[I,106,i]	eṣā vicāryamāṇā tu bhidyate na anumānataḥ pratibandhāt vinā vastu na vastu antara bodhakam yam kañcid artham ālokya na yaḥ kaścid pratīyate pratibandhaḥ api na ajñātaḥ prayāti mati hetu tām na sadyojāta bāla ādeḥ udbhavanti tathā dhiyaḥ na viśeṣa ātmanā yatra saṃbandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ tatra api asti eva sāmānya rūpeṇa tad upagrahaḥ 
[I,107,i]	api ca tena vinā na upapadyate iti kalpanam arthāpattiḥ tena vinā na upapadyate iti ca vyatireka bhaṇitiḥ iyam vyatirekaḥ ca pratītaḥ tasmin sati upapadyate iti anvayam ākṣipati anvaya vyatirekau ca gamakasya liṅgasya dharmaḥ iti katham arthāpattiḥ na anumānam kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ anvaya mūlaḥ eva gamakaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,107,ii_I,107,iii]	yāḥ ca pratyakṣa ādi pūrvikāḥ śakti kalpanāyām artha āpattayaḥ udāhṛtāḥ tāḥ ca śakteḥ atīndriyāyāḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayā eva svarūpāt udbhavat kāryam saha kārī upavṛhmitāt na hi kalpayitum śaktam śaktim anyām atīndriyām 
[I,107,iv_I,108,i]	nanu śaktim antareṇa kārakam kārakam eva na bhavet yathā pādapam chettu manasā paraśuḥ udyamyate tathā pādukā ādi api udyamyeta śakteḥ anabhyupagame hi dravya svarūpā viśeṣāt sarvasmāt sarvadā sarva kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ tathā hi viṣa dahanayoḥ māraṇe dāhe ca śakta a aniṣyamāṇāyām mantra pratibaddhāyām svarūpa pratyabhijñāyām satyām api sva kārya audāsīnyam yat dṛśyate tatra kā yuktiḥ na hi mantreṇa svarūpa sahakāri sānnidhyam pratibadhyate tasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt śaktiḥ tu pratibadhyate iti sati api svarūpe satsu api sahakāriṣu kārya anutpādaḥ yuktaḥ kiñca sevā adhyayana ādi sāmye api phala vaicitrya darśanāt atīndriyam kim api kāraṇam kalpitam eva dharma ādi bhavadbhiḥ atas śaktiḥ atīndriyā tathā abhyupagamyatām iti 
[I,108,ii_I,109,i]	tat etat anupapannam yat tāvat upādāna niyamāt iti uktam tatra ucyate na hi vayam adya kiñcid abhinavam bhāvānām kārya kāraṇa bhāvam utthāpayitum śaknumaḥ kintu yathāpravṛttam anusarantaḥ vyavaharāmaḥ na hi asmad icchayā āpaḥ śītam śamayanti kṛśānuḥ vā pipāsām tatra chedana ādau anvaya vyatirekābhyām vā vṛddha vyavahārāt vā paraśvadha ādeḥ eva kāraṇa tvam adhyavagacchāmaḥ iti tat eva tad arthinaḥ upādadmahe na pādukā ādi iti 
[I,109,ii_I,109,iii]	na ca paraśvadha ādeḥ svarūpa sannidhāne sati api sarvadā kārya udayaḥ svarūpa vat sahakāriṇām api apekṣaṇīya tvāt sahakāri sannidhānasya sarvadā anupapatteḥ sahakāri varge ca dharma ādikam api nipatati tad apekṣe kārya utpāde katham sarvadā tad saṃbhavaḥ dharma adharmayoḥ ca jagat vaicitrya kārya valena kalpanam aparihāryam tayoḥ ca na śakti tvāt atīndriya tvam api tu sva rūpamahimnā eva manaḥ paramāṇu ādi vat 
[I,110,i_I,110,iii]	yat api viṣa dahana sannidhāne sati api mantra prayogāt tad kārya adarśanam tat api na śakti pratibandhana nibandhanam api tu sāmagrī antara anupraveśa hetukam nanu mantreṇa praviśatā tatra kim kṛtam na kiñcid kṛtam sāmagryantaram tu saṃpāditam kācid hi sāmagrī kasyacid kāryasya hetuḥ svarūpam tad avastham eva iti ced yadi evam abhakṣitam api viṣam katham na hanyāt 
[I,110,iv_I,111,iii]	tatrā aasi asaṃyoga ādi apekṣaṇīyam asti iti ced mantra abhāvaḥ api apekṣya tām divya karaṇa kāle dharmaḥ iva mantraḥ api anupraviṣṭaḥ kāryam pratihanti śakti pakṣe api vā mantrasya kaḥ vyāpāraḥ mantreṇa hi śakteḥ nāśaḥ vā kriyate pratibandhaḥ vā na tāvat nāśaḥ mantra apagame punar tad kārya darśanāt pratibandhaḥ tu svarūpasya eva śakteḥ iva astu svarūpasya kim jātam śakteḥ api kim jātam kārya audāsīnyam iti ced tat itaratra api samānam svarūpam asti eva dṛśyamāna tvāt iti ced śaktiḥ api asti eva punar kārya darśanena anumīyamāna tvāt iti 
[I,111,iv]	kiñca śaktiḥ abhyupagamyamānā padārtha svarūpa vat nityāḥ abhyupagamyeta kāryā vā nitya tve sarvadā kārya udaya prasaṅgaḥ sahakārī apekṣāyām tu svarūpasya eva tad apekṣā astu kim śaktyā kāryatve tu śakteḥ padārtha svarūpa mātra kārya tvam vā syāt sahakārya ādi sāmagrī kārya tvam vā sva rūpa mātra kārya tve punar api sarvadā kārya utpāda prasaṅgaḥ sarvadā śakteḥ utpādāt sāmagrī kārya tve tukāryam eva sāmagrī kāryam astu kim antarāla vartinyā śaktyā 
[I,112,i]	aśaktāt kārakāt kāryam na niṣpadyate iti ced śaktiḥ api kāryam tad utpattau api evam śakti antara kalpanādanavasthā 
[I,112,ii]	āha dṛṣṭa siddhaye hi adṛṣṭam kalpyate na tu dṛṣṭa vighātāya śakti antara kalpanāyām śakti śreṇī nirmāṇaḥ eva kṣīṇa tvāt kārakāṇām kārya vighātaḥ syāt iti ekā eva śaktiḥ kalpyate tat kutas anavasthā 
[I,112,iii_I,113,ii]	atra ucyate yadi adṛṣṭam antareṇa dṛṣṭam na siddhyati kāmam adṛṣṭam kalpyatām anyathā api tad upapattau kim tad upakalpanena darśitā ca anyathā api upapattiḥ kalpyamānam api ca adṛṣṭam tat kalpyatām yat anavasthām na avaheta dharma ādi vat api ca vyāpāraḥ api atīndriyaḥ śakti vat iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ anyatara kalpanayā eva kārya upapatteḥ kim ubhaya kalpanā gauraveṇa 
[I,113,iii_I,114,i]	śaktam avyāpriyamāṇam na kārakam kārakam iti ced tat śaktam iti tadā katham jānāmi kārya darśanāt jñāsyāmi iti ced vyāpārāt eva kāryam setsyati pādukā ādeḥ vyāpriyamāṇāt api na pādapa chedaḥ dṛśyate iti ced pratyakṣaḥ tarhi vyāpāraḥ na atīndriyaḥ yatas kārya darśanāt pūrvam api vyāpriyamāṇa tvam jñātam āyuṣma tā kārya anumeyaḥ hi vyāpāraḥ kāryam vinā na jñāyeta eva kāryam tu anyatarasmāt api ghaṭamānam na ubhayam kalpayitum prabhavati iti alam prasaṅgena prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ tasmāt atīndriyāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvāt nirviṣayāḥ yathā udāhṛtāḥ tāḥ artha āpattayaḥ bhavanti 
[I,114,ii_I,114,iii]	api vā śaktiḥ atīndriyāḥ anumānasya eva viṣayaḥ kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvena vyāpti grahaṇāt sva rūpa mātrasya ca kāraṇa tva anirvahaṇāt adhikam kim api anumāsyate sā śaktiḥ iti śabda nitya tva siddhau tu yā arthāpattiḥ udāhṛtā tasyāḥ śabda parīkṣāyām samādhiḥ abhidhāsyate 
[I,114,iv_I,115,i]	abhāva pūrvikā api arthāpattiḥ anumānam eva jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvena liṅga bhūtena bahirbhāva avagamāt caitrasya gṛha abhāvaḥ dharmī bahis bhāvena tadvān iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ jīvan manuṣya gṛha abhāva tvāt pūrva upalabdhā evaṃvidha gṛha abhāva vat yathā dhūmaḥ dharmī vahnimān iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ dhūma tvāt pūrva upalabdha dhūma vat iti atas ca gṛha ādīnām liṅga tva āśaṅkanam apākaraṇam ca āḍambara mātram 
[I,115,ii_I,116,i]	yat punar prameya anupraveśa dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi tat api na sāṃpratam kim prameyam abhimatam atrabhavatām kim sattā mātram uta bahis deśa viśeṣitam sattvam sattā mātram tāvat āgamāt eva avagatam iti na pramāṇa antara prameya tām avalambate bahis deśa viśeṣitam tu sattvam bhavati prameyam tasya tu tadānīm anupraveśaḥ kutastyaḥ gṛha abhāva grāhakam hi pramāṇam gṛhe eva sat upalambhaka pramāṇa avakāśam apākaroti na bahissaṃdasattva cintām prastauti mṛtasya jīvataḥ dūre tiṣṭhataḥ prāṅgaṇe api vā gṛha abhāva paricchede na viśeṣaḥ asti kaścana jīvana viśiṣṭaḥ tu asau gṛhyamāṇaḥ liṅga tām aśnute vyabhicāra nirāsāt na ca viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam eva prameya grahaṇam jīvanam anyat anyat ca bahirbhāva ākhyam prameyam 
[I,116,ii_I,116,iii]	nanu jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ na etat evam jīvana viśiṣṭa gṛha abhāva pratīteḥ bahirbhāvasya pratītiḥ na tad pratītiḥ eva bahirbhāva pratītiḥ na hi dahana adhikaraṇe dhūma pratītiḥ eva dahana pratītiḥ nanu dhūmāt anyaḥ eva dahanaḥ iha api gṛha abhāva jīvanābhyām anyaḥ eva bahirbhāvaḥ 
[I,116,iv_I,116,v]	parvata hutavahayoḥ siddha tvāt mattu artha mātram tatra apūrvam anumeyam evam iha api bahis deśa yoga mātram apūrvam anumeyam yadi tu tat adhikam prameyam iha na iṣyate tadā gṛha abhāva jīvanayoḥ sva pramāṇābhyām avadhāraṇāt ānarthakyam arthāpatteḥ tasmāt prameya antara sadbhāvāt tasya ca tadānīm ananupraveśāt na prameya anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ 
[I,117,i]	artha āpattau api ca tulyaḥ eva ayam doṣaḥ tatra api arthāt artha antara kalpanā abhyupagamāt dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ anyathā na upapadyate iti artha kalpanā iti evam grantha upanibandhāt tasya tasmāt pratītiḥ iti yatra vyavahāraḥ tatra avaśyam tad pratītau tad anupraveśaḥ doṣaḥ eva svabhāva hetau iva tad buddhi siddhyā tad siddheḥ pramāṇa antara vaiphalyāt iti 
[I,117,ii_I,118,i]	prabhākarāḥ tu prakāra antareṇa anumānāt bhedam atra ācakṣate anumāne gamaka viśeṣaṇam anyathā anupapannam analam vinā dhūmaḥ hi na upapadyate iha tu viparyayaḥ gamyaḥ gamakena vinā na upapadyate gamyaḥ bahirbhāvaḥ sa jīvataḥ gṛha abhāvam vinā na upapadyate gṛhāt nirgataḥ jīvan bahis bhavati iti bhāṣya papi evam yojayanti dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā arthaḥ artha kalpanā artha antaram kalpayati iti arthaḥ yatas sā kalpanā prameya dvārikā anyathā anupapadyate iti arthaḥ evam gamya gamakayoḥ anupapadyamāna tva viparyayāt anumānāt pramāṇa antaram iyam arthāpattiḥ iti bahirbhāvaḥ anyathānopapadyate sa ca gamyaḥ iti 
[I,118,ii_I,118,iii]	etat api grantha vaiṣamya upapādana mātram na tu nūtana viśeṣa utprekṣaṇam gamye tāvat agṛhīte sati tad gatam anupapadyamāna tvam katham avadhāryeta gṛhīte tu gamye kim tad gata anupapadyamāna tva grahaṇena sādhyasya siddha tvāt purā tad gatam anyathā anupapadyamāna tvam gṛhītam āsīt iti ced aho mahān anu mānāt viśeṣaḥ idam hi pūrvam pratibandha grahaṇam uktam syāt 
[I,119,i_I,119,iii]	api ca bahirbhāvasya gṛha abhāvam vinā anupapattiḥ iti ukte tasmin sati tasya upapattiḥ vaktavyā sā ca kā kim utpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā yadi jñaptiḥ sā ca anumāne api gamyam gamakam vinā na asti tasmin sati asti iti samānaḥ panthāḥ utpattiḥ tu gṛha abhāvāt bahirbhāvasya durbhaṇā prāc siddhe hi gṛha abhāve tad utpādaḥ kṣaṇa antare kāraṇam pūrva siddham hi kārya utpādāya kalpate tena ekatra kṣaṇe jīvan na gṛhe na bahis bhavet tasmāt yat kiñcid etat 
[I,119,iv]	evañca yat eke jñapti utpatti kṛtam iha vailakṣaṇyam utprekṣitavantaḥ dhūmena agniḥ gamyate eva gṛha abhāvena bahirbhāvaḥ janyate api iti tat api pratyuktam bhavati 
[I,119,v_I,120,ii]	yat tu sambandha grahaṇa abhāvāt iti uktam tat api na sundaram mandira dvāra vartinaḥ tad utpatteḥ etat ca svayam āśaṅkya na taiḥ pratisamāhitam udāharaṇam anyat tu vyatyayena pradarśitam gṛha bhāvena bahirabhāva kalpanam iti tatra etat eva vaktavyam iyam abhāva pūrvikā na bhavati eva arthāpattiḥ ṣaṣ arthāpattīḥ pratijñāya imām abhāva pūrvikām arthāpattim uktvā upanaiyyāyika kesari kaṭākṣa pāta bhītām iha gahane hariṇīm iva yat upekṣya gamyate tat atyantam atrabhava tām ana artha jana ucitam ceṣṭitam 
[I,120,iii_I,120,iv]	tvad eka śaraṇām bālām imām utsṛjya gacchataḥ katham te tarkayiṣyanti mukham anyāḥ api striyaḥ bhāvena abhāva kalpanā tu pratyakṣa pūrvikā eva artha āpattiḥ tasyāḥ api ca na duravagamaḥ sambandhaḥ asarva gatasya dravyasya niyata deśa vṛtteḥ akleśena tad itara deśa nāstitva avadhāraṇāt anagni vyatireka niścaye ca dhūmasya bhavatām kā gatiḥ yā tatra vārtā sā eva iha api naḥ bhaviṣyati 
[I,120,v_I,121,i]	na ca bhūyas darśanau agamyamāna anvaya mātra eka śaraṇa tayā yasya vastu antara abhāvaḥ gamyaḥ tasya eva duṣyati mama tu adṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam aniścita vyatirekasya sādhya niścaya abhāvāt iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vat vyatirekaḥ api na agṛhītaḥ anumāna aṅgam bahirbhāva siddhau ca anumāna prayogaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ tvayā darśitaḥ tasya tu pratiprayogaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viruddha tvāt hetvābhāse eva iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,121,ii]	śruta arthāpattiḥ api varākī na anumānāt bhidyate vacana eka deśa kalpanāyāḥ anupapanna tvāt arthasya ca kārya liṅga gamyasya sattvāt yathā kṣitidhara kandhara adhikaraṇam dhūmam avalokya tad kāraṇam analam anuminoti bhavān evam āgamāt pīna tva ākhyam kāryam avadhārya tad kāraṇam api bhojanam anuminotu kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ tad kārya tayā bhūyas darśanataḥ pratipanna tvāt liṅgasya tu kvacid pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam kvacid vacanataḥ pratipattiḥ iti na eṣa mahān bhedaḥ 
[I,122,i_I,122,iv]	nanu vacanam aparipūrṇam iti pratītim eva yathocitām janayitum asamartham kim pīnaḥ devadattaḥ divā na bhuṅkte iti atas na bhavati tad pīnatā pratītiḥ na na bhavati sa ākāṅkṣā tu bhavati na ca sa ākāṅkṣa pratīti kāriṇaḥ tasya prāmāṇyam iti tat eva tāvat pūrayitum yuktam tat asat kasya atra sa ākāṅkṣa tvam kim śabdasya kim vā tad arthasya uta svid tadava gamasya iti 
[I,122,v_I,122,vii]	śabdasya tāvat artha nirapekṣasya na kācid ākāṅkṣā anabhivyakta śabda vat arthaḥ tu sā ākāṅkṣassan artha antaram upakalpayatu kaḥ avasaraḥ vacana kalpanāyāḥ avagamaḥ api artha viṣayaḥ eva sa ākāṅkṣaḥ bhavati na śabda viṣayaḥ śrotra karaṇakaḥ tasmāt avagamanaiḥ ākāṅkṣya siddhaye tad artha kalpanam eva yuktam vacana eka deśa kalpanam api artha avagati siddhi artham eva iti tad kalpanam eva astu kim sopāna antareṇa 
[I,123,i_I,123,ii]	yat tu kalpyamānasya arthasya avaidika tvam prāpnoti iti tatra vacana kalpanā pakṣe suta rāma vaidikaḥ saḥ arthaḥ syāt kalpyamānasya vacanasya vedāt anyatvāt śrutaḥ anumitaḥ ca dvividhaḥ sa vedaḥ eva iti ced śrauta arthaḥ śrauta artha anumitaḥ dvividhaḥ sa veda arthaḥ eva bhaviṣyati iti kim vacana sopāna antara kalpanayā tena śrūyamāṇa veda vacana pratipādya artha sāmarthya labhya tvāt eva tasya veda artha tā bhaviṣyati sarvathā na vacana eka deśa viṣayā śruta arthāpattiḥ śreyasī śruti eka deśa kalpanā pakṣa pratikṣepāt ca 
[I,123,iii]	tad atīndriya tayā sambandha grahaṇam aghaṭamānam iti yat uktam tat api pratyuktam arthe tu sāmānyena sambandha grahaṇam api sūpa pādam tatra tatra yaji ādeḥ arthasya adhikāra ādi artha antara sambaddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt iti 
[I,124,i]	prābhākarāḥ tu dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ vā itibhāṣyam laukikam abhidhāna antaram eva idam upalabdhi vacanam iti varṇayantaḥ śruta arthāpattim pratyācakṣate śrūyamāṇasya eva śabdasya tāvatī arthe sāmarthyam upagacchantaḥ tam artham śābdam eva pratijānate vākyasya dūra avidūra vyavasthita guṇa aguṇa kriyā ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa uparakta kārya ātmaka vākya artha pratītau iṣoḥ iva dīrgha dīrghaḥ vyāpāraḥ avirata vyāpāre ca śabde sā pratītiḥ udeti tad vyāpāra viratau na udeti tad utpādaka kāraka abhāvāt vṛddha vyavahārataḥ ca śabdeṣu vyutpadyamānaḥ lokaḥ tathābhūta vākya vyavahāriṇaḥ vṛddhān paśyan vākyasya eva tādṛśa vākya arthe sāmarthyam avadhārayati tad anuvartīni tu padāni tasmin naimittike nimittāni bhavanti 
[I,125,i_I,125,iv]	naimittika ānukūlya paryālocanayā kvacid aśrūyamāṇāni api tāni nimitta tām bhajante viśva jit ādau svarga kāma ādi pada vat kvacid śrūyamāṇāni api tad ananukūla tvāt parityajyante yasya ubhayam haviḥ ārtim ārcchet iti vat kvacid anyathā sthitāni tat anurodhāt anyathā eva sthāpyante prayāja śeṣeṇa havīṃṣi abhighārayati itivat tasmāt prathama avagata eka ghana ākāra vākya artha anusāreṇa satām asatām vā padānām nimitta bhāva vyavasthāpanāt aśrūyamāṇa tathāvidha eka deśāt api vākyāt tad artha avagati saṃbhavāt kim śruta artha āpattyā atas eva na sa upāta vyavahitam tasya arthasya śābda tvam sākṣāt eva tad siddheḥ 
[I,125,v_I,126,i]	nanu aśrūyamāṇeṣu nimitteṣu kutas tad artham avagacchāmaḥ anavagacchantaḥ ca kīdṛśam naimittikam avakalpayāmaḥ ucyate śruteṣu api padeṣu teṣām nimitta bhāvaḥ na sva mahimnā avaphalpate kintu naimittika anusāra dvārakaḥ iti uktam evam aśruteṣī api bhaviṣyati na yajau karaṇa vibhaktim śṛṇumaḥ na svarge karma vibhaktim na agnacit ādiṣu kvippratyayam na adhunā ādiṣu prakṛtim na samāsa tad hiteṣu yathocitām vibhaktim api ca pratīmaḥ eva tad artham evam viśva jit ādau api yajeta iti naimittika balāt eva svarga kāma ādi padārtham pratyeṣyāmaḥ niyoga garbha tvāt ca viniyogasya liṅga ādīni śruti kalpanām antareṇa api niyoga vyāpāram parigṛhya tena vastuni viniyojaka tām pratipatsyante 
[I,126,ii_I,127,i]	nanu evam sati sarvatra śabda vyāpāra saṃbhavāt mukhyasya api bhavet sāmyam gauṇala akṣaṇikā ādibhiḥ śruti liṅga ādi mānānām virodhe yat ca varṇyate pūrva pūrva balīyaḥ tvam tat katham vā bhaviṣyati ucyate sati api sarvatra śabda vyāpāre tad prakāra bheda upapatteḥ eṣa na doṣaḥ na hi padānām sarva ātmanā nimitta bhāvam apahāya eva naimittika pratītiḥ upaplavate tad aparityāgāt ca tad svarūpa vaicitryam anuvartate eva 
[I,127,ii_I,127,iii]	anyathā siṃha śabdena matiḥ kesariṇī sute anyathā devadatta ādau pratītiḥ upajanyate gaṅgāyām majjati iti atra gaṅgā śabdaḥ nimitta tām upayāti yathā na evam ghoṣa ādi vasatau tathā śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām api artha sannikarṣa viprakarṣa kṛtaḥ asti eva viśeṣaḥ iti tatra api na viniyoga sāmyam 
[I,127,iv_I,128,i]	śruti liṅga ādibhiḥ yaḥ api kalpayet viniyojikām tasya api tasyāḥ tulya tvāt bādhya bādhaka tā katham atha tad kalpane teṣām vidūra antika vṛtti tā saḥ eva artha gataḥ nyāyaḥ iti tad kalpanena kim aindra agna ādiṣu vaikṛteṣu karmasu na prākṛta vidhi anta vacana anumānam api tu ca udaka vyāpāreṇa tasya eva prāptiḥ vaikṛtasya vidheḥ kācid ākāṅkṣā ca udakaḥ iti ucyate 
[I,128,ii_I,128,iii]	nanu evam ubhayatra tad avagama aviśeṣāt upadeśa atideśayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ na niyoga avagame kaścid viśeṣaḥ kintu upadeśe yathopadeśam kāryam atideśe tu yathākāryam upadeśaḥ iti etayoḥ viśeṣaḥ nanu yathākāryam upadeśe anupayujyamāna kṛṣṇala carvavaghāta ādeḥ prāptiḥ eva na bhavet iti kaḥ bādha arthaḥ na akhaṇḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa prāpteḥ na hi aṃśa aṃśikayā ca udakaḥ pravartate iti alam anayā prasakta anuprasakti āgata śāstra antara garbha kathā vistara prastāvanayā 
[I,129,i]	iti prasaṅgāt vyākhyātam leśataḥ vākya vid matam etasya yuktā yukta tva paricchede tu ke vayam śruta arthāpattiḥ asmākam dūṣaṇīya tayā sthitā tad dūṣaṇam ca pūrva ukta vīthyā anena pathā astu vā 
[I,129,ii_I,129,iii]	etena śabda sāmarthya mahimnā saḥ api vāritaḥ yam anyaḥ paṇḍitaṃmanyaḥ prapede kaṃcana dhvanim vidheḥ niṣedha avagatiḥ vidhi buddhiḥ niṣedhataḥ yathā bhava dhammiya vīsatthaḥ mā sma pāntha gṛham viśa māna antara paricchedya vastu rūpa upadeśinām śabdānām eva sāmarthyam tatra tatra tathā tathā athavā na īdṛśī carcā kavibhiḥ saha śobhate vidvāṃsaḥ api vimuhyanti vākya artha gahane adhvani tat alam anayā goṣṭhyā vidvat jana ucitayā ciram parama gahanaḥ tarka jñānām abhūmiḥ ayam nayaḥ prakṛtam adhunā tasmāt brūmaḥ na bhāti anumānataḥ tanuḥ api satām artha āpatteḥ viśeṣaḥ iti sthitam 
[I,130,i_I,131,iii]	āha abhāvaḥ tarhi pramāṇa antara mastuḥ sat paricchedakam yatra na pramāṇam pravartate tad abhāva mitau mānam pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭam prati sat upalambhaka pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ na asti iti asau pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa abhāvam paricchinatti tatra ca ghaṭa viṣaya jñātṛvyāpārān utpādaḥ eva dṛśya adarśana vācyaḥ pramāṇam na asti iti buddhiḥ phalam atha vā ghaṭa abhāva grāhī grahītṛ vyāpāra sat upalambhaka pramāṇa abhāva janitaḥ na asti iti pratyaya svabhāvaḥ pramāṇam phalam tu hāna ādi jñānam bhaviṣyati tat uktam pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate sā aatmaṇaḥ apariṇāmaḥ vā vijñānam vā anya vastuni iti anya vastu śabdana ghaṭa abhāvaḥ eva uktaḥ 
[I,132,i]	tatra tāvat idam na asti iti jñānam na pratyakṣa janitam indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāvāt sannikarṣaḥ hi saṃyoga samavāya svabhāvaḥ tad prabhava bhedaḥ vā saṃyukta samavāya ādiḥ iha na asti eva saṃyuktaṃviśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ api na saṃbhavati kumbha abhāvasya bhū pradeśa viśeṣaṇa tva abhāvāt na hi asaṃyuktam asamavetam vā kiñcid viśeṣaṇam bhavati saṃyuktasya daṇḍa ādeḥ samavetasya śukla guṇa ādeḥ tathā abhāva darśanāt abhāvaḥ ca na kenacid saṃyujyate adravya bhāvāt na kvacid samavaiti guṇa ādi vailakṣaṇyāt iti 
[I,132,ii_I,132,iii]	yadi ca saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvam gṛhṇāti tarhi tad aviśeṣāt saṃyukta dravya vṛttīn rasa ādīn api gṛhṇīyāt ayogya tvāt na gṛhṇāti iti ced tad abhāvam api mā grahīt ayogya tva aviśeṣāt yogya ayogya tva kṛta grahaṇa agrahaṇa niyama vāde vā yogya tā eva sannikarṣaḥ bhavatu kim ṣaṭka ghoṣeṇa tasmāt na ghaṭa abhāva jñānam cākṣuṣam 
[I,133,i_I,133,ii]	nanu bhū pradeśam ca ghaṭa abhāvam ca viṣphārite cakṣuṣi nirīkṣāmahe nimīlite tu tasmin tayoḥ anyataram api na paśyāmaḥ tatra samāne ca tad bhāva bhāvi tve bhū pradeśa jñānam cākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tu na cākṣuṣam iti kutas viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ bāḍham avagacchāmaḥ sannikarṣa abhāvāt eva na hi asannikṛṣṭam cakṣuḥ avagati janmane prabhavati 
[I,133,iii]	tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tu idam anyathā siddham vidūra deśa vyavasthita sthūla jvālā āvalī jaṭila jvalana gata bhāsvara rūpa upalambha anuvarti tad gata uṣṇa sparśa jñāna vat tatra yathā rūpa anumīyamāna sparśa vedane nayana anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam anyathā siddham evam iha api bhū predeśa upalambhāvinā bhāvini kumbha abhāva grahaṇe tad kṛtam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam iti na cākṣuṣaḥ ghaṭa abhāva pratibhāsaḥ tat uktam gṛhītvā vastu sadbhāvam smṛtvā ca pratiyoginam mānasam na astita ajñānam jāyate akṣa anapekṣayā iti
[I,134,i]	atas ca eva asannihitasya api kvacid grahaṇam sva rūpa mātrakeṇa gauramūlakam upalabdhavataḥ tatas deśa antaram gatasya tatra kenacid gargaḥ asti vā na asti vā iti pṛṣṭasya sata sva rūpa mātram gṛhītam gauramūlakam anusmarataḥ tad ānīm asat nikṛṣṭaṃ api gargasya bhāve tadā eva tasya jñānam udeti tatra indriya kathā api na asti iti na tasya pratyakṣa tvam 
[I,134,ii]	na ca anumāna gamyaḥ ayam abhāvaḥ bhū pradeśasya tad gata ghaṭa adarśanasya vā liṅga tva anupapattaḥ na bhū pradeśaḥ liṅgam agṛhīta sambandhasya api tad pratīteḥ anaikāntika tvāt apakṣa dharma tvāt tad adhikaraṇa abhā a ānantyena sambandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt ca na api ghaṭādarśanam liṅgam apakṣa dharma tvāt ghaṭādarśanam ghaṭasya dharmaḥ na tad abhāvasya ghaṭa abhāva pratītim prati vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt tad dharma tvam asya iti ced na itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt tad dharma tve sati liṅga pratīti janaka tvam pratīti janmani sati tad dharma tvam iti asiddhāyām ca ghaṭa abhāva pratītau tad dharmatā jñānam adarśanasya durghaṭam eva siddhāyām tu kim pakṣa dharma tā jñānena sādhya pratīteḥ siddha tvāt 
[I,135,i_I,135,ii]	api ca idam adarśana ākhyam liṅgam avidita vyāpti katham abhāvasya anumāpakam bhavet vyāpti grahaṇam ca dhūma agni vat ubhaya dharmi grahaṇa pūrvakam tatra vyāpti grahaṇa velāyām eva tāvat kutastyam abhāva ākhya dharmi grahaṇam iti cintyam tatas eva anumānāt iti yadi ucyate tad itaretara āśrayam anumāna antara nibandhane tu tad grahaṇe anavasthā 
[I,136,i_I,136,iii]	adarśana ākhyam liṅgam api darśana abhāva svabhāvam iti tad svarūpa pariccheda cintāyām api ayam eva panthāḥ atas dūram api gatvā tad avagama siddhaye pramāṇa antaram abhāva pariccheda nipuṇam avagantavyam iti tatas eva tad avagama siddheḥ na tasya anumeya tvam na ca idam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam śabda upamāna artha apatti anyatama nimittam āśaṅkitum api yuktam iti sat upalambhaka pramāṇa atīta tvāt abhāvasya eva bhūmiḥ abhāvaḥ iti yuktam api ca prameyam anurūpeṇa pramāṇena pramātum uvitam bhāva ātmake prameye hi na abhāvasya pramāṇa tā abhāve api prameye syāt na bhāvasya pramāṇa tā na prameyam abhāva ākhyam nihnutam bauddha vat tvayā pramāṇam api tena idam abhāva ātmakam iṣyatām 
[I,136,iv_I,137,i]	atra abhidhīyate satyam abhāvaḥ prameyam abhyupagamyate pratyakṣa ādi avasīyamāna svarūpa tvāt tu na pramāṇa antaram ātma paricchittaye mṛgayate adūra medinī deśa vartinaḥ tasya cakṣuṣā paricchedaḥ parokṣasya kvacid māna antaraiḥ api tathā ca iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti jñānam ekam eva idam iha kuṇḍe dadhi iti jñāna vat ubhaya ālambanam anuparata nayana vyāpārasya bhavati tatra bhū pradeśa mātraḥ eva nayana jam jñānam itaratra pramāṇa antara janitam iti kutastyaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ 
[I,137,ii]	atra agniḥ iti yuktaḥ ayam anakṣajaḥ pratibhāsaḥ dhūma grahaṇa anantaram avinā abhāva smaraṇa ādi buddhi antara vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt iha tu tathā na asti eva avyavahitā eva hi bhū pradeśa vat ghaṭana astitā avagatiḥ avicchedena anubhūyate na ca kṣitidhara adhikaraṇa parokṣa āśu śukṣaṇi vat anīkṣaṇa viṣaya tā bhavati abhāvasya tad vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad pratīteḥ tatra hi vyāpṛta akṣaḥ api na parvata vartinam analam avalokayitum utsahate iha tu ghaṭa abhāvam aparimlāna nayana vyāpāraḥ eva paśyati iti cākṣuṣam abhāva jñānam tad bhāva bhāvitva anuvidhānāt 
[I,138,i_I,138,iii]	na ca dūra sthita hutavaha rūpa darśana pūrvaka sparśa anumāna vat idam anyathā siddham tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tatra hi bahuśas sparśa darśana kauśala śūnya tvam avadhāritam cakṣuṣaḥ sparśa paricchedi ca kāraṇa antaram tvac indriyam avagatam avinā bhāvitā ca purā tathāvidhayaḥ rūpa sparśayoḥ upalabdhā iti anumeyaḥ eva asau sparśaḥ iti yuktam tatra anyathā siddha tvam cakṣuḥ vyāpārasya prakṛte tu na īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ samasti na ca ekatra tad bhāva bhāvi tvam anyathā siddham iti sarvatra tathā kalpyate evam hi rūpam api cākṣupatām avajahyāt 
[I,138,iv_I,139,i]	nanu nīrūpasya asaṃbaddhasya ca cākṣuṣa tvam abhāvasya katham abhidhīyate cakṣuḥ janita jñāna vat tvāt hi cākṣuṣa tvam na rūpavat tvena rūpavatām api paramāṇūnām acākṣuṣa tvāt nīrūpasya api rūpasya cākṣuṣa tvāt ca saṃbaddham api na sarvam cākṣuṣam ākāśasya tathā ātve api tad abhāvāt nanu asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇe dūra vyavahitasya vibhīṣaṇa ādeḥ api cākṣuṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ ucyate bhāve khalu ayam niyamaḥ yat asambaddhasya cakṣuṣā agrahaṇam abhāvaḥ tu asambaddhaḥ api cakṣuṣā gṛhīṣyate 
[I,139,ii_I,139,iv]	ṣaṣ prakāra sannikarṣa varṇanam api bhāva abhiprāyam eva sambaddha hi yat gṛhyate tat ṣaṇṇām sannikarṣaṇām anyatamena sannikarṣeṇa iti prāpya kāri tvam api indriyāṇām vastu abhiprāyam eva ucyate tasmāt avastu tvāt abhāvasya tena sannikarṣam alabhamānam api nayanam upajanayati tad viṣayam avagamam iti na doṣaḥ na ca asambaddhatva aviśeṣāt deśa antara ādiṣu sarva abhāva grahaṇam āśaṅkanīyam āśraya grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvāt abhāva pratītaḥ āśrayasya ca sannihitasya eva pratyakṣa tvāt 
[I,139,v]	athavā saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāva ākhya sannikarṣa upakṛtam cakṣuḥ abhāvam grahīṣyati yathā samavāya pratyakṣa tva vādinām pakṣe samavāyāmati 
[I,140,i]	nanu tat idam asiddham asiddhasya dṛṣṭāntīkriyate mā evam bhavatā api dravya guṇayoḥ vṛtteḥ aparihārya tvāt bheda buddhyā siddha bhedayoḥ asambaddhayoḥ ca dravya guṇayoḥ adarśanāt avaśyam kācid vṛttiḥ eṣitavyā iti alam artha antara cintanena 
[I,140,ii]	yat tu uktam saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ abhāvāt abhāvaḥ na bhū pradeśasya viśeṣaṇam iti tat api asādhu saṃyoga samavāyābhyām anyasya eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva nāmnaḥ sambandhasya adūraḥ eva pratīti balena darśayiṣyamāṇa tvāt 
[I,140,iii_I,140,iv]	yaḥ tu saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāve sannikarṣe rasa ādibhiḥ ati prasaṅgaḥ udbhāvitaḥ saḥ ayam saṃyukta samavāya ākhye cakṣū rūpa sannikarṣe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ saṃyukta samavāyaḥ api tarhi mā bhūt sannikarṣaḥ kim naḥ chinnam tat kim asambaddham eva rūpam gṛhṇātu cakṣuḥ na hi saṃyukta samavāyāt anyaḥ cakṣū rūpayoḥ sambandhaḥ 
[I,141,i]	nanu artha grahaṇa ātmakaḥ vyāpāraḥ eva cakṣuṣaḥ sannikarṣaḥ yogyatā vā tad vaśāt eva rūpasya tat grāhakam upeyate na ca saṃyukta samavāya ādinā iti sa tarhi vyāpāraḥ sā vā yogya tā katham abhāvam api prati tasya na syāt prāpya kārīṇi ca indriyāṇi kāraka tvāt iṣyante sannikarṣaḥ ca nihnūyate iti vipratiṣiddham 
[I,141,ii_I,141,iii]	tasmāt ṣaṣ prakārā sannikarṣa anugāminī yogya tā vaktavyā na yogyatā mātraḥ eva viśramya sthātavyam yatra yogyatā tatra sannikarṣaḥ api asti na tu yatra sannikarṣaḥ tatra avaśyam yogyatā iti evam abhyupagacchatām na rasa ādi ati prasaṅga codanāḥ dhunoti manaḥ rasa ādeḥ sati api sannikarṣe yogya tva abhāvāt agrahaṇam yogya tā mātra vāde api na abhau asya astyayogya tā bhavadbhiḥ vastu dharmaḥ asya kaḥ vā na abhyupagamyate sarva upākhya viyukta tvāt na asti eva iti eṣa vā ucyatām abhāvaḥ cākṣuṣa jñāna viṣayaḥ vā abhyupeyatām 
[I,142,i]	yat api sva rūpa mātram dṛṣṭvā api paścāt kiñcid smaran api tatra āmyanāstitām pṛṣṭaḥ tadā eva pratipadyate iti uktam tat api na yuktam vastu antara vivikta gaura mūlaka svarūpa grahaṇa samayaḥ eva tatra asat nihita sakala padārtha abhāva grahaṇasya mecaka buddhyā siddha tvāt idānīm tad gata gargā bhāva smaraṇam na tasya parokṣasya anubhavaḥ 
[I,142,ii_I,142,iii]	tathā hi tadānīm gargaḥ tatra na āsīt iti evam asau smṛtvā satya vādī vadati idānīm astitvanāstitve prati saṃśetaḥ eva asau gargasya kutaścid āgatasya idānīm tatra astitva saṃbhavāt nanu na pūrvam sarva abhāva grahaṇam anubhūtavān asau gauramūlake iti ced ananubhūyamānam api tat asya balāt kalpyate abhyasta viṣaye avinā abhāva smaraṇa vat tathā hi tena tena anuyuktaḥ tasya tasya abhāvam smṛtvā uttaram asau sarvebhyaḥ ācaṣṭe 
[I,143,i]	nanu mecaka buddhyā sakala abhāva grahaṇe sahasā eva sakala abhāva smṛtiḥ upajāyeta mā evam yatra eva praśna ādi smaraṇa kāraṇam asya bhavati tat eva smarati na sarvam avidyamāna smaraṇa nimittam krama upalabdheṣu api varṇeṣu yugapadanti avarṇa anubhava samanantaram smaraṇam anyatra tu yugapad upalabdhe api krameṇa smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti na mecaka buddhau ayam doṣaḥ 
[I,143,ii_I,143,iii]	kiñca svarūpa mātram dṛṣṭam iti vadatā bhavatā api mecaka jñānam abhyupagatam eva mātra grahaṇena tad anya abhāva grahaṇa siddheḥ evam hi bhavān eva abhyadhāt ayam eva iti yaḥ hi eṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇayaḥ na eṣa vastu antara abhāva saṃvitti anugamāt ṛte iti tasmāt gaura mūlaka avagama samayaḥ eva tatra asat nihitasya garga ādeḥ abhāva grahaṇāt na idānīm parokṣa abhāva grahaṇam abhāva kāraṇakam abhyupagantavyam iti pratyakṣa gamyaḥ eva ayam abhāvaḥ 
[I,144,i_I,144,iii]	yat punar ananumeya tvam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti prakṛta abhāva viṣayam abhyadhāyi tat asmākam abhimatam eva kaścid punar asannikṛṣṭa deśa vṛttiḥ anumeyaḥ api bhavati abhāvaḥ yathā santamase salila dhārā visara sikta sasya mūlam abhivarṣati deve ghana pavana saṃyoga abhāvaḥ anumīyate yathā vā arthāpattau udāhṛtam gṛha abhāvena caitrasya bāheḥ abhāva kalpanam iti āgamāt api abhāvasya kvacid bhavati niścayaḥ cora ādinā astita ajñānam adhvagānām iva āptataḥ 
[I,144,iv_I,144,v]	yat punar anurūpeṇa pramāṇena prameyam pramīyate prameya tvāt bhāva ātmaka prameya vat iti etat api aprayojakam sādhanam abhāvaḥ paṭala ādīnām pratyakṣasya prapadyate vipakṣa vṛtti abhāvaḥ ca liṅgasya sahakāritām puruṣoktiṣu doṣāṇām abhāvaḥ ca upayujyate sāmagrī antargatāt tasmāt abhāvāt api bhāva dhīḥ abhāvaḥ ca kvacid liṅgam iṣyate bhāva saṃvidaḥ vṛṣṭyabhāvaḥ api vāyu abhra saṃyogasya anumāpakaḥ tasmāt yuktam abhāvasya na abhāvena eva vedanam na nāma yādṛśaḥ yakṣaḥ valiḥ api asya tādṛśaḥ 
[I,145,i_I,145,ii]	atra rakta paṭāḥ prāhuḥ prameye sati cintanam yuktam nāma pramāṇasya tat eva tu ati durlabham abhāvaḥ nāma pratīyamānaḥ na tu atantra tayā ghaṭa ādi bhāva svarūpa vat anubhūyate api tu deśa kāla pratiyogi viśiṣṭa tvena tathā hi evam pratītiḥ idam idānīm iha na asti iti sa ca ittham avagamyamānaḥ api yadi taiḥ sambaddhaḥ eva bhavet abhāvaḥ kaḥ enam dviṣyāt na tu asau tad saṃbaddhaḥ na hi deśena kālena pratiyoginā saha asya kaścid sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya ādeḥ anupapatteḥ na ca sambandha rahitam eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati 
[I,145,iii_I,146,i]	nanu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ kim sambandha antara apekṣayā mā evam sambandha antara mūlaka tvena tad avagamāt saṃyuktam samaveta vā viśaṣaṇa bhavati daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam iti atas ca na vāstavaḥ svatantraḥ eva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ puruṣa icchayā viparyasyantam api enam paśyāmaḥ viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyībhavati viśeṣyam api viśeṣaṇībhavati iti kālpanikaḥ eva ayam sambandhaḥ na vastu dharmaḥ 
[I,146,ii_I,146,iii]	pratiyoginā saha nata rāma bhāvasya sambandhaḥ asamāna kāla tvāt yadā hi ghaṭaḥ na tadā tad abhāvaḥ yadā vā tad abhāvaḥ na tadā ghaṭaḥ iti virodha ākhyaḥ sambandhaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced kaḥ virodha arthaḥ yadi hi prāk siddhaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ āgatya ghaṭam virundhyāt bhavet api tad virodhī ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva na tu evam asti tayoḥ asamāna kāla tvāt abhyupagame vā ghaṭa tada bhāvayoḥ ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva vadhya ghātukayoḥ sāhacaryam anubhūyeta ghaṭa abhāvaḥ kim kurvan ghaṭam virundhyāt akiñcitkarasya virodhi tve ati prasaktiḥ abhāva antara karaṇe tu anavasthā mudgara ādayaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya hetavaḥ na bhavitum arhanti bhāvasya svatas eva bhaṅgura tvena vināśa hetu anapekṣa tvāt 
[I,147,i_I,147,ii]	bhāvaḥ vinaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ atha api anaśvara ātmā ced kṛtam pralaya hetubhiḥ tasmāt vijātīya kapāla ādi santati jananaḥ eva mudgara ādi kāraka vyāpāraḥ sāmagryantara anupraveśe sati santati antara utpādaḥ na punar abhāvasya tatas niṣpattiḥ sa hi ghaṭāt vastu antaram ced kim āyātam yat asau na pūrvavat upalabhyate tad virodhi tvāt iti ced pratyuktam etat anartha antara tve tu ghaṭasya eva mudgara kārya tvam syāt 
[I,147,iii_I,147,iv]	nanu yāni mudgareṇa kapālāni janyante saḥ eva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ hanta tarhi kapāla āsphoṭane sati ghaṭa abhāvasya vinaṣṭa tvāt ghaṭasya unmajjanam prāpnoti kiñca akiñcitkarāṇi kapālāni ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ iti yadi ucyate paṭasya api tathā ucyeran kiñcid kāraka tvam teṣām pūrvavat pratikṣeptavyam 
[I,148,i]	api ca ayam abhāvaḥ bhavana dharmā vā syāt abhavana dharmā vā bhavana dharma tve bhāvaḥ asau bhavet ghaṭa ādi vat abhavana dharmā tu yadi abhāvaḥ asti sa nityaḥ eva asau tarhi bhavet 
[I,148,ii]	sa ca ayam eka padārtha sambandhī vā syāt sarva padārtha sambandhī vā tatra eka bhāva sambandhi tve na tasya niyama kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ sarva bhāva sambandhi tve tu sarva padārtha pratikṛlasya abhāvasya nitya tvāt nitya sannihita tvāt sakṛt eva trailokya lopa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na nityaḥ anityaḥ vā kaścid abhāvaḥ nāma asti 
[I,148,iii_I,149,i]	nanu abhāva anabhyupagame bhāvānām itaretara saṅkarāt akhila vyavahāra viplavaḥ prāpnoti yat āha kṣīre dadhi bhavet evam dadhni kṣīram ghaṭe paṭaḥ śaśe śṛṅgam pṛthivī ādau caitanyam mūrtiḥ ātmani iti abhāva abhyupagame tu bhāvānām iṃtaretara abhāvāt asaṅkīrṇa tā setsyati tat etat asādhu svatas eva bhāvānām asaṅkīrṇa svabhāva tvāt 
[I,149,ii]	abhāva kāraṇaka saṅkara parihāra kathane tu sutarām viplavaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāvāt iva anyasmāt abhāva aṃśāt api dhruvam asaṅkīrṇaḥ abhyupetavyaḥ sa katham vā bhaviṣyati anyonyam api abhāvānām yadi asaṅkīrṇa tā svatas bhāvaiḥ kim aparāddham vaḥ paratas ced kutas nu sā bhāvebhyaḥ yadi upeyeta bhavet anyonya saṃśrayam abhāva antara janyā ced anavasthā duruttarā 
[I,149,iii]	abhāva svabhāva tāyāḥ ca sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt pratiṣedhya nibandhanaḥ eva tad bhedaḥ pratiṣedhyāḥ ca bhāvāḥ paraspareṇa bhidyamānāḥ tam bhindanti iti pratyuta bhāva adhīnam abhāvānām asāṅkaryam vaktum ucitam na tu viparyayaḥ yuktaḥ tat akhila padārtha vyavasya avisaṃṣṭhulī bhāva bhayāt api na abhāva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ 
[I,150,i]	nanu abhāva pratikṣepe nañaḥ kim vācyam ucyatām na eva śabda anusāreṇa vācya sthitiḥ upeyate bauddhāḥ khalu vayam loke sarvatra khyāta kīrtayaḥ vikalpa mātra śabda artha parikalpana paṇḍitāḥ kvacid nāma pada prāpta vṛttinā janyate nañā niṣedha paryudasta ani aviṣaya ullekhinī matiḥ kvacid tva ākhyāta sambandham upetya vidadhāti asau tad upātta kriyā aaraṃbha nivṛtti ullekha mātrakam 
[I,150,ii_I,151,ii]	nanu ca anena mārgeṇa yadi abhāvaḥ nirasyate ekādaśa prakāra eṣā anupalabdhiḥ kva gacchatu svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ yathā na iha ghaṭaḥ anupalabdheḥ iti kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ dahana anupalabdheḥ iti vyāpaka an upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śiṃśapā vṛkṣa anupalabdheḥ iti 
[I,151,iii_I,151,vi]	 kārya anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra nirapavādāḥ dhūma hetavaḥ santi dhūma anupalabdheḥ iti svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ pāvaka upalabdheḥ iti svabhāva viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti 
[I,151,vii_I,152,iii]	 kārya viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta kāraṇam apratibaddha sāmarthyam asti jvalana upalabdheḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra tuhina sparśaḥ kṛśa anu darśanāt iti kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā naitasya roma harṣa danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣāḥ santi sannihita hutavaha viśeṣāt iti kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā pravṛtta danta vīṇā ādi viśeṣa puruṣa adhiṣṭhitaḥ eṣa deśaḥ na bhavati dhūmavat tvāt iti satyam ekādaśavidhā anupalabdhiḥ iha iṣyate sā tu asat vyavahārasya hetuḥ na abhāva saṃvidaḥ 
[I,152,iv]	nanu anupalabdheḥ svabhāva hetau antarbhāvaḥ uktaḥ svabhāva hetau ca sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekaḥ iṣyate asat vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna abhidhāna ātmaka tvāt tatas eva pṛtham iti katham tat viṣaya tām yāyāt satyam evam kintu na asat vyavahāraḥ tayā sādhyate api tu tad yogya tā yogya tā ca na tatas artha antaram iti na svabhāva hetu tva hāniḥ 
[I,153,i_I,153,ii]	nanu yogyatā bhāva ātmikā anupalabdhiḥ tu abhāva svabhāva iti katham anartha antara tvam na etat evam na hi upalabdhi pratiṣedha ātmikām abhāva svabhāvām anupalabdhim anupalabdhi vidaḥ vadanti kintu pratiṣedha paryudaḥ ta vaḥ tu antara upalabdhim eva artha abhāva svabhāvām iti atas eva idam api na codyam anupalabdheḥ abhāva ātmaka tvāt anupalabdhi antara paricchedya tvāt anavasthā iti yasmāt vastu antara upalaṃbha ātmikā anupalabdhiḥ sva saṃvedyā eva iti 
[I,153,iii]	nanu anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāra siddhau adṛśyasya api tathātvam siddhyet na dṛśya tva viśeṣaṇa upādānāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ asat vyavahāraḥ na yasya kasya cit iti tatra ghaṭa ādeḥ pūrva dṛṣṭasya dṛśya tva pariniścayāt asattva vyavahāraḥ hi siddhi ati anupalabdhitaḥ ekānta anupalabdheṣu vihāyaḥ kusuma ādiṣu dṛśya tva yogya tā yogāt asattva pariniścayaḥ piśāca ādeḥ tu dṛśya tva niścayaḥ anavadhāraṇāt na śakyaḥ anupalambhena kartum na astitva niścayaḥ tatra api tu api śācaḥ ayam caitraḥ iti evamādiṣu tādātmya pratiṣedheṣu dṛśya tvam na upayujyate piśāca itara rūpaḥ hi caitraḥ pratyakṣa gācaraḥ tādrūpya niścaye tasya kim phalam tad viśeṣaṇam iti asat vyavahārasya siddheḥ anupalabdhitaḥ na bhāva vat abhāva ākhyam prameyam avakalpate 
[I,154,i_I,154,ii]	atra abhidhīyate idam tāvat sakala prāṇi sākṣikam saṃvedana dvayam upajāyamānam dṛṣṭam iha ghaṭaḥ asti iha na asti iti tatra vikalpa mātra saṃvedanam anālambanam ātma aṃśa ābalambanam vā ityādi yat abhilapyate tat na astita jñānaḥ iva astita ajñāne api samānam atas dvayoḥ api prāmāṇyam bhavatu dvayoḥ api vā mā bhūt yat tu asti iti jñānam pramāṇam itarattva pramāṇam iti kathyate tad icchā mātram asti iti jñāna samāna yogakṣema tve ca na asti iti jñānasya viṣayaḥ cintanīyaḥ 
[I,155,i_I,155,ii]	nanu ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala upalambha bhāve ghaṭa anupalambhaḥ iti uktam tat ayuktam kā iyam ghaṭa vivikta tā sā bhū pradeśāt abhinnā bhinnā vā abhede bhū pradeśa aviśeṣāt ghaṭa sannidhāne api ghaṭaḥ na asti iti pratipattiḥ jāyeta bhede api nāmni vivādaḥ syāt bheda abhedena cintyā ca ghaṭāt api viviktatā abhede ghaṭaḥ eva syāt bhede ca abhāvaḥ eva sā 
[I,155,iii]	tat iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala ālamba natāyām asyāḥ saṃvidaḥ iha iti tāvat asmin saṃvid aṃśe deśaḥ ālambanam iti avivādaḥ eva iha ghaṭaḥ asti iti bhāva pratīti samaye api tatra tad avabhāsa abhyupagamāt ghaṭaḥ na asti iti atra tu yat avabhāsate tat na bhū tala mātram eva bhāva pratīti samaya vat tad atirikta pratibhāsasya avaśya bhāvi tvāt tat atiriktam tu pratibhāsamānam ghaṭa vivikta tā iti vā kathyatām ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti vā na atra vastuni viśeṣaḥ 
[I,156,i_I,156,ii]	nanu ghaṭaḥ na asti iti vikalpa mātram etat na darśana anantara pravṛtta tvena vidhi vikalpa tulya tvāt yathā anubhavam utpattum arhanti kila kalpanāḥ pratiṣedha vikalpaḥ tu na vidhi anubhava ucitaḥ 
[I,156,iii_I,156,iv]	nanu na eva vikalpānām vayam prāmāṇya vādinaḥ kāmam vidhi vikalpānām api mā bhūt pramāṇa tā prāmāṇyam darśanānām ced tu adhi kalpa anusārataḥ iha api teṣām eva asti tu avikalpa anusārataḥ vastu prāptyā vidhi vikalpānām pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ iti ced iha api tad prāptyā eva niṣedha vikalpānām astu prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ kim atra vastu prāpyata iti ced tatra api kim prāpyate nīlam iti ced sā iyam abhāvasya api prāptiḥ bhavati eva nīlam hi prāpyamāṇam tad abhāva avinābhūta pīta ādi vyavacchinna rūpam prāpyate sā ca iyam tathābhūta nīla prāptiḥ bhavantī itara abhāva prāptiḥ api bhavati anyathā hi nīlayāptiḥ eva na syāt iti etat ca lākṣaṇikam virodham ācakṣa arṇarbhavadbhiḥ eva upagatam 
[I,157,i]	sukha duḥkha samutpattiḥ abhāve śatru mitrayoḥ kaṇṭaka abhāvam ālakṣya padam pathi nidhīyate prāk utpatteḥ ghaṭa abhāvam buddhvā tad kāraṇa ādaraḥ vyādhi abhāva paricchedāt bhaiṣajya vinivartanam iha abhāva pratiṣṭhāna vyavahāra paramparām paśyan abhāvam kaḥ nāma vihnuvīta sa cetanaḥ 
[I,157,ii]	nanu na ajanakam ālambanam bhavati jñānasya abhāvaḥ tu sakala upākhya vinirmukta svarūpaḥ iti na jñāna janana paṭuḥ atas katham tad ālambanam ucyate saugatānām tāvat na kiñcid janakam vastu pratibhāsate dvi tri kṣaṇa avasthiti prasaṅgena kṣaṇa bhaṅga vrata vilopa prasaṅgāt utpadyate ca artha jñānam ca janayati jātena tena gṛhyate ca iti āsām kriyāṇām eka kāla tva abhāvāt tasmāt akārakaḥ eva bhāvaḥ pratibhāsate 
[I,158,i_I,158,ii]	ākāra arpaṇa pakṣam ca pratikṣepsyāmaḥ evam bhāva vat abhāvaḥ api ajanakaḥ pratibhāsatām asmābhiḥ tu bhāva vat abhāvaḥ api jñāna janana samarthaḥ ipyate na hi niśśeṣa sāmarthya rahita tvam abhāva lakṣaṇam api tu na asti iti jñāna gamya tvam sat pratyaya gamyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ ipyate asat pratyaya gamyaḥ tu abhāvaḥ iti tat idam uktam sadasatī tattvam iti 
[I,158,iii]	nanu bhāva vat eṣa jñāna janakassan abhāvaḥ na bhāvāt viśiṣyate aho nipuṇa darśī devānāṃpriyaḥ pratīti bhedaḥ ca asti na ca pratīyamānau bhāva abhāvau bhidyete iti katham evam bhavet api re mūḍha jñāna janaka tva aviśeṣe api rūpa rasau katham bhidyete pratīti bhedāt iti ced bhāva abhāvau api janakatva dharma sāmānye api pratīti bhedāt eva bhidyeyātām na hi pratibhā āsi a bhedam antareṇa pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati iti bhavatā api abhyupagatam yathā uktam prāmāṇyam vastu viṣayam dvayoḥ artha bhidām jagau pratibhāsasya citra tvāt ekasmin tad ayogataḥ iti 
[I,159,i_I,159,iii]	tasmāt asti iti pratīteḥ iva bhāvaḥ na asti iti pratīteḥ abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti abhyupagamyatām athavā vijñāna vādaḥ eva sumpaṣṭam āsthīyatām antara avasthānam tu na sāṃpratam artha kriyā sāmarthyam api tasya darśitam eva sva jñāna ākhya kriyāśaktiḥ amuṣya durapahnavā artha kriyā anya janyā tu na bhāvena api janyate evam ca sati yaḥ pūrvam śaktivādaḥ atra varṇitaḥ sa pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt kaṇṭha śoṣāya kevalam 
[I,159,iv_I,160,i]	tathā sambandha abhāvāt iti yat uktam tatra deśena saha tāvat abhāvasya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ sa tu sambandha antara mūlaḥ iti bhāve ayam niyamaḥ na abhāve yat vā bhāve api eṣa na niyamaḥ na hi evam bhavati yat sambaddham tat viśeṣaṇam eva pāda pīḍite śirasi vā dhāryamāṇe daṇḍe daṇḍī iti pratyaya anutpādāt na api evam yat viśeṣaṇam tat sambanddham eva iti samavāyasya sati api viśeṣaṇa tve sambandha antara abhāvāt tasmāt sambandha antara rahitaḥ api pratibandhaḥ iva vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ svatantraḥ eva sambandhaḥ tathā apratīteḥ avadhāryate 
[I,160,ii_I,160,iv]	ubhayoḥ ubhaya ātmaka tvāt kadācid kasyacid tathā pratibhāsāt puruṣa icchā anuvartanena vyatyaya pratyaya sattve api na doṣaḥ tasmāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ deśena bhū tala ādinā saha abhāvasya evam kālena api saha saḥ eva veditavyaḥ kriyayā kartṛsthayā vā gamana ādikayā karma sthayā vā bhedana ādikayā saha saṃyoga ādi abhāve api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ eva sambandhaḥ tadvat abhāvasya api bhaviṣyati iti pratiyoginā tu saha virodhaḥ asya sambandhaḥ ayam eva ca virodha arthaḥ yat ekatra ubhayoḥ asamāveśaḥ atas ca eka vināśe na sarva vināśaḥ ghaṭa abhāvasya ghaṭa eka pratiyogika tvāt 
[I,161,i]	yat tu bhavana dharmā abhavana dharmā vā iti vikalpitam tatra bhavana dharmā eva abhāvaḥ abhyupagamyate bhavana dharma tve api ca abhāvaḥ na bhāvāt na bhidyate pratibhāsa bhedasya rūpa rasa ādiṣu upadarśita tvāt bhavana dharma tvam ca asya hetu anvaya vyatireki tvāt bhavati ghaṭaḥ hi mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa ādīn iva janmani vināśe api mudgara ādīn anuvartate hetūn 
[I,161,ii]	vijātīya santati janana pakṣe api sadṛśa santāna janikāyāḥ śakteḥ abhāvaḥ kriyate eva anyathā mudgara ādi upanipāte api vijātīya iva sajātīya santatiḥ api jāyeta sajātīya vijātīya ubhaya santati janana śakti yuktaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ced mudgara ādi yogāt pūrvam api kapāla santati jananam tad yoge api vā sati ghaṭa santati jana nam aniyamena dṛśyeta iti vijātī ya kṣaṇa utpādana svabhāve ca ghaṭe mudgara ādi vaiyyarthyam eva syāt 
[I,162,i]	tad utpāda svabhāve hi na kiñcid mudgara ādinā atad utpādaka tve api na kiñcid mudgara ādinā mudgara upanipātāt ca yadi utpannam kṣaṇa antaram ghaṭa kṣaṇasya kim vṛttam yena na ābhāti pūrvavat nanu asya abhavanam vṛttam saḥ eva arthaḥ ayam ucyate ghañā kim aparādhe vaḥ kim vā api upakṛtam lyuṭā 
[I,162,ii_I,162,iii]	nanu uktam na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam iti tat ayuktam yat asau na bhavati saḥ eva asya abhāvaḥ nanu sa na na tu tasya abhāvaḥ mā evam sa na iti śabdayoḥ jñānayoḥ ca viṣaya bhedāt saḥ iti jñānasya smaryamāṇaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ viṣayaḥ na iti tu jñānasya abhāvaḥ bhūmiḥ iti alam alīka vidagdha viracita viphala vakra vacana vimardena 
[I,163,i_I,163,ii]	tasmāt ittham abhāvasya prameya tva upapādanāt na hi asat vyavahārāya kalpante anupalabdhayaḥ na svabhāva anumāne ca tad antarbhāva sambhavaḥ meyam pṛthak abhāva ākhyam amūṣām upapāditam kāraṇa anupalabdhi ādeḥ bāḍham astu anumāna tā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu pratyakṣam iti sādhitam yā ca iyam ekādaśa anupalabdhi vadhū śuddhānta madhye viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ udāhṛtā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti sā iyam idānīm eva sādhvī dūṣitā vistaraḥ tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe dūṣayiṣyate 
[I,163,iii_I,163,iv]	yaiḥ tu mīmāṃsakaiḥ sadbhiḥ abhāvaḥ na abhyupeyate pramādena amunā teṣām vayam api adya lajjitāḥ ghaṭaḥ hi na pratīyate na tu tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate iti evaṃvadadbhiḥ ebhiḥ darśana adarśane eva padārthānām sat asat tve iti kathitam syāt etat ca ayuktam darśana adarśanābhyām hi sat asat tve niścīyete na tu darśana adarśane eva sat asat tve 
[I,164,i]	na ca apratīti mātreṇa tad abhāva nibandhanāḥ vyavahārāḥ prakalpante mṛd antarita toya vat khapuṣpasya piśācasya mṛd antarita vāriṇaḥ na khalu anupalabhya tve viśeṣaḥ pratibhāti naḥ sarvadā anupalambhaḥ hi kurvat nāstitva niścayam viśiṣyate mṛdanta sstha salila anupalabdhitaḥ āgamāt yuktitaḥ ca api sattva saṃbhāvanām gataḥ sarvadā anupalabdhaḥ api na piśācaḥ kha puṣpa vat 
[I,164,ii]	atas ca yat ucyate anupalabdheḥ punar anupalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ iti tad bhaṇiti mātram kha puṣpa ādeḥ tu sa viśeṣaṇa tayā anupalabdhyā abhāvaḥ eva niścīyate na tasya anupalabdhi mātram 
[I,165,i_I,165,ii]	aniṣyamāṇe ca abhāve bhāvānām pratiyogini nitya tā eṣām prasajyeta na hi ete kṣaṇikāḥ tava mudgara ādeḥ ca kim kāryam kapālapaṭalī iti ced ghaṭaḥ tarhi avinaṣṭa tvāt sva kāryam na karoti kim adarśanāt iti ced tadānīm eva dṛṣṭasya sthirasya amuṣya kim kṛtam sarva indriya ādi sāmagrī sannidhāne api adarśanam tasmāt tad abhāva kṛtam eva tadānīm tasya adarśanam 
[I,165,iii]	sva prakāśā ca na asti iti saṃvittiḥ bhavatām mate na nirālambanā ca iyam asti iti pratipatti vat vikalpa viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ yathā śauddhodaneḥ gṛhe gīyante bhavatā na evam iti nañvācyam ucyatām prasiddhiḥ ca parityaktā na ca abhāvaḥ parākṛtaḥ upekṣitaḥ ca bhāṣya arthaḥ iti ahar naya naipuṇam alam ca bahunā uktena vimardaḥ atra na śobhate mahātmanām pramādaḥ api marṣaṇīyaḥ hi mādṛśaiḥ tasmāt na asti iti pratyaya gamyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti siddham 
[I,166,i_I,166,ii]	sa ca dvividhaḥ prāc abhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ ca iti caturvidhaḥ iti anye itaretarābhāvaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ tau ca dvau iti ṣaṣ prakāraḥ iti anye apekṣā bhāvaḥ sāmarthya abhāvaḥ te ca catvāraḥ iti 
[I,166,iii]	tatra ca prāc ātma lābhāt nāstitvam prāgabhāvaḥ abhidhīyate utpannasya ātma hānam tu pradhvaṃsaḥ iti kathyate na prāc abhāvāt anye tu bhidyante paramārthataḥ sa hi vastu antara upādhiḥ anyaḥ anya abhāvaḥ ucyate saḥ eva avadhi śūnya tvāt atyanta abhāva tām gataḥ apekṣā bhāva tā tasya deśa upādhi nibandhanā sāmarthyam pūrva siddham ced pradhvaṃse tad abhāva dhīḥ no ced tarhi viśeṣaḥ asya durlabhaḥ prāc abhāvataḥ utpannasya vināśaḥ vā tad anutpādaḥ eva vā abhāvaḥ tattvataḥ anye tu bhedāḥ tu aupādhikāḥ matāḥ tasmāt abhāva ākhyam idam prameyam tasya indriyeṇa grahaṇam ca siddham atas pramāṇeṣu jagāda yuktam catuṣṭam eṣām muniḥ akṣapādaḥ 
[I,167,i_I,168,i]	nanu na adya api catuṣṭvam eṣām avatiṣṭhate saṃbhava aitihye iti dvayoḥ pramāṇa antara bhāvāt saṃbhavaḥ nāma samudāyena samudāyinaḥ avagamaḥ saṃbhavati khāryām droṇaḥ saṃbhavati śate sahasram iti anirdiṣṭa pravaktṛka pravāda paraṃparā ca aitihyam iha vaṭe yakṣaḥ prativasati iti na ca ayam āgamaḥ āptasya upadeṣṭuraniścayāt iti 
[I,168,ii_I,168,iii]	tat idam anupapannam bhinnaḥ saṃbhavaḥ eṣa na hi anubhiteḥ ākhyāyi khāryām khalu droṇaḥ saṃbhavati iti sā iyam avinā abhāvāt matiḥ laiṅgikī aitihyam tu na satyam atra hi vaṭe yakṣaḥ asti vā na iti vā kaḥ jānāti kadā kva kena kalitam yakṣasya kīdṛś vapuḥ satyam api ca āgamāt pṛthak naitihyam upadeśa rūpa tvāt āpta grahaṇam sūtre na lakṣaṇāya iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,168,iv_I,169,i]	cārvāka dhūrtaḥ tu atha atas tattvam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti pratijñāya pramāṇa prameya saṅkhyā lakṣaṇa niyama aśakya karaṇīya tvam eva tattvam vyākhyātavān pramāṇa saṅkhyā niyama aśakya karaṇīya tva siddhaye ca pramiti bhedān pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa anupajanyānīdṛśān upādarśayat vakrāṅgaliḥ pravirala aṅguliḥ eṣa pāṇiḥ isi asti dhīḥ tamasi mīlita cakṣuṣaḥ vā na iyam tvac indriya kṛtā na hi tad kara stham tatra eva hi pramitim indriyam ādadhāti dūrāt karoti niśi dīpa śikhā ca dṛṣṭā paryanta deśa visṛtāsu matim prabhāsu dhatte dhiyam pavana kampita puṇḍarīka ṣaṇḍe anuvāta bhuvi dūra gate api gandhe saḥ evaṃprāya saṃvitti samutprekṣaṇa paṇḍitaḥ rūpam tapasvī jānāti na pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ 
[I,170,i]	pratyakṣāt virala kara aṅgula pratītiḥ vyāpi tvāt akuśalam indriyam na tasyām ānābheḥ tuhina jalam janaiḥ pibadbhiḥ tad sparśaḥ śiśirataraḥ anubhūyate antar saṃyoga buddhiḥ ca yathā tad utthā tathā eva tad jā tad abhāva buddhiḥ kriyā viśeṣa grahaṇāt ca tasmāt ākuñcita tva avagamaḥ aṅgulīnām padma āmoda vidūra dīpaka vibhā buddhiḥ punar laiṅgikī vyāpti jñāna kṛtā iti kā khalu matiḥ māna antara apekṣiṇī saṅkhyāyāḥ niyamaḥ pramāṇa viṣaye na asti iti atas nāstikaiḥ tad sāmarthya viveka śūnya matibhiḥ mithyā eva visphūrjitam iyat tvam avilakṣaṇam niyatam asti māneṣu naḥ prameyam api lakṣaṇa ādi niyama anvitam vakṣyate aśakya karaṇīyatām kathayatā tu tattvam satām samakṣama munā aatmanaḥ jaḍam ati tvam uktam bhavet 
[I,171,i_I,171,ii]	evam pramāṇānām sāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca nirṇīte sati adhunā viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇa bhāva saraḥ iti sakala pramāṇa mūla bhūta tvena pūrva paṭhita tvena jyaiṣṭhyāt prathamam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam pratyakṣam pratyakṣam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ itarat lakṣaṇam samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedaḥ lakṣaṇa arthaḥ samāna jātīyam pramāṇa tayā anumāna ādi vijātīyam prameya ādi tatas vyavacchinnam pratyakṣasya lakṣaṇam anena sūtreṇa upapādyate 
[I,171,iii_I,172,i]	atra codayanti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ svarūpam vā viśeṣyate sāmagrī vā phalam vā tatra sva rūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yat evaṃsvarūpam jñānam tat pratyakṣam iti tad svarūpasya viśeṣita tvāt phala viśeṣaṇa anupādānāt ca lakṣaṇam avyāpti ati vyāptibhyām upahṛtam syāt avyāptiḥ tāvat atathāvidha svarūpasya bodhasya indriya ādeḥ ca nirmala phala janakatayā labdha pramāṇa bhāvasya api prāmāṇyam na uktam bhavet ativyāptiḥ ca tathāvidha svarūpasya api jñānasya ākārakasya vā saṃskāra kāriṇaḥ vā smṛtim janayataḥ vā saṃśayam ādadhānasya vā viparyayam utpādayataḥ vā pramāṇa tvam prāpnoti phalasya aviśeṣita tvāt 
[I,172,ii_I,172,iii]	tad viśeṣaṇa abhidhāne punar aśruta sūtra antara adhyāhāra prasaktiḥ avyāptiḥ ca tad avasthā iti na sva rūpa viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ na api sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ tatra hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam sāmagryam iti vyākhyātavyam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti ca tad janaka tvāt upacāreṇa tathā sākalyam varṇanīyam iti kliṣṭa kalpanā 
[I,173,i]	phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣaḥ api na saṅgacchate jñāna pratyakṣa śabdayoḥ phala karaṇa vācinoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt asamāna adhikaraṇa pramāṇa lakṣaṇa prastāvāt pratyakṣam pramāṇam ucyate tat ca karaṇam iti varṇitam jñānam tu tad upajanitam phalam iti katham aika ādhikaraṇyam tasmāt pakṣa trayasya api ayukta tvāt pakṣa antarasya api asaṃbhavāt ayuktam sūtram iti 
[I,173,ii]	atra ucyate sva rūpa sāmagrī viśeṣaṇa pakṣau tāvat yathā ukta doṣa upahata tvāt na abhyupagamyete phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣam eva saṃmanyāmahe tatra ca yat vaiyyadhikaraṇyam coditam tat yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa parihariṣyāmaḥ yatas evaṃvidha viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭam jñāna ākhyam phalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ ittham ca na kvacid avyāptiḥ ati vyāptiḥ vā na kācid kliṣṭa kalpanā yatas śabda adhyāhāra mātreṇa niravadya lakṣaṇa upavarṇana samartha sūtra pada saṅgati saṃbhavāt 
[I,174,i_I,174,ii]	nanu samāna adhikaraṇe eva jñāna pratyakṣa pade katham na vyākhyāyete kim yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa uktam atra karaṇasya pramāṇa tvāt jñānasya ca tad phala tvāt phala karaṇayoḥ ca svarūpa bhedasya siddha tvāt tat atra pramāṇa tāyām sāmagryāḥ tat jñānam phalam iṣyate tasya pramāṇa bhāve tu phalam hāna ādi buddhayaḥ 
[I,174,iii]	nanu smṛti ādi aneka buddhi vyavadhāna saṃbhavāt katham indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocanā jñānam hāna ādi phalam bhavet tathā hi kapittha ādi jātīyam artham indriya ādi sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrītaḥ upalabhya tad gatam sukha sādhana tvam anusmarati evaṃjātīyakena mama pūrvam sukham upajanitam abhūt iti tatas smṛti anantaram parāmarśa jñānam asya upajāyate ayam sa kapittha jātīyaḥ iti tatas upādeya tā jñānam utpadyate yatas eṣa sukha sādhanam kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ padārthaḥ tasmāt upādeyaḥ iti atra antare prathamasya indriya sannikarṣa janmanaḥ kapittha ālocanā jñānasya nāma api na avaśiṣyate iti katham asya tad phala tvam iti 
[I,175,i]	atra ācāryāḥ tāvat ācakṣate sādhu coditam satyam īdṛśaḥ eva ayam jñānānām kramaḥ na vayam prathamam ālocana ajñānasya upādāna ādiṣu pramāṇa tām brūmaḥ tathā hi prathamam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam ālocanā jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa ādi sāmagrī svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya pramāṇasya phalam eva na tu svayam pramāṇa tām pratilabhate smṛti janaka tvāt tad anantaram hi sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ bhavati iti sā iyam anusmṛtiḥ apramāṇa phalam api satī pratyakṣam pramāṇam saṃpadyate tathā ayam kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ iti indriya viṣaya parāmarśa utpattau indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha vyāpriyamāṇa tvāt 
[I,175,ii_I,176,i]	sa punar parāmarśa pratyayaḥ pratyakṣa janitaḥ dhūma jñāna vat anumānam pramāṇam ucyate parokṣasya agneḥ iva sukha sādhana sāmarthyasya tatas avagateḥ yadi api na kācid atīndriyā śaktiḥ asmat mate vidyate tathā api svarūpa saha kārya ādi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kāraṇa samūha sannidhāna svabhāvam api sāmarthyam atīndriyam eva 
[I,176,ii]	tasmāt eṣa kapittha ādi jātīyaḥ arthaḥ sukha sādhanam iti vahnimat parvata pratīti vat tad jātīya liṅgakam ānumānikam idam jñānam tat idam anumāna phalam api sukha sādhana tva niścaya ātmakam jñānam indriya viṣaye kapittha ādau upādeya jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa saha janayat pratyakṣam pramāṇam bhavati tat eva ca hṛdi vyavasthāpya bhāṣya kṛt vabhāṣe yadā jñānam vṛttiḥ tadā hāna upādāna upekṣā buddhayaḥ pramitiḥ iti 
[I,176,iii]	vyākhyātāraḥ tu bruvate na ayam īdṛśaḥ jñānānām kramaḥ ādyam ālocanā jñānam sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtim upajanayati iti satyam smṛtyā ca tasya vinaśyattā vinaśyat avastham ca indriya viṣaye kapittha ādau sukha sādhana tva niścayam ādadhāti sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva ca upādeya tā jñānam ucyate na anyat parāmarśaḥ tu na kaścid antarāle saṃvedyate tat eva sādhyam darśitam indriya artha sannikarṣa janitam upādeya tā jñāna phalakam avakalpate iti kim asaṃvedyamāna jñāna kanthā kalpanena iti 
[I,177,i_I,177,ii]	nanu parāmarśaḥ anubhūyate eva na tu kalpyate dhūma jñāna anantaram avinā bhāvam yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti anusmṛtya parābhṛśati tathā ca ayam dhūmaḥ iti asati tu parāmarśe na liṅga jñānam liṅgini pramāṇa tām pratipadyeta smaraṇa janakam hi tat na ca smṛti janakam pramāṇam iṣyate smaraṇa anantaram ca liṅga pratītiḥ bhavantī na upalabhya anuvādena bhavet ayam agnimān iti api ca tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti yat upanaya vacanam avayaveṣu paṭhyate tasya kim vācyam bhaviṣyati parāmarśā palāpa vādinām sva pratipatti vat ca para pratipattiḥ avayavaiḥ janyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt apratyākhyeyaḥ parāmarśaḥ iti 
[I,178,i_I,178,ii]	atra vadanti na tāvat antarā kaścid parāmarśaḥ anubhūyate anumeya miteḥ pūrvam ūrdhvam ca niyama smṛteḥ atas eva artham ālokya vinā eva hi davīyasā vilambena vyavasyanti grahaṇa ādiṣu laukikāḥ liṅga jñānam ca vinaśyat avastham anumeya pratītau vyāpriyamāṇam pramāṇa tām pratipatsyate tad kṛtā eva upalabhya anuvādena liṅga buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt kapittha ādi padārtha darśanasya parāmarśa sopānam anārohataḥ eva upādeya jñāna phala tā vaktum yuktā iti 
[I,178,iii]	api ca anumeya viṣaye vahni ādau sukha sādhanatva anusmṛti kṛtam upādeya tā jñānam tava na samasti eva tatas ca tatra api tathā ca ayam jvalana jātīyaḥ iti parāmarśaḥ bhavatā abhyupeyaḥ eva sa ca kiṃkaraṇakaḥ iti nirūpaṇīyam na tāvat indriya dvārakaḥ pāvakasya parokṣa tvāt śabda upamāne tu āśaṅkitum api tatra na yukte dhūma ākhyāt liṅgāt eva saḥ utpadyate iti ced na liṅgasya parāmarśa aviṣayīkṛtasya anumeya miti janana naipuṇya anabhyupagamāt dhūma avamarśasya tadānīm atikrānta tvāt tathā hi prathamam liṅga jñānam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas dhūma parāmarśaḥ tatas vahni jñānam tena dhūma parāmarśasya vinaśyattā tatas agnau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇam tadā ca dhūma parāmarśasya vināśaḥ eva iti tasmin vinaṣṭe na kevalaḥ dhūmaḥ tadānīm anala parāmarśam janayitum utsahate 
[I,179,i]	agnau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇa anantaram punar dhūma jñānam indriyāt utpadyate iti ced mā evam ananubhavāt bhavatu vā dhūma jñānam tathā api dhūma jñāna anantaram punar vyāpti smṛtiḥ punar dhūma parāmarśaḥ ca avaśyam bhavet iti atra antare hutabhuji sukha sādhanatva anusmṛtiḥ atikrāntā iti tad sahāya parāmarśa janya sukha sādhana tva niścaya utpādaḥ na syāt sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇena hi vinaśyat avasthena janyamānaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ asau dṛṣṭaḥ iti 
[I,180,i]	atha manyase na tadānīm punar dhūma jñāna vyāpti smaraṇa tatparāmarśa utpāda ādi jñāna śṛṅkhalā abhyupeyate kintu prāktanaḥ eva dhūma parāmarśaḥ kṛśānau sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇa anantaram smariṣyate tena smṛti viṣaya vartinā satā tathā ca ayam agni jātīyaḥ iti jvalana parāmarśaḥ janayiṣyate iti etat api ayuktam agni jñāna anantaram yugapad smaraṇa dvaya udaya prasaṅgāt tadā eva sukha sādhana tā anusmṛtiḥ tadā eva dhūma parāmarśa smṛtiḥ iti na hi krama utpāde kiñcid kāraṇam asti jñāna yaugapadyam ca śāstre pratiṣiddham 
[I,180,ii_I,181,i]	bhavatu vā krama utpādaḥ tathā api smaraṇa dvaya samanantaram upajāyamānaḥ pāvaka parāmarśaḥ na upalabhya anuvādena jāyate krama pakṣe api ca vahni jñāna anantaram tad gata sukha sādhanatva anusmaraṇam eva pūrvam bhavet tatas dhūma parāmarśa smaraṇam tena tasya vinaśyattā tatas agnau tad jātīya tva parāmarśaḥ tena sukha sādhana tva smṛteḥ vināśaḥ eva iti punar api sā vinaṣṭā satī sukha sādhana tva niścaya janmani na vyāpriyeta iti na ca dhūma liṅga anumita vahni jñāna anantaram dhūma smaraṇam ucitam analam upalabhya hi tad gata sukha sādhana tvam anusmarati lokaḥ na dhūmam iti tena anumāna viṣaye parāmarśaḥ ati durghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa viṣaye api evam kim anena śikhaṇḍinā 
[I,181,ii]	yat punar upanaya vacanam abhidheya rahitam aprayojyam prasajyate iti paricoditam tat avayavi prasaṅgaḥ eva nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt antarāvartinaḥ parāmarśa jñānasya abhāvāt ādyam ālocanā jñānam eva heya ādi jñāna phalam yathā ukta rītyā bhaviṣyati iti 
[I,181,iii]	nanu ca pratyakṣa phalam iha mīmāṃsyam vartate sa ca ayam sukha sādhana tvāt liṅgāt udgamyamānaḥ ānumānikaḥ iti na pratyakṣa phala tām avalambate satyam etat kintu sambandha grahaṇa samaye sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ pratyakṣa janitaḥ api samasti yatas anumānam pravartate mahānasa ādau dhūma agni darśana vat atas sambandha grahaṇa kāla bhāvinam sukha sādhana tva niścayam cetasi vidhāya bhāṣya kāraḥ tad phala tvaṃpratyakṣa jñānasya varṇitavān iti 
[I,182,i]	nanu sambandha grahaṇa kāle api sukha sādhana tva śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt katham pratyakṣa gamyatā tad jātīya tvāt liṅgāt eva tadā api tad grahaṇe iṣyamāṇe tatas punar sambandha grahaṇāt anavasthā sukhāt eva kāryāt tadā tad avagamaḥ iti ced tadā api na ajñāta sambandham avagati janana samartham iti tad saṃbandha grahaṇa velāyām api śakti grahaṇe pratyakṣasya akṣama tvāt anumāna antara apekṣāyām anavasthā tad avasthā ucyate na khalu ati indriyā śaktiḥ asmābhiḥ upagamyate yayā saha na kāryasya sambandha jñāna saṃbhavaḥ svarūpa sahakāri sannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā ca sugama eva 
[I,182,ii]	nanu sahakāriṇām madhye adṛṣṭam api anupraviṣṭam na ca tat pratyakṣa gamyam atīndriya tvāt dharmasya iti sā api na sugamā śaktiḥ na etat na dharma ādi śakti tvāt atīndriyam api tu tat naisargikam eva jagat vaicitryeṇa tad anumānam vakṣyāmaḥ tat evam tad itara sahakāri svarūpa sannidhāna ātmikāyāḥ śakteḥ pratyakṣa grāhya tva saṃbhavāt upapannam tad jātīya tva liṅgasya saṃbandha grahaṇam 
[I,183,i_I,183,ii]	nanu kapittha ādi kāryasya sukhasya idānīm na cakṣuḥ grāhya tvam iti tad sambandhi grahaṇa abhāvāt katham cākṣuṣa pratyaya gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ na cākṣuṣa gamyaḥ sambandhaḥ kintu mānasa pratyakṣa gamyaḥ sukha ādi manasā buddhvā kapittha ādi ca cakṣuṣā tasya kāraṇa tā tatra manasā eva avagamyate 
[I,183,iii]	nanu ca manasā kapittha ādeḥ sukha sādhana tva grahaṇa abhyupagame bāhya viṣaya pramitiṣu manaḥ eva niraṅkuśam karaṇam idānīm saṃvṛttam iti kṛtam cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ atas ca na kaścid andhaḥ vā badhiraḥ vā syāt na eṣa doṣaḥ prathama pravṛtta samanaskavāhya indriya janita vijñāna viṣayīkṛta vapuṣaḥ vāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhya tva abhyupagamāt tasya eva niyāmaka tvāt na ucchṛṅkhalam antaḥkaraṇam bāhya viṣaye pravartate 
[I,184,i_I,184,ii]	nanu ca sambandha grahaṇa kāle yadi mānasena pratyakṣeṇa sukha sādhanatva avadhāraṇam tarhi tad kāle iva vyavahāra kāle api mānasa pratyakṣaḥ eva sukha sādhana tva niścayaḥ astu kim tad jātīya tva liṅga apekṣaṇena iti mā evam śabda liṅga indriya ādi uparatau kevalam antaḥkaraṇam karaṇam kalpyate paridṛśyamānāyāḥ pratīteḥ apahnotum aśakya tvāt liṅga ādi upāya antara saṃbhave tu yadi manaḥ eva kevalam kāraṇam ucyate tat mānasam eva ekam pramāṇam syāt na catvāri pramāṇāni bhaveyuḥ iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt sambandha grahaṇa kāle yat tat kapittha ādi viṣayam akṣa jam jñānam tat upādeya ādi jñāna phalam iti bhāṣya kṛtaḥ cetasi sthitam sukha sādhana tva jñānam eva upādeya ādi jñānam iti uktam 
[I,184,iii]	āha kimartham ayam īdṛśaḥ kleśaḥ āśrīyate pramāṇāt abhinnam eva phalam astu tat eva cakṣuḥ ādi janitam kapittha ādi padārtha darśanam viṣaya prakāśena vyāpriyamāṇam iva abhāti iti karaṇam ucyatām tat eva viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvāt phalam iti kathyatām ittham ca pramāṇa phale na bhinna avikaraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ anyatra pramāṇam anyatra phalam iti tat uktam sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt pramāṇam phalam eva sat iti 
[I,185,i]	tat idam anupapannam pramāṇasya sva rūpa hāni prasaṅgāt karaṇam hi pramāṇam ucyate pramīyate ca anena iti na ca kriyā eva kvacid karaṇam bhavati kriyāyām sādhyāyām kārakam kim api karaṇam ucyate tatra yathā dātreṇa caitraḥ śāli stambam lunāti iti kartṛ karma karaṇāni kriyātas bhinnāni upalabhyante tathā iha api cakṣuṣā ghaṭam paśyati iti darśana kriyā ataḥ pṛthak bhāvaḥ eva teṣām yuktaḥ na darśanam karaṇam eva iti pramā pramāṇam iti tu phale pramāṇa śabdasya sādhu tva ākhyāna mātram kṛtiḥ karaṇam itivat 
[I,185,ii]	yat tu na bhinna adhikaraṇe pramāṇa phale ittham bhaviṣyataḥ iti sā iyam apūrva vācaḥ yuktiḥ kim atra adhikaraṇam vivakṣitam yadi tāvat viṣayaḥ tat asti eva eka viṣaya tvam yat viṣayam hi darśanam saḥ eva cakṣuḥ ādeḥ karaṇasya viṣayaḥ āśrayaḥ astu adhikaraṇam iti bauddha gṛhe tāvat avācakaḥ granthaḥ kṣaṇika tvena sarva kāryāṇām nirādhāra tvāt 
[I,186,i]	asmat pakṣe tu bhinna āśrayayoḥ api phala karaṇa bhāvaḥ pāka kāṣṭhayoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā cakṣuḥ jñānayoḥ api bhaviṣyati iti kvacid tu bhinnayoḥ api jñānayoḥ phala karaṇa tvena sthitayoḥ liṅga liṅgi jñānayoḥ iva viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya jñānayoḥ iva ca aikātmya āśrava tvam asti na ttu anena samāna āśraya tvena prayojanam cakṣuḥ ādau anirvahaṇāt 
[I,186,ii_I,186,iii]	atha eka phala niṣpattau vyāpāra samāna āśraya tvam ucyate tat api bhavatu kāraka antarāṇām na tu phala svabhāvasya jñānasya phala niṣpattau vyāpāraḥ saṃbhavati yat api sa vyāpāra pratīti tvāt iti ucyate tat api pramāṇa phalayoḥ bhinnatām eva sūcayati na hi svarūpa niṣpattau savyāpāra tvam upapadyate api tu pṛthak bhūta phala nirvṛttau eva iti 
[I,187,i_I,187,ii]	nanu vastu sthityā phalam eva jñānam phalam api tu bhavat viṣaya anubhavam prati vyāpṛtam iti ayi mugdha buddhe viṣaya anubhavaḥ eva jñānam ucyate na tu viṣaya anubhavaḥ viṣaya anubhave sa vyāpāraḥ bhavati atha manuṣe viṣaya adhigama abhimānaḥ tasmin sati bhavati iti kaḥ ayam abhimānaḥ nāma viṣaya anubhavāt bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā abhede sati tasmin sati bhavati iti asaṅga tā vācaḥ yuktiḥ bhede tu asmad mata anupraveśaḥ 
[I,187,iii]	api ca jñānam viṣaya adhigame vyāpṛtam iti kṛtvā viṣaya adhigama abhimānam upajanayati uta viṣaya adhigama svabhāva tvāt eva iti vicāre viṣaya adhigamāt pṛthak bhūtasya tatra vyāpriyamāṇasya anupalaṃbhāt viṣaya adhigama svabhāvam eva jñānam avadhāryate tad kṛtaḥ ca abhimānaḥ iti phalam eva jñānam avakalpate na karaṇam iti tathā ca loka phala tvam eva jñānasya anumanyate na karaṇa tvam tathā hi evam vadati cakṣuṣā paśyāmi liṅgena jānāmi iti na tu jñānena jānāmi iti vyapadiśan kaścid dṛśyate 
[I,188,i]	nanu satsu api cakṣuḥ ādiṣu viṣaya jñānam anupajanayatsu na karaṇa tām vyapadiśati lokaḥ janayatsu ca vyapadiśati iti loke karaṇa utpādaka tvāt eva teṣām karaṇa tva vyapadeśaḥ na sākṣāt karaṇa tvāt iti tat ayuktam cakṣuḥ ādi eva karaṇam na tu tena anyat karaṇam upajanyate kim hi tat anyat karaṇam jñānam iti ced kasyām kriyāyām tat karaṇam iti parīkṣyatām etat na hi ātmani eva kiñcid karaṇam karaṇam bhavati iti 
[I,188,ii_I,188,iii]	yat tu jñānam anupajanayati cakṣuḥ ādau na karaṇa tām ācaṣṭe lokaḥ tat yuktam eva na hi kriyā utpattau avyāpriyamāṇam karaṇam kārakam bhavati tena cakṣuḥ ādeḥ jñāna kriyām upajanayataḥ karaṇa tvam jñānasya tu phala tvam eva iti yuktaḥ tathā vyapadeśaḥ pramāṇasya pramāṇa tvam tasmāt abhyupagacchatām bhinnam phalam upetavyam eka tve tad asaṃbhavāt 
[I,189,i]	yaḥ tu mūḍhataraḥ pramāṇa prameya phala vyavahāram ekatra eva jñāna ātmani nirvāhayitum udyacchati yadābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthak kṛtam iti tam apavarga āhnike jñānāt vaitat alana prasaṅgena durācāram nirbhartsayiṣyāmahe iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam yadā jñānam pramāṇam tadā hāna ādi buddhayaḥ phalam iti 
[I,189,ii]	tat evam phala viśeṣaṇa pakṣe yatas śabda adhyāhāreṇa vācakam sūtram yatas indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitam jñāna ākhyam phalam bhavati tat pratyakṣam iti 
[I,189,iii_I,189,iv]	tatra indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padam artha anapekṣa janmanaḥ smṛti ādi jñānasya artha janitasya api ca parokṣa viṣayasya anumānādi jñānattya vyavaccheda artham atas tad janakasya na pratyakṣatā prasajyate nanu indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam indriya gati anumānam api asti tat hi indriya artha sannikarṣeṇa liṅga bhūtena janyate deśa antara prāpti eva tapana gamana anumānam iti katham anena padena anumānam apākriyate na etat evam indriyeṇa sva viṣaya sannikṛṣṭena satā tatra eva yat vijñānam utpadyate tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iha brūmahe na ca īdṛśam indriya gati anumānam 
[I,190,i]	kutas viśeṣa pratilambhaḥ iti ced utpanna grahaṇāt iti brūmaḥ utpanna grahaṇena hi sannikarṣamya kāraka tvam khyāpyate tat ca api indriya viṣaye arthe jñānam utpādayataḥ nirvahati indriya gati anumāne tu na sannikarṣam kārakam āhuḥ api tu jñāpakam atas eva sva grahaṇa sāpekṣaḥ tad anumāne asau vyāpriyate na rūpa ādi pramitau iva tad nirapekṣaḥ iti 
[I,190,ii]	indriyāṇi ghrāṇa rasana nayana sparśana śrotrāṇi pṛthivī ādi bhūta pañcaka prakṛtīni vakṣyante arthāḥ tu gandha rūpa rasa sparśa śabdāḥ gandha tva ādi sva jāti avacchinnāḥ tad adhikaraṇāni pṛthivī ap tejāṃsi dravyāṇi tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ saṅkhī ā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇa ādīni karmāṇi tad vṛttīni sāmānyāni yeṣām sparśanena cakṣuṣā grahaṇam kaṇa vrata mate nirūpitam te arthāḥ prāk uktaḥ ca abhāvaḥ api arthaḥ eva vicārya gamyamāna tvāt 
[I,191,i]	sannikarṣaḥ tu indriyāṇām arthaiḥ saha ṣaṣ prakāraḥ tatra dravyam cakṣuṣā tvac indriyeṇa vā saṃyogāt gṛhyate tad gataḥ rūpa ādiḥ guṇaḥ saṃyukta samavāyāt rūpa tva ādi sāmānyāni saṃyukta samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyante cakṣuṣā saṃyuktam dravyam tatra samavetam rūpam rūpe ca samavetam rūpa tvam iti samavāyāt śabdaḥ gṛhyate śrotram ākāśa dravyam tatra samavetaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvam samaveta samavāyāt gṛhyate śrotra ākāśa samavete śabde tat hi samavetam iti saṃyukta viśeṣaṇa bhāvāt abhāva grahaṇam vyākhyātam iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti cakṣuṣā saṃyuktaḥ bhū pradeśaḥ tad viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ ca abhāvaḥ iti 
[I,191,ii]	nanu sannikarṣa avagame kim pramāṇam vyavahita anupalabdhiḥ iti brūmaḥ yadi hi asat nikṛṣṭam api cakṣuḥ ādi indriyam artham gṛhṇīyāt vyavahitaḥ api tatas arthaḥ upalabhyeta na ca upalabhyate tasmāt asti sannikarṣaḥ 
[I,191,iii]	nanu avyavadhānam eva astu kim sannikarṣeṇa mā evam indriyāṇām kāraka tvena prāpya kāri tvāt saṃsṛṣṭam ca kārakam phalāya kalpate iti kalpanīyaḥ saṃsargaḥ etat ca indriya parīkṣāyām nipuṇam nirṇeṣyate iti na iha vivicyate rasa sparśanayoḥ ca spaṣṭam prāpya kāri tvam upalabhyate iti tad sāmānyāt indriya antareṣu api kalpanīyam iti 
[I,192,i_I,192,iii]	nanu evam satyartha ākṣiptaḥ kāraka tvāt eva sannikarṣaḥ iti sva kaṇṭhena kasmāt ucyate ṣaḍvidha tva jñāpana artham iti uktam utpanna grahaṇena indriya arthayoḥ jñāna janaka tvam darśayati tatra indriyam karaṇa tvena janakam arthaḥ tu karma tvena nanu arthasya jñāna janaka tvam kutas avagamyate tad viṣaya jñāna utpādāt eva svatassa ākāra tvasya nirākṛta tvāt prakāra antareṇa pratikarma vyavasthāyāḥ asiddheḥ 
[I,192,iv]	nanu prayojanam etat pramāṇam pṛṣṭaḥ asi tat brūhi ucyate etat eva pramāṇam anyasya api vīraṇa ādeḥ karma kārakasya kaṭa ādi kārya utpattau pratyakṣa anupalaṃbha pratipannābhyām anvaya vyatirekābhyām yathā kāraṇa tvam avadhāryate tathā arthasya api jñāna utpattau yathā hi devadatta arthī kaścid gṛham gataḥ tatra asat nihitam na paśyati devadattam kṣaṇa antare ca enam āyāntam paśyati tatra anvaya vyatirekābhyām devadatta sada sattva anuvartinau jñāna utpāda an utpādau avadhārya mānasena pratyakṣeṇa candana sukha vat asya tad kāraṇa tām pratipadyate 
[I,193,i]	nanu vīraṇa kaṭayoḥ pṛthak upalaṃbhāt yuktaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ arthaḥ tu jñānāt pṛthak na kadācid upalabhyate iti duradhigamau tatra anvaya vyatirekau ucyate ayam eva pṛthak upalaṃbhaḥ yat asat nihite arthe na tad viṣayam abādhitam jñānam utpadyate iti tat alam asmin avasare jñāna vāda garbha codya udvibhāvayiṣayā bhaviṣyati etat avasare iti 
[I,193,ii]	yathā ca indriyāṇām karaṇānām anvaya vyatirekābhyām jñāna kāraṇa tvam evam arthasya karmaṇaḥ api iti utpanna grahaṇena darśitam 
[I,193,iii]	nanu indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena sukha ādi viṣayam pratyakṣam na saṅgṛhītam na na saṅgṛhītam manasaḥ indriya tvāt sukha ādeḥ arthasya tad grāhya tvāt bhautika ghrāṇa ādi indriya dharma vailakṣaṇyāt tu manasaḥ tad varge parigaṇanam na kṛtam iti 
[I,194,i]	tat ca idam pratyakṣam catuṣṭaya traya dvaya sat nikarṣāt pravartate tatra bāhye rūpa ādau viṣaye catuṣṭaya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate ātmā manasā saṃyujyate manaḥ indriyeṇa indriyam arthena iti sukha ādau tu traya sannikarṣāt jñānam utpadyate tatra cakṣuḥ ādi vyāpāra abhāvāt ātmani tu yoginaḥ dvayoḥ ātma manasoḥ eva saṃyogāt jñānam upajāyate tṛtīyasya grāhyasya grāhakasya vā tatra abhāvāt tasmāt sukha ādi jñāna saṅgrahāt indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti yuktam uktam ātma manasoḥ tu sat api jñāna janaka tvam iha na sūtritam sarva pramāṇa sādhāraṇa tvāt 
[I,194,ii_I,194,iii]	jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artham tasya hi indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādīni viśeṣaṇāni tāni asati viśeṣye kasya viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ iti athavā sukha ādi vyāvṛtti artham jñāna padam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam hi sukham api bhavati tatra tad janakam kāraka cakram pramāṇam mā bhūt jñāna janakam eva pramāṇam yathā syāt iti jñāna grahaṇam 
[I,195,i]	atra śākyāḥ codayanti na jñāna padena sukha ādi vyavacchedaḥ kartum yuktaḥ śakyaḥ vā sukha ādīnām api jñāna svabhāva tvāt jñānasya eva amī bhedāḥ sukham duḥkham icchā dveṣaḥ prayatnaḥ iti kāraṇa adhīnaḥ hi bhāvānām bhedaḥ bhavitum arhati samāna kāraṇānām api tu bhede abhidhīyamāne na kāraṇa kṛtam padārthānām niyatam rūpam iti tad ākasmika tva prasaṅgaḥ tat uktam tat atad rūpiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ tad atad rūpa hetu jāḥ tad sukha ādi kim ajñānam vijñāna abhinna hetu jam iti tasmāt jñāna rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ tad abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti 
[I,195,ii_I,196,i]	tat idam anupapannam pratyakṣa viruddha tvāt hetoḥ sukha ādi saṃvedyamānam ānanda ādi rūpa tayā anubhūyate jñānam viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā iti pratyakṣa siddha bheda tvāt katham abhede anumānam kramate atas eva idam api na vacanīyam ekam eva idam saṃvid rūpam harṣa viṣāda ādi aneka ākāra vivartam paśyāmaḥ tatra yatheṣṭam saṃjñāḥ kriyantām iti saṃvidaḥ viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tayā eva pratibhāsāt sukha ādeḥ ca viṣaya anubhava svabhāvasya anusyūtasya apratibhāsāt jñānam eva viṣaya grahaṇa rūpam prakāśate na sukham duḥkham vā 
[I,196,ii]	yaḥ tu sukha jñānam duḥkha jñānam iti pratibhāsaḥ saḥ jñāna svabhāva meda kṛtaḥ eva saṃśaya jñānam viparyaya jñānam itivat uktam atra saṃśaya viparyaya ādau viṣaya anubhava svabhāva tvam anusyūtam avabhāti saṃśayaḥ hi viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ anubhūyate aniścitam tu viṣayam gṛhṇāti viparyayaḥ api viṣaya grahaṇa ātmakaḥ eva viparītam asantam vā viṣayam gṛhṇāti na tu viṣaya grahaṇa svabhāvam sukham duḥkham ca anubhūyate atas anyaḥ eva ayam grāhya eka svabhāvaḥ āntaraḥ dharmaḥ sukha duḥkha ādiḥ iti ghaṭa jñāna vat viṣaya tayā eva jñānam bhinatti na svabhāva bhedena saṃśaya jñāna vat iti 
[I,196,iii]	tatra etat syāt sva prakāśa tvāt sukha ādeḥ na grāhya eka svabhāva tvam atas ca grāhya grahaṇa ubhaya svabhāva tvāt jñānam eva tat iti mā evam vocaḥ sva prakāśa tvam jñāne api pratikṣiptam pratikṣepsyate ca tat kutas sukha ādau bhaviṣyati na hi grahaṇa svabhāvam kaścid sukham anubhavati jñāna vat iti 
[I,197,i_I,197,iv]	nanu asya prakāśa tva anabhyupagame sukha ādeḥ utpāda anutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt sarvadā sukhi tvam na kadācid vā syāt iti na etat evam utpannam eva sapadi sukham gṛhyate jñānena iti katham anutpannāt na viśiṣyate pratyuta sva prakāśa sukha vādinām eṣa doṣaḥ sva prakāśa sukha utpādāt tena eva sva prakāśena sukhena anyaḥ api sukhī syāt sva prakāśasya dīpa ādeḥ sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt kvacid santāne sva prakāśa sukha utpādāt tena eva sva prakāśena anyaḥ api sukhī syāt yasya api sukham na utpannam iti kiñca kim ekam eva jñānam sarva sukha duḥkha ādi aśeṣa ākāra bhūṣitam iṣyate uta kiñcid sukha ātmakam kiñcid duḥkha ātmakam iti ādye pakṣe sarva ākāra khacita jñāna upajananāt ekasmin eva kṣaṇe paraspara viruddha sukha duḥkha ādi dharma prabandha saṃvedana prasaṅgaḥ 
[I,197,v]	uttarasmin tu kiñcid sukha jñānam kiñcid duḥkha jñānam iti yat kiñcit asukha duḥkha khacitam viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api jñānam anubhūyamānam eṣitavyam eva tat ca na svaccham api tu kenacid haṭa ādinā viṣayeṇa uparaktam anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca ghaṭa ādi upajanana apāye api bodha svabhāvam anuvartamānam pratīyate tat idānīm sukha jñānam api anubhūyamānam sukhena viṣaya bhāva juṣā ghaṭa ādinā iva uparajyate iti gamyate na sva rūpeṇa eva sukha ātmakam tatas bhinna rūpasya bodha mātra svabhāvasya jñānasya anyadā dṛṣṭa tvāt iti tasmāt na bodha rūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ 
[I,198,i_I,198,ii]	abhinna hetu ja tvāt iti ca ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya ātmanaḥ asamavāyi karaṇasya ca ātma mana ssaṃyogasya ca abhede api nimitta kāraṇasya sukha tva jñāna tva ādeḥ bhinna tvāt nanu sukha utpādāt pūrvam anāśrayam sukha tva sāmānyam katham tatra syāt kaḥ ca asya sukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ asaṃsṛṣṭam vā katham kārakam syāt ucyate sarva gatāni sāmānyāni sādhayiṣyante iti santi tatra api sukha tva ādīni yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ eva ca eṣām sukha hetubhiḥ kārakaiḥ saṃsargaḥ dharma adharma vat dharma adharmau hi sarvasya prāṇinām sukha duḥkha hetoḥ jāyamānasya śāli ādeḥ kāryasya kāraṇam tayoḥ ca tad kāraṇaiḥ bīja kṣiti jala ādibhiḥ saha yogya tā eva saṃsargaḥ evam sukha tva ādīnām api syāt tasmāt nimitta kāraṇa bhedāt bhinnāni jñāna sukha ādīni kāryāṇi 
[I,199,i_I,200,i]	nimitta kāraṇa anya tvam api kāryasya bhedakam vilakṣaṇāḥ hi dṛśyante ghaṭa ādau pāka jāḥ guṇāḥ api ca jñānam icchanti na sarve jñāna pūrvakam sukha duḥkha ādi sarvam tu viṣaya jñāna pūrvakam viṣaya anubhava utpādyāḥ yatra api na sukha ādayaḥ tatra api teṣām utpattau kāraṇam viṣaya smṛtiḥ kvacid tu saṅkalpaḥ api sukhasya kāraṇa tām pratipadyate tasmāt sarvam sukha ādi jñāna pūrvakam eva jñānam api jñāna pūrvakam eva iti ced na upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt na hi garbha ādau mada mūrchā ādi anantaram vā jñānam upajāyamānam jñāna antara pūrvakam bhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ tena jñāna sukha ādīnām vailakṣaṇya upapādanāt sukha ādi nivṛtti artham jñāna grahaṇam arthavat 
[I,200,ii]	nanu evam api na jñāna grahaṇena kṛtyam avyabhicāri padāt eva sukha ādi vyavacchedasya siddha tvāt vyabhicāra avi abhicārau hi jñānasya dharmau na sukha ādeḥ atas tad upādānāt tad dharma yogi jñānam labhyate eva kim jñāna grahaṇena na etat evam sukhasya api savyabhicārasya dṛṣṭa tvāt kim punassukham vyabhicāra vat dṛṣṭam yat etat para dāra abhimarśa ādi niṣiddha ācaraṇa saṃbhavam sukham tat vyabhicāri 
[I,200,iii_I,200,vi]	nanu sukhasya kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ jñānasya api kīdṛśaḥ vyabhicāraḥ atasmin tathā bhāvaḥ sukhasya api atasmin tathā abhāvaḥ eva kim para purandhrī pariraṃbha saṃbhavam sukham sukham na bhavati kim śuktikāyām rajata jñānam jñānam na bhavati jñānam bhavati kintu mithyā idam api sukham bhavati kintu mithyā 
[I,201,i_I,201,iii]	nanu na sukham mithyā tat api hi ānanda svabhāvam eva yadi evam śuktikāyām rajata jñānam api na mithyā tat api hi viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam eva nanu viṣaya anubhava svabhāvam api tat jñānam viṣayam vyabhicarati sukham api tarhi idam ānanda svabhāvam api sva hetum viṣayam vyabhicarati eva kim asukha sādhanena tat janitam jñānam api kim ajñāna sādhanena janitam 
[I,201,iv_I,201,vi]	nanu jñānam jñāna sādhanena janitam asatyena pratyakṣa bādhitena rajata ādinā sukham api sukha sādhanena janitam asatyena tu śāstra bādhitena para vanitā ādinā kim para vanitā ādi na satyam tatra api jñāna janakam na satyam asatyam pratyakṣa bādhita tvāt para vanitā ādi api sukha sādhanam asatyam śāstra bādhita tvāt 
[I,201,vii_I,201,x]	nanu śāstreṇa kim atra bādhyate jñāne api pratyakṣeṇa kim bādhyate viṣayaḥ mithyā iti khyāpyate śāstreṇa api sukhasya hetuḥ bhithyā iti khyāpyate kim sa viṣaya ssukha hetuḥ na bhavati yathā tu eṣa viṣayaḥ kaluṣasya jñānasya hetuḥ tathā saḥ api kaluṣasya kaṭu vipākasya sukhasya hetuḥ iti tathāvidham sukham api vyabhicāri bhavati eva iti alam ati kelinā tasmāt samāna nyāya tvāt sukhe vyabhicāritā asti iti avyabhicāri padāt jñānam na labhyate 
[I,202,i_I,202,ii]	aparaḥ āha kim anena ḍimbha kalahena mā bhūt avi abhicāri padāt jñānasya lābhaḥ tathā api vyavasāya ātmaka padāt labhyate eva jñānam na hi sukha duḥkha ādayaḥ vyavasāya ātmakāḥ bhavanti kintu jñānam eva tathāvidham iti saṃśaya vyavaccheda artham tat padam iti ced satyam sukha ādi vyavacchedam api kartum alam eva bhavati vyavasāya ātmaka tvasya sukha ādiṣu asaṃbhavāt iti 
[I,202,iii]	tat evam siddhe api sukha ādi vyavacchede kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam viśeṣya nirdeśa artha tvāt tasya hi sarvāṇi amūni viśeṣaṇāni upāttāni tad anupādāne nirālambanāni bhaveyuḥ śrotuḥ ca buddhiḥ na samādhīyeta iti tena balāt gamyamānam eva kartavyam eva jñāna grahaṇam artha ākṣiptasya avacane pratyakṣam pratyakṣam iti etāvat mātram abhidheyam syāt anyat arthāt labhyate eva tasmāt dharmi nirdeśa artham yuktam jñāna padam 
[I,202,iv]	śabdānām artha saṃsparśi tvam śākya mata nirāsena sādhayiṣyate iti śabda anupraveśa vaśena vyapadeśyam nāma jñānam upapadyate iti tad vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam 
[I,203,i_I,203,ii]	tatra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat ācakṣate vyapadiśyate iti vyapadeśyam śabda karmatā āpannam jñānam ucyate yat indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannam sat viṣaya nāmadheyena vyapadiśyate rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tat vyapadeśyam jñānam pratyakṣa phalam pratyakṣam mā bhūt iti avyapadeśya grahaṇam tat idam anupapannam na hi nāmadheya vyapadeśya tvam aprāmāṇya kāraṇam bhavati yadi hi tat rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam ca viṣaya avyabhicāri nissaṃśayam ca tat katham apramāṇa phalam ucyate vyabhicāra ādi doṣa yoge vā pada antareṇa tad pratikṣepāt kim avyapadeśya padena pramāṇa phalam ca tat vijñānam idānīm kiṃpramāṇa prabhavam bhavatu na pratyakṣa phalam etat pada pratikṣipta tvāt na anumāna ādi janyam tad vailakṣaṇyāt na asti kiñcid pañcamam pramāṇam asaṅgrahaḥ asya lakṣyasya lakṣaṇena iti prajñā pramādaḥ tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat
