[I,204,i]	vyavacchedya antaram avyapadeśya padasya varṇayāñcakruḥ ācāryāḥ śabda artheṣu sthaviravya bahāravaḥ vyutpadyamānaḥ janaḥ saṃśaya avagama samaye saṃjñā upadeśaka ādayam panasaḥ ucyate iti vṛddha udīritāt vākyāt purovasthita śākhā ādimantam artham panasa śabda vācya tayā jānāti tat asya jñānam indriya jam api na kevala indriya karaṇakam bhavitum ucitam asati saṃjñā upadeśini śabde tad anutpādāt tena śabda indriyābhyām saṃbhūya janita tvāt ubhaya jam idam jñānam vyapadeśāt jātam iti vyapadeśyam ucyate tat avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate 
[I,204,ii]	na ca idam pañcamam pramāṇam avatarati kintu śābdam iva etat anumanyate lokaḥ tathā ca katham punar jānīte bhavān panasaḥ ayam iti iti pṛṣṭaḥ prativakti mama devadattena ākhyātam panasaḥ ayam iti iti na punar evam vismṛtya api vravi iti cakṣuṣā mayā pratipannam panasaḥ ayam ucyate iti iti tat indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāne sati api śabdaḥ eva atra karaṇam 
[I,205,i_I,205,ii]	atas eva sūtra kṛtā śabda lakṣaṇam varṇayatā na indriya anupraveśa pratiṣedhāya kim api viśeṣaṇam uparacitam upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva lakṣaṇam abhihitam atas ca indriya anupraveśe api śābda tām asya manyate sūtrakāraḥ iha punar avyapadeśya viśeṣaṇa padoṣa ādānena śabda anupraveśa pratiṣedhāt na pratyakṣam etat jñānam tasmāt evaṃvidha vyapadeśya vajñāna vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya padam iti 
[I,205,iii]	tat etat vyākhyātāraḥ na anumanyante yadi ubhaya jam jñānam avyapadeśya padena vyudasyate tat api na apramāṇam apramāṇa lakṣaṇa atīta tvāt iti pramāṇam bhavat kasmin anuviśatām iti cintyam nanu śābdam idam jñānam tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ bhavatu akṣajam api etat tad bhāva anuvidhānataḥ śābdam ca ubhaya jam ca iti viruddham abhidhīyate pramāṇa antaram eva syāt ittham tat api pūrvavat 
[I,206,i]	nanu lokaḥ śābda tām asya vyapadiśati devadattena ākhyātam panasaḥ ayam iti iti vyavahārāt iti uktam aho loka vatsalaḥ śraddadhānaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ na khalu lokasya vyapadeśa eka śaraṇāḥ vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti lokaḥ hi yathāruci vyapadiśati nānā muni jana sādhāraṇam api tīrtham nandikuṇḍam iti kim na śrutavān bhavān 
[I,206,ii_I,206,iii]	hanta tarhi sūtrakārāśayam anusarantaḥ śābdam idam jñānam pratipadyāmahe yat ayam sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣe śabda anupraveśa vyavacchedāya viśeṣaṇam idam upadiśati śabde tu na indriya vyudāsāya kiñcid viśeṣaṇam upādatte sa paśyati kāraṇa antara anupraveśe api śābdam etat jñānam iti ucyate manu vat sūtra kāraḥ api na dharmasya upadeśakaḥ yena etat anurodhena tasya brūyāma śābda tām vastu sthityā tu nirūpyamāṇam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt idam vijñānam na pratyakṣa phala tām ativartate tatas ca vyudasyamānam pramāṇa antara tām eva spṛśet 
[I,206,iv_I,206,v]	tasmāt ubhaya jajñāna vyudāsā anupapattitaḥ vyākhyā bhaṅgi antareṇa asya padasya iyam vidhīyate asambhava doṣa vyavaccheda artham avyapadeśya pada upādānam evam hi paraḥ manyate sati lakṣye lakṣaṇa varṇanam ucitam iha tu lakṣyamāṇam pratyakṣam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam nāma na kiñcid asti gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śabda avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvena śābda tvāt iha hi viṣaya vyatirekeṇa jñānānām atiśayaḥ durupapādaḥ bodha svabhāvasya sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt tatra yathā daṇḍī iti śuklaḥ iti vā pratyayaḥ viśeṣaṇa avacchinna viśeṣya viṣaya tayā sa atiśaya tvam aśnute tathā gauḥ iti ādi pratyayaḥ api vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvāt sa atiśaya tvam bhajate śabda avacchinna vācya viṣaya tvāt ca śābdaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ tad vyatirikta karaṇa kāryatva anupapatteḥ 
[I,207,i_I,207,ii]	na hi indriya karaṇakam idam jñānam bhavitum arhati cakṣuṣaḥ viśeṣaṇā viṣaya tvāt viśeṣye ca śrotrasya asāmarthyāt na ca yugapad indriya dvaya dvārakam ekam utpadyamānam jñānam kvacid dṛṣṭam tatra etat syāt mānasam idam jñānam sugandhibandhūka bodha vat bhaviṣyati uktam atra śabda liṅga ādi karaṇa antara vyāpāra viratau kāryam upajāyamānam kevala manaḥ karaṇam iti kalpyate na tad saṃbhave api tathā hi sati mānasam eva ekam pramāṇam syāt iti asti ca atra śabdaḥ eva karaṇam sa hi sahasra kiraṇa vat ātmānam ca viṣayam ca prakāśayati iti tasmāt indriya viṣaye api gauḥ ityādi jñānam utpadyamānam śābdam eva iti avadhāryate 
[I,208,i_I,208,ii]	nanu saṅketa avagama samaye gauḥ iti ādi śabdaḥ śrutaḥ āsīt saḥ idānīm atikrāntaḥ iti katham tad kṛtaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ syāt ucyate tadānīm aśrūyamāṇasya śabdasya smṛti ārūḍhasya tad pratyaya hetutvāt tad śrutau api kim sarve varṇāḥ pratyakṣa gocarāḥ viśeṣaḥ kaḥ antya varṇena gṛhītena smṛtena vā tat evam smṛti viṣayī kṛta śabda janitaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ iti abhyupetavyaḥ yathā parokṣe api śabdaḥ uccaritaḥ ātmānam prakāśayati artham ca tathā pratyakṣe viṣaye saḥ eva smaryamāṇaḥ ātmānam artham ca prakāśayati iti vācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāsaḥ ca evaṃvidhāsu buddhiṣu nūnam eṣitavyaḥ yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ saṃjñi tvam kevalam param iti 
[I,208,iii_I,209,i]	saṃjñi tvam iti mattu arthīya pratyaya antāt utpannaḥ bhāva pratyayaḥ saṃbandham ācaṣṭe saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandhaḥ saṃjñitvam iti kṛt taddhita samāseṣu sambandha abhidhānam bhāva pratyayena iti ābhiyukta smaraṇāt saṃjñā ca śabdaḥ saḥ ayam śabda viśiṣṭa artha pratibhāsaḥ uktaḥ bhavati na ca śabda anusandhāna rahitaḥ kaścid pratyayaḥ dṛśyate anullikhita śabdakeṣu api pratyayeṣu antatas sāmānya śabda samunmeṣa saṃbhavāt tad ullekha vyatirekeṇa prakāśa ātmikāyāḥ pratīteḥ anutpādāt tathā aaha bhartṛ hariḥ na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gṛhyate iti tasmāt pratyakṣasya lakṣyasya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam upakrāntam iti asaṃbhava doṣam āśaṅkya āha sūtra kāraḥ avyapadeśyam iti 
[I,209,ii]	yat idam avidita pada padārtha sambandhasya jñānam utpadyate vidita sambandhasya api vā yat prathama akṣa sannipāta samayaḥ eva jñānam anullikhita śabdakam śabda anusmaraṇe hetu bhūtam upajāyate tat aśabdam aśabda avacchinna viṣayam avyapadeśyam indriya artha sannikarṣa eka karaṇam avikalpam pratyakṣam na ca śabda kṛtā buddhīnām prakāśa svabhāva tā svatas eva tāsām evaṃrūpa tvāt na ca nirvikalpaka samaye yat kiñcid idam iti ādi sāmānya śabda ullekhaḥ kaḥ api kaiścid anubhūyate tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānānām śābda tve api tathāvidhasya jñānasya lakṣyasya sadbhāvāt na vyartham lakṣaṇam iti evam asaṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam iti 
[I,210,i]	tat etat ācāryāḥ na kṣamante na gauḥ iti ādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam api idam śābdam iti vaktum yuktam na ca atra śabda avacchinna arthaḥ prakāśate tathāvidha artha grahaṇe kāraṇa abhāvāt viśeṣya artha pramitau tāvat śabdaḥ karaṇam viśeṣaṇībhūtasya tu śabdasya grahaṇe kim karaṇam iti nirūpyatām na śrotram viramya vyāpārā saṃvedanāt sambandha grahaṇāt ūrdhvam ca smaryamāṇa śabda yojanayā jāyamāne gauḥ iti ādi jñāne śrotram karaṇam āśaṅkitum api na yuktam na api manaḥ bāhya karaṇa nirapekṣam bāhye viṣaye dhiyam ādhātu m alam andhādya bhāva prasaṅgāt 
[I,210,ii]	nanu śabdaḥ eva karaṇam iti uktam tat kim apara karaṇa āśaṅkanena mā evam ekasya kārakasya ekasyām eva kriyāyām karma karaṇa bhāva anupapatteḥ savitṛ prakāśa vat iti ced na kriyā bhedāt yatra asau karaṇam na tatra karma yatra vā karma na tatra karaṇam iti ghaṭa ādi viṣaya pramiti janmani karaṇam eva taraṇi prakāśaḥ na karma tad grahaṇa kāle tu karma eva asau na karaṇam 
[I,211,i]	kim tarhi tatra karaṇam iti ced kevalam eva cakṣuḥ iti brūmaḥ āloka grahaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa tvāt katham evam iti ced aparyanuyojyā hi vastu śaktiḥ ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe cakṣuḥ udyotam apekṣate na udyota grahaṇaḥ iti kam anuyuñjmahe saḥ ayam sūrya prakāśaḥ prakāśa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya prathama gṛhītaḥ ciram avatiṣṭhamānaḥ tad indriya grāhyaḥ eva viṣaye gṛhyamāṇe karaṇa tām upayāti iti yuktam 
[I,211,ii_I,212,ii]	śabdaḥ tu kṣaṇikaḥ śrotra indriya grāhyaḥ tad itara paricchedye viṣaye tad avagama kriyāyām karaṇībhūya bhūyas tasyām eva kriyāyām katham iva karma bhāvam anubhavet śabdaḥ hi dhūma ādi vat upāyaḥ eva na upeyaḥ saḥ upāya tvāt prathamam gṛhyatām nāma na upeya grahaṇa kāle punar grahaṇam arhati dhūma vat eva iti evam smaryamāṇaḥ api śabdaḥ yatra artha pratīti kāraṇam tatra api prathamam śabda smaraṇam tatas śabda artha sampratyayaḥ bhavati na tarām tatra artha pratīti velāyām śabda grahaṇam saṃbhāvyate tasmāt na asti vācaka viśeṣita vācya pratibhāsaḥ api ca gauḥ ityādi jñānam indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi prasabham tat katham śābdam iti ucyate śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣam yasya utpādakam indriyam tat eva yadi te śābdam aho naiyāyikaḥ bhavān 
[I,212,iii_I,212,iv]	nanu śabda avacchinnam artham na cakṣuḥ śrotrayoḥ anyatarat api karaṇam grahī tum alam iti uktam bhoḥ sādho cakṣuḥ eva enam grahīṣyati iti katham na brūṣe nanu na aviṣaye yuktam indriyasya pravartanam tena śabda viśiṣṭa artha jñānam na indriya jam bruve marīciṣu jala jñānam katham indriya jam tava tatra api hi na toyena sannikarṣaḥ asti cakṣuṣaḥ nanu ca smṛti upārūḍham udakam tatra gṛhyate iha api smṛti upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ kasmāt na gṛhyate nanu śabdaḥ na netrasya kadācid api gocaraḥ asannihitam api ambu kim vā bhavati gocaraḥ nanu eka indriya vādaḥ syāt cakṣuṣā śabda vedane atra api sarva bodhaḥ syāt asannihita vedane 
[I,213,i_I,213,ii]	nanu ca marīci jala jñānam bhrāntam iti katham iha dṛṣṭāntīkriyate katham asya bhrānta tvam kim anindriya ja tvāt uta vyabhicāri tvāt tatra anindriya ja tvena asya bhrānta tāyām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena eva nirāsāt avyabhicāri padam anupādeyam iti tad upādānāt vyabhicāri tvena asya bhrānta tvam iti nūnam idam indriya jam asat nihita salila jñānam abhyupagantavyam 
[I,213,iii_I,213,iv]	yathā ca aviṣaye tasmin nīre nayana jā matiḥ tathā vācaka saṃspṛṣṭe vācye kim iti na iṣyate yathā ca tava kāla ādi nīrūpam api cākṣuṣam tathā śabda anuraktaḥ api kim iti arthaḥ na cākṣuṣaḥ evam hi indriya vyatireka anuvidhānam atra na bādhitam bhaviṣyati nanu cākṣuṣa tām śabde na jīvan vaktum utsahe tyaja enam vācaka upeta vācya avagama durgraham 
[I,214,i_I,214,ii]	api ca amuṣya śābda tve sambandha grahaṇam katham na ca agṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati vācakaḥ nirvikalpaka vi jñāna viṣaye na ca tad grahaḥ śābda pakṣe tu nikṣiptam bhavatā sa vikalpakam sambandhaḥ śakyate boddhum na ca māna antarāt vinā śābda jñānena tad bodhe bhavet anyonya saṃśrayaḥ na ca śabda uparakte arthe sambandham buddhyate janaḥ go śabda vācyaḥ go śabdaḥ iti hi grahaṇam bhavet vācyasya hi gavā ādeḥ go śabda viśeṣitasya vācya tvāt vācyaḥ arthaḥ iva go śabdaḥ api vācya tām avalambate 
[I,214,iii]	yadi ca sva anurāgeṇa vācakāt vācya vedanam liṅgāt api bhavet buddhiḥ sva avacchedena liṅgini atha dhūma anvita tvena na vahniḥ avagamyate iha api śabda yogena gavādiḥ na eva gamyate na ca asti vastunaḥ dharmaḥ vā acya tā nāma kaścana yadi syāt nirvikalpe api pratibhāseta rūpavat artha asaṃsparśinaḥ śabdān kathayan duṣṭa saugataḥ pratyakṣa astreṇa bhettavyaḥ sa katham hanyate tvayā pratyakṣa viṣaye vṛttiḥ śabdānām bhavataḥ kutas teṣām yat viṣaye vṛttiḥ tat hi śābdīkṛtam tvayā 
[I,215,i_I,215,ii]	api ca viṣaya bhedena pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhavati iti durāśayā śabda viśiṣṭam artham nirvikalpāt sa vikalpasya viṣayam adhikam paśyati bhavān anena eva ca vartmanā avataran param śabda adhyāsam na paśyati iti kaḥ ayam vyāmohaḥ sa tvam vacanīyaḥ asi saṃvṛttaḥ madhu paśyasi durbuddhe prapātam na eva paśyasi iti tasmāt gauḥ iti vijñānam pratyakṣam avadhāryatām śabda smaraṇa sāpekṣa cakṣuḥ indriya nirmitam mānasa tvam tu yadi asya na iṣyate yuktam eva tat tad bhāva anuvidhāyi tvāt bāhya indriya jam eva tat 
[I,216,i_I,216,ii]	atra punar pravarāḥ prāhuḥ nanu evam gauḥ iti ādi bodheṣu vācaka avacchinna vācya pratibhāse sarva prakāram apākriyamāṇe prathama akṣa sannipāta samaya samāsādita sadbhāva nirvikalpaka vedana vailakṣaṇyam katham eṣām bhavet na hi viṣaya atiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsā atiśayaḥ bhavitum arhati daṇḍī iti daṇḍa viśiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ pratibhāsate itarathā na kevala puruṣa pratīteḥ eṣā pratītiḥ viśiṣyata ubhaya pratibhāse api na daṇḍa puruṣau iti pratīteḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt pūrva apara cira kṣipra krama ādi avagameṣu api diś kāla ādi viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sphurati atiśaya grahāt pratyakṣaḥ kim sa kāla ādiḥ pratītim pṛccha kim mayā gṛhyate tad viśiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sa ca na iti etat adbhutam 
[I,217,i_I,217,ii]	etena samavāye api pratyakṣa tvam prakāsitam iha iti tantu sambanddha paṭa pratyaya darśanāt ayam paṭaḥ iti pratyayāt iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti vilakṣaṇaḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ tantu paṭa sambandhasya viśeṣaṇasya apratyakṣatāyām na kevala paṭa pratyayāt viśiṣyeta iti 
[I,217,iii_I,217,iv]	atha matam upāya bhedāt pratīti bhedaḥ bhavati dūra avidūra deśa vyavasthita sthāṇu ādi padārtha pratīti vat saṃskṛta āsaṃskṛta akṣa karaṇa viṣaya bodha vat vā iti tat asāṃpratam upāya bhede api tad bheda asiddheḥ upāyaḥ buddhau atiśayam ādadhāti na viṣaye viṣaya avagati samaye ca na buddhiḥ avabhāti iti naiyāyikāḥ tat ayam atiśayaḥ yat adhikaraṇaḥ sā na pratibhāsate buddhiḥ yat ca tadānīm avabhāsate viṣayaḥ tatra atiśayaḥ na asti dṛśyate ca atiśaya saṃvedanam iti saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ na ca dūra avidūra deśa vartini padārthe pratītiḥ upāya bhedāt bhidyate sā api hi viṣaya bhedāt eva bhidyate 
[I,218,i]	dūrāt hi vastu sāmānyam dharma mātra upalakṣitam adūrataḥ tu vispaṣṭa viśeṣam avasīyate yathā mādhena varṇitam cayaḥ tviṣām iti avadhāritam purā tatas śarīrī iti vibhāvita ākṛtim vibhuḥ vibhakta avayavam pumān iti kramāt amum nāradaḥ iti abodhi saḥ iti kriyā antarāṇām vaicitrye yat vā tat vā astu kāraṇam bhedaḥ jñāna kriyāyāḥ tu karma bheda nibandhanaḥ 
[I,218,ii_I,218,iii]	tat etat ācāryāḥ pratisamādadhate na viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ kintu upāya bhedāt bhavati eva yat ca coditam viṣaya pratibhāsa kāle tad pratibhāsā pratibhāsāt atiśaya vacane saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ iti tad avidita naiyāyika darśanasya eva codyam jñāna utpādaḥ eva viṣayasya pratyakṣata iti naḥ darśanam na jñāna grahaṇam iti tatra yathā puruṣaḥ iti niratiśaya jñāna mātra utpāde tāvat mātra viṣaya pratyakṣa tā bhavati na tatra jñānam prakāśate agṛhyamāṇe api jñāne viṣayaḥ eva pratibhāsate evam daṇḍī iti śukla vāsāḥ iti viśeṣaṇa jñāna abhyupāya vaśāt sa atiśaya pratyaya janane tad agrahaṇe saḥ eva viṣayaḥ avabhāsate iti kiyān eṣa saṅkaṭaḥ panthāḥ tathā ca daṇḍī iti puruṣa pravaṇā eva matiḥ kaḥ daṇḍī puruṣaḥ kaḥ puruṣaḥ daṇḍī iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nissandigdhasya puṃsaḥ eva pratibhāsāt evam daṇḍinam bhojaya daṇḍine dehi iti bhojana ādi kārya yogi tvam na daṇḍe dṛśyate api tu puṃsi eva 
[I,219,i]	nanu daṇḍī parvatam ārohati iti daṇḍe api kārya anvayaḥ dṛśyate loke vede api daṇḍī maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣān anvāhaḥ iti praiṣa anuvaṃcanasya vacana antarataḥ prāpteḥ daṇḍa vidhāna artham etat vākyam bhavati yathā lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti śyena ādau ṛtvijām prakṛti vat bhāvena prāptānām lohita uṣṇīṣa vidhāna mātram etat bhavati ucyate bhavatu evam kintu daṇḍam abalambya puruṣaḥ parvatam ārohati na daṇḍaḥ niścetanaḥ vede api daṇḍa pāṇiḥ puruṣaḥ preṣān anubhāṣata na daṇḍaḥ na lohitāḥ uṣṇīṣāḥ caranti kintu anya padārthībhūtāḥ ṛtvijaḥ eva iti sarvatra viśeṣya pravaṇā eva matiḥ ubhaya pratipādane tu daṇḍa puruṣau iti syāt na daṇḍī iti 
[I,219,ii_I,219,iii]	viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya niyāmaka tvāt iti ced sā iyam viśeṣya pravaṇāḥ matiḥ uktā eva bhavati viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇa tvena eva upasarjana tvāt daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti puruṣaḥ eva ucyate na daṇḍa puruṣau evam pūrva apara ādi pratyayāḥ cira kṣipra ādi pratyayāḥ iha tantuṣu paṭe ityādi pratyayāḥ ca diś kāla samavāya grāhiṇaḥ te ime diś kāla samavāyāḥ sāmagrī antargatāssantaḥ pratyaya atiśayam ādadhati na tad viṣayī bhavanti paṭa ādi dravya vat 
[I,220,i_I,220,ii]	evam patana ādi anumeya guru tva ādi kāraṇa bheda janitāḥ guruḥ pāṣāṇaḥ ityādi pratyayāḥ parokṣa viśeṣaṇam viśaṣyam avalambante iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt gauḥ ityādi jñānam na vācaka avacchinna vācya viṣayam atas ca na śābdam tat api tu su spaṣṭam pratyakṣam eva tasmin ca lakṣye sati lakṣaṇa vaiyarthya śaṅkā karaṇa abhāvāt na asaṃbhava doṣa nirākaraṇa artham avyapadeśya padam 
[I,220,iii]	kimartham tarhi idamaḥ tu uktam ācārvaiḥ ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda artham iti 
[I,220,iv_I,220,v]	nanu tat api pratyakṣam eva iti anapohyam uktam purovasthita gava ādi padārtha svarūpa mātra grahaṇa niṣṭhita sāmarthyam atra pratyakṣam go śabda vācya tāyām tu saṃjñā karma upadeśī śabdaḥ eva pramāṇam yadi api śabda artha sambandha paricchede gati antaram api saṃbhavati tathā api yatra tāvat saṃjñinam nirdiśya saṃjñā vṛddhaiḥ upadiśyate go śabda vācyaḥ ayam panasa śabda vācyaḥ ayam iti tatra tat vācya tā paricchede saḥ eva karaṇam 
[I,220,vi]	atas eva ca lokaḥ api śābda tvam iha manyate śabda uparacitā pūrva jñāna atiśaya toṣitaḥ tat śabda vācya tā ājñaptiḥ vinā saṃjñā upadeśinaḥ śabdāt na iti saḥ eva atra sati api akṣe prakarṣa bhāj atas sūtra kṛtā api atra śabda atiśaya darśinā vyadhāyi tad vyavacchedaḥ na tu dharma upadeśinā tasmāt ubhayaja jñāna vyavaccheda artham eva idam padam iti 
[I,221,i_I,221,ii]	anye tu manyante yadi saṅketa grahaṇa kāle bhāvinaḥ saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana janitasya ubhaya ja jñānasya vyavacchedakam idam varṇyate padam tadā tad vyavahāra kāle api yat ayam gauḥ iti saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta devadatta ādi udīrita saṃjñā upadeśaka vacana smaraṇa pūrvakam vijñānam utpadyate tat api ubhaya jam eva iti katham anena na vyudasyate nanu tatra śabda smaraṇam kāraṇam na śabdaḥ saṅketa kāle api śabda smaraṇam eva kāraṇam na hi krama bhāvinaḥ varṇāḥ yugapad anubhavitum pāryante antya varṇe tu gṛhyamāṇe smaryamāṇe vā kim śabda vyāpāraḥ viśiṣyate 
[I,222,i]	nanu vyavahāra kāle gavā ādi nāmadheya pada mātram eva smaryamāṇam indriyeṇa saha sa vikalpa pratyaya udaye vyāpriyate saṅketa kāle tu saṃjñā upadeśi vṛddha vākyam iti ced mā evam vyavahāra kāle api saṃjñā upadeśakam vṛddha vākyam eva smaryate tat asmaraṇe tad śabda vācya tā anavagamāt asya gauḥ iti nāma devadattena upadiṣṭam āsīt iti evam anusmṛtya go śabda vācya tayā evam vyavaharati iti vākya smaraṇa jam eva idam jñānam tasmāt asya api tat vākyam saṃjñā karma upadeśakam hetu tām upayāti iti śābdam etat apīpyatām evam astu iti ced śāntam evam sati tapasvinām naiyāyikānām utpannam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam yatra mārga antareṇa api saṅketa jñāna saṃbhavaḥ tatra api anena nyāyena śābda tā na nivartate naiyāyikānām ca sa vikalpa pratyakṣa mayāḥ prāṇāḥ tasmāt na ubhaya jasya śābda tvam jñānasya vaktavyam 
[I,223,i]	sambandha adhigamaḥ tu nānā pramāṇakaḥ tatra sve sve viṣaye tad tad pramāṇam pravartate yathā aaham bhaṭṭaḥ sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti tasmāt na ekasya śabdasya bhāraḥ āropaṇīyaḥ pratyakṣam tu saṅketa grahaṇa kāle api sva viṣaya grāhakam iti na ubhaya ja jñāna vyavaccheda paṃkṣaḥ niravadyaḥ tasmāt varam jarat naiyāyika kathita śabda karmatā āpanna jñāna vyavaccheda pakṣaḥ iti saḥ eva aśrīyatām tatra tāvat karmaṇi kṛtye kṛte vyapadeśya śabdaḥ yathārthataraḥ bhavati 
[I,223,ii]	nanu tatra coditam na tādṛśam jñānam apramāṇam na pañcamam pramāṇam iti satyam ayantu teṣām āśayaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya grahaṇa abhimukham hi tat akṣa jam jñānam pramāṇam phalam vā ucyate yadā tu tat eva śabdena ucyate rūpa jñānam rasa jñānam iti tadā rūpa ādi jñāna viṣaya grahaṇa vyāpāra labhyām pramāṇa tām apahāya śabda karmatā āpatti kṛtām prameya tām eva avalambataḥ iti na tasyām daśāyām tad pramāṇam iti kutas pañcama pramāṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti 
[I,224,i_I,224,ii]	aparaḥ āha sa vikalpakasya śabda saṅkalpakasya śabda saṃsarga sāpekṣa janmanaḥ pratyakṣa jñānasya śābda tām pūrvavat āśaṅkya tasya evaśābda tām darśayati avyapadeśya padena sūtrakāraḥ pratyakṣam eva tat jñānam indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt avyapadeśyam aśābdam iti arthaḥ spaṣṭa tvāt vācaka abhāvāt indriya anuvidhānataḥ lokasya sammata tvāt ca pratyakṣam idam iṣyate śabda anusmṛti ja tve api na śābdam jñānam īdṛśam śabda smṛtiḥ sahāyaḥ syāt indriyasya pradīpa vat 
[I,224,iii]	nanu evam sa vikalpasya pratyakṣa tve prasādhite na idānīm saṅgṛhītam syāt pratyakṣam nirvikalpakam yaḥ tu śabda anuvedhena śābda tvam sa vikalpake kaścid āśaṅkate tasya pratiśabdaḥ ayam ucyate yatra śabda anuvedhe api pratyakṣam jñānam iṣyate tatra tad sparśa śūnyasya tathā tve kā vicāraṇā nirvikalpaka vat tasmāt pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam samagrahīt ca tat idaṃpadena anena sūtrakṛt iti ācārya matāni iha darśitāni yathā aagamam yadebhyaḥ satyam ābhāti sabhyāḥ tad avalambyatām 
[I,225,i_I,226,i]	avyabhicāri grahaṇam vyabhicāri jñāna vyavaccheda artham yathā grīṣme tapati lalāṭantape tapane tad marīciṣu caturam ūṣara bhuvam abhihatya samutphaliteṣu taraṅga ākāra dhāriṣu yat vāri jñānam tat atasmin tad iti grahaṇāt vyabhicāri bhavati tat anena padena vyavacchidyate na tat pratyakṣam iti tatra nirvikalpakam api prathama nayana sannipāta jam jñānam udaka sa vikalpaka jñāna janakam udaka grāhyā iva na yathā tathā tathāgatāḥ kathayanti marīci viṣayam avikalpakam jñānam udaka vikalpaka jananāt apramāṇam iti nirvikalpa avasthāyām avicārayataḥ eva prathama unmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ jhaṭiti salila pratibhāsāt athavā vācaka ullekha pūrvikāḥ api saṃvidaḥ na eva indriya artha janya tvam jahati iti upapāditam tasmāt sa vikalpakam avikalpakam vā yat atasmin tat iti jñānam utpadyate tat vyabhicāri tat ca iha vyāvartyam iti 
[I,226,ii]	nanu marīciṣu jala jñānam avidyamāna salila avabhāsi tvāt atindriya artha sannikarṣa jam atas ca indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena tad vyudāsa siddheḥ kim avyabhicāri padena na etat evam tasya indriya artha janya tvam siddham tat bhāva bhāvataḥ na hi anunmīlita akṣasya marau salila vedanam arthaḥ api janakaḥ tasya vidyate na asataḥ prathā 
[I,226,iii_I,227,i]	tad ālambana cintām tu tridhā aacāryāḥ pracakrire kaiścid ālambanam tasmin uktam sūrya marīcayaḥ nigūhita nija ākārāḥ salila ākāra dhāriṇaḥ tatra taraṅga ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇe sati na sthāṇu puruṣa vat ubhaya viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti na ca sannihita marīci viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti kintu pūrva upalabdha viruddha salila vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ tad smaraṇāt ca sthagiteṣu sva viśeṣeṣu marīcayaḥ svarūpam upadarśayitum aśaknuvantaḥ toya rūpeṇa avabhāsante 
[I,227,ii_I,227,iii]	anye tu ālambanam prāhuḥ puras avasthita dharmiṇaḥ sādṛśya darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitam payaḥ yatra kila jñāne yat rūpam upaplavate tat tasya ālambanam ucyate na sannihitam bhū pradeśasya tad āraṃbhakāṇām ca paramāṇūnām tad ālambana tva prasaṅgāt idam ca salila avabhāsi vijñānam atas tat eva asya ālambanam tat ca na iha sannihitam na ca ekānta asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ khyātiḥ avakalpate iti deśa antara ādau vidyamānam eva salilam sadṛśa darśana prabuddha saṃskāra upajanita smaraṇa upārūḍham iha avalambanībhavati 
[I,228,i_I,228,iii]	anyat ālambanam ca anyat pratibhāti iti kecana ālambanam dīdhitayaḥ toyam ca pratibhāsate kartṛ karaṇa vyatiriktam jñāna janakam ālambanam ucyate iti na paramāṇu ādau prasaktiḥ iti tat idam pakṣa trayam api upariṣṭāt nipuṇataram nirūpayiṣyate tat evam bāhya indriya artha anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinām vibhramāṇām indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna padena nirasitum aśakya tvāt yuktam avyabhicāri pada upādānam 
[I,228,iv]	ye tu mānasāḥ vibhramāḥ bāhya indriya anapekṣa janmānaḥ teṣām iṣyate eva indriya artha sannikarṣa padena paryudasanam iti na tad artham avyabhicāri pada upādānam tat yathā viraha uddīpita uddāma kāma ākulita dṛṣṭayaḥ dūra sthām api paśyanti kāntām antika vartinīm 
[I,228,v]	nanu evaṃprāyeṣu nirālambaneṣu vibhrameṣu kutastyaḥ ākāraḥ pratibhāti ucyate ākāraḥ smṛti upārūḍhaḥ prāyeṇa sphurati bhrame smṛteḥ tu kāraṇam kiñcid kadācid bhavati kvacid kvacid sadṛśa vijñānam kāma śoka ādayaḥ kvacid kvacid tu darśana abhyāsaḥ timiram cakṣuṣaḥ kvacid kvacid nidrā kvacid cintā dhātūnām vikṛtiḥ kvacid alakṣyamāṇe tad hetau adṛṣṭam smṛti kāraṇam bālasya indu dvaya jñānam asti na asti iti vetti kaḥ astitve api smṛtau hetum adṛṣṭam tasya manvate nūnam niyama siddhi artham janakasya avabhāsanam na ca ekānta asataḥ dṛṣṭā jñāna utpādana yogya tā na ca sannihitam vastu tatra asti vanitā ādikam tena idam smṛti upārūḍham avabhāti iti manvate tatra ādyena padena etāḥ sva antaḥkaraṇa saṃbhavāḥ nirastāḥ bhrāntayaḥ akṣa ādi saṃsarga rahita udayāḥ yāḥ punar pīta śaṅkha ādi maru nīḥ a ādi buddhayaḥ akṣa jāḥ tat vyudāsāya sūtre padam idam kṛtam 
[I,230,i]	dūrāt sthāṇu puruṣa sādhāraṇam dharmam āroha pariṇāha rūpam upalabhamānasya tayoḥ anyataratra vartamānān vakra koṭara ādīn kara caraṇa ādīn vā viśeṣān apaśyataḥ samāna dharma prabuddha saṃskāra tayā ca ubhaya vartinaḥ api viśeṣān anusmarataḥ puras avasthita artha viṣayam sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśaya jñānam upajāyate tat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tva ādi viśeṣaṇa yuktam api na pratyakṣa phalam atas tat vyavacchedāya vyavasāya ātmaka grahaṇam 
[I,230,ii]	nanu mānasa tvāt saṃśaya jñānasya indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇena nirāsaḥ siddhi ati eva kim pada antareṇa tathā ca bhāṣya kāraḥ smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhāsvapna jñāna ūha sukha ādi pratyakṣam icchā ādayaḥ ca manasaḥ liṅgāni iti vakṣyati mā evam sthāṇu ādi saṃśayasya bāhya indriya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt kaścid hi mānasaḥ saṃśayaḥ samasti eva yathā daiśikasya jyotiḥ gaṇaka ādeḥ ekadā anyadā ca asamyak ādiśya tṛtīye pade punar ādiśataḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati kim ayam asmad ādeśaḥ saṃvadet uta visaṃvadet iti sa bhāṣya kṛtaḥ cetasi kevala manaḥ karaṇaḥ iti sthitaḥ yaḥ tu viṣphārita akṣasya sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā ityādiḥ saṃpadyate saṃśayaḥ tam anindriya artha sannikarṣa jam kaḥ nāma ācakṣīta 
[I,231,i_I,231,ii]	nanu atasmin tat iti jñānam vyabhicāri vyākhyātam eka rūpam ca puras avasthitam artham aneka rūpa tayā spṛśati saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti saḥ ayam atasmin tathā abhāvāt viparyayaḥ eva iti pūrva pada vyudaḥ tatvāt na pada antara vyavacchedya tām arhati iti na etat evam svarūpa bhedāt kāraṇa bhedāt ca ekam eva viruddham ākāram ullikhan viparyayaḥ jāyate sthāṇau puruṣaḥ iti puṃsi vā sthāṇuḥ iti aniyata ākāra dvaya ullkhī tu saṃśayaḥ bhavati sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti saḥ ayam svarūpa bhedaḥ pratyātma saṃvedyaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa prabhavaḥ viparyayaḥ śuktikāyām sannihitāyām rajata viśeṣān marīciṣu sannihiteṣu salila gata viśeṣān anusmarataḥ viparyayaḥ bhavati ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā tu saṃśayaḥ iti pada antara nirasanīyaḥ eva ayam 
[I,232,i_I,232,ii]	nanu saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ api nirvikalpayoḥ asaṃbhavāt avyapadeśya padena eva pravara pakṣe pratikṣepaḥ siddhyet puras avasthita sthāṇu ādi dharmi darśana mātram eva nirvikalpakam indriya vyāpāra jam anantarantu ubhaya anyatara viśeṣaṇa smaraṇa janmanorullikhita śabdayoḥ eva saṃśaya viparyayayoḥ utpādaḥ tatra viśeṣasmṛtyā eva śabda anuvedhasya ākṣepāt atas pada dvayam api tat vyudāsāya na kartavyam atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva yatas śabda anuvedha jātam api pratyakṣam upapāditam 
[I,232,iii_I,233,i]	nanu bhavatu pravara pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ sadṛśa darśana niṣṭhite tu nayana vyāpāre viśeṣa smṛteḥ ūrdhvam upajāyamānau saṃśaya viparyayau na indriya jau iti prathama padena eva nirastau bhavataḥ tat asat smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api indriya vyāpāra anuvṛtteḥ iti ukta tvāt etat ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate nimīlita cakṣuṣaḥ tad anutpādāt na ca tadānīm antar saṅkalpa rūpeṇa api śabda ullekhaḥ utpanne tu saṃśaye viparyaye ca vācaka smaraṇam bhaviṣyati iti samyak jñāna vat saṃśaya viparyayau api śabda ullekha śūnyau saṃvedyete viśeṣa smṛtiḥ tu viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt tān eva ākṣipatu śabdasya kim vartate vācaka śabda smṛtiḥ tu śabdam upasthāpayati sā ca na tāvat utpannā iti samyak pratyaya vat tasmāt vācaka ullekha varjitau akṣa vyāpāra jau na staḥ na saṃśaya viparyayau īdṛśayoḥ katham anayoḥ ādya pada vyudasanīya tā tasmāt tad apākṛtaye yuktam pada dvayasya api upādānam 
[I,233,ii]	evam lakṣaṇa padāni lakṣya padam tu pratyakṣam iti jñāna viśeṣe rūḍhyā eva pravartate yogasya vyabhicārāt prati gatam akṣam pratyakṣam iti akṣara arthaḥ sa ca ayam sukha ādau api saṃbhavati iti rūḍhiḥ eva sādhīyasī 
[I,234,i_I,234,ii]	athavā jñāna padasya sūtre nirdeśāt yoga pakṣaḥ api astu na ca asau dṛśyamānaḥ nihnotum yuktaḥ yogarūḍhiḥ tu nāma na sammatā eva viduṣām yatra api hi dvayam dṛśyate tatra api śabda pravṛttau prayojakam eva bhavati katham punar akṣam prati gatam jñānam iṣyate na saṃyogi tvena añjana ādeḥ pratyakṣa prasaṅgāt na samavāyi tvena akṣa vartinām rūpa ādīnām tathā tva prasaṅgāt na janaka tvena akṣāraṃbhakāṇām paramāṇūnām api tathā abhāva prasakteḥ tasmāt janya tvena eva jñānam akṣam prati gatam iti vyākhyeyam 
[I,234,iii_I,235,i]	avyayībhāva vyākhyānam tu na yuktam pratyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣā strī ityādi vyavahāra darśanāt iti alam ati prasaṅgena tena indriya artha ja tvādi viśeṣaṇa gaṇa anvitam yatas bhavati vijñānam tat pratyakṣam iti sthitam iti vigata kalaṅkam asya dhīmān akuruta lakṣaṇam etat akṣapādaḥ na tu para racitāni lakṣaṇāni kṣaṇam api sūkṣma dṛśām viśanti cetaḥ 
[I,235,ii]	yat tāvat kalpanā apoḍham abhra antam iti lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya jagau bhikṣuḥ tat atyantam asāṃpratam śabda saṃsarga yogya artha pratītiḥ kila kalpanā asyāḥ ca kena doṣeṇa prāmāṇyam na viṣahyate 
[I,236,i]	nanu abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsa tvāt api kam anyam doṣam mṛgayate bhavān asat artha viṣaya tvam eva idam uktam bhavati śabda arthasya vāstavasya abhāvāt sva lakṣaṇasya sajātīya itara vyāvṛtta ātmanaḥ sambandha adhigama savyapekṣa pravṛttinā śabdena viṣayīkartum aśakyatvāt tad vyatiriktasya vastunaḥ anupalambhāt 
[I,237,i]	na ca indriya artha sannikarṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī kalpanā buddhiḥ tam antareṇa api bhāvāt tasmin sati api ca pūrva anubhūta vācaka śabda yojanam vinā anutpādāt yadi ca indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ tad janakaḥ bhavet prathamam eva tathāvidhām dhiyam janayet na ca janayati tat ayam śabda smṛteḥ ūrdhvam api na janakaḥ iti manyāmahe 
[I,237,ii_I,237,iii]	tat uktam yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddheḥ upayoga aviśeṣataḥ sa paścāt api tena syāt artha apāye api netra dhīḥ iti api ca sati api indriya artha saṃsarge smṛti apekṣāyām saḥ arthaḥ tayā eva vyavahitaḥ syāt āha ca artha upayoge api punar smārtam śabda anuyojanam akṣadhīrya di apekṣeta saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti
[I,238,i_I,239,i]	saṅketa smaraṇa sahakāri savyapekṣam akṣam īdṛśīm buddhim janayati iti ced na vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra ādi vikalpaiḥ sahakāriṇaḥ nirasta tvāt kiñca daṇḍī ityādi vikalpa vijñānam na indriya āpāta velāyām eva jāyate kintu bahu prakriyā apekṣam yat āha viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam ca saṃbandham laukikīm sthitim gṛhītvā sakalam ca etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā iti na ceyatīm prakriyām prathama nayana upanipāta jātam avikalpakam jñānam udvoḍhum kṣamam iti āha saṅketa smaraṇa upāyam dṛṣṭa saṅkalana ātmakam pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnye tat cākṣuṣe katham iti
[I,239,ii]	tatra etat syāt dvividhāḥ vikalpāḥ chātra manoratha viracitāḥ idantā grāhiṇaḥ ca nīlam ityādayaḥ tatra pūrve mā bhūvan pramāṇam kaḥ teṣu artha nirapekṣa janmasu prāmāṇye abhiniviśeta idantā grāhiṇām tu artha avinābhūta tvāt katham na prāmāṇyam iti ucyate sarve eva amī vikalpāḥ paramārthataḥ artham na spṛśanti eva sa hi nirvikalpakena eva sarva ātmanā paricchinnaḥ tat uktam ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam kaḥ anyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate iti
[I,240,i_I,240,ii]	yat tu keṣāñcid vikalpānāmidantā grāhi tva spaṣṭa tva ādi rūpam tat arthāvinābhā vi nirvikalpaka darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvi tva avāpta tad chāyā saṃsarga ja nitam na tu teṣām artha sparśaḥ kaścid asti artha ātmanaḥ nirvikalpena eva mudrita tvāt tasmāt atāttvika ākāra samullekha purassarāḥ na yathāvastu jāyante kadācid api kalpanāḥ 
[I,240,iii_I,240,v]	pañca ca ete kalpanāḥ bhavanti jāti kalpanā guṇa kalpanā kriyā kalpanā nāma kalpanā dravya kalpanā ca iti tāḥ ca kvacid abhede api bheda kalpanāt kvacid ca bhede api abheda kalpanāt kalpanāḥ ucyante jāti jāti matoḥ bhedaḥ na kaścid paramārthataḥ bheda āropaṇa rūpā ca jāyate jāti kalpanā idam asya goḥ go tvam iti na hi kaścid bhedam paśyati tena abhede bheda kalpanā eva 
[I,240,vi_I,241,i]	etayā sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā guṇa kalpanā tatra api abhinnayoḥ bhedaḥ kalpyate guṇa tadvatoḥ tathā ca āhuḥ eṣa guṇī rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvena na ātmānam naḥ darśayati tebhyaḥ ca vyatirekam vāñchasi iti citram bheda āropaṇa rūpā eva guṇavat karma kalpanā tad svarūpa atiriktā hi na kriyā nāma kācana 
[I,241,ii_I,241,v]	gacchati devadattaḥ iti devadattasya eva anyūna an atiriktasya pratibhāsāt vibhinnayoḥ tu abhedena pravṛttā nāma kalpanā caitraḥ ayam iti abhedena niścayaḥ nāma nāminoḥ caitraḥ iti ayam śabdaḥ ayam iti arthaḥ kīdṛśam anayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam evam daṇḍī ayam iti ādiḥ mantavyā dravya kalpanā sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhedinoḥ grahaṇāt tayoḥ 
[I,241,vi]	nanu yadi abhede bhedam bhede ca abhedam āropayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante tat katham āsu bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ na jāyate śuktikā ra jata buddhi vat ucyate yatra vastu vastu antarātmanā avabhāsate tatra bādhakaḥ bhavati marīciṣu iva jala buddhau iha tu na jāti ādi vastu antaram asti yatas vastu antarātmanā asya grahaḥ bhavet vyakti viṣayāḥ eva ete sāmānya ādi vikalpāḥ tasmāt vastu antara anava bhāsiṣu eṣu na bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ jāyate tasmāt na viparyaya ātmānaḥ vikalpāḥ 
[I,242,i_I,242,ii]	na ca ete pramāṇam etat ullikhyamānasya jāti ādeḥ apāramārthika tvāt atas eva pramāṇa viparyaya abhyām ayam anyaḥ eva vikalpaḥ iti ācakṣate iti alam vistareṇa evam etāḥ pravartante vāsanā mātra nirmitāḥ kalpita alīka bheda ādi prapañcāḥ pañca kalpanāḥ evam ca paśyatā tāsām prāmāṇya āmoda manda tām bhikṣuṇā lakṣaṇa granthe tad apoḍha padam kṛtam 
[I,243,i_I,243,iii]	atra pratividhīyate tat idam saṃkīrṇa prāyam atibahu vilapatā bhavatā na niyatam kim api vikalpānām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam iti spaṣṭam āveditam tat ucyatām kim śabda artha avabhāsi tva garbhīkṛtam asat artha vāci tvam tad aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhimatam uta saṃketa smṛti apekṣā upanatam anindriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvam 
[I,243,iv_I,243,viii]	uta viśeṣa grahaṇa ādi apekṣā avāptam bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam uta pūrva apara parāmarśa śūnya cākṣuṣa vailakṣaṇya vācaḥ yukti samarpitam vicāraka tvam uta nirvikalpaka paricchinna vastu grāhitā nibandhanam adhigata adhigantṛ tvam uta bheda abheda samāropa bhaṇitam atasmin tad iti grāhi tvam uta vṛtti vikalpa ādi vādhita sāmānya grahaṇa sūcitam bādhya tvam eva iti 
[I,244,i_I,244,iv]	tatra tāvat na śabda saṃsarga yogya artha grahaṇa dvāra kamasat artha grāhi tvam eṣām aprāmāṇya kāraṇam abhidhātum yuktam śabda arthasya vāstavasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt kaḥ punar asau iti ced yaḥ eva nirvikalpake pratibhāsate kim nirvikalpake sāmānya ādikam avabhāsate bāḍham avabhāsate iti vakṣyāmaḥ atas eva vā adhya tvam api na prāmāṇya apahāra kāraṇam eṣām vaktavyam vṛtti vikalpa ādeḥ bādhakasya parihariṣyamāṇa tvāt bādhaka antarasya ca na idam iti pratyayasya śuktikā ra jata jñāna ādi vat bhavatā eva anabhyupagamāt 
[I,244,v_I,245,ii]	na apya nindriya artha sannikarṣa janya tvam saṅketa grahaṇa kāla anubhūta śabda smaraṇa apekṣaṇāt asya vaktavyam sahakārī apekṣāyām api tad vyāpārā virateḥ yaḥ prāc ajanakaḥ buddheḥ sa labdhvā sahakāriṇam kāla antareṇa tām buddhim vidadhat kena vāryate vyatirikta avyatirikta upakāra karaṇa ādi vikalpāḥ tu kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge nirākariṣyante 
[I,245,iii]	rūpa grahaṇe ca cakṣuṣaḥ pradīpa ādi apekṣāyām duṣparihārāḥ te vikalpāḥ na vai kiñcid ekam janakam iti bhavantaḥ api paṭhanti iti bhavat pakṣe api tulyāḥ te yadi ubhayoḥ doṣaḥ na tena ekaḥ codyaḥ bhavati tasmāt upayoga aviśeṣataḥ iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ ayam eva upayoga viśeṣaḥ yat indriya āloka manaskāra viṣaya vat vācaka smaraṇam api sāmagrī antaram etat pratyaya janmani vyāpriyate iti na vācaka smaraṇa janita tvena smārta tvāt apramāṇam vikalpaḥ rūpa smṛti ākhya samanantara pratyayatiḥ mitasya nirvikalpasya rūpa jñānasya api tathā tva prasaṅgāt 
[I,246,i_I,246,ii]	yat ca idam ucyate saḥ arthaḥ vyavahitaḥ bhavet iti tat na vidmaḥ kīdṛśam vyavadhānam arthasya iti na hi dīpena vā manasā vā vijñāna hetunā kadācid arthaḥ vyavadhīyate manaḥ vat ca vācaka smṛtiḥ api sāmagrī antargatā satī tad pratītau vyāpriyate iti katham artham vyavadadhīta smṛti viṣayīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ tam artham vyavadhatte iti ced na śabdasya tad prakāśaka tvena jñāna vat dīpa vat vā vyavadhāyaka tva abhāvāt na ca indriya vyāpāra tirodhānam vyavadhānam tasya adhunā api anuvartamāna tvāt 
[I,246,iii_I,247,i]	yathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt ādyam vijñānam akṣa jam tathā tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt uttaram jñānam akṣa jam na hi vācaka smaraṇa antaram akṣiṇī nimīlya vikalpayati paṭaḥ ayam iti atha yāvat vācaka vijñānam hṛdaya patham avatarati tāvat saḥ arthaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt atikrāntaḥ iti vyavahitaḥ ucyate tat api durāśā mātram kṣaṇa bhaṅgasya upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt api ca pradarśita prāpti ādi vyavahāra vat santāna dvārakam iha api tad grahaṇam bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na vyavadhānam tat evam samaya smaraṇa sāpekṣa tve api na indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tām ativartate sa vikalpakam vijñānam iti katham apratyakṣam 
[I,247,ii]	yat punar viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya grahaṇa ādi sāmagrī apekṣa tvena bahu prayāsa sādhya tvam aprāmāṇyakāraṇam abhidhīyate tat atīva su bhāpitam na hi bahu kleśa sādhya tvam nāma prāmāṇyam upahanti uktam ca na hi giri śṛṅgam āruhya yat gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti rasa ādi jñāna apekṣayā ca rūpa ādi jñānasya dīpa ādi āloka āharaṇa prayāsa sādhya tvāt aprāmāṇyam syāt 
[I,247,iii]	yat api pūrva apara parāmarśa rahita cākṣuṣa vijñāna vaiparītyena vikalpa jñānānām vicāraka tvāt aprāmāṇyam ucyate tat api na samyak sarvatra jñānasya vicāraka tva anupapatteḥ vicārakaḥ hi pramātā sa hi paśyati smarati anusandhatte vicārayati icchati dveṣṭi yatate gṛhṇāti jahāti sukham anubhavati iti vakṣyāmaḥ artham ca spṛśataḥ vijñānasya vicārayataḥ api katham aprāmāṇyam syāt 
[I,248,i]	atha asya nirvikalpena eva sarva ātmanā spṛṣṭa tvāt piṣṭa peṣaṇam ayuktam iti sa vikalpam adhigata artha grāhi tvāda pramāṇam iti manyase tat api na sādhu pūrvam eva parihṛta tvāt na hi anadhigata adhigantṛ tvam prāmāṇyam iti uktam gṛhīta grahaṇe api pramāṇasya pramāṇa tva anativṛtteḥ 
[I,248,ii]	yat tu abhyadhāyi bhinneṣu abhedam abhinneṣu ca bhedam kalpayantyaḥ kalpanāḥ atasmin tad grahaṇe prāmāṇyam avahajati iti tat yuktam atasmin tad grahaḥ bhavati apramāṇa tva kāraṇam tat tu iha na asti tasya hi bādhaka pratyaya upasannipātāt niścayaḥ na ca bhavat upavarṇitāsu pañcasu api jāti ādi kalpanāsu bādhakam kiñcid asti iti na atasmin tad grāhiṇyaḥ kalpanāḥ bhavanti 
[I,248,iii_I,248,v]	jātiḥ jātimataḥ bhinnā guṇī guṇa gaṇāt pṛthak tathā eva tad pratīteḥ ca kalpanā uktiḥ abādhikā etat ca upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyate dravya nāmnaḥ atu bhinnayoḥ bhedena eva pratītiḥ nābheda kalpanā na hi devadatta śabdaḥ ayam iti evam tad vācyaḥ pratīyate nanu devadattaḥ ayam iti saṃjñā saṃjñya bheda vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate eva iti ced na śabda viśiṣṭa tad vācyā avagatiḥ eṣā na śabdaḥ asyām artha ārūḍhaḥ avabhāsate na śabda vivarta rūpeṇa arthaḥ parisphurati kim tarhi śabda smṛti ākhya sāmagrya sāmarthya atiśaya udbhavaḥ pratyaya atiśayaḥ saḥ ayam iti evam prāk prasādhitam 
[I,249,i_I,249,ii]	daṇḍī ayam iti dravya abheda kalpanā tu manda matibhiḥ eva udāhṛtā na hi daṇḍaḥ ayam iti devadatte pratītiḥ api tu daṇḍī iti tatra ca prakṛti pratyayau pṛthak eva upalabhyete daṇḍaḥ asya asti iti daṇḍī iti tat iha yathā eva vastu tathā eva tad avasāyaḥ iti nābhedāropaḥ karmaṇi tu dvayam api na asti na abhinne bheda kalpanā na ca bhinne api abheda kalpanā 
[I,249,iii]	kriyā hi tadvataḥ bhinnā bhedena eva ca gṛhyate calati ityādi bodheṣu tad svarūpa avabhāsanāt tena kriyā guṇa dravya nāma jāti uparañjitam viṣayam darśayan aiti vikalpaḥ na apramāṇa tām viparyayāt samuttīrṇaḥ iti sādhu sahāmahe pramāṇāt tu bahis bhūtam vikalpam na kṣamāmahe kvacid vādhaka yogena yadi tasya apramāṇa tā nirvikalpe api tulyā asau dvi candra ādi avabhāsini manorājya vikalpānām kāma mastu apramāṇa tā yathāvastu pravṛttānām na tu asau akṣa janmanām 
[I,250,i_I,250,ii]	na ca nirvikalpa pṛṣṭha bhāvi tva kṛtam eṣām etat rūpam viṣaya saṃsparśam antareṇa svatassvaccha rūpāṇām jñānānām evam ākāra tva anupapatteḥ kim nirvikalpa pṛṣṭha bhāvitā kariṣyati tad anantara bhāvinī hi smṛtiḥ api kvacid duśyate eva na ca sā tad śāyāvatī iti durāśā mātram etat nanu nirvikalpakena eva vastu sarva svam gṛhītam ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti varṇitam prativihitam etat gṛhīta grahaṇe api prāmāṇya anapāyāt 
[I,250,iii_I,253,ii]	kiñca kim nirvikalpakena gṛhyate iti etat eva na jānīmaḥ bhavantaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayam saṃpracakṣate sajātīya vijātīya parāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam mahāsāmānyam anye tu sattām tad viṣayam viduḥ vāc rūpam apare tattvam prameyam tasya manvate kecid guṇa kriyā dravya jāti bheda ādi rūṣitam śabalam vastu manyante nirvikalpaka gocaram pratyakṣa viṣaye api etāḥ citram vipratipattayaḥ parokṣa arthe hi vimatiḥ pratyakṣeṇa upaśāmyati pratyakṣe hi samutpannā vimatiḥ kena śāmyati idam bhāti na bhāti iti saṃvid vipratipattiṣu para pratyāyane puṃsām śaraṇam śapatha uktayaḥ na tu śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva nirudyamam āsmahe mārga antareṇa api tat prameyam niścinumaḥ nirvikalpa anusāreṇa sa vikalpaka saṃbhavāt grāhyam tadā anuguṇyena nirvikalpasya manmahe 
[I,253,iii_I,253,v]	tatra na tāvat sakala sajātīya vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ gṛhīte nirvikalpena vyāvṛtte hi sva lakṣaṇe akasmāt eva sāmānya vikalpa ullasanam katham nirvikalpa anusāreṇa hi vikalpāḥ prādurbhavitum arhanti api ca vijātīya parāvṛtta viṣayā yadi kalpanā vyāvṛtti rūpam sāmānyam gṛhītam hanta darśanaiḥ vyāvṛttān nanu na eva anyā vyāvṛttiḥ paramārthataḥ vyāvṛtta grahaṇena eva sutarām tad grahaḥ bhavet sāmānya grahaṇe api evam tad vyāpāra avakalpanāt sva lakṣaṇa pariccheda niṣṭham tat na avatiṣṭhate 
[I,254,i_I,254,ii]	na api sattā dvaita va ādi sammata satta ākhyaḥ nirvikalpasya viṣayaḥ yuktaḥ sattā grahaṇa pakṣe api viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas sā bhāti bheda spṛṣṭā ced siddham advaita darśanam na ca bhedam vinā sattā gṛhītum api śakyate na avidyā mātram eva idam iti ca sthāpayiṣyate 
[I,254,iii]	vāc tattva pratibhāsaḥ api pratikṣiptaḥ anayā diśā katham ca cākṣuṣe jñāne vāc tattvam avabhāsate agṛhīte tu sambandhe gṛhīte vā api vismṛte aprabuddhe api saṃskāre vācaka avagatiḥ kutas 
[I,255,i]	citra tā api pṛthak bhūtaiḥ dharmaiḥ tad samavāyibhiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yadīṣyeta dharmiṇaḥ kāmam astu sā tad ātma tā tu na ekasya nityam tattva anupagrahāt aṃśa niṣkarṣa pakṣe tu dharma bhedaḥ balāt bhavet yatra yatra yadā udbhūtiḥ jighṛkṣā ca iti kathyate tad ātmaka tvam dharmāṇām ucyate ca iti asaṅgatam deśa bhedaḥ tu dharmāṇām asmābhiḥ api na iṣyate dharmī hi teṣām ādhāraḥ na punar sa tad ātmakaḥ 
[I,256,i]	tasmāt yaḥ eva vastu ātmā sa vikalpasya gocaraḥ saḥ eva nirvikalpasya śabda ullekha vivarjitaḥ kimātmakaḥ asau iti ced yat yadā pratibhāsate vastu pramitayaḥ ca eva praṣṭavyāḥ na tu vādinaḥ kvacid jātiḥ kvacid dūvyam kvacid karma kvacid guṇaḥ yat eva sa vikalpena tat eva anena gṛhyate iha śabda anusandhāna mātram abhyadhikam param viṣaye na tu bhedaḥ asti sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ atas śabda anusandhānavandhyam tad anubandhi vā jāti ādi viṣaya grāhi sarvam pratyakṣam iṣyate tasmāt yat kalpanā apoḍha padam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe bhikṣuṇā paṭhitam tasya vyavacchedyam na vidyate 
[I,257,i_I,257,ii]	abhrānta padasya api vyāvartyam na kiṃcana tad mate paśyāmaḥ nanu timiraḥ āśu bhramaṇa nauyāna saṃkṣobha ādi āhita vibhramam dvi candra alāta cakra calat pādapa ādi darśanam apohyam asya paraiḥ uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu kalpanā apoḍha padena eva tad vyudāsa siddheḥ tatra api nirvikalpakam jñānam eka candra ādi viṣayam eva vikalpāḥ tu viparīta ākāra grāhiṇaḥ bhavanti yathā marīci grāhiṇi nirvikalpake salila avasāyī vikalpaḥ iti 
[I,258,i]	nanu timireṇa dvidhā akṛtam cakṣuḥ ekatayā na śaknoti śaśitam grahītum iti nirvikalpakam api dvi candra ādi jñānam yadi evam tarala taraṅga ādi sādṛśya rūṣitam ūṣare marīci cakram cakṣuṣā paricchettum aśakyam iti tatra api nirvikalpakam udaka grāhi vijñānam kim iti na iṣyate abhyupagame vā sat asat kalpana utpāta ādi kṛtaḥ pramāṇa itara vyavahāraḥ na syāt 
[I,258,ii_I,259,i]	api ca na bādhaka upanipātam antareṇa bhrānta tā avakalpate jñānānām na ca kṣaṇika vādi mate vādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ buddhīnām upapadyate iti alam vimardena iti su nipuṇa buddhiḥ lakṣaṇam vaktu kāmaḥ pada yugalam api idam nirmame na anavadyam bhavatu mati mahimnaḥ ceṣṭitam dṛṣṭam etat jagat abhibhava dhīram dhīmataḥ dharma kīrteḥ 
[I,259,ii]	śrotra ādi vṛttiḥ aparaiḥ avikalpaka iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avarṇi tat api apāstam sāmya at nayasya na ca siddhyati buddhi vṛttyā draṣṭṛ tvam ātmanaḥ iti pratipāditam prāk 
[I,259,iii]	sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tad pratyakṣam animittam vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt iti etat sūtram jaiminīyaiḥ sākṣāt pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa paratvena na vyākhyātam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti prakṛta pratijñā saṅgatyabhāvāt api tu dharmam prati pratyakṣam animittam evam lakṣaṇaka tvāt iti anuvāda bhaṅgyā lakṣaṇe yojitam yathā uktam evam sati anuvāda tvam lakṣaṇasya api saṃbhavet iti tad etad lakṣaṇa varṇane sūtra yojanam asamīcīnam ati vyāpti doṣān ativṛtteḥ tathā hi indriyāṇām sati saṃprayoge puruṣasya jāyamānā buddhiḥ pratyakṣam iti sūtra arthaḥ tathā ca ati vyāptiḥ saṃśaya viparyaya buddhyoḥ api indriya saṃyoga ja tvena pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgāt 
[I,261,i_I,261,ii]	atha sat saṃprayogaḥ iti satām saṃprayogaḥ iti vyākhyāsyate tathā api nirālambana vibhramāḥ eva artha nirapekṣa janmānaḥ nirastāḥ bhaveyuḥ na sa ālambanau saṃśaya viparyayau atha sati saṃprayogaḥ iti saptamī pakṣaḥ eva na tyajyate saṃśaya viparyaya chedī ca saṃprayogaḥ iti upasargaḥ varṇyate yathā uktam samyak arthe ca saṃśabdaḥ duṣprayoga nivāraṇaḥ duṣṭa tvāt śuktikā yogaḥ vāryatāmakṣaja īkṣaṇāt iti
[I,261,iii_I,262,i]	tathā api prayoga samyaktvasya atīndriya tvena pratyakṣa anavagamya tvāt kāryataḥ avagatiḥ vaktavyā kāryam ca jñānam na ca tat aviśeṣitam eva prayogasya samyak tām avagamayati na ca tad viśeṣaṇa param iha padam api akṣaram api mātrām api vā sūtre paśyāmaḥ satām saṃprayogaḥ iti ca padam nirālambana jñāna nivṛttaye varṇitam sati iti tu sati saptamya eva gata artha tvāt anarthakam lokataḥ eva kārya viśeṣa avagamāt prayoga samyak tvam avagamiṣyāmaḥ iti ced lokataḥ eva pratyakṣasya siddha tvāt kim tad lakṣaṇe sūtra sāmarthya yojana ākleśena 
[I,262,ii]	yat api atra bhagavān vṛtti kāraḥ prāha yat pratyakṣam na tat vyabhicarati yat vyabhicāri na tat pratyakṣam kim tarhi pratyakṣam tad saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat viṣayam jñānam tena eva saṃprayoge indriyāṇām puruṣasya buddhi janma sat pratyakṣam yat anya viṣayakam jñānam anya saṃprayoge bhavati na tat pratyakṣam iti iti evam tad satoḥ vyatyayena lakṣaṇam anapavādam avakalpate iti tat api vṛthā aṭāṭyā mātram saṃśaya jñānena vyabhicāra anativṛtteḥ tatra hi yat viṣayam jñānam tena saṃprayogaḥ indriyāṇām asti eva 
[I,263,i]	nanu ubhaya viṣayam jñānam na ca ubhābhyām saṃprayuktam indriyam mā evam na hi dhava khadira vat dvau api saṃśaya saṃvidi pratibhāsete kim tu sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti anirdhārita ekatara padārtha tattva avamarśī saṃśayaḥ jāyate nūnam ca tayoḥ anyatareṇa indriyam saṃprayuktam eva iti ubhaya avamarśi tvāt ca saṃśayasya yena saṃprayuktam cakṣuḥ tad viṣayam api tat jñānam bhavati eva iti na ati vyāptiḥ parihṛtā bhavati 
[I,263,ii]	atha brūyuḥ kim anena parikleśena na lakṣaṇa varṇanam asmākam abhimatam anuvāda pakṣa nikṣipta tvāt api tu loka prasiddha pratyakṣa anuvādena dharmam pratyanimitta tvam eva vidhīyate na dharmam prati pramāṇam pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvāt vidyamāna artha grāhi tvāt iti arthaḥ dharmaḥ ca na vartamānaḥ tri kālān avacchinnasya tasya yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ pratīteḥ 
[I,263,iii_I,264,ii]	tarhi sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti kimarthaḥ granthaḥ iti ced na vidyamāna upalaṃbhana samarthana artha tvāt yadi vidyamāna upalaṃbhana tvam asiddham iti paraḥ brūyāt sa vaktavyaḥ vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam pratyakṣam sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt iti pratyakṣa grahaṇam api hetu nirdeśa artham eva sat saṃprayogasya asiddha tām bruvan anena pratyākhyāyate sat saṃprayoga jam pratyakṣam pratyakṣa tvāt iti tat uktam pratyakṣa tvam adohetuḥ śeṣam hetu prasiddhaye iti svātantryeṇa api pratyakṣa tvam dharma grāhaka tva niṣedhāya vaktavyam na dharma grāhi pratyakṣam pratyakṣa tvāt asmad ādi pratyakṣa vat iti evam anyatra eva sūtra tātparyāt na ati vyāpti ādi doṣa avasaraḥ iha iti 
[I,264,iii]	tat etat api na prāmāṇika manaḥ anukūlam katarasya pratyakṣasya dharmam pratyanimitta tvam pratipādyate kim asmad ādi pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya vā tatra asmad ādi pratyakṣasya tathātve sarveṣām avivādaḥ eva iti kim tatra iya tā śrameṇa yogi pratyakṣasya tu bhavatām asiddha tvāt kasya dharmam pratyanimitta tva pratipādanam 
[I,265,i_I,265,ii]	evam ca dharmiṇaḥ abhāvāt āśraya asiddha tām spṛśet vidyamāna upalaṃbha tva pratyakṣa tva ādi sādhanam para prasiddhyā tad siddhiḥ iti ced kā iyam prasiddhiḥ nāma pramāṇa mūlā tad viparītā vā ādye pakṣe pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt parasya iva tava api siddhiḥ bhavatu apramāṇa mūla tve tuna kasyacid aṣi asau prasiddhiḥ 
[I,265,iii_I,265,v]	yogi jñānam pareṣām yat siddham tad anubhāṣaṇe pratijñāpadayoḥ eva vyāghātaḥ te prasajyate paraiḥ hi dharma grāhi yogi jñānam abhyupagatam atas tad anubhāṣaṇe dharma grāhakam na dharma grāhakam iti uktam syāt para saṃsiddha mūlam ca na anumānam prakalpate uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva idam nirālambana dūṣaṇe sādhya siddhiḥ yathā na asti para siddhena hetunā tathā eva dharmi siddha tvam para siddhyā na yujyate 
[I,266,i]	tatra etat syāt prasaṅga sādhanam idam prasaṅgaḥ ca nāma para siddhena parasya aniṣṭa āpādanam ucyate parasya ca vidyamāna upalaṃbhanam sat saṃprayoga janyam ca pratyakṣam siddham atas tena eva hetunā dharma animitta tvam tasya upapādyate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ na etat evam prasaṅga sādhanam nāma na asti eva paramārthataḥ tat hi kuḍyam vinā tatra citrakarmā iva lakṣyate 
[I,266,ii_I,267,i]	na hi nabhaḥ kusumasya saurabhā saurabha vicāraḥ yuktaḥ atha api kim na etena bhavatu evam prasaṅga sādhanam tat api tu vyāpti mūlam bhavati na ca saṃbhavati vyāpti pratītiḥ iha mādṛśām na dharma grāhi sarveṣām pratyakṣam iti vetti kaḥ mad pratyakṣam akṣamam dharma grahaṇaḥ iti bhavān na jānīte tvad pratyakṣam api na dharma grāhi iti na aham jāne anyasya pratyakṣam īdṛśam eva iti ubhau api āvām na jānīvahe 
[I,267,ii]	tvayā tu yadi sarveṣām pratyakṣam jñātam īdṛśam tarhi tvam eva yogī iti yoginaḥ dvekṣi kim vṛthā prāmāṇika sthitim tasmāt ittham śrotriya budhyase para ukte atīndriye hi arthe mā vādīḥ dūṣaṇam punar pramāṇa siddhe hata śakti dūṣaṇam pramāṇa śūnye api vṛthā tad uktayaḥ nirasya codya vyasanam tu mṛgyatām atīndriye vastuni sādhanam punar sa ced paryanuyuktaḥ san vaktum śaknoti sādhanam om iti pratipattavyam no ced na asti eva tasya tat 
[I,268,i]	āha śikṣitāḥ smaḥ prāmāṇika vṛttam na dūṣaṇam brūmaḥ bhavantam eva anuyuñjmahe tat ā itarhi kathyatām dharma adhigama nipuṇa yogi pratyakṣa siddhau kim pramāṇam iti idam ucyate darśana atiśayaḥ eva pramāṇam tathā hi asmad ādiḥ apekṣitālokaḥ avalokayati nikaṭa sthitam artha bṛndam unduru vairiṇaḥ tu sāndratama tamaḥ paṅka paṭala vilipta deśa patitam api saṃpaśyanti saṃpāti nāmā ca gṛdhra rājaḥ yojana śata vyavahitām api daśaratha nandana sundarīm dadarśa iti śrūyate rāmāyaṇe saḥ ayam darśana atiśayaḥ śukla ādi guṇa atiśayaḥ iva tāratamya samanvitaḥ iti gamayati param api niratiśayam atiśayam atas ca yatra asya paraḥ prakarṣaḥ te yoginaḥ gīyante darśanasya ca paraḥ atiśayaḥ sūkṣma vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa bhūta bhaviṣyat ādi viṣaya tvam 
[I,269,i_I,269,ii]	nanu sva viṣaya anatikrameṇa bhavatu tad atiśaya kalpanā dharmaḥ tu cakṣuṣaḥ na viṣayaḥ eva tat uktam yatra api atiśayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa sva artha an atilaṅghanāt dūra sūkṣma ādi dṛṣṭau syāt na rūpe śrotra vṛtti tā api ca ye api ca atiśayāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ prajñā medhā balaiḥ nṛṇām stoka stoka antara tvena na tu ati indriya darśanāt iti etat ayuktam yatas yadi api na asmad ādi nayana viṣayaḥ dharmaḥ tathā api yogi indriya gamyaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā hi yojana śata vyavahitam andhakāra antaritam vā na asmad ādi locana gocara tām upayāti saṃpāti pṛṣa d aṃśa dṛśoḥ tu viṣayaḥ bhavati eva 
[I,269,iii_I,270,i]	nanu evam aviṣaye pravṛttam yoginām cakṣuḥ gandha rasa ādīn api gṛhṇīyāt yathā uktam ekena tu pramāṇena sarvajñaḥ yena kalpyate nūnam sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasa ādīn pratipadyate iti na etat evam rasa ādi grāhīṇi api yoginām indriyāṇi cakṣuḥ vat atiśayavanti eva iti na rasa ādiṣu cakṣuḥ vyāpāraḥ parikalpyate dharme api na tarhi kalpanīyaḥ iti ced na tasya rasa ādi vat tad aviṣaya tva abhāvāt 
[I,270,ii]	api ca yogi indriya aviṣaya tvam dharmasya katham avagatavān bhavān aviṣaya tvam tad bhāve api tad anavagamāt avagamyate yathā nayana sadbhāve api śabda aśravaṇāt tad aviṣaya tā śabdasya avasīyate na ca evam yogi cakṣuṣi sati api dharmasya agrahaṇam avagantum śaknoti bhavān ubhayasya api bhavataḥ parokṣa tvāt iti aviṣayassa tasya iti na te vaktum yuktam iti 
[I,270,iii]	nanu kartavyatā rūpaḥ tri kāla sparśa varjitaḥ cakṣuḥ viṣaya tām eti dharmaḥ iti ati sāhasam satyam sāhasam etat te mama vā carmacakṣuṣaḥ na tu eṣa durgamaḥ panthāḥ yoginām sarva darśinām 
[I,271,i]	yat ca tri kālān avacchinnaḥ yajeta iti ādiliṅā ādi yukta śabda eka śaraṇa avagamaḥ dharmaḥ katham tatas anyena pramāṇena paricchidyatām iti ucyate tat api prakriyā mātram kim iva hi tri kāla sparśa asparśābhyām kṛtyam yathā vayam gamana ādi kriyāṇām deśa antara prāpti ādi prayojana tām jānīmaḥ tathā agnihotra ādi kriyāṇām svarga ādi phala tām jñāsyanti yoginaḥ iti kim atra sāhasam 
[I,271,ii_I,271,iv]	yadi hi bāhya indriyeṣu amarṣaḥ na teṣu atiśayaḥ viṣahyate tat alam anubandhena manaḥ karaṇakam jñānam bhāvanā abhyāsa saṃbhavam bhavati dhyāyatām dharme kāntā ādau iva kāminām manaḥ hi sarva viṣayam na tasya aviṣayaḥ kaścid asti abhyāsa vaśāt ca atīndriyeṣu api artheṣu parisphuṭāḥ pratibhāsāḥ prādurbhavantaḥ dṛśyante yathā aahuḥ kāma śoka āmaya unmāda cora svaprādi upadrutāḥ abhūtān api paśyanti puratas avasthitān iva 
[I,272,i]	nanu eteṣām mithyājñāna tvāt na yogi vijñāne dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam na sphuṭa ābabhāsa mātra tayā dṛṣṭānta tva upapatteḥ na hi śabda ghaṭayoḥ api sarva ātmanā atulya tvam tatra kāma śoka ādi bhāvanā abhyāsa bhuvām pratibhāsānām bādhaka vaidhuryāt aprāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati na itareṣām tad abhāvāt sphuṭa ābhāsa tvam tu ubhayatra api tulyam 
[I,272,ii^1_I,272,ii^2]	nanu abhyāsaḥ api kriyamāṇaḥ na atyantam apūrvam atiśayam āvahati laṅghana abhyāsa vat yaḥ api hi pratidinam ananya karmā laṅghanam abhyasyati saḥ api katipaya pada parimitam avani talam abhilaṅghayati na tu parvatam ambudhim vā iti ucyate laṅghanam deha dharma tvāt kapha jāḍya ādi saṃbhavāt mā gāt prakarṣam jñāne tu tasya kaḥ pratibandhakaḥ laṅghana ādau tu pūrvedyus prayatna samupārjitaḥ na dehe atiśayaḥ kaścid anyedyus avatiṣṭhate tatra kevalam abhyāsāt prakṣaye kapha medasoḥ śarīra lāghavam labdhvā laṅghayanti yathocitam iha vijñāna janyaḥ tu saṃskāraḥ vyavatiṣṭhate krama upacīyamānaḥ asau para atiśaya kāraṇam yathā anuvāka grahaṇe saṃsthā abhyasana kalpitaḥ sthiraḥ karoti saṃskāraḥ pāṭha smṛti ādi pāṭavam yathā vā puṭapākena śodhyamānam śanaiśśanais hema niṣpratikāśam tat yāti
[I,272,ii^3]	kalyāṇa tām parām tathā eva bhāvanā abhyāsāt yoginām api mānasam jñānam sakala vijñeya sākṣātkāra kṣamam bhavet asmad ādeḥ ca rāga ādi mala āvaraṇa dhūsaram manaḥ na labhate jñāna prakarṣa padavīm parām pratyaham bhāvanā abhyāsa kṣapita aśeṣa kalmaṣam yoginām tu manaḥ śuddham kam iva artham na paśyati yathā ca teṣām rāga ādi prahāṇam avakalpate tathā apavarga cintāyām vistareṇa abhidhāsyate tat evam kṣīṇa doṣāṇām dhyāna avahita cetasām nirmalam sarva viṣayam jñānam bhavati yoginām 
[I,274,i]	api ca anāgata jñānam asmad ādeḥ api kvacid pramāṇam prātibham śvas me bhrātā aagantā iti dṛśyate na anartha jam na sandigdham na bādha vidhurīkṛtam na duṣṭa kāraṇam ca iti pramāṇam idam iṣyatām kvacid vādhaka yogaḥ ced astu tasya apramāṇa tā yatra aparedyus abhyeti bhrātā tatra kim ucyatām kākatālīyam iti ced na pramāṇa pradarśitam vastu tad kākatālīyam iti śaṅkitum arhati 
[I,274,ii_I,275,i]	nanu anartha jam idam jñānam bhrātuḥ tad janakasya tadānīm asattvāt syāt etat evam yadi tadā astitvena bhrātaram gṛhṇīyāt kintu bhāvinam enam gṛhṇāti bhāvi tvam ca tadā asya asti eva iti katham anartha jam tat jñānam nanu bhāvitayā grahaṇam aghaṭamānam bhāvi tvam hi nāma sa avadhiḥ prāc abhāvaḥ abhāvasya ca bhāvena bhrātrā saha kaḥ sambandhaḥ vastu avastunoḥ virodhāt tat etat asamyak tad deśa sambandhasya tatra prāc abhāvaḥ na tu dharmiṇaḥ sa hi vidyate eva prāc avagataḥ sa ca kutaścid bhojana utkaṇṭha ādeḥ kāraṇāt smaraṇa padavīm upārūḍhaḥ śvastana āgamana viśiṣṭa tvena pratibhāti iti prātibhasya saḥ eva janakaḥ iti tasmāt anartha jatvā abhāvāt pramāṇam prātibham pramāṇam ca sat pratyakṣam eva na pramāṇa antaram śabda liṅga sārūpya nimitta anapekṣa tvāt 
[I,275,ii]	nanu pratyakṣam api mā bhūt indriya anapekṣa tvāt mā evam manasaḥ eva tatra indriya tvāt pūrva utpanna cākṣuṣa vijñāna viśeṣaṇasya bāhyasya vastunaḥ manaḥ grāhakam iti na andhādya bhāvaḥ iti uktam śabda ādi upāya antara viratau ca jāyamānam anavadyam jñānam mānasam pratyakṣam bhavati surabhi ketaka kusumam madhurā śarkarā iti jñāna vat iti api uktam atas eva na aniyata nimittakam jñānam pratibhā iti vaktavyam pratyakṣa nimitta tvāt 
[I,276,i]	na ca ārṣam nāma jñānam pratibhā pratyakṣa atiriktasya ārṣa nāmnaḥ pratyayasya abhāvāt ṛṣīṇām api yat jñānam tat api āgama pūrvakam iti hi vadanti āgama grahaṇam ca nidarśana artham anupāyasya jñānasya teṣām asattvāt 
[I,277,i]	na ca siddha darśanam pratibhā asmad ādeḥ api bhāvāt tasmāt na pramāṇa antaram prātibham api tu pratyakṣam eva 
[I,277,ii_I,277,v]	nanu pratyakṣam api na idam bhavati tat hi vartamāna eka viṣayam yathā uktam saṃbaddham vartamānam ca gṛhyate cakṣuḥ ādinā iti tathā eṣa pratyakṣa dharmaḥ ca vartamāna artha tā eva yat iti ca mā evam anāgata grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya pradeśa antare svayam eva ukta tvāt rajatam gṛhyamāṇam hi cira sthāyi iti gṛhyata iiti ca bhavān eva avocat tasmāt pratyakṣam anāgata grāhi śvas me bhrātā aagantā iti siddham evañca asmad ādīnām iva anāgate bhrātari yoginām bhaviṣyati dharme pratyakṣam pravartsyati iti tasmāt yat sarvajña niṣadhāya kathyate yat jātīyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ tu yat jātīya artha darśanam bhavet idānīm lokasya tathā kāla antare api abhūt iti tad apāstam bhavati 
[I,277,vi_I,278,i]	tatra etat syāt sarvajña tā yoginām kim ekena jñānena bahubhiḥ vā na tāvat ekena na hi ekasmin jñāne paraspara virodhinaḥ arthāḥ śīta uṣṇa vat avabhāsante na api bahubhi tāni hi krameṇa vā bhaveyuḥ yugapad vā na yugapad jñānāni saṃbhavanti sūkṣma antaḥkaraṇa sāpekṣa tvāt krama bhāvibhiḥ tu jñānaiḥ aśeṣa tribhuvana kuhara nihita nikhila padārtha sārtha sākṣāt karaṇam eṣām manvantara koṭibhiḥ api durghaṭam iti katham sarva jñāḥ yoginaḥ 
[I,278,ii]	ucyate yugapad ekayā eva buddhyā sarvatra sarvān arthān drakṣyanti yoginaḥ yat tu viruddha tvāt iti tad aprayojakam viruddhānām api nīla pīta ādīnām ekatra citra pratyaye avabhāsanāt ekatra ca mecaka pratyaye sannihita padārtha vyatirikta sakala vastu abhāva grahaṇasya pūrvam darśita tvāt śīta uṣṇayoḥ api kvacid avasare bhavati yugapad upalaṃbhaḥ tat yathā pratapati hutavaha visphuliṅga nikara anukāri kiraṇe taruṇa ūṣmaṇi grīṣme himaśakala śiśira payasi sarasi nimagna tā abhidaghna dehasya puṃsaḥ yugapad eva saras salila sūrya ātapa vartinau śīta uṣṇa sparśau anubhava patham avata rataḥ 
[I,279,i]	nanu ekena jñānena sarvān arthān bhūta bhāvinaḥ parokṣān api paśyantaḥ yoginaḥ katham akhila trailokya vṛttānta darśinaḥ sakala jagadguroḥ īśvarāt viśiṣyeran asti viśeṣaḥ īśvarasya tathāvidham nityam eva jñānam yoginām tu yoga bhāvanā abhyāsa prabhavam iti 
[I,279,ii_I,279,iii]	nanu na adṛṣṭa pūrve arthe kvacid bhavati bhāvanā āgamāt tu paricchinne dharme bhāvanayā api kim codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti sa avadhāraṇa pratijñā arthaḥ prathamam āgamāt avagata dharma svarūpeṣu satsu api yogiṣu na viplavataḥ eva iti ucyate yogiṣu asti eva ayam prakāraḥ paścāt api pravartamāne dharma grāhiṇi pratyakṣe codanā eva iti avadhāraṇam śithilībhavati eva api ca īśvara jñānam sāṃsiddhikam eva dharma viṣayam vedasya kāraṇa bhūtam vakṣyāmaḥ tasmin api sati na codanā eva iti avadhāraṇa artha siddhiḥ 
[I,280,i_I,280,iii]	tasmāt na dharma grāhakam yogi pratyakṣam vidyamāna upalambhana tvāt sat saṃprayoga ja tvāt ityādi sādhanam aprayojakam pramāṇa antara vijñāta prameya pratipādakaḥ dharma upadeśakaḥ śabdaḥ śabda tvāt ghaṭa śabda vat pratyakṣaḥ kasyacid dharmaḥ prameya tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat ityādayaḥ ca sulabhāḥ santi eva pratihetavaḥ tena niṣpratigha yukti sādhitām yoga buddhim akhila artha darśinīm kim viḍambayitum ucyate mudhā duṣṭa hetu nikurumba śambaram tat ittham api jaiminīyam sūtram asaṅgatā artham lakṣaṇa paratvam tu asya nirastam eva 
[I,280,iv]	yat api kaiścid pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa m uktam ātma indriya manaḥ artha sannikarṣāt yat utpadyate jñānam tad anyat anumāna ādibhyaḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api traya dvaya sannikarṣa janmanām sukha ātma ādi jñānānām avyāpakam ati vyāpakam ca vyabhicārya ādi bodhānām iti upekṣaṇīyam 
[I,281,i]	īśvara kṛṣṇaḥ tu prativiṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ dṛṣṭam iti pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam avocat tat api na manojñam anumāna ādi jñānānām api viṣaya adhyavasāya svabhāva tvena ati vyāpteḥ 
[I,281,ii]	yat tu rājā vyākhyātavān pratirābhi mukhye vartate tena ābhimukhyena viṣaya adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti tat api anumāna ādau asti eva ghaṭaḥ ayam iti vat agnimān parvataḥ iti ābhimukhyena eva pratīteḥ spaṣṭa tā tu sarva saṃvidām sva viṣaye vidyate evam 
[I,281,iii_I,282,i]	atha manyase sāmānya vihitasya viśeṣeṇa bādhāt anumāna ādi vyāvṛttiḥ setsyati sāmānyena adhyavasāyaḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ sa liṅga śabdābhyām viśeṣitaḥ iti tad itaraḥ adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣam iti sthāsyati yadi evam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam idānīm avyākaraṇīyam eva śabda liṅga grahaṇe varṇite sati tad vailakṣaṇyāt eva pratyakṣam jñāsyate iti tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣa pada upādānam antareṇa na anumāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ upapadyate iti idam api na pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam anavadyam alam ati vistareṇa para darśana gītam atas vigata kalaṅkam asti na hi lakṣaṇam akṣa dhiyaḥ tad alam akṣa pāda muninā eva nibaddham idam harati manāṃsi lakṣaṇam udāra dhiyām 
[I,282,ii_I,282,vi]	tad pūrvakam ca trividham anumānam pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam ca evam pramāṇa jyeṣṭhe asmin pratyakṣe lakṣite sati kathyate avasara prāptam anumānasya lakṣaṇam tatra anumāna svarūpam brūmahe tatas tatra sūtram yojayiṣyāmaḥ pañca lakṣaṇa kāt liṅgāt gṛhītān niyama smṛteḥ parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam pracakṣate atra api liṅga viṣayam jñānam jñāna viṣayīkṛtam vā liṅgam pratibandha smaraṇa sahitam pramāṇam liṅgi jñānam phalam liṅgi jñānasya vā pramāṇa tāyām pūrvavat upādānādi jñānam phalam upavarṇanīyam karaṇasya hi pramāṇa tvam iti sthitam eva etat 
[I,283,i_I,283,vii]	tatra parokṣaḥ arthaḥ liṅgyate gamyate anena iti liṅgam tat ca pañca lakṣaṇam kāni punar pañca lakṣaṇāni pakṣa dharma tvam sa pakṣa dharma tvam vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ avādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pakṣaḥ tad dharma tvam tad āśrita tvam iti arthaḥ sādhya dharma yogena nirjñātam dharmi antaram sa pakṣaḥ tatra astitvam sādhya saṃsparśa śūnyaḥ dharmī vipakṣaḥ tatas vyāvṛttiḥ anumeyasya arthasya pratyakṣeṇā aagamena vā anapaharaṇam avādhita viṣaya tvam saṃśaya bīja bhūtena arthena pratyanumāna tayā prayujyamānena anupahata tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam etaiḥ pañcabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ upapannam liṅgam anumāpakam bhavati 
[I,283,viii_I,284,iii]	eteṣām eva lakṣaṇānām ekaika apāyāt pañca hetvābhāsāḥ vakṣyante yasya pakṣa dharma tā na asti asau asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt sādhya viparyaya vyāptaḥ tu viruddhaḥ sa yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa vat vipakṣe asattvam yasya na asti saḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti 
[I,284,iv_I,284,v]	yasya ābādhita viṣaya tvam na asti sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ yathā anuṣṇaḥ tejaḥ avayavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti yasya niṣpratipakṣatā na asti sa prakaraṇa samaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat iti saḥ ayam eteṣu pañcasu lakṣaṇeṣu avinābhāvaḥ liṅgasya parisamāpyate 
[I,284,vi]	nanu tri lakṣaṇake hetau a vinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate na ca tathāvidhe bādhā saṃbhavati bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt 
[I,285,i]	yat ca idam agni anuṣṇa tva sādhane kṛtaka tvam tri lakṣaṇam api bādhaka vidhurita viṣayam iti udāhṛtam tat asamīkṣita abhidhānam atra trailakṣaṇya anupapatteḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ eva tāvat ayam na bhavati pratyakṣa ādi anirākṛtaḥ hi pakṣaḥ ucyate na ca ayam īdṛśaḥ iti apakṣaḥ eva tad dharmaḥ hetuḥ katham pakṣa dharmaḥ syāt 
[I,285,ii_I,286,i]	na api ayam anvayī hetuḥ anvaya grahaṇa samayaḥ eva tad viplava avadhāraṇāt anvayaḥ hi gṛhyamāṇaḥ sarva ākṣepeṇa yat yat kṛtakam tat tad anuṣṇam iti evam gṛhyate tatas ca tad grahaṇa samayaḥ eva ayam uṣṇaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti hṛdaya patham avatarati tanūnapāt iti katham anvaya grahaṇam yadi tu analam utsṛjya ghaṭa ādau anvaya grahaḥ na antar vyāptiḥ gṛhītā syāt sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ tatas ca īvaṃvidhāt hetoḥ sva sādhya niyama ujjhitāt sādhya abhilāṣaḥ iti evam ṣaṇḍa anunaya doha daḥ 
[I,286,ii_I,286,iii]	anvaya pūrvaka tvāt ca vyatireka grahaṇasya tad nirākaraṇe tad apākaraṇam avagantavyam api ca siṣādhayita dharma vaiparītyena vahneḥ pratyakṣataḥ niścayāt vastu vṛtta na saḥ eva vipakṣaḥ iti na tatas vyatirekaḥ kṛtaka tvasya iti tasmāt trelakṣaṇya apāyāt eva hetvābhāsaḥ ayam iti na rūpa antaram abādhita viṣaya tvam apekṣate 
[I,286,iv]	katham ca idam abādhita tvam niścīyate na hi adarśana mātreṇa bādhā viraha niḥ cayaḥ sarva ātmanā hi nāstitvam vidyuḥ katham ayoginaḥ aniścite tad aṅge ca na hetoḥ hetu tā bhavet yathā eva pakṣa dharma ādi rūpāṇām anupagrahe tasmāt abādhita tvam rūpa antaram avacanīyam iti 
[I,287,i]	atra abhidhīyate yat uktam anvaya grahaṇam sarva ākṣepeṇa iti tad grahaṇa velāyām eva siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viparyaya adhyāsita hutavaha svarūpa parisphuraṇāt anvaya śūnyaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti tad ahṛdayaṅgamam anvayaḥ satyam sarva ākṣepeṇa gṛhyate na punar eka eka dharmi samullekhena evam hi tad ānantyāt anvayaḥ gṛhītum eva na śakyeta anumānasya ca vaiphalyam ittham bhavet agnimatām dhūmavatām sarva dharmāṇām anvaya avagama kāle eva gṛhīta tvāt 
[I,287,ii_I,288,i]	dhūmaḥ hi yatra yatra iti sāmānyena eva gṛhyate na punar parvate araṇye gṛhe vā iti evam iṣyate evañca satya ākṣepa vācaḥ yuktiḥ upapannā bhaviṣyati na ca evam sati vaktavyam ṣaṇḍa anunaya mārgaṇam na hi tat varjam iti evam vyāpti grahaṇam iṣyate sāmānyena ca vyāptiḥ gṛhītā satī siṣā dhayiṣita dharmī apekṣayā sā eva antar vyāptiḥ ucyate yā eva ca naga lagna agni anumāna samaye tad vyatirikta kāntāra ādi pradeśa vartinī bahis vyāptiḥ abhūt sā eva kāla antare kāntāra vartini vahnau anumīyamāne antar vyāptiḥ avatiṣṭhate tat iha api yat kṛtakam tat anuṣṇam iti sāmānyatas paricchedāt na tadānīm anala unmeṣaḥ iti siddhaḥ anvayaḥ 
[I,288,ii_I,289,i]	vyatirekaḥ api kārye tejaḥ avayavini pakṣīkṛte kṛtaka tvasya tejaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ vidhu tāraka paramāṇu anabhyupagame tu vipakṣaḥ eva na asti iti tad abhāvāt sutarām tatra āvṛttiḥ bhavati iti na hi sa pakṣaḥ iva vipakṣe vṛttiḥ iṣyate yena yatnatas tad siddhaye yateta agniḥ eva vipakṣaḥ iti ced mā evam na hi pakṣaḥ eva vipakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati 
[I,289,ii]	nanu vastūnāmat virūpa tvāt pakṣaḥ nāma paramārthataḥ na asti eva sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa bhūtaḥ ced saḥ arthaḥ tat sapakṣaḥ eva viparyaye tu na vipakṣatām ativartate na ca krama dvaya yogi tvam rūpa dvaya rahita tvam vā vastunaḥ samasti iti 
[I,290,i]	tat ayuktam anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt advirūpa tve api vastūnām nisarga viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ kaścid pakṣe eṣitavyaḥ tad abhāve tad apekṣa svarūpayoḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ api abhāvaḥ syāt tat asya pakṣasya sataḥ vipakṣa tvam āropya yat tena vyabhicāra codanam tena agni anumānam api viplaveta 
[I,290,ii]	nanu parvata ādiḥ dharmī na jvalana ākhya sādhya dharma śūnya tayā tatra niścitaḥ tejaḥ avayavī tu anuṣṇa tva vaiparītyena pratyakṣataḥ niścitaḥ iti tat kim idānīm parvata ādiḥ agni mat tayā niścitaḥ tathā abhyupagame vā kim anumānena 
[I,291,i]	nanu na parvataḥ agni mattayā niścitaḥ na api tat vaiparītyena kintu sandigdhaḥ eva āste yadi evam sandigdhe api vipakṣe vartamānaḥ dhūmādiḥ ahetuḥ eva syāt niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat sandigdha vipakṣa vṛtteḥ api ahetu tvāt sarvam anumānam utsīdet tasmāt pakṣeṇa vyabhicāra codanam anucitam iti vyatirekavān eva ayam hetuḥ 
[I,291,ii_I,292,i]	yat punar abhihitam anirākṛta pakṣa vṛtti tvam asya na asti iti tat satyam vayam api amum pakṣam adhyakṣa vādhitam icchāmaḥ eva sa tu na pakṣa mātra paryavasitaḥ bādhaḥ kintu hetum api spṛśati na hetu nirapekṣa ātmā pakṣaḥ nāma asti kaścana prasādhayitum iṣṭaḥ hi hetunā pakṣaḥ ucyate sa na sādhayitum śakyaḥ pratyakṣe pratiyogini sādhya apahāra dvāreṇa hetuḥ bhavati bādhitaḥ abādhita anumeya tvam atas eva asya lakṣaṇam na tu hetuḥ asiddhaḥ ayam jvalane vṛtti saṃbhavāt 
[I,292,ii_I,293,i]	yat tva bādhita tā jñātum śakyā na iti vikalpitam pakṣasya api mahābhāga katham tām pratipatsyase prayatne kriyamāṇe api yadi bādhā na dṛśyate na asti eva iti avagantavyam vyavahāraḥ hi na anyathā atas tri lakṣaṇe api hetau bādha saṃbhavāt abādhita tvam rūpa antaram vaktavyam evañca yat ucyate bādhāvinā bhāvayoḥ virodhāt iti tad kathañcid yuktam kathañcid ayuktam pañca lakṣaṇake liṅge yaḥ parisamāptaḥ avinābhāvaḥ tatra na asti eva bādhaḥ iti evam yuktam etat tri lakṣaṇa kaliṅga abhiprāyeṇa tu ayuktam iti 
[I,293,ii]	evam āgama bādhitaḥ api hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ yathā brāhmaṇena surā peyā aduṣṭa tvāt kṣīra vat iti 
[I,293,iii_I,293,iv]	nanu pratyakṣa āgama viruddha vat anu māna viruddham anumānam kasmāt na udāhriyate asambhavāt iti brūmaḥ na hi anumāna viruddham anumānam avakalpate anumānayoḥ hi tulya balayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ atulya balayoḥ vā tatra tulya balayoḥ tulya bala tvāt eva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ samāne hi vīrye kim kasya bādhakam bādhyam vā atulya bala tva pakṣe api yat kṛtam alpa bala tvam anyatarasya tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anumāna bādhayā tasmāt na anumāna viruddham anumānam buddhyāmahe atas eva anumāna viruddham anumānam apaśyatā bhāṣya kāreṇa uktam yat punar anumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsassaḥ iti 
[I,294,i]	yatra tu tulya bale dve anumāne nipatataḥ sa sat pratipakṣasya viṣayaḥ iti asat pratipakṣa tvam pañcamam liṅga lakṣaṇam upadiśyate 
[I,294,ii]	nanu vastūnām advi rūpa tvāt katham ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dharma dvaya ākṣepi prayojaka hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ bhavet atas eva viruddhā avyabhicārī nāma na hetvābhāse iha iṣyate tad ati durlabhaḥ sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iti kam apahartum pañcamam idam hetu lakṣaṇam upadiśyate iti satyam evam kintu saṃśaya bījam yat viśeṣa agrahaṇam tad anyatara nirṇayāya bhrāntyā prayujyamānam sat pratipadyate sthāṇuḥ ayam puruṣa dharma anupalabdheḥ puruṣaḥ ayam sthāṇu dharma anupalabdheḥ iti anyatara viṣaya anupalaṃbhaḥ eva ayam saṃśaya ādhāyī pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka upapatti bhrameṇa hetuḥ iti prayujyamānaḥ sat pratipakṣaḥ bhavati iti prakaraṇa sama hetvābhāsa cintāyām vistareṇa nirūpayiṣyate puruṣa prajñā pramāda mūla tvāt ca vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam iti tatra eva vakṣyate lakṣaṇa antaram atas kathanīyam pratyaneka vikala tvam avaśyam tena liṅgam anumāna patha jñāḥ pañca lakṣaṇakam abhyupajagmuḥ 
[I,295,i]	pañca lakṣakāt liṅgāt iti vyākhyātam vyāpti grahaṇa samaya samadhigata svarūpasya api liṅgasya punar dharmiṇi kvacid anavadhṛta vapuṣaḥ na asya adhyavasāya sādhana tvam iti dvitīyam liṅga darśanam eva apekṣaṇīyam iti gṛhītāt iti uktam liṅgam hi jñāpakam na cakṣuḥ ādi vat kārakam jñāpakasya ca ayam svabhāvaḥ yat jñātam anu jñāpayati iti vyāpti grahaṇa kāla gṛhītam eva vyāpti vat smaryamāṇa tathā eva liṅgam liṅginam gamayiṣyati iti ced na grahaṇam antareṇa vyāpti smṛteḥ api abhāvāt iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,296,i]	niyamasmṛteḥ iti vivriyatām kaḥ ayam niyamaḥ nāma vyāptiḥ avinābhāvaḥ nitya sāhacaryam iti arthaḥ 
[I,296,ii]	āha na etāvatī eva virantum ucitam tasya tad avinābhāvi tvam iti atra hi nimittam anveṣaṇīyam tārkikaiḥ 
[I,296,iii_I,297,i]	tat ca tādātmya tad utpatti rūpam īkṣitavantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ yaḥ hi yadātmā bhāvaḥ sa katham tam utsṛjati vṛkṣa ātmikā eva hi śiṃśapā tena vṛkṣa tvam anumāpayati saḥ ayam svabhāva hetuḥ ucyate vṛkṣaḥ ayam śiṃśapā tvāt iti tatra tādātmyam pratibandhaḥ kāryam nāma kāraṇa adhīna ātma lābham eva bhavati na kāraṇa anapekṣam iti tat upalabhyamānam tat anumāpayati agniḥ atra dhūmāt iti kārya hetau tad utpattiḥ pratibandhaḥ evam hi dvividham pratibandham anumeya avyabhicāra nibandhanam anuktvā kevala sāhacarya niyama mātra varṇanam yat pāda prasārikā sā eva iti 
[I,297,ii_I,297,iii]	ucyate pāda prasārikā eva sādhīyasī sthūla dṛṣṭibhiḥ avalambitāḥ varam na sūkṣma dṛṣṭibhiḥ utprekṣitāḥ tādātmya ādi pratibandhāḥ tādātmye tāvat gamaka aṅge hetu sādhyayoḥ avyatireke gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ eva durupapādaḥ na khalu a gṛhītam liṅgam liṅgi pratītim ādhātum arhati tatra liṅga buddhau liṅgī pratibhāsate na vā apratibhāse tad vuddhyā tad agrahaṇāt katham tasya tad ātmaka tvam pratibhāse tu liṅga vat pratyakṣaḥ eva saḥ arthaḥ iti kim anumānena 
[I,297,iv]	viparīta samāropa vyavaccheda artham anumānam iti ced tad svarūpa grahaṇe viparīta āropaṇa avasara abhāvāt na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśane sati sthāṇu samāropaḥ pravartate tatra tad bhedāt upapadyeta api na hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādayaḥ eva puruṣaḥ iti tad grahaṇe api apuruṣa āropaḥ kāmam bhavet iha vṛkṣa tva śiṃśapā tvayoḥ abhedāt śiṃśapātu agrahaṇe sati kā kathā vṛkṣa itara samāropasya 
[I,298,i_I,298,ii]	api ca vṛkṣa tva grahaṇe sati sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa an adhyavasāyāt kadācid aśiṃśapa āropaḥ syāt na tu śiṃśapātu agrahaṇe sati avṛkṣatva samāropaḥ yuktaḥ pramātuḥ śiṃśapā tvam hi yasya pratyakṣa gocaraḥ parokṣam tasya vṛkṣa tvam iti na atīva laukikam kiñca sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt yathā śiṃśapā tve ca vṛkṣa tvam anumīyate tathā vṛkṣa tvena api śiṃśapā tu am anumīyeta tādātmya aviśeṣāt tathā ca prayatna anantarīyaka tvena anitya tvam sādhyate tadvat anitya tvena api tat sādhyeta tatas ca sa pakṣa vyāpti avyāptibhyām kṛtaka tva prayatna ānantarīyaka tvayoḥ yaḥ bhedaḥ uktaḥ sa hīyeta 
[I,299,i]	nanu ca anyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ anyaḥ ca pratibandhaḥ dviṣṭhaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pratibandhaḥ tu parāyat tatva lakṣaṇaḥ tatra śiṃśapā tvam vṛkṣa tve pratibaddham na vṛkṣa tvam śiṃśapā tve prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam api anitya tve niyatam na tu anitya tvam tatra iti tathā dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme satyam evam kintu ā ivam ucyamāne niyamaḥ eva aṅgīkṛtaḥ bhavet na tādātmyam tādātmye hi yathā śiṃśapā śiṃśapām vinā na dṛśyate tathā vṛkṣa tvam api śiṃśapā rahitam na dṛśyeta dṛśyate ca khadira ādau śiṃśapā rahitam vṛkṣa tvam vidyut ādau ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tva rahitam anitya tvam upalabhyate iti katham abhedaḥ 
[I,300,i_I,300,ii]	vinā sādhana dharmeṇa sādhya dharmaḥ ayam asti hi dṛṣṭaḥ tad vyatirekeṇa tad ātmā ca iti kaitavam atha vidyut ādya nitya tvāt anyat eva ghaṭa ādi anitya tvam yat prayatna ānantarīyaka tva abhinnam ucyate tarhi dharmi bhedena dharmāṇām bhede anvaya grahaṇa anupapatteḥ sarvam anumānam utsīdet dhūma agnyoḥ tu kārya kāraṇayoḥ bhedāt yuktam vaktum dhūmasya agnau pratibandhaḥ na tu agneḥ dhūme iha tu sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekāt na tathā śakyate vaktum tathā abhidhāne vā na avyatirekaḥ sarvathā tādātmyam vā tyajyatām vṛkṣa tva anitya tvābhyām śiṃśapātu aprayatna anantarīyaka tve vai anumīyatām na antarā avasthātum śakyate 
[I,300,iii]	yaḥ ca ayam anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti svabhāva hetuḥ udāhṛtaḥ sa katham svabhāva hetuḥ idam hi cintyatām anitya tvam nāma kim ucyate kim ca kṛtaka tvam iti tatra anitya tvam vināśa yogaḥ utpatti yogaḥ ca kṛtaka tvam utpannasya ca bhāvasya vināśaḥ na tu utpādaḥ eva vināśaḥ iti katham sādhya sādhanayoḥ avyatirekaḥ 
[I,301,i_I,301,iii]	atra codayanti vināśa yoge hi anitya tve vināśī śabdaḥ iti buddhiḥ syāt na anityaḥ iti eṣyā ca sā mithyā buddhiḥ śikhariṇaḥ iva kṛśa anu viśeṣitasya vināśavataḥ śabdasya gṛhītum aśakyatvāt abhāvena hi dharmeṇa tadvat tā dharmiṇaḥ katham abhāva graha velāyām dharmiṇaḥ anupalambhanāt anitya tvam iti ca bhāva pratyayaḥ katham abhāve bhavet viruddha tvāt tasmāt ubhayānta paricchinnā vastu sattā anitya tvam ucyatām kṛtaka tvam api sattā eva kāraṇa utpāditā dhārā satī kathyate iti evañca sattā eva sādhyam sādhanam ca iti siddham svabhāva hetu tvam 
[I,301,iv_I,302,iii]	tat idam anupapannam sādhya sādhanayoḥ tathā tvena anavabhāsanāt evam hi ucyamāne śabdaḥ sattāvān sattāvat tvāt iti pratītiḥ syāt na ca evam dṛśyate api tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti atha ubhaya anta paricchinnā sattā sādhyā kāraṇa nirvartyā aaśraya samavāyinī ca sādhanam ucyate tat etat aghaṭamānam vināśa rūpasya antasya tadānīmavidyamāna tvena sattā paricchedaka tva abhāvāt buddhi sthena atha tena asyāḥ paricchedaḥ abhyupeyate śabdasya eva paricchedaḥ vināśena astu tādṛśā dharmaḥ samāna kālaḥ api buddhyā eva viṣayīkṛtaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tām yāti tathā bhāvi api yāsyati tat evam vināśī śabdaḥ iti viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva siddheḥ kim sattā sādhya kalpanayā 
[I,302,iv_I,303,i]	yat punar abhihitam abhāve bhāva pratyayaḥ tu atalādiḥ na syāt iti tad atyanta anabhijñasya codyam śabda pravṛtti nimittasya tatra bhāva pratyayena abhidhānāt tasya guṇasya hi bhāvāt dravye tad śabda niveśaḥ iti abhāve api abhāva tvam iti darśanāt tasmāt buddhi stha vināśa yogaḥ eva anitya tvam kṛtaka tvam api utpatti yogaḥ eva na sattā kāraṇa utpādita āśraya avacchede tu tasyāḥ iṣyamāṇe dharmiṇaḥ eva tad avacchedaḥ bhavatu iti kim sopāna antareṇa 
[I,303,ii_I,304,i]	nanu utpāda vināśa ākhyam na dharma dvayam anvayi yat haṭe na asti tat śabde yat ca śabde na tad haṭe atha ekaḥ eva dharmaḥ sarva bhāva saṃbandhī iṣyeta tarhi eka bhāva samutpāde sarva utpādaḥ prasajyate eka pralaya kāle ca sakala pralayaḥ bhavet tasmāt sattā pakṣaḥ eva varam 
[I,304,ii_I,304,iv]	na etat evam dharmi bhede api dharmāṇām tulya rūpāṇām avabhāsāt na ghaṭa ādi svarūpam hi nāśaḥ iti avakalpate yena ananvaya doṣaḥ syāt tad bheda upanibandhanaḥ eka tvam api dharmasya na asti sarveṣu dharmiṣu yena eka dhvaṃsa samaye sakala dhvaṃsa saṅkaraḥ bhinna tve api ca dharmāṇām samāna rūpa tvena avabhāsamāna tvāt anvaya grahaṇa ādi kārya avirodhaḥ atas eva sāmānyam antareṇa api samāna dharma mūla anvaya ādi vyavahāra upapatteḥ tatra na sūtrakāreṇa sāmānya grahaṇam kṛtam api tu sādharmya grahaṇam upāttam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti tena vināśa utpāda dharmayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvāt tayoḥ ca bhedāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti na svabhāva hetuḥ iti siddham 
[I,305,i_I,306,i]	kārya hetuḥ api na saṃbhavati bhavatām hi pakṣe kṣaṇayoḥ vā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bhavet santānayoḥ vā kṣaṇayoḥ na iti vakṣyāmaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga nirākṛtau saṃbhavan api durlakṣaḥ sūkṣma tvāt ca tayoḥ asau dhūma agni santānayoḥ tu avāstava tvāt eva na asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ artha kriyā kāritvam eva vastu tvam yadi dhūmaḥ kārya tvāt analam anumāpayet kaṭu malina gagana gāmi tva ādi dharmaiḥ api tasya gamakaḥ bhavet na ca kathañcid tad kārya tvam kathañcid atad kārya tvam ca dhūmasya upapannam sarva ātmakasya tad anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāci prabhava tvāt atha sarva ātmanā api tad kārya tve dhūma tva mātram eva agni sahacārī iti manyase sahacāri tvam eva astu tad utpatti kathā vṛthā 
[I,306,ii]	nanu bhavadbhiḥ api kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva yathā śeṣavat iti vyākhyāsyate yathā aaha kaṇa vrataḥ kāryam kāraṇam saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ca iti laiṅgikam iti na sāhacarya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt dhūma agnyoḥ nadī pūrayoḥ vā na kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt gamaka tvam yathā ukta nyāyena api tu nitya sāhacaryāt niyamāt eva iti 
[I,307,i_I,307,ii]	virodhinoḥ katham sāhacaryam iti ced sat asatoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvāt virodhinoḥ ekatara darśanāt anyatarasya abhāvaḥ anumīyate bhāva abhāvayoḥ ca sāhacaryam tayoḥ asti eva kaṇāda sūtre kārya ādi grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam anyeṣām api hetūnām bhūmnām jagati darśanāt sūrya astamayam ālokya kalpyate tāraka udayaḥ pūrṇa candra udayāt vṛddhiḥ ambudheḥ avagamyate uditena anumīyante saritaḥ kumbhayoninā śuṣyat pulina paryanta viśrānta khaga paṅktayaḥ pipīlika aṇḍa sañcāra ceṣṭā anumita vṛṣṭayaḥ bhavanti pathikāḥ parṇa kuṭīra karaṇa udyatāḥ anye api saugata udgīta pratibandha dvaya ujjhitāḥ kiyantaḥ bata gaṇyante hetavaḥ sādhya bodhakāḥ loka prasiddhāḥ tādātmya tad utpatti avadhīraṇāt ḍimbha hevāka sadṛśam sva matyā tad samarthanam atas ca tad svabhāvaḥ tad kāryam ityādi vyasana mātrakam 
[I,308,i_I,308,ii]	api ca vyāvṛttyoḥ liṅga liṅgi tvam pratibandhaḥ ca vastunoḥ vikalpaiḥ grahaṇam tasya katham saṅgacchatām idam uktam ca etat prathamaḥ eva āhnike iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt anumiti hetuḥ sambandhaḥ sāhacaryam iti siddham na tu śauddhodani śiṣya parikalpitam ubhayam api etat 
[I,308,iii]	yat tu abhyadhīyata paraiḥ kim adhīnam asya tad sāhacaryam iti tatra vidhiḥ pramāṇam tādātmya tad jananayoḥ api ca eṣa teṣām tulyaḥ anuyogaḥ iti kim viphalaiḥ pralāpaiḥ
