[I,308,iv_I,309,ii]	niyamaḥ vyākhyātaḥ smṛteḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ ucyate niyamaḥ hi gṛhītaḥ aṅgam anumeya pramām prati na nārikela dvīpa sthaḥ dhūmāt agnim prapadyate sādhya anumiti velāyām na ca asti niyama grahaḥ niyama graha kāle ca na sādhyam anumīyate tena pūrva gṛhītassan idānīm smṛti gocaraḥ niyamaḥ pratipatti aṅgam tathā avagati darśanāt dvitīya liṅga darśane sati api niyama smaraṇam antareṇa sādhya pramiteram utpādāt yatra api viṣaye abhyaste na eva sañcetyate smṛtiḥ tatra api anena nyāyena balāt sā parikalpyate 
[I,309,iii]	atas eva kecana pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyām smṛtim eva anumānam uktavantaḥ 
[I,309,iv]	pratyutpannam ca kāraṇam kutracid dharmiṇi dharma antara sahacarita liṅga darśanam iti parokṣe liṅginī iti uktam 
[I,309,v]	tatra liṅgī tāvat ucyate dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ saḥ eva liṅgī iti na dharmi mātram sādhyam parvata ādi dharmiṇaḥ siddha tvāt na dharma mātram agneḥ api yatra tatra siddha tvāt na ca dvayossādhya tvam svatantrayoḥ tayoḥ api siddha tvāt eva tasmāt ekasya dvayoḥ vā svātantryeṇa anumeya tā na avakalpate iti avaśyam anyatara viśiṣṭaḥ anyataraḥ sādhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ 
[I,310,i]	tatra api tu dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ na dharmi viśiṣṭaḥ dharmaḥ tathā hi deśa viśiṣṭe vahnau sādhye ṣoḍaśa vikalpāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ sarve eva agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśeṣa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta mahānasa ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ saṃprati upalabhyamāna parvata ādi deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ syāt 
[I,310,ii_I,310,iv]	anirdhārita viśeṣaḥ vā kaścid agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭaḥ pūrva anubhūta deśa viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ syāt pūrva anubhūtaḥ vā agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anirdhārita deśa viśiṣṭaḥ prāk dṛṣṭa deśa viśiṣṭaḥ upalabhyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ anumeyaḥ syāt evam siṣā dhayiṣitaḥ vā agniḥ sarva deśa viśiṣṭaḥ prāk anubhūta deśa viśiṣṭaḥ idānī nubhūyamāna deśa viśiṣṭaḥ vā anumeyaḥ iti 
[I,310,v_I,311,i]	tatra ete pañcadaśa pakṣāḥ pratyakṣa virodha siddha sādhana tva ādi doṣa upahatāḥ iti anādaraṇīyāḥ eva yaḥ ca ṣoḍaśaḥ pakṣaḥ etad deśa viśiṣṭaḥ eṣaḥ agniḥ iti tatra api deśa viśeṣa avacchedam antareṇa eva vahniḥ iti gṛhītum eva na śakyataḥ eva iti prathamam deśaḥ eva gamyate tasya ca pūrva pratipanna tvāt idānīm anavagata dahana viśiṣṭasya anumātum yogya tvāt saḥ eva sādhyaḥ yuktaḥ 
[I,311,ii]	api ca agneḥ sādhyatāyām anupalabdha tad dharmaḥ katham anumāpakaḥ syāt anupalabdhe tu jvalane na tad dharma tayā dhūmaḥ gṛhītum pāryate upalabdhe tu hutabhuji bhavat api niṣphalam eva dhūmasya tad dharmatā grahaṇam anumeyasya tadānīm abhāvāt tasmāt agni viśiṣṭaḥ paridṛśyamānaḥ deśaḥ eva sādhyaḥ sa ca svarūpataḥ pratyakṣaḥ api parokṣa dharma viśiṣṭa tayā anumeyaḥ iti dhūma dharma yogāt agni dharmavān saḥ eva anumīyate saḥ anumānasya viṣayaḥ liṅgī iti ucyate parokṣa grahaṇam ca etat abhiprāyam eva 
[I,311,iii]	kvacid tu vyāpti smaraṇa samanantaram eva pratyāsīdataḥ pramātuḥ jhaṭiti samunmiṣan akasmāt eva pratyakṣībhavati vibhāvasuḥ iti na tad viśiṣṭa tayā api dharmiṇaḥ parokṣa tvam avakalpate iti tad vyāvṛttaye parokṣa grahaṇam nitya parokṣasya api ca īśvara adṛṣṭa indriya ādeḥ anumeya tām vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt yathocitāt liṅgāt yathā ukta niyama smṛteḥ yathā ukta liṅgi vijñānam anumānam iti sthitam 
[I,312,i_I,312,ii]	nanu sati anumānasya prāmāṇye lakṣaṇa āśrayaḥ kāryaḥ vicāraḥ na punar prāmāṇyam tasya yujyate tathā ca āhuḥ prāmāṇyasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi rūpam hi liṅgasya balāt gauṇyāḥ vṛttyā darśayitavyam dharme hi sādhye na hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam agni dharma tvāt dhūmasya dharmiṇi sādhye hetoḥ ananvayi tvam na hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvataḥ iti anvayaḥ dvaye tu sādhye dvayam api na asti na hi dahana mahīdhrayoḥ dhūmaḥ dharmaḥ 
[I,313,i_I,313,iii]	na api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra parvata agnī iti dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhye tat ubhayam aghaṭa mānam eva na api agni viśiṣṭa dharādhara dharma tayā dhūmaḥ prathamam upalabdhum śakyate na ca api evam anvayaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agnimān parvataḥ iti tasmāt avaśyam pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyavahāra siddhaye dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi rūḍhaḥ pakṣa śabdaḥ tad eka deśe dharmiṇi gauṇyāḥ vṛttyā varṇanīyaḥ anvaya pradarśana samaye ca tad eka deśe tathā eva yojane ati gauṇa lakṣaṇa tvāt indriya artha sannikarṣa ja tvā ādi vat agauṇa lakṣaṇa tva abhāvāt anumānam apramāṇam 
[I,313,iv]	api ca viśeṣe anugama abhāvāt sāmānye siddha sādhanāt tadvataḥ anupapanna tvāt anumāna kathā kutas 
[I,313,v]	sāhacarye ca sambandhe visrambhaḥ iti mugdha tā śata kṛtvas api tad dṛṣṭau vyabhicārasya saṃbhavāt deśa kāla daśā bheda vicitra ātmasu vastuṣu avinā abhau a niyamaḥ na śakyaḥ vaktum āha ca avasthā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt bhinnāsu śaktiṣu bhāvānām anumānena prasiddhiḥ ati durlabhā 
[I,314,i]	bhavan api a vinābhāvaḥ paricchettum na śakyate jagattraya gata aśeṣa padārtha ālocanāt vinā na pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ yāvat dhūma agni vyaktayaḥ akhilāḥ tāvat syāt api dhūmaḥ asau yaḥ anagneḥ iti śaṅkyate 
[I,314,ii]	ye tu pratyakṣatas viśvam paśyanti hi bhavādṛśāḥ kim divya cakṣuṣām eṣām anumāna prayojanam 
[I,314,iii]	sāmānya dvārakaḥ api asti nāvinā abhāva niścayaḥ vāstavam hi na sāmānyam nāma kiñcana vidyate 
[I,315,i]	bhūyas darśana gamyā api na vyāptiḥ avakalpate sahasraśas api tad dṛṣṭau vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt bahu kṛtvas api vastu ātmā tathā iti pariniścitaḥ deśa kāla ādi bhedena dṛśyate punar anyathā bhūyas dṛṣṭyā ca dhūmaḥ agni sahacārī iti gamyatām anagnau tu sa na asti iti na bhūyas darśanāt gatiḥ 
[I,315,ii]	na ca api dṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ tatra eva niyata tvam hi tad anya abhāva pūrvakam niyamaḥ ca anumāna aṅgam gṛhītaḥ pratipadyate grahaṇam ca asya na anyatra na astitā niścayam vinā darśana adarśanābhyām hi niyama grahaṇam yadi tat api asat anagnau hi dhūmasya iṣṭam adarśanam anagniḥ ca kiyān sarvam jagat jvalana varjitam tatra dhūmasya nāstitvam na eva paśyanti ayoginaḥ tat evam niyama abhāvāt sati vā jñapti asaṃbhavāt anumāna pramāṇa tva durāśā parimucyatām 
[I,316,i_I,316,ii]	anumāna virodhaḥ api yadi ca iṣṭa vighāta kṛt viruddha avi abhicāraḥ vā sarvatra sulabha udayaḥ atas eva anumānānām apaśyantaḥ pramāṇa tām tad visraṃbha niṣedha artham idam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ hasta sparśa ādinā andhena viṣame pathi dhāvatā anumāna pradhānena vinipātaḥ na durlabhaḥ api ca yatnena anumitaḥ api arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyuktataraiḥ anyaiḥ anyathā eva upapādyate 
[I,316,iii_I,317,iii]	atra abhidhīyate kim ayam anumāna svarūpākṣepaḥ eva kriyate uta tad tad tārkikā upalakṣita tad lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ iti tatra anumāna svarūpam ca aśakya nihnavam eva sarva loka prasiddha tvāt abalā bāla gopālahālika pramukhāḥ api buddhi ante niyatāt arthāt artha antaram asaṃśayam anumāna apalāpe tu pratyakṣāt api durlabhā lokayātrā iti lokāḥ syuḥ likhitāḥ iva niścalāḥ pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam api padārtha jātam tad jātīya tva liṅga vyāpāreṇa sukha sādhanam itara kāraṇam iti vā niścitya tat upādadate jahati vā laukikāḥ 
[I,317,iv^1]	atha avicārita ramaṇīya tā eva tattvam na tu lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ śakya kriyaḥ tasya iti lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ ayam ucyate saḥ api ayuktaḥ yatas yam kañcid artham ālokya yaḥ kaścid na avagamyate kañcid eva akṣipati artham arthaḥ kaścid iti sthitiḥ tatra vastu svabhāvaḥ ayam iti pāda prasārikā dṛśyate hi avinābhūtāt arthāt artha antare matiḥ atas yad darśanāt yatra pratītiḥ upajāyate tayoḥ asti arthayoḥ kaścid sambandhaḥ iti manmahe tad ātma tā tad utpattī na śraddadhati tad vidaḥ sāhacaryam tu sambandhaḥ iti naḥ hṛdayaṅgamam tasmin sati eva bhavanam na vinā bhavanam tatas ayam eva avinābhāvaḥ niyamaḥ sahacāritā kiṃkṛtaḥ niyamaḥ asya asmin iti ced evam uttaram tad ātma tā ādi pakṣe api na eṣa praśnaḥ nivartate jvalanāt jāyate dhūmaḥ na jalāt iti kā gatiḥ 
[I,317,iv^2_I,318,ii]	evam eva etat iti ced sāhacarye api tad samam tarkasya yāvān viṣayaḥ sa tāvati nirūpyate vastu svabhāva bhede tu na tasya prabhaviṣṇu tā ayam ca viṣayaḥ yukteḥ yat uktam niyamāt vinā na arthāt artha antare jñānam atas tasya prakalpanam tatas param tu niyamaḥ api eṣa kiṃkṛtaḥ iti na yuktiḥ prabhavati tādātmya tad utpattyoḥ anupapanna tvāt atas niyamaḥ eva viramyate na ca pratibhā mātram ānumānikī pramitiḥ iti vaktum yuktam niyatāt kutaścid eva vastuni pratīti darśanāt iti ukta tvāt niyamaḥ ca yadi agṛhītaḥ eva prati iti aṅgam bhavet nārikela dvīpa vāsibhiḥ api dhūma darśanāt kṛśānuḥ anumīyeta na ca evam asti iti niyama grahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam 
[I,319,i_I,319,ii]	yat ca vikalpitam aśakyam tat grahaṇam iti tatra kecid ācakṣate mānasam pratyakṣam pratibandha grāhi iti pratyakṣa anupalaṃbhābhyām anala sahacaritam anagneḥ ca vyāvartamānam dhūmam upalabhya vibhāvasau niyataḥ dhūmaḥ iti manasā pratipadyate manaḥ ca sarva viṣayam kena vā na abhyupeyate asat nihitam api artham avadhārayitum kṣamam 
[I,319,iii_I,319,iv]	na ca sakala tribhuvana vivara niruddha dhūma agni vyakti sārtha sākṣāt karaṇam upayujyate jvalana tva ādi sāmānya purassara tayā vyāpti grahaṇāt yat tu uktam sāmānyam vāstavam na asti iti tat śabda artha cintā prasaṅge pratisamādhāsyate 
[I,320,i]	apare punar yogi pratyakṣa kalpam yauktikam sambandha grāhi pratyakṣam pratipedire kila dhūma tva agni tva sāmānya puraskāreṇa vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ anvayaḥ nāma gṛhyatām vyatirekaḥ tu anagnibhyaḥ dhūmasya grahītavyaḥ anagnayaḥ ca ativitatāḥ na ca teṣu anagni tvam nāma sāmānyam asti tena samasta trailokya antargata agni anagni gata anvaya vyatireka grāhi pratyakṣa vyatirekeṇa na pratibandhaḥ avadhṛtaḥ bhavet anavadhṛtaḥ ca na pramā aṅgam asti ca pramā iti yukti balāt pratibandha grāhakam ekasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣam idam aśeṣa vyakti viṣayam asaṃvedyamānam api kalpitam iti yauktikam ucyate 
[I,320,ii_I,321,ii]	anye punar atas eva tad kalpanā bhayāt bhūyas darśana paricchinna sāmānya purassara anvayam anapekṣita vyatireka niścayam eva liṅgam gamakam abhyupāgaman yathā uktam mama tu adṛṣṭi mātreṇa gamakāḥ sahacāriṇaḥ iti ayam āśayaḥ bhūyas darśanataḥ tāvat udeti matiḥ īdṛśī niyataḥ ayam anena iti sakala prāṇi sākṣikā tāvatā ca gamaka tvam autsargikam siddhyati mīmāṃsakānām tu vipakṣe darśanam bādhakaḥ pratyayaḥ na ca saḥ asti na adya yāvat anagnau dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ anutpanne api bādhake tad āśaṅkanam ayuktam iti uktam taiḥ doṣa jñāne tu anutpanne na śaṅkyāḥ niṣpramāṇa tā iti 
[I,321,iii]	etat tu na cāru vyatireka niścayam antareṇa pratibandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt jñāpaka tvāt hi niyamaḥ sva grahaṇam apekṣate niyamaḥ ca ayam ucyate yat tasmin sati bhavanam tatas vinā na bhavanam iti bhūyas darśanataḥ ca tasmin sati bhavanam iti anvaya mātra paricchedāt ardha gṛhītaḥ niyamaḥ syāt tatas vinā na bhavanam iti asya arthasya aparicchedāt iti 
[I,322,i_I,322,ii]	apare punar anagni tva sāmānyam antareṇa api yogi pratyakṣa kalpanām akurvante eva mānasa pratyakṣa gamyam anvaya vyatirekam āhuḥ dhūma agni sāmānye tāvat sahacarite upalabdhe tadvat tad abhāvau api sahacaritau upalabhyete eva dhūma tva sāmānyasya anagnau jalādau adarśanāt sarva gata tve api sāmānyānām vṛtti bhedaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti vakṣyate yadi api ca anagni tva ādi abhāva sāmānyam na asti tathā api pratiṣedhya agni tva sāmānya anugama siddhyā eva tad abhāva anugama grahaṇam siddhyati 
[I,322,iii]	sakala vyakti vijñānam anaṅgam vyāpti niścaye bhāva sāmānyayoḥ yadvat tathā eva tad abhāvayoḥ bhāvayoḥ sāhacaryam yat anvayam tat pracakṣate vyatirekam tu manyante sāhityam tad abhāvayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tu bhavet yatra api abhāvayoḥ tayoḥ eva anvayaḥ tatra vyatirekaḥ tu bhāvayoḥ 
[I,323,i_I,323,iv]	tat evam abhāva anvaya vat bhāva vyatirekaḥ api pratyakṣa gamyaḥ bhavati eva iyāna iva viśeṣaḥ tu bhāvayoḥ yādṛśī yayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka tā sā eva vyatyastā tad abhāvayoḥ abhāvayoḥ tu gamya gamaka bhāve bhāvayoḥ vyāpti vyatyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ evañca pratiṣedhya anugama pūrvaka sāmānya abhāva dvaya anugama pratyaya upapatteḥ anvaya vyatireka niścaye api na yogi pratyakṣam upayujyate bhāva abhāva sāhacaryam avadhārya manasā niyama jñāna siddheḥ iti alam nirvandhena tasmāt niyama vat tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ api asti iti siddham 
[I,324,i_I,324,ii]	gṛhīte niyame yāvat punar kvacid dharmiṇi dhūma ādeḥ liṅgasya grahaṇam na vṛttam tāvat na bhavati liṅginaḥ avagatiḥ iti sambandha grahaṇa kāla apekṣayā dvitīyam tad liṅga darśanam apekṣitavyam sā eva iyam pakṣa dharmatā ucyate pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka niścaye sati api pratyakṣa āgama virodhena pratipakṣa upanipātena vā na gamaka tvam iti tad aparam lakṣaṇa dvayam upadiṣṭam abādhita viṣaya tvam asat pratipakṣa tvam ca iti tat evam anubhava siddha tvāt anumāna svarūpam iva tasya lakṣaṇam api tāntrika kathitam apratyākhyeyam api ca yadi tāntrika viracitam avācakam lakṣaṇam tat svayam anavadyam āvedyatām na tu tad dveṣeṇa lakṣyam api anumānam nihnotum yuktam 
[I,324,iii_I,324,iv]	yat punar abhāṇi pramāṇasya agauṇa tvāt anumānāt artha niścayaḥ durlabhaḥ iti tat na buddhyāmahe na hi pramāṇasya kiñcid gauṇa tvam iha paśyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi padāni yadi nāma vyākhyātṛbhiḥ gauṇāni prayuktāni kim etāvatā pramāṇam gauṇībhavet śabda antareṇa hi tad lakṣaṇa abhidhāne na kaścid gauṇa tā ādi pramādaḥ 
[I,325,i_I,325,iv]	yat api avādi viśeṣe anugama abhāvāt sāmānye siddha sādhanāt iti tat api asādhu sādhyasya mattu arthasya darśita tvāt yat api avasthā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt iti abhyadhāyi tat api na bhaya āvaham samyak avadhṛtāyām vyāptau viplava abhāvāt pramātuḥ eva tatra tatra aparādhaḥ na anumānasya iti yat api vyāhāri viruddha anumāna virodhayoḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt kutracid ca viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca sulabha tvāt iti tat api āla jālam prayojaka hetau prayukte sati evaṃprāyāṇām anavakāśa tvāt sa dvitīya prayogāḥ tu na bhavanti prayojakāḥ utprekṣā mātra mūla tvāt hetu ābhāsāḥ bhavanti te iti vakṣyāmaḥ
[I,326,i]	na viśeṣa viruddhaḥ ca na ca asti iṣṭa vighāta kṛt hetau su pratibaddhe hi na etāḥ santi viḍambanāḥ tādṛśā ca anumānena puṃsaḥ artham adhigacchataḥ na andhena tulya tā hasta sparśa anumita vartmanā yatnena anumitaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ kuśalaiḥ anumātṛbhiḥ abhiyoga śatena api saḥ anyathā na upapādyate 
[I,326,ii_I,326,iii]	su śikṣitatarāḥ prāhuḥ dvividham anumānam kiñcid utpanna prati iti kiñcid utpādya prati iti īśvara ādi anumānam tu utpādya prati iti tatra dhūma anumāna ādeḥ prāmāṇyam kena na iṣyate atas hi sādhyam buddhi ante tārkikaiḥ akṣatāḥ api yat tva ātma īśvara sarvajña para loka ādi gocaram anumānam na tasya iṣṭam prāmāṇyam tattva darśibhiḥ ṛjūnām jāyate tasmāt na tāvat anumeya dhīḥ yāvat kuṭilitam cetaḥ na teṣām viṭa tārkikaiḥ 
[I,327,i_I,327,iii]	evam tu kathayadbhiḥ taiḥ param nāstikyam ātmanaḥ khyāpyate sma jaḍa tvam vā na anumāna apramāṇa tā na hi sambandha grahaṇa upāya vaicitryāt apramāṇa tā bhavitum arhati āgamena anumānena tarka vyutpādanena vā pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītaḥ vā sambandhaḥ na viśiṣyate īśvara ādi anumānānām tad prasaṅge sa vistaram draḍhimānam ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti alam bahu bhāṣitaiḥ pramāṇam upagamyatām tad anumānam evaṃvidhaiḥ avipluta parākramam bhavat udīritaiḥ dūṣaṇaiḥ anabhyupagame punar vigata ceṣṭitāḥ prāṇinaḥ bhaveyuḥ upala upamāḥ iti hi pūrvam āveditam 
[I,327,iv_I,328,i]	atha idānīm sūtram anusarāmaḥ tat pūrvakam ityādi anumānam iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ tat pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇam tat iti sarva nāmnā prakrāntam pratyakṣam avamṛśyate tat pūrvam kāraṇam yasya tat tad pūrvakam etāvatī ucyamāne nirṇaya upamāna ādau tad pūrvake prasaṅgaḥ na vyāvartate iti tad vyāvṛttaye dvivacana antena vigrahaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ te dve pratyakṣe pūrvam yasya iti yat ekam avinābhā vi pratyakṣam vyākhyātam yat ca dvitīyam liṅga darśanam te dve pratyakṣe anumānasya eva kāraṇam na upamāna ādeḥ tatra pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam smaraṇa dvāreṇa tad kāraṇam liṅga darśanam tu svatas eva 
[I,328,ii]	nanu pratyakṣa mātrasya prakṛta tvāt prakṛta avamarśi tvāt ca sarva nāmnaḥ kutas ayam viśeṣa pratilābhaḥ ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti vakṣyate hetuḥ eva ca anumānam yat iha lakṣyam nirdiṣṭam na ca agṛhītam udāharaṇa sādharmyam tat vaidharmyam vā sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti tad grahaṇa upāyaḥ apekṣitavyaḥ pratyakṣa vyatirikta tad avagama upāya parikalpane ca anavasthā dūṣaṇam asakṛt abhihitam iti pratyakṣasya eva tad upāya tvam atas anumāna kāraṇa bhūta pratyakṣa apekṣayā pratyakṣa mātra prakrame api sarva nāmnā tad viśeṣa ākṣipyate yat pratibandha grāhi pratyakṣam yat ca dvitīyam liṅga darśanam iti 
[I,328,iii_I,329,ii]	nanu pratyakṣa viśeṣa dvaya pūrvaka tvam anumāna ābhāseṣu api savyabhicāra viruddha ādiṣu saṃbhavati iti ativyāptiḥ mā evam hetu lakṣaṇe sādhya sādhana grahaṇena tad pratikṣepāt pratibandha svarūpam hi tatra eva nipuṇam abhidhāsyate iha tu tad grahaṇa upāya mātram ucyate samyak pravṛtte ca pratibandha grāhiṇi pratyakṣe vyāpti viplava abhāva at na anumāna ābhāsa prasaṅgaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvādena ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇe varṇyamāne tatas eva pramāṇa ābhāsa vyudāsa siddheḥ kevalam idānīm samāna jātīya upamāna ādi vyavacchedaḥ vracanīyaḥ iti saḥ eva tad pūrvaka padena upāttaḥ artha utpannam avyabhicāri vyavasāya ātmakam iti phala viśeṣaṇānām sarva pramāṇeṣu anuvṛtteḥ yugapad ca kvacid na asti vyāpāraḥ śabda liṅgayoḥ atas na avyapadeśya tva viśeṣaṇam iha arthavat dvayoḥ api ca śabda liṅgayoḥ jñāpaka tvena svarūpa grahaṇa apekṣa tvāt jñāna ayaugapadyena ca yugapad grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt 
[I,329,iii_I,330,i]	nanu evam nirasyatām ativyāptiḥ avyāptiḥ tu katham nirasiṣyate āgama ādi pūrvakāṇām anumānānām asaṅgrahāt teṣu api mūla bhūtam pratyakṣam eva kāraṇam iti kecid āhuḥ yathā uktam yatra api anumitāt liṅgāt liṅgini grahaṇam bhavet tatra api maulikam liṅgam pratyakṣāt eva gamyate iti yat vā prādhānya abhiprāyeṇa pratyakṣa pūrvaka tvam ucyate na niyama artham iti na avyāptiḥ 
[I,330,ii]	tāni iti vā punar tāvat avabodhāya vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ tāni pratyakṣa ādīni pūrvam yasya iti yadi api pratyakṣam eva lakṣya tvena prastutam tathā api vyavacchedya tayā anumāna ādīnām api prakṛta tvam na vāryate 
[I,330,iii_I,331,i]	atra codayanti tat iti karaṇa avamarśaḥ vā syāt phala avamarśaḥ vā karaṇa avamarśe indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam jñānam tat phalam tat pūrvakam ca anumānam iti pūrva śabdasya dvis pāṭhaḥ syāt sa ca aśrutaḥ kalpanīyaḥ phala avamarśe tu pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam anumāna phalam bhavet na anumānam iti tad pūrvaka śabdasya phala vacanasya anumāna śabdena karaṇa vācinā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt tat pūrvakam anumānam iti pratyakṣa phalena hi liṅga darśanena parokṣa artha pratipattiḥ upajanyate sā ca anumāna phalam na anumānam iti ucyate ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ karaṇa avamarśe tāvat indriya ādi karaṇa pūrvakam tat phalam liṅga darśanam yat tat eva parokṣa artha pratipattau karaṇam anumānam iti na dvis pūrvaka śabdasya pāṭhe upayujyate phale api avamṛśyamāne pratyakṣa phala liṅga darśana pūrvakam yat avinā abhāva smaraṇam tad anumānam karaṇam eva tatas parokṣa artha pratipatteḥ yat uktam pratyutpanna kāraṇa janyā smṛtiḥ anumānam iti tatra spaṣṭam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam 
[I,331,ii_I,332,i]	phale vā anumāna śabdam varṇayiṣyāmaḥ anumitiḥ anumānam iti yatas śabdam vā adhyāhariṣyāmaḥ pratyakṣa phala pūrvakam parokṣa artha pratipatti rūpam phalam yatas bhavati tad anumānam iti 
[I,332,ii]	atra hi prathamam liṅga darśanam tatas pratibandha smaraṇam tatas keṣāñcit mate parāmarśa jñānam tatas sādhya artha pratītiḥ tatas pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa avasara varṇitena krameṇa heya ādi jñānam itīyati pratīti kalāpe yathopapatti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti evam tad pūrvaka padam eva kevalam anumāna lakṣaṇa kṣamam iti guravaḥ varṇayāñcakruḥ 
[I,332,iii_I,332,iv]	anye punar upamānāt yati vyāpti vyudāsāya trividha grahaṇam vyākhyāta bantaḥ tad pūrvakam anumānam iti ucyamāne sati upamāna ādau prasaṅgaḥ iti trividha grahaṇam liṅgam vakṣyamāṇa kārya ādi bhedāt vā trividham pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa traya yogāt vā trirūpam trividham ucyate liṅge ca trividhe sati tad ālambanam jñānam upacārāt trividham abhidhīyate tena pratyakṣa pūrvakam trividha liṅga ālambana jñānam anumānam iti ukte sati na ati vyāptiḥ 
[I,333,i]	nanu pūrvavat ādibhiḥ śabdaiḥ kāryādi bheda varṇanam jñāsyāmaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa trayam tu katham ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ pratipādyate iti atra āhuḥ vāda ādi kathā traye api pūrvam upādīyamāna tvāt pakṣaḥ pūrva śabdena ucyate saḥ asya asti āśraya tvena iti pūrvavat liṅgam iti evam anena padena pakṣa dharma tvam uktam bhavati pakṣe upayukte sati śeṣaḥ sa pakṣaḥ bhavati saḥ asya asti āśraya tvena iti śeṣavat evam anena sa pakṣe vṛttiḥ uktā bhavati sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti anena vipakṣāt vyāvṛttam liṅgam ucyate katham akāra praśleṣāt sāmānyatas adṛṣṭam iti tiṣṭhatu tāvat viśeṣaḥ sāmānyatas api na dṛṣṭam kva iti pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ vṛtteḥ ukta tvāt pariśeṣāt vipakṣe sāmānyatas api na dṛṣṭam iti avatiṣṭhate ittham trirūpam liṅgam ebhiḥ śabdaiḥ uktam bhavati tad ālambanam jñānam anumānam 
[I,333,ii_I,333,iii]	tat evam lakṣaṇe kaścid sarvam sūtram ayojayat evam tu khyāpitam na syāt sūtrakārasya kauśalam kiñca pañca lakṣaṇam iha śāstre abhyupagamyate iti trirūpe tasmin varṇyamāne kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa prakaraṇa samayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ na vyāvartate iti tasmāt tad pūrvaka padam eva lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham anavadyam 
[I,334,i]	trividha grahaṇam tasya vibhāga pratipādakam bhedāḥ pūrvavat ityādi granthena kathitāḥ trayaḥ tad pūrvaka pada udgīta nirmala nyāya lakṣaṇaḥ parimlāna ādaraḥ anyatra sūtra kṛt vākya lāghave vibhāga vacanāt siddham traividhyam sva girā bhavet tathā ca śabda siddhānta chaleṣu evam adīdṛśat 
[I,335,i]	pūrvavat iti yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate yathā jaladhara unnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭiḥ iti 
[I,335,ii]	atra codayati pūrvam hi kāraṇam ucyate pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāryam vaktum yuktam tena kāryāt kāraṇa anumānam iha udāhartavyam na kāraṇāt kārya anumānam 
[I,335,iii_I,336,i]	na ca kāraṇena kāryam anumātum api pāryate kāryasya tāvat pakṣa tvam ayuktam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ siddhe hi kārye kim anyat anumeyam asiddhe kha puṣpa vat na pakṣa tvam api ca asti kāryam kāraṇasya astitvāt iti vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti vat sattāyām ca sādhyāyām bhāva dharmasya hetoḥ asiddha tvam abhāva dharmasya viruddha tvam ubhaya dharmasya anaikāntika tvam iti katham sādhayitum śakyate tat uktam na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti vyabhicāryu bhaya āśrayaḥ dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham iti na ca kāraṇa mātrasya hetu tvam yuktam vinā ca pratibandha ādinā vyabhicāra sambhavāt kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ ca na kaścid vipaścitā api niścetum śakyaḥ calat acala vipula vapuṣām utpala dala malīm asatviṣām api payomu cām a mukta payasām uparama darśanāt yadi tu antyadaśāvarti kāraṇam liṅgam iṣyate vyāpti smaraṇa velāyām kārya pratyakṣa tā bhavet 
[I,336,ii_I,337,i]	nanu saugataiḥ api kāraṇāt kārya anumānam aṅgīkṛtam eva hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa kārya utpādaḥ anumīyate artha antara anapekṣi tvāt sa svabhāvaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ iti agrantha jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ utpādyate asmāt iti utpādaḥ yogyatā kathyate sā ca atra anumeyā atas eva tasyāḥ vastunaḥ ananya tvāt svabhāva anumānam idam iṣyate sa svabhāvaḥ anuvarṇitaḥ iti 
[I,337,ii_I,337,iii]	atra āhuḥ sarvam idam avidita anumāna prayoga kramasya durmateḥ codyam na kāryam atra pakṣīkriyate na sattā sādhyate na vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ prayujyate api tu payodharāḥ eva dharmiṇaḥ adūra kāla bhāvinyā vṛṣṭyā tadvantaḥ sādhyante viśiṣṭa unnati rūpa dharma ādi yogena iti na pūrva kathita doṣa avasaraḥ yathā agni mānayam dhūmaḥ bahula pāṇḍutā ādi dharma yogi tvāt mahān asa avadhṛta dhūma vat iti dhūmaḥ eva agnimattayā anumīyate evam samanantara utpādita vṛṣṭayaḥ amī jīmūtāḥ sa atiśaya unnati ādi dharma yogi tvāt pūrva upalabdha parjanya vat iti jaladharāḥ eva bhaviṣyat vṛṣṭimat tayā anumīyante yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ tasmāt dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ syāt prameya tā sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitā iti
[I,338,i_I,338,ii]	yat tu pūrvam kāraṇam ucyate iti tat satyam pūrvam asya asti iti pūrvavat kāraṇa gatam unnata tva ādi dharma jātam ucyate tat eva liṅgam iti grantha doṣaḥ api na kaścid na ca kāraṇa mātrasya hetu tvam brūmaḥ yena asya vidhugpratyaya upanipāta ādi kṛtaḥ vyabhicāraḥ syāt api ca viśiṣṭam eva kāraṇam hetuḥ na ca kāraṇa viśeṣaḥ duravagamaḥ gambhīra garjita ārambha nirbhinna giri gahvarāḥ rolamba ga bala vyāla tamāla malina tviṣaḥ tuṅgat taṭit latā saṅga piśaṅga uttuṅga vigrahāḥ vṛṣṭim vyabhicaranti iha na evaṃprāyāḥ payomucaḥ anabhyupagame ca evam anumānasya jīvitam na syāt dhūma viśeṣāṇām api boddhum aśaktitaḥ 
[I,339,i_I,341,i]	yat api kārya pratyakṣa tvam āśaṅkitam tat api ayuktam na hi vṛṣṭi anumāna samayaḥ eva śirasi salila kaṇāḥ patantaḥ payoda muktāḥ dṛśyante parokṣe liṅgini jñānam anumānam iti ca viśeṣaṇa upādānāt yatra tatra na tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ pratyakṣībhavati tad udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati api ca anupajāta avayava kriyatayā anāśaṅkyamāna vināśe antyatantau jātayā kriyayā paṭa niṣpatti anumāne kriyamāṇe na paṭa pratyakṣa tā kāla vyavadhāna sambhavāt tathā hi ekatas tāvat antyatantau kriyā darśanam avinā abhāva smaraṇam parāmarśa jñānam anumeya pratītiḥ iti tricatvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ anyatas tu kriyā kriyātaḥ vibhāgaḥ vibhāgāt pūrva saṃyoga nivṛttiḥ tatas uttara saṃyoga utpādaḥ tatas paṭa niṣpattiḥ niṣpanne paṭe kṣaṇa antare rūpa ādi guṇa āraṃbhaḥ rūpa ādi janmani paṭasya samavāyi kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇasya kāryāt avaśyam pūrva kāla bhāvi tvam atas niṣpannaḥ api nūnam ekasmin kṣaṇe nīrūpaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati iti na tadā eva pratyakṣaḥ tatas kṣaṇa antare rūpa utpādāt rūpavat dravyam indriya sannikarṣāt pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti ati vahavaḥ ete kṣaṇāḥ atas na kārya pratyakṣa tvam na api vidhura pratyaya ādinā kārya anutpattiḥ anutpanna avayava kriyatva viśeṣaṇa upādānena tad vināśa aśaṅkanāt kriyātaḥ ca uttarottara kāryāṇām avarśya bhāvi tvāt 
[I,341,ii]	yat api hetunā yaḥ samagreṇa ityādinā yogya tā anumānam vyākhyātam tat api asādhu svabhāva anumānasya nirasta tvāt lokaḥ ca kāraṇāt avikalāt kāryam eva kalpayati na yogyatām iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,341,iii]	śeṣavat iti yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate yathā nadī pūreṇa uparitane deśe vṛṣṭiḥ iti atra api vṛṣṭi mat u paritana deśa saṃsarga lakṣaṇaḥ nadī dharmaḥ tad dharmeṇa eva viśiṣṭena pūrṇa tā ādinā anumīyate vṛṣṭimat pṛṣṭha deśa saṃsṛṣṭā iyam nadī phenila kaluṣa tva ādi viśiṣṭa ṣūra upeta tvāt pūrva upalabdhā evaṃvidhadhunī vat 
[I,341,iv_I,342,i]	ayam deśaḥ vā vṛṣṭi viśiṣṭa deśa antara saṃsṛṣṭaḥ viśiṣṭa nadī pūravat tvena anumīyata iti prāktana vaiyadhikaraṇyādi codya cakrasya iha api na asti prasaraḥ phala tattu iyam vācaḥ yuktiḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate iti paramārthataḥ tu dharmīm dharmavat tvena dharmavān anumīyate iti sthitiḥ yat āha bhaṭṭaḥ saḥ eva ca ubhayā ātmā ayam gamyaḥ gamakaḥ eva ca asiddhena eka deśena gamyaḥ siddhena bodhakaḥ iti
[I,343,i]	yat tu setu bhaṅga hima vilaya nādinā api nadī pūra upapattiḥ dṛṣṭā iti tatra api ucyate āvarta vartanāśa ali viśāla kaluṣa udakaḥ kallola vikaṭa āsphāla sphurat pheṭa chaṭā añcitaḥ vahat bahala śaivāla vanaśāt bala saṅkulaḥ nadī pūra viśeṣaḥ api śakyeta na na veditum pramātuḥ aparādhaḥ ayam viśeṣam yaḥ na paśyati na anumānasya doṣaḥ asti prameya avyabhicāriṇaḥ rodha upaghāta sādṛśya vyabhicāra nibandhanam anumāna apramāṇa tvam atas vaktum asāṃpratam pāraṃparyeṇa vṛṣṭiḥ ca nadī pūrasya kāraṇam patat dhana payaḥ bindu sandoha syandana kramāt 
[I,344,i_I,344,iii]	sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu yat akārya kāraṇa bhūtāt liṅgāt tādṛśasya eva liṅginaḥ anumānam yathā kapittha ādau rūpeṇa rasa anumānam rūpa rasayoḥ samavāyi kāraṇam ekam kapittha ādi dravyam na tu tayoḥ anyonyam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ śākya dṛṣṭyā api vartamānayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ itaretara kārya kāraṇa tā na sambhavati eva dharmiṇaḥ ca rūpavat tvena rasavat tā anumānāt asiddhi ādi codyānām pūrvavat anavakāśaḥ vaktavyaḥ 
[I,344,iv_I,345,ii]	yat punar bhāṣya kāreṇa bhāskarasya deśa antara prāpti ā agati anumānam udāhṛtam tat ayuktam deśa antara prāpteḥ gati kārya tvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇa anumānam śeṣavat eva idam syāt api ca deśa antara prāptiḥ deśa antara saṃyogaḥ na ca daśa śata aṃśoḥ deśa antareṇa śailādinā saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati nabhasā tu bhavan api diśā vā durlakṣyaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt pavana vanaspati saṃyoga vat mātṛ garbha saṃyoga vat vā atha deśa antare taraṇi darśanam hetuḥ ucyate tasya api gati kārya tā pāramparyeṇa vidyate eva gatyā prāptiḥ prāptyā ca tatra darśanam iti 
[I,345,iii]	atha deśa antare tapana darśanam pakṣīkṛtya darśana tvena ca darśana śabda vācya tvena vā tasya gati pūrvaka tvam anumīyate deśa antare divākara darśanam gati pūrvakam deśa antara darśana tvāt tad śabda vācya tvāt vā devadatta deśa antara darśana vat iti tathā api pāramparyeṇa gati kārya tā na nivartate eva na hi darśana tvam go tva ādi vat sāmānyam asti kintu bhāva pratyayena atra darśana utpādikā śaktiḥ ucyate sā ca na atīndriyā nityā kācid api tu svarūpa sahakāri svabhāvā eva iti dṛśyamānam svarūpam api śakti varge patati dṛśyamānam ca deśa antara prāpti ātmakam iti gati kāryam 
[I,346,i_I,346,ii]	evam darśana śabda vācya tve api hetūkṛte vaktavyam gatyā deśa antara prāptiḥ janyate tayā tatra darśanam tena śabda prayogaḥ saḥ eva vācya tvam iti bhāva pratyayena uktaḥ tasmāt sarvathā gati kārya tvānapāyāt śeṣavat eva idam anumānam tat etat bhāṣya kārīyam udāharaṇam īdṛśam rūpāt rasa anumānam tu tasmāt yuktam udāhṛtam akārya kāraṇa prāya hetūnām ca pradarśitaḥ bhadanta kalahe asmābhiḥ udāharaṇa vistaraḥ 
[I,346,iii_I,347,i]	evam tāvat matu bvyākhyayā traividhyam anumānasya varṇitam etat tu phalgu prāyam iva manyante niyama ātmaka sambandha balāt eva liṅgasya gamaka tvam uktam na kārya ādi svarūpeṇa tat kim īdṛśa traividhyena darśitena iti vati pratyayam āśritya anyathā vyācakṣate pūrvavat iti atra sambandha grahaṇa kāle liṅga liṅginoḥ pratyakṣatas sva rūpam avadhārya punar tādṛśā eva liṅgena tādṛś eva liṅgī gamyate tat pūrveṇa tulyam vartate iti pūrvavat anumānam yathā mahānase dhūma agnī sahacaritau dṛṣṭvā punar parvate dhūma agni anumānam 
[I,347,ii]	nanu pratyakṣa pratītyā viṣaya gata sakala viśeṣa sākṣāt karaṇa kṣamayā tulyā na anumānikī matiḥ iti katham kriyā tulya tvam tad abhāvāt katham vatiḥ satyam evam tathā api vahneḥ eva tādṛśasya vailakṣaṇya āpādaka viśeṣa avacchinnasya liṅgena grahaṇāt adūra vipra karṣeṇa kriyā tulya tvam upapatsyate 
[I,348,i]	śeṣa vat nām pariśeṣaḥ sa ca prasakta pratiṣedhe anyatra aprasaṅgāt śiṣyamāṇe saṃpratyayaḥ yathā kvacid pradeśe dhūmena agni mātre anumite kim indhanaḥ ayam agniḥ iti vimarśe prasaktānām tṛṇa parṇa kāṣṭha ādīnām aprasaṅgāt ca gomaya indhanaḥ agniḥ parikalpyate yathā vā śabde dravya karma tva pratiṣedhāt sāmānyādau aprasaṅgāt ca guṇa tva anumānam vakṣyate 
[I,348,ii]	sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu yatra sambandha kāle api liṅgi svarūpam apratyakṣam nitya parokṣam eva sāmānyatas vyāpti grahaṇāt anumīyate yathā śabda ādi upalabdhyā śrotra ādi karaṇam indriyāṇām atīndriya tvāt na kadācid pratyakṣa gamya tvam atha ca chedana ādi kriyāṇām paraśvadha ādi karaṇa pūrvaka tvena vyāpti grahaṇāt śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām karaṇa pūrvaka tvam anumīyate 
[I,348,iii]	atra vati vyākhyāne codayanti pūrvavat evam ekam anumānam uktam syāt na trividham yatas na tāvat anavagata vyāptikam liṅgam gamakam bhavati viśeṣāṇām ananta tvena ca tad anvaya vyatirekayoḥ duravagama tvāt sarvatra sāmānyena eva vyāpti grahaṇam yat ca ittham vyāpti jñānam tad tulyam tritaye api atas sarvam pūrvavat eva syāt vateḥ sarvatra saṃbhavāt 
[I,349,i_I,349,ii]	tat etat ayuktam avāntara viśeṣasya su spaṣṭasya bhāvāt vyāpti pūrvakam anumānam iti etāvatā yadi ekavidham ucyate tat satyam evam prakāram eva idam tasmin sati api tu sāmye bheda antara saṃbhavāt traividhyam asya pratipādyate tathā hi dhūma jvalanayoḥ pūrvam pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt idānīm tena eva dhūmena saḥ eva agniḥ anumīyate iti pūrvavat idam anumānam ucyate yat pratyakṣa pūrvakam iti prasiddham 
[I,350,i_I,350,iv]	nanu dhūma antareṇa vahni antara anumānam kim na pratyakṣa pūrvakam kaḥ ekam āha na pūrvavat iti katham tarhi idam ucyate tena eva dhūmena iti jāti abhiprāyam etat ucyate na vyakti abhiprāyam nanu sāmānyatas tarhi tad paricchedāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam eva idam syāt na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya nitya parokṣa anumeya eka viṣaya tvāt prasakta pratiṣedha ādinā ca niyata sādhya pariccheda hetuḥ pariśeṣa anumānam ucyate yathā gomaya indhana dahana anumānam udāhṛtam śabde vā guṇa tva kalpanam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam udāhṛtam eva śrotra ādi anumānam tat evam bheda saṃbhavāt trividham anumānam iti yuktam 
[I,350,v]	āstām vai udāharaṇa bhedaḥ ekatra api udāharaṇe traividhyam abhidhātum śakyate yathā icchā ādi kāryam āśritam kāryatvāt ghaṭa vat iti āśraya mātre sādhye pūrvavat anumānam prasakta śarīra indriya ādi āśraya pratiṣedhena viśiṣṭa āśraya kalpane tat eva pariśeṣa anumānam anumeyasya nitya parokṣa tvāt tat eva sāmānyatodṛṣṭam ca 
[I,351,i]	tarhi pariśeṣa anumānasya sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ ucyate pariśeṣa anumāna pravṛttau anyaḥ panthāḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya anyaḥ icchā ādi kāryam deha ādi vilakṣaṇa āśrayam śarīra ādiṣu bādhaka pramāṇa upapattau satyām kāryatvāt iti sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya kramaḥ pariśeṣa anumānasya tu ittham pravṛttiḥ icchā ādeḥ āśraya tvena prasaktāni śarīra indriya manāṃsi niṣidhyante diś kāla ādau ca tad prasaṅgaḥ na asti tad pāriśeṣyāt ātmā eva tad āśrayaḥ iti pariśeṣa anumāne ca sarvatra na eṣa niyamaḥ sādhyasya ati parokṣa tvam iti gomaya agni kalpanā ādi darśanāt sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu nitya parokṣa viṣayam eva iti sūktam traividhyam 
[I,351,ii_I,352,i]	apare punar adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam śakti kriyā anumānam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam udāharanti devadatta ādau api kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tvāt calati iti pratyaye hi na devadatta svarūpa atirikta kriyā tattva pratibhāsaḥ yaḥ eva devadatta ātmā tiṣṭhat pratyaya gocaraḥ calati iti api saṃvittau saḥ eva pratibhāsate avirala samullasat saṃyoga vibhāga prabandha viṣaya tvāt cala ti iti pratyayasya na sarvadā tad utpādaḥ 
[I,352,ii_I,353,i]	katham tarhi nitya parokṣe kriyāsu alakṣaṇe anumānam kramataḥ iti ced kāryasya kādācid ka tvena kāraṇa pūrvaka tvāt paridṛśyamānasya dravya svarūpasya kāraṇa tve sarvadā kārya utpādana prasaṅgāt sarvadā tad svarūpa sadbhāvāt na ca sarvadā kāryam utpadyate iti tad atirikta kriyā anumānam evam śaktau api draṣṭavyam kriyā śakti svarūpasya ca nitya parokṣa tvāt tad adṛṣṭa sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam anumānam ucyate na tu viśeṣa viṣayam viśeṣa vyāpti grahaṇasya asaṃbhavāt iti 
[I,353,ii]	tat idam anupapannam parispanda rūpasya utkṣepaṇa ādi bhedavataḥ karmaṇaḥ calati ādi pratītau prakāśamāna tvena pratyakṣa tvāt na tasya nitya anumeya tvam saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve tu saṃyujyate vibhajyate iti pratītiḥ syāt na calati iti yathā viṣayam pratyaya utpādāt saṃvedana anusāriṇī ca viṣaya vyavasthā anyathā ghaṭa pratyaye api paṭasya ālambanatā syāt saṃyoga vibhāga ālambana tve sati tiṣṭhati api calat pratyayaḥ prāpnoti tatra api saṃyoga vibhāga saṃbhavāt sthāṇau ca śyena saṃyoga vibhāgavati calati iti pratibhāsaḥ bhavet avirala tad upajanana prabandhe api bhūta bhāvinoḥ saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ parokṣa tvāt vartamānayoḥ grahaṇam tau ca calitvā api sthite devadatte staḥ iti tatra api katham na calati iti pratyayaḥ nirantaram ca saṃyoga vibhāga śreṇi darśanāt bhūmau api bhavet buddhiḥ calati iti manuṣya vat 
[I,354,i]	atha manuṣe yad kriyā janya tvam saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ tatra eva calati ityādi buddhiḥ na anyatra devadatta kriyayā ca tau janyete na niṣkriyayā bhūmyā iti na tasyām tathā pratyayaḥ yadi evam kriyā anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt kriyā ālambanaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ tad ālambana tve hi tayoḥ dvaya vṛtti tva aviśeṣāt viśeṣe kāraṇam vācyam yena puruṣaḥ eva ayam pratyayaḥ na bhūmau iti devadatta kriyā janya tvena tu na viśeṣaḥ yatas kriyāyāḥ parokṣa tve sati tat eva na vidmaḥ kim asau devadatta āśrayā kriyā kim vā bhūmi āśritā iti saṃyoga vibhāga kārya anumānasya ubhayatra api tulya tvāt na ca devadatte gacchati bhūmau anavarata vahat vahala saṃyoga vibhāgavatī api vā taraṅgiṇī tīra pāṣāṇe calati iti pratyayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasmāt kriyā viṣayaḥ eva calati iti pratyayaḥ na saṃyoga vibhāga ālambanaḥ 
[I,355,i_I,355,ii]	saṃyoga vibhāga agrahaṇe api ca nirālambe vihāyasi viharati vihaṅgame calati iti saṃvedanam dṛśyate na ca gagana saṃyogaḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣa itara vṛtti tvāt gandha vaha mahīruha saṃyoga vat vitata āloka avaya vi ākāśaḥ tad saṃyogaḥ ca patriṇaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ced na etat evam tamāla nīla jīmūta samūha pihita ambare niśīthe sa andhakāre api calat khadyota darśanāt 
[I,355,iii_I,356,iii]	na tatra āloka avayavī kaścana timira avayavī vā vidyate iti kena saṃyogaḥ gṛhyate vibhāgaḥ vā bhūkampa utpāte ca jāte calati vasumatī iti matiḥ asti na tatra saṃyoga vibhāgau gṛhyete bahula niśīthe ca na tarām tasmāt na saṃyoga ādi ālambanā calati iti matiḥ api tu kriyā ālambanā eva iti na ca nitya parokṣā kriyā anumātum api śakyā kāryasya kāraṇa pūrvaka tvena bhavat mate sambandha grahaṇa anupapatteḥ na hi te dravya svarūpam kāraṇam api tu kriyā viśiṣṭam kriyāyāḥ ca parokṣa tvāt na tad āviṣṭa dravya grahaṇam su ghaṭam iti kāraṇatva agrahaṇāt ghaṭa ādau api durghaṭā vyāpti pratītiḥ ātmā anumāne tu na ayam doṣaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya pratyakṣam upalambhāt tasmāt na kārya anumeyā kriyā 
[I,356,iv]	na ca saṃyoga anumeyā saṃyoga antam karma iti nyāyāt vartamānāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tena anumātum aśakyatvāt kriyā anumāna vādaḥ ca sāmānya lakṣaṇe vistareṇa nirastaḥ 
[I,357,i_I,357,ii]	etena śakti anumānam api vyudastam veditavyam purā ca sa vistaram atīndriya śakti nirākaraṇam kṛtam eva tena adṛṣṭa kriyā śakti svalakṣaṇam iti kṣamam na idam sāmānyatodṛṣṭam iti pūrva uktam eva sat iti matupi vatau vā pratyaye varṇyamāne trividham idam iha uktam yuktam eva anumānam para kavi racitānām lakṣaṇānām tu amuṣmin sati na bhavati śobhā bhāsvatī iva indu bhāsām bauddha ukta pratibandha dūṣaṇa diśā tad lakṣaṇam dūṣitam bhūyas dṛṣṭa mita anvaya eka śaraṇam śocyam punar śābaram sāṅkhyānām tu kutas anumāna ghaṭana upādāna rūpā yatas teṣām jātiḥ asau ca tad vikṛti vat bhinnā iti duḥsthaḥ anvayaḥ 
[I,359,i]	idam idānīm cintyate yat etat indriya ādi sannikarṣa ja tu ā ādinā lakṣitam asmad ādi pratyakṣam tat kila prāyaśas vartamāna kāla viśiṣṭa vastu viṣayam evam idam anumānam api kim tat gocaram eva kim vā kāla antara paricchede api kṣamam iti tat ucyate tri kāla viṣayam anumānam iti kasmāt traikālya grahaṇāt tri kāla yuktāḥ arthāḥ anumānena gṛhyante bhūtāḥ nadīpūreṇa vṛṣṭiḥ anumīyate sā eva bhaviṣyantī megha unnatyā dhūmena vartamānaḥ agniḥ iti 
[I,359,ii]	atas ca yat mīmāṃsakaiḥ ucyate codanā hi bhūtam bhavantam bhaviṣyantam sūkṣmam vyavahitam viprakṛṣṭam iti evaṃjātīyakam artham śaknoti avagamayitum na anyat kiñca iti tat ayuktam codanā vat pramāṇa antarasya api evam jātīyaka viṣaya tva upapatteḥ pratyakṣam api yoginām tri kāla viṣayam uktam asmad ādīnām api kvacid iti 
[I,360,i_I,360,ii]	atra codayanti kāle sati traikālya grahaṇam cintyam saḥ eva tu durupapādaḥ tad abhāve kasya vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ nirupyate na tāvat gṛhyate kālaḥ pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭa ādi vat cira kṣipra ādi bodhaḥ api kārya mātrā balambanaḥ na ca amunā eva liṅgena kālasya parikalpanā pratibandhaḥ hi dṛṣṭaḥ atra na dhūma jvalana ādi vat pratibhāsā atirekaḥ tu kathañcid upapatsyate pracitām kāñcid āśritya kriyā akṣaṇa paramparām na ca eṣa graha nakṣatra parispanda svabhāvakaḥ kālaḥ kalpayitum yuktaḥ kriyātaḥ na aparaḥ hi asau muhūrtayāmāhorātra m āsaṛtu ayana vatsaraiḥ loke kālpanikaiḥ eva vyavahāraḥ bhaviṣyati yadi tu ekaḥ vibhuḥ nityaḥ kālaḥ dravya ātmakaḥ mataḥ atīta vartamāna ādi bheda vyavahṛtiḥ kutas 
[I,361,i_I,361,ii]	evam ākṣipte sati pratyakṣa gamya tām eva kecid kālasya manvate viśeṣaṇa tayā kārya pratyaye pratibhāsanāt krameṇa yugapad kṣipram cirāt kṛtam iti īdṛśāḥ pratyayāḥ na avakalpante kārya mātra avalambanāḥ na hi viṣaya atiśayam antareṇa pratibhāsā atiśayaḥ avakalpate 
[I,362,i_I,362,ii]	arūpaḥ nanu ayam kālaḥ katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā rūpam eva tava arūpam katham gṛhyeta cakṣuṣā katham vā rūpavantaḥ api parokṣāḥ paramāṇavaḥ tasmāt pratītiḥ anveṣyā kim nimitta parīkṣayā nanu dravye ayam niyamaḥ na rūpa ādau dravye api na ayam niyamaḥ yat rūpavat tat pratyakṣam iti yena paramāṇūnām tathā abhāvaḥ syāt kintu yat pratyakṣam tat rūpavat iti tat uktam trayāṇām pratyakṣa tva rūpavat tva drava tva ādīni iti 
[I,362,iii_I,363,ii]	na idam daivikam vacanam yat anatikramaṇīyam na ca vacanena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā vyavasthāpyate pratyakṣa tvam hi aindriyika pratīti viṣaya tvam ucyate tat ced asti kālasya nīrūpasya api pratyakṣatā kena vāryate rūpavat tvam tad dravyāṇām astu tathā darśanāt na ca anuddhāṭita akṣasya kṣipra ādi pratyaya udayaḥ tad bhāva anuvidhānena tasmāt kālaḥ tu cākṣuṣaḥ svatantraḥ eva tarhi ghaṭa ādi vat kasmāt na gṛhyate kālaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāvaḥ eṣa na paryanuyoga arhaḥ rūpi dravya viśeṣaṇa tām gatasya tasya grahaṇam na daṇḍa ādi vat svatantrasya api iti gagana ādeḥ tu anya viśeṣaṇa tayā api na grahaṇam asti iti tasya apratyakṣa tvam na tu arūpa tvāt 
[I,363,iii_I,364,iii]	atha vadet viśeṣaṇasya api rūpavataḥ eva daṇḍa ādeḥ cakṣuṣā grahaṇam na kāla ādeḥ iti tat ayuktam arūpasya api sāmānya ādeḥ viśeṣaṇasya cakṣuṣā grahaṇāt dravye niyamaḥ iti ced uktam atra yat eva nayana karaṇaka avagama gocare saṃcarati tat eva cākṣuṣam rūpavat a rūpam vā dravyam adravyam vā iti evam guru dravyam iti kārtasvara ādau pratibhāsāt guru tvam api pratyakṣam na patana anumeyam eva tasmāt svatantra bhāvena viśeṣaṇa tayā api vā cākṣuṣa jñāna gamyam yat tat pratyakṣam upeya tām atas eva pratyakṣaḥ kālaḥ evam samāna nyāya tvāt pūrva apara ādi pratyaya gamyā diś api pratyakṣā veditavyā iti 
[I,364,iv_I,365,ii]	anye manyante daṇḍī devadattaḥ nīlam utpalam itivat viṣaya atirekasya agrahaṇāt pratyaya atiśayasya ca parokṣa kāla pakṣe api tad kāraṇakasya upapatteḥ anumeyaḥ eva kālaḥ apratyakṣa tva mātreṇa na ca kālasya na astitā yuktā pṛthivī adhobhāga candramaḥ para bhāga vat apratibhāsamānaḥ api kālaḥ saṃskāraḥ iva indriya sahacaritaḥ pratyabhijñām kṣipra ādi pratītim janayiṣyati kṛtaḥ ca pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe mahān kaliḥ kim viṣaya bhedāt eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ uta upāya bhedāt api iti tat alam punar tad vimardena 
[I,365,iii_I,365,iv]	pramāṇam iti nirṇītam pratyakṣam sa vikalpakam tasmāt na kalpanā mātram cira kṣipra ādi saṃvidaḥ na ca āsām paridṛśyamāna kāraṇa vinirmita tvam upapadyate kriyamāṇasya paṭa ādeḥ kāryasya tad utpādakasya ca tantu turī vema śalākā kuvinda ādi kāraṇa bṛndasya sāmye api kvacid tūrṇam kṛtam kvacid cireṇa kṛtam iti pratibhāsa bheda darśanāt nimitta antaram cintanīyam 
[I,366,i]	nanu parispanda ādi kriyā bhedaḥ eva atra nimittam kaścid parispandaḥ caturaḥ kaścid mantharaḥ iti kvacid kṣipra buddhiḥ kvacid cira buddhiḥ iti na etat cāru parispanda gatayoḥ api cāturya māntharyayoḥ nimitta antara kārya tvāt parispande api cireṇa gacchati śīghram dhāvati iti cira kṣipra ādi pratītiḥ dṛśyate 
[I,366,ii]	āha na deva datta ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ krama ākrama ādi pratyayāḥ kintu graha nakṣatra ādi parispanda nibandhanāḥ saḥ eva ca graha tārā ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ iti ucyate tad kṛtaḥ eva ayam yāma ahorātra māsa ādi vyavahāraḥ tasya svatas eva bhedāt aupādhika bheda kalpanā kleśaḥ na bhaviṣyati bheda paricchede nālikā prahara ādiḥ upāyaḥ iyatī nālikā iyat muhūrtam iyān praharaḥ iti tatra ekasmin muhūrte prahare vā nirvarttyamāneṣu bahuṣu kāryeṣu yugapad iti bhavati matiḥ muhūrta antara apekṣeṣu krameṇa iti tasmāt graha ādi parispandaḥ eva taiḥ taiḥ nimittaiḥ upalakṣyamāṇa pramāṇaḥ kālaḥ iti kāla vidaḥ ca jyotiḥ gaṇakāḥ te eva enam budhyante 
[I,367,i_I,367,ii]	tat asāṃpratam candra ādi graha paricchede api krama ādi pratīti darśanāt cireṇa astam gataḥ bhānuḥ śītāṃśuḥ śīghram udgataḥ uditau iva dṛśyete yugapad bhauma bhārgavau iti dṛśyate pratibhāsaḥ na ca graha antara parispanda kāraṇakaḥ eṣa śakyate vaktum anavasthā prasaṅgāt tasmāt na graha ādi parispandaḥ kālaḥ kintu vastu antaram yat kṛtaḥ ayam krama ākrama ādi vyavahāraḥ 
[I,367,iii]	nanu bhavat kalpitaḥ api kālaḥ kim svatas eva krama ākrama svabhāvaḥ hetu antarāt vā svatas tasya tad svabhāva tve kāryasya eva paṭa ādeḥ paridṛśyamānasya tat svābhāvyam bhavatu kim kālena hetu antara pakṣe tu anavasthā tasya api hetu antara apekṣa tvāt iti tat etat bāliśa codyam śukla guṇa ādau api evam vaktum śakya tvāt guṇasya svatas śukla svabhāva tve dravyasya eva tat bhavatu kim guṇena guṇa antara kalpane tu anavasthā iti 
[I,368,i_I,368,iii]	atha tatra tathā darśanāt na idam codyam tat iha api samānam kāryeṣu paṭa ādiṣu nimitta antara kṛtaḥ krama ādi vyavahāraḥ nimitta antare nimitta antaram na mṛgyam iti tasmāt asti yugapad a ādi vyavahāra hetuḥ kālaḥ atas ca evam dṛṣṭaḥ parāparatvasya dikkṛtasya viparyayaḥ yuvasthavirayoḥ saḥ api vinā kālam na siddhyati dūratara diś avacchinnaḥ devadatta ādiḥ paraḥ iti pratibhāsate nikaṭa diś ava chinnaḥ tu aparaḥ iti te ete dikkṛte paratva aparatve viparivartamāne dṛśyete dūra sthaḥ hi yuvā aparaḥ iti ucyate nikaṭa sthaḥ api sthaviraḥ paraḥ iti tat atra na kāla vyatiriktam kāraṇam upapadyate iti atas anumīyate kālaḥ 
[I,369,i_I,369,ii]	sa ca ayam ākāśa vat sarvatra ekaḥ kālaḥ yathā aakāśa liṅgasya śabdasya sarvatra aviśeṣāt viśeṣa liṅga abhāvāt ca ekaḥ tathā sarvatra tad vyavahārāt vibhuḥ avayava āśraya anupalaṃbhāt niravayavaḥ anāśritaḥ ca anāśrita tvāt eva dravyam atas eva avayava vibhāga ādi nāśa kāraṇa anupapatteḥ nityaḥ iti 
[I,369,iii]	nanu evañca eka tvāt kālasya kutas vartamāna ādi vibhāgaḥ tad abhāvāt katham tri kāla viṣayam anumānam ucyate ucyate na tāttvikaḥ kālasya bhedaḥ vartamāna ādiḥ kintvasan api asau vyavahāra siddhaye kenacid upādhinā kalpyate 
[I,369,iv]	kaḥ punar asau upādhiḥ kriyā iti brūmaḥ nanu tasyāḥ api na svatas vartamāna ādi bhedaḥ tad bhāve vā sā eva tathā bhavatu kim kālena mā evam utpatti sthiti nirodha yogi phala avacchedena nānā akṣaṇa paramparā ātmikā kriyā iti ucyate sā vartamāna ādi bhedavatī ca tathā hi sthālī adhiśrayaṇāt prabhṛti ātadavataraṇāt utpadyamāna odana ākhya phala avacchedāt kriyā vartamāna ucyate pacati iti tad avacchedāt ghaṭa ākāśa vat kālaḥ api tāvān vartamānaḥ iti ucyate abhinirvṛtta phala avaccheda ātmā parispanda santatiḥ atītā bhavati apākṣīt iti tad avacchedāt kālaḥ api atītaḥ ucyate anārabdha phala avacchedāt bhaviṣyantī kriyā ucyate pakṣyati iti tathā kālaḥ api iti evam aupādhikaḥ kāle vartamāna ādi traya vyavahāraḥ 
[I,370,i]	atas ca yat ucyate vṛkṣāt patataḥ parṇasya bhūta bhaviṣyanta ābadhvānau dṛśyete na vartamānaḥ tasmāt vartamānaḥ kālaḥ na asti iti tad asambaddham adhva vyaṅgya tva abhāvāt kālasya na hi adhva vyaṅgyaḥ kāla bhedaḥ kintu yathā ukta krameṇa kriyā vyaṅgyaḥ eva iti kriyā parikalpita bheda nibandhanaḥ ca ayam kṣaṇa lava kāṣṭhā kalā nālikā muhūrtayāmāhorātra m āsartu ayana saṃvatsara yuga manvantara kalpa vyavahāraḥ iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,371,i]	tithi ādi bheda avadhāraṇam ca vaidika karma prayoga aṅgam paurṇamāsyām paurṇamāsyām yajeta amāvāsyāyām amāvāsyāyām ca iti evam vasantādyutu bhedaḥ api tad aṅgam vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīnāt adhīta grīṣme rājanyaḥ śaradi vaiśyaḥ varṣāsu rathakāraḥ iti 
[I,371,ii]	sa ca ayam ṛtu tithyādi vibhāgaḥ kriyayā eva jyotiḥ śāstra upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa rāśi saṃsṛṣṭa candra ādi graha gatayā lakṣyate laukikena ca lakṣmaṇā tena tena iti tat yathā cañcu agra cumbita ātāmra cūta aṅkura kadambakaiḥ kathyate kokilaiḥ eva madhuḥ madhura kūjitaiḥ divākara kara alātapāta nirdagdha vīrudhaḥ mārgāssa mallikā modāḥ bhavanti grīṣma śaṃsinaḥ śikhaṇḍi maṇḍala ārabdha caṇḍa tāṇḍava ḍambaraiḥ prāvṛṣ ākhyāyate megha meduraiḥ medinīdharaiḥ mauktika ākāra vistāri tārā nikara citritam śarad piśuna tām yāti yamunā ambhaḥ nibham nabhaḥ āyāma yāminī bhoga saphala ābhoga vibhramāḥ hemantam abhinandanti sa ūṣmāṇaḥ taruṇī stanāḥ āskandana dalat kunda kalikā utkara danturāḥ vadanti śiśiram vātāḥ tuṣāra kaṇa karkaśāḥ tasmāt ekaḥ api ayam kālaḥ kriyā bhedāt vibhidyate etena sadṛśa nyāyāt mantavyā diś samarthitā 
[I,372,i]	pūrva paścimā ādi pratyayānām kevala vṛkṣa ādi pratyaya vailakṣaṇyena kāraṇa antara anumānāt diś liṅga aviśeṣāt eka tve api diśaḥ daśavidhāḥ pradakṣiṇa āvarta parivartamāna mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala marīci nicaya cumbyamāna kāñcana acala kaṭaka saṃyoga upādhi kṛtaḥ pūrva paścimā ādi bhedaḥ kalpyate pūrvā pūrva dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇa paścimā paścimā paścima uttarā uttarā uttara pūrvā adhastanī ūrdhvā ca iti devatā parigraha vaśāt ca punar eṣā eva dika daśadhā ucyate aindrī āgneyī yāmyā nairṛtī vāruṇī vāyavyā kauberī aiśānī nāgīyā brāhmī ca iti 
[I,372,ii_I,372,iii]	nanu ca yena eva pratyayena pratyakṣeṇa liṅgena vā satā dikkālau avagamyete tena eva tayoḥ bheda grahaṇāt katham eka tvam tad avagama samayaḥ eva tathā bheda pratibhāsāt uktam atra sarvatra tad pratyaya aviśeṣāt iti vyatyaya darśanāt ca yā eva ekatra pūrvā diś sā eva anyatra dakṣiṇā iti gṛhyate prāc bhāgaḥ yaḥ surāṣṭrāṇām mālavānām sa dakṣiṇaḥ iti 
[I,372,iv]	kāle api cira kṣipra ādi vibhāgaḥ ca avyavasthitaḥ eva dṛśyate yaḥ hi anāgataḥ iti parisphurati kālaḥ saḥ eva vartamānaḥ bhavati bhūtaḥ bhavati ca tatha ca ciram api śīghrībhavati śīghram api cirībhavati tasmāt tad bhedaḥ api aupādhikaḥ iti siddham samāna tantre diś kālau vaitatyena vicintitau tat na iha likhyate loke dveṣyāḥ hi bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ siddhaḥ kālaḥ cākṣuṣaḥ laiṅgikaḥ vā tad nānātvam siddham aupādhikam ca tasmāt yuktam niścikāya tri kāla grāhi iti evam sūtrakāraḥ anumānam 
[I,373,i_I,374,i]	anumāna anantaram upamānam vibhāga sūtre paṭhitam iti tad krameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam ucyate prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam atra vṛddha naiyāyikāḥ tāvat evam upamāna svarūpam ācakṣate saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratīti phalam prasiddhā itarayoḥ sārūpya pratipādakam atideśa vākyam eva upamānam gavaya arthī hi nāgarikaḥ anavagata gavaya svarūpaḥ tad abhijñam āraṇyakam pṛcchati kīdṛś gavayaḥ iti sa tam āha yādṛśaḥ gauḥ tādṛśaḥ gavayaḥ iti tat etat vākyam aprasiddhasya prasiddhena gavā sādṛśyam abhidadhat tat dvāra kama prasiddhasya gavaya saṃjñā abhidheya tvam jñāpayati iti upamānam ucyate 
[I,374,ii]	nanu śabda svabhāva tvāt asya āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti anena gata artha tvāt na idam pramāṇa antaram bhavet na ca saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pariccheda phala tvena pramāṇa antara tā vaktavyā phala vaicitryeṇa pramāṇa ānantya prasaṅgāt laukikāni hi vacanāni vaidikāni ca vidhi niṣedha bodhakāni nānā phalāni api bhavanti na śabda tām atikrāmanti ucyate yatra śabda pratyayāt eva tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt eva vā artha tathā tvam upāya antara anapekṣam avagamyate saḥ āgamaḥ eva tatas eva tad artha pratīteḥ yatra tu puruṣaḥ prati iti upāyam aparam upadiśati tatra tatas eva upāyāt tad artha avadhāraṇam upāya mātra avagame tu śabda vyāpāraḥ 
[I,375,i]	yathā para artha anumāne agni mān ayam parvataḥ dhūmavat tvāt mahān asa vat iti atra hi na puruṣa upadeśa viśvāsāt eva śailasya kṛśa anumattām pratipattā nimitta antara nirapekṣaḥ pratipadyate api tu tad avabodhaka dhūma ākhya liṅga sāmarthyāt eva tat iha yadi āṭavikaḥ nāgarikāya gavaya arthine tad avagama upāyam prasiddha sādharmyam na abhyadhāsyat tarhi tad upadeśaḥ āgamaḥ eva antarabhaviṣyat tad upadeśāt tu tatas eva tad artha avagamaḥ iti sati api śabda svabhāva tve pramāṇa antaram eva idam pratipattā api nāgarikaḥ na araṇyaka vākyāt eva tam prāṇinam gavaya śabda vācya tayā buddhyate kintu sārūpyam prasiddhena gavā tasya paśyati 
[I,375,ii]	kim āraṇyaka vākyena na saṃpratyayaḥ nāgarakasya na brūmaḥ na saṃpratyayaḥ iti kintu sārūpyam upāya antaram tad avagatau asau upadiṣṭavān iti tatas avagatiḥ bhavantī na nihnotum śakyate iti na śābdī sā pratītiḥ api tu aupamānikī iti vacanam api bhavat idam upamānam pramāṇa antaram iti yuktam bhāṣya akṣarāṇi api ca etat pakṣa sākṣya chāyām iva vadanti lakṣyante tāni tu grantha gaurava bhayāt na yojyante iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,376,i]	adyatanāḥ tu vyācakṣate śruta atideśa vākyasya pramātuḥ aprasiddhe piṇḍe prasiddha piṇḍa sārūpya jñānam indriya jam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratipatti phalam upamānam tat hīndriya janitam api dhūma jñānam iva tad agocara prameya pramiti sādhanāt pramāṇa antaram śruta atideśa vākyaḥ hi nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhraman go sadṛśam prāṇinam avagacchati tatas vanecara puruṣa kathitam yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti vacanam anusmarati smṛtvā ca pratipadyate ayam gavaya śabda vācyaḥ iti tat etat saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam tat janyam iti upamāna phalam iti ucyate 
[I,376,ii_I,377,i]	pratyakṣam tāvat etasmin viṣaye na kṛta śramam vana stha gavaya ākāra pariccheda phalam hi tat anumānam punar na atra śaṅkām api adhirohati kva liṅga liṅgi sambandhaḥ kva saṃjñā saṃjñitā matiḥ āgamāt api tad siddhiḥ na vanecara bhāṣitāt tad kālam saṃjñinaḥ na asti gavayasya hi darśanam saṃjñā saṃjñinoḥ ca paricchede sati tad sambandhaḥ suśakaḥ bhavati na anyathā atas eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā karmā iti ācakṣate 
[I,377,ii^1]	etat ākṣipati nanu nāgaraka praśnam anurudhya vanecaraḥ brūte atideśakam vākyam yathā gauḥ gavayaḥ tathā asya ayam arthaḥ yasya tvam go sādṛśyam nirīkṣase tam eva gavayam vidyāḥ sa ca ayam saṃjñinaḥ grahaḥ sambandha karaṇam ca iha viśeṣeṣu na yujyate ānantyāt kintu sāmānye tat cattham avadhāritam pratyakṣa pūrvakam saṃjñā akarmā iti na hi vaidikī codanā kim tu avacchedaḥ saṃjñinaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ sa tu pratyakṣataḥ vā astu 
[I,377,ii^2]	pramāṇa antarataḥ api vā smaryamāṇe api ca arthe asti saṅketakaraṇam kvacid yaḥ asau tatra tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ prāṇī sa ruruḥ ucyate kvacid tu kaiścid nirdiśya parokṣam upalakṣaṇaiḥ saṃjñinam vyahartāraḥ tatra saṃjñām niyuñjate danturaḥ romaśaḥ śyāmaḥ vāmanaḥ pṛthu locanaḥ yaḥ tatra cipiṭa grīvaḥ tam caitram avadhārayeḥ evam atra api gopiṇḍa sārūpyeṇa upalakṣite vācye vācaka sambandha bodhanam na eva durghaṭam atha sa upaplavā vākyāt buddhiḥ iti abhidhīyate upaplavaḥ api sambandhe na kaścid anubhūyate yaḥ tu asti gavaya ākāram prati kīdṛś asau iti saḥ api pratyakṣatas dṛṣṭe gavaye vinivartate pratyakṣa āgama siddhe arthe tasmāt māna antareṇa kim 
[I,379,i_I,380,i]	atra āhuḥ nāṭavikaraṭitāt vākyāt vispaṣṭaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha pratyayaḥ bhavitum arhati saṃjñinaḥ tadānīma pratyakṣa tvāt yadi api go sārūpya viśiṣṭa tayā tad avagamaḥ upapāditaḥ tathā api sa upaplavā eva bhavati tadānīm buddhiḥ na nirākāṅkṣatā buddhiḥ tadānīm upajāyate tad utpādana paryantaḥ śabda vyāpāraḥ iṣyate na ca asau nirvahati atra vācya saṃvitti apekṣaṇāt śabdena tad anirvāhāt na sva kāryam kṛtam bhavet sambandha pratipattiḥ ca sāmānye yadi api iṣyate tat api avidita vyakti na samyak avadhāritam gavaya ākāra vṛttiḥ ca tadānīm buddhi upaplavaḥ sambandhe api dvi adhiṣṭhāne dadhāti śyāmalām dhiyam pratyakṣa pūrvakam tasmāt saṃjñā akarmā iti gīyate kvacid tat eva pratyakṣam smṛti dvāreṇa kāraṇam pūrva dṛṣṭe kuraṅga ādau sambandhaḥ darśitaḥ yathā caitre pratyakṣa vat siddhiḥ dantura ādi viśeṣaṇaiḥ iha punar atideśa vacana samaye go sādṛśya mātra upadeśye sati api saṃjñini na nivartate eva upaplavaḥ pramāṇa antara paricchedasa apekṣaka saṃjñi rūpa upadeśāt 
[I,380,ii_I,380,iv]	yatra go sādṛśyam paśyasi iti pratyakṣāt eva tarhi saḥ upaplavaḥ viraṃsyati iti ced na pratyakṣasya indriya sannikarṣa ādi svabhāvasya saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha karaṇa asamartha tvāt pratyakṣa phalam etat tu samartham satyam iṣyate tasya eva ca vayam brūmaḥ upamāna pramāṇa tām yathā pratyakṣa phalam api dharaṇidhara kuhara bhuvi dhūma darśanam anindriya viṣaya vibhāvasu bodha sādhana tvāt anumānam evam go sārūpya viśeṣita vipina gata gavaya piṇḍa darśanam adhyakṣa phalam api tad anavagata saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha bodha vidhānāt upamānam ucyate yathā ca tatra pūrva avagata dhūma agni pratibandha smaraṇam sahakāritām upaiti tathā iha api pūrva śruta āraṇyaka vākya artha smaraṇam yathā ca tatra vyāpti velāyām anālīḍha viśeṣā buddhiḥ adhunā pakṣa dharma tā balāt viśeṣe vyavatiṣṭhate atra agniḥ iti tathā atra api anavagata vācya viśeṣāt vākyāt buddhiḥ idānīm vācya viśeṣe dṛṣṭe nirupaplavā jāyate ayam sa gavaya śabda abhidheyaḥ iti 
[I,381,i_I,381,iv]	na etāvatā anumānam eva idam iti āśaṅkanīyam anapekṣita pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka ādi sāmagrīkasya tad pratyaya utpādāt tasmāt ayam sa gavayaḥ nāma iti evaṃvidhā matiḥ upamāna eka janyā eva na pramāṇa antara udbhavā na ca eṣā na asti sandigdhā bādhyate kalpanā mātram vā iti sarvathā etasyāḥ pramiteḥ sādhanam upamānam pramāṇam iti siddham tat idam āha prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam 
[I,382,i]	prasiddha sādharmyāt iti karmadhārayaḥ tṛtīyā samāsaḥ bahu brīhiḥ vā prasiddham ca tat sādharmyam prasiddhena gavā vā sādharmyam gavayasya prasiddham vā sādharmyam yasya saḥ prasiddha sādharmyaḥ gavayaḥ tasmāt prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam sādhyaḥ saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ tasya sādhanam bodhanam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam vā sādhyam tasya sādhanam jananam iti arthaḥ evam prasiddha sādharmya jñānam upamānam phalam saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha jñānam iti uktam bhavati 
[I,382,ii_I,383,ii]	sādhya sādhana śabdena karaṇasya pramāṇa tām bravīti etat ca mantavyam sarvatra paribhāṣitam atas eva madhye likhitam idam yat ubhayatas pramāṇa lakṣaṇāni vyāpsyati iti atyanta prāya sādharmya vikalpa ādi nibandhanaḥ kṣiptaḥ sūtra kṛtā sākṣāt upamānasya viplavaḥ yena sadṛśa pratītiḥ janyate tad sādṛśyam iti kim atyanta sādṛśya ādi vikalpaiḥ 
[I,383,iii]	abhinna pratyaye hetuḥ yathā sāmānyam ucyate sadṛśa pratyaye hetuḥ tathā sādṛśyam ucyate 
[I,383,iv]	nanu upamāna lakṣaṇam asmin mokṣa śāstre kva upayujyate āgamāt tāvat ātma jñānam mokṣa sādhanam sa iti kartavya tākam avagamyate anumānāt āgama prāmāṇya niścayaḥ pratyakṣāt anumānasya vyāpti paricchedaḥ iti trayam eva upadeṣṭavyam 
[I,384,i_I,384,iii]	satyam evam upamānam api kvacid gavaya ālambha ādi codanā artha anuṣṭhāne sa upayogam anavagata gavaya svarūpe tad ālambha abhāvāt yathā mudgastambhaḥ tathā mudgaparṇī iti mudgaparṇī ādyauṣadhi parijñāne api tad upayogi bhavati sarva anugraha buddhyā ca karuṇā ārdra matiḥ muniḥ mokṣa upayoga abhāve api tasya lakṣaṇam uktavān nanu evam sati yāga auṣadha ādi upayogi anyat api bahu upadeṣṭavyam syāt na pramāṇa śāstra tvāt asya pramāṇam eva artha paricchitti sādhanam iha upadiśyate tat caturvidham eva na nyūnam adhikam vā iti nirṇītam prameyam tu mokṣa aṅgam eva upadiśyate iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,384,iv_I,385,i]	jaiminīyāḥ tu anyathā upamāna svarūpam varṇayanti yat aśruta atideśa vākyasya vane gavaya piṇḍa darśana anantaram nagaram gatam go piṇḍam anusmarate etena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam tad upamānam tasya viṣayaḥ saṃprati avagamyamāna gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭaḥ parokṣaḥ gauḥ tad vṛtti vā gavaya sādṛśyam atas eva na tat jñānam pratyakṣa janyam parokṣa gopiṇḍa viṣaya tvāt aśrutā atideśa vākyasya bhāvāt na śābdam na ca smaraṇam eva idam prameya ādhikya saṃbhavāt gavayena hi sādṛśyam na pūrvam avadhāritam bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ yadi api manmate sādṛśyam tasya tu jñaptiḥ gṛhīte pratiyogine 
[I,385,ii]	na ca anumānikam idam jñānam anapekṣita pakṣa ādi dharmakasya bhāvāt na ca gavaya gatam sārūpyam tatra liṅgam apakṣa dharma tvāt na api go gatam asiddha tvāt pratijñā artha eka deśa tvāt ca viṣāṇa ādi avayava jātam api na go gatam liṅgam idānīm vana sthasya tad grahaṇa abhāvāt agṛhītasya ca liṅga tva anupapatteḥ gavaya gatam api tad aliṅga megha pūrvavat apakṣa dharma tvāt tasmāt gavaya sādṛśya viśeṣita nagara gata parokṣa gopiṇḍa jñānam kānana vartinaḥ pramātuḥ pramāṇa antaram bhavati iti abhyupagantavyam 
[I,386,i_I,387,i]	tat idam anupapannam evaṃvidha pratīti abhāvāt prasiddhena hi sādṛśyam aprasiddhasya gamyate gavā gavaya piṇḍasya na tu yuktaḥ viparyayaḥ tathā hi aśrutā atideśakaḥ nāgarakaḥ kānane paribhramenna dṛṣṭa pūrvam go sadṛśam prāṇinam upalabhamānaḥ evam buddhyate bravīti ca aho nu gavā sadṛśaḥ eṣa kaścana prāṇī iti na tu anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti jñānam abhidhānam vā kasya cit asti iti atas pramiteḥ eva abhāvāt kim pramāṇa cintayā bhavatu vā eṣā buddhiḥ anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ iti tathā api smṛti tvāt na pramāṇa phalam 
[I,387,ii_I,387,iii]	nanu gopiṇḍa mātre satyam smṛtiḥ eva eṣā saṃprati avagata gavaya sādṛśya viśiṣṭa tvam tu tasya pūrvam anupalabdha madhunā eva gamyate iti na tasmin eṣā smṛtiḥ mā evam gavaya sādṛśyasya api tatra pūrvam grahaṇāt nanu anavagata gavayena gavi gavaya sādṛśyam avagatam iti citram na citram vyakti tiraskṛtasya grahaṇāt 
[I,387,iv]	nanu idam api citrataram gṛhītam ca vyakti tiraskṛtam ca iti vyaktiḥ hi grahaṇam eva tad tiraskāre ca na asti eva grahaṇam ucyate na etat api citrataram tathā hi vane gavayam ālokya nāgarikaḥ na kareṇum anusmarati na karabham na turaṅgam api tu viśiṣṭam eva piṇḍam na ca nirnibandhanam eva idam viśiṣṭa viṣaya smaraṇam utpattum arhati tasmāt yatra eva paridṛśyamāna piṇḍa sādṛśyam pūrvam avagatam saḥ eva piṇḍaḥ asmin dṛśyamāne smaraṇa patham avatarati na itaraḥ iti sādṛśya graṇam asaṃvedyamānam api abhyasta viṣaya avinā abhāva smṛti vat balāt parikalpyate pūrvam ca gavaya grahaṇāt vinā gavaya sadṛśī iyam gauḥ iti grāmīṇasya anubhavaḥ na bhavati iti vyakti tiraskṛtam tad sādṛśya grahaṇam ucyate iti na kiñcid citram tasmāt smṛtiḥ eva iyam tathā hi pratītiḥ anena sadṛśaḥ gauḥ mayā nagare dṛṣṭaḥ iti na tu adya etat sadṛśaḥ gauḥ dṛśyate iti buddhiḥ 
[I,388,i_I,389,i]	nanu pratiyogi grahaṇāt vinā katham grāmyasya sādṛśya grahaṇam atra bhavatā eva ātmanaḥ pratikūlam abhihitam sāmānya vat ca sādṛśyam eka ekatra samāpyate pratiyogini adṛṣṭe api tasmāt tat upalabhyate sa ca bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ agṛhītagavayavena api nāgarakeṇa grahītum śakyate atha tadā tad grahaṇe api sati na tasya sadṛśa pratyayaḥ na tarhi bhūyas avayava sāmānya yogaḥ sādṛśyam kintu sadṛśa pratyaya hetuḥ sādṛśyam yathā uktam sādṛśyam sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva bhūyas avayava sāmānya yoge ca tad lakṣaṇe citra ādau avyāptiḥ ativyāptiḥ ca prāṇi antareṣu visadṛśeṣu api tad avayava sāmānyānām khura ādīnām bhāvāt bhūyas tvam tu kiyat teṣām iti na vidmaḥ yāvatā sādṛśya pratyaya utpattiḥ iti ced tarhi sadṛśa pratyaya hetu tvam eva sādṛśyam astu iti yuktam tasmāt gavaya darśanāt pūrvam api gavyanabhi vyakta sādṛśya grahaṇa upapatteḥ smṛtiḥ eva iyam 
[I,389,ii_I,390,i]	atha matam yathā naiyāyikānām atideśa vākya velāyām sa upaplavā saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandha buddhiḥ upamānāt nirupaplavībhavati evam iyam api yaḥ asau pūrvam vyakti tiraskṛtā gavi gavaya sādṛśya buddhiḥ abhūt sā idānīm upamānāt vyaktībhaviṣyati iti na etat asti gavaya grāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa eva tad spaṣṭa tā siddheḥ yathā bhavadbhiḥ naiyāyikāḥ uktāḥ atha tu adhika tā kācid pratyakṣāt eva sā bhavet iti tathā naiyāyikāḥ api yuṣmān vakṣyanti nanu vanastha pramātuḥ gavaya viṣayam pratyakṣam katham grāma vartini gavi sādṛśya buddheḥ spaṣṭa tām ādadhīta kim kurmaḥ tad darśana anantaram su spaṣṭa tad sādṛśya viśiṣṭa gopiṇḍa smaraṇāt 
[I,390,ii]	nanu atas eva idam upamānam pramāṇa antaram ucyate pratyakṣasya sannihita gavaya sva rūpa mātra niṣṭha tvāt parokṣe ca gavi gavaya sādṛśya pratyayasya vispaṣṭasya anyatas asiddheḥ iti uktam atra smṛtiḥ eva iyam tathā avabhāsanāt anadhigata artha grāhi ca pramāṇam upagacchanti bhavantaḥ 
[I,390,iii]	bhavatu vā smṛti vilakṣaṇā iyam pratītiḥ tathā api anumāna janya tvāt na pramāṇa antaram āviśati smaryamāṇaḥ gauḥ dharmī etat sadṛśaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ etad avayava sāmānya yogi tvāt sannihita dvitīya gavaya piṇḍa vat tad asannidhāne sāmānyena vyāptiḥ darśayitavyā yatra yat avayava sāmānya yogi tvam tatra tad sādṛśyam yathā yamayoḥ iti viśiṣṭasya tad yogasya hetu tva at na anaikāntika tvam sāmānya yogaḥ anyaḥ anyat ca sādṛśyam iti ukta tvāt na pratijñā artha eka deśaḥ hetuḥ avyutpannasya nārikela dvīpa vāsinaḥ bālasya vā tad pratyaya anutpādāt na vyāptinaiḥ apekṣyeṇa sā pratītiḥ iti vaktavyam tasmāt ittham anumāna janya tvāt smṛti tvāt vā pūrva uktāt asaṃbhavāt eva vā na iyam avagatiḥ upamāna kāryā iti siddham 
[I,391,i]	kaḥ ca asya bhavat upamānasya svatantra upayogaḥ evam hi āhuḥ bhavantaḥ aparīkṣā āmiṣeṇa api lakṣaṇāni vadan ayam na svatantra upayogi tva nirapekṣāṇi jalpati 
[I,392,i]	nanu uktaḥ eva upayogaḥ saurye carau dravya devatā sā rūpyāt āgneya vidhi anta lābhaḥ āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa iti kartavyatā kalāpatayā nirākāṅkṣaḥ vidhiḥ sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti atra pradhāna mātra upadeśāt vidhi ādiḥ asti na tu vidhyantaḥ itikartavya tā abhidhānam na ca anitikartavya tākam karma prayoga yogyam atas kim iyam itikartavyatā jātam iha gṛhyatām iti apekṣāyām caru puroḍāśayoḥ brīhi ādi auṣadha sādhya tvena dravya sādṛśyāt sūrya agnyoḥ ca tejasvitayā devatayoḥ sārūpyāt āgneya iti kartavyatā saurye kriyate iti upamānāt gamyate 
[I,392,ii]	api ca kvacid codita dravya ādau alabhyamāne pratinidhi upādānena karma samāpanāt pratinidhi mātra upādāne prāpte brīhi sadṛśa nī vāra upādānam upamānāt pratīyate iti tat āha bhinna anumānāt upameya muktā saurya ādi vākyaiḥ na sahāyi dṛṣṭam sādṛśyataḥ agni ādi yutam katham nu pratyāyayet iti upayujyate naḥ pratinidhiḥ api ca evam brīhi sādṛśya yogāt bhavati tad apacāre yatra nīvāra jātau tat api phalam abhīṣṭam lakṣaṇasya upamāyāḥ prakṛtiḥ api ca gauṇaiḥ bādhyate yatra ca anyaiḥ 
[I,393,i_I,393,ii]	tat etat asamañjasam prasiddhena aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam avagamyate iti eṣa bhavadbhiḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ panthāḥ viparyayaḥ tu āśritaḥ yat api adṛṣṭena nūtanena aprasiddhena gavayena vākya siddhasya goḥ sādṛśyam upamānāt pratīyate iti tat iha api nirjñāta iti kartavya tākena go vat prasiddhena āgneyena sauryasya gavaya vat aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam avagamyate na tu gavayena goḥ sauryeṇa āgneyasya tat iha yasya vidhi anta arthitā na tatra upamānāt sādṛśya avagamaḥ yatra vā tad avagamaḥ na tatra iti kartavyatā arthi tvam 
[I,394,i]	nanu saurye vidhyanta arthini pratīyamāne dravya devatā sārūpya ādeḥ āgneyaḥ smaraṇa patham avatarati iti tatas eva asau vidhyantam adhigacchati iti evam api smaraṇa mātrāt siddhe arthe kim upamānena āgneya smaraṇāt eva tad itikartavya tā saurye upādāsyate smṛti viśeṣaḥ eva viṣaya ādhikyāt upamānam ucyate iti ced prativihitam etat iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,394,ii]	kiñca upamāna pratipādita arthaḥ na codanā lakṣaṇa tām bibharti tasmāt na yujyeta tatas adhigantum āgneya vidhi anta viśeṣa lābhaḥ pratinidhiḥ api ca evam na asti nīvāra jāteḥ na hi bhavat upamānāt brīhi sādṛśya buddhiḥ bhavati tu matiḥ eṣā brīhayaḥ tad sadṛkṣāḥ iti na ca phalam asyāḥ kiñcid asti pratīteḥ 
[I,395,i]	bhavati aṅgam yāge kvacana gavaya ālambha nam atas tad ākāra jñāne pratinidhi viveke ca kṛtinām upāya tvam yuṣmad kathitam upamānam na bhajate parigrāhyam tasmāt pravara muni gītam sumatibhiḥ 
[I,396,i_I,396,ii]	upamāna anantaram śabdasya vibhāga sūtre nirdeśāt tasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha āpta upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti ucyamāne paryāya mātra uccāraṇāt akārake śabda mātre pramāṇyaprasaktiḥ iti tad vinivṛttaye pūrva sūtrāt sādhya sādhana padam ākṛṣyate tathā api śabda antara janake prasaktiḥ iti pratyakṣa sūtrāt jñāna padasya smṛti janakasya vyavaccheda artham ca artha grahaṇasya saṃśaya viparyaya janaka nirākaraṇāya ca vyavasāya ātmaka avyabhicāri padayoḥ anuvṛttiḥ iti evam avyabhicāra ādi viśeṣaṇa artha pratīti janakaḥ upadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti uktam bhavati 
[I,396,iii]	tat evaṃparyāyam eva upadeśa śabdam śabda lakṣaṇam apekṣita pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa padam kecid vyācakṣate āpta grahaṇam ca lakṣaṇa niścaya artham āhuḥ ghrāṇa rasana tvac cakṣuḥ śrotrāṇi indriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ iti atra bhūta grahaṇam vakṣyate evam hi aitihyasya na pramāṇa antara tā bhaviṣyati upadeśa rūpa tva aviśeṣāt iti 
[I,397,i]	anye tu bruvate yuktam upadeśa padam eva śabda lakṣaṇam yuktam ca tad niścaya artham āpta grahaṇam pūrva sūtra upātta viśeṣaṇa pada anuvṛttiḥ tu na upayujyate sāmānya lakṣaṇa anantaram viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prakramāt sāmānya lakṣaṇena ca smṛti ādi janaka sakala pramāṇa ābhāsa vyudāse kṛte sajātīya pratyakṣa ādi vyadacchedaḥ eva kevalam idānīm vaktavyaḥ tatra ca paryāyatayā paryāptam upadeśa padam eva buddhi ādi pada vat iti kim viśeṣaṇa anuvṛtti kleśena iti 
[I,397,ii]	aparaḥ āha anavalambita sāmānya lakṣaṇa anusaraṇa dainyam anadhyā hṛta prāktana viśeṣaṇa padam āpta upadeśaḥ śabda lakṣaṇam na ca ākārakeṇa śabda antara kāriṇā vā smṛti janakena vā saṃśaya ādhāyinā vā śabdena kiñcid upadiśyate iti nirvacana savyapekṣāt upadeśa grahaṇāt eva tad nivṛttiḥ siddhā mithyā upadeśe tu rathyā puruṣa ādi vacasi viparīta pratīti kāriṇi prasaṅgaḥ na nivartate iti tad pratikṣepa artham āpta grahaṇam aitihye yathārtha pratīti hetau āpta anumānāt na pramāṇa antara tvam iti tasmāt yathāśrutam eva sūtram śabda lakṣaṇa artham yuktam 
[I,398,i_I,398,ii]	bhavatu evam upadiśyate iti kaḥ arthaḥ abhidhāna kriyā kriyate kā iyam abhidhāna kriyā nāma pratītiḥ iti ced cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ sva avagati pūrvikā pratītiḥ iti ced dhūma ādeḥ api upadeśatā prasaṅgaḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ api tad karaṇa tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ sva sādṛśyena pratītiḥ iti ced bimbasya api pāda ādi anumitau upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabde ca tad abhāvāt anupadeśa tvam syāt śabda avacchinnā pratītiḥ iti ced śrotrasya tad janaka tvāt upadeśa tva prasaṅgaḥ śabdasya ca sva avacchedena pratīti janakatva niṣedhāt anupadeśa tvaṃbhavet na api śabda karaṇikā pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā vivakṣāyām ākāśa anumāne vā tasya upadeśa tva prasaṅgāḥ diti abhidhāna kriyā svarūpā niścayāt na tasyāḥ karaṇam upadeśaḥ 
[I,399,i]	ucyate śrotra grāhya vastu karaṇikā tad artha pratītiḥ abhidhāna kriyā ittham loke vyavahārāt uktaḥ abhihitaḥ ca saḥ eva arthaḥ loke vyapadiśyate yaḥ tu tathāvidha pratīti viṣaya tām pratipannaḥ śrotra grāhyasya varṇa rāśeḥ eva artha pratīti karaṇa tvāt na tu śrotra pratyaya viṣayaḥ sphoṭa tmā śabdaḥ śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe śabda śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ varṇāḥ eva ca śrotra grahaṇāḥ yatas artha pratītiḥ sa śabdaḥ iti tu ucyamāne dhūma ādiḥ api śabdaḥ syāt agṛhīta sambandhaḥ ca śabdaḥ śabda tvam jahyāt artha pratipatteḥ akaraṇāt 
[I,399,ii]	nanu pratīteḥ saṃvid ātmaka tvāt na abhidhānakriyā nāma kācid apūrvā saṃvid anyā vidyate tad karaṇasya ca upadeśa tāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ iti uktam satyam saṃvid ātmā eva sarvatra pratītiḥ sā cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇikā pratyakṣa phalam liṅga karaṇikā anumāna phalam śrotra grāhya karaṇikā śabda phalam na hi dṛśyate anumīyate abhidhīyate iti paryāya śabdāḥ tad pratīti viśeṣa janane ca śabdasya upadeśa tvam ucyate ākāśa anumāna vivakṣa ādau tu tasya liṅga tvam eva iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,399,iii_I,400,ii]	āptaḥ bhāṣya kṛtā vyākhyātaḥ āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛta dharmā yathādṛṣṭasya arthasya cikhyā payiṣā prayuktaḥ upadeṣṭā ca iti dharmaḥ iti upadeṣṭavyaḥ kaścid arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sākṣātkaraṇam etasya yathārtham upalambhanam na tu pratyakṣeṇa eva grahaṇam iti niyamaḥ anumāna ādi niścita artha upadeśinaḥ api āpta tvānapāyāt 
[I,400,iii_I,400,v]	cikhya apayiṣayā yuktaḥ iti uktā vīta rāga tā upadeṣṭa iti anena uktam pratipādana kauśalam vīta rāgaḥ api mūka ādiḥ upadeṣṭum aśaktaḥ kim kuryāt vaktum śaktaḥ api sākṣātkṛta dharmā api avīta rāgaḥ na vakti tūṣṇīm āste iti tasya ca pratipādye arthe vīta rāga tvam iṣyate sarvathā vīta rāgaḥ tu puruṣaḥ kutra labhyate ṛṣyāri alma iccha sāmānyam vaktavyam ca āpta lakṣaṇam evam hi loke api āpta uktyā vyavahāraḥ na naṅkṣyati 
[I,400,vi_I,401,i]	ye api āptim doṣa kṣayam ācakṣate taiḥ api doṣa kṣayaḥ pratipādya artheṣu eva varṇanīyaḥ anyathā līke dṛśyamānasya āptokti nibandhanasya vyavahārasya nihnavaḥ syāt athavā veda prāmāṇya siddhi artha tvāt śāstrasya tad praṇetuḥ āptasya īśvarasya yathāśrutam eva idam lakṣaṇam sa sākṣātkṛta dharmā eva dharmasya īśvara pratyakṣa gocara tvāt 
[I,401,ii]	cikhyā payiṣā prayuktaḥ iti kāruṇikaḥ eva bhagavān iti vakṣyate upadeṣṭā ca veda ādi āgamānām tad praṇīta tvasya samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt 
[I,401,iii_I,401,iv^1]	āha āstām tāvat etat idam tu cintyatām kimartham idam punar śabdasya pṛthak lakṣaṇam upadiśyate śabdasya khalu paśyāmaḥ na anumānāt vibhinnatām atas tad lakṣaṇa ākṣepāt na vācyam lakṣaṇa antaram parokṣa viṣaya tvam hi tulyam tāvat dvayoḥ api sāmānya viṣaya tvam ca sambandha apekṣaṇāt dvayoḥ agṛhīte api sambandhe na ekasya api pravartanam sambandhaḥ ca viśeṣāṇām ānantyāt ati durgamaḥ yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ anumīyate tathā eva śabdam ākarṇya tad arthaḥ api avagamyate anvaya vyatirekau ca bhavataḥ atra api liṅga vat yaḥ yatra dṛśyate śabdaḥ sa tasya arthasya vācakaḥ pakṣa dharma tvam api asti śabdaḥ eva yatas arthavān prakalpayiṣyate pakṣaḥ dhūmaḥ dahanavān iva tatra dhūma tva sāmānyam yathā vahati hetu tām go tva ādi śabda sāmāni aṃtadvat atra apivakṣyati evam viṣaya sāmagrīsābhyāt eka tva niścaye na vilakṣaṇa tā mātram kiñcid anya tva kāraṇam pūrva varṇa krama udbhūta saṃskāra sahakāritā puruṣa apekṣa vṛtti tvam vivakṣā anusṛti kramaḥ ityādinā viśeṣeṇa na pramāṇa antaram bhavet kārya kāraṇa dharma ādi viśeṣaḥ atra api na asti kim 
[I,401,iv^2]	 yathā iṣṭa viniyojya tvam api na anyatva kāraṇam hasta saṃjñā ādi liṅge api tathā abhāvasya darśanāt dṛṣṭānta nirapekṣat tvam abhyaste viṣaye samam anabhyaste tu sambandha smṛti sāpekṣa tā dvayoḥ aneka pratibhā utpatti hetu tvam api vidyate aspaṣṭa liṅge kasmiṃścid aśvaḥ ityādi śabda vat sphuṭa artha an avasāyāḥ ca pramāṇa ābhāsataḥ yathā liṅge tathā eva śabde api nānā artha bhrama kāriṇi api ca pratibhā mātre śabdāt jāte api kutracid āpta vāda tva liṅgena janyate niścitā matiḥ 
[I,403,i]	atas eva hi manyante śabdasya api vipaścitaḥ āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tām 
[I,404,i]	kiñca śabdaḥ vivakṣāyām eva prāmāṇyam aśnute na bāhyeḥ vyabhicāri tvāt tasyām ca etasya liṅgatā 
[I,404,ii_I,404,iii]	tatra abhidhīyate dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ pada ātmā vākya ātmā ca iti tatra vākyam anavagata sambandham eva vākya artham avagamayitum alam abhinava viracita śloka śravaṇe sati pada saṃskṛta matīnām tad artha avagama darśanāt atas sambadha adhigama mūla pravṛttinā anumānena tasya katham sāmya saṃbhāvanā padasya tu sambandha adhigama sāpekṣa tve sati api sāmagrī bhedāt viṣaya bhedāt ca anumānāt bhinnat tvam viṣayaḥ tāvat visadṛśaḥ eva pada liṅgayoḥ tadvat mātram padasya arthaḥ iti ca sthāpayiṣyate anumānam tu vākya artha viṣayam atra agniḥ agnimān parvataḥ iti tatas pratipatteḥ uktam ca tatra dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti 
[I,405,i_I,405,ii]	nanu padāni api vākya artha vṛttīni santi gomān aupagavaḥ kumbhakāraḥ iti satyam kintu teṣu api sā kāṅkṣatā asti eva pada antaram antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya anutpādāt gomān kaḥ iti ākāṅkṣāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ api ca parvata ādi viśeṣya pratipatti pūrvikā pāvaka ādi viśeṣaṇa avagatiḥ liṅgāt udeti padāt tu viśeṣaṇa avagati pūrvikā viśeṣya avagatiḥ iti viṣaya bhedaḥ 
[I,405,iii]	nanu uktam yathā anumāne dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ evam iha artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ bhavatu mā evam śabdasya hetu tvāt na ca hetuḥ eva pakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,405,iv]	nanu yathā agni mānayam dhūmaḥ dhūma tvāt mahān asa dhūma vat iti uktam sā deśasya agni yuktasya dhūmasya anyaiḥ ca kalpitāḥ iti evam go śabdaḥ eva arthavat tvena sādhyatām go śabda tvāt ityādi sāmānyam ca hetūkriyatām iti etat api durghaṭam śabdasya dharmiṇaḥ kim artha viśiṣṭa tvam vā sādhyate pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭa tvam vā artha pratīti viśiṣṭa tvam vā 
[I,406,i_I,406,ii]	na tāvat artha viśiṣṭa tvam sādhyam śaila jvalanayoḥ iva śabda arthayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt atha artha viṣaya tvāt śabdasya artha viśiṣṭa tā iti ucyate tat api ayuktam tad pratīti jananam antareṇa tad viṣaya tva anupapatteḥ pratītau tu siddhāyām kim tad viṣaya tva dvārakeṇa tad dharma tvena yadi tu tad viṣaya tva mūlā tad dharma tva pūrvikā artha pratītiḥ artha pratīti mūlam tat viṣaya tvam tad itaretara āśrayam tasmāt na artha viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sādhyaḥ 
[I,406,iii_I,407,i]	na api artha pratyāyana śakti viśiṣṭaḥ tad arthi tayā śabda prayoga abhāvāt na śakti siddhaye śabdaḥ kathyate śrūyate api vā artha gati artham eva amum śṛṇvanti ca vadanti ca na api artha pratīti viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣatām anubhavitum arhati siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ asiddhayā api tadvat tvam śabdasya artha dhiyā katham siddhāyām tad pratītau vā kim anyat anumīyate jvalana ādau api tulyaḥ vikalpaḥ iti ced na hi tatra agniḥ dhūmena janyate api tu gamyate iyam tu arthapratītiḥ janyate śabdena iti asyām eva siddha asiddhatva vikalpa avasaraḥ tasmāt tridhā api na śabdasya pakṣa tvam 
[I,407,ii]	api ca go śabde dharmiṇi gatvā ādi sāmānya ātmakasya hetoḥ grahaṇam tatas vyāpti smaraṇam tatas parāmarśaḥ tatas artha pratipattiḥ iti kāla drāghīyaḥ tvāt dharmī tirohitaḥ bhavet na parvata vat avasthitiḥ tasya api tu uccarita pradhvaṃsi tvam śabdasya na ca śabdam arthavat tvena lokaḥ pratipadyate kintu śabdāt pṛthak eva artham iti na sarvathā śabdaḥ pakṣaḥ atas dharma viśiṣṭasya dharmiṇaḥ sādhyasya īt vā asaṃbhavāt śabda liṅgayoḥ mahān viṣaya bhedaḥ 
[I,407,iii]	sāmagrī bhedaḥ khalu api pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi rūpa sāpekṣam anumānam vyākhyātam śabde tu na tāni santi rūpāṇi tathā ca śabdasya pakṣatva pratikṣepāt na tad dharma tayā gatvā ādi sāmānyasya liṅgatā na ca arthasya dharmi tvam siddhi asiddhi vikalpa anupapatteḥ na ca tad dharma tvam śabdasya śakyate vaktum tatra vṛtti abhāvāt pratīti janaka tvena tad dharma tāyām ucyamānāyām pūrvavat itaretara āśrayaḥ pakṣa dharma ādi valena pratītiḥ pratītau ca satyām pakṣa dharma ādi rūpa lābhaḥ 
[I,408,i]	api ca yadi artha dharma tayā śabdasya pakṣa dharma tvam bhavet tadā anavagata dhūma agni sambandhaḥ api yathā dhūmasya parvata dharma tām gṛhṇāti eva tathā anavagata śabda artha sambandhaḥ api artha dharma tām śabdasya gṛhṇīyāt na ca gṛhṇāti iti atas na asti pakṣa dharma tvam śabdasya iti 
[I,408,ii_I,408,iii]	anvaya vyatirekau api tasya durupapādau deśe kāle ca śabda arthayoḥ anugama abhāvāt na hi yatra deśe śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ yathā uktam śrotriyaiḥ mukhe hi śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau artham iti vayam tu karṇa ākāśe śrotram upalabhāmahe iti āḥ tām etat na api yatra kāle śabdaḥ tatra arthaḥ idānīm yudhiṣṭhira artha abhāve api yudhiṣṭhira śabda sadbhāvāt artha śabda arthayoḥ anvaya abhāve api tat buddhyoḥ anvayaḥ grahīṣyate iti ucyate tarhi vaktavyam kim artha buddhau utpannāyām anvayaḥ gṛhyate anutpannāyām vā anutpannāyām tāvat sva rūpa asattvāt kutas anvaya grahaṇam utpannāyām tu artha buddhau kimanvaya grahaṇena iti naiṣphalyam tad pūrvaka tve tu pūrvavat itaretara āśrayam etena vyatireka grahaṇam api vyākhyātam 
[I,409,i_I,409,ii]	nanu āvāpa udvāpa dvāreṇa śabda artha sambandhe niścīyamāne upayujyete eva anvaya vyatirekau yathā uktam yatra yaḥ anveti yam śabdam arthaḥ tasya bhavet asau iti satyam etat kintu samaya balena siddhāyām artha buddhau samaya niyama artha ābanvaya vyatirekau śabde na anvaya vyatireka kṛtā ca dhūma ādeḥ iva agneḥ tatas artha buddhiḥ api ca dhūma ādibhyaḥ pratītiḥ ca na eva avagati pūrvikā iha avagati pūrvā eva śabdāt utpadyate matiḥ sthavira vyavahāre hi bālaḥ śabdāt kutaścana dṛṣṭvā artham avagacchan tam svayam api avagacchati 
[I,410,i]	yatra api evam samayaḥ kriyate etasmāt śabdāt ayam arthaḥ tvayā pratipattavyaḥ iti tatra api pratītiḥ eva kāraṇa tvena nirdiṣṭā draṣṭavyā tasmāt anyaḥ liṅga liṅginā uḥ avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ anyaḥ ca śabda arthayoḥ samayā apara nāmā vācya vācaka bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ prati iti aṅgam evaṃvidha viṣaya bhedāt sāmagrī bhedāt ca pratyakṣa vat anumānāt anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham 
[I,410,ii]	yat tu pūrva varṇa krama apekṣaṇa ādi vailakṣaṇyam āśaṅkya dūrṣitam kaḥ tatra phalgu prāye nirbandhaḥ 
[I,411,i_I,411,ii]	yat punar abhihitam āpta vāda avisaṃvāda sāmānyāt anumāna tā iti tat atīva subhāṣitam viṣaya bhedāt āpta vāda tva hetunā hi śabda artha buddheḥ prāmāṇyam sādhyate na tu sā eva janyate yat āha anyat eva hi satya tvam āpta vāda tva hetukam vākya arthaḥ ca anyaḥ eva iha jñātaḥ pūrvataram ca saḥ tatas ced āpta vādena satya tvam anumīyate vākya artha pratyayasya atra katham syāt anumāna tā janma tulyam hi buddhīnām āpta an āpta girām śrutau janma adhika upayogī ca na anumāyām tri lakṣaṇaḥ iti na ca prāmāṇya niścayāt vinā pratibhā mātram tat iti vaktavyam śabda artha saṃpratyayasya anubhava siddha tvāt 
[I,412,i_I,412,ii]	etena vivakṣā viṣaya tvam api pratyuktam na hi vivakṣā nāma śabdasya vācyaḥ viṣayaḥ kintu arthaḥ eva tathā vivakṣāyām hi śabdasya liṅga tvam iha dṛśyate ākāśaḥ iva kāryatvāt na vācaka tayā punar śabdāt uccaritāt ca vācya viṣayā tāvat samutpadyate saṃvittiḥ tad anantaram tu gamayet kāmam vivakṣām asau artha upagraha varjitāt tu niyamāt siddhā evam ājīva tā tad vācya artha viśeṣitā tu avidite na eṣā tad arthe bhavet 
[I,412,iii]	nanu siddhe pramāṇat tve bheda abheda parīkṣaṇam kriyate na tu śabdasya prāmāṇyam avakalpate 
[I,412,iv]	artha pratīti janakam pramāṇam iti varṇitam vikalpa mātra mūla tvāt na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī 
[I,413,i]	arthaḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ ca kaḥ vā śabdasya śakyate vaktum na jātiḥ na vyaktiḥ na tadvān nāma kaścana 
[I,413,ii]	sambandhaḥ api asya na arthena nityaḥ asti samayaḥ astha vā śakyaḥ san api vā boddhum arthe katham atīndriye 
[I,413,iii]	vākya arthaḥ api na nirṇetum pāryate pāramārthikaḥ niyoga bhāva nā bheda saṃsarga ādi svabhāvakaḥ tad prati iti abhyupāyaḥ ca kim padārthaḥ padāni vā vākyam vā vyatiṣakta artham sphoṭaḥ vā iti na lakṣyate siddhāyām api tad buddhau tasyāḥ draḍhima kāraṇam nitya tvam āpta ukta tvam vā na samyak avatiṣṭhate 
[I,414,i]	pade nitye api vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ nityā vā kṛtaka tve api kṛtāḥ kena iti durgamam kartā asti sa ca nirdvandvaḥ sa ca ekaḥ sa ca sarva vid sa ca kāruṇikaḥ vā iti pratipattum na śakyate
