[I,414,ii]	paraspara viruddhāḥ ca santi bhṛyāṃsaḥ āgamāḥ teṣām kasya īśvaraḥ kartā kasya na iti na manmahe vede doṣāḥ ca vidyante vyāghātaḥ punarukta tā phalasya anupalaṃbhaḥ ca tathā phala viparyayaḥ kīdṛśaḥ ca artha vādānām viruddha artha abhidhāyinām mantrāṇām nāmadheya ādi padānām vā samanvayaḥ 
[I,414,iii]	siddha kārya upadeśāt ca vede saṃśerate janāḥ kim asya kārye prāmāṇyam siddhe arthe vā ubhayatra vā tena veda pramāṇa tvam viṣame pathi vartate jīvikā upāya buddhyā vā śraddhayā vā abhyupeyatām 
[I,415,i]	atra āmidhīyate sarve eva ete doṣāḥ yathākramam parihariṣyante iti alabha samāśvāsena su pratiṣṭham eva veda prāmāṇyam avagacchatu āyuṣmān 
[I,415,ii]	nanu artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva tāvat katham parihriyate na hi bāhye arthe śabdāḥ pratītim ādadhati te hi durlabha vastu saṃparka vikalpa mātra adhīna janmānaḥ sva mahimānam anuvartamānāḥ tiraskṛta vāhya artha samanvayān vikalpa prāyān pratyayān utpādayantaḥ dṛśyante aṅguli agre hasti yūtha śatamāḥ te iti iti svabhāvaḥ eva śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvam 
[I,415,iii]	cakṣuḥ ādīnām api alīka kaca kūrcaka ādi pratīti kāraṇa tvam asti na ca teṣām artha asaṃsparśitvam iti ced na teṣāṃhi timira ādi doṣa kaluṣita vapuṣām tathāvidha vibhrama kāraṇa tvam na tu sva mahimnā eva iha api puruṣa doṣāṇām eṣa mahimā na śabdānām iti ced mā evam doṣavataḥ api puruṣasya mūka ādeḥ anuccārita śabdasya īdṛśa viplava utpādana pāṭava abhāvāt asati api ca puruṣa hṛdaya kāluṣye yathā prayujyamānāni aṅgulī agra ādi vākyāni viplavam āvahanti eva iti śabdānām eva eṣa svabhāvaḥ na vaktṛ doṣāṇām 
[I,416,i]	api ca na cakṣuḥ ādi bādhaka jñāna udaye sati na viramati viparīta vedana janmanaḥ śuktikāra jata ādi buddhiṣu vibhramasya apāya darśanāt śabdaḥ tu śata kṛtvas api bādhyamānaḥ yathā eva uccaritaḥ karaśākhā śikhare kareṇu śatam āste iti tathā eva tathābhūtam bhūyas api vikalpam ayathārtham utpādayati eva iti vikalpa adhīna janma tvāt śabdānām eva idam rūpam yat artha asaṃsparśi tvam nāma iti tat uktam vikalpa yonayaḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ śabda yonayaḥ teṣām anyonya sambandhe na artham śabdāḥ spṛśanti amī iti
[I,416,ii_I,416,iii]	atra abhidhīyate bhavet etat evam yadi na kadācid api yathārtham śabdaḥ pratyayam upajanayet artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva asya svabhāvaḥ iti gamyeta bhavati tu guṇavat puruṣa bhāṣitāt nadyāḥ tīre phalāni santi iti vākyāt atiraskṛta bāhya arthaḥ yathārthaḥ pratyayaḥ tatas pravṛttasya tad artha prāpteḥ na ca iyam artha prāptiḥ artha sparśa śūnyāt api śabda vikalpāt pāraṃparyeṇa maṇi prabhā maṇi buddhi vat avakalpate iti upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ nanu guṇavat vaktṛkāt aṅgulī ādi vākyāt dṛṣṭaḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ maitram guṇavatām evaṃvidha vākya uccāraṇa capala abhāvāt 
[I,417,i]	yat tu āptaḥ api kam cit anuśāsti mā bhavān abhūta artham vākyam vādīḥ aṅguli koṭau kari ghaṭā śatam āste iti iti tatra iti karaṇa avacchinnasya dṛṣṭānta tayā śabda paratvena upādānāt pratiṣedha eka vākya tayā yathārtham eva artha paratve tu niṣedhaka vākya tā eva na syāt iti tasmāt āpta vākyānām ayathārtha tva abhāvāt na svatas artha asaṃspārśinaḥ śabdāḥ puruṣa doṣa anuṣaṅga kṛtaḥ eva āyām viplavaḥ 
[I,417,ii]	nanu āptaiḥ evaṃvidha vākya aprayoge api sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ kim śabdānām tad ṛśa svabhāva abhāvāt ayathārtha pratyaya anutpādaḥ uta vaktṛ doṣa abhāvāt iti na etat evam anuccarita śabdaḥ api puruṣaḥ vipralaṃbhakaḥ hasta saṃjñā ādi upāyena janayati eva viplavam 
[I,417,iii]	na ca hasta saṃjñā ādinā śabda anumānam tad kṛtaḥ ca viplavaḥ iti vaktavyam ittham apratīteḥ utpanne ca kvacid nadyādi vākyāt vijñāne taraṅgiṇī tīram anusaran ana āsādita phalaḥ pravṛtta bādhaka pratyayaḥ puruṣam evāṣikṣipati dhik hā tena durātmanā vipralabdhaḥ asmi iti na śabdam prāptaphalaḥ ca pumāṃsam eva ślāghate sādhu sādhunā tena upadiṣṭam iti atas puruṣa doṣa anvaya anuvidhānāt puruṣa doṣa kṛtaḥ eva śabdāt viplavaḥ na svarūpa nibandhanaḥ tad abhāva kṛtaḥ eva āpteṣu tūṣṇī mātīneṣu vibhramānutpādaḥ iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ 
[I,418,i_I,418,ii]	nanu puruṣa doṣāḥ tatra kim kuryuḥ puruṣasya hi guṇavataḥ doṣavataḥ vā śabda uccāraṇa mātraḥ eva vyāpāraḥ tatas param tu kāryam śabda āyattam eva iti tad svarūpa kṛtaḥ eva ayam vibhramaḥ hanta tarhi vaktari guṇavati sati saritaḥ tīre phalāni santi iti samyak pratyaye api śabdasya eva vyāpārāt puruṣasya uccāraṇa mātre caritārtha tvāt na ekāḥ tatas śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva svabhāvaḥ yuktaṃca etat eva yat dīpa vat prakāśa tva mātram eva śabdasya svarūpam na yathārtha tvam ayathārtha tvam vā viparīte api arthe dīpasya prakāśa tva anativṛtteḥ ayam tu viśeṣaḥ pradīpe vyutpatti nirapekṣam eva prakāśa tvam śabdasya tu vyutpatti apekṣam iti prakāśa ātmanaḥ tu śabdasya vaktṛ guṇa doṣa adhīne yathārtha itara tve atas eva aṅguli śikhara adhikaraṇa kareṇu śata vacasi bādhite api punar punar uccāryamāṇe bhavati vibhramaḥ prakāśa tva rūpa anapāyāt na tu eṣa śabdasya doṣaḥ 
[I,419,i_I,419,ii]	padārthānām tu saṃsargam asamīkṣya prajalpataḥ vaktuḥ eva pramādaḥ ayam na śabdaḥ atra aparādhyati tat uktam pramāṇa antara darśanam atra bādhyate na punar hasti yūtha śatam iti śābdaḥ anvayaḥ puruṣaḥ hi sva darśanam śabdena pareṣām prakāśayati tatra tad darśanam ce dduṣṭam duṣṭaḥ śābda pratyayaḥ aduṣṭam ced aduṣṭaḥ iti guṇavataḥ puruṣasya aduṣṭam darśanam bhavati doṣavataḥ duṣṭam iti adṛṣṭvā api vastu yat upadiśyate saḥ api buddhi doṣaḥ eva tasmāt puruṣa gata guṇa doṣa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad kṛte eva śabda yathārtha tva ayatha artha tve tat uktam tattvam api bhavati vitatham api bhavati iti 
[I,419,iii]	tena abhidhātṛ daurātmya kṛtā iyam ayathārtha tā pratyayasya iti śabdānām na artha asaṃsparśitā svatas yā tu jāti ādi śabda artha parākaraṇa vartmanā artha asaṃsparśitā proktā sā purastāt niṣetsyate 
[I,419,iv]	pramāṇa tvam tu śabdasya katham iti atra vastuni jaiminīyaiḥ ayam tāvat pīṭha bandhaḥ vidhīyate prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā sarva vijñāna gocaraḥ svatas vā paratas vā iti prathamam pradhivicyatām 
[I,420,i_I,420,ii]	nanu śabda prāmāṇya cintā avasare sakala pramāṇa prāmāṇya vicārasya kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ na svātantryeṇa parīkṣaṇam api tu tad artham eva samāna mārga tvāt yathā anyeṣām svatas paratas vā prāmāṇyam tathā śabdasya api bhaviṣyati iti na hi tasya svarūpam iva prāmāṇyam api tad visadṛśam iti tat ucyate kim vijñānānām prāmāṇya prāmāṇyam ca iti dvayam api svatas uta tat ubhayam api paratas āhosvit aprāmāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam tu paratas uta svid prāmāṇyam svatas aprāmāṇyam tu paratas iti 
[I,420,iii_I,421,i]	tatra dvayam api svatas iti tāvat asāṃpratam pravṛttasya visaṃvāda darśanāt yadi hi prāmāṇyam itarat vā svatas eva jñānasya gamyeta tarhi śuktau rajata jñānam pramāṇa tayā vā pratipannam anyathā vā pramāṇa tva paricchitta auviṣaṃvadati tat katham aprāmāṇya gṛhītauvā tasmin kasmāt pravartate 
[I,421,ii]	etena tṛtīyaḥ api pakṣaḥ pratyuktaḥ yat apramāṇyam svatas prāmāṇyam tu paratas iti svatas hi aprāmāṇye niścite pravṛttiḥ na prāpnoti iti kiñca aprāmāṇyam utpattau karaṇa doṣa apekṣam niścaye bādhaka jñāna apekṣam tat katham svatobhavitum arhati 
[I,421,iii]	yat ca aprāmāṇyam avastu tvāt na syāt kāraṇa doṣataḥ iti kaiścid ucyate tat api yat kiñcit saṃśaya viparyaya ātmanaḥ apramāṇasya vastu tvāt tad gatam aprāmāṇyam api vastu eva iti paratas tu prāmāṇyam yathā na avakalpate tathā vistareṇa ucyate 
[I,421,iv_I,421,v]	evañcāyam dvayam api paratas iti dvitīya pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ api bhaviṣyati artha tathā tva prakāśakam hi pramāṇam iti uktam tasya svaprameya avyabhicāri tvam nāma prāmāṇyam atas ca para apekṣāyām satyām hi paratas iti kathayitum ucitam na ca asya para apekṣā kvacid vidyate sā hi bhavantī utpattau vā syāt sva kārya karaṇe vā prāmāṇya niścaye vā utpattau kāraka svarūpa mātra apekṣā tad atirikta tad gata guṇa apekṣā vā kāraka svarūpa mātra apekṣāyām siddha sādhya tvam asatsu kārakeṣu kāryasya jñānasya ātma lābha abhāvāt kasya prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā cintyate 
[I,422,i_I,422,ii]	kāraka atirikta tad adhikaraṇa guṇa apekṣaṇam tu durghaṭam aprāmāṇika tvena kāraṇa guṇānām ākāśa kuśeśaya sadṛśa vapuṣām apekṣaṇīya tva abhāvāt na kāraṇa guṇa grāhi pratyakṣam upapadyate cakṣuḥ ādeḥ parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣāḥ tad guṇāḥ katham liṅgam ca adṛṣṭa sambandham na teṣām anumāpakam yathā artha buddhi siddhiḥ tu nirdoṣāt eva kārakāt 
[I,422,iii]	yadi hi yathā artha tva āyathā artha tva rūpa dvaya rahitam kiñcid upalabdhi ākhyam kāryam bhavet tatas kārya traividhyāt kāraṇa traividhyam avaśyam avasīyeta yathā artha upalabdheḥ guṇavat kārakam kārakam ayathā a rtha upalabdheḥ doṣa kaluṣam kārakam kārakam ubhaya rahitāyāḥ tu tasyāḥ svarūpa avasthitam eva kārakam kārakam iti na tu evam asti dvividhā eva khalu iyam upalabdhiḥ yathā artha tvayathā artha tva bhedena 
[I,423,i_I,423,iv]	tatra āyathā artha upalabdhiḥ tāvat duṣṭa kāraka kāryā eva dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭaḥ kuṭila kumbha ādi saṃbhavaḥ duṣṭa kāraṇāt tathā māna antara jñātāt timira ādeḥ dvi candra dhīḥ ayathā artha upalabdhau ca duṣṭa kāraka kārya tvena siddhāyām idānīm tṛtīya kārya abhāvāt yathā artha upalabdhiḥ svarūpa avasthitebhyaḥ eva kārakebhyaḥ avakalpate iti na guṇa kalpanāyai prabhavati anumāne ca yā eva pakṣa dharma anvaya ādi sāmagrī jñānasya janikā sā eva prāmāṇya kāraṇa tvena dṛṣṭā na ca svarūpa sthitāni kāraṇāni kārya janmani udāsate eva yena yathā artha upalabdhi janena teṣām guṇa kāritā kalpyeta iti atas na santi kāraṇa guṇāḥ 
[I,423,v_I,423,vi]	nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ tu locana ādeḥ kāca kāmalā ādi doṣa apāya nibandhanaḥ eva na svarūpa atirikta guṇa kutas añjana ādi upayogaḥ api doṣa nirharaṇāya eva na guṇa janmane tasmāt avitathā saṃvid svarūpa sthita hetu jā doṣa adhikaiḥ tu taiḥ eva janyate viparīta dhīḥ atas eva apramāṇa tvam paratas abhyupagamyate janmani apekṣate doṣān bādhakam ca sva niścaye tasmāt na utpattau guṇa apekṣam pramāṇam 
[I,424,i_I,424,iii]	na api sva kārya karaṇe kiñcid apekṣate artha prakāśana svabhāvasya eva tasya sva hetoḥ utpādāt artha prakāśanam eva ca pramāṇa kāryam pravṛtti ādeḥ puruṣa icchā nibandhana tvāt na eva vā jāyate jñānam jāyate vā prakāśakam artha prakāśane kiñcid na tu utpannam apekṣate tathā ca uktam mṛd daṇḍa cakra sūtra ādi ghaṭaḥ janmani apekṣate udaka āharaṇe tu asya tad apekṣā na vidyate iti
[I,424,iv_I,425,i]	athavā sa apekṣa tvam ghaṭasya api salila āharaṇam prati yat kiñcid asti na tu evam pramāṇasya upapadyate na ca sva grahaṇa apekṣam jñānam artha prakāśakam tasmin anavabuddhe api tad siddheḥ cakṣuḥ ādi vat uktam ca na hi ajñāte arthe kaścid vuddhim upalabhate jñāte tu anumānāt avagacchati iti tasmāt sva kārya karaṇe api na sva grahaṇa apekṣam pramāṇam 
[I,425,ii_I,425,iii]	na api prāmāṇya niścaye kiñcid apekṣate apekṣaṇīya abhāvāt tathā hi asya kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt vā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ bhavet bādhaka abhāva jñānāt vā saṃvādāt vā na tāvat kāraṇa guṇa jñānāt kāraṇa guṇānām idānīm eva nirasta tvāt 
[I,425,iv]	api ca na kāraṇa guṇa jñānam indriya karaṇakam atīndriya kāraka adhikaraṇa tvena parokṣa tvāt guṇānām apitu upalabdhi ā ākhya kārya pariśuddhi samadhigamyam guṇa svarūpam apravṛttasya ca pramātuḥ na kārya pariśuddhiḥ bhavati tat na idānīm prāmāṇya niścaya pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ bhavet anyathā vā aniścita prāmāṇyāt eva jñānāt pravṛtti siddhau kim paścāt tad niścayena prayojanam niścita prāmāṇyāt tu pravṛttau duratikramaḥ cakrakakrakaca pātaḥ pravṛttau satyām kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇam kārya pariśuddhi grahaṇāt kāraṇa guṇa avagatiḥ kāraṇa guṇa avagateḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ prāmāṇya niścayāt pravṛttiḥ iti 
[I,426,i_I,426,iv]	na api bādhaka abhāva paricchedāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ sa hi tātkālikaḥ vā syāt kāla antara bhāvī vā tātkālikaḥ na paryāptaḥ prāmāṇya pariniścaye kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādau kiñcid kālam anutpanna bādhake api kāla antare tad utpāda darśanāt sarvadā tad abhāvaḥ tu na asarvajñasya gocaraḥ 
[I,426,v_I,426,vi]	atha saṃvādāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ ucyate tarhi ucyatām kaḥ ayam saṃvādaḥ nāma kim uttaram tat viṣayam jñāna mātram uta artha antara jñānam āho svid artha kriyā jñānam iti ādye pakṣe kaḥ pūrva uttara jñānayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat uttara jñāna saṃvādāt pūrvam pūrvam jñānam prāmāṇyam aśnuvīta 
[I,426,vii_I,426,viii]	api ca uttara saṃvādāt pūrva pūrva pramāṇa tām vadantaḥ na adhigaccheyuḥ antam yuga śataiḥ api su dūram api gatvā tu prāmāṇyam yadi kasya cit svatas eva abhidhīyet kaḥ dveṣaḥ prathamam prati yat āha kasya cittu yadīṣyeta svatas eva pramāṇa tā prathamasya tathā abhāve vidveṣaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ iti 
[I,426,ix]	atha anya viṣaya jñānam anyasya saṃvādaḥ ucyate tat ayuktam adaśanāt na hi stambha jñānam kumbha jñānasya saṃvādaḥ 
[I,427,i]	atha artha kriyā jñāna saṃvādāt prathamasya pravartakasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam iṣyate tat api hi anavasita prāmāṇyam katham ādimasya prāmāṇyam avagamayet kaḥ ca artha kriyā jñānasya pūrvasmāt viśeṣaḥ yat etat āyattaḥ tasya prāmāṇya adhigamaḥ artha kriyā ajñāna tvam eva viśeṣaḥ iti ced kila salila jñānam ādyam avidyamāne api payasi pūṣa dīdhitiṣu pravartakam dṛṣṭam iti na bhavati visraṃbhabhūmiḥ 
[I,427,ii]	idam punar artha kriyā saṃvedanam ambu madhya vartinaḥ pāna avagāhana ādi viṣayam udeti iti anavadhārita vyabhicāritayā tad prāmāṇya niścayāya kalpate iti tat asat svapne pāna avagāhanasya api vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ 
[I,427,iii_I,428,i]	kiñca carama dhātu visargaḥ api svapne sīmantinīm antareṇa bhavati iti mahān eṣa vyabhicāraḥ atha rāga udreka nimitta tvena pitta ādi dhātu vikṛti nibandhana tvena vā tad visargasya na sva sādhana vyabhicāraḥ iti ucyate tat asamañjasam asakṛt anubhūta yuvati pariraṃbha ādi anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tvena tad kāryatva avadhāraṇāt tasmāt artha kriyā jñāna vyabhicāra avadhāraṇāt tad prāmāṇya parīkṣāyām anavasthā na śāmyati 
[I,428,ii_I,428,iv]	athavā aapta phala tvena kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā prathame api pravṛtta tvāt kim tad prāmāṇya cintayā na ca idam artha kriyā jñānam apravṛttasya puṃsassamudbhavati tatra prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa pūrvikāyām pravṛttau kāraṇa guṇa niśceya prāmāṇya carcā baddha cakra kakra kaca codya prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva aniścita prāmāṇyasya tu pravṛttau paścāt tad nirṇayaḥ bhavan api kṛta kṣaurasya nakṣatra parīkṣā vat aphalaḥ eva iti uktam 
[I,428,v]	tata etat syāt dvividhā hi pravṛttiḥ ādyā ca ābhyāsikī ca tatra ādyāḥ yathā vinihita salila avasikta masṛṇa mṛdi śarāve śāli ādi bīja śakti parīkṣaṇāya katipaya bīja kaṇā āvāpa rūpā tatas tatra teṣām aṅkara karaṇa kauśalam avikalam avalokayantaḥ kīvāśā niśśaṅkam kedāreṣu tāni bījāni āvapanti iti sā iyam ābhyāsikī pravṛttiḥ evam iha api prathama parīkṣita pramāṇa bhāvāt eva jñānāt kutaścid kaścid vipaścit api vyavaharan tad vyavahāra paraḥ tad tad phala jñāne tasya prāmāṇyabhava gacchan punar tathāvidhe jāte sati sukham eva pravṛtti ādikam vyavahāra bha śaṅkita kāluṣyaḥ kariṣyati iti na sarva ātmanā vaiyarthyam iti 
[I,429,i]	ucyate viṣamaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tad jātīya tayā bījam śakyate yadi veditum tatra tad niścaya ādi uktam nirviśaṅkam pravartanam jñāne tathāvidha tvam tu bodha rūpā viśeṣataḥ kāryāt vā kāraṇāt vā api jñātavyam na svarūpataḥ iti 
[I,429,ii]	kāraṇānām parokṣa tvāt na tad dvārā tadāgatiḥ kāryam tu na apravṛttasya bhavati iti upavarṇitam tasmāt vaiyarthya codyasya na ayam parihṛti kramaḥ evam ca artha kriyā jñānāt kīdṛś prāmāṇya niścayaḥ 
[I,429,iii_I,430,i]	samartha kāraṇa jñānāt yaḥ api prāmāṇya niścayam brūte saḥ api kṛta udvāhaḥ tatra lagnam parīkṣate kila ati vikasita kusuma makaranda pāna mudita madhukara kule kasmiṃścid udyāne vādyamānāyām vīṇāyām nirantara latā santāna antarita vapuṣi vidūrāt anavalokyamāne vādake vīṇā dhvani saṃvidi rolambanāt a sandeha dūṣitāyām tad abhimukham eva pratiṣṭhamānaḥ śrotā parivādake darśana patham avatīrṇe svara anukūla kāraṇa niścayāt tad pratītau saṃśaya nivṛtteḥ prāmāṇyam niścinoti iti eṣa samartha kāraṇa jñāna kṛtaḥ prāmāṇya niścayaḥ tatra api na apravṛttasya hetu sāmarthya darśanam evam eva pravṛttau tu niścitena api tena kim tad niścayāt pravṛttau vā punar anyonya saṃśraṭam tad niścayāt pravṛttiḥ syāt pravṛtteḥ tad viniścayaḥ 
[I,430,ii]	tat evam na kutaścid api prāmāṇya niścayaḥ cakra ka itaretara āśraya anavasthā vaiyarthya ādi dūṣaṇa atīta sthitiḥ asti iti atas prāmāṇya niścaye api na kiñcid apekṣate pramāṇam atas ca utpattau sva kārya karaṇe sva prāmāṇya niścaye ca nirapekṣa tvāt apekṣā traya rahita tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti siddham tat uktam svatas sarva pramāṇānām prāmāṇyam iti gṛhyatām na hi svatas asatī śaktiḥ kartum anyena pāryate 
[I,430,iii]	aprāmāṇyam tu utpattau doṣa apekṣa tvāt sva niścaye bādhaka pratyaya ādi sāpekṣa tvāt ubhayatra api paratas iti uktam eva tasmāt pakṣa trayasyāyanupapatteḥ caturthaḥ eva ayam pakṣaḥ śreyān prāmāṇyam svatas aprāmāṇyam paratas iti 
[I,430,iv_I,431,i]	nanu ca utpatti velāyām na viśeṣaḥ avadhāryate pramāṇa itarayoḥ tena balāt bhavati saṃśayaḥ paricchitti mātram pramāṇa kāryam tat ca yathā artha itara pramiti sādhāraṇam rūpam sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇam ca saṃśaya kāraṇam iti prasiddhaḥ panthāḥ evam sthite ca pramāṇa antara saṃvāda visaṃvādau vinā katham pramāṇa itara nirṇītiḥ atas ca paratas dvayam 
[I,431,ii]	tat etat acaturasram satyam paricchittiḥ eva pramāṇa kāryam sā punar upajāyamānā eva na sandeha ādi dūṣita tanuḥ upalabhyate iti autsargikam prāmāṇyam eva sā bhajate artha paricchedāt ca pravartamānaḥ pramātā pramāṇena eva pravartitaḥ bhavati na saṃśayāt pravṛttaḥ sthite ca evam autsargike prāmāṇye yatra tasya apavādaḥ kvacid bhavati tatra aprāmāṇyam 
[I,431,iii_I,431,iv]	apramāṇye ca avaśyaṃbhāvya pavādaḥ dvividhaḥ eva apavādaḥ vādhaka pratyayaḥ kāraṇa doṣa jñānam ca tat uktam bhāṣya kṛtāḥ yatra duṣṭam karaṇam yatra ca mithyā iti pratyayaḥ saḥ eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayaḥ na anyaḥ iti vārtikakāraḥ api āha tasmāt bodha ātmaka tvena prāptā buddheḥ pramāṇa tā arthānyathātva hetu uttha doṣa jñānāt apodyate iti tatra bādhaka jñānam pūrva jñāna upamarda dvāreṇa eva tasmin viṣaye jāyat iti samāna viṣaya tvāt spaṣṭam eva bādhakam 
[I,432,i]	karaṇa doṣa jñānam tu bhinna viṣayam api kārya aikyāt vā adhaka tām pratipadyate yathā camasena apaḥ praṇayati iti darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅga tvāt kratu arthaḥ camasaḥ go dohanena paśu kāmasya praṇayet iti kāmyamāna paśu nirdeśāt puruṣa arthaḥ go dohanam iti evam kratu artha puruṣa artha tayā bhinna viṣaya tve api camasa go dohanayoḥ praṇayana ākhya kāryam ekam iti go dohanena nirvṛtte tasmin camasaḥ nivartate evam iha kāraṇa doṣa jñānam doṣa viṣayam api doṣāṇām ayathā artha jñāna janana svabhāvat tvāt tasya jñānasya prāmāṇyam bādhate tat uktam duṣṭa kāraṇa bodhe tu jāte api viṣaya antare arthāt tulya artha tām prāpya bādhaḥ go dohana ādi vat iti
[I,432,ii]	yatra punar idam apavāda dvayam api na dṛśyate tatra tad autsargikam prāmāṇyam anapoditam āste iti na mithyātva āśaṅkāyām nimittam kiñcid yat āha doṣañcāne tu anutpanne na āśaṅkyā niṣpramāṇa tā iti tathā hi kaścid utpannaḥ eva iha sva saṃvedyaḥ asti saṃśayaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti kaḥ nāma apahnuvīta tam haṭhāt utpādyamānaḥ tu hinasti sakalāḥ kriyāḥ sva bhāryā pariraṃbhe api bhavet mātari saṃśayaḥ vināśī saṃśaya ātmā iti pārāśaryaḥ api abhāṣata na ayam lokaḥ asti kaunteya na paraḥ saṃśaya ātmanaḥ iti 
[I,433,i]	yatra api ca kvacid bādhaka pratyaye saṃśayaḥ jāyate tatra api tṛtīya jñāna apekṣaṇāt na anavasthā na ca tāvatā svatas prāmāṇya hāniḥ yatra prathama vijñāna saṃvādi tṛtīya jñānam utpadyate tatra prathamasya prāmāṇyam autsargikam sthitam eva dvitīya vijñāna āropita alīka kāluṣya śaṅkā nirākaraṇam tu atya tṛtīyena kriyate na tu asya saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam 
[I,434,i]	yadi tu dvitīya jñāna saṃvādi tṛtīyam jñānam tadā prathamasya aprāmāṇyam tat ca paratas iṣṭam eva dvitīyasya tu jñānasya na tṛtīya saṃvāda kṛtam prāmāṇyam api tu saṃkalpyamāna kuśaṅkā aacamana mātre tasya vyāpāraḥ uktam ca evam tri catur ajñāna janmanaḥ na adhikā matiḥ prārthyate tāvatā eva ekam svatas prāmāṇyam aśnute iti
[I,434,ii]	tat evam sarva pramāṇānām svatas prāmāṇye siddhe samāna nyāya tayā śabdasya api tathā eva prāmāṇyam bhavati na ca naisargikam artha asaṃsparśi tvam eva śabdasya svarūpam iti parīkṣitam etat kintu artha bodha janaka tvāt tasya naisargike prāmāṇye sati puruṣa doṣa anupraveśa kāritaḥ kvacid hi viplavaḥ tat uktam śabde doṣa udbhavaḥ tāvat vaktra dhīnaḥ iti sthitam iti 
[I,434,iii]	tatra paureṣeye vacasi guṇavati vaktari tad guṇa apasārita doṣa tayā tad prāmāṇyam autsargikam anapoditam bhavati na tu guṇa kṛtam tad prāmāṇyam anaṅga tvāt prāmāṇye guṇānām bodhaka tva nibandhanam eva tat iti uktam vede tu praṇetuḥ puruṣasya abhāvāt doṣa āśaṅkā eva na pravartate vaktra dhīna tvāt doṣāṇām na ca bādhaka pratyayaḥ adya yāvat veda arthe kasya cit utpannaḥ iti nirapavādam veda prāmāṇyam āha ca tatra apavāda nirmuktiḥ vaktra bhāvāt ladhīyasī vede tena apramāṇa tvam na śaṅkām adhigacchati iti tat idam uktam tad pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti 
[I,435,i]	girām mithyātva hetūnām doṣāṇām puruṣa āśrayāt apauruṣeyam satya artham iti yuktam pracakṣate girām satya tva hetūnām guṇānām puruṣa āśrayāt pauruṣeyam tu satya artham iti ayuktam tu manvate na hi puruṣa guṇānām satya tā sādhana tvam vacasi khalu nisargāt eva satya tva siddhiḥ guṇam api nara vācām vipla va ādhāyi doṣa praśamana caritārtham saṅgirante guṇa jñāḥ 
[I,435,ii]	atra abhidhīyate pratyakṣa ādiṣu dṛṣṭa artheṣu pramāṇeṣu prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva vyavahāra siddheḥ tatra kim svatas prāmāṇyam uta paratas iti vicāreṇa na naḥ prayojanam anirṇayaḥ eva tatra śreyān adṛṣṭe tu viṣaye vaidikeṣu agaṇita draviṇa vitaraṇa ādi kleśa sādhyeṣu karmasu tad prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam antareṇa prekṣāvatām pravartanam anucitam iti tasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ avaśya kartavyaḥ tatra paratas eva vedasya prāmāṇyam iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,436,i]	yat ced amiyatā vistareṇa svatas prāmāṇyam upapāditam tat vyākhyeyam svatas prāmāṇyam iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim svatas eva pramāṇasya prāmāṇyam bhavati uta svayam eva tat pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam gṛhṇāti iti 
[I,436,ii_I,436,iii]	na tāvat svayam eva prāmāṇya grahaṇam upapannam aprāmāṇika tvāt tathā hi yat etat nīla prakāśane pravṛttam pratyakṣam tat nīlam prati tāvat pratyakṣam pramāṇam tāvat indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam iti jānīmaḥ eva etat kim atra vicāryate prāmāṇya paricchede tu kim tat pramāṇam iti cintyatām pratyakṣam anumānam vā pramāṇa antarāṇām anāśaṅkanīya tvāt 
[I,437,i_I,437,ii]	na tāvat sva prāmāṇya paricchede tat pratyakṣam pramāṇam tat hi jñānasya vā prāmāṇyam gṛhṇīyāt tad phalasya vā tatra jñātṛ vyāpāra ātmanaḥ jñānasya bhavat mate nitya parokṣa tvāt pratyakṣasya svatas pariccheda anupapattau tad prāmāṇyasya api katham pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam phalasya api artha prakāśana ākhyasya saṃvedana ātmanaḥ na indra saṃsarga yogya tā vidyate yena tad gatam api yathā artha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam indriya vyāpāra labdha janmanā pratyakṣeṇa paricchidyeta 
[I,437,iii]	na ca mānasam api pratyakṣam phala gata yathā artha tāvasāya samartham iti kathanīyam tadānīm ananubhūyamāna tvāt na hi nīla saṃvid prasava samanantaram yathā arthā iyam nīla saṃvittiḥ iti saṃvedana antaram utpadyamānam anubhūyate anubhave vā tatas dvitīyāt prathama utpanna nīla jñāna yātha arthya grahaṇāt na svatas prāmāṇya niścayaḥ syāt tasmāt na pratyakṣasya eṣa viṣayaḥ 
[I,437,iv]	anumānena api kasya prāmāṇyam niścīyate jñānasya phalasya vā iti pūrvavat vācyam phalasya tāvat tad niścaye liṅga tvam eva tāvat na kasyacid paśyāmaḥ jñātṛ vyāpara ātmanaḥ jñānasya tu sva kāryam bhavet api liṅgam phalasya kriyā mātra vyāpti grahaṇāt svarūpa sattā mātram anumāpayitum utsahate na yathā artha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam tat hi phalam nirviśeṣaṇam vā sva kāraṇasya jñātṛ vyāpārasya prāmāṇi anumāpayet yathārtha tva viśiṣṭam vā ādye pakṣe yatas kutaścana phalāt tad prāmāṇya anumāne nedānim kiñcid apramāṇam bhavet uttaraḥ api na asti pakṣaḥ phala gata yāthā arthya pariccheda upāya abhāvāt iti uktam 
[I,438,i]	nanu sva anubhavaḥ eva atra upāyaḥ tat hi nīla saṃvedana tayā phalam svatas eva prakāśate nīla saṃvedana tvam eva ca asya yathā artha tvam na anyat yadi evam śuktikāyām api rajata saṃvedane samānaḥ nyāyaḥ na hi rajata saṃvedanāt anyā yathā artha tva saṃvittiḥ iti 
[I,438,ii_I,439,i]	nanu tatra bādhaka pratyaya upanipātena āyathā artha tvam upanīyate nūnam ca asya mithyā darśaneṣu deśa antare vā śuktikāra jata ādi jñāne kāla antare kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādi pratītau puruṣa antare vā jāta taimirike dvi candra pratītau avasthā antare pīta śaṅkha ādi pratibhāse bhavati bādhaka pratyayaḥ tat asattve na tad śaṅkā yuktimatī iti uktam eva satyam uktam ayuktam tu evam hi vadatā bādhaka abhāva jñāna adhīnam prāmāṇyam abhihitam bhavati tat ca tātkālikam kāla antara bhāvī vā iti kalpyamānam na upapadyate iti darśitam tasmāt utpadyamānam eva pramāṇam ātmanaḥ prāmāṇyam niścinoti iti na yuktam etat 
[I,439,ii]	yadi tu prasava samayaḥ eva jñānasya prāmāṇyam niścinuyāmaḥ tarhi tatas pravartamānā na kvacid api vipralabhyemahi vipralabhyāmahe tu tena manyāmahe na niścitam tad prāmāṇyam saṃśayāt eva vyavaharāmaḥ iti 
[I,439,iii_I,440,i]	nanu saṃśayaḥ api tadā na anubhūyate eva kim idam rajatam uta na rajatam iti api tu rajatam iti eva pratītiḥ na hi saṃśayānāḥ pravartante laukikāḥ kintu niścinvantaḥ eva viṣayam iti kim ananubhūyamānaḥ eva āropyate saṃśayaḥ ekatara grāhī apyayam pratyayaḥ tad niścaya upāya virahāt saṃśaya koṭi patitaḥ eva balāt bhavati yathā asti kūpe jalam iti bhikṣavaḥ manyante iti evam rajatam idam iti eka pakṣa grāhī api tadānīm pratibhāsaḥ vastu vṛttena saṃśayaḥ eva yadi hi pramāṇa tayā asau gṛhyeta katham kvacid visaṃvadet apramāṇa tayā tu gṛhyamāṇaḥ katham pumāṃsam pravartayet ubhābhyām api rūpābhyām atha tasya anupagrahaḥ saḥ ayam saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti kim naḥ prakupyasi 
[I,440,ii]	yat tu na anubhūyate saṃśayaḥ iti satyam ananubhūyamānaḥ api nyāyāt abhyaste viṣaye avinā abhāva smaraṇāt sa parikalpyate niścaya nimittasya tadānīm avidyamāna tvāt saṃśaya janana hetoḥ ca sāmagryāḥ sannihita tvāt tathā hi yathā artha itara artha sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ bodha rūpa tvam ūrdhva tva ādi vat tadā prakāśataḥ eva na ca prāmāṇya avinā bhāvī viśeṣaḥ kaścana tadānīm avabhāti tad agrahaṇe ca samāna dharma adhigama prabodhyamāna vāsanā adhīnā tad sahacarita paryāya anubhūta viśeṣa smṛtiḥ api saṃbhavati eva itīyati iyam sā saṃśaya jananī sāmagrī sannihitā eva iti katham tat janyaḥ saṃśayaḥ na syāt 
[I,440,iii_I,441,i]	nanu pramāṇa bhūte pratyaye jāyamānaḥ eva tad gataḥ viśeṣaḥ parisphurati iti katham viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate bho mahātman kathyatām saḥ viśeṣaḥ na hi tam vayam anupadiṣṭam kṛśa matayaḥ jānīmaḥ yadi tāvat spaṣṭa tā viśeṣaḥ śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva na hi tatra anadhyavasāya kāluṣyam kiñcid asti 
[I,441,ii_I,441,v]	atha niṣkampatā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ niṣkampaḥ eva na hi asau jāyamānaḥ eva aṅguṃlī agrādi vākya karaṇa bodha vat kampamānaḥ jāyate atha nirvicikitsatā śuktikāyām api rajata avabhāsaḥ nirvicikitsaḥ eva kiṃsvid iti koṭi dvaya an avamarśāt atha yasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyate saḥ asya viśeṣaḥ iti nanu etat eva pṛcchāmi kasmin sati bādhā na dṛśyate iti sarva avasthasya bādha darśanāt na ca asau ciram api cintayitvā viśeṣaḥ darśayitum śakyaḥ atha sva viṣaya avyabhicāri tvam eva viśeṣaḥ sa tadānīm na avabhāsate iti uktam api ca yadi tathāvidhaḥ api viśeṣaḥ samasti tarhi yatra jñāne asau na dṛśyate tatas kim iti pravartate tad viśeṣa darśī vā pravartamānaḥ katham vipralabhyeta iti uktam 
[I,441,vi_I,442,i]	yat ayam sthāṇu puruṣa saṃśaya vat asaṃvedyamānaḥ api tadānīm asti eva bodhe yathā artha itara tva saṃśayaḥ na ca asau kalpyamānaḥ api vyavahārasya lopakaḥ tena eva vyavahārasya siddha tvāt sarva dehinām atas ca saṃśayāt eva vyavahāram vitanvatām laukikānām prayoktavyāḥ na abhi śāpa paraṃmparāḥ 
[I,442,ii]	na ca sarvathā saṃśaya samarthane asmākam abhiniveśaḥ prāmāṇyam tu jñāna utpatti kāle gṛhītum aśakyam iti naḥ pakṣaḥ prāmāṇya agrahaṇam eva anadhyavasāya svabhāvam saṃśaya śabdena iha vyapadekṣyāmaḥ prāmāṇya agrahaṇam ca pradarśitam pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vā satā pramāṇena ātmanaḥ pramāṇa tva pariccheda ayogāt tasmāt svayam prāmāṇyam gṛhyate iti eṣa durghaṭaḥ pakṣaḥ 
[I,442,iii]	atha svatas prāmāṇyam bhavati iti eṣa pakṣaḥ āśrīyate saḥ api ayuktaḥ kāryāṇām kāraṇa adhīna janma tvāt prāmāṇyasya ca kāryatvāt asti ca prāmāṇyam vastu ca tat na ca nityam iti kāryam eva tat kāryam ca kārya tvāt eva na svatas bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,442,iv]	atha utpattau sva kāraka atirikta guṇa anapekṣi tvam eva prāmāṇyasya svatobhavanam ucyate na punar akārya tvam eva iti tat api asamyak samyak rūpasya kāryasya guṇavatkāraka vyatirekeṇa aniṣpatteḥ dvividham kāryam bhavati samyak asamyak vā tatra guṇavatā kāraṇena samyak kāryam utpadyate doṣavatā tu asamyak iti 
[I,443,i_I,443,ii]	nirdoṣam nirguṇam vā api na samasti eva kāraṇam atas eva tṛtīyasya na kāryasya asti saṃbhavaḥ samyat jñāna utpādakam kārakam dharmi svarūpa atirikta svagata dharma sāpekṣam kārya nirvartakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāraka tvāt mithyājñāna utpādaka kāraka vat samyat jñānam vā dharmi svarūpa atirikta dharma sambaddha kāraka niṣpādyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatvāt mithyājñāna vat 
[I,443,iii]	āyurveda āgamāt ca indriya guṇān pratipadyāmahe yat amī vaidyāḥ svastha vṛtteḥ auṣadha upayogam upadiśanti tat guṇa upayogāya eva na doṣa śāntaye dṛśyate ca tad upadiṣṭa auṣadha upayogāt indriya atiśayaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva ca loke nairmalya vyapadeśaḥ na doṣa abhāva mātra pratiṣṭhaḥ iti alam vimardena tasmāt utpattau guṇa anapekṣa tvāt svatas prāmāṇyam iti yat uktam tat ayuktam 
[I,444,i_I,444,ii]	yat api ca sva kārya karaṇe pramāṇasya para anapekṣa tvam ucyate tat api vyākhyeyam kim pramāṇam sva kārya karaṇe nirapekṣam sāmagrī vā tat eka deśaḥ vā tat janyam vā jñānam iti tatra sāmagryāḥ satyam sva kārya janmani nairapekṣyam asti na tu tāvatā svatas prāmāṇyam tad paricchedasya parāyattatvāt 
[I,444,iii_I,444,iv]	sāmagrī antargata kārakasya sva kārye para apekṣa tvam aparihāryam ekasmāt kārakāt kārya nirvṛtti abhāvāt jñānam phalam eva na pramāṇam iti uktam na ca phala ātmanaḥ tasya sva kāryam kiñcid asti yatra sa apekṣa tvam anapekṣa tvam vā asya cintyeta puruṣa pravṛtti ādau tu tad icchā ādi apekṣa tvam vidyate eva iti yat kiñcid etat 
[I,444,v]	yat api prāmāṇya niśraye nairapekṣyam abhyadhāyi tat api na sāṃpratam prāmāṇya niścayasya hi dvayī gatiḥ nāstitvam kāraṇa apekṣitā vā na punar asti ca prāmāṇya niścayaḥ kāraṇa anapekṣaḥ ca iti śakyate vaktum tatra prathama pravartaka pratibhāsa prasava samaye tāvat na asti eva prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti uktam na hi nīla grāhiṇā pramāṇena nīla svarūpam iva sva prāmāṇyam api tadānīm niścetum śakyate iti kāla antare tad prāmāṇya niścayaḥ satyam asti na tu tatra nairapekṣyam pravṛtti sāmarthya adhīna tvāt tad niścayasya 
[I,445,i]	nanu kṣaṇika tvāt kāla antare jñānam eva na asti kasya prāmāṇyam niścinumaḥ śiśu codyam etat aprāmāṇyam api bādhaka pratyaya ādinā kāla antare kasya niścinumaḥ kṣaṇika tvena jñānasya atīta tvāt atikrāntasya api smaryamāṇasya jñānasya tad utpādakasya vā vartamānasya kāraka cakrasya iti ced prāmāṇya niścaye api samānaḥ ayam panthāḥ 
[I,445,ii_I,446,i]	yat punar kāla antare tad niścaya karaṇe dūṣaṇam itaretara āśraya tvam vā muṇḍita śiraḥ nakṣatra anveṣaṇa vat vaiyarthyam vā iti varṇitam tatra adṛṣṭe viṣaye prāmāṇya niścaya pūrvikāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ abhyupagamāt na itaretara āśrayam cakrakam vā dṛṣṭe viṣaye hi anirṇīta prāmāṇya eva artha saṃśayāt pravṛtti rūpam anartha saṃśayāt ca nivṛtti ātmakam vyavahāram ārabhamāṇaḥ dṛśyate lokaḥ etat eva yuktam iti uktam na prāmāṇya niścaya purassaram pravartanam iti kutas ita retāra śrayam vaiyarthyam tu dṛṣṭe viṣaye satyam iṣyate kintu tatra pravṛtti sāmarthyena prāmāṇyam niścinvan āpta ukta tvasya hetoḥ prāmāṇyena vyāptim avagacchati iti adṛṣṭa viṣaya upayogi veda ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya paricchede pāraṃparyeṇa upāya tvāt sva viṣaye vyarthaḥ api asau tatra sārthaka tām avalambataḥ iti adoṣaḥ 
[I,446,ii]	kim punar idam pravṛtti sāmarthyam nāma yatas prāmāṇya niścayam ācakṣate naiyyāyikāḥ ucyate pūrva pratyaya apekṣā uttarā saṃvid pravṛtti sāmarthyam viśeṣa darśanam vā iti pūrva ācāryaiḥ tad svarūpam uktam tat punar na ati iva hṛdayaṅgamam iti bhāṣya kṛtā eva samīhā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate sāmarthyam punar asyāḥ phalena abhisambandhaḥ iti vadatā artha kriyā ākhya phala jñānam eva pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti nirṇītam 
[I,446,iii]	yat punar artha kriyā jñānasya api pūrvasmāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tasya api ca anyatas prāmāṇya niścaya apekṣāyām anavasthā iti uktam tat api sakala prāṇabhṛt pratīti sākṣika vyavahāra virodhi tvāt asambaddha abhidhānam aparīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇya tvāt artha kriyā jñānasya pravartakam na sarva jñānam pravṛtti siddhaye parīkṣaṇīya prāmāṇyam vartate phala jñāne tu siddha prayojana tvāt prāmāṇya parīkṣā apekṣā eva na asti iti kutas anavasthā 
[I,447,i]	saṃśaya abhāvāt vā tad prāmāṇya vicāra abhāvaḥ pravartakam hi prathamam udaka jñānam avidyamāne api nīre mihira marīciṣu dṛṣṭam iti tatra saṃśerate janāḥ artha kriyā jñānam tu salila madhyartinām bhavat tad avinābhūtam eva bhavati iti na tatra saṃśayaḥ tad abhāvāt na tatra prāmāṇya vicāraḥ vicārasya saṃśaya pūrvaka tvāt 
[I,447,ii]	viśeṣa darśanāt vā phala jñāne prāmāṇya niścayaḥ kaḥ punar ayam viśeṣaḥ iti ced yaḥ ayam śauca ācamana majjana amara pitṛ tarpaṇa paṭa kṣālana śrama tāpa nodana vinodana ādi aneka prakāra nīra parya ālocana prabandhaḥ na hi ayam iyān kārya kalāpaḥ mithyājñānāt pravṛttasya kvacid api dṛṣṭaḥ 
[I,447,iii]	svapne api asya prabandhasya darśanam asti iti ced na svapna daśā visadṛśa vispaṣṭa jāgrat avasthā pratyayasya saṃvedya tvāt eṣaḥ asmi jāgarmi na svapimi iti svapna vilakṣaṇam anidrāyamāṇa mānasaḥ pratyakṣam eva jāgrat samayam sakalaḥ janaḥ cetayate na ca tasmin avasare salilam antareṇa etāḥ kriyāḥ pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante iti tad viśeṣa darśanāt su jñānam artha kriyā jñāna prāmāṇyam 
[I,448,i]	kāraṇa parīkṣātaḥ vā tasmin prāmāṇyam niśceṣyāmaḥ yathā uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva prayatnena anvicchantaḥ na ced doṣam avagacchema tad pramāṇa abhāvāt aduṣṭam iti manyemahi iti tathā hi viṣayasya cala tva sādṛśya ādi doṣa virahaḥ ālokasya malīm asatva ādi kāraṇa vaikalyam antaḥkaraṇasya nidrā ādya dūṣita tvam ātmanaḥ kṣudh prakopa ādi anākula tvam īkṣaṇa yugalasya timira paṭala ādi vikala tvam ityādi svayam ca kārya dvāreṇa para upadeśena ca sarvam su jñānam atas niravadya kāraṇa janya tvāt pramāṇam artha kriyā jñānam iti vidmaḥ 
[I,448,ii]	yadi evam prathame pravartakaḥ eva pratyaye kasmāt kāraṇa parīkṣā eva iyam na kriyate kimartham kriyā jñāne na āyuṣman ādye api jñāne kāraṇa parīkṣāyām kriyamāṇāyām kaḥ pramādaḥ kim evam sati svatas prāmāṇyam siddhyati tava mama vā paratas prāmāṇyam apahīyate kintu lokaḥ pravartaka jñāna anantaram phala prāptim prati yathā sa udyamaḥ dṛśyate na tathā tad kāraṇa parīkṣām prati phala jñānam eva ittham parīkṣyate ādyasya hi jñānasya phala jñānāt eva prāmāṇya siddhiḥ kaḥ ca nāma nikaṭam upāyam upekṣya dūram gacchet iti 
[I,449,i]	atha vā saṃśaya utpatti sāmarthyāt eva yathārtha itaratva niścayaḥ phala jñānena lapsyate saṃśayaḥ hi nāma dvaividhya darśanāt vinā na bhavati eva na hi sthāṇu puruṣa sāhacaryam ūrdhvata ākhyasya dharmasya yaḥ na jānāti sa tam dṛṣṭvā sthāṇuḥ vā syāt puruṣaḥ vā iti saṃśete evam ūrdhva tva vat vodha rūpa tvasya vyabhicāri tvā avyabhicāri tvābhyām saha darśanam avaśyam āśrayaṇīyam anyathā tad viṣaya saṃśaya anutpādāt atas pūrvam avyabhicāritva darśane siddhe yaḥ tadā tad pariccheda upāyaḥ sa paścāt api bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā siddhi atyavyabhicāri tva niścayaḥ 
[I,450,i]	aniścita prāmāṇyāt api vā phala jñānāt pravartakasya prāmāṇya niścayaḥ yuktaḥ na tu svatas utpattau pramāṇa tad ābhāsayoḥ viśeṣa agrahaṇāt phala jñāne ca tad viśeṣa pratibhāsāt 
[I,450,ii]	yat tu viśeṣa jñānam niścita prāmāṇyam aniścita prāmāṇyam vā iti vikalpya anavasthā pādanam apratipatti prahata tā kathanam vā tat dṛṣṭa viruddha tvāt pralāpa mātram iti alamalīkā ukta vikalpa kalāpa nirmathana udita durāma uda āsvādanena 
[I,450,iii]	sthitam etat artha kriyā jñānāt prāmāṇya niścayaḥ iti tat idam uktam pramāṇataḥ artha pratipattau pravṛtti sāmarthyāt arthavat pramāṇam iti tasmāt aprāmāṇya vat prāmāṇyam api para apekṣam iti atas dvayam api paratas iti eṣa eva pakṣaḥ śreyān 
[I,450,iv]	yat tu kaścid prājña mānī vadati abhyaste viṣaye svatas prāmāṇyam anabhyaste tu paratas iti saḥ ayam abhyaste viṣaye iti ca bravīti svatas ca prāmāṇyam manyate iti svayam eva ātmānam vañcyamānam na cetayate abhyāsaḥ hi nāma punar punar prayogaḥ kriyāyāḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ viṣayasya ca abhyasta tā bhūyas bhūyas pravṛttiḥ atas ca sva śarīra grahe nija gṛha kuḍya stambha ādi pratibhāse vā sahasra kṛtvas pravṛtta saṃvāda jñāna janmanā prāmāṇya niścayaḥ uktaḥ bhavati svatas abhyasta tvam ca anyathā na bhavet iti yat kiñcid etat tasmāt paratas prāmāṇyam iti siddham 
[I,451,i_I,451,iii]	yat punar kaiścid codyate pramāṇānām na parīkṣaṇam upapadyate tat hi pramāṇaiḥ kriyeta apramāṇaiḥ vā pramāṇaiḥ api parīkṣitaiḥ aparīkṣitaiḥ vā tatra na nāma apramāṇaiḥ pramāṇa parīkṣaṇam śakya kriyam pramāṇaiḥ api aparīkṣitaiḥ tad karaṇe varam vyavahāraḥ eva tādṛśaiḥ kriyatām kim parīkṣaṇena 
[I,451,iv_I,451,vi]	parīkṣitaiḥ tu tad parīkṣā karaṇam aparyavasitam anavasthā prasaṅgāt ityādi tat api uktena nyāyena parihṛtam bhavati dṛṣṭe viṣaye pramāṇa parīkṣām vinā eva vyavahārāt adṛṣṭe tu parīkṣāyāḥ avaśya kartavya tvāt upapatteḥ ca iti tasmāt adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha pada upadeśi mānam manīṣi bhiḥ avaśya parīkṣaṇīyam prāmāṇyam asya paratas niraṇāyi ca iti cetaḥ pramāthibhiḥ alam kuvikalpa jālaiḥ 
[I,451,vii]	su śikṣitāḥ tu ācakṣate yuktam yat amī mīmāṃsaka pāśāḥ kāśa kusuma ra āśayaḥ iva śaradi marudbhiḥ ati dūrāt samutsāryante duṣṭa tārkikaiḥ ye hi kila abhyupayanti ca viparīta khyāti vādam akṛta astrāḥ prāmāṇyam ca svatas iti ca vadanti teṣām kutas kauśalam viparīta khyātau abhyupagamyamānāyām bādhya bodha sandarbha subhikṣe sati tat sādharmyāt anutpanna bādhake api bodhe duṣpariharaḥ saṃśayaḥ saṃśaye ca saṃvāda ādi anveṣaṇam api dhruvam avatarati iti paratas prāmāṇyam anivāryam 
[I,452,i_I,452,ii]	yadā tu na bādhyaḥ nāma jagati kaścid api bodhaḥ tadā kiṃsādharmyāt saṃśera tām pramātāraḥ asaṃśayānāḥ ca kim iti param apekṣantām anapekṣamāṇāḥ katham paratas prāmāṇyam pratipadyantām iti niścalam svatas eva prāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate katham punar bādhyaḥ nāma na asti bodhaḥ śukikā ādau rajata ādi pratyayāḥ prācuryeṇa bādhyamānāḥ dṛśyante anabhijñaḥ bhavān bādhasya na hi te bādhyāḥ pratyayāḥ 
[I,452,iii_I,453,ii]	idam hi nirūpapyatām kaḥ iva uttara jñānena pūrva jñānasya bādhaḥ bādha artham eva na vidmaḥ yadi tāvat nāśaḥ eva bādhaḥ sa na teṣām eva buddheḥ buddhi antarāt virodhaḥ iti sakala bodha sādhāraṇa tvāt atha saha anavasthānam tat api samānam abādhitānām api jñānānām saha avasthāna asaṃbhavāt atha saṃskāra ucchedaḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api tādṛś eva saṃyak pratyaya upajanita saṃskārasya api uccheda darśanāt kaścid bhavat abhimata bādhya bodhā ahitaḥ api saṃskāraḥ sati api bādhaka pratyaye na ucchedam upagacchati kāla antare tad kāraṇaka tad viṣaya smaraṇa darśanāt 
[I,453,iii_I,453,iv]	atha viṣaya apahāraḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api durghaṭaḥ pratibhāta tvena viṣayasya apahartum aśakyatvāt na hi bādhakam jñānam ittham uttiṣṭhati yat pratibhātam tat na pratibhātam iti atha tad abhāva grahaḥ bādhaḥ sa tātkālikaḥ kāla antara bhāvī vā kāla antara bhāvi tadabhāva grahaṇasya bādhaka tve prāc avagata mudgara dalita ghaṭa abhāva grāhiṇaḥ api vijñānasya tad bādhaka tva prasaṅgaḥ tadā eva tu tad abhāva grahaṇe pratyaya dvaya samarpita rūpa dvitaya yogāt ubhaya ātmakam eva tat astu vastu kim kasya bādhyam bādhakam vā 
[I,453,v_I,453,viii]	atha phala apahāraḥ bādhaḥ saḥ api na saṃbhavati saṃvidaḥ pramāṇa phalasya utpanna tvena anapaharaṇīya tvāt na hi yat utpannam tat anutpannam iti vadati bādhakaḥ atha hāna ādi phalā apahāraḥ bādhaḥ na tasya pramāṇa phala tva abhāvāt hāna ādi vyavahāraḥ hi puruṣa icchā nibandhanaḥ na tena apahṛtena api pramāṇam bādhitam bhavet tasmāt na bādhaḥ nāma kaścid 
[I,454,i_I,454,ii]	itas ca na asti sa hi samāna viṣayayoḥ vā jñānayoḥ iṣyate bhinna viṣayayoḥ vā na samāna viṣayayoḥ dhārāva ahi jñāneṣu adṛṣṭa tvāt na api bhinna viṣayayoḥ stambha kumbha upalambhayoḥ tad anupalambhāt yadi ca uttareṇa jñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītāt arthāt arthaḥ anyaḥ idānīm gṛhītaḥ tat pūrva jñānam kim iti bādhitam ucyate api ca pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe sati āgantuḥ uttaraḥ pratyayaḥ bādhitum yuktaḥ na pūrvaḥ na ca evam dṛśyate tasmāt na bādhyam nāma vijñānam asti tad abhāvāt na tad sādharmya nibandhanaḥ saṃśayaḥ tad abhāvāt saṃvāda ādi ananveṣaṇāt na paratas prāmāṇyam 
[I,454,iii_I,455,ii]	nanu evam bādhe nirākriyamāṇe kim amī śuktikāra jata ādi grāhiṇaḥ viparīta pratyayāḥ abādhitāḥ eva asatām āḥ kumate nāmī viparīta pratyayāḥ na hi īdṛśānām viparyayāṇām utpattau kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ na tāvat indriyam evaṃvidha bodha vidhāyi bhavitum arhati sarvadā tad utpāda prasaṅgāt na api doṣa kaluṣitam duṣṭam hi kāraṇam sva kārya karaṇaḥ eva kuṇṭhita śakti jātam iti tat eva mā jījanat viparīta kārya karaṇasya kim vartate na hi duṣṭāni śāli bījāni yava aṅkura karaṇa kauśala bhava lamberan tasmāt kāraṇa abhāvāt api na viparīta pratyayāḥ te 
[I,455,iii]	tat kim samyak pratyayaḥ eva śuktikāyām rajata pratibhāsaḥ ayi mūḍha na ayam ekaḥ pratyayaḥ idam rajatam iti kintu dve ete grahaṇa smaraṇe idam iti puras avasthita bhāsvara ākāra dharmi pratibhāsaḥ rajatam iti tu bhāsvara rūpa darśana prabodhyamāna saṃskāra kāraṇakam tad sāhacaryāt avagata rajata smaraṇam 
[I,455,iv]	atas ca idam smaraṇam yatas prāk anavagata rajatasya na jāyate vidita rajatasya api rajanyām anyadā vā sādṛśya darśanāt vinā na bhavati iti 
[I,456,i]	smaraṇam api bhavat idam ātmānam tathā na prakaṭayati iti pramuṣitam ucyate sva rūpeṇa ca apratibhāsamānāyām smṛtau anubhava smaraṇayoḥ vivekaḥ na gṛhītaḥ bhavati iti agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate 
[I,456,ii_I,456,iii]	tathā hi bhrānta bodheṣu prasphurat vastu saṃbhavāt catuṣprakārāḥ vimatiḥ udapadyata vādinām viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ ātma khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ iti 
[I,456,iv]	tatra viparīta khyātiḥ tāvat kāraṇa abhāvāt eva nirastā api ca viparīta khyātau trayī gatiḥ rajatam vā anya deśa kālam atra ālambanam śuktikā vā nigūhita nija ākārā satī parigṛhīta rajata ākārā ca athavā anyat ālambanam anyat ca pratibhāti 
[I,456,v_I,457,i]	tatra yadi rajatam ālambanam tat iyam asat khyātiḥ eva na viparīta khyātiḥ asataḥ tatra rajatasya pratibhāsāt atha anya deśa kālam tat asti eva iti abhidhīyate iha asat nihitasya asya tena sattvena kaḥ guṇaḥ api ca deśa kālau api kim santau pratibhāsete uta āsantau iti yadi santau tarhi tad deśa kālam eva idam rajatam avabhātam iti na bhrāntiḥ eṣā syāt asantau tu ubhau api rajata vat na ālambanam bhavitum arhataḥ 
[I,457,ii]	atha smṛti ārūḍham rajatam asyām pratītau parisphurati iti ucyate tarhi smṛti upārūḍham iti kaḥ arthaḥ smaraṇam api jñānam eva tat api katham asat artha viṣayam syāt smṛteḥ anartha ja tvam eva svarūpam iti ced astu kāmam tad sāmānyāt atra api evam prayogaḥ iti etat api tāvat na brūmaḥ tathā tu anartha janyayā smṛtyā saḥ arthaḥ katham iha sannidhāpayitum pāryate sā hi na spṛśati evā artham tasmāt asat nihita rajata ālambanā viparīta khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na viśiṣyate eva 
[I,457,iii]	atha sthagita nija vapuḥ uṣa gṛhīta rajata rūpā śuktikā atra prakāśate iti na iyam asat khyātiḥ ucyate tat idam apūrvam kim api nāṭakam iyam asmin kṛtyā sītā pravṛttā iti tathā hi kim atra śuktiḥ iti pratītiḥ uta rajatam iti śuktikā pratītau tu śuktau śuktiḥ eva pratīyate na rajatam iti bhramārthaḥkaḥ rajata pratītau tu śuktiḥ asau iti atra kim pramāṇam bādhaka pratyayāt evam avagatam iti ced mā evam na hi jñāna antareṇa asyāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayaḥ vyavasthāpayitum yuktaḥ bādhakena hi jñānena pūrva jñāna gṛhītasya vastunaḥ asattvam nāma khyāpyatām na tu tasya viṣayaḥ nirūpyate anarthi tvāt vā kadācid apravṛttasya puṃsaḥ bādhaka anutpattau vā kaḥ asyāḥ pratīteḥ viṣayam vyavasthāpayiṣyati tasmāt yat eva asyām cakāsti tat eva rajatam asyāḥ viṣayaḥ iti yuktam vaktum śuktiḥ tu nigūhita nija vapuḥ iti durvidagdha vācaḥ yuktiḥ iyam 
[I,458,i]	ye tu ālambana tām śukteḥ rajatasya avabhāsanam vadanti asmin bhrama jñāne teṣām atitarām bhramaḥ na hi ālambanatā yuktā sannidhāna nibandhanā tatra eva bhū pradeśasya tathā abhāva prasaṅgataḥ tat eva ālambanam buddheḥ yat asyām avabhāsate anyat ālambanam ca anyat bhāti iti bhaṇitiḥ na vā atas rajatam eva etat buddhi grāhyam asat ca tat evam viparyaya khyātiḥ asat khyāteḥ na bhidyate 
[I,458,ii]	tat kim asat khyātiḥ eva sādhīyasī tām eva abhyupagacchāmaḥ mā evam sā api na upapadyate eva asat khyātiḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim ekānta asataḥ eva arthasya prathamam atha deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti uttarasmin pakṣe viparīta khyātiḥ eva eṣā paraiḥ api tatra rajatasya satvān abhyu pagamāt deśa antara ādau tu tad sattāyāḥ tvayā api pratipanna tvāt ekānta asataḥ tu asya khyātiḥ iti na peśalam ākāśa nalinī pallava ādeḥ apratibhāsanāt vāsanā abhyāsāt asatām api pratibhāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti ced na artham antareṇa vāsanāyāḥ api anupapatteḥ artha anubhava samāhitaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ vāsanā kathyate sā katham asat artha pratibhāsa hetuḥ syāt 
[I,459,i_I,459,iii]	bhavatu anyā vā bhavat abhimatā kācana vāsanā sā api tu asattva aviśeṣe kim iti rajata matim upajanayati na gagana nalina pratītim iti kutastyaḥ niyamaḥ tat alam anayā na atyantam asataḥ arthasya sāmarthyam avakalpate vyavahāra dhuram vā udumiyatīm anupaplutām api ca sattvena pratibhāti iti asat khyātiḥ api na viparīta khyātim ativartate 
[I,460,i]	tasmāt varam ātma khyātiḥ astu vijñānam eva khalu etat gṛhṇāti ātmānam ātmanā bahis nirūpyamāṇasya grāhyasya anupapattitaḥ buddhiḥ prakāśamānā ca tena tena ātmanā bahis udvahati artha śūnyāṃpi lokayātrām iha īdṛśīm 
[I,460,ii_I,460,iii]	ucyate na ātma khyātiḥ api yuktimatī vijñāna ātmanaḥ hi pratibhāse aham rajatam iti pratītiḥ syāt na idam rajatam iti kiñca yad antar jñeya rūpam hi vahiḥ vat avabhāsate iti abhyupagamāt iyam api viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt asat khyātiḥ api ca iyam bhavati eva bahis buddheḥ asattvāt buddhiḥ asti eva iti ced bahiṣṭvam tarhi cintyam sat asat vā iti na tāvat sat buddheḥ bāhya tva abhāvāt asattve tu asat khyātiḥ iti uktam tasmāt khyāti traye api asmin anyaḥ anya anupraveśini yuktyā virudhyamāne ca śreyasya khyātiḥ eva sā 
[I,460,iv_I,461,iii]	khyāti traya vādibhiḥ api ca iyam apratyākhyeyā nūnam akhyātiḥ ātma khyātau tāvat ātma tayā vijñānasya khyātiḥ na asti viccheda pratibhāsāt iti ukta tvāt asat khyātau api asattvam arthasya na eva pratibhāsate pravṛtti ādi vyavahāra uccheda prasaṅgāt viparīta khyātau api rajatasya sannihitasya jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya ca pratibhāsaḥ neṣyate eva atas tatra rajata smṛti upasthāpitam rajatam avagati janakam upagatam atas ca rajata smṛtiḥ aparihāryā sā ca rajata smṛtiḥ na tadā svena rūpeṇa prakāśate smarāmi iti pratyaya abhāvāt tasmāt pramuṣitām enām smṛtim icchanti tārkikāḥ abhyaste viṣaye liṅga pratibandha smṛtim yathā saḥ ayam smṛti pramoṣaḥ tattva agrahaṇam akhyātiḥ ucyate evam satīyam akhyātiḥ iṣyate sarva vādimiḥ tathā prakaṭayadbhiḥ tu pītam prābhākaraiḥ yaśaḥ 
[I,462,i_I,462,ii]	nanu rajatam iti smṛteḥ svarūpa ullekhaḥ mā bhūt idam iti atra puras avasthita dharmi pratibhāsāt katham akhyātiḥ ucyate na puras avasthita dharmaḥ śuktikā iyam iti spaṣṭa tayā gṛhyate tathā ca abhyupagame bhrama abhāva prasaṅgāt kintu tejasvita ādi viparītam dharmi mātram avabhāsate dharma sārūpyāt ca tadānīm rajatam smaryate te ete grahaṇa smaraṇe vivikte api vivikta tayā na gṛhyete iti viveka agrahaṇa makhyātiḥ na tu sarveṇa sarva ātmanā apratipattiḥ eva vyadhikaraṇayoḥ ca grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ vaiyadhi karaṇyam ced na gṛhītam kim anyat astu sāmānādhikaraṇyam na tu yat eva idam tat eva rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena grahaṇam asti sā hi viparīta khyātiḥ eva syāt vaiyyadhi karaṇyā anupagrahāt eva pramātuḥ pravṛttiḥ avivekāt sādhāraṇya abhimānena pravṛttiḥ iti phalatas iyam vācā uyuktiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena kecid tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinam parāmarśam api icchanti tat na śraddadhmahe vayam akhyāti pakṣaḥ evam hi hīyeta eka tva vedanāt vakraiḥ ca vitatha ākhyātiḥ akṣaraiḥ kathitā bhavet 
[I,463,i_I,463,ii]	nanu evam akhyāti pakṣe pratiṣṭhāpyamāne na idam rajatam iti pūrva avagata rajata pratiṣedha bodhī bādhaka pratyayaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ katham samarthayiṣyate apratīti jñaḥ devānām priyaḥ na hi anena rajata niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate kintu prāgagṛhītaḥ vivekaḥ prakhyāpyate na idam rajatam yat eva idam tat eva rajatam iti etat na idam idam rajatam iti etat uktam bhavati idam anyat rajatam anyat iti saḥ ayam vivekaḥ khyāpitaḥ bhavati 
[I,463,iii_I,463,v]	nanu evam idam rajatam ityādau smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ bhavatu viveka agrahaṇam svapne tu katham etat bhaviṣyati bhīro kim jātam svapne vivekena na gṛhyete smaraṇa anubhavau kvacid svapne tu smṛtiḥ eva ekā tathātvena na gṛhyate sadṛśa darśanāt vinā smṛtiḥ eva kutastyeti ced na nānā kāraṇaka tvāt smaraṇasya nidrā kaṣāyitam api antaḥkaraṇam smaraṇa kāraṇam bhavati eva 
[I,463,vi_I,464,i]	yadi evam dvi candra tikta śarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu katham smṛti pramoṣaḥ āḥ kuṇḍaśekhara katham asakṛt abhihitam api na budhyase na sarvatra smṛteḥ eva pramoṣaḥ abhyupagamyate kintva khyātiḥ atas ca asau kathañcid kasya cit kvacid bhavati anubhava smṛtyoḥ viveka agrahaṇam kvacid kvacid tu smaryamāṇasya tathā tvena anupagrahaḥ dvidhā kṛtā kvacid vṛttiḥ netrasya timira ādinā na hi grahītum aikyena śaknoti śiśira tviṣam kvacid rasana saṃpṛkte pitte tikta tva vedanāt paricchettum na śaknoti mādhuryam śarkarā gatam gṛhṇāti yat tu tikta tvam vastutas pitta varti tat tathā tu na vijānāti nigiran eṣa śarkarām etena pīta śaṅkha ādi khyātayaḥ api vyākhyātāḥ 
[I,464,ii]	tat evam sati sarvatra samyak agrahaṇam bhramaḥ na mithyā pratyayaḥ kaścid asti śaṅkā nibandhanam ajāta mithyā āśaṅkaḥ ca na saṃvādam apekṣate tasmāt na kaścid paratas prāmāṇyam adhigacchati evam svatas pramāṇa tve siddhe vede api sā gatiḥ aṃpavāda dvaya abhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ca atra pūrvavat 
[I,465,i]	atra pratividhīyate yat uktam idam rajata miti smaraṇa anubhava svabhāve vivekena āgṛhyamāṇe dve ete jñāne iti tat asāṃpratam pratyabhijñāvat eka tvena eva saṃvedyamāna tvāt yat eva idam puras avasthitam bhāsvara rūpa ādi adhikaraṇam dharmi sāmānyam tat eva rajatam iti viśeṣataḥ pratipādyate yat idam agratas sthitam tat rajatam iti satya rajata pratīti vat anubhūta tayā hi na rajatam atra prakāśate kintu anubhūyamāna tayā anubhūta tā grahaṇam ca smaraṇam ucyate na anubhūyamāna tā grahaṇam 
[I,465,ii]	sva prakāśā ca saṃvittiḥ iti bhavatām darśanam tatra eṣām rajata saṃvittiḥ kena rūpeṇa prakāśa tām iti cintyam yadi smaraṇa ātmanā kaḥ pramoṣa arthaḥ atha anubhava ātmanā tat iyam viparīta khyātiḥ eva smṛteḥ anubhava tvena śukteḥ iva rajata tvena pratibhāsāt 
[I,465,iii]	atha saṃvid mātra tayā eva prakāśate tat api na yuktam rajata viṣaya ullekhāt smaraṇa anubhava viśeṣa rahitāyāḥ ca viṣaya saṃvitteḥ anupapatteḥ na ca iyam apratipattiḥ eva iti vaktum ucitam mada mūrchā ādi daśa avisadṛśa sva prakāśa saṃvedana anubhavāt yathā idam iti aṃśe sva prakāśam saṃvedanam tathā eva rajatam iti atra api 
[I,466,i]	api ca dvayoḥ ca aṃśayoḥ samāne saṃvedane tatra ekam pratyakṣa labdham aparam smaraṇa phalam iti kutastyaḥ vibhāgaḥ idam iti atra ca kim avabhāsate iti nirūpyatām yadi śukti kāśa kalam sakala svagata viśeṣa khacitam avabhāti tadā tad darśane sati rajata smaraṇasya kaḥ avasaraḥ bhavat api vā sādṛśya kṛtam smaraṇam na tad avivekāya kalpate devadatta darśana anantara udgata tad sadṛśa puruṣa antara smaraṇa vat 
[I,466,ii]	atha dharmi mātram idam iti pratyaye pratibhāti na śukti śakalam tat vāḍham iṣyate tat eva ca idam sāmānya dharma grahaṇa vaśa viruddha saṃskāra upanibandhana viruddha viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇakam idam rajatam iti sāmānya upakrame viśeṣa paryavasānam jñānam yat idam tat rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇya avamarśāt rajata anubhava abhimānena eva ca rajata arthī tatra pravartate 
[I,466,iii_I,467,i]	nanu smaraṇa anubhavayoḥ vivekam apratipadyamānaḥ pravartate iti uktam śrutam idam yat atra bhavadbhiḥ dharma kīrti gṛhāt āhṛtam dṛśya vikalpau arthau ekīkṛtya pravartate iti kiñca cauryam api idam na kathañcana sva artham puṣṇāti yāvat hi dṛśyam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat katham dṛśya arthinaḥ tatra pravṛttiḥ evam iha api yāvat rajatam gṛhītam iti na jātaḥ pratyayaḥ tāvat kutas tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ tasmāt asti rajata grahaṇam na tu tad smaraṇa pramoṣa mātram 
[I,467,ii]	nanu rajata smaraṇam viparīta khyāti vādibhiḥ api aṅgīkṛtam iti uktam satyam rajata gata viśeṣa smaraṇam abhyupagatam yathā hi puras avasthite dharmiṇī ūrdhva tva ādi sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt sthāṇu puruṣa gata viśeṣa agrahaṇāt ubhaya viśeṣa smṛteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati evam iha api tejasvi ta ādi sāmānya dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt rajata gata viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca tasmin dharmiṇi rajata pratyayaḥ bhavati viparyaya ātmakaḥ saṃśaye hi ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇam kāraṇam iha tu anyatara viśeṣa smaraṇam iti viśeṣaḥ atas eva ca agṛhīta rajatasya idam jñānam na utpadyate sadṛśa agrahaṇe vā niśītha ādau iti 
[I,467,iii]	na tu etāvatā smaraṇa mātram eva idam itīyati sthātavyam smaraṇa janyasya viparyaya pratyayasya api saṃvedanāt atas eva tad pṛṣṭha bhā vi parāmarśa vādinaḥ varam satya vācaḥ te hi pratibhāsam na nihnuvate 
[I,468,i]	yat tu viparyaya avagateḥ kāraṇam vikalpitam tatra uktam eva prāmāṇikaiḥ kāryam ced avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā kāryam ced na avagamyeta kim kāraṇa parīkṣayā iti kārya akasmika tā anupapatteḥ ca kalpyatām kāraṇam tat ca kḷptam eva doṣa sahitam indriyam yathā saṃskāra sahakāri pratyabhijñāyām iti 
[I,468,ii_I,468,iii]	suvate śālayaḥ duṣṭā na yadi api yava aṅkuram śāli kāryam tu apūpa ādi janayanti eva kalmaṣam tasmāt doṣa kalitāt indriyāt puras avasthita dharmi gata trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa avamarśa kauśala śūnyāt sāmānya dharma sahacarita padārtha antara gata viśeṣa smaraṇa upakṛtāt bhavati viparīta pratyayaḥ samyat jñāna apekṣayā ca tat duṣṭam ucyate sva kārye tu viparyaya jñāne tad kāraṇam eva na duṣṭam tasmāt rajatam iti anubhavaḥ eva na pramuṣita smṛtiḥ 
[I,469,i]	api ca na idam rajatam iti bādhaka jñānam pūrva anubhava viṣayīkṛta rajata niṣedham adhigamayat utpadyate na idam rajatam iti yat aham adrākṣam tat rajatam na bhavati iti prasaktasya ca ayam niṣedhaḥ ananubhūtam tu aprasaktam api pratiṣidhyamānam rajatam iva kanakam api kim iti na pratiṣidhyate 
[I,469,ii]	yat tu vyākhyātam prāc anavagata smaraṇa anubhava viveka pratipādakam bādhaka jñānam iti tat vyākhyāna mātram eva tathā ananubhavāt na hi evam bādhakam utpadyateyat aviviktam tat viviktam iti atas yat kiñcid etat tasmāt na rajata smaraṇam rajate vā kadācid anubhavaḥ abhūt iti smaraṇam abhidhīyamānam na atyantam alaukikam 
[I,469,iii]	svapne tu sva śira cheda ādeḥ atyantān anubhūtasya smṛtiḥ iti kathyamānam eva trapākaram janma antare nijam asta kalavanam anubhūtam anena iti ced idam api subhāṣitataram yat janma antara anubhūtam smaryate tatra ca kutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ yat kadācid eva smaryate na sarvadā sarvam iti 
[I,469,iv]	nanu bhavatā api asat khyātim nirasyatā svapna jñāneṣu tādṛkṣu kim vaktam yat vaktavyam tat tatra eva śroṣyasi asat na pratibhāti iti ucyate na tu ananubhūtam iti 
[I,470,i]	nanu ananubhūtam sat katham jānīṣe sat iti ced jñānam tad anubhūtam iti mā evam mayā tat na anubhūtam anyena anubhaviṣyate para anubhūtam ca sat iti śakyate vaktum para anubhūte tu smaraṇam aghaṭamānam iti na āvayoḥ atra vastuni samāna yogakṣema tvam 
[I,470,ii]	api ca bhavat mate svapna smṛteḥ smṛti tvena agrahaṇe kena rūpeṇa grahaṇam iti cintyam rūpa antareṇa grahaṇe viparīta khyātiḥ sarva ātmanā tu agrahaṇe svapna suṣuptyoḥ avi śeṣa prasaṅgaḥ anubhava pratyayaḥ ca svapne saṃvedyate na smaraṇa anullekha mātram iti durabhi niveśaḥ eva smṛti pramoṣa samarthanam nāma iti 
[I,470,iii_I,471,i]	dvi candra ādi pratyayeṣu katham akhyātiḥ nanu uktam timira sīmanti tā nayana vṛttiḥ eka tvena gṛhītum na śaknoti śaśāṅkam iti bhoḥ śrotriya tādṛśī dṛśaḥ vṛttiḥ eka tvam indoḥ mā grahīt dvi tva anubhavam tu bhāntam kva pracchādayāmaḥ nanu cakṣuḥ vṛttau tad dvi tvam tad gata tvena tu yat tasya agrahaṇam saḥ eva bhramaḥ na etat evam netra vṛtteḥ sarvatra parokṣa tvāt kim eka candra bodhe api vṛtti eka tvam pratīyate iyam hi agṛhyamāṇā eva cakṣuḥ vṛttiḥ prakāśikā evam ucyamāne ca eka candra grahaṇe api vṛtti ekatva agrahaṇāt akhyātiḥ eva bhavet 
[I,471,ii_I,471,iv]	yat api tiktaśarkarā ādi pratyayeṣu akhyāti samarthana ka dā āśayā pitta vṛtteḥ tikta tvasya saṃvedyamānasya tad sthatvena agrahaṇam upavarṇitam tat api kuśa kāśa avalambana prāyam mohāt pitta gata tvena tikta tā ced na gṛhyate mā grāhi śarkarāyām tu kiṃkṛtā tikta tā matiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyena hi tiktā śarkarā iti tad adhikaraṇā tikta tā pratītiḥ upajāyate pittam tu indriya stham timira vat agṛhyamāṇam api bhramam upajanayati śarīra stham iva jvaram śiraḥ arti ādi rogam iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,471,v]	evam sarvatra na akhyātiḥ nirvahanti iva lakṣyate na ca etayā api paratas prāmāṇyam upahanyate rajate anubhavaḥ kim syāt uta pramuṣitā matiḥ dvaividhya darśanāt evam bhavet tatra api saṃśayaḥ saṃśayānaḥ ca saṃvādam nūnam anveṣate janaḥ tad apekṣā akṛtam tasmāt prāmāṇyam paratas dhruvam 
[I,472,i]	na ca eṣa śūnya vādasya pratīkāra kriyā kramaḥ anartha jā hi nirdagdha pitṛ ādau bhavati smṛtiḥ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya tām eva śūnya vādī samutthitaḥ bhrama apahnava mātreṇa pratihantum na śakyate 
[I,472,ii_I,472,iii]	atha asti kācid paratas prāmāṇyasya niṣedhikā śūnya vādasya yā yuktiḥ sā eva vācyā kim etayā tasmāt yathārtham asyāḥ saṃśrayaṇam tat na niṣiddhamakhyāteḥ saṃvid virodhaḥ eva prakaṭitaḥ iti dhik pramādi tvam tat uktam kṛtaḥ ca śīla vidhvaṃsaḥ na ca anaṅgaḥ ca saṅgataḥ ātmā ca lāghavam nītaḥ tat ca kāryam na sādhitam iti
[I,472,iv_I,473,i]	yat punar viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam āśaṅkya dūṣitam tat api na yuktam astu tāvat ayam eva ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ rajatam ālambanam tat eva ca asyām pratītau parisphurati iti nanu atra coditam asat khyātiḥ eva sā bhavet iti na etat sādhu deśa antara ādau rajatasya vidyamāna tvāt asat khyāti pakṣe hi ekānta asataḥ arthasya pratibhānam aṅgīkriyate iha tu deśa antara ādau vidyamānasya iti mahān bhedaḥ 
[I,473,ii_I,473,iii]	nanu tatra asataḥ arthasya kim deśa antara cintayā kim kurmaḥ tādṛśasya eva vastunaḥ khyāti darśanāt yaḥ tu deśa antare api arthaḥ na asti kāla antare api vā na tasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam gagana indīvara ādi vat ayam eva ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat ekasya grahaṇam dṛṣṭam itarasya na dṛṣṭam iti 
[I,473,iv_I,473,v]	nanu uktam tatra asataḥ arthasya katham jñāna janaka tvam ajanakasya vā katham pratibhāsaḥ uktam atra sadṛśa padārtha darśana udbhūta smṛti upasthāpitasya rajatasya atra pratibhāsanam iti na ca asya upasthāpanam paśoḥ iva rajvā saṃyamya ḍhaukanam api tu hṛdaye parisphurataḥ arthasya bahis avabhāsanam na ca etāvatā iyam ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ vā iti vaktavyam vijñānāt viccheda pratīteḥ atyanta asad artha pratibhāsā bhāvāt ca iti 
[I,473,vi_I,474,i]	athavā pihita sva ākārā parigṛhīta parākārā śuktikā eva atra pratibhāti iti bhavatu dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ nanu uktam kṛtyā sītā vat kim idam veśa bhāṣā parivartanam katham ca rajata jñāne śuktikā avabhāsitum arhati iti śrutam idam nāṭakam na tu vayam atra upahāsa pātram śuktikā iti vastu sthitiḥ eṣā kathyate puras avasthitam dharmi mātram bhāsvara rūpa ādi sādṛśya upajanita rajata viśeṣa smaraṇam atra pratibhāti iti brūmaḥ yat etat puras kim api vartate tat rajatam iti anubhavāt vastu sthityā tu śuktiḥ eva sā trikoṇa tva ādi viśeṣa grahaṇa abhāvāt ca nigūhita nija ākārā iti ucyate rajata viśeṣa smaraṇāt ca parigṛhīta rajata ākāra iti 
[I,474,ii]	etat ca viṣaya indriya ādi doṣa prabhaveṣu śuktikā rajata avabhāsa bhāskara kiraṇa jala avagama jalada gandharvanagara nirvarṇana rajju bhujaga grahaṇa rohiṇī ramaṇa dvaya darśana śaṅkha śarkarā pīta tikta tāvasāya keśa kūrcaka ālokana ādi vibhrameṣu abhyupagamyate manaḥ doṣa nibandhaneṣu tu mithyā pratyayeṣu nirālambaneṣu smṛti ullikhitaḥ eva ākāraḥ prakāśate iti 
[I,474,iii_I,474,iv]	yaḥ tu tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ anyat ālambanam anyaḥ ca pratibhāti iti kaiścid āśritaḥ tatra api na sannihitasya ālambana tvam ucyate yena bhū pradeśasya api tathā atvam āśaṅkyeta na api janakasya ālambana tvam yat cakṣuḥ ādau api prasajyeta kintu idam iti aṅgulyā nirdiśyamānam karma tayā yat jñānasya janakam tad ālambanam iti ucyamāne na kaścid doṣaḥ 
[I,474,v_I,475,ii]	nanu keśoṇḍuka jñāne kim ālambana kāraṇam kiñcid tu timiram romarājiḥ iva nayana dhāmnaḥ madhye eva āste tena dvidhā kṛtā nayana vṛttiḥ dvi tvena candramasam gṛhṇāti kiñcid tu timiram tatra vivara vat antarā antarā tiṣṭhati cakṣuṣaḥ tena virala prasṛtāḥ nayana raśmayaḥ sūkṣmāḥ sūrya aṃśubhiḥ upahanyamānāḥ keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ bhavanti iti tat eva ālambanam anudite astamite vā savitari keśoṇḍuka pratyayasya anutpādāt gandharvanagara jñāne jaladāḥ pāṇḍura tviṣaḥ ālambanam gṛha aṭṭala prakāra ākāra dhāriṇaḥ tasmāt viparīta khyātau pakṣa trayam api niravadyam 
[I,475,iii]	yaḥ punar itaretara saṅkaraḥ khyātīnām udāhāri tatra ātma khyāti akhyātī apavarga āhnike vayam api vijñānāt vaitam apākariṣyantaḥ parākariṣyāmaḥ iti kim tad cintayā viparīta khyātau tu tat sāṅkaryam parihṛtam 
[I,475,iv]	yat punar avādi sarva vādibhiḥ smṛti pramoṣaḥ abhyupagataḥ eva prābhākaraiḥ tuyaśaḥ pītam iti tatra vādi antarāṇi tāvat yathā bhavanti tathā bhavantu vayam tu smṛti upārūḍha rajata ādi ākāra pratibhāsam abhivadantaḥ bāḍham smṛti pramopam abhyupagatavantaḥ kintu na tāvatī eva viśrāmyati matiḥ api tu rajata ādi anubhavaḥ api saṃvedyate iti na smṛti pramoṣa mātraḥ eva virantavyam atas viparīta khyāti pakṣaḥ eva niravadyaḥ iti sthitam 
[I,476,i]	yaḥ tu bādha prakāraḥ prāc vikalpitaḥ tatra saha anavasthāna saṃskāra uccheda ādi pakṣāḥ anabhyupagamena eva nirastāḥ iti asthāne kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ āyuṣmatā anubhūtaḥ viṣaya apahāraḥ tāvat astu bādhaḥ viṣayasya ca na pratibhāta tvam apahriyate kintu pratibhātasya asattvam khyāpyate iti apahāra arthaḥ asattvam api na idānīm upanatasya khyāpyate yena pūrva dṛṣṭaḥ draghaṇa bhagna kumbha abhāva pratibhāsa vat a bādhaḥ syāt na ca tadānīm api abhāva grahaṇe vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam āśaṅkanīyam pūrva avagata ākāra upamarda dvāreṇa bādhaka pratyaya utpādāt yat mayā tadā rajatam iti gṛhītam tat rajatam na bhavati anyat eva tat vastu iti 
[I,476,ii]	nanu sva kāla niyata tvāt jñānānām katham uttarasya jñānasya pūrva jñāna utpāda kāla avacchinna tad viṣaya abhāva grahaṇa sāmarthyam kim kurmaḥ tathā pratyaya utpādāt na bhagna ghaṭa vat idānīm tat na astitāḥ gṛhyate api tu tadā eva tat asat iti pratītiḥ yathā ca na vartamāna eka niṣṭhāḥ eva viṣaya pratītayaḥ tathā kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,476,iii_I,477,ii]	athavā phala apahāraḥ bhavatu bādhaḥ pramāṇa phala tvam ca hāna ādi buddhīnām pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe varṇitam iti tad apaharaṇāt pramāṇam bādhitam bhavati eva kiṃkurvatā bādhakena pramāṇa phalam apahṛtam iti ced gāyatā nṛtyatā vā api japatā juhvatā api vā tat ced kāryam kṛtam tena kim avāntara karmaṇā tad abhyupagame vā api tat kim vidadhatā kṛtam tat ca kim kurvata iti evam avadhiḥ kaḥ bhaviṣyati tad alam amunā avāntara praśnena sarvathā bādhaka pratyaya upajanane sati hāna ādi rūpam pūrva pramāṇa phalam nivartate iti tena tat bādhitam ucyate 
[I,477,iii_I,477,iv]	samāna asamāna viṣaya vikalpaḥ api na peśalaḥ ekasmin viṣaye viruddha ākāra grāhiṇoḥ jñānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva abhyupagamāt citra ādi pratyaye katham na bādhaḥ iti ced pūrva jñāna upamardena uttara vijñāna anutpādāt atas eva ekatra api dharmiṇi bahūnām dharmāṇām itaretarān upamardena vedyamānānām asti eva samāveśaḥ 
[I,477,v]	pūrva upamardena uttara vijñāna janmataḥ ca etat api pratyuktam bhavati yat uktam pūrvasmin pratyaye prāpta pratiṣṭhe satya āgantu jñānam uttaram bādhyatām iti yatas pūrva upamardena eva tad uttaram jñānam udeti viṣaya sahāya tvāt pramāṇa antara anugṛhyamāṇa tvāt ca uttaram eva jñānam bādhakam iti yuktam tasmāt asti jñānānām bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ sa ca ayam bādha vyavahāraḥ viparīta khyāti pakṣaḥ eva sāmarthyam askhalitam dadhāti iti saḥ eva jyāyān 
[I,478,i]	ajñaḥ kaḥ api nāma mīmāṃsakaḥ tu āha yā iyam śuktikāyām rajata pratītiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ iti tad vādinām abhimatā sā tathā na bhavati iti satya rajata pratīti vat atra api avabhāsya rajata sadbhāvāt laukika alaukika tve tu viśeṣaḥ rajata jñāna avabhāsyam hi rajatam ucyate tat ca kiñcid vyavahāra pravartakam kiñcinnā iti tatra vyavahāra pravartakam laukikam ucyate tatas anyat alaukikam iti yat ca śukti kāśakalam iti bhavantaḥ badanti tat alaukikam rajatam rajata jñāna avabhāsya tvāt rajatam tat vyavahāra apravṛtteḥ alaukikam iti 
[I,478,ii_I,478,iii]	tat etat aparāmṛṣṭa saṃvedana iti vṛttasya abhinava padārtha sarga prajāpateḥ abhidhānam bādhaka pratyayena tatra rajata abhāvasya khyāpanāt na idam rajatam iti hi rajatam pratiṣedhati eṣa pratyayaḥ na vidyamāna rajatasya alaukika tvam avadyotayati iti atha na idam laukikam iti vyākhyāyate hanta vākya śeṣaḥ kriyatām saṃyajatraiḥ aṅgāni itivat saḥ ayam śrotriyaḥ sva śāstra vartanīm iha api na tām tyajati na tu tasyāḥ ayam avasaraḥ agṛhyamāṇe tu rajata ākhye anya dharmiṇi katham tad dharma tvena laukika tvam gṛhyate rajata abhāva grahaṇe tu eṣa na doṣaḥ bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ dharma dharmi bhāva abhāvāt smaryamāṇa pratiyogi avacchinnaḥ hi abhāvaḥ gṛhyate eva tasmāt atra mā asti eva rajatam na punar ala ekikam tat asti 
[I,479,i]	na ca rajata jñāna avabhāsya tva mātram rajata lakṣaṇam api tu abādhita rejata jñāna gamya tvam 
[I,479,ii_I,480,i]	api ca laukika alaukika pravibhāgaḥ pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ vā syāt vyavahāra sat asadbhāva nibandhanaḥ vā na tāvat pratibhāsa nibandhanaḥ tathā pratīti abhāvāt kvacid hi rajatam kvacid ca tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate na tu laukika tvam alaukika tvam vā atha vyavahāra pravṛtti apravṛttibhyām laukika alaukika tve vyavasthā apyete tat vaktavyam kaḥ ayam vyavahāraḥ nāma iti jñāna abhidhāna svabhāvaḥ hi vyavahāraḥ sa ca tad viṣayaḥ na asti iti uktam tad artha kriyā nirvartanam vyavahāraḥ iti ced tarhi svapne parirabhyamāṇāyāḥ yoṣitaḥ kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇasya ca laukika tvam prāpnoti utpadya naṣṭe ghaṭe artha kriyāyāḥ nivṛtteḥ alaukika tvam syāt api ca yaḥ śuktikāyām rajata vyavahāram na karoti sa rajata abhāvam eva buddhvā na rajatasya sataḥ tasya alaukika tām 
[I,480,ii]	yadi ca idam alaukikam rajatam tat kimartham iha tad artha kriyā artham pravartate alaukikam laukika tvena gṛhītvā iti ced sā eva iyam tapasvinī viparīta khyātiḥ āyātā tasmāt viparīta khyāti dveṣeṇa kṛtam īdṛśā atra api loka siddhā eva pratītiḥ anugamyatām 
[I,480,iii]	na vā mīmāṃsakāḥ ete sva bhāryām api veśmataḥ nissārayitum icchanti svatas prāmāṇya tṛṣṇayā na ca evam api tad siddhiḥ buddhi dvaividhya darśanāt saṃśaye sati saṃvādasa apekṣa tvam tathā eva tat kleśena tad amunā api sva arthaḥ teṣām prasiddhyati na kaścid yat bhavati daiva gatyā rāja pathena eva tat bhavatu 
[I,481,i]	na ātma khyātiḥ bāhya tayā artha pratibhāsāt na asat khyātiḥ na hi asatām dhī viṣaya tvam uktaḥ akhyātau dūṣaṇa mārgaḥ viparīta khyātiḥ tasmāt āśrayaṇīyā matimadbhiḥ 
[I,481,ii]	sthite ca tasmin viparīta vedane tadīya sādharmya kṛtaḥ asti saṃśayaḥ tadā ca saṃvāda mukha pratīkṣaṇāt bhajanti bodhāḥ paratas pramāṇa tām pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇānām tat yathā astu tathā astu vā śabdasya hi pramāṇa tvam paratas mukta saṃśayam 
[I,481,iii]	dṛṣṭe hi viṣaye prāmāṇya niścayam antareṇa eva laghu pariśrameṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ iti tad upayogi pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa prāmāṇya niścaye durupapāde kaḥ abhiniveśaḥ śabde punar adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha patha upadeśini prāmāṇyam aniniścatya mahā prayatna nirvartyāni jyotiṣṭoma ādīni na prekṣā pūrva kāriṇaḥ yajvānaḥ prayuñjīrat iti a vaśyam niścetavyam tatra prāmāṇyam tat ca paratas eva iti brūmaḥ 
[I,481,iv]	śabdasya vṛddha vyavahāra adhigata sambandha upakṛtasya sataḥ pratīti janaka tvam nāma rūpam avadhṛtam tat tu naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha mahimnā vā puruṣa ghaṭita samaya sambandha valena vā iti vicārayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśaka tva mātram tu dīpa ādeḥ iva tasya rūpam yathā hi dīpaḥ prakāśamānaḥ śucim aśucim vā yathāsannitahitam artham avadyotayati tathā śabdaḥ api puruṣeṇa prayojyamānaḥ śravaṇa patham upagataḥ satye anṛte avā samanvite asamanvite vā sa phale niṣphale vā siddhe kārye vā arthe pramitim upajanayati iti tāvat eva asya rūpam ayam tu dīpāt śabdasya viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa sambandha vyutpattim apekṣamāṇaḥ pramām utpādayati iti dīpaḥ tu tad nirapekṣaḥ iti 
[I,482,i]	tasyāḥ śabda janitāyāḥ pramiteḥ yathārtha itara tvam puruṣa darśana adhīnam samyak darśini śucau puruṣe sati satya arthā sā bhavati pratītiḥ itarathā tu tad viparītā iti tatra yathā naisargikam artha saṃsparśi tvam śabdasya rūpam iti samarthitam evam asya svābhāvikam satya artha tvam api na rūpam evam abhyupagamyamāne vipralambha kavacā asi visaṃvāda darśanam na bhavet tasmāt puruṣa guṇa doṣa adhīnau eva śābde pratyaye saṃvāda visaṃvādau 
[I,482,ii]	na ca indriya ādau iva tatra durbhaṇāḥ guṇāḥ rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ karuṇā ādayaḥ guṇāḥ puruṣāṇām atiprasiddhāḥ eva puruṣa guṇāḥ eva śabdasya guṇāḥ na sva śarīra saṃsthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādeḥ iva iti tatra yadi puruṣa guṇānām prāmāṇya kāraṇa tā na iṣyate doṣāṇām api viplava hetu tā mā bhūt 
[I,483,i]	yat tu doṣa praśamana caritārthāḥ eva puruṣa guṇāḥ prāmāṇya hetavaḥ tu na bhavanti iti atra śapatha śaraṇāḥ eva śrotriyāḥ na ca bādha anutpatti mātreṇa vaidikyāḥ pratīteḥ prāmāṇyam bhavitum arhati pakṣmalākṣī lakṣam abhiramayet vidyādhara pada kāmaḥ iti ādau api prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt uktam ca kena cit yathā hi svapna dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ kaścid vīpa antara ādiṣu asaṃbhavat visaṃvādaḥ śraddhātum na eva śakyate tathā ca udanayā api artham bodhyamānam atīndriyam asaṃbhavat visaṃvādam na śraddadhati ke cana iti
[I,483,ii_I,483,iii]	tatra svapna jñāne hetuḥ nidrā ādi doṣaḥ asti iti duṣṭa kāraṇa jñānāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced lola akṣī lakṣa vākye kim vakṣyasi prabhavaḥ tasya na jñāyate iti ced na tarāmasau vede api tvad mate jñāyate iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ mahā jana ādi parigrahaḥ asya na asti iti ced anveṣaṇīyam tarhi prāmāṇya kāraṇam na buddhi utpādaka tvāt eva autsargikam prāmāṇyam iti yuktam sākṣāt draṣṭṛ nara ukta tvam śabde yāvat na niścitam bādhā anutpatti mātreṇa na tāvat tad pramāṇa tā 
[I,483,iv]	yat api vede kāraṇa doṣa nirākaraṇāya kathyate yat vā vaktuḥ abhāvena na syuḥ doṣāḥ nirāśrayāḥ iti tat api asāṃpratam asati vaktari prāmāṇya hetūnām guṇānām api abhāvena tad prāmāṇyasya api abhāvāt na ca vede vaktuḥ abhāvaḥ su vacaḥ tathā hi etat eva tāvat vicārayāmaḥ kim vede vaktā vidyate na vā iti 
[I,484,i]	nanu vede pramāṇa antara saṃsparśa rahita vicitra karma phala gata sādhya sādhana bhāva upadeśini katham tad artha sākṣāt darśī puruṣaḥ upadeṣṭā bhavet ucyate vedasya puruṣaḥ kartā na hi yādṛśa tādṛśaḥ kintu trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ sa devaḥ paramaḥ jñātā nitya ānandaḥ kṛpā anvitaḥ kleśa karma vipāka ādi parāmarśa vivarjitaḥ 
[I,484,ii]	atra āha kim brūṣe trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇa matiḥ iti aho tava saralam ati tvam na hi tathāvidha puruṣa sadbhāve kiñcana pramāṇam asti 
[I,484,iii]	tathā hi īśvara sadbhāvaḥ na pratyakṣa pramāṇakaḥ na hi asau akṣa vijñāne rūpa ādiḥ iva bhāsate na ca mānasa vijñāna saṃvedyaḥ ayam sukha ādi vat yogi nām aprasiddha tvāt na tad pratyakṣa gocaraḥ 
[I,484,iv]	pratyakṣa pratiṣedhena tad pūrvakam apākṛtam anumānam anirjñāte tasmin vyāpti anupagrahāt 
[I,485,i]	na ca sāmānyatas dṛṣṭam liṅgam asya asti kiñcana kṣiti ādīnām tu kārya tvam asiddham sudhiyaḥ prati śaila ādi sanniveśaḥ api na eṣa kartṛ anumāpakaḥ kartṛ pūrvaka kumbha ādi sanniveśa vilakṣaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kartṛ avinābhāvī sanniveśaḥ hi yādṛśaḥ tādṛś naga ādau na asti iti kāryatva vat asiddha tā 
[I,485,ii]	siddha tve api na hetu tvam anaikāntyāt tṛṇādimiḥ akṛṣṭa jātaiḥ kartāram antareṇa āpta janmabhiḥ teṣām utpatti samaya pratyakṣa tvena labhyate kartuḥ dṛśya tvam api evam abhāvaḥ anupalabdhitaḥ 
[I,485,iii]	na ca kṣiti jala prāya dṛṣṭa hetu atirekiṇaḥ kasya api kalpanam teṣu yujyate ati prasaṅgataḥ tena kartuḥ abhāve api sanniveśa ādi darśanāt anaikāntika tā hetoḥ vipra tve puruṣa tva vat 
[I,486,i]	kiñca vyāpti anusāreṇa kalpyamānaḥ prasiddhyati kulāla tulyaḥ kartā iti syāt viśeṣa viruddha tā vyāpāra vān a sarva jñaḥ śarīrī kleśa saṃkulaḥ ghaṭasya yādṛśaḥ kartā tādṛś eva bhavet bhuvaḥ viśeṣa sādhyatāyām vā sādhya hīnam nidarśanam kartṛ sāmānya siddhau tu viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas 
[I,486,ii_I,487,ii]	api ca sa śarīraḥ vā jaganti racayet īśvaraḥ śarīra rahitaḥ vā śarīram api ca tadīyam kāryam nityam vā bhavet sarvathā anupapattiḥ aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛśyate na hi kasya cit dehaḥ api utpatti mānasya deha tvāt caitra deha vat kāryam api īśvara śarīram tat kartṛkam vā syāt īśvara antara kartṛkam vā tatra svayam nija śarīrasya nirmāṇam iti sāhasam kartṛ antara kṛte tasmin īśvara ānantyam āpatet bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva doṣaḥ ekasya api tāvat īśvasya sādhane paryākula tām gatāḥ kim punar anantānām 
[I,487,iii]	kiñca vyāpāreṇa vā kulāla ādiḥ iva kāryāṇi sṛjet īśvaraḥ icchā mātreṇa vā dvayam api durghaṭam vyāpāreṇa jagat sṛṣṭiḥ kutas yuga śataiḥ api tad icchām ca anuvartante na jaḍāḥ paramāṇavaḥ 
[I,487,iv]	api ca kim kim api prayojanam anusandhāya jagat sarge pravartate prajāpatiḥ evam eva vā niṣprayojanāyām pravṛttau aprekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt unmatta tulyaḥ asau bhavet pūrvaḥ api na asti pakṣaḥ avāpta sarva ānandasya rāga ādi rahita ātmanaḥ jagat ārabhamāṇasya na vidmaḥ kim prayojanam 
[I,488,i_I,488,iii]	anukampayā pravartate iti ced mā evam sargāt pūrvam hi niśśeṣa kleśa saṃsparśa varjitāḥ na asya muktāḥ iva ātmānaḥ bhavanti karuṇā āspadam parama kāruṇikānām api dussaha duḥkha dahana dandahyamāna manasaḥ jantūn abalokayatām udeti dayā na punar apavarga daśā vat aśeṣa duḥkha śūnyān iti karuṇā amṛta saṃsikta hṛdayaḥ vā jagat sṛjan katham sṛjati durvāra duḥkha prāgbhāra dāruṇam 
[I,488,iv]	atha kevalam sukha upabhoga prāyam jagat sraṣṭum eva na jānāti sṛṣṭam api vā na ciram avatiṣṭhate iti ucyate tat api acāru niratiśaya svātantrya si imani vartamānasya sva icchā anuvarti sakala padārtha sthiteḥ parameśvarasya krima sādhyam nāma bhavet 
[I,488,v]	nānā ātma gata śubha aśubha karma kalāpa apekṣaḥ sraṣṭā prajāpatiḥ iti ced karmāṇi eva hi tarhi sṛjantu jaganti kim prajāpatinā 
[I,488,vi]	atha acetanānām cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sraṣṭṛ tvam aghaṭa mānam iti teṣām adhiṣṭhātā cetanaḥ kalpyate iti ced na tad āśrayāṇām ātmanām eva cetana tvāt te eva adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti kim adhiṣṭhā tṛ antareṇa īśvareṇa 
[I,489,i]	tasya api tādṛśā parakīya karma antara apekṣā saṅkocita svātantryeṇa kim aiśvaryeṇa kāryam rājyam iva mantri para vaśam aiśvaryam kva upayujyate tādṛś yatra apara nirapekṣam rucyā eva na racyate abhimatam anyena api uktam kim īśvaratayā īśvaraḥ yadi na vartate sva icchayā na hi prabhavatām kriyā vidhiṣu hetuḥ anviṣyate iti
[I,489,ii_I,489,iv]	atha krīḍā arthāḥ jagat sarge bhagavataḥ pravṛttiḥ īdṛśā ca śubha aśubha rūpeṇa jagatā sṛṣṭena krīḍati parameśvaraḥ iti ucyate tarhi krīḍā sādhya sukha rahita tvena sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam avāpta sakala ānanda tvam nāma tasya rūpam apa hīyeta na ca krīḍā api niśśeṣa jana tā aataṅka kāriṇī āyāsa bahulā ca iyam kartum yuktāḥ mahātmanaḥ tasmāt na jagatām nāthaḥ īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā saṃhartā api bhavati 
[I,489,v]	na hi asya dhriyamāṇeṣu pūryate jantu karmasu sakṛt samasta trailokya nirmūlana manorathaḥ karma uparama pakṣe tu punar sṛṣṭiḥ na yujyate na karma nirapekṣaḥ hi sarga vaicitrya saṃbhavaḥ 
[I,490,i]	atha brāhmeṇa mānena saṃvatsara śata niṣṭhām adhitiṣṭhati parameṣṭhini maheśvarasya saṃjihīrṣā jāyate tayā tirohita sva phala ārambha śaktīni karmāṇi saṃbhavanti iti saṃpadyate sakala bhuvana pralayaḥ punar ca tāvatī eva rātri prāye kāle vyatīte sisṛkṣā bhavati bhagavataḥ tayā abhivyakta śaktīni karmāṇi kāryam āranbhate iti tat api ayuktam udbhava abhibhavau teṣām syātām ced īśvara icchayā tarhi sā eva astu jagatām sarga saṃhāra kāraṇam 
[I,490,ii]	kim karmabhiḥ evam astu iticed na īśvara icchā vaśi tva pakṣe hi trayaḥ duratikramāḥ doṣāḥ tasya eva tāvat mahātmanaḥ niṣkaruṇa tvam akāraṇam eva dāruṇa sarga kāriṇaḥ tathā vaidikīnām vidhi niṣedha codanānām ānarthakyam īśvara icchātaḥ eva śubha aśubha phala upabhoga saṃbhavāt anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca muktāḥ api pralaya samayaḥ iva jīvāḥ punar īśvara icchayā saṃsareyuḥ tasmāt na īśvara adhīnaḥ jagatām sargaḥ saṃhāraḥ vā 
[I,490,iii]	iti anantara gītena nayena īśvara sādhane na anumānasya sāmarthyam upamāne tu kā kathā 
[I,491,i_I,491,ii]	agamasya api nityasya tat paratvam asāṃpratam tad praṇīte tu visraṃbhaḥ katham bhavatu mādṛśām kiñca āgamasya prāmāṇyam tad praṇīta tva hetukam tad prāmāṇyāt ca tad siddhiḥ iti anyonya āśrayam bhavet anyathā anupapattyā tu na śakyaḥ labdhum īśvaraḥ na hi tat dṛśyate kāryam tam vinā yat na siddhyati tasmāt sarva sat viṣaya pramāṇa an avagamyamāna svarūpa tvāt abhāvaḥ eva īśvarasya iti siddham 
[I,491,iii]	na ca prasiddhi mātreṇa yuktam etasya kalpanam nirmūla tvāt tathā ca uktam prasiddhiḥ vaṭa yakṣa vat atas eva nirīkṣya durghaṭam jagataḥ janma vināśa ḍambaram na kadācid anīdṛśam jagat kathitam nīti rahasya vedibhiḥ 
[I,491,iv]	atra vadāmaḥ yat tāvat idamagādi naga ādi nirmāṇa nipuṇa puruṣa pariccheda dakṣam pratyakṣam na bhavati iti tat evam eva pratyakṣa pūrvakam anumānam api tena eva pathā pratiṣṭhitam iti tat api āstām sāmānyatodṛṣṭam tu liṅgam īśvara sattāyām idam brūmahe pṛthivī ādi kāryam dharmi tad utpatti prakāra prayojana ādi abhijña kartṛ pūrvakam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatvāt ghaṭa ādi vat 
[I,492,i_I,492,iv]	nanu kāryatvam asiddham iti uktam kaḥ evam ācaṣṭe cārvākaḥ śākyaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ vā cārvākaḥ tāvat veda racanāyāḥ racanā antara vilakṣaṇāyāḥ api kāryatvam abhyupagacchati yaḥ sa katham pṛthvī ādi racanāyāḥ kārya tvam apahnuvīta mīmāṃsakaḥ api na kāryatvam apahnotum arhati yatas evam āha yeṣām api anavagata utpattīnām rūpam upalabhyate tantu vyatiṣakta janitaḥ ayam paṭaḥ tad vyatiṣaṅga vimocanāt tantu vināśāt vā naṅkṣyati iti kalpyate iti evam avayava saṃyoga nirvartyamāna vapuṣaḥ kṣitidhara ādeḥ api nāśa saṃpratyayaḥ saṃbhavati eva dṛśyate ca kvacid vināśa pratītiḥ prāvṛṣeṇya jala dhara dhārā sāra nirluṭhitaḥ eva parvata eka deśe parvatasya khaṇḍaḥ patitaḥ iti vastu gatayoḥ ca kāryatva vināśi tvayoḥ samavyāptika tā vārtika kṛtā api uktā eva tena yatra api ubhau dharmau vyāpya vyāpaka sammatau tatra api vyāpya tā eva syāt aṅgam na vyāpita amatiḥ iti vadatā tasmāt vināśi tvena api kāryatva anumānāt tad mate api na kārya tvam asiddham śākyaḥ api kāryatvasya katham asiddha tām abhidadhīta yena nityaḥ nāma padārthaḥ praṇaya keliṣu api na viṣahyate tasmāt sarva vādibhiḥ apraṇodyam pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryatvam 
[I,493,i]	athavā sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvam eva hetum abhidadhmahe yasmin pratyakṣataḥ upalabhyamāne sarva apalāpa lampaṭāḥ api na kecana vipratipattum utsahante tasmāt na asiddhaḥ hetuḥ 
[I,493,ii]	nanu kartṛ avinābhāvitayā yathāvidhasya sanniveśasya śarāva ādiṣu darśanam tādaśam eva sanniveśam upalabhya kvacid anupalabhyamāna kartṛke kalaśa ādau kartṛ anumānam iti yuktam ayam tu anyaḥ eva kalaśa ādi sanniveśāt parvata ādi sanniveśaḥ na atra sanniveśa sāmānyam kiñcid upalabhante laukikāḥ sanniveśa śabdam eva sādhāraṇam prayuñjate na ca vastunoḥ atyanta bhede sati śabda sādhāraṇa tā mātreṇa tad anumānam upapadyate na hi pāṇḍu tā mātra sādhāraṇa tvena dhūmāt iva kakkola rajaḥ rāśeḥ api kṛśānuḥ anumātum śakyate iti tat uktam siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat sanniveśa ādi tat tasmāt yuktam yat anumīyate vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yuktā anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravyāt iva hutāśane iti
[I,494,i]	ucyate yādṛś iti na buddhyāmahe dhūmaḥ hi mahānase kumbha dāsī phūtkāra māruta sandhukṣyamāṇa manda jvalana janmā kṛśa prāya prakṛtiḥ upalabdhaḥ sa yadi parvate pravala samīraṇa ullasita hutavaha pluṣyamāṇa mahā mahīruha skandha indhana prabhavaḥ bahula bahulaḥ kha maṇḍalam akhilam ākrāman upalabhyate tat kim idānīm anala pramitim mā kārṣīt 
[I,494,ii]	atha viśeṣa rahitam dhūma mātram agni mātreṇa vyāptam avagatam iti tatas tad anumānam iha api sanniveśa mātram kartṛ mātreṇa vyāptam iti tatas api tad anumīyatām 
[I,494,iii_I,494,iv]	nanu sanniveśa śabda mātra sādhāraṇyam atra na vastu sāmānyam kiñcid asti bhikṣaḥ dhūmaḥ api bhavat darśane kim vastu sāmānyam asti mā bhūt vastu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vyāvṛtti rūpam tu saṃvyavahāra kāraṇam asti eva hanta tarhi prakṛte api asanniveśa vyāvṛtti rūpam bhavatu sāmānyam ākāśa kāla ādi vilakṣaṇa rūpa tvāt pṛthivī ādeḥ 
[I,495,i]	nanu tatra dhūmaḥ dhūmaḥ iti anuvṛtta vikalpa balena kalpitam apoha svabhāvam sāmānyam abhyupagatam iha api sanniveśa vikalpa anuvṛtteḥ tvad prakalpitam apoha rūpam eva sāmānyam iṣyatām 
[I,495,ii]	apica sa kartṛka tva abhimateṣu api saṃsthāneṣu na sarva ātmanā tulya tvam pratīyate na hi ghaṭa saṃsthānam catur śāla saṃsthānam ca su sadṛśam iti saṃsthāna sāmānyam tu parvata ādau api vidyate eva iti sarvathā yādṛś itya vācakaḥ granthaḥ 
[I,495,iii]	yat api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam akṛṣṭa jātaiḥ sthāvara ādibhiḥ akāri tat api na cāru teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt pakṣeṇa ca vyabhicāra codanāyām sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ 
[I,495,iv]	nanu ca pṛthivī ādeḥ utpatti kālasya parokṣa tvāt kartā na dṛśyate iti tad anupalabdhyā tad asattva niścaya anupapatteḥ kāmam saṃśayaḥ astu vanaspati prabhṛtīnām tu prasava kāla madya tvena vayam evapaśyāmaḥ na ca yatnataḥ api anveṣamāṇāḥ kartāram eṣām upalabhāmahe tasmāt asau dṛśya anupalabdheḥ na asti eva iti avagacchāmaḥ
