[I,495,v]	api ca yena yena vayam vyabhicāram udbhāvayiṣyāmaḥ tam tam ced pakṣīkariṣyati bhavān sutarām anumāna ucchedaḥ savyabhicārāṇām api evam anumāna tva anapāyāt 
[I,496,i]	ucyate sthāvarāṇām utpatti kāla pratyakṣa tve api kartuḥ adṛśya tvam eva aśarīra tva niścayāt aśarīrasya tarhi tad utpattau avyāpriyamāṇa tvāt kartṛ tvam api katham iti ced etat agratas nirṇeṣyate adṛśyasya ca kartuḥ anupalabdhitaḥ na astitva niścaya anupapatteḥ na ākṛṣṭa jāta banaspatīnām akartṛka tvam iti na vipakṣatā 
[I,496,ii]	yat tu uktam paridṛśyamāna kṣiti salila ādi kāraṇa kārya tvāt sthāvarāṇām kim adṛśyamāna kartṛ kalpanayā iti tad apeśalam para loka vādibhiḥ adṛśyamānānām karmaṇām api kāraṇa tva abhyupagamāt bārhaspatyānām tu tad samarthanam eva samādhiḥ 
[I,496,iii]	atha jagat vaicitryam karma vyatirekeṇa na ghaṭataḥ iti karmaṇām adṛśyamānānām api kāraṇa tvam kalpyate tatra yadi evam acetanebhyaḥ kārakebhyaḥ cetana anadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kārya utpāda anupapatteḥ kartā api cetanaḥ teṣām adhiṣṭhātā kalpyatām tasmāt sthāvarāṇām akartṛka tva abhāvāt na vipakṣata iti na taiḥ vyabhicāraḥ 
[I,496,iv]	yat api uktam yena yena vyabhicāraḥ udbhāvyate sa ced pakṣe antar bhāvayiṣyate kaḥ idānīm anumānasya niyamaḥ iti etat api na sādhu yadi hi bhavān niścite vipakṣe vṛttim upadarśayet kaḥ tam pakṣe antar bhāvayet na hi vipra tve puṃstvasya nityatāyām vā prameya tvasya vyabhicāre codyamāne vedhasā api vipakṣaḥ pakṣīkartum śakyaḥ vādī icchayā vastu vyavasthāyāḥ abhāvāt iha tu sthāvara ādau kartṛ abhāva niścayaḥ na asti iti uktam 
[I,497,i]	nanu sthāvareṣu pakṣīkṛteṣu api vyabhicāraḥ na nivartate eva na hi sa pakṣa vipakṣa vyatirekeṇa tāttvikaḥ pakṣaḥ nāma kaścid asti vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ vastu sthityā sa kartṛkāḥ ced vanaspati prabhṛtayaḥ sa pakṣāḥ eva te no ced tarhi vipakṣāḥ eva na rāśi antaram samasti iti ucyate pakṣa abhāve sa pakṣa vipakṣa vācaḥ yuktiḥ eva tāvat kim apekṣā pakṣa anukūlaḥ hi sa pakṣaḥ ucyate tad pratikūlaḥ ca vipakṣaḥ iti 
[I,497,ii_I,498,i]	yadi evam vaktavyam tarhi kaḥ ayam pakṣaḥ nāma iti sādhya dharma anvita tvena dvābhyām api avadhāritaḥ sa pakṣaḥ tad abhāvena niścitasya vipakṣatā vimataḥ yatra tu tayoḥ tam pakṣam saṃpracakṣmahe vastunaḥ dvi ātmaka tvam tu na anumanyāmahe vayam vādi buddhi anusāreṇa sthitiḥ pakṣasya yadi api tathā api vyavahāraḥ asti vastutas tad nibandhanaḥ sandigdhe hi nyāyaḥ pravartate na anupalabdhe na nirṇītaḥ iti uktam etat sandihyamānaḥ eva ca arthaḥ pakṣaḥ ucyate kiñcid kālam tasya pakṣa tvam yāvat nirṇayaḥ na utpannaḥ tad utpāde tu nūnam sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ anyataratra anupravekṣyati asau atas ca pakṣa avasthāyām tena vyabhicāra udbhāvanam asamīcīnam 
[I,498,ii]	nanu niścita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ iva sandigdha vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na hetuḥ eva tat evam vīrudha ādiṣu sandigdhe api kartari sanniveśasya darśanāt ahetutvam na etat sāram sat asat pāvaka tayā parvate sandigdhe vipakṣe vartamānasya dhūmasya ahetu tva prasaṅgāt sarve eva ca sādhya aṃśa saṃśayāt vipakṣāḥ eva jātāḥ iti pakṣa vṛttayaḥ hetavaḥ idānīm vipakṣa gāminaḥ bhaveyuḥ iti anumāna ucchedaḥ 
[I,498,iii]	atha pakṣīkṛte api dharmiṇi sat asat sādhyadheḥ matayā sandigdhe api vartamānaḥ dhūma ādiḥ anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakaḥ iṣyate tarhi sat asat kartṛka tayā sandigdhe api vasundharā vanaspati ādau vartamānam kāryatvam anyatra vyāpti niścayāt gamakam iṣyatām viśeṣaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ 
[I,498,iv]	anye manyante kim akṛṣṭa jāta sthāvara ādi vyabhicāra sthāna anveṣaṇena pṛthivī ādibhiḥ eva atra vyabhicāraḥ asya vyāpti grahaṇasya pratighātāt vyāptiḥ hi gṛhyamāṇā sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa kroḍīkāreṇa gṛhyate ittham ca tasyām gṛhyamāṇāyām eva yat yat sanniveśa viśiṣṭam tat tad buddhimat kartṛkam iti asmin eva avasare sanniveśavantaḥ api kartṛ śūnya tayā śaila ādayaḥ cetasi sphuranti yathā kṛtaka tvena bahneḥ anuṣṇa tā anumāne yat yat kṛtakam tat tad anuṣṇam iti vyāpti pariccheda velāyām eva vahniḥ uṣṇaḥ api kṛtakaḥ iti hṛdaya patham avatarati tat varjam tu vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyām tatas hetoḥ ṣaṇḍāt iva putra jana nam aghaṭa mānam eva sādhya anumānam iti 
[I,499,i]	tat etat anupapannam viśeṣa ullekha rahita sāmānya mātra pratiṣṭhitasya vyāpti paricchedasya anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇīta tvāt agni anuṣṇa tā anumāne hi na vyāpti grahaṇa pratīghātāt aprāmāṇyam api tu pratyakṣa virodhāt iti uktam etat 
[I,499,ii]	api ca ayam pṛthivī ādau kartṛ anumāna nirāsa prakāraḥ śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ karaṇa pūrvikāḥ kriyā tvāt chidi kriyā vat iti atra śrotra ādi karaṇa anumāne api samānaḥ pratibandha avadhāraṇa velāyām eva karaṇa śūnyānām śabda ādi upalabdhi kriyāṇām avadhāraṇāt tābhiḥ eva vyabhicārāt pakṣeṇa ca pṛthivī ādinā vyabhicāra codanam atyantam alaukikam 
[I,499,iii_I,500,ii]	nanu vastu sthityā parvata ādayaḥ api vipakṣāḥ eva tvayā tu teṣām pakṣaḥ iti nāma kṛtam na ca tvad icchayā vastu sthitiḥ viparivartate nanu evam śabda ādi upalabdhayaḥ api vastu sthityā vipakṣāḥ eva tāsām api pakṣaḥ iti nāmakaraṇam eva syāt na tāsām karaṇa abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam parvata ādau api kartṛ abhāva niścaya anutpādāt na vipakṣa tvam 
[I,500,iii_I,500,v]	teṣu kartā na upalabhyate iti ced śabda ādi upalabdhika mapi na upalabhyate eva karaṇam adṛśyamāna tvāt eva na upalabhyate na nāstitvāt iti ced kartā api adṛśya tvāt eva na upalabhyate na nāstitvāt anumānāt karaṇam upalabhyate tad vyatirekeṇa kriyā anupapatteḥ iti ced kartā api anumānāt upalapsyate kartāram antareṇa kārya anupapatteḥ 
[I,500,vi_I,500,vii]	tena anumāna gamya tvāt na kartuḥ na astita āgrahaḥ tad abhāvāt vipakṣa tvam kṣiti ādeḥ api durbhaṇam liṅgāt pūrvam tu sandehaḥ dahane api na vāryate tathā sati prapadyeta dhūmaḥ api ananumāna tām atha asya liṅga ābhāsa tvam kṣiti ādau kartṛ adarśanāt dhūme api liṅga ābhāsa tvam tatra deśe agni adarśanāt nanu tam deśam āsādya gṛhyate dhūma lāñchanaḥ anayā eva dhiyā sādho vardhasva śaradām śatam yat paścāt darśanam tena kim liṅgasya pramāṇa tā anarthi tvāt adṛṣṭe vā kṛśānau kim kariṣyasi tasmāt sarvathā na ayam anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ 
[I,501,i]	yat api viśeṣa viruddha tvam asya pratipā tat api asamīkṣita abhidhānam viśeṣa viruddhasya hetvābhāsasya abhāvāt abhyupagame vā sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt śrotra ādi anumāne api yathā udāhṛte śakyam evam abhidhātum yādṛś eva lavana kriyāyām dātṛ ādi karaṇam kāṭhinya ādi dharmakam avagatam tādṛś eva śrotra ādi syāt tad vilakṣaṇa karaṇa sādhyatāyām tu sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ chedana ādi kriyāṇām atīndriya karaṇa kārya tva adarśanāt iti 
[I,501,ii]	atha kriyā mātram karaṇa mātreṇa vyāptam avagatam iti tāvat mātram anumāpayati tat iha api sanniveśa mātram adhiṣṭhātṛ mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham iti tāvat mātram eva anumāpayatu viśeṣāṇām tu na tat liṅgam asti yatra bādhakam anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti ayam api śrāvaṇa tva ādi śabdasya viśeṣa jātam bādhataḥ eva dhūmaḥ api parvata agni viśeṣān kāṃścid mahānasa agnau adṛṣṭān apahanti eva tasmāt yathā nirdiṣṭa sādhya viparyaya sādhanam eva viruddhaḥ hetuḥ na hi viśeṣa viparyaya āvahaḥ prakṛta hetuḥ ca sādhya viparyayasya akartṛ pūrvaka tvasya na sādhakaḥ aśvaḥ ayam viṣāṇi tvāt iti vat tasmāt na viruddhaḥ 
[I,501,iii]	na api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ bādhakayoḥ adarśanāt pratyuta āgamam anugrāhakam iha udāhariṣyāmaḥ 
[I,501,iv]	na api sat pratipakṣaḥ ayam hetuḥ saṃśaya bījasya viśeṣa agrahaṇa ādeḥ iha hetu tvena anupādānāt 
[I,502,i_I,502,ii]	na api ayama prayojakaḥ hetuḥ yathā paramāṇūnām anitya tve sati mūrta tvam abhidhāsyate na hi mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam iha tu kāryatva prayuktam eva sa kartṛka tvam tatra tatra upalabdham iti atas eva anumāna virodhasya iṣṭa vighāta kṛtaḥ ca na kaścid iha avasaraḥ prayojake hetau prayukte tathāvidha pāṃsu prakṣepa prayoga anavakāśāt tasmāt para udīrita aśeṣa doṣa vikala kārya anumāna mahimnā nūnam īśvaraḥ kalpanīyaḥ sakala loka sākṣikam api ca anumāna prāmāṇyam api īkṣaṇīyam anumāna prāmāṇya rakṣaṇe ca kṛtaḥ eva parikara bandhaḥ prāk iti siddhaḥ eva īśvaraḥ 
[I,502,iii]	anyat api tad anumānam anyaiḥ uktam mahābhūta ādi vyaktam cetanā adhiṣṭhitam sat sukha duḥkhe janayati rūpa ādimat tvāt tūrya ādi vat tathā pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni cetanā adhiṣṭhitāni santi dhāraṇa ādi kriyām kurvanti yugi ādi vat iti atra api doṣāḥ pūrvavat eva parihartavyāḥ 
[I,502,iv_I,502,v]	yat punar avādi kartṛ sāmānya siddhau vā viśeṣa avagatiḥ kutas iti tatra kecid āgamāt viśeṣa pratipattim āhuḥ viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatas mukhaḥ viśvatas bāhuḥ uta viśvataspād saṃbāhubhyām dhamati saṃpatatraiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ iti tathā apāṇi pādaḥ javanaḥ gṛhītā paśyati acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti akarṇaḥ sa vetti sarvam na hi tasya vettā tam āhuḥ agryam puruṣam mahāntam iti śrutau paṭhyate tatas sarvasya kartā sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ jñāpyate 
[I,503,i]	na ca kāryaḥ eva arthe vedāḥ pramāṇam iti mantra arthavādānām atatparatvam abhidhātum ucitam kāryaḥ iva siddhe api arthe veda prāmāṇyasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca itaretara āśrayam āgama eka śaraṇa tva abhāvāt īśvara siddheḥ 
[I,503,ii]	anye tu anvaya vyatireki hetu mūla kevala vyatireki balena viśeṣa siddhim abhidadhati deha ādi vyatirikta ātma kalpanam iva sukha duḥkha ādi gatena kāryatvena varṇayiṣyate pṛthivī ādi kāryam asmad ādi vilakṣaṇa sarvajña eka kartṛkam asmad ādiṣu bādhaka utpattau satyām kārya tvāt iti 
[I,503,iii_I,503,iv]	apare pakṣa dharma tā balāt eva viśeṣa lābham abhyupagacchanti na hi īdṛśam paridṛśyamānam aneka rūpam aparimitam ananta prāṇi gata vicitra sukha duḥkha sādhanam bhuvana ādi kāryam anatiśayena puṃsā kartum śakyam iti yathā candana dhūmam itara dhūma visadṛśam avalokya candanaḥ eva vahniḥ anumīyate tathā vilakṣaṇāt kāryāt vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kartā anumāsyate 
[I,504,i]	yathā prāvarakebhyaḥ iva tat kuśalaḥ kuvindaḥ yathā ca kulālaḥ sakala kalaśa ādi kārya kalāpa utpatti saṃvidhāna prayojana ādi abhijñaḥ bhavan tasya kārya cakrasya kartā tathā iyatas trailokyasya niravadhi prāṇi sukha duḥkha sādhanasya sṛṣṭi saṃhāra saṃvidhānam sa prayojanam bahu śākham jānan eva sraṣṭā bhavitum arhati maheśvaraḥ tasmāt sarvajñaḥ 
[I,504,ii_I,504,iii]	api ca yathā niyata viṣaya vṛttīnām cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrajñaḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ evam sakala kṣetrajña karma viniyogeṣu prabhavan i īśvaraḥ tad apekṣayā sarvajñaḥ tathā ca āha vyāsaḥ dvau imau puruṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ akṣaraḥ ucyate uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya vibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ mantraḥ ca tad artha anuvādī paṭhyate dvā suparṇā sa yujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pariṣasvajāte tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti anaśnan anyaḥ abhicākaśīti iti atas ca sarvajñaḥ īśvaraḥ 
[I,505,i_I,505,ii]	puṃsām asarva vid tvam hi rāga ādi mala bandhanam na ca rāga ādibhiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān iti sarva vid iṣṭa aniṣṭa artha saṃbhoga prabhavāḥ khalu dehinām rāga ādayaḥ katham te syuḥ niti ānanda ātmake śive mithyājñāna mūlāḥ ca rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ te katham nitya nirmala jñānavatī īśvare bhaveyuḥ 
[I,505,iii]	nityam tat jñānam katham iti ced tasmin kṣaṇam api ajñātari sati tad icchā preryamāṇa karma adhīna nānā prakāra vyavahāra virama prasaṅgāt pralaya velāyām tarhi kutas tad nitya tva kalpanā iti ced mā evam āpralayāt siddhe nitya tve tadā vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt asya ātmanaḥ iva tat jñānasya nitya tvam setsyati punar ca sarga kāle tad utpatti kāraṇa abhāvāt api nityam jñānam 
[I,505,iv]	evañca tad atīta anāgata sūkṣma vyavahita ādi samasta vastu viṣayam na bhinnam krama yaugapadya vikalpa anupapatteḥ krama āśrayaṇe kvacid ajñātṛ tvam syāt iti vyavahāra lopaḥ yaugapadyena sarvajñātṛ tve kutastyaḥ jñāna bhedaḥ 
[I,506,i]	pratyakṣa sādharmyāt ca tat jñānam pratyakṣam ucyate na punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna tvam asya asti ajanakānām eva arthānām savitṛ prakāśena iva tena grahaṇāt 
[I,506,ii]	jñāna vat anye api ātma guṇāḥ ye asya santi te nityāḥ eva manassaṃyoga an apekṣa janma tvāt duḥkha dveṣāḥ tasya tāvat na santi eva bhāvanā ākhyena saṃskāreṇa api na prayojanam sarvadā sarva artha darśi tvena smṛti abhāvāt atas eva na tasya anumānikam jñānam iṣyate dharmaḥ tu bhūta anugrahavataḥ vastu svābhāvyāt bhavat na vāryate tasya ca phalam para artha niṣpattiḥ eva sukham tu asya nityam eva nitya ānanda tvena āgamāt pratīteḥ asukhitasya ca evaṃvidha kārya ārambha yogya tā abhāvāt 
[I,506,iii_I,507,i]	nanu jñāna ānanda vat icchā api nityā ced īśvarasya tarhi sarvadā tad icchā sambhavāt sarvadā jagat utpattiḥ iti jagat ānanti aprasaṅgaḥ sarga icchā nitya tvāt ca saṃhāraḥ na prāpnoti saṃhāra icchāyāḥ api nitya tva abhyupagamena naktaṃdinam pralaya prabandhaḥ na viramet eva jagatām iti na eṣa doṣaḥ anātma mana ssaṃyoga ja tvāt icchā sva rūpa mātreṇa nityā api kadācid sargeṇa kadācid saṃhāreṇa vā viṣayeṇa anurajyate sarga saṃhārayoḥ antarāle tu jagataḥ sthiti avasthāyām asmāt karmaṇaḥ idam asya saṃpadyatām iti icchā bhavati prajāpateḥ prayatnaḥ tasya sa kalpa viśeṣa ātmakaḥ eva tathā ca āgamaḥ satyakāmaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ iti kāmaḥ iti icchā ucyate saṃkalpaḥ iti prayatnaḥ 
[I,507,ii]	tat evam navabhyaḥ ātma guṇebhyaḥ pañca jñāna sukha icchā prayatna dharmāḥ santi īśvare catvāraḥ tu duḥkha dveṣa adharma saṃskārāḥ na santi iti ātma viśeṣa aiva īśvaraḥ na dravya antaram āha ca patañjaliḥ klaśa karma vipāka āśayaiḥ aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ iti saḥ ayam āgamāt anumānāt pakṣa dharmataḥ vā viśeṣa lābhaḥ iti sthitam 
[I,507,iii]	yat punar vikalpitam sa śarīraḥ īśvaraḥ sṛjati jagat aśarīraḥ vā iti tatra aśarīrasya eva sraṣṭṛ tvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ 
[I,507,iv]	nanu kriyā aaveśa nibandhanam kartṛ tvam na pāribhāṣikam tat aśarīrasya kriyā virahāt katham bhavet kasya ca kutra aśarīrasya kartṛ tvam dṛṣṭam iti ucyate jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna yogi tvam kartṛ tvamā cakṣate tat ca īśvare vidyate eva iti uktam etat sva śarīra preraṇe ca dṛṣṭam aśarīrasya api ātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam 
[I,508,i]	icchā mātreṇa ca tasya kartṛ tvāt aneka vyāpāra nirvartana upātta durvaha kleśa kāluṣya vikalpaḥ api pratyuktaḥ 
[I,508,ii_I,508,iii]	nanu atra uktam kulāla vat ca na etasya vyāpāraḥ yadi kalpyate acetanaḥ katham bhāvaḥ tad icchām anuvartate iti asmābhiḥ api uktam eva yathā hi acetanaḥ kāyaḥ ātmā icchām anuvartate tad icchām anuvartsyante tathā eva paramāṇavaḥ 
[I,508,iv_I,508,v]	yaḥ tu prayojana vikalpaḥ kimartham sṛjati jaganti bhagavān iti saḥ api na peśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ eva eṣa bhagavataḥ yat kadācid sṛjati kadācid ca saṃharati viśvam iti katham punar niyata kāle eṣaḥ asya svabhāvaḥ iti ced ādityam paśyatu devānāṃpriyaḥ yaḥ niyata kālam udetyaḥ tam eti ca prāṇi karma sāpekṣam etat vivasvataḥ rūpam iti ced īśvare api tulyaḥ samādhiḥ 
[I,509,i]	krīḍā arthe api jagat sarge na hīyeta kṛtārtha tā pravartamānāḥ dṛśyante na hi krīḍāsu duḥkhitāḥ 
[I,509,ii]	athavā anukampayā eva sarga saṃhārau ārabhatām īśvaraḥ 
[I,509,iii]	nanu atra coditam na tathāvidhāḥ prāṇinaḥ anukampyāḥ bhavanti kevala sukha svabhāvā vā sṛṣṭiḥ anukampāvatā kriyeta iti satyam coditam anupapannam tu anādi tvāt saṃsārasya 
[I,509,iv]	śubha aśubha saṃskāra anuviddhāḥ eva ātmānaḥ te ca dharma adharma nigaḍa saṃyata tvāt apavarga pura dvāra praveśam alabhamānāḥ katham na anukampyāḥ anupabhukta phalānām karmaṇām na prakṣayaḥ sargam antareṇa ca tad phala upabhoga asaṃbhavaḥ iti śubha phala upabhogāya svarga ādi sargam aśubha phala upabhogāya naraka ādi sṛṣṭim ārabhate dayāluḥ eva bhagavān upabhoga prabandhena pariśrāntānām antarā antarā viśrāntaye jantūnām bhuvana upasaṃhāram api karoti iti sarvam etat kṛpā nibandhanam eva 
[I,510,i]	nanu ca yugapad eva sakala jagat pralaya karaṇam anupapannam avināśinām karmaṇām phala upabhoga pratibandha asaṃbhavāt iti coditam na yuktam etat īśvara icchā pratibaddhānām karmaṇām stimita śaktīnām avasthānāt tad icchā preritāni karmāṇi phalam ādadhati tad icchā pratibaddhāni ca tatra udāsate kasmāt evam iti ced acetanānām cetanā anadhiṣṭhitānām sva kārya karaṇa anupalabdheḥ 
[I,510,ii_I,510,iii]	nanu teṣām eva karmaṇām kartāraḥ ātmānaḥ cetanāḥ adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhaviṣyanti yathā āha bhaṭṭaḥ karmabhiḥ sarva jīvānām tad siddheḥ siddha sādhanam iti na etat evam na ete adhiṣṭhātāraḥ bhavitum arhanti bahu tvāt viruddha abhiprāya tvāt ca tathā hi ekaḥ eva kaścid sthāvara ādi viśeṣaḥ rāja ādi viśeṣaḥ vā prāṇi koṭīnām anekavidha sukha duḥkha upabhogasya hetuḥ sa taiḥ bahubhiḥ avyavasthita abhiprāyaiḥ katham ārabheta teṣām ekatra saṃmāna abhāvāt maṭha pariṣadaḥ api kvacid eva sakala sādhāraṇa upakāriṇi kārye bhavati aikamatyam na sarvatra mahā prāsāda ādi a āraṃbhe bahūnām takṣa ādīnām ekasthapati āśaya anuvarti tvam dṛśyate pipīlikānām api mṛd kūṭa karaṇe tulyaḥ kaścid upakāraḥ pravartakaḥ sthapati vat ekāśaya anuvarti tvam vā kalpyam iha tu tad sthāvaram śarīram keṣāñcit upakāra kāraṇam itareṣām api bhūyasā ām apakāra kāraṇam iti katham taiḥ saṃbhūya sṛjyate anadhiṣṭhitānān tva cetanānām ārambhaka tvam ayuktam eva tasmāt avaśyam ekaḥ teṣām karmaṇām adhiṣṭhātā kalpanīyaḥ yat icchām antareṇa bhavanti api karmāṇi na phala janmane prabhavanti 
[I,511,i]	atas eva ekaḥ īśvaraḥ iṣyate na dvau bahavaḥ vā bhinna abhiprāya tayā loka anugraha upaghāta vaiśasa prasaṅgāt icchā visaṃvāda saṃbhavena ca tatas kasya cit saṅkalpa vighāta dvārakān aiśvarya prasaṅgāt iti ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tad icchayā karmāṇi kāryeṣu pravartante iti upapannaḥ sargaḥ tad icchā pratibandhāt stimita śaktīni karmāṇi udāsate iti upapannaḥ pralayaḥ 
[I,511,ii]	evañca yat uktam tasmāt adyavat eva atra sarga pralaya kalpanā samasta kṣaya janmabhyām na siddhi ati apramāṇikāḥ iti etat api asāṃpratam 
[I,511,iii]	tiṣṭhatu vā sarga pralaya kālaḥ adyatve api yathā ukta nayena tad icchām antareṇa prāṇinām karma vipāka anupapatteḥ avaśyam īśvaraḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ itarathā sarva vyavahāra vipralopaḥ tat uktam ajñaḥ jantuḥ anīśaḥ ayam ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ īśvara preritaḥ gacchet svargam vā śvabhram eva vā iti
[I,512,i]	nanu evam tarhi īśvara icchā eva bhavatu kartrī saṃhartrī ca kim karmabhiḥ mā evam karmabhiḥ vinā jagat vaicitrya anupapatteḥ karma nairapekṣya pakṣe api trayaḥ doṣāḥ darśitāḥ eva īśvarasya nirdaya tvam karma codanā narthakyam anirmokṣa prasaṅgaḥ ca iti tasmāt karmaṇām eva niyojane svātantryam īśvarasya na tad nirapekṣam 
[I,512,ii]	kim tādṛś a aiśvaryeṇa prayojanam iti ced na na prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati kim vā bhagavataḥ karma apekṣiṇaḥ api na prabhu tva miti alam ku tarka lava lipta mukha nāsti ka ālāpa parimardena 
[I,512,iii]	tasmāt kutārkikā udgīta dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vāraṇāt siddhaḥ trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ 
[I,512,iv]	ye tu īśvaram nirapavāda dṛḍha pramāṇa siddha svarūpam api na abhyupayanti mūḍhāḥ pāpāya taiḥ saha kathā api vitanyamānā jāyeta nūnam iti yuktam atas virantum yasya icchayā eva bhuvanāni samudbhavanti tiṣṭhanti yānti ca punar vilayam yuga ante tasmai samasta phala bhoga nibandhanāya nitya prabuddha muditāya namaḥ śivāya 
[I,513,i]	nanu trailokya nirmāṇa nipuṇe parameśvare siddhe api tad praṇīta tvam na vedasya avakalpate pade śabda artha sambandhe vedasya racanāsu vā kartṛ tvam asya āśaṅkyeta tat ca sarvatra durvacam varṇa rāśiḥ krama vyaktaḥ padam iti abhidhīyate varṇānām ca avināśi tvāt katham īśvara kārya tā sambandhaḥ api na tad kāryaḥ sa hi śakti svabhāvakaḥ śabde vācaka śaktiḥ ca nityā eva agnau iva uṣṇa tā racanāḥ api vaidikyaḥ na etāḥ puruṣa nirmitāḥ kavi praṇīta kāvya ādi racanābhyaḥ vilakṣaṇāḥ evam ca vede svātantryam īśvarasya na kutracid kāmam tu parvatān eṣa vidadhātu bhinattu vā svatas prāmāṇya siddhau tu vede vaktra napekṣa tām vadāmaḥ na tu sarvatra puruṣa dveṣiṇaḥ vayam anapekṣa tvam eva atas veda prāmāṇya kāraṇam yuktam vaktā api vedasya kurvan api karotu kim 
[I,513,ii_I,514,i]	katham punar amī varṇāḥ śruta mātra tirohitāḥ nityāḥ bhavantu kaḥ ayam vā śabda svātantrya doha daḥ ucyate śabdasya na hi anitya tve yuktiḥ sphurati kācana pratyakṣam arthāpattiḥ ca nityatām tu adhigacchataḥ 
[I,514,ii]	tathā hi anitya tva hetavaḥ ime kila kathyante prayatna anantaram upalabdheḥ kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti kāryatva anitya tvayoḥ paraspara āvinā abhāvāt ekatara siddhau anyatara siddhiḥ bhavati eva iti kvacid kiñcid sādhanam ucyate prayatna prerita kauṣṭhya māruta saṃyoga vibhāga anantaram upalabhyamānaḥ śabdaḥ tad kāryaḥ eva iti gamyate uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam anupalabdheḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ na hi enam uccaritam muhūrtam api upalabhāmahe tasmāt vinaṣṭaḥ iti avagacchāmaḥ 
[I,514,iii]	karoti śabda vyapadeśāt ca kāryaḥ bdaḥ śabdam kuru śabdam mā kārṣīḥ iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate te nūnam avagacchanti kāryaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[I,514,iv]	nānā deśeṣu ca yugapad upalambhāt teṣu teṣu deśeṣu śabdena vyavahārāt sarvatra yugapad upalabhyate śabdaḥ tat ekasya nityasya sataḥ anupapannam kāryatve tu bahūnām nānā deśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate aneka deśa sambandhaḥ iti 
[I,515,i]	śabda antara vikārya tvāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ dadhi atra iti ikāraḥ eva yakārībhavati iti sādṛśyāt smṛteḥ ca avagamyate vikārya tvāt ca drākṣā ikṣu rasa ādi vat anitya tvam asya iti 
[I,515,ii]	kāraṇa vṛddhyā ca vardhamāna tvāt bahubhiḥ mahā prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ mahān go śabdaḥ upalabhyate alpaiḥ alpa prayatnaiḥ uccāryamāṇaḥ alpaḥ iti etat ca tantu vṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ paṭaḥ iva śabdaḥ api hetu vṛddhyā vardhamānaḥ kāryaḥ bhavitum arhati iti 
[I,515,iii_I,515,v]	te ete sarve eva aprayojakāḥ hetavaḥ tathā hi prātyabhijñātaḥ siddhe nitya tve prayatna anantaram upalaṃbhāt abhivyaktiḥ prayatna kāryā śabdasya na utpattiḥ iti gamyate tat evam vyaṅgye api prayatna anantaram upalambha saṃbhavāt anaikāntika tvam abhivyañjakānām ca pavana saṃyoga vibhāgānām acira sthāyi tvāt na ciram uccāraṇāt ūrdhvam upalabhyate śabdaḥ prayoga abhiprāyaḥ ca karoti śabda vyapadeśaḥ asya bhaviṣyati gomayāni kuru kāṣṭhāni kuru iti vat tasmāt saḥ api na aikāntikaḥ nānā deśeṣu yugapad upalambhanam ekasya sthirasya api śabdasya vivasvataḥ iva setsyati 
[I,516,i_I,516,ii]	vikārya tvam tu asiddham eva śabda antara tvāt dadhi śabdaḥ ikāra antar saṃhitā vyatirikta viṣaya vṛttiḥ yakāraḥ tu ayam anyaḥ eva aci paratas saṃhitā viṣaye prayujyamānaḥ na punar ikāraḥ eva ayam yakārībhūtaḥ kṣīram iva dadhi bhūtam upalabhyate na hi icu yaśāḥ tālavyāḥ iti sthāna sādṛśya mātreṇa tad vikāra tva varṇanam ucitam aprakṛti vikārayoḥ api nayana utpala pallavayoḥ sādṛśya darśanāt ikaḥ yaṇaci iti pāṇinismṛteḥ api na ayam arthaḥ ikāraḥ yakārībhavati kṣīram iva dadhībhavati iti kintvā asmin viṣaye ayam varṇaḥ prayoktavyaḥ asmin ayam iti sūtra arthaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca tat śāstram pravṛttam iti api ca kṣīram dadhi tvam upaiti na tu dadhi kṣīra tām iha tu yakāraḥ api kvacid ikāra tām upaiti vidhyati iti saṃprasāraṇe sati tasmāt asiddhaḥ eva varṇānām prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ 
[I,516,iii]	na api kāraṇa vṛddhyā vardhate śabdaḥ balavatā api uccāryamāṇāni bahubhiḥ ca tāvanti eva akṣarāṇi dhvanayaḥ eva tathā tatra pravṛddhāḥ upalabhyante na varṇāḥ iti 
[I,517,i]	tasmāt anitya tā asiddhiḥ na evam prāyairasādhanaiḥ śabdasya nityatāyām tu sā eṣā artha āpattiḥ iṣyate śabdasya uccāraṇam tāvat artha gati artham iṣyate na ca uccārita naṣṭaḥ ayam artham gamayitum kṣamaḥ sarveṣām avivādaḥ atra śabda artha vyavahāriṇām yat avijñāta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ na arthasya vācakaḥ vedyamānaḥ sa sambandhaḥ sthavira vyavahārataḥ drāghīyasā na kālena vinā śakyeta veditum 
[I,517,ii_I,518,i]	tathā hi gām śuklām ānayaḥ iti eka vṛddha prayukta śabda śravaṇe sati ceṣṭamānam itaram vṛddham avalokayan bālaḥ taṭa sthaḥ tasya artha pratītim tāvat kalpayati ātmani tad pūrvikāyāḥ ceṣṭāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt pramāṇa antara asannidhānāt etat vṛddha prayukta śabda samanantaram ca pravṛtteḥ tatas eva śabdāt kim api anena pratipannam iti manyate tatas kṣaṇa antare tam artham tena vṛddhena ānīyamānam upalabhamānaḥ evam buddhyate ayam arthaḥ amutas śabdāt anena avagataḥ iti sa ca arthaḥ aneka guṇa kriyā jāti vyakti ādi rūpa saṃkulaḥ upalabhyate śabdaḥ api aneka pada kadambaka ātmā śrutaḥ tat katamasya vākya aṃśasya katamaḥ artha aṃśaḥ vācyaḥ iti āvāpa udvāpa yogena bahu kṛtvas śṛṇvan guṇa kriyā ādi parihāreṇa go tva sāmānyam asman mate tvad mate vā tadvat mātram go śabdasya abhidheyam nirdhārayati iti evam dīrgha adhvasāpekṣa sambandha adhigama avadhi śabdasya jīvitam siddham iti na āśu vināśi tā 
[I,518,ii_I,518,iv]	bhavatu vā vinaśvarasya api śabdasya sambandha grahaṇam tathā api tasmin gṛhīta sambandhe śabde vinaṣṭe sati katham anavagata sambandhāt abhinavāt idānīm anyasmāt śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ anyasmin jñāta sambandhe yadi anyaḥ vācakaḥ bhavet vācakāḥ sarva śabdāḥ syuḥ ekasmin jñāta saṅgatau na ca vaktā vyavaharamāṇaḥ tadā eva śabdam ca uccārayati sambandham karoti ca evam ca vyutpādayati param ca vyavahārayati iti na hi yugapad imāḥ kriyā bhavitum arhanti evam adarśanāt 
[I,518,v]	atha ādau sambandha grahaṇe vṛtte tasmin vinaṣṭe api go śabde tad sadṛśam abhinava kṛtam api śabdam upaśrutya artham pratipatsyante vyavahartāraḥ iti ucyate tat api na caturaśram sādṛśyasya agrahaṇāt na hi go śabdaḥ iva ayam iti pratītiḥ dṛṣṭā api tu go śabdaḥ eva iti na ca bhūyas avayava sāmānya yoga rūpam sādṛśyam varṇānām anavayavānām upapadyate abhinavasya śabdasya svayam arthavat tva anavadhāraṇāt katham ayam amutas śrotā pratipadyeta iti śaṅkamānaḥ vaktā katham prayogam kuryāt 
[I,519,i]	atha saḥ api arthavat sadṛśam eva prayuṅkte na arthavantam tarhi yat sadṛśam asau prayuṅkte tasya api anya sādṛśyāt eva arthavat tā iti jagat sarga kāla kṛtasya mūla bhūtasya arthavataḥ śabdasya smaraṇam syāt tad mūla tvāt vyavahārasya na ca evam asti na ca tatas prabhṛti adyayāvat sādṛśyam anuvartate tad sādṛśya kalpanāyām mūla sādṛśya vināśāt viśeṣataḥ tu śabdānām 
[I,519,ii_I,520,i]	bhinnaiḥ vaktṛ mukha sthāna prayatna karaṇa ādibhiḥ na nirvahati sādṛśyam śabdānām dūra vartinām sādṛśya janita tve ca mithyā eva artha gatiḥ bhavet dhūma anukāri nī hāra janya jvalana buddhi vat tasmāt sādṛśya nibandhana artha prati iti anupapatteḥ go śabdaḥ eva sthāyī iti abhyupagamanīyam 
[I,520,ii]	nanu yathā dhūma vyakti bhede api dhūma tva matim abalambya sambandha grahaṇa ādivya bahāra nivaha nirvahaṇam evam iha gakāra ādi varṇa vyakti bhede api sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tad nirvāhaḥ kariṣyate iti mā evam tatra hi dhūma tva sāmānyam vidyate dhruvam śabda tvam vyabhicāryatra go śabda tvam tu durghaṭam bhinnaiḥ ayugapad kālaiḥ asaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ vinaśvaraiḥ varṇaiḥ ghaṭayitum śakyaḥ go śabda avayavī katham anārabdhe ca go śabde go śabda tvam kva vartatām paṭa tvam nāma sāmānyam na hi tantuṣu vartate 
[I,520,iii]	nanu mā bhūt go śabda tvam sāmānyam bhinna ākāra gakāra ādi vyakti vṛttibhiḥ eva vā gatvā ādi jātibhiḥ kāryam pūrva uktam upapadyate etat api na asti gatvā ādi jātīnām anupapatteḥ bheda abheda pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ hi vyakti jāti pravibhāga vyavahāraḥ iha ca ayam abheda pratyayaḥ varṇa aikya nibandhanaḥ eva na jāti kṛtaḥ bheda pratibhāsaḥ tu vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ iti kutas jāti vyakti vyavahāraḥ 
[I,521,i]	go tva ādi jāti nirākaraṇe api eṣa prakāraḥ samānaḥ iti ced na vyakti bhedasya su spaṣṭa siddha tvena vyañjaka ādi upādhi nibandhanatva anupapatteḥ paraspara vibhakta svarūpa tayā hi śābaleya bāhuleya piṇḍāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyante sthite ca vyakti bhede sarvatra gauḥ iti tad abheda pratyayasya ananya viṣaya tvāt iṣyate eva go tva jātiḥ iha punar gakāra vyaktayaḥ bhinnāḥ śābaleya ādi piṇḍa vat kva nāma bhavatā dṛṣṭāḥ yena āsām jātim icchasi śiśau paṭhati vṛddhe vā strī jane vā śuke api vā vaktṛ bhedam prapadyante na varṇa vyakti bhinna tām 
[I,521,ii_I,521,iii]	tathā ca gargaḥ paṭhati māṭharaḥ paṭhati iti uccārayitṛ bhedaḥ eva pratīyate amum gaviśeṣam eṣa paṭhati iti na uccāryamāṇa bhedaḥ eka vaktṛ prayoge api tasya eva uccāraṇam punar gaṅgā gagana gargā ādau na rūpa antara darśanam druta ādi bheda bodhaḥ api nāda bheda nibandhanaḥ na vyakti bheda janitaḥ śābaleya ādi bodha vat 
[I,521,iv]	abhyupagate api gatva sāmānye tasya druta ādi bheda pratibhāse sati api na bhinna tvam eṣitavyam aupādhikaḥ eva tasmin bheda pratibhāsaḥ varṇanīyaḥ saḥ ayam gakāra vyaktau eva katham na varṇyate tasyāḥ evai katvāt eka pratyayaḥ bheda bhramaḥ tu vyañjaka adhīnaḥ iti evam hi kalpanā laghīyasī bhavati tasmāt na nānāgakāra vṛtti gatvasāmānyam nāma kiñcid asti 
[I,522,i]	api ca go guru geha ādau bhinna ājupa śleṣa kāritaḥ eva vyañjaneṣu buddhi bhedaḥ para upādhiḥ avadhāryate saḥ ayam akṣu api para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati varṇa āśrita tvāt vyañjaka bheda pratyaya vat iti tasmāt gatva vat atva sāmānyam api na asti 
[I,522,ii_I,522,iii]	yat punar aṣṭādaśa bhedam avarṇa kulam ucyate tadaupādhikam eva hrasva dīrgha pluta saṃvṛta vivṛta ādi buddhīnām dhvani bheda anuvidhāyi tvāt vivṛtaḥ saṃvṛtāt anyaḥ na gakārāt vakāra vat api tu akāraḥ eva asau pratibhāti yathā tathā 
[I,523,i_I,523,ii]	katham tarhi śabda bheda abhāve bhinne artha pratipattī araṇyam āraṇyam iti dhvani kṛte eva te bhaviṣyataḥ aśabda dharmasya dīrgha tvāde katham artha prati iti aṅga tvam iti ced turaga vegavat bhaviṣyati yathā turaga deha sthaḥ vegaḥ puṃsaḥ artha siddhaye para dharmaḥ api dīrgha ādiḥ evam tasya upakārakaḥ 
[I,523,iii]	itas ca etat akāra sāmānyam anupapannam atvam hi na dīrgha plutayoḥ anugatam bhavati ātvam na hrasva plutayoḥ ātvam na hrasva dīrghayoḥ iti tasmāt ekatvāt varṇānām nāvā antara jātayaḥ saṃbhavanti śabda tvam tu niyata artha pratipattau vyabhicāri iti atas na atra dhūma ādi nyāyaḥ 
[I,523,iv]	tena artha pratyayaḥ śabdāt anyathā na upapadyate na ced nitya tvam iti asmin arthāpatteḥ pramāṇa tā 
[I,523,v_I,524,i]	anumānāt anyathātvam arthāpatteḥ na dṛśyate tena anumānam api etat prayoktum na na śakyate tat idam ucyate śabdaḥ dharmī nityaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa artha pratipādaka tvāt dhūma ādi jāti vat tat idam uktam nitya tvam tu syāt darśanasya para artha tvāt iti evam sambandha grahaṇāt prabhṛti ārtha pratipatteḥ avasthitasya vināśa hetu abhāvāt ātma ādi vat nitya tvam 
[I,524,ii_I,524,iii]	na hi ayam avayava vināśāt naśyati śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt tat eva katham iti ced ucyate su alpena api prayatnena yadi varṇaḥ prayujyate yadi vā na anubhūyeta śakalaḥ na anubhūyate sa avayave hi vastuni dvidhā avayavāḥ dṛśyante ārabdha kāryāḥ ca anārabdha kāryāḥ ca iti iha punar ārabdha kāryāḥ anārabdha kāryāḥ vā paṭe tantu ādayaḥ iva varṇe na kvacid avayavāḥ upalabhyante na ca anumīyante liṅga abhāvāt 
[I,525,i_I,525,ii]	na api aśraya vināśāt vināśaḥ śabdasya ātma ādi vat ana āśrita tvāt ākāśa āśrita pakṣe vā tad nitya tvāt na ca anyaḥ kaścana śabda nāśasya hetuḥ asti kṣayaḥ yathā upabhogena śastra ādi chedanena vā saṃbhāvyate paṭa ādīnām na evam śabdasya karhi cit tasmāt tirohitaḥ api āste yadi śabdaḥ kṣaṇa antaram mṛtyoḥ mukhāt apakrāntaḥ punar kena eṣa hanyate 
[I,525,iii]	itas ca nityaḥ śabdaḥ saṅkhyā bhāvāt aṣṭa kṛtvas go śabdaḥ uccāritaḥ iti vadanti na tu aṣṭau go śabdāḥ iti tena ekatvam avagamyate yaḥ ayam kriyā abhyāvṛtti gaṇane vihitaḥ kṛtvasucpratyayaḥ sa kriyāvatām abhede bhavati tena uccāraṇa āvṛtti mātram tat uktam kriyāvatām abhede hi kriyā aavṛttiṣu kṛtvasu c tad prayogāt dhruvam tasya śabdasya āvartate kriyāḥ iti kriyā abhyāvṛtti sattāyām abhede ca kriyāvatām saṃkhyā abhidhācinaḥ śabdāt kṛtvasucpratyayam viduḥ 
[I,526,i]	tat anena prakāreṇa pratyabhijñānam ucyate pramāṇam śabda nitya tve sakala śrotṛ sākṣikam tathā hi asti saḥ eva ayam go śabdaḥ iti vedanam śrautram karaṇa kāluṣya bādha sandeha varjitam 
[I,526,ii]	śrotra indriya vyāpāra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānāt śrautram idam vijñānam na ca etat janakasya karaṇasya kim api daurbalyam upalabhyate na ca kiṃsvid iti koṭi dvaya saṃsparśitayā idam vijñānam upajāyate na ca na etat evam iti pratyaya antaram asmin bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ idānīṃtana astitva prameya ādhikya grahaṇāt ca idam anadhigata artha grāhī api bhavitum arhati bhavat mate ca gṛhīta grāhi tve api pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam iṣyate na hi tad aprāmāṇyam vaktum śakyate śākyaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ kṣaṇika padārtha anabhyupagamāt 
[I,526,iii_I,527,i]	na sādṛśya nimitta tvam vaktum tasyāḥ ca yujyate sāmānya viṣaya tvam vā dvayasya api niṣedhanāt kaiścid tirohite bhāva āditya prāmāṇyam ucyate tat asat tat pratītya eva tirodhāna niṣedhanāt jīvati tvad mate api eṣa śabdaḥ tricaturān kṣaṇān pratyabhijñā ca kālena tāvatā na na siddhyati ekakṣaṇa āyuṣi tu asmin pratītiḥ ati durlabhā na khalva janakam kiñcid vastu jñānena gṛhyate iti kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge vakṣyate 
[I,527,ii]	api ca yathā niśīthe rolamba śyāmala ambuda ḍambare pratyabhijñāyate kiñcid acira dyuti dhāmabhiḥ tathā avirata saṃyoga vibhāga krama janmabhiḥ pratyabhijñāyate śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaiḥ api mārutaiḥ 
[I,527,iii_I,527,v]	atra āha mārutaiḥ iti upoddhātena sādhu smṛtam tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyabhijñānam prathamam eva śabdasya yat niyata grahaṇam tad abhivyakti pakṣe durghaṭam nitya tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca sarve savatra sarvadā śabdāḥ santi iti bhedena grahaṇe kim niyāmakam dhvanayaḥ hi nāma saṃyoga vibhāga viśeṣitāḥ vāyavaḥ vāyu vṛttayaḥ vā saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ te hi śabdasya vyañjakāḥ iṣyante taiḥ ca karaṇam vā saṃskriyate karma vā dvayam vā sarvathā ca pramādaḥ 
[I,528,i_I,528,iii]	karaṇe saṃskṛte tāvat sarva śabda śrutiḥ bhavet gakārāya eva saṃskāraḥ iti eṣa niyamaḥ kutas apica stimita samīraṇa apasaraṇam eva karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ sa ca ayam tad deśa vyavasthita sakala tad viṣaya sādhāraṇaḥ eva yathā javanikā prāya prāpta prasaram īkṣaṇam raṅga bhūmiṣu tad deśam aśeṣam vastu paśyati tathā prasara saṃrodhi samīra utsāraṇe sati śrotram tad deśa niḥśeṣa śabda grāhi bhaviṣyati 
[I,528,iv]	ākāśam ca śrotram ācakṣate bhavantaḥ tat ca vibhu niravayavam ca iti kvacid eva tasmin saṃskṛte sati sarve ca tadā eva saṃskṛta karaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ iti sarve eva śṛṇuyuḥ iti badhira itara vyavasthā dusthitā 
[I,529,i]	viṣaye tu saṃskriyamāṇe tasya anavayavasya vyāpinaḥ ca saṃskṛta tvāt sarvatra śravaṇam iti madreṣu abhivyaktaḥ go śabdaḥ kaśmīreṣu api śrūyeta na hi tasya ādhāra dvārakaḥ saṃskāraḥ ākāśa vat ana āśrita tvāt ākāśa āśrita tva pakṣe api tad eka tvāt na api bhāgaśas saṃskriyate go śabdaḥ tasya niravaya tvāt uktam hi alpīyasā prayatnena śabdem uccaritam matiḥ yadi vā na eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti
[I,529,ii_I,529,iv]	ubhaya saṃskāra pakṣe tu doṣa dvayasya api anativṛttiḥ sarveṣām grahaṇam sarvatra śravaṇam iti na ca samāna deśānām samāna indriya grāhyāṇām ca bhāvānām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tvam upalabdham gṛhe dadhi ghaṭīm draṣṭum ānītaḥ gṛhamedhinā apūpān api tad deśān prakāśayati dīpakaḥ tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣaḥ eva niyata deśam śabdasya grahaṇam parikalpate na abhi vyakti pakṣaḥ iti 
[I,529,v]	api ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ abhibhavaḥ ca śabdasya śabda antareṇa na prāpnoti na hi śabdaḥ tīvraḥ mandaḥ vā kaścid svatas tasya bheda abhāvāt saṃskārasya ca tad abhivyakti hetoḥ na kācana tīvra tā manda tā vā yad anusāreṇa viṣaye tathā buddhiḥ syāt 
[I,530,i]	pavana dharmaḥ vā tīvra ādiḥ bhavan katham śrotreṇa gṛhyeta sa avayave hi vastuni sakala viśeṣa grahaṇa agrahaṇa saṃbhavāt tad apekṣayā pratīti bhedaḥ bhavet iha tu niravayave śabde na tathā upapadyate iti tasmāt kṛtaka pakṣaḥ eva śreyām iti 
[I,530,ii_I,530,iii]	atra ucyate karaṇa saṃskāra pakṣaḥ eva tāvat astu tat ca karaṇam kiñcid eva marudbhiḥ upāhita saṃskāram kañcid eva śabdam gṛhṇāti yathā tālu ādi saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ bhavatām mate utpādaka tayā iṣyante kecid varṇasya kasyacid tathā tad vāyu saṃyoga vibhāgāḥ kecid eva naḥ kasyacid grahaṇe śaktāḥ śrotram kurvanti saṃskṛtam yathā ca teṣām utpattau sāmarthya niyamaḥ tava tathā eva eṣām abhivyaktau sāmarthya niyamaḥ mama 
[I,530,iv_I,531,ii]	vyañjakānām niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti ced kaḥ evam āha sahasrākṣaḥ tathā hi pṛthivyām eva vartamānaḥ gandhaḥ samāna deśaḥ bhavati samāna indriya grāhyaḥ ca ghrāṇa eka viṣaya tvāt tasya ca niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tā dṛśyate eva kvacid pāvaka saṃparkāt arka aṃśu sparśataḥ kvacid kvacid salila saṃsekāt gandhaḥ abhivyajyate bhuvaḥ na ca stimita pavana apanodana mātram karaṇasya saṃskāraḥ iṣyate yaḥ sarva sādhāraṇaḥ syāt kintu anyaḥ eva niyataḥ prativiṣayam yogya tā lakṣaṇaḥ 
[I,531,iii]	yat punar abhyadhāyi nabhasi śrotre abhyupagamyamāne sarva prāṇinām ekam eva śrotram bhavet iti tat api asādhu dharma adharmayoḥ niyāmaka tvāt ākāśasya api ghaṭa ākāśa vat anyā avat cheda upapatteḥ dharma adharma nibandhanaḥ eva badhira itara vibhāgaḥ 
[I,531,iv]	api ca bhavatām eva eṣa doṣaḥ yeṣām ākāśam eva śrotram iti abhyupagama niyamaḥ mīmāṃsakānām tu na avaśyam ākāśam eva śrotram kārya artha āpatti kalpitam tu kim api karaṇa mātram prati puruṣa niyatam śrotram iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ tathā ca bhartṛ mitraḥ pavana janita saṃskāram eva śrotram manyate 
[I,532,i]	atha vā viṣaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ bhavatu tathā api na ati prasaṅgaḥ niyata deśasya eva tatra saṃskārāt na ca asya bhāgaśas saṃskāraḥ niravayava tvāt tathā api jāti vat asya grahaṇa niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati tathā ca bhavatām eva pakṣe yathā sarva gatā jātiḥ piṇḍa deśā eva gṛhyate na ca kārtsnya gṛhītā api piṇḍe anyatra na dṛśyate tathā sarva gataḥ śabdaḥ nāda deśeṣu gṛhyate kārtsnyena ca gṛhītaḥ api punar anyatra gṛhyate piṇḍaḥ abhivyañjakaḥ jāteḥ śabdasya vyañjakaḥ dhvaniḥ āśrita anāśrita tva ādi viśeṣaḥ kva upayujyate 
[I,532,ii]	sarva gata tva niravaya tva aviśeṣāt tīvra manda tva ādayaḥ ca dhvani dharmāḥ api bhavantaḥ śabda vṛtti tayā avabhānti yathā sthūla tva kṛśa tvādaya piṇḍa dharmāḥ api jāti vṛtti tvena kvacid gṛhyantaḥ dṛśyante agṛhīta śābaleya ādi viśeṣasya kṛśāḥ gāvaḥ ityādi pratibhāsa darśanāt 
[I,533,i]	yat vā na tīvra manda ādeḥ varṇa dharma tayā grahaḥ buddhiḥ eva tathā udeti vyañjaka anuvidhāyinī tāvantaḥ eva te varṇāḥ pracaya apacaya spṛśaḥ evam ca abhibhavaḥ api eṣām svatas na asti parasparam marudbhiḥ abhibhūyante mārutāḥ iva durbalāḥ tejobhiḥ iva dīpta aṃśoḥ divā dīpa prabhā ādayaḥ 
[I,533,ii]	dvaya saṃskāra pakṣaḥ api evam samāhitaḥ bhavati ubhayeṣām api doṣāṇām utsāraṇāt tasmāt pratyabhijñā pratyaya prabhāva siddha nitya tvasya śabdasya abhivyaktiḥ eva sādhīyasī 
[I,533,iii_I,533,iv]	idam ca ālocya tām āryāḥ kārya abhivyaṅgya pakṣayoḥ śabdasya grahaṇe gurvī laghvī vā kutra kalpanā tathā hi bhavantaḥ vaiśeṣikāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ jaināḥ saugatāḥ ca kārya śabda vādinaḥ cārvākāḥ tu varākāḥ kasya evaṃvidhāsu goṣṭhīṣu smṛti patham upayānti 
[I,534,i]	tatra bhavatām vaiśeṣikāṇām ca śabdasya śravaṇe tāvat eṣā tulyā eva kalpanā saṃyogāt vā vibhāgāt vā śabdaḥ upajāyate jātaḥ ca asau tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca sarvatodikkāni kadamba golaka ākāreṇa sajātīya nikaṭa deśāni śabda antarāṇi ārabhate tāni api tathā iti evam vīcī santāna vṛtti ārambha prabandha prāptaḥ antyaḥ śrotra ākāśa janmā śabdaḥ tad samavetaḥ tena eva gṛhyate iti 
[I,534,ii_I,534,iii]	tat iyam tāvat ati ghargharā kalpanā śabdaḥ śabda antaram sūtaḥ iti tāvat alaukikam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi na dṛṣṭaḥ teṣu buddhi vat janyante anantare deśe śabdāḥ sva sadṛśāḥ ca te tiryak ūrdhvam adhas ca iti kā iyam vaḥ śraddadhāna tā śabda antarāṇi kurvantaḥ katham ca viramanti te na hi vega kṣayaḥ teṣām marutām iva kalpyate kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne ca śabdasya akaraṇam katham vyomnaḥ sarva gata tvāt hi kuḍya madhye vyavasthitiḥ 
[I,535,i_I,535,ii]	atha āvaraṇa ātmaka kuḍya ādi dravya saṃyoga rahitam ākāśam śabda janmani samavāyi kāraṇam iṣyate tat atra pramāṇam viśeṣe vaktavyam tulya ārambhe ca tīvreṇa mandasya jananam katham śrūyate ca antikāt tīvraḥ śabdaḥ mandaḥ tu dūratas vīcī santāna tulya tvam api śabdeṣu durvacam mūrtimat tva kriyā yoga vega ādi rahita ātmasu 
[I,535,iii_I,535,vi]	yat api ucyate sajātīya janakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpa ādi vat iti tat idam asiddham asiddhena sādhyam guṇa tvasya asiddha tvāt na śabdaḥ pāratantryeṇa kadācid upalabhyate dravya sthaḥ iva rūpa ādiḥ atas asya guṇatā kutas api ca na śabda antara ārambhakaḥ śabdaḥ guṇa tvāt rūpavat śabdam na ārabhate śabdaḥ śabda tvāt śrotra śabda vat na saṃyoga vibhāgau śabdasya janakau saṃyoga vibhāga tvāt anya saṃyoga vibhāga vat iti ādayaḥ pratihetavaḥ api atra sulabhāḥ iti yat kiñcid etat 
[I,536,i]	kāpilāḥ tu bruvate śrotra vṛttiḥ śabda deśam gacchati sā śabdena vikriyate iti tatra śrotrasya vyāmiśra tvāt nikaṭa deśena eva śabdena tad vṛttiḥ vikriyate na dūra deśena iti atra kaḥ niyamaḥ niyama abhāvāt ca kānyakubja prayuktaḥ go śabdaḥ gauramūlake api śrūyeta amūrtā ca śrotra vṛttiḥ prasarantī na mūrtaiḥ kuḍya ādibhiḥ abhihantum śakyate iti vyavahitasya api śabdasya śravaṇam syāt 
[I,536,ii_I,536,iv]	vāyau śabda anukūle ca na tasya śravaṇam bhavet gacchantyāḥ pratikūlaḥ hi śrotra vṛtteḥ sa mārutaḥ dūre api anuvātam śabdasya śravaṇam yat dṛṣṭam prativātam ca nikaṭe api yat aśravaṇam tat asmin pakṣe viparītam syāt vṛtti vṛttimatoḥ bhedaḥ na asti iti indriya vat bhavet vyāpikā vṛttiḥ iti evam katham sarvatra na śrutiḥ 
[I,536,v]	ārhatāḥ tu āduḥ sūkṣmaiḥ śabda pudgalaiḥ ārabdha śarīraḥ śabdaḥ sva prabhava bhūmeḥ niṣkramya prati puruṣam karṇa mūlam upasarpati iti tat etat ati su bhāṣitam varṇasya avayavāḥ sūkṣmāḥ santi kecana pudgalāḥ taiḥ varṇaḥ avayavī nāma janyate paśya kautukam teṣām adṛśyamānānām kīdṛśaḥ racanā kramaḥ kena tad sanniveśena kaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyatām laghavaḥ avayavāḥ ca ete nibaddhā na ca kenacid na ca enam kaṭhinam kartum varṇa avayavinam kṣamāḥ kṛśaḥ ca gacchan sa katham na vikṣipyeta mārutaiḥ dalaśas vā na bhajyeta vṛkṣa ādi abhihataḥ katham prayāṇaka avadhiḥ kaḥ ca gacchataḥ asya tapasvinaḥ eka śrotra praviṣṭaḥ vā sa śrūyeta aparaiḥ katham niṣkamya karṇāt ekasmāt praveśaḥ śravaṇa antare yadīṣyeta katham tasya yugapad bahubhiḥ śrutiḥ śrotṛ saṃkhyā anusāreṇa na nānā varṇa saṃbhavaḥ vaktuḥ tulya prayatna tvāt śrotṛ bheda tad aikyayoḥ tat alam parihāsasya mahataḥ hetu bhūtayā nagna kṣapaṇaka ācārya prajñā cāturya carcayā 
[I,537,i_I,537,ii]	śākya prāyāḥ tu ācakṣate aprāptaḥ eva śabdaḥ śrotra śaktyā gṛhyate iti tat etat ativyāmūḍha bhāṣitam aprāpti tulya tāyām dūra vyavahita ādīnām aśravaṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt prāpya kārita ākhya karma dharma aprasaṅgāt ca na ca cārvāka vat aparīkṣitaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ upekṣitum yuktaḥ iti kāryatva pakṣe amūḥ śrutāḥ tārkika kalpanāḥ atha abhivyakti pakṣe asya śṛṇu śrotriya kalpanām 
[I,537,iii^1]	vivakṣā pūrvaka prayatna preryamāṇaḥ tāvat vegavat tayā kriyāvat tayā ca kauṣṭhyaḥ bahis nissarati samīraṇaḥ iti su spaṣṭam etat pratyakṣa nikaṭa pavana vādinām pakṣe pavana samaye vaktṛ vadana nikaṭa nihita hasta sparśena eva saḥ upalabhyate anumeya māruta pakṣe api tadā ānīm āsya samīpa sannidhāpita tūlaka karmaṇā saḥ anumīyate sa gacchan sarva todikkaḥ stimita anila nodanam karoti karṇa ākāśe ca prayāti śruti yogyatām sa ca prayatna tīvra tva manda tvena tad ātmakaḥ śabde tathāvidha jñapti hetutām avalambate sa ca eṣa gacchan uddāma vega yoga āhita kriyaḥ śaravat vega śāntyā eva na dūram gantum arhati sa mūrtaḥ prasarat mūrtaiḥ aparaiḥ pratibadhyate kuḍya ādibhiḥ atas na asya śrutiḥ vyavahita ātmanaḥ sa vega gati yogi tvāt āgacchati yatas yatas śrotā tatas tatas śabdam āyāntam abhimanyate sa tu śaṅkha ādi saṃyoga preryamāṇaḥ samīraṇaḥ śabdasya avarṇa rūpasya bhavati vyakti kāraṇam śabdaḥ yadi api varṇa ātmā śrotra grāhyaḥ na vidyate tathā api tatra śabda tvam śravaṇena grahīṣyate 
[I,538,i_I,539,ii]	tat iha na kadācid asmābhiḥ adhikā kalpanā kṛtā māruta gateḥ asyāḥ sarva loka prasiddha tvāt karṇa ākāśa saṃskāra mātram adṛṣṭam kalpitam tat api kārya arthāpatti gamya tvāt na apūrvam iti apakṣapātinaḥ sabhyāḥ satyam utpatti apekṣayā śabdasya kalpanām āhuḥ abhivyaktau laghīyasīm tat evam abhivyakti pakṣe niyata grahaṇa upapatteḥ pratyabhijñā pratyaya prāmāṇyāt nitya tvam eva upagantavyam 
[I,539,iii]	yā tu anaikāntika tva uktiḥ dhī karma pratyabhijñayā pratyakṣe codyamānā asau darśayati ati mūḍha tām tena anumāna doṣeṇa pratyakṣam na hi dūṣyate siddhānta antara cintā tu bhavet bhṛśam asaṅga tā nirbādham pratyabhijñānam asti ced buddhi karmaṇoḥ tayoḥ api astu nitya tvam no ced kā śabda tulya tā tasmāt nityaḥ pratyabhijñā prabhāvāt siddhaḥ śabdaḥ paśyatām tārkikāṇām arthāpattiḥ pūrvam uktā ca tasmin asthāyi tve yuktayaḥ ca vyudastāḥ asti ca vede vacanam siddhām anuvadati yat dhruvām vācam tad liṅga darśanāt api nityaḥ śabdaḥ abhimantavyaḥ śikṣā vidaḥ tu pavana ātmakam eva śabdam ācakṣaṃte tad asamañja sam a pratīteḥ arhan mata prathita pudgala paryudāsa nītyā ca vāyu avayavāḥ api vāraṇīyāḥ ye api sthūla vināśa darśana vaśāt brūyuḥ kṣaṇa dhvaṃsinaḥ bhāvān te api na śaknuvanti gaditum śabdasya vidhvaṃsitām ante hi kṣaya darśanāt kila tathā teṣām bhramaḥ asmin punar śabde na anta parikṣayau iti katham kumbha ādi vat bhaṅgi tā 
[I,541,i]	atra brūmahe na khalu bhavat abhihitamet pramāṇa dvayam api śabda nityatām prasādhayitum arhati 
[I,541,ii]	yāvatā yad artha āpattiḥ avādi darśanasya para artha tvāt iti sā kṣīṇā eva artha pratīteḥ anyathā api upapanna tvāt 
[I,541,iii_I,541,iv]	tatra sādṛśyam api anabhyupagatam eva dūṣita mitya sthāne kliṣṭāḥ bhavantaḥ gatvā ādi jātīḥ a āśritya sambabdha grahaṇa ādikaḥ artha avagati paryantaḥ vyavahāraḥ prasetsyati 
[I,541,v]	nanu ga tvam pratikṣiptam etat eva parīkṣyatām asmin samāpyate vādaḥ marma sthānam idam ca naḥ pratikṣipte ca gatvā ādau na artha saṃpratyayaḥ anyathā pratyabhijñāna bhūmiḥ ca na anyā asti iti vayam jitāḥ siddhe tu gatva sāmānye tatas eva artha vedanam tat eva pratyabhijñeyam iti yūyam parājitāḥ tena anyat sarvam utsṛjya vāda sthāna kaḍambaram gatvā ādi jāti siddhi artham atha atas prayatāmahe 
[I,542,i_I,542,iii]	tatra idam vicāryatām yaḥ eṣa gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ sa kim vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ uta varṇa bheda viṣayaḥ iti vyañjaka bheda kṛte tasmin eka tvāt gakārasya kiṃvṛtti gatva sāmānyaṃsyāt varṇa bheda viṣaya tve tu tad bheda siddheḥ abheda pratyayasya viṣayaḥ mṛgyaḥ iti tad grāhyam aparihāryam gatvasāmānyam 
[I,542,iv]	tat ucyate na ayam vyañjaka bheda kṛtaḥ gakāra bheda pratyayaḥ yadi hi vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ eṣa bheda pratibhāsaḥ tarhi yara lava ādi varṇa bheda pratyayaḥ api tad kṛtaḥ eva kim iti na bhavati tatas ca sakala varṇa vikalpa atītam ekam anavayavam śabdabrahma vaiyākaraṇa vat abhyupagantavyam 
[I,542,v]	atha manuṣe yara lava ādīnām itaretara vibhakta svarūpa paricchedāt viṣaya bheda kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na upādhi nibandhanaḥ iti tarhi gaṅgā gagana gargā ādau gakāra bheda pratibhāsaḥ api eṣa na vyañjaka bheda adhīnaḥ bhavitum arhati tatra api paraspara vibhinna gakāra svarūpa pratibhāsāt śuka sārikā manuṣyeṣu hi vaktṛ bhede sati vyañjaka nānātva saṃbhāvanayā varṇa bheda pratyayasya tad kṛta tvam kāmam āśaṅkyeta api vaktṛ eka tve tu gagana ādau kutas tad kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ 
[I,543,i]	nanu tatra api marutaḥ bhinnāḥ eva vyañjakāḥ mukham tu ekam bhavatu kim tena tat api vā bhinnam iti eke ucyate sa tarhi marutām bhedaḥ yara lava ādiṣu api tulyaḥ iti mā bhūt teṣām api bhedaḥ 
[I,543,ii]	nanu yara lavānām viśeṣa pratītiḥ asti gakāre tu sā na asti iti uktam uccāraṇasya eva tatra bhedaḥ na uccāryasya iti na etat sāram mā bhūt eṣa viśeṣaḥ iti pratītiḥ bheda buddhiḥ tu vidyate eva anyā ca viśeṣa buddhiḥ ucyate anyā ca bheda buddhiḥ iti viśeṣa apratibhāse api kvacid viccheda pratīti viśeṣāt 
[I,543,iii_I,544,i]	nanu atra ucyate dṛśyate śābaleya ādi vyakti antara vilakṣaṇā bāhuleya ādi go vyaktiḥ tena bhedaḥ asti vāstavaḥ na tu druta ādi bhedena niṣpannā saṃpratīyate gavyakti antara vicchinnā gavyaktiḥ aparā sphuṭā iti na etat yuktam śābalaiyādau prativyakti sāsnā ākhura kakudādi avayava vartinaḥ viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsante te ca sthūla tvāt sugamāḥ bhavanti yatra tu tila taṇḍula kulattha ādau pratisiktham viśeṣāḥ na pratibhāsante tatra viśeṣa pratīti abhāve api viccheda pratibhāsaḥ vidyate eva sikthāt sikthā antara tvena pratibhāsāt evam iha api eṣa gakāra viśeṣaḥ iti pratibhāsā bhāve api viccheda grahaṇāt gakāra nānā tvam 
[I,544,ii]	nanu taṇḍula ādau api sikthāt siktha antare viśeṣāḥ pratibhāsantaḥ eva tad apratibhāse bhedasya api grahītum aśakyatvāt mā evam vādīḥ yatne sati caturaśratri koṇa vartula tva ādi viśeṣāḥ api amutra pratibhāsiṣyante evam gakāreṣu api prayatnam vinā api tu prathama akṣa nipātaḥ eva viccheda buddhiḥ utpadyate iti tayā eva nānātva siddhiḥ 
[I,544,iii]	nanu na eva anadhigata viśeṣasya viccheda buddhiḥ utpattum arhati iti viśeṣa buddhiḥ eva viccheda buddhiḥ na etat evam bhramaṇa ādi karma kṣaṇānām sūkṣma viśeṣa apratibhāse api viccheda pratibhāsāt 
[I,545,i]	nanu tatra api viśeṣa grahaṇam kalpyate anyathā viccheda pratīti anupapatteḥ yadi evam varṇeṣu api gagana ādau viccheda pratīti darśanāt kalpyatām viśeṣa grahaṇam 
[I,545,ii_I,545,iii]	nanu asti eva tat kintvaupādhikam sphaṭike rakta tā pratyaya vat viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sphaṭikasya śuddhasya dṛṣṭa tvāt lākṣā ādi upādhi nimittakaḥ bhavatu rakta tā pratyayaḥ varṇānām tu nityam eva udātta ādi viśeṣavatām pratibhāsāt tad rahitānām anupalabdheḥ ca naisargikaḥ eva ayam bhedaḥ tat yathā buddhīnām ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣaya viśeṣa śūnyānām asaṃvedanāt prativiṣayam nānā tvam tathā varṇānām api pratyudātta ādi viśeṣam nānātvam na ca buddhiḥ ekā eva nityā ca viṣaya bheda upādhi nibandhanaḥ tad bhedaḥ iti sāmpratam svayam eva buddhi janma pratyakṣam iti abhidhānāt asmābhiḥ ca buddhi nityatāyāḥ upariṣṭāt nirākariṣyamāṇa tvāt viṣaya bhedāt ca tad bheda abhidhāne viṣayasya api kutas idānīm bhedaḥ buddhi bhedāt iti ced itaretara āśraya prasaṅgaḥ tat imāḥ svatas eva bhedavatyaḥ buddhayaḥ viṣayāṇām api svatas eva bhedaḥ bhavati sa tu buddhibhiḥ jñāyate iti alam artha antara gamanena 
[I,546,i_I,546,ii]	yathā ca śukla guṇasya bhāsvara dhūsara ādi bhedavataḥ nānā tvam tathā varṇasya api udātta ādi bhedavataḥ śukla guṇaḥ api ekaḥ eva āśraya bhedāt tu tad bhedaḥ iti ced aho rasa samārūḍhaḥ bhaṭṭaḥ karma ekam buddhiḥ api ekā jagati ekaḥ sitaḥ guṇaḥ tat ca etat nityam iti etāḥ strī gṛhe kāmuka uktayaḥ 
[I,546,iii_I,546,iv]	api ca eka ātmavādaḥ api evam eva avataret sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedasya śarīra bhedena api upapatteḥ advaitasya ca na ati davīyān eṣa panthāḥ iti alam alīka vikatthanena tasmāt buddhi ādi vat sarvadā sa viśeṣāṇām eva varṇānām grahaṇāt nānātvam 
[I,546,v]	tatra etat syāt gaganāda avakāra upaśleṣa kṛtaḥ eva bheda pratyayaḥ na svarūpa bhedaḥ iti tat ayuktam akārasya api bhavat mate bheda abhāvāt avidyamāne ca tad upaśleṣe digajaḥ diggajaḥ iti bhedena pratibhāsaḥ bhavati eva tathā ca samadaḥ sammadaḥ paṭaḥ paṭṭaḥ āsanam āsannam malaḥ mallaḥ avikaḥ avikkaḥ patiḥ pattiḥ patanam pattanam iti ādau api varṇa bheda pratītiḥ artha pratīti bhedaḥ api diś aja diggaja ādau śabda antara nimittakaḥ bhavitum arhati na dvis uccāraṇa kṛtaḥ grantha ādhikyāt artha ādhikyam na uccāraṇa bhedāt śata kṛtvas api prayukte go śabde sāsnādi mad artha vyatirikta vācya saṃpratyaya abhāvāt tathā ca diggajaḥ iti dviga kārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ iti ācakṣate śabda vidaḥ na dvis gakāraḥ uccāritaḥ iti 
[I,547,i_I,548,i]	nanu go guru giri geha āda avajbhede api gakāra pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ ekaḥ eva ayam gakāraḥ mā evam vocaḥ eṣaḥ eva hi bheda pratyayaḥ asmābhiḥ upadarśitaḥ vinā api ca ajupaśleṣam diggaja ādau bheda pratyayaḥ varṇitaḥ na ca vayam abheda pratyayam apahnumahe kintu bheda pratyayasya api abādhitasya bhāvāt ananyathā siddha tvāt ca gavā ādi vat sāmānya viśeṣa rūpa tām brūmaḥ vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvam tu yara lavādau api vaktum śakyam iti uktam eva api ca śāvaleya ādi bheda pratyayasya api vyañjaka bheda nibandhana tvāt ekaḥ eva asau syāt 
[I,548,ii_I,548,iii]	nanu tatra kaḥ vyañjakaḥ yad bheda kṛtaḥ piṇḍa bheda pratyayaḥ iṣyate āha ca na piṇḍa vyatirekeṇa vyañjakaḥ atra dhvaniḥ yathā piṇḍa vyaṅgyā eva go tva ādi jātiḥ nityam pratīyate iti tat ayuktam go tva jāteḥ gatva vat idānīm avivāda āspadībhūta tvāt piṇḍa bheda pratyayasya cakṣuḥ vyāpāra bhedāt api upapatteḥ 
[I,548,iv]	nanu sakṛt api vyāpṛta locanasya paraspara vibhakta piṇḍa pratibhāsaḥ bhavati mā evam tadānīm go mātra pratītiḥ eṣa śābaleyaḥ eṣa bāhuleyaḥ iti tu viśeṣa grahaṇe cakṣuḥ vyāpāra bhedaḥ aparihāryaḥ 
[I,548,v]	yadi ca ādya gopiṇḍa bhede prathama akṣa sannipāta jā buddhiḥ subhaga tām gatā gakāra bhede tarhi kim kṛtam asyāḥ daurbhāgyam tatra api prathama śrotra vyāpāra velāyām anavagata vyañjaka vibhāgasya api gagana gaṅgā ādau gakāra bhedaḥ pratibhāsate eva iti alam prasaṅgena 
[I,549,i]	tat ayam vastu saṃkṣepaḥ upekṣyatām vā sarvatra sāmānya viśeṣa vyavahāraḥ iṣyatām vā go tva ādi vat gakāra bheda vṛtti gatvasāmānyam 
[I,549,ii_I,549,iv]	atvam api gatva vat apratyākhyeyam itaretara vilakṣaṇānām akārāṇām hrasva dīrgha pluta ādi bhedena pratibhāsāt yaḥ punar ākāre api akāra pratyabhijñānam brūyāt tasya īkāra ukāra pratītiṣu api akārasya eva grahaṇa prasaktiḥ actvā aviśeṣāt atha tad aviśeṣe api avarṇāt iva ṛṇasya bhedaḥ iṣyate sa tarhi ākārasya na nihrotavyaḥ evañca sati araṇya araṇya śabdābhyām bhinna artha pratītiḥ upapatsyate udātta anudātta svarita saṃvṛta vivṛta ādi bhedaḥ api śabda vidām pratyakṣaḥ eva gīta jñānām iva svara grāma bhāṣā vibhāgaḥ tasmāt aṣṭādaśa bhedam akāram ācakṣate atvam ca tad sāmānyam avarṇa kula śabdena vyavaharanti iti 
[I,550,i_I,550,iii]	yat tu dhvani dharmasya api dīrgha ādeḥ artha pratipatti aṅga tvam turaga vega vat uktam tat api ahṛdayaṅgamam śabdāt artham pratipadyante lokāḥ na marudbhyaḥ atha marutām api tathā vyutpatteḥ artha pratīti hetu tvam tarhi vyutpattiḥ eva pramāṇam syāt na śabdaḥ vyutpatteḥ avyabhicārāt śabdasya ca vyabhicārāt iti āstām etat tasmāt gatvā ādi sāmānyaiḥ artha saṃpratyaya ātmanaḥ kāryasya pariniṣpatteḥ na varṇa vyakti nityatā 
[I,550,iv_I,550,v]	aparaḥ āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūratas eva gatvā ādya para sāmānyam mahāsāmānyam api śabda tvam varṇeṣu na upapadyate vyakti antara anusandhānam yatra eka vyakti darśane tatra eka rūpa sāmānyam iṣyate tad kṛtam ca tat gakāra śruti velāyām na vakāra avamarśanam bāhuleya parāmarśaḥ śābaleya grahe yathā śabdaḥ śabdaḥ ayam iti evam pratītiḥ tu aprayojikā eṣā hi śrotra gamya tvam upādhim anurudhyate 
[I,551,i_I,551,ii]	tat etat niranusandhānasya abhidhānam anusandhāna pratyayasya sāmānya siddhau aprayojaka tvāt anusandhānam hi sārūpyāt vijātīyeṣu api bhavati gavaya grahaṇa samaye gopiṇḍa anusandhāna vat tasmāt abādhita eka rūpa pratyaya pratiṣṭhaḥ eva sāmānya vyavahāraḥ samāna buddhi grāhye api sāmānye avasthite kvacid bhavati anya anusandhānam kvacid vā na bhavati api tat asti khaṇḍa muṇḍa ādau piṇḍa sārūpya kāritam gakāra ādiṣu varṇeṣu tad abhāvāt tu na asti tat na tu sāmānya abhāvāt 
[I,551,iii_I,551,iv]	na ca sārūpyam eva sāmānyam sāṅkhya vat abhidhātum yuktam vijātīyeṣu api gogavaya ādiṣu tasya dṛṣṭa tvāt yadi ca śabdaḥ śabdaḥ iti anuvṛtta buddheḥ śrotra gamya tva upādhi kṛta tvam ucyate tarhi gavā ādau api ekabuddheḥ vāha doha ādi eka artha kriyā kāri tva nibandhana tvāt go tva ādi jāti nihnavaḥ bauddhavat mantavyaḥ na ca etat evam tat go tva vat śabda tvam api na pratyākhyeyam 
[I,552,i]	etena brāhmaṇa tva ādi sāmānyam api samarthitam veditavyam upadeśa sahāya pratyakṣa gamya tvāt na ca upadeśa apekṣaṇāt apratyakṣa tvam tasya bhavituḥ mahati go tva ādi pratyayasya api sambandha grahaṇa kāle tad apekṣa tva darśanāt uktam ca na hi yat giri śṛṅgam āruhya gṛhyate tat apratyakṣam iti 
[I,552,ii_I,552,iii]	na ca aupādhikaḥ paiṭhīna sipaippala ādi prabhṛtiṣu brāhmaṇa pratyayaḥ upādheḥ agrahaṇāt aupādhika tvasya go tva ādau api vaktum śakya tvāt api ca upadeśa nirapekṣam api cakṣuḥ kṣatriya ādi vilakṣaṇām saumya ākṛtim brāhmaṇa jātim avagacchati iti eke tat alam anayā kathayā 
[I,552,iv_I,552,v]	prakṛtam ucyate gatvā ādibhiḥ jātibhiḥ eva artha saṃpratyaya upapatteḥ yat uktam darśanasya para artha tvāt iti etat ayuktam etena sarvatra yaugapadyāt iti etat api pratyuktam sambandha niyamasya gatvā ādibhyaḥ eva siddheḥ 
[I,552,vi_I,553,i]	yat api saṅkhyā bhāvāt kṛtu a sucprayoga darśanam udagrāhi tat api vyabhicāri kṛtam kāntasya tanu aṅgyā tris apāṅga vilokanam catur āliṅganam gāḍham aṣṭa kṛtvas ca cumbanam iti tad bhede api darśanāt atha tatra strīpuṃsayoḥ abhede cumbana ādi kriyā mātra bhedaḥ eva iti ucyate tathā api apūrveṣu brāhmaṇeṣu bhuktavatsu pañca kṛtvas brāhmaṇāḥ bhuktabantaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ dṛśyate 
[I,553,ii]	evam śabde api tad saṅkhyā vyavahāraḥ hi dṛśyate kavinā sat anuprāse nibaddhe akṣara ḍambare gakāraḥ bahavaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti vyavaharanti hi yat api pratyabhijñānam tat dvārakam udāhṛtam tasya api siddhe prāmāṇye jāti ālambanatā bhavet nṛtta abhinaya ceṣṭā ādi pratyabhijñānataḥ vayam na śabda pratyabhijñānam uttārayitum īśmahe viśeṣam pratyabhijñāne na paśyāmaḥ manāk api stambha ādi pratyabhijñāsu na tadā eva vināśa dhīḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratīkāram tena tāḥ kartum īśate śabdasya pratyabhijñāna velāyām eva dṛśyate śabda rūpasya vidhvaṃsaḥ iti tat nitya tā kutas 
[I,554,i]	yadi api kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyam asmābhiḥ api samarthayiṣyate tathā api stambha ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ śabda pratyabhijñāyāḥ eṣaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat atra dhvastaḥ śabdaḥ iti tadā eva pratyayaḥ jāyate atas eva tirohite api bhāvāt iyam apramāṇam pratyabhijñā iti āhuḥ 
[I,554,ii_I,555,i]	yadi api dhriyate asmākam śabdaḥ dvitrān api kṣaṇān pratyabhijñā tu kālena tāvatā na avakalpate tathā hi śabdaḥ utpadyate tāvat tatas sva viṣayam jñānam janayati ajanakasya pratibhāsā yogāt tatas tena jñānena śabdaḥ gṛhyate tatas saṃskāra bodhaḥ tatas pūrva jñāta śabda smaraṇam tatas tat sacivam śrotram manaḥ vā śabda pratyabhijñānam janayiṣyati tadā śabdaḥ grahīṣyataitīyat kutas asya dīrgham āyuḥ pratyabhijñā prāmāṇyāt eva tāvat āyuḥ tasya kalpyate iti ced satyam kalpyeta yadi vināśa pratyayaḥ tadā eva na syāt api ca go śabdaḥ ayam aśva śabdaḥ ayam iti tad abhidhāna viśeṣa ullekhāt nānā anusmaraṇam tasya tadā eva avaśyam āpatet vijñāna ayaugapadyāt ca kālaḥ dīrghataraḥ bhavet 
[I,555,ii]	yat api udita muhāma megha śyāmāsu rātriṣu sāmyam saudāminī dhāma janyayā pratyabhijñayā tat asat kāla dairghyeṇa tad avasthiti asaṃbhavāt vidyut dṛṣṭe ca vṛkṣa ādau nāśa saṃvitti a saṃbhavāt 
[I,555,iii]	pratyabhijñā nāma smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna sāmānādhikaraṇya grāhiṇī saṃskāra saciva indriya janyā pratītiḥ iti kecid 
[I,555,iv_I,556,i]	anye manyante smaryamāṇa pūrva jñāna viśeṣita artha grāhi tvāt pratyabhijñāyāḥ tad viśeṣaṇasya ca arthasya bāhya indriya grāhya tva anupapatteḥ stambha ādau api mānasī pratyabhijñā iti nirbandhaḥ tu iha na asmākam sā yathā astu tathā astu vā śabde vināśa jñānāt tu na sā nitya tva sādhikā 
[I,556,ii]	bādhya bādhaka bhāve tu niyamaḥ nanu kiṃkṛtaḥ śabdasya pratyabhijñāna vināśa pratibhāsayoḥ ucyate pratyabhijñānam anyathā api upapadyate gatvā ādi jāti viṣayam yat vā sādṛśya hetukam 
[I,556,iii_I,557,i]	nanu abhivyañjaka dhvaṃsāt nāśadhīḥ api setsyati tad asau api bādhyā astu yat vā bhavatu saṃśayaḥ mā evam vināśitā buddhiḥ bheda budhi upabṛṃhitā sā ca iyam ca anyathā siddhe iti vaktum asāṃpratam pratyabhijñā ca sa apekṣā nirapekṣā tu abhāva dhīḥ tena evamādau viṣaye pratyabhijñā eva bādhyate śabda abhāvasya jhagiti grahaṇāt tat pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca pūrva anusandhāna ādi savyapekṣa tvāt 
[I,557,ii]	api ca pratyabhijñā vyabhicarantī karma ādiṣu gṛhyate tena asyām śabde api abhāva pratyaya upahata vapuṣi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ na ca idam pratyakṣe api anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam api tu vināśaka pratyaya pratihata prabhāvā pratyabhijñā nitya tvam karma ādiṣu iva śabde api na sādhayitum prabhavati iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ eṣa pradarśyate 
[I,557,iii]	nanu pratyakṣe api dṛṣṭāntasya kaḥ avasaraḥ satyam grāhakāḥ tu bhavādṛśāḥ svayam anavabudhyamānāḥ evam budhyante 
[I,557,iv_I,557,vi]	yat tu pravṛddha rabhasa tayā buddhi karma ādau api nitya tva samarthanam tat atyantam alaukikam iti uktam kim nāma śabda nitya tva samarthana tṛṣā aaturaḥ jaṅgamam sthāvaram ca eva sakalam pātum icchasi tasmāt ala mati rabhasa pravṛttābhiḥ buddhi karma ādi nitya tva samarthana kathābhiḥ 
[I,558,i]	yat punar abhivyakti pakṣe śabdasya grahaṇe niyama abhāvam āśaṅkya śrotra saṃskāreṇa viṣaya saṃskāreṇa ubhaya saṃskāreṇa vā niyatam grahaṇam upavarṇitam tad vañcanā mātram samāna deśānām samāna indriya grāhyāṇām pratiniyata vyañjaka vyaṅgya tva adarśanāt 
[I,558,ii_I,558,iii]	ye punar atra gandhāḥ udāhṛtāḥ te samāna indriya grāhyāḥ bhavanti na samāna deśāḥ eka bhūmi āśrita tvena tulya deśa tva kalpane bhavet samāna deśa tvam himavat vindhyayoḥ api ekatve api bhuvaḥ bhānti padārthāḥ pārthivāḥ pṛthak vyajyante tad adhiṣṭhānāḥ gandhāḥ taiḥ taiḥ nibandhanaiḥ bhavantu anāśritāḥ śabdāḥ yadi vā aakāśa saṃśritāḥ sarvathā bhinna deśa tvam eṣām vaktum na śakyate 
[I,558,iv]	nanu yathā ekatve api nabhasaḥ tad bhāga kalpanayā prati puruṣam śrotra indriya bhedaḥ evam tad bhāga kalpanayā eva śabdānām api asamāna deśa tvāt niyata vyañjaka vyaṅgyatā bhaviṣyati na evam upapadyate yatra eva vaktṛ mukha ākāśa deśe śrotṛ śrotra ākāśa deśe vā go śabdaḥ upalabdhaḥ tatra eva aśva śabdaḥ idānīm upalabhyate na punar atimukta kusume yaḥ upalabdhaḥ gandhaḥ sa bandhūke madhūke vā kadācid upalabhyate iti 
[I,558,v]	tasmāt samāna deśa tvāt na vyaktau niyamaḥ bhavet utpattau tu vyavasthāyām tad bhedaḥ upapadyate nādaiḥ saṃskriyatām śabdaḥ śrotram vā dvayam eva vā sarvathā niyamaḥ na asti vyañjakeṣu iti niścayaḥ vyavasthā vyañjakānām ced ucyate adṛṣṭa kāri tā utpattau dṛśyamānāyām dṛṣṭam api avirodhakam 
[I,559,i]	na ca stimita māruta apanayana vyatiriktaḥ kaścana śrotra saṃskāraḥ vidyate tatra ca atiprasaṅgaḥ uktaḥ etad atirikta saṃskāra kalpanāyām tu adṛṣṭa kalpanā sthire ca śabda saṃskāra grāhiṇi sati punar abhivyaktasya api go śabdasya śravaṇam syāt tad grahaṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya sthira tvāt tad kṣaṇika tve tu śabdakṣaṇika tā eva sādhvī pratīyamāna tvāt 
[I,559,ii]	yat tu bhartṛ mitraḥ tam eva saṃskāram śrotra indriyam abhyupaiti tat idam apūvikam kim api pāṇḍityam indriyasya hi saṃskāryasya saṃskāraḥ na saṃskāraḥ eva indriyam loka āgama viruddha tvāt prati puruṣam yāvat śabdam bhinnasya kṣaṇikasya ca indriyasya kalpanam anupapannam anaśvara tve tu śaśvat eva śabda kolāhala prasaṅgaḥ iti yat kiñcid etat bhaṭṭena eva sa upahāsam eṣa dūṣitaḥ pakṣaḥ iti kim atra vimardena 
[I,559,iii_I,560,ii]	yat api bhaṭṭaḥ āha yadi tu avaśyam vaktavyaḥ tārkikā ukti viparyayaḥ tatas veda anusāreṇa kāryā diś śrotra tā matiḥ iti tat api asāṃpratam diśām kārya antara ākṣepāt āgamāni aparatvataḥ āhopuruṣikā mātram diś dravya śrotra kalpanam indriyāṇām bhautika tvasya sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt diśaḥ ca amūrta tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe vā kāla ātmanoḥ api tathā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tayoḥ anyatra vyāpāraka tvāt na indriya prakṛti tvam iti ced diś dravye api tulyam etat āgamaḥ tu anya paraḥ eva yathā hi sūryam cakṣuḥ gamayatāt diśaḥ śrotram iti paṭhyate evam antarikṣam asum iti ca paṭhyate eva na ca āsavaḥ antarikṣa prakṛtikāḥ pavana ātmaka tvāt tasmāt kṛtam diśā ākāśa deśaḥ eva karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinnaḥ śabda nimitta upabhoga prāpaka dharma adharma upanibaddhaḥ śrotram iti uktam 
[I,560,iii]	nanu dharma adharma kṛta śrotra niyama vat abhivyakti niyamaḥ api śabdasya tad kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati kim iti tad aniyamaḥ nitya tva pakṣe codyate iti na etat yuktam cakṣuḥ ādi indriyāṇām vaikalyam adṛṣṭa nibandhanam andhakāra prabhṛtiṣu dṛśyate na punar padārtha sthitiḥ adṛṣṭa vaśāt viparivartate vyañjaka dharma atikrame hi himam api śaityam svadharmam atikrāmet vyañjakeṣu niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ iti uktam dṛṣṭe ca varṇa bhede niyata upalabdhi hetau saṃbhavati sati kim ayam adṛṣṭa mastake bhāraḥ āropyate 
[I,561,i_I,561,ii]	katham ca abhivyakti pakṣe tīvra manda vibhāgaḥ tīvra tā ādayaḥ hi varṇa dharmāḥ vā syuḥ dhvani dharmā vā varṇa dharma tve tīvrāt gakārāt anya tvam mandasya iti asmad mata anupraveśaḥ dhvani dharma tva pakṣe tu śrotreṇa grahaṇam katham na hi vāyu gataḥ vegaḥ śravaṇena upalabhyate 
[I,561,iii_I,561,iv]	yat tu vyakti dharmāḥ kṛśa tva sthūla tva ādayaḥ jāta abupalabhyante iti darśitam tat kāmam upapadyeta api jāteḥ vyakteḥ tad dharmāṇām ca samāna indriya grāhya tvāt iha tu sparśana grāhyaḥ pavanaḥ atīndriyaḥ atha vā tad dharmāḥ śravaṇe śabde gṛhyante iti vismayaḥ 
[I,561,v_I,561,vi]	yat tu buddhiḥ eva tīvra mandavatī iti tat atīva subhāṣitam asati viṣaya bhede buddhi bheda anupapatteḥ kiñca nitya parokṣā te buddhiḥ evam ca nāda vat tad agrahe na tīvra ādi tad dharma graha saṃbhavaḥ aho tīvra ādayaḥ tīvre prapāte patitā amī yaḥ gṛhyate na tad dharmā yat dharmā sa na gṛhyate 
[I,562,i]	yaḥ ca abhibhava vṛttāntaḥ tvad mate marutām asau anile ca abhibhūte api śabdaḥ na śrūyate katham dīpe abhibhūte raviṇā na hi rūpam na gṛhyate niyata vyañjaka tvam tu pratikṣiptam adarśanāt 
[I,562,ii]	yat tu śaṅkha ādi śabdānām śrotra grāhya tva siddhaye śabda tvam tatra tat grāhyam iti avādi tat api asat satyam vadata dṛṣṭam vā śrutam vā kvacid īdṛśam āśrayasya parokṣa tve tad sāmānya upalambhanam śabdaḥ na te asti avarṇa ātmā na śaṅkhaḥ varṇa sambhavaḥ na nāda vṛtti śabda tvam iti tad grahaṇam katham 
[I,563,i_I,563,ii]	yat punar saṃpradhāritam vyaṅgya kārya pakṣayoḥ kva śabda grahaṇe gurvī kalpanā bhavati kva vā laghvī iti tat api maula pramāṇa vicāra sāpekṣa tvāt aprayojakam yadi maula pramāṇena sādhitā nitya śabda tā tvad uktā kalpanā sādhvī mad uktā tu viparyaye 
[I,563,iii_I,564,i]	kauṣṭhyena bahis prasaratā samīraṇena sarvatas stimita māruta apasaraṇam kriyate iti etat eva tāvat alaukikam kalpitam agneḥ ūrdhva jvalanam vāyoḥ tiryak gamanam aṇu manasoḥ ca ādyam karma iti adṛṣṭa kāritāni iti marutām tiryak gamana svabhāva tvāt ūrdhvam adhas ca śabda śravaṇam na bhavet yāvat na veginā anyena preritaḥ mātariśvanā tāvat naisargikaḥ vāyuḥ na tiryak gatim ujjhati adhomukha prayuktaḥ api śabdaḥ ūrdhvam pratīyate uttāna vadana uktaḥ api na adhas na śrūyate ca saḥ kadamba golaka ākāra śabda ārambhaḥ hi saṃbhavet na punar dṛśyate loke tādṛśī marutām gatiḥ ākaṇṭha ānaddha nī randhra carma āvṛta mukha uditaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śrūyate tatra na kauṣṭhya anila sarpaṇam kuḍya ādi pratibandhena bāyoḥ aprasaraṇam bhavadbhiḥ api kathitam eva nirvivara carma puṭa uparuddhaḥ api asau na prasaret 
[I,564,ii]	api ca sarvatas niruddha sarva dvārasya api jaṭhare gura gurā śabdaḥ manda agneḥ śrūyate atra kutas vyañjakānām kauṣṭhī a pavanānām nissṛtiḥ romakūpa nissṛtānām api sūkṣma tayā stimita bāhya vāyu apasaraṇa sāmarthya abhāvaḥ 
[I,564,iii]	kiñca manāk api bahis vāyau vāti na śabda śravaṇam syāt iti durbalaḥ api bāhyaḥ pavanaḥ prabalāt api kauṣṭhyavāyoḥ balīyān bhavati iti katham tena apasāryeta 
[I,564,iv]	anyaḥ eva sūkṣmāḥ vāyavaḥ śabda āvaraṇa kāriṇaḥ na punar ete paridṛśyamānāḥ śyāmā kala tālā asya upadeśinaḥ mātariśvānaḥ iti ced na viśeṣe pramāṇa abhāvāt yam ca sūkṣmāḥ api vāyavaḥ tirodadhati tam sutarām balīyāṃsaḥ api vivṛṇuyuḥ iti yat kiñcid etat 
[I,564,v_I,565,i]	tasmāt sajātīya śabda santāna ārambha pakṣaḥ eva yukti anuguṇaḥ tathā hi sajātīya guṇa ārambhiṇaḥ guṇāḥ tāvat dṛśyante eva rūpa ādayaḥ amūrtā api ca buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate deśa antare api sā eva kāryam ārabhate pathi gacchataḥ devadatta ādeḥ ekasmāt ātma pradeśāt pradeśa antare buddhi utpāda darśanāt kārya ārambha viratiḥ api bhavati adṛṣṭa adhīna saṃsargāṇām sahakāriṇām anavasthānāt tīvreṇa api śanais evam atīvra ārambha sambhavaḥ sīdat saciva sāmarthya sāpekṣa kṣīṇa vṛttinā vīcī santāna dṛṣṭāntaḥ kiñcid sāmyāt udāhṛtaḥ na tu vega ādi sāmarthyam śabdānām asti apām iva 
[I,565,ii]	yat tu kuḍya ādi vyavadhāne kim iti viramati śabda santāna ārambhaḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ nirāvaraṇasya hi vyomnaḥ śabda ārambhe samavāyi kāraṇa tvam tathā adarśanāt kalpyate na ākāśa mātrasya iti 
[I,565,iii_I,565,iv]	yat api guṇa tvam asiddham śabdasya iti tatra kecid aśrita tvāt guṇa tvam ācakṣate tat ayuktam āśrita tvam guṇa tve hi na prayojakam iṣyate ṣaṇṇām api padārthānām āśrita tvasya saṃbhavāt diś kāla paramāṇu ādi niti a dravya atirekiṇaḥ āśritāḥ ṣaṭ apīṣyante padārthāḥ kaṇa bhojinā na ca vyoma āśrita tvam api śabdasya pratyakṣam apratyakṣe nabhasi tad āśrita tvasya api apratyakṣa tvāt 
[I,565,v_I,566,i]	katham ādhāra pārokṣye śabda pratyakṣata iti ced yathā evā aatma parokṣa tve buddhi ādeḥ upalambhanam etat eva asiddham iti ced alam bāda antara gamanena upariṣṭāt nirṇeṣyamāṇa tvāt kim etarhi śabdasya guṇa tve pramāṇam pariśeṣa anumānam iti brūmaḥ prasaktayoḥ dravya karmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhe sāmānyādau aprasaṅgāt ca guṇaḥ eva avaśiṣyate śabdaḥ 
[I,566,ii]	katham punar na dravyam śabdaḥ eka dravya tvāt adravyam vā bhavati dravyam ākāśa paramāṇu ādi aneka dravyam vā dvaṇuka ādi kārya dravyam eka dravyam tu śabdaḥ eka ākāśa āśrita tvāt tasmāt na dravyam 
[I,566,iii_I,566,iv]	na api śabdaḥ karma śabda antara janaka tvāt karmaṇaḥ hi samāna jāti ārambhaka tvam na asti sattā śabda tva ādi sāmānya sambandhāt ca sāmānya ādi traya prasaṅgaḥ asya na asti iti pāriśeṣyāt guṇaḥ eva śabdaḥ 
[I,566,v_I,566,vi]	nanu guṇa tva siddhau satyām ākāśa āśrita tvam śabdasya bhaviṣyati guṇasya dravyān āśritasya adarśanāt pṛthivī ādīnām ca śabda āśraya tva anupapatteḥ tatas ca guṇa tve sati eka dravya tvam eka dravya tve sati guṇa tvam iti itaretara āśraya tvam tathā ca samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api guṇa tva siddhi mūlam eva guṇa tve sati śabdasya ākāśa āśrita tvāt tad ātmakena śrotreṇa grahaṇam tat ca deśa antara gata saṃyoga vibhāga prabhavasya śabdasya santānam antareṇa śrotra deśa prāpti abhāvāt na sidhyati iti guṇa tva siddhi mūlā santāna kalpanā santāna kalpanāyām ca samāna jāti ārambhaka tvāt karma vyavacchede sati guṇa tva siddhiḥ iti ita retara āśraya tvam eva 
[I,567,i_I,567,ii]	ucyate na ubhayatra api eṣa doṣaḥ śrotra grāhya tvāt eva śabdasya ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam ca guṇa tvāt ākāśa eka deśaḥ hi śrotram iti prasādhitam etat prāpya kāri tvam ca indriyāṇām vakṣyate na ca ākāśānāśrita tve śabdasya śrotreṇa prāptiḥ bhavati na ca aprāptasya grahaṇam iti tad āśrita tvam kalpyate evam samāna jātīya ārambhaka tvam api tatas eva śrāvaṇa tvāt dūra vartinaḥ śabdasya śravaṇe sati kalpyate na tu guṇa tvāt iti na itaretara āśrayam 
[I,567,iii_I,567,v]	kārya tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam kalpyate iti eke nanu kāryatvāt api ākāśa āśrita tva kalpanāyām tad avastham eva itaretara āśrayam kārya tvāt ākāśa āśrita tvam ākāśa āśrita tve sati niyata grahaṇa pūrvam pūrva rītyā kāryatvam iti na etat evam bheda vināśa pratibhāsābhyām eva kāryatva siddheḥ kimarthaḥ tarhi niyata grahaṇa samarthanāya ayam iyān prayāsaḥ kriyate niyata grahaṇam api kārya pakṣa anuguṇam iti darśayitum na punar eṣā eva kāryatve yuktiḥ iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā 
[I,567,vi]	aparaḥ āha parispanda vilakṣaṇa tvasya pratyakṣa tvāt akarma tvam śabdasya sādhyate na samāna jāti ārambhaka tvāt iti itaretara āśraya sparśaḥ api na asti iti tasmāt sarvathā pariśeṣa anumānāt śabdasya guṇa tva siddhiḥ 
[I,568,i_I,568,ii]	katham tarhi asya mahat tva ādi yogaḥ nirguṇāḥ guṇāḥ iti hi kāṇādāḥ asti hi pratītiḥ mahān śabdaḥ iti samāna jātīya guṇa abhiprāyam tat kaṇāda vacanam iti na doṣaḥ tasmāt ākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ api ca yathā aatma guṇa tā hi icchā dveṣa ādeḥ upapatsyate śabdaḥ nayena tena eva bhaviṣyati nabhaḥ guṇaḥ 
[I,568,iii_I,568,iv]	ye tu samāna jātīya śabda ārambhaka tva niṣedha hetavaḥ śabda tvāt ityādayaḥ paraiḥ upanyaḥ tāḥ teṣām aprayojaka tvāt na sādhana tvam ittham santāna vṛttyā ca śabda grahaṇa sambhave kalpanā alpatarā asmākam na śabda vyakti vādinām śākyakāpila nirgrantha grathita prakriyām prati yat tu dūṣaṇam ākhyātam asmākam priyam eva tat 
[I,569,i_I,569,ii]	tasmāt kārya pakṣe niyata grahaṇa upapatteḥ abhivyakti pakṣe ca tad abhāvāt kāryaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti sthitam tat idam uktam sūtra kṛtā ādimattvā t aindriyaka tvāt kṛtaka vat upacārāt ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti ādima tvāt iti saṃyoga vibhāga ādīnām śabde kāraka tvam na vyañjaka tvam iti darśitam atas ca na prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam anaikāntikam 
[I,569,iii_I,569,iv]	aindriyaka tvāt iti kārya pakṣaḥ eva śabdasya niyatam grahaṇam iti uktam prati puruṣam pratyuccāraṇam ca śabda bhedasya aindriyaka tvāt iti vā hetu arthaḥ tena pratyabhijñā durāśā śrotriyāṇām apākṛtā bhavati kṛtaka vat upacārāt iti tīvra manda vibhāga abhibhava ādi vyavahāra adarśanāt sukha duḥkha ādi vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti darśitam 
[I,569,v]	tathā prāk ūrdhvam uccāraṇāt anupalabdheḥ āvaraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca iti anena sūtreṇa śabda abhāva kṛtam eva tat agrahaṇam iti uktam na hi stimitāḥ vāyavaḥ śabdam āvarītum arhanti mūrtam hi mūrtena vyavadhīyate na amūrtam ākāśa ādi vat na ca prakṛtyā eva ākāśa ādi vat ati indriyaḥ śabdaḥ tasmāt kṣaṇika pratīteḥ tad kālam eva śabdasya avasthānam iti asthāna hetoḥ api na anyathā siddha tvam 
[I,570,i]	vārtika kṛtā śabda anitya tve sādhanam abhihitam anityaḥ śabdaḥ jātimat tve satya smad ādi bāhya karaṇa pratyakṣa tvāt ghaṭa vat iti 
[I,570,ii_I,571,i]	yat tu atra jātīnām api jātimat tvāt anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam eka artha samavāyena jātiḥ jātimatī yatas iti tat atyantam anupapannam nissāmānyāni sāmānya ādīni iti su prasiddha tvāt na hi ghaṭe ghaṭa tva pārthiva tve staḥ iti ghaṭa tva sāmānye api pārthiva tva sāmānyam asti iti śakyate vaktum atas niravadya eva ayam hetuḥ tena yat ucyate jātimattva aindriya tva ādi vastu sanmātra bandhanam śabda anitya tva sidhi artham kaḥ vadet yaḥ na tārkikaḥ iti tad avidita tārkika parispandasya vyāhṛtam 
[I,571,ii]	iha tu aprayojakāḥ hetavaḥ bhavanti hyastana uccāritaḥ tasmāt go śabdaḥ adya api vartate go śabda jñāna gamya tvāt yathā uktaḥ adya eṣa gauḥ iti vijñāna grāhya tā nāma vastu svābhāvya bandhanā nitya tve kṛtaka tve vā na khalu eṣā prayojikā aprayojaka tā ca evaṃprāyāṇām ca evam ucyate svayam ca ete prayujyante hetu tvena iti kim nu idam 
[I,571,iii]	evam nitya tve durbalaḥ yukti mārgaḥ tasmāt mantavyaḥ kāryaḥ eva iti śabdaḥ vācaḥ yukti tve vaidikaḥ yaḥ anuvādaḥ nyāye pratyukte kiṃphalaḥ tad prayogaḥ 
[I,572,i]	kṣaṇa bhaṅgi bhāvasya abhāvāt api śabdasya kṣaṇika tām na vaktum alam sthūla vināśa bhāvāt iti yat uktam tat api anṛtam sṛkṣma vināśa apekṣī nāśaḥ sthūla sthirasya kumbha ādeḥ prakṛti taralasya nāśaḥ śabdasya saḥ eva hi sthūlaḥ sattvāt yadi kṣaṇika tām kathayet purā vā śabdaḥ tadā eṣa katham akṣaṇikaḥ abhidheyaḥ yukti antarāt yadi tat eva hi tarhi cintyam kim prauḍhi vāda bahu māna parigraheṇa alam ativitata uktyā tyajyatām nitya vādaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti naya jñaiḥ gṛhyatām eṣa śabdaḥ sati ca kṛtaka bhāve tasya kartā purāṇaḥ kavi ravirala śaktiḥ yuktaḥ eva indu mauliḥ 
[I,573,i_I,573,iii]	evam kṛtaka tve varṇānām sādhite sati varṇa ātmanaḥ padāt prabhṛti sarvatra puruṣasya svātantryam siddham bhavati pada nitya tva pakṣe api vākye tat racana ātmake kartṛ tva saṃbhavāt puṃsaḥ vedaḥ katham akṛtrimaḥ tathā ca vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ racanā tvāt laukika racanā vat eṣa ca pañca lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ prayojakaḥ ca iti gamakaḥ eva na hetvābhāsaḥ 
[I,573,iv_I,573,vi]	na tāvat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye ityādiṣu veda vākya sandarbheṣu pada racanāyāḥ svara krama ādi viśeṣavatyāḥ pratyakṣa tvena pakṣe hetoḥ vartamāna tvāt na api viruddhaḥ kartṛ pūrvakatvavati sa pakṣe kumāra sambhava ādau racanā tu asya vidyamāna tvāt na api anaikāntikaḥ kartṛ rahiteṣu gagana ādiṣu gagana kusuma ādiṣu vā racanāyāḥ adṛṣṭa tvāt 
[I,574,i_I,574,iii]	na api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā vede vaktra bhāva niścaya anutpādāt na api sat pratipakṣaḥ prakaraṇa cintā hetoḥ sthāṇu puruṣa viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ iva hetu tvena anabhidhānāt na api paramāṇu anitya tāyām iva mūrta tvam aprayojakam idam sādhanam racanā vyāpārāṇām kartṛ vyā pāra sādhya tva avadhāraṇāt yathā dhūmasya jvalana adhīnaḥ ātma lābhaḥ jñaptiḥ tu dhūmāt agneḥ tathā kartṛ adhīnā racanānām abhinirvṛttiḥ pratītiḥ tu tābhyaḥ kartuḥ iti tasmāt prayojakaḥ eva ayam hetuḥ 
[I,574,iv_I,575,i]	nanu sat pratipakṣa tve vivadante tathā ca mīmāṃsakaiḥ pratihetuḥ iha gīyate vedasya adhyayanam sarvam guru adhyayana pūrvakam veda adhyayana vācya tvāt adhunā adhyayanam yathā iti na etat yuktam evaṃprāyāṇām prayogāṇām aprayojaka tvāt na hi tad śabda vācya tva kṛtam anādi tvam upapadyate anaikāntikaḥ ca ayam hetuḥ bhārate api evam abhidhātum śakya tvāt bhārata adhyayanam sarvam guru adhyayana pūrvakam bhārata adhyayana vācya tvāt idānīṃtana bhāra ta adhyayana vat iti 
[I,575,ii_I,575,iii]	nanu bhārate kartṛ smṛtiḥ avigītā vidyate yadi evam vede api prajāpatiḥ kartā smaryate eva atha vaidika mantra artha vāda mūlā iyam prajāpati kartṛ tva smṛtiḥ prajāpatinā catvāraḥ vedāḥ asṛjyanta catvāraḥ varṇāḥ catvāraḥ āśramāḥ iti tatra pāṭhāt iti ucyate hanta tarhi bhārate api tatratya vacana mūlā eva pārāśarya smṛtiḥ iti śakyate vaktum 
[I,575,iv]	yathā prajāpatiḥ vede tatra tatra praśasyate bhārate api tathā vyāsaḥ tatra tatra praśasyate atha praṇetā vedasya na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacid kvacid dvaipāyanaḥ api kim dṛṣṭaḥ bhavat pitṛ pitāmahaiḥ sarveṣām avigītā ced smṛtiḥ satyavatī sute prajāpatiḥ api sraṣṭā loke sarvatra gīyate 
[I,576,i_I,576,ii]	āha kim iti sat asat viveka vikala śā kaṭikā ādi pravāda vipralabdhaḥ evam bhrāmyasi kila svalpam api karma pitrā mātrā vā upadiśyamānam tad vacana pratyayāt anuṣṭhīyate tat ayam iyān aneka kleśa vitta vyayā ādi nirvartyaḥ vaidikaḥ karma kalāpaḥ evam eva tad upadeśinam āptam saṃsmṛtvā eva kriyate iti mahān pramādaḥ evañca sati uccāvacaka viracita jarat pustaka likhita kāvya vat asmaryamāṇa kartṛkeṇa vedena vyavahāra anupapatteḥ avaśya smaraṇīyaḥ tatra kartā syāt na ca kadācana vedeṣu vyavahāra vicchedaḥ saṃbhāvyate yena tat kṛtam jaratkūpa ārām a ādiṣu iva teṣu kartṛ asmaraṇam syāt tasmāt avaśyam smaryeta kartā na ca saṃsmaryate smartum śakyate vā smṛtiḥ hi bhavantī tad anubhava mūlā bhavati na ca mūle api kartṛ anubhavaḥ kasyacid jātaḥ sarga ādeḥ abhāvāt bhāve vā kartuḥ aśarīra tvena darśana yogya tva abhāvāt 
[I,576,iii_I,577,i]	sa śarīra tva pakṣe vā puruṣaḥ kaḥ api tādṛśaḥ tadānīm dṛśyamānaḥ api vedam kurvan na dṛśyate adhīyamāne dṛṣṭe asmin tadā saṃśerate janāḥ kim eṣa racayet vedam uta vā anya kṛtam paṭhet yat kṛtam vā paṭhet eṣaḥ tasmin api hi saṃśayaḥ bhaṅgyā ca idam anādi tvam unmīlat iva dṛśyate asatya ādi pramāṇe ca kartṛ tā anubhavam prati smṛtiḥ prabandha siddhā api spṛśati andha paramparām yogibhiḥ grahaṇam kartuḥ iti etat api durvacam kartṛ tā hṛdi durbodhā katham gṛhyeta taiḥ api yogibhiḥ sā gṛhītā iti vayam etat na manmahe amanvānāḥ ca gacchema visrabdhāḥ tat patham katham vedāt kartṛ avabodhe tu spaṣṭam anyonya saṃśrayam tatas veda pramāṇa tvam vedāt kartuḥ ca niścayaḥ tasmāt paurvāparya paryālocanā rahita yathā śruta mantra artha vāda mūlā bhrāntiḥ eṣā na punar paramārthataḥ kaścid kañcid vedasya kartāram smarati tasmāt akṛtakāḥ vedāḥ avaśya smaraṇīyasya api kartuḥ asmaraṇāt na ca vyadhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti evam sādhana prayogāt 
[I,577,ii_I,578,i]	atra ucyate api tat guru adhyayana pūrvaka tvam sādhanam upekṣitam yājñikaiḥ ayam abhinavaḥ hetuḥ asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti prayuktaḥ tasmāt astu nāma na enān hetu antara upanyāsinaḥ nigṛhṇīmaḥ akṣuda kathā iyam prastutā ayam api asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti hetuḥ kim svatantraḥ eva akartṛka tva siddhaye prayujyate uta asmad uparacita racanā tu a pratighātāya iti 
[I,578,ii_I,579,i]	tatra na tāvat anumānam anumāna antara paripanthi kathayitum ucitam pratyakṣa āgama vat anumānasya api anumāna bādhaka tva anupapatteḥ na hi tulya balayoḥ anumānayoḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ tulya bala tvāt eva atulya bala tve tu yat kṛtam anyatarasya daurbalyam tatas eva tad aprāmāṇya siddheḥ kim anumāna bādhayā tad viḍambana artham tat abhidhānam iti ced tat api ayuktam ekatra dharmiṇi yugapad ita retara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipāta ayogāt na hi dvi ātmakāni vastūni bhavitum arhanti iti avaśyam anyataraḥ tatra aprayojaka hetuḥ aprayojaka tvāt eva tasya āgamaka tve kim viḍambana arthena hetu antareṇa prayuktena viruddha avyabhicārī api nāma na kaścid hetu ābhāsaḥ iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,579,ii]	prakaraṇa samaḥ api na yaḥ kaścid sat pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate api tu saṃśaya bīja bhūtaḥ anyatara viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ bhrāntyā hetu tvena prayujyamānaḥ tathā ucyate iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ tasmāt para udīritam hetum nirācikīrṣatā vādinā tad gata pakṣa vṛtti ta ādi dharma parīkṣaṇe manaḥ khedanīyam na hi pratihetu anveṣiṇā vṛthā aṭāṭyā kartavyā 
[I,579,iii_I,580,i]	nanu kataradanayoḥ sādhanayoḥ aprayojakam racanā tvāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvāt iti ca ucyate racanā tvam eva prayojakam na hi puruṣam antareṇa kvacid akṣara vinyāsaḥ iṣṭavya bho bhagavantaḥ sabhyāḥ kva idam dṛṣṭam kva vā śrutam loke yad vākyeṣu padānām racanā naisargikī bhavati yadi svābhāvikī vede padānām racanā bhavet paṭe hi hanta tantūnām katham naisargikī na sā śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya asti uttarasyām diśi devatā ātmā iti tulye racanā tve kvacid kartṛ pūrvaka tvam aparatra tad viparyayaḥ iti mahān vyāmohaḥ evam hi dhūmaḥ api kaścid anannikaḥ iti api syāt 
[I,580,ii_I,580,iii]	kim idānīm kumāra saṃbhava tulyaḥ asau vedaḥ saṃpannaḥ aho sarva astika dhuryeṇa veda prāmāṇyam sādhitam naiyāyikena alam upahāsena racanā mātram eva tulyam vedasya kumāra saṃbhavena na anyat na ceyata upahasitum yuktam kim asya śabda tva sāmānyam śaṅkha śabda sādhāraṇam na asti sattā sāmānyam vā sarva sādhāraṇam iti 
[I,580,iv]	nanu yāḥ kāli dāsa ādi racanāḥ kartṛ pūrvikāḥ tābhyaḥ vilakṣaṇā eva iyam racanā bhāti vaidikī iha adhyayana velāyām rūpāt eva pratīyate akṛtrima tvam vedasya bhedaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ ananya gaiḥ nāma ākhyāta upasarga ādi prayoga gatayaḥ navāḥ stuti nindā purā kalpa parakṛti ādi gītayaḥ śākhā antara ukta sāpekṣa vikṣipta artha upavarṇanā ityādayaḥ na dṛśyante laukike sannibandhane tena adhyetṛ gaṇāḥ sarve rūpāt vedam akṛtrimam manyante eva loke tu pītam mīmāṃsakaiḥ yaśaḥ vedāḥ na paṭhitāḥ yaiḥ tu tvādṛśaiḥ kuṇṭha buddhibhiḥ kāryatvam bruvate te asya racanā sāmya mohitāḥ
