[I,581,i_I,581,iii]	ucyate mīmāṃsakāḥ yaśaḥ pibantu payaḥ vā pibantu buddhi jāḍya apanayanāya brāhmī ghṛtam vā pibantu vedaḥ tu puruṣa praṇītaḥ eva na atra bhrāntiḥ yathā ghaṭa ādi saṃsthānāt bhinnam api acala ādiṣu saṃsthānam kartṛmat siddham vede api racanā tathā yat ca atra kiñcid vaktavyam tat pūrvam eva sa vistaram uktam 
[I,581,iv_I,582,ii]	api ca yat vilakṣaṇā iyam racanā tad vilakṣaṇaḥ eva kartā anumīyatām na punar tad apalāpaḥ yuktaḥ iti api uktam yāḥ ca etāḥ nirvivāda sidva kartṛkāḥ kāli dāsa ādi racanāḥ camatkāriṇyaḥ tāsām anyonya visadṛśam rūpam upalabhyate eva amṛtena iva saṃsiktāḥ candanena iva carcitāḥ candra aṃśubhiḥ iva unmṛṣṭāḥ kāli dāsasya sūktayaḥ prakaṭa rasa anuguṇa vikaṭa akṣara racanā camat kārita sakalaka vikulāḥ bāṇasya vācaḥ pratikāvyam ca tāni tāni vaicitryāṇi dṛśyante eva nāma ākhyāta ādi vaicitrya mātreṇa kartṛ abhāvaḥ vede rūpāt eva pratīyate iti nūtaneyam vācā uyuktiḥ 
[I,582,iii]	api ca yadi rūpe samāśvasiti bhavataḥ manaḥ tadā ādimad artha abhidhānam api vedasya rūpam katham na parīkṣase babaraḥ prāvāhaṇiḥ akāmayata kusura binda auddālakiḥ akāmayata purūravaḥ mā prapataḥ iti 
[I,582,iv_I,582,v]	pratisargam punar teṣām bhāvāt anādi tvam iti ced pratisargam tarhi veda anyatvam api bhaviṣyati yathā uktam pratimanvantaram ca eṣā śrutiḥ anyā abhidhīyate iti rūpāt akṛtrimat tve ca kalpanā kalpitā eva sā ādimat vastu buddhiḥ tu vācakaiḥ akṣaraiḥ sphuṭaiḥ teṣām anyathā vyākhyānam tu vyākhyānam eva paṭhantaḥ eva tu adhyetāraḥ tatas ādim ataḥ arthān bahūn avagacchanti iti nānādirvedaḥ tasmāt na racanā tvam aprayojakam 
[I,583,i]	kartṛ asmaraṇam eva tu aprayojakam asiddha tvāt siddham api vā vede kartṛ asmaraṇam anyathā siddham veda karaṇa kālasya ati davīyaḥ tvāt tad praṇetuḥ ca puṃsaḥ sakala puruṣa vilakṣaṇa tvāt niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt idantayā asya pāṇi nipiṅgala ādi vat smaraṇam na asti na tu sa na asti eva anumāna āgamābhyām tad avagamāt katham pakṣa dharma tayā grahītum śakyate kartṛ asmaraṇam 
[I,583,ii]	tad hi eka puruṣa sambandhi vyabhicarati sarva puruṣa sambandhi tu duravagamam sarve pumāṃsaḥ kartāram vedasya na smaranti iti katham jānāti bhavān na hi tava sakala loka hṛdayāni pratyakṣāṇi sarvajña tva prasaṅgāt na ca yat tvam na jānāsi tat anyaḥ api na jānāti iti yuktam atiprasaṅgāt tasmāt asmaryamāṇa kartṛka tvam durbodham eva 
[I,583,iii]	api ca kartuḥ asmaraṇe sati sutarām veda artha anuṣṭhānam prekṣāvatām śithilībhavet na hi akartṛkaḥ eva upadeśaḥ saṃbhavati saṃbhavan api vā prāmāṇya niścaya nimitta abhāvāt katham visraṃbhabhūmiḥ asau bhavet bādhaka abhāva mātrāt ca na prāmāṇya niścayaḥ vacasām iti uktam prāk tasmāt āpta pratyayāt eva nirvicikitsam veda artha anuṣṭhānam sa pratiṣṭhānam saṃbhavati na anyathā iti tasmāt na kartṛ asmaraṇasya racanā tu apratipakṣa tayā upanyāsaḥ upapannaḥ 
[I,584,i]	na api svatantram eva idam kartṛ abhāva sādhanam bhavitum arhati anupalabdhiḥ iyam anena prakāreṇa kila ucyate sā anupapannā anumānena kartuḥ upalambhāt anumānena api yat upalabdham tad upalabdham eva bhavati 
[I,584,ii_I,584,iii]	nanu kartṛ abhāva smaraṇa bādhita tvāt anumānam idam ayuktam itaretara āśraya prasaṅgāt anupalabdhau siddhāyām anumāna nirāsaḥ anumāna nirāse ca sati anupalabdhi siddhiḥ anumāna prāmāṇye api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na tasya pratibandha mahimnā prāmāṇya siddheḥ na hi tasya anupalabdhi nirāsa apekṣam prāmāṇyam 
[I,585,i]	tatra etat syāt na vayam kartṛ abhāve prāmāṇyam brūmaḥ sakala loka padārtha vyavahāriṇaḥ hi mīmāṃsakāḥ param tu vedasya pauruṣeya tām bruvāṇam pramāṇam pṛcchāmaḥ tat ca asya na asti iti balāt anupalabdhyā tad abhāva niścayaḥ vyavatiṣṭhate iti syāt etat evam yadi anumānam na syāt uktam ca racanā tvāt iti anumānam 
[I,585,ii_I,586,i]	yat punar avādi vedeṣu puruṣasya kartṛ tvam aśakyam grahītum iti tat api asādhu parokṣasya kuvinda ādeḥ abhinava prāvaraka paṭa ādau kārye katham kartṛtā avagamyate paṭa ādi racanām dṛṣṭvā tasya ced sā anumīyate vede api racanām dṛṣṭvā kartṛ tvam tasya gamyatām 
[I,586,ii]	śarīra parigraham antareṇa prāṇinām upadeśasya kartum aśakyatvāt kadācid īśvaraḥ śarīram api gṛhṇīyāt iti kalpyate niyata śarīra parigraha abhāvāt ca vyāsa ādi vat asau na smaryate tatas ca adya sadyas kaviḥ kāvye yathā kartā iti mīyate tathā tad kāla jaiḥ puṃbhiḥ saḥ api kartā iti māsyate yathā para kṛtā śaṅkā tasmin kāvye vyapaiti te vede api anya kṛtā śaṅkā tathā teṣām vyapaiṣyati parokṣam anumānena yat ca budhyāmahe vayam pratyakṣam yoginām tat ca iti uktam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe pratyakṣam anumānam ca tat evam kartṛ tā amitau mūla pramāṇam asti iti smṛtau na andha paraṃparā mantra artha vāda mūla tvam tatas eva na tad smṛteḥ yathā udita anumāna ādi pramāṇa antara saṃbhavāt 
[I,587,i]	yat api itaretara āśrayam abhāṣi puruṣa ukte vedeprāmāṇyam veda prāmāṇyāt puruṣa siddhiḥ iti tat api na samyak pūrvam parihṛta tvāt anumānāt prasiddhe kartari veda vākyaiḥ tat pratīteḥ upodbalanam iṣyate na tu āgama eka śaraṇaḥ eva kartṛ avagamaḥ uktam ca pūrvam api pṛthivī ādinā kāryeṇa kartuḥ anumānam 
[I,587,ii]	kim yena eva kartrā pṛthivī ādi kāryam nirmitam tena eva vaidikyaḥ racanāḥ nirmitāḥ iti ced om iti ucyate kim atra pramāṇam iti ced ucyate tarhi sarvajñaḥ sraṣṭum prabhavati īdṛśam vicitram prāṇibhṛt karma phala bhoga āśrayam jagat tad karma phala sambandha vidā tad upadeśinaḥ tena eva vedāḥ racitāḥ iti na anyasya kalpanā ekena eva ca siddhe arthe dvitīyam kalpayema kim aneka kalpanā bījam na hi kiñcana vidyate 
[I,587,iii_I,588,iii]	jagat sarge tāvat ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ iṣyate na dvau bahavaḥ vā bhinna abhinna āśaya kalpane ekatra vaiyarthyāt itaratra vyabahāra vaiśasa prasaṅgena tatas ekasya īśvara tva vighātāt tathā hi aneka īśvara vādaḥ hi na atīva hṛdayaṅgamaḥ te ced sadṛśa saṅkalpāḥ kaḥ arthaḥ bahubhiḥ īśvaraiḥ saṃkalpayati yat ekaḥ śubham aśubham vā api satya saṅkalpaḥ tat sidhyati tad vibhavāt iti aparaḥ tatra kim kuryāt bhinna abhiprāyatāyām tu kārya vipratiṣedhataḥ nūnam ekaḥ sva saṅkalpa vihatyā anīśvaraḥ bhavet ekasya kila saṅkalpaḥ rājā ayam kriyatām iti hanyatām iti ca anyasya tau samāviśataḥ katham rājya saṅkalpa sāphalye vihatā badha kāmanā tasyāḥ sa phala tāyām vā rājya saṅkalpa viplavaḥ tena citra jagat kārya saṃvāha anuguṇa āśayaḥ ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ sraṣṭā jagatām iti sādhitam evam jagat sarga vat saḥ eva vedānām api ekaḥ praṇetā bhavitum arhati nānā tva kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt kalpanā gaurava prasaṅgāt ca tena yat ucyate nanu ekaḥ sarva śākhānām kartā iti avagatam kutas bahavaḥ bahubhiḥ granthāḥ katham na racitāḥ ime iti tad parihṛtam bhavati 
[I,588,iv]	atas ca eka kartṛkāḥ vedāḥ yatas paraspara vyatiṣakta artha upadeśinaḥ dṛśyante ekam eva hi karma veda catuṣṭaya upadiṣṭaiḥ pṛthak bhūtaiḥ api eka artha sama vāyibhiḥ aṅgaiḥ anvitam prayujyate tatra hi hautram ṛgvedena yajurvedena adhvarya vam audgātram sāmavedena brahma tvam atharvavedena ca kriyate paippala ādi śākhā bheda upadiṣṭam ca tad tad aṅga jātam tatra tatra apekṣyate tatra sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti āhuḥ etat ca adūraḥ eva agre nirṇeṣyate eka abhiprāya baddha tvam tena sarvatra gamyate bhavet bhinnāśayānām hi katham eka artha mīlanam 
[I,589,i_I,589,ii]	kāvya samasya āpūraṇe kā vārtā iti ced tatra api prathamasya eva kaveḥ tad vastu darśanāt tad abhiprāya vedī tu saḥ anyastam anuvartate anyathā ananvitam kāvyam syāt viśva vasu kāvyavat anvita tve tu sā nūnam ādyasya eva kaveḥ matiḥ iha api ekāśaya abhijña dvitīya īśvara kalpane eka abhiprāya tā eva syāt kim ca tad kalpane phalam tasmāt ekaḥ eva kartā sarva śākhānām kāṭhaka ādi vyapadeśaḥ tu prakṛṣṭa adhyayana nibandhanaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhavadbhiḥ api uktam 
[I,590,i_I,590,ii]	api ca yathā taroḥ vikṣiptāḥ śākhāḥ bhavanti na ca kṛtsnam puṣpa phala patram ekasyām śākhāyām sannihitam bhavati kintu kasyāñcitkasyāñcid evam vedasya api śākhāḥ pṛthak aṅga karma upadeśinyaḥ vikṣiptāḥ ca tāsām ca vṛkṣa śākhānām ekasmāt janma bījataḥ tathā eva sarva śākhānām ekasmāt puruṣottamāt 
[I,590,iii_I,590,iv]	kartā yaḥ eva jagatām akhilātma vṛtti karma prapañca paripāka vicitra tājñaḥ viśva ātmanā tad upadeśa parāḥ praṇītāḥ tena eva veda racanā iti yuktam etat āptam tam eva bhagavantam anādim īśam āśritya viśvasiti veda vacassu lokaḥ teṣām akartṛka tayā na hi kaścid evam visrambham eti matimān iti varṇitam prāk evañca pada vākya racanā ādau tāvat vedeṣu puruṣa apekṣi tvam upapāditam 
[I,590,v]	yat api sambandha karaṇe puruṣa anapekṣa tvam ucyate citra bhānoḥ iva dahana śaktiḥ śabdasya naisargikī vācaka śaktiḥ vyutpattiḥ tu vṛddhebhyaḥ eva vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ upalabhyate iti kim atra puruṣaḥ kariṣyati iti tat api aghaṭamānam puruṣa parighaṭita samaya sambandha vyatirekeṇa śabdāt artha pratyaya anupapatteḥ 
[I,591,i_I,591,iii]	nanu na eva śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kaścid asti kasya idam puruṣa sāpekṣa tvam vā nirapekṣa tvam vā cintyate na hi śabda arthayoḥ kuḍya badarayoḥ iva saṃyoga svabhāvaḥ tantu paṭayoḥ iva samavāya ātmā vā sambandhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ upalabhyate tad mūla tvāt ca sambandha antarāṇi api na santi tat uktam mukhe śabdam upalabhāmahe bhūmau artham iti na api anumīyate śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ kṣurama udaka śabda uccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭana pūraṇa anupalambhāt na ca śabda deśe arthaḥ saṃbhavati na ca artha deśe śabdaḥ sthāna karaṇa prayatnānām tad hetūnām ghaṭa ādi artha pradeśe anupalambhāt vyāpaka tvam tu śabdasya pratiṣiddham eva 
[I,591,iv_I,591,vii]	ucyate na saṃśleṣa lakṣaṇaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ asmābhiḥ abhyupagamyate tat kim kārya kāraṇa nimitta naimittika āśraya āśrayi bhāva ādayaḥ śabdasya arthena sambandhāḥ ete api na tarām na tarhi tasya kaścid arthena sambandhaḥ na na asti śabdasya arthena sambandhaḥ pratyaya nimitta hetu tvāt dhūma ādi vat tat kim śabda arthayoḥ avinā bhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ saḥ api na asti evam hi śabdaḥ anumānam eva syāt kaḥ tarhi samayaḥ iti brūmaḥ 
[I,592,i_I,592,ii]	kaḥ ayam samayaḥ nāma abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyogaḥ samayaḥ ucyate yadi evam kim anā śaṅkanīya saṃśleṣa paricodanena tad dūṣaṇena ca ucyate śabda artha abheda vādinām hi vaiyākaraṇānām eṣa saṃśleṣa rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ balāt āpatati iti te eva pratikṣepyante 
[I,592,iii_I,592,iv]	āha yadi vaiyākaraṇa varṇitaḥ na saṃśleṣaḥ upapattimān samayaḥ ayam anupapanne eva sa hi puruṣa kṛtaḥ saṅketaḥ na ca puruṣa icchayā vastu niyamaḥ avakalpate tad icchāyāḥ avyāhata prasara tvāt arthaḥ api kim iti vācakaḥ na bhavati śabdaḥ ca vācyaḥ na ca evam asti dahanam anicchan api puruṣaḥ dhūmāt na tam pratyeti jalam vā tatas icchan api pratipadyate tatra yathā dhūma agnyoḥ naisargikaḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ nāma sambandhaḥ jñaptaye tu bhūyas darśana ādi nimittam āśrīyate evam śabda arthayoḥ sāṃsiddhikaḥ eva śakti ātmā sambandhaḥ tad vyutpattaye tu vṛddha vyavahāra prasiddhi samāśrayaṇam 
[I,593,i]	svābhāvike sambandhe sati dīpa ādi vat kim tad vyutpatti apekṣaṇena iti ced na śabdasya jñāpaka tvāt jñāpakasya dhūma ādeḥ etat rūpam yat sambandha grahaṇa apekṣam sva jñāpyajñāpaka tvam udyota ādayaḥ tu pratyakṣa sāmagrī antargata tvāt na vyutpatti apekṣyāḥ bhavanti śaktiḥ tu naisargikī yathā rūpa prakāśinī dīpa ādeḥ tathā śabdasya artha pratipādane tasmāt na samaya mātrāt artha pratipattiḥ 
[I,593,ii]	api ca abhidhāna abhidheya niyama niyoga rūpaḥ samayaḥ jñānam eva na tatas artha antaram jñānam ca ātmani vartate na ca śabda arthayoḥ iti na tayoḥ sambandhaḥ syāt 
[I,593,iii_I,593,v]	kiñca samayaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ pratyuccāraṇam vā kriyate prati puruṣam vā sarga ādau vā sakṛt īśvareṇa iti pratyuccāraṇam prāktanaḥ eva kriyate nūtanaḥ vā navasya tāvat kriyamāṇasya katham artha pratyāyana sāmarthyam avagamyate tad avagatau vā kim tad karaṇena pūrva kṛtasya tu kṛta tvāt eva punar karaṇam anupapannam ekasya vastunaḥ jñaptiḥ asakṛt āvartate na utpattiḥ 
[I,593,vi_I,594,iii]	prati puruṣam api sambandhaḥ bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā kriyate bheda pakṣe katham eka artha saṃjñānam go śabdasya sa asrādimānarthaḥ kesara ādimān aśva śabdasya iti abhede api tathā eva kṛtasya karaṇa ayogāt jñānam eva sambandhasya karaṇam sarga ādau api sakṛt sambandha karaṇam ayuktam tathāvidha kāla asambhavāt eva na hi śabda artha vyavahāra rahitaḥ kaścid kāle upapadyate tasmāt nityasya eva sambandhasya lokataḥ vyutpattiḥ na punar karaṇam 
[I,594,iv]	vyutpatti pakṣam ca na karaṇa pakṣa abhihitāḥ doṣāḥ spṛśanti pratyakṣa siddha tvāt pratyakṣam hi idam upalabhyate vṛddhānām hi sva arthe vyavaharamāṇānām upaśṛṇvantaḥ bālāḥ tatas tatas śabdāt tam tam artham pratiyanti te api vṛddhāḥ yadā bālāḥ āsan tadā anyebhyaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ tathā eva pratipanna bantaḥ te api anyebhyaḥ iti na asti ādissaṃsārasyati 
[I,594,v]	api ca samaya mātra śaraṇaḥ śakti śūnyaḥ śabdaḥ katham akṣi nikoca hasta saṃjñā ādibhyaḥ midyeta sa hi tadānīm kaśā aṅkuśa pratoda abhighāta sthānīyaḥ eva bhavet tathā ca śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ bādhyeta samayāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti syāt samaya pakṣe ca yadṛcchā śabda tulya tvam sarva śabdānām prāpnoti tena gavāśvādi śabdānām niyata viṣaya tvam na syāt 
[I,595,i_I,595,ii]	yat punar ucyate jāti viśeṣe ca aniyamāt samaya rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti jāti śabdena atra deśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kila kvacid deśe kaścid śabdaḥ deśa antara prasiddham artham utsṛjya tatas artha antare vartate yathā cora śabdaḥ taskara vacanaḥ odane dākṣiṇātyaiḥ prayujyate etat ca samaya pakṣe yujyate nitye tu sambandhe katham tad artha vyabhicāraḥ iti tat api ayuktam sarva śabdānām sarva artha pratyāyana śakti yukta tvāt kvacid deśe kenacid arthena vyabahāraḥ atas eva ca anavagata sambandhe śrute sati sandehaḥ bhavati kam artham pratyāyayitum anena ayam śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ syāt iti asatyām hi śaktau akṛta samaye nirālambanā pratyāyaka tvā aaśaṅkā iti 
[I,595,iii]	athavā ārya deśa prasiddhaḥ eva śabdānām arthaḥ itaraḥ tu mleccha jana sammataḥ anādaraṇīyaḥ eva tasmāt samaya pakṣasya ati daurbalyāt akṛtrimaḥ eva śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ iti na tatra puruṣasya prabhaviṣṇu tā 
[I,595,iv]	atra ucyate na nityaḥ sambandhaḥ upapadyate śabda vat arthavat ca tṛtīyasya tasya pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena apratīyamāna tvāt 
[I,595,v]	nanu śakti rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ iti uktam śaktiḥ ca tad āśritā iti katham dharmyantara vat pṛthaktayā pratīyeta na etat sāṃpratam svarūpa sahakāri vyatiriktāyāḥ śakteḥ sūkṣmāyāḥ prāk eva vistarataḥ pratikṣipta tvāt na ca śaktiḥ pratyakṣa gamyā dravya svarūpa vat anupalambhāt na anumeyā kāryāṇām anyathā api ghaṭamāna tvāt kalpayitvā ca śaktim aparihāryaḥ samayaḥ samayam antareṇa artha pratipatteḥ asiddheḥ siddhe ca samaye tatas eva artha siddheḥ kim nitya sambandha āśrayaṇena 
[I,596,i]	yat tu uktam samayasya puruṣa icchā adhīna tvāt tasyāḥ ca avyāhata prasara tvāt vācya vācaka vyatyayaḥ syāt iti tat ayuktam śakti abhāve śabdasya eva vācaka tve yogya tvāt kā punar śakti abhāve yogyatā asya iti ced yaḥ ayam gatvā ādi jāti yogaḥ krama viśeṣa upakṛtaḥ gatvā autu a ādi sāmānya sambandhaḥ hi yasya bhavati sa vācaka tve yogyaḥ iti itaraḥ tu vācya tve yathā dravya tva ādi aviśeṣe api vīraṇa tva ādi sāmānyavatām kaṭa niṣpattau tantu tva ādi sāmānyavatām ca paṭa niṣpattau na ca tatra śaktiḥ asti iti uktam na ca kāraṇe kāryam sat iti sāṅkhyaiḥ iva bhavadbhiḥ iṣyate tasyām asatyām api śaktau sāmānya viśeṣa sambandhasya niyāmaka tvāt na vācya vācakayoḥ vyatyayaḥ iti na śakti rūpaḥ śabda arthayoḥ sambandhaḥ 
[I,596,ii_I,597,i]	na ca tayoḥ avinā abhāvaḥ dhūma agnyoḥ iva sambandhaḥ tatra hi sambandhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ evam pratīyate dhūmaḥ agnim vinā na bhavati iti iha punar ayam asmāt pratīyate iti etāvatī eva vyutpatti paryavasānam atas eva avagati pūrvikā eva avagatiḥ iha iti anumānāt śabdasya bhedaḥ uktaḥ prakāśaka tvam api śabdasya samaya prasāda upanatam eva na svābhāvikam sāṃsiddhike hi tathā tve bhramitvā ādi prayuktāt anyatas vā yatas kutaścid abhinavāt api dīpāt iva śabdāt artha pratītiḥ syāt 
[I,597,ii]	yat tu naisargike api prakāśaka tve śabdasya dhūma ādeḥ iva jñāpaka tvāt sambandha grahaṇa sāpekṣa tvam uktam saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ na hi dhūma ādeḥ pratyāyaka tvam svābhāvikam analāvinā bhāvi tvam tu tasya nijam balam tatra ca agṛhyate tasmin pratītiḥ eva na jāyate iti yuktam tat grahaṇam prati iti artham iha tu pratīti śaktiḥ eva svābhāvikī bhavatā abhyupagamyate sā ced svābhāvikī kim vyutpatti apekṣaṇena iti 
[I,597,iii]	yadi ca ucyate pratyāyakaḥ iti pratyayam dṛṣṭvā avagacchāmaḥ na prathama śravaṇaḥ iti yāvat kṛtvas śrutena iyam saṃjñā ayam saṃjñī iti avagamyate tāvat kṛtvas śrutāt artha avagamaḥ iti saḥ ayam samaya upayogaḥ eva kathitaḥ bhavati saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandhaḥ hi samayaḥ eva ucyate tad upayogam antareṇa pratyāyaka tvānavagamāt na svābhāvikī śaktiḥ 
[I,597,iv]	yat tu abhyadhāyi samayasya jñāna ātmaka tvāt ātmani vṛttiḥ na śabda arthayoḥ iti etat api acaturaśram tad āśraya tva abhāve api jñānasya tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ 
[I,598,i_I,598,ii]	yat api abhāṣaṇe samaya mātra śaraṇe sṛṇi pratoda nodana nirviśeṣe śabde śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyapadeśaḥ na syāt iti tat api yat kiñcit naisargika śakti pakṣe api śakteḥ artham pratipadyāmahe na śabdāt iti vyapadeśaḥ syāt avinā abhāvāt agnim pratipadyāmahe na dhūmāt iti syāt tad aṅga tvāt avinā abhāva ādeḥ na tathā vyapadeśaḥ iti ced tat itaratra api samānam dhūme hi vyāpti pūrva tvam śabde samaya pūrva tā na anayoḥ tad apekṣāyām karaṇa tvam vihanyate 
[I,598,iii_I,598,iv]	api ca laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ samaya pakṣa sākṣitām eva bhajate devadattā iva uktam amutas śabdāt amum artham pratipadyasva iti iti evam hi vyapadiśati lokaḥ tasmāt samayaḥ eva atas ca evam deśa antare saṅketa vaśena tatas eva śabdāt artha antara pratipattiḥ 
[I,599,i]	nanu atra uktam sarve śabdāḥ sarva artha pratyāyana śakti yuktāḥ iti kenacid arthena kvacid vyavahāraḥ iti tat etat ayuktam śaktīnām bheda abheda vikalpa anupapatteḥ na śabda svarūpāt bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ tathā anavabhāsāt avyatireke ca ekasmāt śabdāt ananya tvāt parasparam avyatirekaḥ tāsām syāt na ca bhinna kārya anumeyāḥ bhinnāḥ śaktayaḥ kārya bhedasya anyathā api upapatteḥ sarva śakti yoge ca sarva artha pratyaya prasaṅgaḥ samaya upayogaḥ niyāmakaḥ iti ced saḥ eva astu kim śaktibhiḥ 
[I,599,ii]	yat api aga ādi śabda śravaṇe sati sarva artha viṣaya sandeha darśanāt sarvatra tasya śaktiḥ kalpyate iti tat api asāram na hi śakti kṛtaḥ sandehaḥ kintu gatvā ādi varṇa sāmānya nibandhanaḥ tathā ca gatvā ādi jātimatām varṇānām arthe vācaka tvam avagatam amī tad jāti yoginaḥ varṇāḥ kasya arthasya vācakāḥ syuḥ iti bhavati sandehaḥ 
[I,599,iii_I,600,i]	yat punar avādi saḥ eva śabdasya arthaḥ yatra enam āryāḥ prayuñjata na mleccha jana prasiddhaḥ iti tat etat katham iva śapatham antareṇa pratipadyemahi na hi mleccha deśe api tad artha pratyayaḥ na jāyate bādhyate vā sandigdhaḥ vā iti katham na śabda arthaḥ ārya prasiddhiḥ bādhikā iti ced ārya prasiddheḥ api mleccha prasiddhiḥ katham na bādhikā akṣa ādi vat ca vikalpyamāna artha upapatteḥ vyavasthita viṣayaḥ eva vikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati pika nema tāmarasa ādi śabdānām ca bhavadbhiḥ mleccha prayogāt artha niścayaḥ āśritaḥ eva aveṣṭi adhikaraṇe rāja śabdam āndhra prasiddhe arthe varṇitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ iti alam avāntara cintanena tasmāt samayaḥ eva sambandhaḥ iti yuktam tat uktam jāti viśeṣe ca aniyamāt iti 
[I,600,ii_I,600,iii]	atha yat uktam samayaḥ pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam sarga ādau sakṛt kriyate iti pratyuccāraṇam prati puruṣam ca tad karaṇam anabhyupagatam eva dūṣitam sarga ādau sakṛt eva samaya karaṇam iti naḥ pakṣaḥ atas eva na sarva śabdānām yadṛcchā tulya tvam keṣāñcid eva śabdānām asmad ādibhiḥ adya tve saṅketakaraṇāt tatas eva yadṛcchā śabdāḥ ucyante sarga ādiḥ ca samarthitaḥ eva īśvara siddhau api avikalam anumānam upanyastam 
[I,600,iv]	eṣaḥ eva ca āvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ yat eṣa śabda artha sambandha vyabahāraḥ tava anādiḥ mama tu jagat sargāt prabhṛti pravṛttaḥ iti adya tve tu śabda artha sambandha vyutpattau tulyaḥ eva āvayoḥ panthāḥ tatra api tu ayam viśeṣaḥ yat tava śakti paryantā vyutpattiḥ mama tu tad varjam iti 
[I,601,i_I,601,ii]	tathā ca iyam iyatī vyutpattiḥ loke dṛśyate yat ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti na punar śakti paryantā vyutpattiṃrasti tathā hi yatra śṛṅga grāhikayā śabdam artham ca nirdiśya sambandhaḥ kriyate tatra iyantam eva enam kriyamāṇam paśyāmaḥ ayam asya vācyaḥ ayam asya vācakaḥ iti yatra api ca vṛddhebhyaḥ vyavaharamāṇebhyaḥ vyutpadyate tatra apīyadeva asau jānāti ayam arthaḥ amutas śabdāt anena pratipannaḥ iti na tu anyā asya kācid śaktiḥ asti iti iyatyā eva ca vyutpattyā śabdāt artha pratyaya upapatteḥ asyāḥ ca aparihārya tvāt adhika kalpanā bīja abhāvāt ca na nityaḥ śabda artha sambandhaḥ 
[I,601,iii_I,601,iv]	atas eva ca sambandhaḥ tri pramāṇakaḥ iti yat tvayā ucyate tat asmābhiḥ na mṛṣyate śabda vṛddha abhidheyān ca pratyakṣeṇa atra paśyati iti satyam śrotuḥ ca pratipanna tvam anumānena ceṣṭayā iti etat api satyam anyathā anupapattyā tu vetti śaktim dvaya ātmikām iti etat tu na satyam anyathā api upapatteḥ iti ukta tvāt tasmāt dvi pramāṇakaḥ sambandha niścayaḥ na tri pramāṇakaḥ tat evam śabdasya naisargika śakti ātmaka sambandha abhāvāt īśvara viracita samaya nibandhanaḥ śabda artha vyavahāraḥ nānā ādiḥ 
[I,602,i]	nanu īśvaraḥ api sambandham kurvan avaśyam kenacid śabdena karoti tasya kena kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ śabda antareṇa ced tasya api kena kṛtaḥ tasya api kena iti na kaścid avadhiḥ tasmāt avaśyam anena sambandham kurvatā vṛddha vyavahāra siddhāḥ kecid akṛta sambandhāḥ eva śabdāḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ asti ced vyavahāra siddhiḥ kim īśvareṇa kim vā tad kṛtena samayena iti anādi pakṣaḥ eva śreyān 
[I,602,ii_I,602,v]	ucyate astram āyuṣmatā jñātam viṣayaḥ tu na lakṣitaḥ asmad ādiṣu doṣaḥ ayam īśvare tu na yujyate nānā karma phala sthānam icchayā eva īdṛśam jagat sraṣṭum prabhavataḥ tasya kauśalam kaḥ vikalpayet icchā mātreṇa pṛthivī ādeḥ iyataḥ kāryasya karaṇam asmad ādīnām yat manoratha padavīm api na adhirohati tat api yatas saṃpadyate tasya kiyānayam prayāsaḥ tad atra īśvara sadbhāve param vipratipattayaḥ tasmin tu siddhe kaḥ evam vikalpānām avasaraḥ uktam ca tad siddhau nirapavādam anumānam vayam tu na kartāraḥ eva sambandhasya yatas evam anuyujyemahi aṅgusi agreṇa nirdiśya kañcid artham puras sthitam vyutpādayantaḥ dṛśyante bālān asmadvidhāḥ api tasmāt īśvara viracita sambandha adhigama upāya bhūta vṛddha vyavahāra labdha tad vyutpatti sāpekṣaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati iti siddham 
[I,603,i_I,603,ii]	na ca nitya sambandha abhāve api śabdasya artha asaṃsparśi tvam samaya balena artha pratyayasya ābādhitasya siddheḥ iti ukta tvāt iti alam vistareṇa tasmāt pade ca vākye ca sambandhe ca svatantra tā puruṣasya upapannā iti vedānām tad praṇīta tā tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva vedāḥ pramāṇam na nitya tvāt 
[I,603,iii_I,603,iv]	nanu āpta ukta tvasya hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam katham avagamyate na pratyakṣeṇa kṣoṇīdhara dharma tvam iva dhūmasya vedānām āpta praṇīta tvam avagamyate śravaṇa yugala bala labdha janmani pratyaye veda ākhya śabda rāśeḥ eva pratibhāsāt na ca udātta ādi vat varṇa dharma tvena āpta ukta tvam gṛhyate na api anumānam asmin arthe liṅga abhāvāt prāmāṇye hi vedasya āpta ukta tvam liṅgam āpta ukta tva anumitau tu na liṅga antaram upalabhāmahe iti kutastyaḥ pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ 
[I,603,v]	ucyate alam sarasvatī kṣodena uktaḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva niścaya upāyaḥ tathā hi śabdasya sādhitam tāvat anitya tvam sa vistaram racanāḥ kartṛmatyaḥ ca racanā tvāt iti sthitam kartā sarvasya sarvajñaḥ puruṣaḥ asti iti sādhitam kāryeṇa anuguṇam kalpyam nimittam iti ca sthitam pratyakṣa ādi visaṃvādaḥ vede parihariṣyate vyāghāta paunarukti ādi doṣāḥ ca vacana antare vidhi artha vāda mantrāṇām upayogaḥ ca vakṣyate na mātrā mātram api asti vede khiñcid apārthakam śabdabrahma vivartā ādi kalpanāḥ ca purā uditāḥ sarvāḥ parihariṣyante kāryatvasya virodhikāḥ 
[I,604,i_I,604,ii]	ittham ca sthite kim anyat avaśiṣṭam vedeṣu āpta ukta tā niścayasya saḥ ayam sakala śāstra artha sthitau satyām pakṣa dharma tva niścayaḥ hetoḥ āpta ukta tvasya gīyate yat tu pratyakṣam anumānam vā tad niścaya animittam iti vikalpitam tatra pratyakṣam āstām anumāna ādīni ca yāni racanā tu ādīni uktāni yāni ca para darśana dviṃṣi vakṣyante tāni sarvāṇi āpta uktatāyāḥ pakṣa dharmatā siddhi aupayikāni iti alam vistareṇa 
[I,604,iii_I,605,i]	vyāptiḥ punar asya hetoḥ āyurveda ādi vākyeṣu niścīyate pippalī paṭola mūla ādeḥ api auṣadhasya ittham upayogāt idam abhimatam āsādyate asya ca kṣīra cukra ādi virodhi aśanasya parihārāt idam aniṣṭam upaśāmyati iti ādiṣu āyurveda śāstreṣu pratyakṣeṇa tasya arthasya tathā niścayāt artha avisaṃvādi tvam nāma prāmāṇyam pratipannam tat ca idam āpta vāda prayuktam atas yatra āptavāda tvam tatra prāmāṇyam iti vyāptiḥ gṛhyate tathā mantrāṇām prayoge vṛścika bhujaga t aṣṭasya bhakṣita viṣasya vā nirviṣa tvam apasmāra piśāca rūpikā gṛhītasya tat unmocanam ati rabhasā ujjihāneṣu duṣṭa megheṣu sasya rakṣaṇam iti evam upalabdham atas teṣām viṣa bhūta aśani śamana kuśalānām āptāḥ upadeṣṭāraḥ iti tatra api tathā eva vyāpti niścayaḥ 
[I,605,ii_I,605,iii]	nanu āyurveda ādau prāmāṇyam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt pratipannam na āpta prāmāṇyāt atas katham āpta ukta tvasya tatra vyāpti grahaṇam na etat evam pratyakṣa ādi saṃvādāt tat niścīyatām nāma prāmāṇyam utthitam tu tat āpta ukta tvāt pratyakṣa ādau api artha kriyā jñāna saṃvādāt prāmāṇyasya jñaptiḥ utpattiḥ tu guṇavat kāraka kṛtyā iti uktam nadī ādi vākyāni ca vipralambhaka puruṣa bhāṣitāni visaṃvadanti loke dṛśyante tena āpta praṇīta tvam eva teṣām prāmāṇya kāraṇam kāraṇa śuddhim antareṇa samyak pratyaya anutpādāt niścaya upāvastu pratyakṣam bhavatu na tu tat kṛtam eva prāmāṇyam atas yuktam āpta ukta tāyāḥ āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam 
[I,605,iv]	nanu evam api na yuktam āpta ukta tvasya tatra paricchettum aśakyatvāt anvaya vyatireka mūlam eva āyurveda vākyānām prāmāṇyam na āpta kṛtam anvaya vyatirekau ca yāvatī eva dṛśyete tāvatī eva arthe prāmāṇyam yathā harītakī ādi vākya arthe yatra tu tayoḥ adarśanam tatra aprāmāṇyam yathā somarājī upayoge samāḥ sahasram jīvyate iti āpte tu kalpyamāne argha jaratīyam syāt ardhe tasya āptatvam ardhe ca katham anāpta tvam iti 
[I,606,i]	tat idam anupapannam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ grahītum aśakyatvāt tau hi sva ātmani vā grahītum śakyete vyaktayantare vā vyakti antare api sarvatra kvacid eva vā vyakti viśeṣe sarvathā saṃkaṭaḥ ayam panthāḥ vyādhīnām tad nidānānām tad upacaya apacayānām tad upaśama upāyānām auṣadhānām tad saṃyoga viyoga viśeṣāṇām tad parimāṇānām tad rasa vīrya vipākānām deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bhedena śakti bhedasya ekena janmanā grahītum aśakyatvāt janma antara anubhūtānām ca bhāvānām asmaraṇāt 
[I,606,ii]	janaḥ anantaḥ tāvat nirabadhiḥ iha vyādhi nivahaḥ na saṃkhyātum śakyāḥ bahu guṇa rasa dravya gatayaḥ vicitrāḥ saṃyogāḥ pariṇatiḥ apūrvā iti ca kutas cikitsāyāḥ pāram tarati yuga lakṣaiḥ api naraḥ yat eva dravyam ekasya dhātoḥ bhavati śāntaye yoga antarāt tat eva asya punar kopāya kalpate yā dravya śaktiḥ ekatra puṃsi na asau nara antare harītakyā api na udbhūta vāta kuṣṭhe virecyate śaradi udrikta pittasya jvarāya dadhi kalpate tat eva bhuktam varṣāsu jvaram hanti daśa antare na ca upalakṣaṇam kiñcid asti tad śakti vedane yena ekatra gṛhītā asau sarvatra avagatā bhavet yaḥ vā jñātum prabhavati puruṣaḥ tad sāmarthyam niravadhi viṣayam syāt sarvajñaḥ saḥ iti na vimatiḥ tasmin kāryā sva vacana kathite 
[I,607,i]	atha ucyeta anādiḥ eva eṣā cikitsaka smṛtiḥ vyākaraṇa ādi smṛti vat saṃkṣepa vistara vivakṣayā eva caraka ādayaḥ kartāraḥ na tu te sarva darśinaḥ na ca smṛtau andha paraṃparā doṣaḥ sa mūla tvāt yathā vyākaraṇa smṛteḥ śiṣṭa prayogaḥ mūlam evam iha anvaya vyatirekau śiṣṭa virodhe sati yathā mūla virodhinī pāṇini ādi smṛtiḥ apramāṇam tathā ca āhuḥ iha na bhavati anabhidhānāt iti evam vaidya smṛtiḥ api anvaya vyatireka viruddhāḥ na pramāṇam iti tat etat ayuktam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ yathā ukta nayena pariccheda asambhavena tad mūla tva anupapatteḥ 
[I,607,ii]	yadi hi anvaya vyatirekābhyām aśeṣa dravya śaktīḥ niścitya caraka ādibhiḥ viracitam śāstram iti īdṛśam anvaya vyatireki tvam ucyate tat api ayākṛtam adya tve yāvantau anvaya vyatirekau vayam upalabdhum śaknumaḥ tāvadbhyām tābhyām eka deśa saṃvādāt prāmāṇya kalpanāt tatra pravartatām na tu tau tāvantau śāstrasya mūlam bhavitum arhataḥ sarvaiḥ asmad ādibhiḥ tādṛśa śāstra praṇayana prasaṅgāt 
[I,607,iii]	anādi tvam api śāstrāṇām veda vat anupapannam caraka ādi kartṛ smṛteḥ kāli dāsa ādi smṛti vat avigīta tvāt na ca cikitsā smaraṇa prabandhaḥ eva ayam anādiḥ tathā tve andha paraṃparā kāraṇa anavadhāraṇāt na ca tat uktam unmūlam bhavitum arhati vyudasta tvāt tasmāt sarvajña praṇītaḥ eva āyurvedaḥ 
[I,608,i]	nanu aviduṣām upadeśaḥ na avakalpate iti vidvāṃsaḥ caraka ādayaḥ kalpyantām te tu pratyakṣeṇa eva sarvam vidita bante iti atra kim mānam ucyate anvaya vyatirekayoḥ nirāsāt na anumānasya eṣa viṣayaḥ veda mūla tvam api manu ādi smṛti vat ayuktam kalpayitum kartṛ sāmānya asaṃbhavāt iti varṇaviṣyāmaḥ puruṣa antara upadeśa pūrvaka tve carakeṇava kim aparāddham upamāna m anāśaṅkanīyam eva asmin arthe arthāpattiḥ tum na pramāṇa antaram aprāmāṇyam tu na asti bahu kṛtvas saṃvāda darśanāt atas pariśeṣāt pratyakṣīkṛta deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda anusāri samasta vyastapadārtha sārtha śakti niścayāḥ caraka ādayaḥ iti yuktam kalpayitum 
[I,608,ii_I,608,iii]	yadi evam katham tarhi somarājya ādi vākyeṣu vyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāre ca ardha jaratīyam iti uktam na eṣa doṣaḥ karma kartṛ sādhana vaiguṇyāt eṣu vyabhicāraḥ bhaviṣyati vaidikeṣu ca karmasu mīmāṃsakasya samānaḥ guṇaḥ kārīrya ādau kā te vārtā yasyām na syāt iṣṭau vṛṣṭiḥ vaiguṇyam ced kartṛ ādīnām atra api evam śakyam vaktum yadi vidhuram abhuktam karma śāstrīyam anyat phala vighaṭana hetuḥ kalpyate saḥ api tulyaḥ kvacid atha phala saṃpad dṛśyate tad prayoge tat iha dṛḍha śarīrāḥ santi dīrgha āyuṣaḥ ca āyurvedaḥ tasmāt āpta kṛtaḥ na anya mūlaḥ iti siddham evaṃphala veda ādau prakāśam āpta praṇīta tvam 
[I,609,i]	tasmāt āpta ukta tvasya siddham āyurveda ādau vyāpti grahaṇam vyāpti pradarśanāya eva sūtra kṛtā sa dvividhaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa artha tvāt iti uktam dṛṣṭa artha śabde gṛhīta avinābhāvam āpta ukta tvam adṛṣṭa arthe api prāmāṇyam sādhayati iti atas eva uktam mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti
[I,609,ii]	nanu atra api na vaidyakam viracayan dṛṣṭaḥ muniḥ sarva vid tad vyāpti grahaṇam jane yadi vṛthā aayurveda saṃkīrtanam satyam kintu dṛḍhā tathā api caraka ādi āpta smṛtiḥ vaidyake na asau ca anya nibandhanā iti kathitā tasya iha dṛṣṭānta tā iti āyurveda vākya prabhṛtiṣu bhavati vyāptiḥ āpta ukta tāyāḥ pūrva uktena krameṇa sphuṭam akathi tathā pakṣa dharma tvam asyāḥ na pratyakṣa āgamābhyām apahṛta viṣayā na anumāna antareṇa vyādhūtā vā iti sā eṣā bhajati gamaka tām pañca rūpa upapatteḥ anapekṣa tayā na veda vācām ghaṭate niṣpratimaḥ pramāṇa bhāvaḥ kva girām ayathārtha tā nivṛttiḥ puruṣa pratyayam antareṇa dṛṣṭā tad pratyayāt bahutara draviṇa vyaya ādi sādhyeṣu karmasu tapassu ca vaidikeṣu yuktam pravartanam abādhanakena na eva tad siddhiḥ iti alam asammataḥ eṣa mārgaḥ tasmāt āpta ukta tvāt eva vedāḥ pramāṇam iti siddham 
[I,610,i_I,611,i]	anye tu anyathā veda prāmāṇyam varṇayanti tasya hi prāmāṇye abhyupagata para lokaḥ anabhyupagata para lokaḥ vā paraḥ vipratipadyate tatra anabhyupagata para lokam prati tāvat ātma nitya tā ādi nyāya pūrvakam para loka samarthanam eva vidheyam para loka vādinām tu mate yat etat sukhi duḥkhya ādi bhedena jagataḥ vaicitryam dṛśyate tat avaśyam karma vaicitrya nibandhanam eva karmāṇi ca ananuṣṭhitāni na ātmānam labhante alabdha ātmanām ca nabhaḥ kusuma nibhānām kutas vicitra sukha duḥkha ādi phala sādhana tvam tasmāt anuṣṭhānam eṣām eṣitavyam anuṣṭhānam ca na avidita svarūpāṇām karmaṇām upapannam ajānan puruṣaḥ tapasvī kim anutiṣṭhet tat avaśyam jñātvā anuṣṭheyāni karmāṇi 
[I,611,ii_I,611,v]	tat idānīm teṣām parijñāne kaḥ abhyupāyaḥ na pratyakṣam asmad ādīnām svarga ādi adṛṣṭa puruṣa artha sādhanāni karmāṇi darśayitum prabhavati na api anumānam anvaya vyatirekābhyām tṛpti bhojanayoḥ iva svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana sambandha ān abadhāraṇāt na api arthāpattiḥ jagat vaicitryānyathā anupapattyā tu vicitram kāraṇa mātram anumīyate na ca tāvatā anuṣṭhāna siddhiḥ uktam ca adharme dharma rūpe vā api avibhakte phalam prati kim api asti iti vijñānam narāṇām kva upayujyate iti
[I,611,vi_I,611,vii]	upamānam tu atra śaṅkyamānam api na śobhate na api parasparam upadiśantaḥ laukikāḥ karmāṇi para loka phalāni jānīyuḥ iti vaktum yuktam ajñātvā upapādayatām āpta tva ayogāt jñānam tu laukikānām durghaṭam pramāṇa abhāvāt iti ukta tvāt evam eva hi puruṣa upadeśa paraṃparākalpanāyām andha paraṃpara anyāyaḥ syāt tasmāt avaśyam abhyupagata para lokaiḥ para loka phalāni karmāṇi kurvadbhiḥ śāstrāt karma avabodhaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ śāstram ca vedāḥ eva iti siddham tad prāmāṇyam 
[I,612,i_I,612,ii]	nanu loka prasiddhitaḥ eva dharma adharma sādhanāni karmāṇi śāsyante kim śāstreṇa upakāra apakārau hi dharma adharmayoḥ lakṣaṇam iti prasiddham eva etat tathā aaha vyāsaḥ idam puṇyam idam pāpam iti etasmin pada dvaye ācaṇḍālam manuṣyāṇām alpam śāstra prayojanam iti na etat yuktam loka prasiddheḥ nirmūlāyāḥ pramāṇa tva ācupapatteḥ lokaprasiddhiḥ nāma laukikānām avicchinnā smṛtiḥ smṛtit ca prabhabantī pramāṇa antara mūlā bhavati na svatantrā iti avagryam asyāḥ mūlam anveṣaṇīyam tat ca pratyakṣa ādi na upapadyate iti nūnam śāstra mūlā eva loka prasiddhiḥ viruddha aneka prakāra tvāt ca loka prasiddheḥ na tasyām svatantrāyām samāśvasiti lokaḥ na ca upakāra apakāraka mātra lakṣaṇau eva dharma adharmau vaktum yujyete japa śīdhu pāna ādau tad abhāvāt guru dāra gamana ādau ca viparyaya āditya caśyam śāstra śaraṇau eva tau eṣitavyau 
[I,612,iii]	api ca idam iṣṭi mantra ādikam evaṃphalam ayam asmin adhikṛtaḥ iti iyam itikartavya tā eṣa deśaḥ eṣa kālaḥ ime ṛtvijaḥ ityādi kim loka prasiddheḥ adhigantum śakyate tasmāt avaśyam śāstra adhīnaḥ eva viśiṣṭa karma avabodhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ śāstram ca vedaḥ eva iti uktam atas tasya nirvivāda siddham eva prāmāṇyam iti 
[I,613,i]	evam tu varṇyamāne saṃsāra anādi tvam tāvat uktam syāt vedasya anādi tvam karma jñānānādi tvāt tatas ca mīmāṃsaka vartmanā eva pramāṇa tā sidhyati na āptavādāt tasmāt yathā udāhṛtaḥ eva mārgaḥ pramāṇa tāyām anuvartanīyaḥ 
[I,613,ii]	athavā vayam api na na śiṣmaḥ anādi saṃsāra pakṣam yugapad akhila sarga dhvaṃsa vāde tu bhedaḥ akathi ca racanānām kārya tā tena sargāt prabhṛti bhagavatā idam veda śāstram praṇītam anādiḥ eva īśvara kartṛkaḥ api sadā eva sarga pralaya prabandhaḥ sarga antareṣu eva ca karma bodhaḥ veda antarebhyaḥ api janasya sidhyet anya tve kim pramāṇam nanu tava sumate kim tad aikye pramāṇam dhvastam tāvat samastam bhuvanam iti tadā veda nāśaḥ api avaśyam ekaḥ tu īśaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ sa ca racayati vā prāktanam saṃsmaret bā vede svātantryam asmin niyatam ubhayathā api asti candra ardha mauleḥ ekasya tasya manasi pratibhāsamānaḥ vedaḥ tadā hi kṛtakān na viśiṣyate asau pratyakṣa sarva viṣayasya tu na īśvarasya yuktā smṛtiḥ karaṇam eva tatas anavadyam tena āpta nirmitat tayā eva niratyaya artha saṃpratyaya upajananāya janasya vede śāstram su vistara kṣapāḥ taku tarka mūla moha prapañcam akarot muniḥ akṣapādaḥ 
[I,614,i]	atra kaścid āha yuktam itaretara vyatiṣakta artha upadeśi tvena eka kartṛkatva anumāna dvārakam tri vedyāḥ prāmāṇyam atharvavedasya tu trayī āmnāta dharma upayoga anupalabdheḥ trayī bāhya tvena na tad samāna yogakṣema tvam 
[I,614,ii]	anapekṣa tva lakṣaṇa prāmāṇya pakṣe api vikṣipta śāstra antara upadiṣṭa viśiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi aneka karma anupraviṣṭa hautra adhvarya vādi vyāpāra vyatiṣaṅga darśanāt tad arthā trayyā iva yathā pramāṇa bhāva bhāginī bhavitum arhati na tathā pṛthak vyavahārā ātharvaṇa śrutiḥ 
[I,614,iii]	tathā ca loke catasraḥ imāḥ vidyāḥ prāṇinām anugrahāya pravṛttāḥ ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā daṇḍanītiḥ iti prasiddhiḥ śruti smṛtī api tad anuguṇa arthe eva dṛśyete śrutiḥ tāvat ṛgbhiḥ prātar divi devaḥ īyate yajurvedena tiṣṭhati madhye ahnaḥ sāmavedena astam eti vedaiḥ aśūn yaḥ tribhiḥ eti sūryaḥ iti tathā prajāpatiḥ akāmayata bahusyām prajāyeya iti sa tapaḥ atapyata sa tapaḥ taptvā imān lokān asṛjata pṛthivīm antarikṣam divam iti tān lokān abhyatapat tebhyaḥ trīṇi jyortīṣyajāyanta agniḥ eva pṛthivyāḥ ajāyata vāyuḥ antarikṣāt divaḥ ādityaḥ iti tāni jyortīṣi abhyatapat tebhyaḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ ajāyanta agneḥ ṛgvedaḥ vāyoḥ yajurvedaḥ ādityāt sāmavedaḥ tathā sā eṣā vidyā trayī tapati iti 
[I,615,i]	smṛtiḥ api mānavī prativedam dvādaśa vārṣika brahmacarya upadeśinī dṛśyate ṣaṭtriṃśat vārṣikam caryam gurau traivedikam vratam iti śrāddha prakaraṇe api yatnena bhojayet śrāddhe bahu ṛcam vedapāragam śākhā anta gam athā adhvaryum chandogam vā samāpti gam iti tri vedapāragān eva śrāddha bhujaḥ brāhmaṇān darśayati nātharvavedā dhyāyinaḥ pratyuta niṣedhaḥ kvacid upadiśyate tasmāt ātharvaṇam na pravṛñjayāt iti 
[I,615,ii]	evam ākṣepe sati kecid ācakṣate yadi yajña upayogi tvam na iha asti ātharvaṇa śruteḥ artha antare pramāṇa tvam kena asyāḥ pratihanyate śānti puṣṭi abhicāra arthāḥ eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ kriyāḥ tayā pramīyante trayī vā ātmīya gocaraḥ iti
[I,615,iii]	etat tu sarvam na sādhu abhidhīyate tathā hi tad pramāṇam bādarāyaṇasya anapekṣa tvāt iti yaḥ eṣa veda prāmāṇya adhigatau jaimininā niradeśi panthāḥ yaḥ vai akṣapādena kaṇā ādena ca prakaṭitaḥ tad vacanāt āmnāya prāmāṇyam iti mantra āyurveda prāmāṇya vat ca tad prāmāṇyam āpta prāmāṇyāt iti sa caturṣu api vedeṣu tulyaḥ tatra viśeṣa tuṣaḥ api na kaścid atiprayatnena anviṣyamāṇaḥ prāpyate na hi mīmāṃsaka pakṣe evam vaktum śakyate trayī eva anādimatī nātharva śrutiḥ tasyām kartṛ smaraṇa saṃbhavāt iti 
[I,616,i_I,616,ii]	na api naiyāyika pakṣe evam vaktum śakyam āpta praṇītāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ caturthaḥ tu na āpta praṇītaḥ iti tena prāmāṇya adhigama upāya aviśeṣāt samāna yoga kṣema tayā catvāraḥ api vedāḥ pramāṇam vyabahāraḥ hi sarveṣām sāretara vicāra catura cetasām caturbhiḥ api vedaiḥ caturṇām varṇānām āśramāṇām catasṛṣu dikṣu catur abdhi mekhalāyām avanau prasiddhaḥ iti kaḥ ayam atra anyathātva bhramaḥ 
[I,616,iii]	śruti smṛti mūlaḥ ca āryāvarta nivāsinām bhavati vyavahāraḥ te ca śruti smṛtī caturaḥ api vedān samāna kakṣya an abhivadataḥ ṛc yajussāma vedeṣu api atharvaveda āśaṃsīni bhūyāṃsi vacāṃsi bhavanti tat yathā śatapathe atha tṛtīye ahan iti upakramya aśvamedhe pāriplava ākhyāne saḥ ayam ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ iti śrūyate chānda ugya upaniṣadi ca ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ caturthaḥ iti paṭhyate 
[I,616,iv_I,617,ii]	nanu itihāsa purāṇaḥ pañcamaḥ iti tatra paṭhyate eva kiñcātas kim iyatā atharvaṇaḥ caturthaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ caturtha śabda upādānāt itihāsa ādi tulyaḥ asau na veda samāna kakṣyaḥ iti ced kā iyam kalpanā caturtha śabda upādānāt aprādhānye trayaḥ vedāḥ asṛjyante ityādau tritva saṃkhyā upādānāt te api na pradhāna tām adhigaccheyuḥ itihāsa ādibhiḥ vā saha parigaṇanam aprādhānya kāraṇam yat ucyate tat api sarva veda sādhāraṇam iti yat kiñcid etat 
[I,617,iii_I,617,iv]	tathā śata adhyayane api ṛcaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ prāṇāḥ iti abhyupakramya ātharvaṇaḥ vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ iti paṭhyate tathā ye asya prāñcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya prācyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ ṛcaḥ eva puṣpam iti upakramya paṭhita atha ye asya udañcaḥ raśmayaḥ tāḥ eva asya udīcyaḥ madhunāḍyaḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ eva madhukṛtaḥ iti 
[I,617,v_I,618,ii]	tathā taittarīye tasmāt vā etasmāt prāṇa mayāt anyaḥ antaraḥ ātmā manaḥ mayaḥ iti prastutya tasya yajuḥ eva śiraḥ ṛc dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ sāma uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ātmā atharva aṅgirasaḥ puccham pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhyate tathā anyatra ṛcām prācī mahatī diś ucyate dakṣiṇām āhuḥ yajuṣām sāmnām uttarām atharvaṇām aṅgirasām pratīcī mahatī diś ucyate iti śatapathe brahma yajña vidhi prakrame madhyame payaḥ āhutayaḥ ha vai etāḥ devānām yadṛcaḥ iti upakramya medaḥ āhutayaḥ ha vai etāḥ devānām yat atharva aṅgirasaḥ sa yaḥ evam vidvān atharvā aṅgirasaḥ aharahar svādhyāyam adhīte medaḥ āhutibhiḥ eva tad devān sa tarpayati te enam tṛptāḥ tarpayanti iti 
[I,618,iii]	mantrāḥ api tad artha prakāśana parāḥ anuśrūyante tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niramanthate ityādayaḥ na ca eṣām atharvā nāma kaścid ṛṣiḥ iti evaṃprakāram vyākhyānam yuktam anyatra api asamāśvāsa prasaṅgāt iti evan jātīyakāḥ tāvat udāhṛtāḥ śruti vācaḥ 
[I,618,iv_I,618,v]	smṛti vākyāni khalu api manuḥ tāvat śrutīratharva āṅgirasīḥ kuryāt iti avicārayan iti śruti śabdena trayī vat iha vyavaharati yājñavalkyaḥ caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni gaṇayan purāṇa tarka mīmāṃsā dharma śāstra aṅga miśritāḥ vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānām dharmasya ca caturdaśaḥ iti caturaḥ eva vedān āvedayate na anyathā hi caturdaśa saṃkhyā pūryate 
[I,618,vi_I,619,ii]	smṛti antare ca spaṣṭam eva uktam aṅgāni vedāḥ catvāraḥ mīmāṃsā nyāya vistaraḥ purāṇam dharma śāstram ca vidyāḥ hi etāḥ caturdaśa iti anyatra api uktam purāṇam dharma śāstram mīmāṃsā nyāyaḥ catvāraḥ vedāḥ ṣaṣ aṅgāni iti caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni iti śātātapaḥ api āha ṛc sāma yajuḥ aṅgānām atharva aṅgirasām api aṇoḥ api asya vijñānāt yaḥ anūcānaḥ sa naḥ mahān iti
[I,619,iii_I,619,vi]	tathā anyatra catvāraḥ caturṇām vedānām pāragāḥ dharma jñāḥ pariṣad iti uktam śaṅkha likhitau ca ṛc yajussāma atharva vidaḥ ṣaḍaṅga vid dharma vid vākya vid naiyāyikaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ brahmacārī pañca agniḥ iti daśa avarā pariṣad iti ūcatuḥ prācetase catvāraḥ veda vidaḥ dharma śāstra vid iti pañca avarā pariṣad iti uktam tathā ca paṅkti pāvana prastāve catur veda ṣaḍaṅga vid jyeṣṭha sāma gaḥ atharva aṅgirasaḥ api ete paṅkti pāvanāḥ gaṇyante tat ayam evam ādi veda catuṣṭaya pratiṣṭhā praguṇaḥ eva prācuryeṇa dharma śāstra kārāṇām vyavahāraḥ 
[I,619,vii_I,619,viii]	anye api śāstra kārāḥ tathā eva vyavaharantaḥ dṛśyante tathā ca mahā bhāṣya kāraḥ bhagavān patañjaliḥ atharvavedam eva prathamam udāhṛtavān śannaḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye iti mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kāreṇa api veda adhikaraṇe kāṭhakam kālāpam maudgalam paippalādakam iti yajurveda ādi vat atharvavede api paippalādakam udājahne sarva śākhā adhikaraṇe api veda antara śāsvāntara vat maudgala paippalādaka ākhye atharva śākhe api udāhṛtya vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ tathā ca prathama yajñaḥ nāma caturṣu na kaścid asti iti adhikaraṇa antaḥ eva likhitam evam śruti smṛti viśiṣṭa ācāra vyavahāra vidām atra vipratipatti saṃbhāvanā eva na asti 
[I,620,i]	āha na brūmaḥ atharvavedaḥ na pramāṇam iti kintu trayī bāhyaḥ iti ucyate trayī api iyam atharvaveda bāhyā eva na kevalam evam trayyām api paraspara bāhya tvam asti eva ṛc sāma bāhyāni yajūṃṣi yaju ssāma bāhyāḥ ṛcaḥ ṛc yajuḥ bāhyāni sāmāni iti kiyānayam doṣaḥ sarva bhāvānām itaretarasāṅkarya sahita tvāt ye hi śabda ātmānaḥ grantha sandarbha svabhāvāḥ ye ca tad abhidheyāḥ artha svabhāvāḥ te sarve anyonya saṃmiśrita ātmānaḥ eva na ca pareṇa ātmānam saṃmiśrayantaḥ api te svarūpam apahārayanti iti 
[I,620,ii]	atha ucyeta na īdṛśam trayī bāhya tvam atharvavede vivakṣitam api tu yat eva na trayī pratyayam karma upadiśati na tad sambaddham kiṃcid iti tat asya trayī bāhya tvam iti etat api na sādhu upadiṣṭam iṣṭi paśu eka ahā hīna satra ādi karmaṇām tatra upadeśa darśanāt sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti nyāyāt trayī upadiṣṭe api karmaṇi sambaddham atharvavedāt kim api lamyate eva 
[I,621,i^1]	nanu bhavati sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma tat punar tri vedī sambaddha sarva śākhā pratyayam eva nātharva śākhā pratyayam yatas soma yāga ādi karmaṇām ṛgvedena hautram yajurvedena adhvarya vam samāvedena audgātram kiyate nātharvavedena kiñcid iti tat ayuktam atharvavedena brahma tvasya karaṇāt tathā ca gopatha brāhmaṇam prajāpatissomena yakṣyamāṇaḥ vedān uvāca kam vaḥ hotāram vṛṇīyam iti iti prakramya tasmāt ṛgu idam eva hotāram vṛṇīṣva sa hi hautram veda yajurvidam eva adhvaryum vṛṇīṣva sa hi ādhvaryavam veda 
[I,621,i^2]	sāmavidam eva udgātāram vṛṇīṣva sa hi odgātram veda atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam eva brahmāṇam vṛṇīṣva sa hi brahma tvam vedaḥ iti abhidhāya punar āha atha ced na evaṃvidham hotāram adhvaryu mudgātāram brahmāṇam vā vṛṇute purastāt eva vā eṣām yajñaḥ ricyate iti tasmāt ṛgu idam eva hotāram kuryāt yajurvidam eva adhvaryum sāmavidam eva udgātāram atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam eva brahmāṇam iti tathā yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tad atharvaṇām tejasā pratyāpyāyayet iti na ṛte bhṛgu aṅgirobhyaḥ somaḥ pātavyaḥ iti 
[I,621,ii]	nanu etāḥ śrutīḥ atharvāṇaḥ eva ādhīyate na anye trayī vidaḥ te tu evam paṭhanti yadṛcā hautram kriyate yajuṣā aadhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram atha kena brahma tvam kriyate iti trayyā vidyayā iti brūyāt iti tathā ca yadṛcā eva hautram akurvata yajuṣā aadhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram yat eva trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahma tvam iti ucyate vayam api evamādīni vākyāni na na adhīmahi kim tu eṣām ayam eva arthaḥ atharva aṅgiraḥ vid eva brahma iti katham yatas na trayī nāma kim api vastu antaram api tu trayāṇām vedānām samāhāraḥ iti samāhāraḥ ca samāhriyamāṇa niṣṭhaḥ bhavati samāhriyamāṇāḥ ca ṛgveda ādayaḥ trayaḥ hautra ādi paratvena caritārthāḥ na punar tatra bhedam arhanti ekaikaśas caritārthānām samudāyaḥ api caritārthaḥ eva samudāya buddhau hi vibhajyamānāyām samudāyinaḥ eva sphuranti na avaya vivat arthāntaram te ca anyatra vyāpṛtāḥ 
[I,622,i]	kim nu khalu ṛgveda ādīnām brahma tvam kurvatām atibhāraḥ bhavati na brūmaḥ atibhāraḥ iti kintu tri ātmaka tvena brahma tva kartavyatā upadiśyate tri ātmakaḥ ca anyatamaḥ api tebhyaḥ na bhavati vedaḥ atharvavedaḥ tu tri ātmakaḥ eva tatra hi ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni iti trīṇi api santi tena brahma tvam kriyamāṇam trayyā kṛtam bhavati 
[I,622,ii]	nanu yaḥ trīn vedān adhīte tena ced brahma tvam kriyeta tat kim trayyā na kṛtam bhavati bāḍham iti ucyate saḥ api ekasmai vā kāmāyā anye yajña kratavaḥ samādhīyante sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarvebhyaḥ darśa pūrṇamāsau iti śrutau api yoga siddhi adhikaraṇa nyāyena asyatamam eva buddha ābādhāya vidadhyāt na samudāyam buddhau āropayitum śaknuyāt iti ekena eva tat kṛtam bhavati na trayyā iti 
[I,623,i]	nanu anye api tri ātmakāḥ vedāḥ yadi evam sutarām atharvavedaḥ na pṛthakkaraṇīyaḥ sarveṣām rūpa aviśeṣāt teṣām pṛthak pratiṣṭhaiḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ ṛc ādibhiḥ eva vyapadeśaḥ iti na te samudāya śabda vyapadeśyāḥ 
[I,623,ii]	yat tu vākya antare trayyai vidyāyai śukram tena brahma tvam iti tatra iyam caturthī ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāne prayuktā śukram iti sāram ācakṣate tena trayī vidyāyāḥ sāreṇa brahma tvam kriyate iti uktam bhavati na ca trayyā iva trayyāḥ śukram bhavati na ca atyantam tatas artha antaram eva tena idam atharvaveda ātmakam eva trayyāḥ śukram iti manyāmahe tri ātmaka tvāt iti manyāmahe tri ātmaka tvāt iti śukram iti ca guhyam āhuḥ atharva śabdaḥ api rahasya vacanaḥ yajña atharvāṇam vaidikasyāḥ iṣṭayaḥ iti tena trayī śukra rūpeṇa atharvavedena brahma tvam iti ittham atharvavedasya na trayī bāhya tvam ittham sarva śākhā pratyayam ekam karma iti atra na sarva śabdaḥ saṅka ucitaḥ bhavati 
[I,623,iii]	atas eva brahma vedaḥ atharvavedaḥ iti pūrva uttara brāhmaṇe paṭhyate ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ brahma vedaḥ iti tathā ca kāṭhaka śata adhyayane brāhmaṇe brahmaudane śrūyate brahma vādinaḥ vadanti purodhāḥ auddālakirāruṇim uvāca brahmaṇe tvā prāṇāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi brahmaṇe tvā vyānāya juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti upakramya ātharvaṇau vai brahmaṇaḥ samānaḥ atharvaṇam eva etat juṣṭam nirvapati catur śarāvaḥ bhavati catvāraḥ hi ime vedāḥ tān eva bhāginaḥ karoti mūlam vai brahmaṇaḥ vedāḥ vedānām etat mūlam yat ṛtvijaḥ prāśnanti tad drahmaudanasya brahmaudana tvam iti 
[I,624,i]	tathā sāmavede pṛṣṭhyasya caturthe ahanyārbhave pavamāne atharvaṇe sāmnaḥ gānam yat tad vidhāne śrūyate caturvidham ātharvaṇam bhavati catūrātrasya vṛttvai catuṣpada āmānuṣṭubhā anuṣṭubham eva etat aharyaḥ caturtham bheṣajam vā atharvaṇam tat hi bhaiṣajyam eva tad karoti ātharvaṇāni yāga bheṣajāni iti etat ālambanā iyam stutiḥ atas eva prāk uktam yajñe yat ūnam ca viriṣṭam ca yātayāmam ca karoti tad atharvaṇām tejasā aapyāyayati iti tasmāt ātharvaṇaḥ eva brahma iti etat ca śāstra antare vistareṇa abhiyuktaiḥ yuktibhiḥ upapāditam iti na iha atyantāya pratāyate 
[I,624,ii]	yat tu na ātharvaṇena pravṛñjyāt iti tat kalpa sūtra vākya tvāt veda viruddham iti anādṛtam atha api śrautam idam vākyam tadā api prakaraṇa adhītam ced tatra eva kvacid karmaṇi nivekṣyate anārabhyavāda pakṣe api pūrva ukta vākya visadṛśa artha tvāt atharvavedasya ca trayya bāhya tvena saṃparka parihāra an ardda tvāt niyata viṣayam eva vyākhyāsyate 
[I,624,iii_I,625,i]	yat api ucyate uccais ṛcā kriyate uccaissāmnā upāṃśu yajuṣā iti vat atharvadharmaḥ api na kaścid āmnātaḥ iti tat api asāram maṃtra dharmaḥ hi ayam upadiśyate na veda dharmaḥ mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya svabhāvāḥ hi catvāraḥ ime veda granthāḥ mantrāḥ tu vastutas gadya padya bhedāt dvividhāḥ eva gadya bandhaḥ yajuḥ ucyate padyabandhaḥ ṛc iti gīti nibandhanam tu bheda antaram sāma iti atas eva jaimininā mantra vibhāgam prastutya teṣām ṛgī atra artha vaśena pāda vyavasthā gītiṣu sāma ākhyā śeṣe yajuḥ śabdaḥ ittham eva teṣām traividhyam upapāditam teṣām eva ca ayam uccais tva ādi dharmaḥ na veda śabda vācyānām mantra brāhmaṇa samudāya ātmanām granthānām atharvavede api iyam trividhā eva mantra jātiḥ iti tatra api idam dharma jātam upadiṣṭam bhavati mantra vibhāga kṛtaḥ eva ayam trayī vyapadeśaḥ iti atas casa eṣā trayī vidyā tapati ityādi api na virotsyate evam ṛc yajussāma samudāya ātmaka mantra upabandhāt trayī antargataḥ ca atharbavedaḥ pṛthak vyavasthita grantha sandarbha svabhāva tvāt ca bhinnaḥ saḥ iti siddham 
[I,625,ii]	anye punar ṛc pracura tvāt pravirala yajuḥ vākya tvāt agīyamāna sāma mantra tā vaśāt ca ṛgvedam eva atharvavedam ācakṣate ayam api pakṣaḥ astu na kaścid virodhaḥ 
[I,625,iii]	yat punar abhidhīyate veda śabdaḥ trayāṇām eva vācakaḥ na caturthasya iti saḥ ayamati utkaṭaḥ dveṣaḥ vṛddha vyavahāraḥ hi atra pramāṇam vedaḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti tatra tatra veda śabde uccārite catvāraḥ api pratīyante vedaḥ mayā adhītaḥ iti vadantam pṛcchanti vyavahartāraḥ katamaḥ tvayā adhītaḥ vedaḥ iti saḥ āha atharvavedaḥ iti na tam evam ākṣipanti na asau vedaḥ yaḥ tvayā paṭhitaḥ iti sa upapadaḥ atharvavede veda śabdaḥ iti ced veda antareṣu api tulyam etat ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ iti nirupapadaḥ api teṣu veda śabdaḥ prayujyate iti ced tat itaratra api samānam iti uktam catur veda adhyāyī bharadvājaḥ iti ca prasiddham eva sarvathā tu sa upapadaḥ eva āyurveda ādiṣu veda śabdaḥ iti na tad tulya kakṣya tā adhikṣepa kṣetra tām atharvavedaḥ netavyaḥ 
[I,626,i_I,626,ii]	brahma yajña vidhiḥ ca śrautaḥ caturṣu api aviśiṣṭaḥ iti uktam smārtaḥ api tathāvidhaḥ eva asti yathā aaha yājñavalkyaḥ bhedasā tarpayet devān atharva aṅgirasaḥ paṭhan pitṝn ca madhu sarpirbhyām anvaham śaktitaḥ dvijaḥ iti sāṃpradāyikam adhyāpana adhyayana ādi sarvam abhinnam eva iti alam prasaṅgena tena pramāṇa tāyām veda svādhyāya śabda vācya tve puruṣa artha sādhana vidhau api catvāraḥ samāḥ vedāḥ 
[I,626,iii]	yadi punar auttarādharyeṇa vinā na parituṣyate tat atharvavedaḥ eva prathamaḥ tatas paramasya maṃtrasya brahmaṇaḥ praṇavasya abhivyakteḥ tathā ca śrutiḥ brahma ha vā idam agre āsīt iti upakramya ātharvaṇam vedam abhyaśrāmyat abhyatapat samatapat tasmāt śāntāt taptāt santaptāt om iti manaḥ eva ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat ityādi tathā mahāvyāhṛtīnām śākhā antara prasiddhānām aprasiddhānām ca bṛhat iti ādīnām tat eva utthānam 
[I,626,iv]	atharvaveda kṛta upanayana saṃskārasya veda antara adhyayanam aviruddham anya veda upanīyamānasya tu na atharvaṇa upanayana saṃskāram aprāpitasya atharvaveda adhyayane adhikāraḥ tat uktam bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidā saṃskṛtaḥ anyān vedān adhīyīta na anyatra saṃskṛtaḥ bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ adhīyīta iti trayī eka śaraṇaiḥ api ca etat avaśya āśrayaṇīyam atharvaveda vihitam sva karma bhraṃśe prāyaścittam ācaradbhiḥ iti atharvavedaḥ eva jyāyān 
[I,627,i_I,627,ii]	yat tu mānavam vākyam udāhṛtam ṣaṭtriṃśat ābdikam tat tri veda adhyayana viṣayam vaikalpikam vedān adhītya vedau vā vedam vā api yathākramam iti ekasmin vede dvādaśa varṣāṇi vratam dvayoḥ caturviṃśatiḥ trayāṇām ṣaṭtriṃśat iti yaḥ tu caturaḥ vedān adhīte tasya aṣṭacatvāriṃśat varṣam veda brahmacaryam upāsītaḥ iti smṛti antaram asti na ca tad ā āryaiḥ na ādṛtam tatra tri vedā dhyāyinām eva prativarṣam ṣoḍaśa varṣāṇi vratam caret iti vyākhyānam asaṅgatam upakrama virodhāt anupayogāt ca tena veda antara adhyayana kṛtaḥ eva ayam vikalpa vidhiḥ na dvādaśa ṣoḍaśa varṣa apekṣaḥ iti anādaraḥ api asyām smṛtau kṛṣṇa keśaḥ agnīnāt adhītaḥ iti śruti virodha kṛtaḥ nātharvaveda adhyayana niṣedha garbhaḥ iti traivedika brahmacarya smṛtiḥ api ca iyam atharvaveda adhyayana paryudāsam eva viṣayīkaroti na ca veda antara adhyayana niṣedham iti atra api na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti triṣu vedeṣu idam vratam na punar eṣu eva triṣu iti niyāmakam vacanam asti 
[I,627,iii]	yat api śrāddha prakaraṇe yatnena bhojayet iti tri vedī pāraga parikīrtanam tat vedapāragam iti śākhā anta gam iti samāpti gam iti viśeṣaṇa pada paryālocanayā ṛgveda ādi eka deśa adhyāyinām anadhikāram eva śrāddhe sūcayati atharvaṇaḥ tu atharvaśiraḥ adhyayana mātra labdha paṅkti pāvana bhāvasya eka deśa pāṭhinaḥ api tatra adhikāraḥ upapadyate darśitam ca atharva śiraḥ dhyayana mātrāt api paṅkti pāvana tvam paṅkti pāvanaḥ ca śrāddha bhojane anadhikṛtaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham 
[I,628,i]	yaḥ tu jyeṣṭha sāma gaḥ trimadhuḥ trisuparṇikaḥ iti veda antara eka deśa adhyāyinām api śrāddha bhojana abhyanujñānam tat anukalpa rūpam iva bhāti prathama kalpena samagra veda adhyayana upadeśāt iti tasmāt nātharva niṣedha artham etat vākyam iti 
[I,628,ii_I,628,iii]	tat evam avasthite yat vārtikakāreṇa bhayāt iva dveṣāt iva mohāt iva sa anukampam iva vā idam ucyate yadi yajña upayogi tvam ityādi tad ahṛdayaṅgamam atharvavede pūrva uttara brāhmaṇe vispaṣṭam iṣṭi pa śvāhā hīna satrāṇām upadeśāt veda antareṣu tad codanā bhāvāt kim atharvavede tad upadeśena iti ced su bhāpitam idam evam api hi vaktum śakyam atharvavede tad codanāyāḥ darśanāt kim veda antareṣu tad upadeśena iti na ca jāne kasya epa paryanuyogaḥ kim nityasya vedasya kim vā tad praṇetuḥ īśvarasya iti dvau api tau apari anuyojyau iti uktam artha antara śānti puṣṭi abhicāra ādi veda antareṣu api na na dṛśyate śyenaḥ hi sāmavedaḥ utpannaḥ adbhuta śāntyādayaḥ ca yajurvedaḥ iti tat api samānam 
[I,628,iv]	eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ iti etat api na satyam yatas evam tatra paṭhyate dve yajña vṛttī bhavataḥ vaihārikī ca pākayajña vṛttiḥ ca iti tatra vaihārikī nāma aneka ṛtvij āśritānām eka kriyāṇām upadeśaḥ śrutau eka brahma ṛtvij āśritāḥ tu śānti ādi kriyāḥ smṛtau iti abhūmi jñoktiḥ eṣā 
[I,629,i]	trayī ā iva ātmīya gocara iti etat api parama m ādhyasthyam na hi ātmīyaḥ parakīyaḥ vā kaścid asti veda arthaḥ sarva śākhā pratyaya tvāt ekasya karmaṇaḥ tasmāt samāna yogakṣema tvāt sarva vedānām ekasya tatas pṛthak karaṇam veda nindā prāyaścitta nirbhaya dhiyām eva cetasi parisphurati na sādhūnām iti uparamyate 
[I,629,ii]	iti tulya prabhāva ṛddhi vardhamāna ucita stavāḥ vividha abhimata sphīta phala saṃpādana udyatāḥ catvāraḥ api parākṣepa parihāra sthira sthitim bhajanti vedāḥ prāmāṇya lakṣmīm haribhujāḥ iva catusskandha upetaḥ prathita pṛthak aryaiḥ avayavaiḥ kṛta anyonya śleṣaiḥ upacita vapuḥ veda viṭapī pratiskandham śākhā phala kusuma sandarbha subhagāḥ prakāśante tasya dvija mukha nipīta uttama rasāḥ 
[I,629,iii_I,629,iv]	āha kim etat ittham prāmāṇyam vedānām eva sādhyate uta āgama antarāṇām vā sarveṣa abhiyam ā iva diś kiñcātas ādye pakṣe pareṣi evam bruvāṇeṣu kim uttaram uttaratra tu mithyā syuḥ sarve anyonya virodhinaḥ 
[I,630,i]	kāni punar āgama antarāṇi cetasi vidhāya evam vatsaḥ pṛcchati purāṇa itihāsa dharma śāstrāṇi vā śaivapāśupatapañcarātra bāddhā arhata prabhṛti iti vā 
[I,630,ii_I,630,iii]	tatra śaiva ādīni tāvat nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ manu ādi praṇītāni dharma śāstrāṇi veda vat tad artha anupraviṣṭa viśiṣṭa karma upadeśīni pramāṇam eva kaḥ teṣu vicāraḥ teṣām tu pramāṇa tvam veda mūla tvena eva kecid ācakṣate tathā hi na tāvat manu ādi deśanāḥ bhrānti mūlāḥ saṃbhāvyante bādhaka abhāvāt adyayāvat aparimlāna ādaraiḥ veda vidbhiḥ tad artha anuṣṭhānāt 
[I,630,iv_I,630,v]	na api anubhava mūlāḥ pratyakṣasya tri kāla an avacchinna kārya rūpa dharma pariccheda daśā sāmarthyā saṃbhavāt na ca puruṣa antara upadeśa mūlāḥ puruṣa antarasya api tad avagame pramāṇa abhāvāt bhāve vā manunā kim aparāddham asati hi mūla pramāṇe puruṣa vacana paraṃparāyām eva kalpyamānāyām andha paraṃpara asmaraṇa tulya tvam durnivāram 
[I,630,vi_I,630,vii]	na ca vipralambhakāḥ eva bhavantaḥ manu ādayaḥ evam upadiśeyuḥ iti yuktā kalpanā bādhaka abhāvāt sādhu jana parigrahāt ca iti uktam tasmāt pāriśeṣyāt veda ākhya kāraṇa mūlāḥ eva bhavitum arhanti manu ādi deśanāḥ tat hi anuguṇam samartham ca kāraṇam iti tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ bhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā api puṃvākyāt vipralaṃbhakāt dṛṣṭa anuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī iti
[I,631,i_I,631,ii]	tatra kecid paridṛśyamāna mantra artha vāda bala unnīta vidhi mūla tvam manyante anye viprakīrṇa śākhā mūla tvam apare punar utsanna śākhā mūla tvam iti anena ca viśeṣa vivaraṇena na naḥ prayojanam sarvathā yathopapatti vedaḥ eva tatra mūlam prakalpyatām na mūla antaram apramāṇaka tvāt veda mūla tva pakṣe api ca iyam akhila jagat viditā smṛti samākhyā anugṛhītā bhaviṣyati pratyakṣa mūla tve hi vedavat atra api kaḥ smṛti śabda arthaḥ 
[I,631,iii]	kiñca veda mūla tve sati smṛteḥ śruti virodhe sati tad atulya kakṣya tvāt bādhya tvam su vacam bhavati kḷptam ekatra mūlam itaratra kalpyam yāvat eva bhavān smṛteḥ śrutim kalpayitum vyavasyati tāvat etat virodhinī pratyakṣa śrutā śrutiḥ avatarati hṛdaya patham iti katham tadā mūla kalpanāyai smṛtiḥ prabhavet tat āha saḥ ayam ābhāṇakaḥ loke yat aśvena hṛtam purā tad paścāt gardabhaḥ prāptum kena upāyena śaknuyāt iti
[I,631,iv]	aparaḥ āha vikalpaḥ eva atra yuktaḥ kila dvividhaḥ vedaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ anumīyamānaḥ ca śrūyamāṇaḥ ca śrutiḥ iti ucyate anumīyamānaḥ ca smṛtiḥ iti dvau api ca etau anādī iti kim kena bādhyate vyakta avyaktaḥ hi vedaḥ eva asau atas eva na mantra artha vāda ādi mūlaka tva kalpanam yuktam smaryamāṇasya vedasya anādi tvāt 
[I,632,i_I,632,ii]	nanu evam veda mūla tvena prāmāṇye varṇyamāne bāhya smṛtīnām api prāmāṇyam vadantaḥ pravādukāḥ katham prativaktavyāḥ ucyate pratyuktāḥ eva te tapasvinaḥ uktam hi bhagavatā jaimininā api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇa manumānam syāt iti kartṛ sāmānyāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ eka adhikāra avagamāt iti yaḥ eva veda artha anuṣṭhāne adhikṛtāḥ kartāraḥ te eva smṛti artha anuṣṭhāne ācamana ādi smārta padārtha saṃbalita tayā eva vedistaraṇa ādi vaidika padārtha prayoga darśanāt na tu evam eka adhikāra avagamaḥ bāhya smṛtiṣu vidyate tasmāt manu ādi smṛtayaḥ eva pramāṇam na bāhya smṛtayaḥ 
[I,632,iii]	nanu manu ādi smṛtayaḥ api veda mūla tvāt pramāṇam na anyatas iti atra ucyate tat etat vat amūla tayā prāmāṇyam yogi pratyakṣam dharma grāhakam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ kila ācakṣate bhavantaḥ etat ca na yuktam yathā hi bhagavān īśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā sarvasya īśitā sarva darśī sarva anukampī ca vedānām praṇetā samarthitaḥ tathā yogi pratyakṣam api dharma grahaṇe nipuṇam asmad ādi pratyakṣa vilakṣaṇam pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe samarthitam eva tasmāt tad mūlāḥ eva manu ādi deśanāḥ bhavantu 
[I,633,i]	yat tu tri kālān avacchinnaḥ katham pratyakṣa gamyaḥ dharmaḥ syāt iti codanā eva tatra pramāṇam ucyate prativihitam tat īśvara pratyakṣa samarthanena sādhya sādhana sambandhasya svarga agni ddotra ādi gatasya yathā grāhakam īśvara pratyakṣam evam aṣṭaka ādi gatasya tasya grāhakam manu ādi pratyakṣam bhaviṣyati iti kim atra tri kālān avacchedena avacchedena vā kṛtyam 
[I,633,ii]	yadi evam aṣṭaka ādi karmaṇām dharma tva agrahaṇāt asarva jñaḥ īśvaraḥ syāt jñātvā vā anupadiśat akāruṇikaḥ bhavet na eṣa doṣaḥ sarvam jānāti eva bhagavān kiñcid svayam upadiśati kiñcid parān upadeśayati te hi sya anugrāhyāḥ bhagavataḥ teṣām ca tad anugraha kṛtā iva tathāvidha jñāna prāptiḥ manyādīnām pratyakṣaḥ dharmaḥ iti vede api paṭhyate 
[I,633,iii_I,634,i]	nanu evam pratyakṣa mūla tva aviśeṣāt śruti smṛtyoḥ virodhe vikalpaḥ prāpnoti bṛhat rathantara bidhyoḥ iva na bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ na hi īśvara pratyakṣasya yogi pratyakṣasya ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣaḥ naisargika āhārya kṛtaḥ tu bhaviṣyati kim tena ucyate bhavatu vikalpaḥ kaḥ doṣaḥ veda mūla tva vādibhiḥ api kaścid vikalpaḥ vyākhyātaḥ eva viṣaya vibhāgena vā vikalpaḥ vyākhyāsyate na ca śruti smṛti virodha udāharaṇam kiñcid asti iti svādhyāya abhiyuktāḥ tasmāt āpta pratyakṣa mūla tvena vedānām iva dharma śāstrāṇām api prāmāṇyam 
[I,634,ii]	etena itihāsa purāṇa prāmāṇyam api nirṇītam veditavyam itihāsa purāṇam hi pañcamam vedam āhuḥ uktam ca itihāsa purāṇābhyām vedam samupabṛṃhayet bibheti alpa śrutāt vedaḥ mām ayam pratariṣyati iti
[I,634,iii]	athavā kim asmākam durabhi niveśena veda mūla tvāt smṛtīnām smṛti vat purāṇānām api bhavatu prāmāṇyam prāmāṇye tāvat avivādaḥ sat ācārasya api anupanibaddhasya veda mūla tvāt eva bhavatu prāmāṇyam 
[I,634,iv]	sarvathā tāvat vedāḥ catvāraḥ purāṇam smṛtiḥ iti ṣaṭ imāni vidyā sthānāni sākṣāt puruṣa artha sādhana upadeśīni pūrva ukta rītyā pramāṇam vyākaraṇa ādīni tu ṣaṣ aṅgāni aṅga tvena eva tad upayogīni na sākṣāt dharma upadeśīni kalpa sūtreṣu api vikṣipta karma krama niyama saṃgraha mātram na apūrva upadeśaḥ mīmāṃsā veda vākya vicāra ātmikā veda prāmāṇya niścaya hetuḥ ca nyāya vistaraḥ iti āmukhaḥ eva uktam tat imāni caturdaśa vidyā sthānāni pramāṇam kānicid sākṣāt upadeśīni kānicid tad upayogīni iti siddham 
[I,635,i]	yāni punar āgama antarāṇi paridṛśyante tāni api dvividhāni kānicid sarva ātmanā veda virodhena eva pravartante bauddha ādi vat kānicid tad avirodhena eva kalpita vrata antara upadeśīni śaiva ādi vat 
[I,635,ii]	tatra śaiva āgamānām tāvat prāmāṇyam brūmahe tad upajanitāyāḥ pratīteḥ sandeha bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya kalāpasya anupalambhāt īśvara kartṛ tvasya tatra api smṛti anumānābhyām siddha tvāt mūla antarasya lobha moha ādeḥ kalpayitum aśakyatvāt na hi tatra idaṃprathama tā smaryate veda vat eka deśa saṃvādāḥ ca bhūmnāḥ dṛśyante iti kutas mūla antara kalpanā avakāśaḥ 
[I,635,iii_I,635,iv]	na ca veda pratipakṣa tayā teṣām avasthānam veda prasiddha cāturvarṇya ādi vyavahāra aparityāgāt manu ādi codanā nyāyaḥ sa yadi api na vidyate śaiva āgame tathā api asya na na yuktā apramāṇa tā sarva upanipadām arthāḥ niḥśreyasa pada spṛśaḥ vivicyamānāḥ dṛśyante te hi tatra pade pade ye ca veda vidām agryāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyana ādayaḥ pramāṇam anumanyante te api śaiva ādi darśanam 
[I,636,i_I,636,ii]	pañca rātre api tena eva prāmāṇyam upavarṇitam aprāmāṇya nirmittam hi na asti tatra api kiñcana tatra ca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ praṇetā kathyate sa ca īśvaraḥ eva 
[I,636,iii]	ekasya kasyacid aśeṣa jagat prasūti hetoḥ anādi puruṣasya mahā vibhūteḥ sṛṣṭi sthiti pralaya kārya vibhāga yogāt brahma iti viṣṇuḥ iti rudraḥ iti pratītiḥ 
[I,636,iv]	vede ca pade pade ekaḥ eva rudraḥ avatasthe na dvitīyaḥ idam viṣṇuḥ vicakrame iti rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ ca paṭhyate tad yogāḥ ca tad ārādhana upāyāḥ vede api coditāḥ eva śaivapañcarātrayoḥ tu tad yogāḥ eva anyathā upadiśyante na ca eṣaḥ eva veda virodhaḥ vaikalpika tvāt upāyānām atas āpta praṇīta tvāt veda aviruddha tvāt ca na tayoḥ aprāmāṇyam 
[I,637,i_I,637,ii]	ye tu saugata saṃsāra mocaka āgamāḥ pāpaka ācāra upadeśinaḥ kaḥ teṣu prāmāṇyam āryaḥ anumodate buddha śāstre hi vispaṣṭā dṛśyate veda bāhya tā jāti dharma ucita ācāra parihāra āba dhāraṇāt saṃsāra mocakāḥ pāpāḥ prāṇi hiṃsā parāyaṇāḥ moha pravṛttāḥ eva iti na pramāṇam tad āgamaḥ niṣiddha sevana prāyam yatra karma upadiśyate prāmāṇya kathane tasya kasya jihvā pravartate tatas yadi api siddhiḥ syāt kadācid kasyacid kvacid brahmahatyā arjita grāmya bhoga vat narakāya sā niṣiddha ācaraṇa upāttam duṣkṛtam kena śāmyati atas kāla antareṇa api narake patanam punar 
[I,637,iii]	yat tu atra coditam pareṣu pūrva ukta krameṇa buddha ādi āpta kalpanām kurvatsu kim pratividheyam iti tatra ucyate mahā jana prasiddhi anugrahe hi sati su vacam āpta ukta tvam bhavati na anyathā 
[I,637,iv]	mahājanaḥ ca vedānām veda artha anugāminām ca purāṇa dharma śāstrāṇām veda avirodhinām ca keṣāṃcid āgamānām prāmāṇyam anumanyate na veda viruddhānām bauddha ādi a āgamānām iti kutas teṣām āpta praṇīta tvam mūla antaram hi tatra suvacam ajñāna lobha ādi iti evam abhidhāya veda spardhinaḥ bauddha ādayaḥ niṣeddhavyāḥ 
[I,638,i_I,638,ii]	āha kaḥ ayam mahājanaḥ nāma kimākāraḥ kim āspadaḥ kiṃsaṃkhyaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ iti vyākhyātum arhasi api ca bauddha ādayaḥ buddha ādīn āptān sva āgama prāmāṇya siddhaye vadanti te mahājanam api nijam tad siddhaye bandaka ādikam vadeyuḥ eva kaḥ tatra pratīkāraḥ ucyate cāturvarṇyam cāturāśramyam ca yat etat ārya deśa prasiddham sa mahājanaḥ ucyate ākāraḥ tu tasya kīdṛśam pāṇi pādam kīdṛśam śiraḥ grīvam vā kiyatī tasya saṃkhyā iti puruṣa lakṣaṇa ādīni gaṇayitum na jānīmaḥ 
[I,638,iii_I,639,i]	cāturvarṇya cāturāśramya rūpaḥ ca eṣa mahājanaḥ veda patha pravṛttaḥ āgama antara vādibhiḥ apratyākhyeyaḥ eva tathā ca ete bauddha ādayaḥ api durātmānaḥ veda prāmāṇya niyamitāḥ eva caṇḍāla ādi sparśam pariharanti niraste hi jāti vāda ābalepe kaḥ caṇḍāla ādi sparśe doṣaḥ ye api anye kecid aśuci bhakṣaṇa agamyā gamana ādi nirvikalpa dīkṣā prakāram akāryam anutiṣṭhanti te api cāturvarṇya mahā jana bhītāḥ tat karma rahasi kurvanti na prakāśam nirviśaṅke hi tad śāstra pratyaye kim iti caurya vat tad artha anuṣṭhānam atas eva na nijaḥ mahājanaḥ utthāpayitum śakyate vandaka ādiḥ kim tu ayam eva cāturvarṇyādiḥ mahājanaḥ sa ca eṣa mahājanaḥ veda viruddham āgamam pariharati eva na anumodate saṃsāra mocakam spṛṣṭvā śiṣṭāḥ snānti sa vāsasaḥ bauddhaiḥ api saha eteṣām vyavahāraḥ na kaścana veda dharma anuvartī ca prāyeṇa sakalaḥ janaḥ veda vāhyaḥ tu yaḥ kaścid āgamaḥ vañcanā eva sā 
[I,639,ii_I,639,iii]	īdṛśaḥ ca ayam ananya sāmānya vibhavaḥ mahābhāgaḥ veda nāmā grantha rāśiḥ yat anye bāhya āgama vādinaḥ evam eva spardhante te hi sva āgama prāmāṇyam abhivadantaḥ veda rītyā abhidadhati vede yathā tathā praveṣṭum īhante vaidikān arthān antarā antarā sva āgameṣu nibadhnanti veda sparśa pūtam iva ātmānam manyante teṣām api antar hṛdaye jvalati eva veda prāmāṇyam atas evaṃvidhāyāḥ mahā jana prasiddheḥ āgama antareṣu adarśanāt na teṣām āpta praṇīta tvam 
[I,639,iv_I,640,ii]	āha mahājana prasiddhyā eva veda prāmāṇya niścayāt kimarthaḥ kaṇṭha śoṣaḥ ayam iyāna āryeṇa saṃśritaḥ veda prāmāṇya siddhi artham hi idam śāstram ārabdham iti gīyate veda prāmāṇyasya ca mahājana prasiddhyā eva siddha tvāt kim śāstreṇa alam kṣudracodyaiḥ īdṛśaiḥ mahā jana prasiddhim hi kecid viplāvayanti api atas tad upaghātāya śāstra mantram prayujyate tasmāt pūrva uktānām eva prāmāṇyam āgamānām na veda bāhyānām iti sthitam 
[I,640,iii]	anye sarva āgamānām tu prāmāṇyam pratipedire sarvatra bādhasan deha rahita pratyaya udayāt savatra veda vat kartuḥ āptasya parikalpanā dṛṣṭa artheṣu eka deśeṣu prāyas saṃvāda darśanāt 
[I,640,iv]	yat punar atra uktam sarve eva āgamāḥ paraspara viruddha artha upadeśi tvāt apramāṇam syuḥ iti tatra ucyate āpta praṇīta tvena tulya kakṣya tvāt anyatama daurbalī atimittān upalambhāt ca na kaścid āgamaḥ kiñcid bādhate virodha mātram tu akiñcitkaram pramāṇa tva abhimateṣu veda vākyeṣu api paraspara virodha darśanāt puruṣa śīrṣa sparśana surā graha gava ālambha ādi codanāsu vacana antara viruddham artha jātam upadiṣṭam eva 
[I,640,v_I,640,vi]	kiñca ānamānām virodhaḥ api na atīva vidyate pramāṇe puruṣa arthe vā sarveṣām avivādāt nānāvidheḥ āgama mārga bhedaiḥ ādiśyamānāḥ bahavaḥ abhyupāyāḥ ekatra te śreyasi saṃpatanti sindhau prabāhāḥ iva jāhnavīyāḥ 
[I,641,i_I,641,iii]	tathā hi apavargaḥ upeṣaḥ sarva śāsveṣu nirdiśyate tad upāyaḥ sarvatra jñānam upadiśyate jñāna viṣaye tu vivadante tatra api prāyaśas ātma viṣaya tāyām bahūnām avipratipattiḥ prakṛti puruṣa viveka jñāna pakṣe tu prakṛteḥ vivikta tayā puruṣaḥ eva jñeyaḥ nairātmya vādinaḥ tu ātma śaithilya jananāya tathā upadiśanti svaccham tu jñāna tattvam yaktaiḥ iṣyate tat svātantryāt anāśrita tvāt ātma kalpam eva kūṭasyanityace pravāha nitya tve ca viśeṣaḥ 
[I,641,iv]	evam pradhānayoḥ tāvat upāya upeyayoḥ avivādaḥ kriyā tu vicitrā pratyāgamam bhavatu nāma bhasma jaṭā parigrahaḥ vā daṇḍa ka maṇḍalu grahaṇam vā rakta paṭa dhāraṇam vā digambaratā vā abalambyatām kaḥ atra virodhaḥ vede api kim alpīyāṃsaḥ pṛthak iti kartavyatā kalā apakhacitāḥ svarga upāyāḥ coditāḥ tasmāt paraspara virodhe api na prāmāṇya virodhaḥ 
[I,641,v_I,642,ii]	atas ca yat ucyate kapilaḥ yadi sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ na iti kā pramā atha ubhau api sarva jñau mata bhedaḥ tayoḥ katham iti tad apāstam bhavati pradhāne sati bheda abhāvāt kvacid ca tad bhāve prāmāṇya āviroghāt na ca hṛdaya krośana hetu karma upadeśāt āgama antarāṇām aprāmāṇyam tasya aprāmāṇyatāyām aprayojaka tvāt vicikitsā hi nṛ śiraḥ kapālāt i aśaneṣu yā sā api anya darśana abhyāsa bhāvanā upanibandhanā tathā ca śānta cittānām sarva bhūta dayāvatām vaidikīṣu api hiṃsāsu vicikitsā pravartate 
[I,642,iii_I,642,iv]	abhicāra ādi hiṃsāyām vaidikyām api bhavatu hṛdaya utkampaḥ karaṇa aṃśa upanipātinī hiṃsā iti lipsā ataḥ tasyām pravṛttiḥ yā tu agniṣomīya ādi paśu hiṃsā itikartavya tā aṃśa sthā yasyām kratu arthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate iti vaidhī pravṛttiḥ tasyām api kāruṇikaḥ lokaḥ sa vicikitsaḥ bhavati vadati ca yatra prāṇi vadhaḥ dharmaḥ tu adharmaḥ tatra kīdṛśaḥ iti na ca etāvatā vedasya aprāmāṇyam evam āgama antareṣu api bhaviṣyati 
[I,642,v]	yat tu āgama antarebhyaḥ kaula ādibhyaḥ khecaratā ādi artha siddhau api niṣiddha ācaraṇa kṛtaḥ kāla antare pratyavāyaḥ avaśyaṃbhāvi iti uktam tat api na yuktam tasya arthasya tad āgama niṣiddha tva abhāvāt āgama antara niṣiddha tve api vaikalpika tva kalpana upapatteḥ puruṣa artha prāpti upāya tvāt ca tasya tasmin siddhe kutas pratyavāyaḥ 
[I,643,i]	bhavatu vā kāla antare tatas pratyavāyaḥ tathā api adhikāri bhedena tad phale karmaṇi codyamāne śyena ādau iva na āgama prāmāṇyam atra hīyate śyenena abhicaran yajeta iti atra abhicaran iti śatā laṅghita niṣedham adhikāriṇam ācaṣṭe tasya ca śyena yāgaḥ coditaḥ sa ca tad prayogāt kṛta badhas pratyavaiti eva na ca vedasya aprāmāṇyam uktam ca ubhayam iha codanayā lakṣyate arthaḥ anarthaḥ ca iti adhikāra bhedāt ca vicitra karma codanā na anupapannā maraṇa kāmasya sarva svāraḥ coditaḥ āyuṣkāmasya kṛṣṇala caruḥ tasmāt etat api na aprāmāṇya nimittam 
[I,643,ii]	yat api bauddha āgame jāti vāda nirākaraṇam tat api sarva anugraha pravaṇa karuṇa atiśaya praśaṃsā param na ca yathāśrutam avagantavyam tathā ca tatra etat paṭhyate na jāti kārya duṣṭān pravrājayet iti tasmāt sarveṣām āgamānām āptaiḥ kapila sugata arhat prabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītānām prāmāṇyam iti yuktam 
[I,644,i]	anye manyante sarva āgamānām īśvaraḥ eva bhagavān praṇetā iti sa hi sakala prāṇinām karma vipākam aneka prakāram abalokayan karuṇayā tān anugrahītum apavarga prāpti mārgam bahuvidham utpaśyan āśaya anusāreṇa keṣāṃcid kvacid karmaṇi yogyatām avagamya tam tam upāyam upadiśyati sva vibhūti mahimnā ca nānā śarīra parigrahāt saḥ eva saṃjñā bhedān upagacchati arhan iti kapilaḥ iti sugataḥ iti saḥ eva ucyate bhagavān nānā sarvajña kalpanāyām yatna gaurava prasaṅgāt 
[I,644,ii_I,644,iii]	nanu buddhaḥ śuddhodanasya rājñaḥ apatyam sa katham īśvaraḥ bhavet parihṛtam etat bhagavatā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanena yadā yadā hi dharmasya glāniḥ bhavati bhārata abhyutthānam adharmasya tadā aatmānam sṛjāmi aham iti śarīram eva śuddhodanasya apatye na ātmā atas pratiyugam viṣṇuḥ eva bhagavān dharma rūpeṇa avatarati iti āgama vidaḥ pratipannāḥ 
[I,644,iv_I,645,i]	nanu veda samāna kartṛkeṣu āgama antareṣu katham tādṛśaḥ mahājana saṃpratyayaḥ na asti evam na asti tena vartmanā bhagavatā katipaye prāṇinaḥ anugṛhītāḥ yeṣām tādṛśaḥ āśayaḥ lakṣitaḥ vaidikena tu vartmanā nissaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇinaḥ amugṛhītāḥ iti tatra mahān ādaraḥ āgama antareṣu kṛśaḥ iti eka kartṛke paraspara virodhaḥ katham iti ced vedaiḥ eva atra varṇitaḥ samādhiḥ teṣu api bhūmnaḥ paraspara virodhasya darśanāt iti uktam tasmāt īśvara praṇīta tvāt eva sarva āgamānām prāmāṇyam 
[I,645,ii]	apare punar veda mūla tvena sarva āgama prāmāṇyam abhyupāgaman yaḥ hi manu ādi deśanānām veda mūla tāyām nyoyaḥ uktaḥ bhrānteḥ anubhavāt vā api puṃvākyāt vipralambhakāt dṛṣṭa anuguṇya sāmarthyāt codanā eva laghīyasī iti sa sarva āgameṣu samānaḥ na ca manu ādi smṛtīnām mūlamūtā śrutiḥ upalabhyate anumānena tu tad kalpanam āgama antareṣu api tulyam 
[I,645,iii_I,646,ii]	nanu ca uktam api vā kartṛ sāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānam syāt iti tat ca iha na asti iti katham thuti anumānam na eṣa doṣaḥ eka adhikāra avagamaḥ na prāmāṇye prayojakaḥ miśra anuṣṭhāna siddhau tu kāmam bhavatu kāraṇam na ca pṛthak anuṣṭhīyamānam api karma na pramāṇa mūlam bhavati rṇa āśrama bheda anuṣṭheya karma vat kartṛ sāmānya śūnya tvāt atha mūla antara udayaḥ tat asat bādhaka abhāvāt bhrānti ādi pratiṣedhanāt pratyakṣa mūla tāyā tu gurvī bhavati kalpanā vedaḥ tu ananta śākha tvāt mūlam tatra su saṃgatam 
[I,646,iii]	nanu atra veda mūla tve dveṣaḥ veda vidām katham gatvā te eva pṛcchayantām sa akṣaryam yadi vidyate go vadhe vā katham teṣām dveṣaḥ su spaṣṭa vaidike pratyuktam ca viruddha tvam śākhā ānantyāt ca durgamam kim iyat veda sarvasvam yāvat asmad mukhe sthitam śākhā antarāt vā saṃvādaḥ na labhyeta iti kā pramā 
[I,646,iv_I,647,i]	tathā ca sāṃkhya śāstra prasiddha triguṇa ātmaka prakṛti sūcana param ajām ekām lohita śukla kṛṣṇām iti vaidikam liṅgam upalabhyate nirgrantha kathita tapassaciva tattva jñāna śaṃsī ca ayam anuvādaḥ dṛśyate munayaḥ vāta raśanāḥ iti evam rakta paṭa parigraha bhasma kapāla dhāraṇa ādi mūlam api abhiyuktāḥ labhantaḥ eva 
[I,647,ii_I,647,iii]	manu ādi smṛti vat kartṛ sāmyasya asaṃbhave api atas pramāṇam veda mūla tvāt vācyā sarva āgama smṛtiḥ tatas ca yaḥ kaścid kasyacid dharmaḥ manunā parikīrtitaḥ sa sarvaḥ abhihitaḥ vede sarva jñāna mayaḥ hi saḥ iti atra yathā manu grahaṇam gautama yamaḥ āpastamba saṃvartaka ādi smṛti kāra upalakṣaṇam evam arhat kapila sugata ādi upalakṣaṇa param api vyākhyeyam 
[I,647,iv_I,647,v]	nanu ca lokāyata ādi āgame api evam prāmāṇyam prāpnoti vijñāna ghanaḥ eva etebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāni eva anuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñā asti iti veda mūla darśanāt tatas ca lokāyata darśane pramāṇībhūte sati svasti sarva āgamebhyaḥ ucyate na hi lokāyate kiñcid kartavyam upadiśyate vaitaṇḍika kathā eva asau na punar kaścid āgamaḥ 
[I,647,vi]	nanu ca yāvajjīvam sukham jīvet iti tatra upadiśyate evam na svabhāva siddha tveta atra upadeśa vaiphalyāt dharmaḥ na kāryaḥ tad upadeśeṣu na pratyetavyam iti evam vā yat upadiśyate tat pratibihitam eva pūrva pakṣa vacana mūla tvāt loka āyata darbhanasya tathā ca tatra uttara brāhmaṇam bhavati na vai are aham moham bravīmi avināśī vai are apramātmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavati iti tat evam pūrva pakṣa vacana mūla tvāt lokāyata śāstram api na svatantram uttara vākya pratihata tvāt tu tat nādaraṇīyam 
[I,648,i]	śāstra antarāṇām tu pūrva pakṣa vākya mūla tva kalpanam ayuktam samanantaram eva tad pratipakṣa vacana anupalabdheḥ iti atas veda mūla tvāt sarva āgamāḥ pramāṇam 
[I,648,ii_I,649,i]	sarva āgama pramāṇa tve nanu evam upapādite aham api adya yat kiñcit āgamam racayāmi ced tasya api hi pramāṇa tvam dinaiḥ katipayaiḥ bhavet tasmin api na pūrva ukta nyāyaḥ bhavati durvacaḥ jagat pusta ka likhitam yat api tat api kiñcid idānīm kena api dhūrtena prakhyāpyate maha nayam āgamaḥ iti tatra api āptaḥ eva praṇetā kalpyatām yādṛśam tādṛśam vaidikam vacanam ucyatām mūla bhūtam iti na etat asti avigītām ye prasiddhim prāpuḥ āgamāḥ kṛtaḥ ca bahubhiḥ yeṣām śiṣṭaiḥ iha parigrahaḥ adya pravartamānāḥ ca na apūrvāḥ iva bhānti ye yeṣām na mūlam lobha ādi yebhyaḥ na udvijate janaḥ teṣām eva pramāṇa tvam āgamānām iha iṣyate na mṛṣyate tu yat kiñcit pramāṇam kuṭṭanī matam tathā hi amita eka paṭa nivīta aniyata strīpuṃsa vihita bahu ceṣṭam nīla ambara vratam idam kila kalpitam āsīt viṭeḥ kaiścid tad apūrvam iti viditvā nivārayāmāsa dharma tattva jñaḥ rājā śaṅkaravarmā na punar jaina ādi matam evam 
[I,649,ii]	iti āpta ukta tva hetoḥ parimuṣita para udīrita aśeṣa doṣāt eṣām veda āgamānām su dṛḍham upagate māna bhāve praroham unmūla tvāt tathātvam puruṣa vacanataḥ vā astu śāstra antarāṇām tad dvāreṇa api vaktum na khalu kalupatā śakyate veda vācām 
[I,649,iii_I,649,iv]	nanu na adya api vedasya prāmāṇyam su vyavasthitam sva deha saṃbhavaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ anṛvata ādibhiḥ citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ putra kāmaḥ putra iṣṭyā yajeta iti thūyate na ca iṣṭi anantaram putra paśu ādi phalam upalabhyate tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ 
[I,650,i]	nanu ca yaḥ paśu kāmaḥ saḥ iṣṭim kuryāt iti iyān eva vākya arthaḥ tatra yāgāt paśavaḥ bhavanti iti etat eva durupapādam te ca bhavantaḥ api anantaram eva bhavanti iti etat durupapādataram atas katham na satya artha tvam citra ādi codanānām ucyate yāvajjīvam yajeta yāvajjīvam juhuyāt iti jīvana vat asādhyamāna paśu kāmanā eva na adhikāri viśeṣaṇam bhavitum arhati paśūnām tatas karmaṇaḥ siddhim anavabudhyamānasya tatra adhikāraḥ eva na saṃpravartate iti nirṇeṣyate etat 
[I,650,ii_I,650,iii]	ānantaryam api karma svabhāva paryālocanena eva gamyate samanantara phala tvena karmaṇām dṛṣṭa tvāt āha ca yadā tāvat iyam vidyamānā aasīt tadā phalam na dattavatī yadā phalam utpadyate tadā asau na asti asatī katham phalam dāsyati iti api ca kāla antare phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādi tasmin ca kāraṇe dṛṣṭe sati kaḥ nāma sṛkṣma dṛṣṭiḥ adṛṣṭam citra ādi kāraṇam kalpayet tasmāt asatyāḥ citra ādi codanāḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa pariccheda yogya artha upadeśi tve sati api tad saṃvāda śūnya tvāt evaṃvidha vipralaṃbhaka vākya vat 
[I,651,i_I,651,iii]	citra ādi vacasām evam apacārasya darśanāt anāśvāsaḥ agnihotra ādi codanāsu api jāyate agnihotra codanā mithyā veda eka deśa tvāt citra ādi codanā vat tat atra tāvat asaṃvādāt aprāmāṇyam evam putra kāmaḥ putra iṣṭyā yajeta iti evamādau api asaṃvāda udraṣṭavyaḥ 
[I,651,iv]	visaṃvādaḥ api kvacid dṛśyate pramīte yajamāne pātra cayana ākhyam karma upadiśya evam ādideśa vedaḥ saḥ eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ añjasā svargam lokam eti iti tatra eṣaḥ iti tāvat ātmanaḥ nirdeśaḥ kliṣṭaḥ eva parokṣa tvāt sphya kapāla ādi yajña āyudha saṃbandha abhāvāt ca kāyaḥ tu eṣa nirdiśyate sa na svargam lokam yāti iti tad viparīta bhasmībhāva upalaṃbhāt iti visaṃvādaḥ evañca asaṃvāda visaṃvādābhyām apramāṇam vedaḥ 
[I,651,v]	vyāghātāt ca udite hotavyam anudite hotavyam samaya adhyuṣite hotavyam iti homa kāla trayam api vidhāya nindā artha vādaiḥ tat eva niṣedhati śyāmaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ udite juhoti śabalaḥ vai asya āhutim abhyavaharati yaḥ anudite juhoti śyāma śabalau asya āhutim abhyavaharataḥ yaḥ samaya adhyuṣite juhoti 
[I,651,vi_I,652,i]	na ca arthavāda mātram etat iti vaktavyam yatas vidhānam kalpyate stutyā nindayā ca niṣedhanam vidhi stutyoḥ samā vṛttiḥ tathā nindā niṣedhayoḥ na hi nindā ninditum upādīyate kintu ninditāt itarat praśaṃsitum iti avam api prakāraḥ atra na saṃbhavati kāla trayasya api atra niṣedhāt kasya anyasya tat nindayā praśaṃsā vidhīyate tasmāt paraspara viruddha artha upadeśa lakṣaṇāt vyāghātāt apramāṇam vedaḥ 
[I,652,ii]	paunaruktyāt ca tris prathamām anvāha tris uttamām iti abhyāsa codanāyām prathama uttamayoḥ sāmidhenyoḥ virvacanāt paunaruktyam sakṛt anuvacanena tad prayojana saṃpatteḥ anarthakam tris vacanam tasmāt ittham amṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣa kaluṣita tvāt apramāṇam vedaḥ tat āha sūtrakāraḥ tad aprāmāṇyam anṛta vyāghāta punarukta doṣebhyaḥ putra kāma iṣṭi havanāmpāseṣu iti
[I,652,iii_I,652,iv]	atra samādhim āha na karma kartṛ sāvana vaiguṇyāt iti ayam āśayaḥ aprāmāṇya sādhanam anṛta tvam paraiḥ uktam anṛta tve ca sādhanam phala adarśanam etat ca anaikāntikam anyathā api phala adarśana upapatteḥ kim vedasya asatya artha tvāt atra phala adarśanam uta kartṛ ādi vaiguṇyāt iti na viśeṣa hetuḥ asti 
[I,653,i_I,653,ii]	nanu na kadācid api karma samanantaram eva phalam upalabdham iti tad adarśanam eva tad anṛta tva kāraṇam na kāraṇa vaiguṇyam iti tat ayuktam bhaviguṇāyām kārīryām prayuktāyām sadyas eva vṛṣṭeḥ darśanāt na ca tat kākatālīyam āgamena anvaya vyatirekābhyām ca tad kāraṇa tva darśanāt putra ādiḥ tu aihikam api phalam vastu svabhāva paryālocanayā eva na sadyas bhavitum arhati na hi nabhasaḥ tadānīm eva vṛṣṭiḥ iva nipatati putraḥ strī pusa saṃyoga kāraṇa antara savyapekṣa tvāt tad upatteḥ paśu ādi prāptiḥ tu kasyacid adūra kāle api dṛśyate pratigraha ādinā tathā hi asmad pitāmahaḥ eva grāma kāmaḥ sāṃgrahaṇīm kṛtavān saḥ iṣṭi samāpti samanantaram eva gauramūlakam grāmam avāpa 
[I,653,iii_I,654,i]	nanu evam tarhi pratiprahādya iva dṛṣṭam kāraṇam astu paśu ādeḥ putrasya ca strīpuṃsa yogaḥ kim iṣṭeḥ kāraṇa tva kalpanayā iti mā evam vocaḥ satsu api ca dṛṣṭeṣu kāraṇeṣu tad adarśanāt iṣṭi prayoga anantaram ca etad darśanāt iṣṭi kṛtam strīpuṃsa yoga ādi kāraṇa tvam iti niścīyate kiñca sevā adhyayana kṛṣi ādi sāmye api phala bhedataḥ vaktum na yuktā tad prātiḥ dṛṣṭa kāraṇa mātra jā bhūta svabhāva vāda ādi purastāt pratiṣidhyate tasmāt nūnam upetavyam atra anyat api kāraṇam tad uktam tat ca eva hi tatra kāraṇam śabdaḥ ca iti 
[I,654,ii_I,654,iii]	yatra punar aviguṇe api karmaṇi prayujyamāne kāla antare api putra paśu ādi phalam na dṛśyate tatra tīvram kim api prāktanam karma pratibandhakam kalpanīyam yathā uktam phalati yadi na sarvam tat kadācid tat eva dhruvam aparama bhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti karma ādi vaiguṇya grahaṇam upalakṣaṇa artham ṛṣiṇā prayuktam na tu vedasya aprāmāṇya kalpanā sādhvī sādguṇye karmaṇaḥ prācuryeṇa phala darśanāt
