[I,654,iv_I,655,i]	api ca vitrātaḥ paśavaḥ bhavanti iti etāvān eva śāstra arthaḥ ānantarye tu na kiñcid pramāṇam asti tat ayam pratyakṣa ādi visaṃvādaḥ ānantarya viṣayaḥ citra ādi codanā tu anirdiṣṭa kāla viśeṣa viṣaya iti viṣaya bhedāt na sā tena bādhyate tat āha bhaṭṭaḥ ānantarya visaṃvādaḥ na aviśeṣa pravartinīm codanām bādhitum śaktaḥ sphuṭāt viṣaya bhedataḥ iti
[I,655,ii_I,655,iii]	yat tu karma svabhāva paryālocanayā citra ādeḥ anantara phala tvam uktam yad kālam hi mardavam tad kālam mardana sukham iti tat etat atyantam anabhijñasya abhighānam vidhi phalānām kriyā phala tulya tva anupapatteḥ iha kiñcid vidhi phalam bhavati kiñcid kriyā phalam kṛṣi ādau tu bhūmi pāṭana ādi kriyā phalam sasya sampattiḥ tu vidhi phalam kaḥ punar kṛṣi ādau vidhiḥ asti vārtā vidyāyām vṛddha upadeśaḥ vā kaścid bidhiḥ anvayanyatirekau vā tatra vidhi sthānīyau bhaviṣyataḥ 
[I,655,iv_I,655,vi]	loke api vetana kāmaḥ pavati ityādau pāka kriyā phalam odanaḥ vidhi phalam tu vetanam tatra kriyā phalānām eva epa niyamaḥ yat kriyā anantara bhāvi tvam vidhi phalānām tu vetana ādīnām na asti kāla niyamaḥ iṣṭau api havirṣikāra ādi kriyā phalam sadyas bhavati eva paśu puvādi tu vidhi phalam anavacchinna kālam atas eva mardana sukham kriyā phalam iti sadyas bhavati mṛd gataḥ tu puṃsaḥ sevā phalam aniyata kālam grāma kāmaḥ mahīpālam seveta iti evamādiṣu laukikeṣu vidhiṣu asti na kāla niyamaḥ phale āyurveda upadiṣṭānām api aupadha vidhīnām na kriyāvat sadyas eva phala darśanam api tu kāla apekṣam eva iti na phala ānantarye kiñcid pramāṇam 
[I,656,i]	yat tu paśu viraha kṛtaka daśana ādidodūyamāna adhikāri svarūpa paryālocanayā sadyaḥphala tvam ucyate tat api na sāṃpratam puruṣa icchā mātram etat na pramāṇa vṛttam 
[I,656,ii]	api ca aihika tvam phalasya tāvatā setsyati na punar kriyā phala vat sadyas tvam santi ca aihika phalāni api kāla antara savyapekṣāṇi karmāṇi yathā brahmavarvasa kāmasya kāryam viprasya pañcame iti na tatra pañcama varṣe upanīta mātraḥ eva māṇavakaḥ brahmavarcasa saṃpannaḥ bhavati kāla antare tu bhavati iti evam vīrya kāma ādiṣī api draṣṭavyam tasmāt vidhi phalānām ānantarya niyama abhāvāt na tad visaṃvādaḥ doṣāya kāla antare api yatra phala adarśanam tatra kriyā vaiguṇya karma antara pratibandha ādi kāraṇam iti uktam 
[I,656,iii_I,656,iv]	anye kartṛ ādi vaiguṇya kalpanā ananumodinaḥ iha aphalasya citra ādeḥ phalam āmutrikam jaguḥ sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kaḥ avasaraḥ karma vaiguṇya kalpanāyām janma antare tu tat phalam iti yuktā kalpanā 
[I,656,v_I,657,iv]	tathā ca trividham karma kiñci daihika phalam eva kiñci d āmuṣmika phalam eva kiñcid aniyata phalam eva iha amutra vā tad phala pradam iti kalpanā tatra kārīryādi tāvat aihika phalam eva tat hi sakala janapada santāpa kāriṇi mahati avagrahe prastūyate vṛṣṭi lakṣaṇam ca tad phalam svabhāvataḥ eva sakala loka sādhāraṇam āsanna tayā eva tad abhilaṣaṇīyam iti sadyas eva bhavitum arhati vacanāni ca tatra tādṛṃśya iva dṛśyante yadi varṣet tāvatī eva iṣṭim samāpayet yadi na varṣet śvobhūte juhuyāt iti āmuṣmika phalam tu karma jyotiṣṭoma ādi phala svabhāva mahimnā eva pāralaukikam bhavati svargaḥ nirupamā prītiḥ deśaḥ vā tad viśeṣaṇaḥ bhoktum na ubhayathā api eṣaḥ dehena anena śakyate citra ādi tu aniyata phalam karma tad phalasya paśu ādeḥ iha vā paratra vā loke sambhavāt 
[I,657,v]	avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam tathā hi akṛta citrā yāgānām api iha janmani paśavaḥ dṛśyante te paridṛśyamāna sevā pratigraha ādi kāraṇakāḥ eva iti kathyamāne karma nimitta tva hāneḥ bṛhaspati mata anupraveśa prasaṅgaḥ karma nimittaka tve tu teṣām paśūnām upapādakam kim karma iti nirūpaṇīyam na hi brahmavarcasa ādi phalāt karmaṇaḥ paśavaḥ niṣpadyante citrā ca paśu phalāḥ iha janmani taiḥ na kṛtā eva pūrva janma kṛtā tu tasmin eva janmani phalam dattavatī iti niyata aihika phala abhyupagamāt iti kutas paśu saṃpad 
[I,657,vi]	nanu gautama vacana prāmāṇyāt pūrva kṛta bhukta śiṣṭa jyotiṣṭoma ādi karma nimittakaḥ sa paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā uktam varṇāḥ āśramāḥ ca sva karma niṣṭhāḥ pretya karma phalam anubhūya patantaḥ tatas śeṣeṇa viśiṣṭa deśa śruta vṛtta vitta ādi yuktam janma pratipadyante na etat yathāśrutam boddhum yuktam na hi anya phalakam karma dātum īṣṭe phala antaram sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi niyataḥ phala karmaṇām 
[I,658,i]	tasmāt samūha apekṣā śeṣa vācaḥ yuktiḥ vyākhyeyā bahūni hi karmāṇi varṇāḥ āśramāḥ ca kṛtavantaḥ tatas karma samūhāt jyotiṣṭoma ādi phalam pretya anubhūyate tatas śeṣeṇa citra ādinā karmaṇā viśiṣṭam janma pratipadyante iti arthaḥ tasmāt pūrva janma kṛta citra ādi nibandhanaḥ iha janmani paśu lābhaḥ na akarma nimittakaḥ na anya karma nimittakaḥ iti evam aniyata phala tvāt citra ādeḥ iha janmani phala adarśane api na anṛta tvam tad codanānām janma antare hi tāḥ iṣṭayaḥ phalam dāsyanti iti 
[I,658,ii_I,658,iii]	atra ucyate kim vā ācanikam etat karmaṇām traividhyam uta puruṣa icchā adhīnam iti tatra vacanam tāvat trividha vibhāga pratipādakam na asti kārīrīm nirvaṣet vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta citrayā paśu kāmaḥ iti etāvat mātra śravaṇam na hi atra aihika tvam pāralaukika tvam aniyata tvam vā kvacid phalasya paṭhitam 
[I,659,i_I,659,iii]	vidhi vṛttam api iyat eva yat sapratyaya pravartanam nāma tatra idam evaṃkāmena kartavyam iti etāvān liṅarthaḥ apuruṣa artha rūpe tu vyāpāre pravartaka tva lakṣaṇa sva vyāpāra nirvahaṇam anadhigacchan vidhiḥ adhikāri viśeṣaṇasya kāmasya kāmyamānasya svarga ādeḥ bhāva arthasya ca yāga ādeḥ sādhya sādhana sambandham eva avabodhayati na kāmyamānasya sadyas kāla antare vā niṣpattim ākṣipati iti phala svarūpa paryālocanayā tu satyam svargasya pāralaukika tvam avagamyate na tu paśu ādeḥ aniyamaḥ puruṣa icchā tu puruṣa icchā eva na tayā śāstra arthaḥ vyavasthāpayitum śakyaḥ tasmāt niṣpramāṇakam traividhyam 
[I,659,iv_I,660,i]	yaḥ tu citra ādīnām aniyata phala tve nyāya uktaḥ citra ādīnām phalam tāvat kṣīṇam tatra eva janmani ityādiḥ sa kārīryām api niścita aihika phalāyām yojayitum śakyaḥ adya akṛtāyām kārīryāḥ na hi devaḥ na varṣati janma antara kṛtā tatra kārīrī kim na kāraṇam tasmāt sā api aniyata phalāḥ bhavatu 
[I,660,ii]	atha sasya saṃpad saṃpādya sukha saṃbhoga sādhana bhūta adṛṣṭa nimittā vṛṣṭiḥ adya akṛtāyām api kārīryām iti manyase tarhi dadhi kṣīra ādi bhakṣaṇa sukha ākṣepi karma nimittakaḥ paśu lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati akṛta citrā yāgānām kārīri adhīnaḥ odanaḥ citra adhīnam dadhi iti dadhi odana bhojana sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa kāritā paśu vṛṣṭi sṛṣṭiḥ bhavatu 
[I,660,iii]	atha śṛṅga grāhikayā paśuphalā citreṣṭiḥ upadiśyate tena na sukha sāmānya ākṣepaka karma nibandhanaḥ paśu lābhaḥ evam tarhi vṛṣṭau api śṛṅga grāhikayā kārīrī paṭhyatas eva iti vṛṣṭiḥ api sāmānya adṛṣṭa nibandhanā mā bhūt 
[I,660,iv]	atha na yadi varṣet śvobhūte juhuyāt ityādi vacana paryālocanayā tasyāmaihika phala tvam ucyate yadi evam yatra tādṛśam vacanam na asti yaḥ vṛṣṭi kāmaḥ sa saubhareṇa stuvīta yadi kāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāt iti nīcais sadaḥ minuyāt iti ādau tatra pāralaukika phala tvam syāt yadi ca śvobhūte juhuyāt iti vacana mahimnā eva phale sadyas tva mātram adhikam bhavatu na tu tādṛśa vacana rahitānām karmaṇām vispaṣṭa siddham api aihika phala tvam nivartate 
[I,661,i]	yat punar bahu sādhāraṇa tvena vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam ucyate tat api paśu ādau samānam na hi ātmambhariḥ eva yajamānaḥ bhavati tasya api sva vāsinī kumāra atithi bhṛtya ādi bhojana pūrvaka sva bhojana niyama upadeśāt bahutara upakāraka tvam tu vṛṣṭeḥ iti alam tulayā 
[I,661,ii]	yat api pratyāsanna tvena kāmyamāna tvāt vṛṣṭeḥ aihika tvam kathyate tat api tādṛś eva paśu ādeḥ api tathā eva kāmyamāna tvāt tatra avagraha vihita santāpa tayā pratyāsanna tvena vṛṣṭiḥ abhilaṣyate iha api daurgatya udvegāt āsanna tayā eva paśavaḥ kāmyante tasmāt vāridaḥ tṛptim āpnoti sukhaṃmakṣayam anna daḥ ityādi vacana upadiṣṭa sāmānya sukha sādhana adṛṣṭa nibandha naiva iyam iha akṛta karmaṇām vṛṣṭi paśu ādi saṃpattiḥ iti na bṛhaspati matavat akarma nimittam phalam na api karma phala sādhya sādhana bhāva niyama vyabahāra ullaṅghanam iti 
[I,662,i_I,662,iii]	yat ca kārīryāḥ kvacid phala visaṃvāde samādhānam uktam phalati yadi na sarvam tat kadācid tat eva dhruvam aparama bhuktam karma śāstrīyam āste iti tena sā api aniyata phalā eva syāt na hi tad karma antaram āsaṃsāram pratibandhakam bhavati phala upabhogāt hi tasya avaśyam kṣayeṇa bhavitavyam pratibandhake ca kṣīṇe kārīryā sva phalam tadā dātavyam eva sā api adatta phalā na kṣīyate eva iti evam janma antare tad phala saṃbhavāt tasyāḥ api aniyata phala tvam anena ca prakāreṇa citra ādeḥ api aniyata phala tvam asmābhiḥ iṣyate eva yatra samyak prayuktāyām api iṣṭau karma antara pratibandhāt eva paśūnām anupalambhaḥ kalpyate sarvathā sadyaḥphala tva mātra varjam samāna yogakṣemā kārīryā citra iṣṭiḥ 
[I,662,iv]	etena brahmavarcasa vīryān nādya grāma ādi kāma iṣṭayaḥ api vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt yathāśrutam gautamam boddhavyam 
[I,663,i]	yat api abhyadhāyi samagra aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa kāmya karma prayogāt kutas karmaṇaḥ vaiguṇya avasaraḥ iti tat api asāram sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttau api pramādāt asaṃvedya māna vaiguṇya saṃbhavāt sa ca vicitraḥ bhāṣya kāreṇa pradarśitaḥ tasmāt pūrva uktaḥ eva pratisamādhāna mārgaḥ śreyān 
[I,663,ii]	yat punar pūrva pākṣikeṇa kathitam kāla antare karma abhāvāt kutas phalam iti tat api na samyak yadi api āphala niṣpatteḥ karmaṇaḥ na asti avasthitiḥ tathā api asti eva saṃskāraḥ puruṣasya tat ā āhitaḥ karma janyaḥ hi saṃskāraḥ puṃsaḥ buddhi ādi vat guṇaḥ tasya ca aphala saṃyogāt avasthitiḥ upeyate yathā indriya ādi saṃyogāt ātmanaḥ buddhi saṃbhavaḥ tathā yāga ādi karmabhyaḥ tasya saṃskāra saṃbhavaḥ buddhiḥ tu bhaṅgurā tasya saṃskāraḥ tu phala avadhiḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ hi na anyathā phala karmaṇoḥ smṛti bījam tu saṃskāraḥ tasya anyaiḥ api mṛṣyate tathā eva phala saṃyoga bījam saḥ asya bhaviṣyati sa yāga dāna homa ādi janyaḥ dharmagirā ucyate brahmahatyā ādi janyaḥ tu saḥ adharmaḥ iti kathyate 
[I,664,i]	kāpilāḥ tu antaḥkaraṇasya buddheḥ vṛtti viśeṣam dharmam āhuḥ ārhatāḥ puṇya pudgalān dharma tvena vyapadiśanti śākya bhikṣavaḥ citta vāsanām dharmam ācakṣate vṛddhamīmāṃsakāḥ yāga ādi karma nirvartyam apūrvam nāma dharmam abhivadanti yāga ādi karma eva śābarāḥ bruvate vākya arthaḥ eva niyoga ātmā apūrva śabda vācyaḥ dharma śabdena ca saḥ eva ucyate iti prābhākarāḥ kathayanti 
[I,664,ii_I,664,iv]	tatra puṇya pudgala vṛtti pakṣayoḥ kapila arhat grantha kathitayoḥ tad mata nirāsāt eva nirāsaḥ ātmanaḥ ca samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt tasya eva vāsanā na cetasaḥ iti saugata pakṣaḥ api ayuktaḥ svarga yāga antarāla vartinaḥ casthirasya nirādhārasya apūrvasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt jarat jaiminīya pravādaḥ api apeśalaḥ api ca phalasya vā kācid utpatsyamāna daśā yāgasya vā śaktiḥ apūrva śabdena ucyate 
[I,665,i_I,665,ii]	na ca niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ eva apūrva śabda vācyaḥ tasya upariṣṭāt apākariṣyamāṇa tvāt na api yaḥ yāgam anutiṣṭhati tam dhārmikaḥ iti ācakṣate iti yāga ādi sāmāna adhikaraṇyena prayogāt saḥ eva dharma śabda vācyaḥ iti yuktam vaktum tasya kṣaṇika tvena kāla antare phala dātṛ tva anupapatteḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogaḥ api ca ekāntataḥ na asti eva 
[I,665,iii_I,665,v]	yāga dāna ādinā dharmaḥ bhavati iti api laukikāḥ prayogāḥ santi te ca amī saṃskriyā pakṣa sākṣiṇaḥ evam yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan iti vaidikaḥ api prayogaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva vyākhyeyaḥ tasya sthāyi tvena kāla antare phala dāna yogya ta upapatteḥ saṃskāraḥ nṛ guṇaḥ sthāyī tasmāt dharmaḥ iti sthitam tasmāt ca phala niṣpatteḥ na citra ādau mṛṣā artha tā 
[I,665,vi]	yat api yajña āyudhi vākye pratyakṣa viruddha tvam upapādyate sma bhasmībhāva upalambhāt kāyasya iti tad api asamīcīnam eṣaḥ iti śarīra abheda upacāreṇa ātmanaḥ eva nirdeśāt tasya ca svarga gamanam bhavati eva gamanam ca tad upabhogaḥ eva tasya ucyate yathā śarīra ādi yoga viyogau janma maraṇe iti na tu vyāpinaḥ parispanda ātmaka kriyā yogaḥ upapadyate jñāna cikīrṣā prayatna samavāyaḥ ca tasya kartṛ tvam iti varṇayiṣyate yajñāyudha sambandhaḥ api sva svāmi bhāva ādiḥ tasya eva vyāpaka tva aviśeṣe api vyavasthayā upapadyate iti na kaścid atra virodhaḥ tasmāt sarvatra niravakāśam anṛta tva ādi dūṣaṇam 
[I,666,i_I,666,ii]	yaḥ api havana kāla vidhau vyāghāta doṣaḥ darśitaḥ saḥ api na doṣaḥ eva tatra anuṣṭhāna bhedena kāla tritaya codanā yaḥ yasya coditaḥ kālaḥ laṅghanīyaḥ na tena saḥ tatas ca anyatamam kālam abhyupetya enam ujjhataḥ nindā iti na virodhaḥ atra kaścid vidhi niṣedhayoḥ 
[I,666,iii_I,667,i]	abhyāse paunaruktyam ca kārya artha tvāt adūṣaṇam saṃpādyam pāñcadaśyam hi sāmidhenīṣu coditam imam aham pañcadaśa āreṇa vajreṇa apabādhe yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti śrūyate ekādaśa sāmidhenyaḥ ṛcaḥ tu paṭhyante tatra abhyāsam antareṇa pāñcadaśyam na avakalpate iti evam avaśya kartavyaḥ abhyāsaḥ sa ca ayam aniyamena prāptaḥ vacanena niyamyate prathama uttame ṛcau tris uccāraṇīye iti tasmāt tad prayojana artha tvāt na punarukta tā doṣaḥ abhyāse phala rahite hi paunaruktyam doṣaḥ syāt iha tu na tasya niṣphala tvam vyāghāta anṛta punarukta tā ādi tasmāt vedasya ślathayati na pramāṇa bhāvam iyam ca vākya artha vicāraṇā api prāmāṇyasidhyaupayikī iti matvā cakre sva śāstre muninā iha veda prāmāṇya nirvāhaṇa dīkṣitena 
[I,667,ii_I,667,iii]	nanu na adya api vedasya bhavadbhiḥ nipuṇaiḥ api sva deha saṃbhavāḥ doṣāḥ nikhilāḥ paripiñjitāḥ tathā hi saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tad rudrasya rudra tvam prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat tām agnau prāgṛhṇāt tatas ajastu uparaḥ udagāt devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti evamādīnām artha vādānām kim yathāśruta vastu paratvam uta tebhyaḥ kārya rūpa artha upadeśa parikalpanam uta liṅā ādi yukta vākya antara pratipādyamāna kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam iti cintyam 
[I,668,i]	sarvathā ca pramādaḥ svarūpa paratve tāvat pramāṇa antara viruddha artha upadeśāt aprāmāṇyam eva avatarati rodana vapa utkhedana diś moha ādeḥ arthasya tathātve niścaya abhāvāt 
[I,668,ii_I,668,iii]	kiñca stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti evan jātīyakānām artha vāda vākyānām vispaṣṭam eva pramāṇa antara viruddha artha pratipādaka tvam na hi nisargataḥ eva sarva prāṇinām anṛta vādinī vāc bhavati stenam vā manaḥ api cadhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ tasmāt arciḥ eva agneḥ naktam dṛśyate na dhūmaḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddham abhidhīyate naktam dinam dvayoḥ api indriya artha sannikarṣe sati grahaṇāt 
[I,668,iv_I,668,vi]	kiñca etat na vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smas abrāhmaṇāḥ vā iti brāhmaṇa jāteḥ upadeśa sahāya pratyakṣa gamya tvāt tad viruddhaḥ eṣaḥ artha vādaḥ śāstra virodhaḥ api asti kaḥ hi tadvada yadi amuṣmin loke asti vā na vā iti śāstre svarga ādi phalānām jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmaṇām upadeśāt kā iyam anavakḷptiḥ api ca garga tri rātra brāhmaṇam adhikṛtya śrūyate śobhate asya mukham yaḥ evam vedaḥ iti na hi kasyacid evaṃvid ataḥ mukham śobhate iti pratyakṣa virodhaḥ 
[I,668,vii]	anya karma anartha kī aśaṃsī ca kaścid artha vādaḥ bhavati pūrṇāhutyā sarvān kāmān avāpnoti paśu bandha yājī sarvān lokān abhijayati tarati mṛtyum tarati pāpmānam tarati brahma hatyām yaḥ aśvamedhena yajate yaḥ ca evam vedaḥ iti yadi pūrṇāhutyā eva sarva kāma avāptiḥ paśu bandha yāgena eva sarva loka jayaḥ aśvamedha vedanena eva tad phala avāptiḥ tat kim artham anya karma upadeśaḥ upadiṣṭāni api tāni bahu kleśa sādhyāni karmāṇi vyarthāni bhaveyuḥ anena eva laghunā upāyena tad phala prāpteḥ darśanāt 
[I,669,i_I,669,ii]	api ca na pṛthivyām agniḥ cetavyaḥ na antarikṣe na divi iti vede cayana niṣedhaḥ eva atra bhaṅgyā bhavet divi ca antarikṣe ca tāvat cayana prayogaḥ eva na asti kim tad niṣedhena pṛthivī cayana niṣedha artham ca yat vākyam tat cayana pratiṣedha artham eva bhavet apṛthivī adhikaraṇakasya cayanasya anupapatteḥ api ca yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakānām pratyakṣa viruddha artha abhidhāyinām artha vādānām kā pariniṣṭhā iti tasmāt na svarūpa paratvam teṣām upapadyate 
[I,669,iii]	na api tebhyaḥ eva kārya rūpa artha parikalpanam upapannam aśakya tvāt saḥ arodīt yat arodīt tad rudrasya rudra tvam iti atra kāryam kalpyamānam evam kalpyeta rudraḥ kila ruroda atas anyena api roditavyam iti tat ca aśakyam priya viprayoga janita santāpa vaśena hi bāṣpa mocanam rodanam ucyate na tat codana upadeśāt kartum śakyate 
[I,669,iv_I,670,ii]	prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām uccikheda tasmāt anyaḥ api evam utkhidet ātmanaḥ vapām iti duranuṣṭhānaḥ ayam arthaḥ kaḥ hi nāma ātmanaḥ vapām utkhidet kasya vā vapā home sati samanantaram eva hutabhujaḥ paśuḥ tu uparaḥ udgacchet iti devāḥ diśaḥ na ājñāsiṣuḥ atas anyaḥ api na jānīyāt iti aśakya upadeśaḥ na hi diś mohaḥ nāma upadeśāt kartum śakyaḥ na ca sarvasmāt artha vādāt vidhiḥ kalpayitum śakyaḥ iti madhyamaḥ api na sat pakṣaḥ 
[I,670,iii]	na api tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ saṃbhavati vākya antara vihita kārya rūpa artha aupayika tvam hi tad upayogi dravya devatā ādi vidhāna dvārakam bhavati yathā agnihotram juhoti iti atra dadhnā juhoti payasā juhoti iti dravya viniyoga vidheḥ yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti iti devatā vidheḥ vā na ca ayam artha vādeṣu prakāraḥ saṃbhavati na ca ebhiḥ brīhīn avahanti brīhīn prokṣati iti vat dṛṣṭā adṛṣṭā vā kācid itikartavyatā upadiśyate tasmāt na teṣām tad aupayika tvam 
[I,670,iv_I,670,v]	nanu prekṣāvatām prarocana atiśaya karaṇena pravṛtti utsāham ābahantaḥ artha vādāḥ tad upayoginaḥ bhaviṣyanti na etat api samyak pravṛtti utsāhaḥ hi keṣāṃcid mate nirapekṣa śabda pratyayāt eva sidhyati asmad mate tu tad praṇetṛ puruṣa pratyayāt iti kim prarocanayā evaṃkāmaḥ idam kuryāt iti ukte yaḥ tatra na pravartate sa prarocanayā api na pravarteta eva iti yat kiñcid etat tat evam prakāra trayeṇa api arthavāda padānām ananvayāt eka deśa ākṣepeṇa sarva ākṣepaḥ eva kriyate iti apramāṇam vedaḥ 
[I,671,i]	nanu yāvatī eva pramāṇa antara viruddha tvam upalabhyate tāvatī eva aprāmāṇyam astu sarvatra tu kutastyā tad āśaṅkā iti mā evam tad sāmānyāt anyatra api anāśvāsaḥ mīmāṃsaka pakṣe hi arthavāda rahita kevala veda grantha anupalambhāt tad anuṣaṅgeṇa sarvatra sa apekṣa tvam avatarati naiyāyika mate tu veda praṇetuḥ īśvarasya kvacid vitatha vādi tve dṛśyamāne katham anyatra satya vāditāyām dṛḍhaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavet iti aprāmāṇyam sarvatra iti 
[I,671,ii]	atra abhidhīyate vidhi eka vākya tayā eva bhūmnā tāvat arthavāda padāni paṭhyante vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā devatāḥ vāyum eva svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati saḥ eva enam bhūtim gamayati iti teṣām tad eka vākya tvāt eva prāmāṇyam vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ iti atas yadi api kriyā na avagamyate na api tad sambaddhaḥ kaścid arthaḥ tathā api vidhi uddeśena eka vākya tvam tasya pratīyate bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antaḥ vidhi uddeśaḥ tena eka vākya bhūtaḥ vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ iti evamādeḥ 
[I,671,iii_I,671,iv]	katham eka vākya bhāvaḥ padānām sa ākāṅkṣa tvāt nanu bhūti kāmaḥ iti evam antena vākyena vidheyam vihitam utpāditam pratipattuḥ anākāṅkṣa tvam kṛtañca śabda kartavyam iti kim anyena kṣepiṣṭha aitya ādinā prayojanam tad arthasya eva stutiḥ iti brūmaḥ 
[I,672,i_I,672,ii]	nanu stutyā api kim prayojanam stutaḥ astutaḥ catāvān eva saḥ arthaḥ mā evam sa stuti pade hi vākye stuti pada sahitam vidhāyakam vidhāyakam bhavati kim idānīm kevalam liṅa ādi yuktam vākyam na vidhāyakam ucyate yadi stuti padāni na śrūyante tat bāḍham bhavati vidhāyakam eteṣu ca satsu tad sahitam tad vidhāyakam bhavati na kevalam tathā pratīteḥ stuti pada sambandhe sati bhinna vākyatā mā bhūt iti vidhi padena stuti padena ca saṃbhūya arthaḥ vidhīyate tathā avagamāt anyathā hi pratīyamānaḥ padārtha anvayaḥ tyajyeta vākya bhedaḥ vā kalpyeta tasmāt na stuti padānām ānarthakyam 
[I,672,iii]	nanu kevalasya api vidhi vākyasya sāmarthyāt kim artham stuti padāni prayuñjate iti ucyate aparyanuyojyaḥ jaiminīyānām mate śabdaḥ asmākam ca bhagavān īśvaraḥ ukte sati pratipattāraḥ vayam vedasya na kartāraḥ pratipattau ca kramaḥ darśitaḥ 
[I,672,iv]	evañca yadi api dravya devatā iti kartavyatā vidhāna dvārakam aṅga vidhivat artha vāda vākyānām kārya aupayika tvam na asti tathā api prati iti aṅga tvam na nivāryate 
[I,673,i]	atas eva pramāṇa upayogi tvam eṣām ācakṣate na prameya upayogi tvam kevala vidhi pada śravaṇe hi na tadā ādriyante yajvānaḥ tatra vidhi vibhaktiḥ avasīdati tām nimajjantīm iva artha vāda janita karma prāśastya pratyayaḥ uttabhrāti sarva jitā yajeta iti atas na tathāvidhaḥ śraddhā atiśayaḥ bhavati yathāvidhaḥ sarva jitāḥ vai devāḥ sarvam ajayan sarvasya āptyai sarvasya jityai sarvam eva etena sarvam jayati iti artha vāda padebhyaḥ loke api iyam gauḥ kretavyāḥ iti atas na tathā kretāraḥ pravartante yathā eṣā bahu snigdha kṣīra asu ślīlā sa apatyā anagha prajā ca iti evamādibhyaḥ stutibhyaḥ sva anubhava sākṣikaḥ ayam arthaḥ 
[I,673,ii]	atas eva kecid aśruta artha vādake api vidhi vākye tad kalpanāḥ micchanti yathā kvacid artha vādāt vidhi kalpanam iti yathā uktam vidhi stutyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ samāna viṣaya iṣyate iti anadhigamyamāna vidhi sambandhāt ca artha vādāt vidhiḥ unnīyate na gamyamāna sambandhāt 
[I,674,i]	atas eva ca saḥ arodīt iti evamādibhyaḥ na roditavyam ityādi vidhi kalpanam iṣyate mudhā eva pūrva pakṣiṇā tad āśaṅkitam vidhi antareṇa eka vākya tvam hi pratyakṣam iha upadiśyate barhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ ayam saḥ arodīt ityādiḥ rudraḥ ruroda tasya yat aśru aśīryata tat rajatam abhavat yaḥ hi barhiṣi rajatam dadāti purā asya saṃvatsarāt gṛhe rodanam bhavati iti tasmāt varhiṣi rajatam na deyam iti 
[I,674,ii_I,674,iii]	prājāpatyam ajam tu uparama ālabheta iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat iti vapā homa māhātmya pradarśana artham ucyate agnau vai pragṛhīta mātrāyām vapāyām ajastu uparaḥ udagāt iti ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ caruḥ iti asya vidheḥ śeṣaḥ ayam devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti vyāmohānām ādityaḥ caruḥ nāśayitā yathā diś mohasya iti evam tatra tatra vidhi śeṣa tvam artha vādānām veditavyam 
[I,674,iv]	katham punar idam asatyam eva ucyate rudra ruditāt rajatam ajāyata prajāpati homa samiddhāt agneḥ ajastu uparaḥ udagāt iti ucyate na idam asatyam yat asya vākyasya pratipādyam tatra satya artham eva idam na ca asya yathāśrutaḥ arthaḥ pratipādyaḥ kintu vidheyaḥ niṣedhyaḥ vā kaścid arthaḥ iha anvākhyāne dvayam āpatati yat ca vṛttānta jñānam yat ca kasmiṃścid arthe prarocanā dveṣaḥ vā tatra vṛttānta jñānam na pravartakam na nivartakam iti prayojana abhāvāt anarthakam anādaraṇīyam prarocanāḥ dveṣau pravṛtti nivṛtti aṅga tvāt tad arthau gṛhītvā prarocanāyāḥ pravarteta dveṣāt nivarteta iti tatra tad pratipādya satya arthaḥ eva artha vādaḥ 
[I,675,i_I,675,iii]	yat tu arudati rudre katham tat rodana vacanam arodana prabhave vā rajate katham tat udbhavatā abhidhānam iti guṇavāda mātram gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ śveta varṇa sārūpya ādinā rodana prabhavam rajatam ninditum ucyate evam paśu yāge vapā homa praśaṃsāyai prajāpatiḥ ātmanaḥ vapām udakkhidat iti vṛttānta ākhyānam yojanīyam āditya caru praśaṃsāyai devāḥ vai deva yajana madhyavasāya diśaḥ na prājānan iti 
[I,675,iv]	athavā naiyāyikānām aneka prakāra puruṣa atiśaya vādinām yathāśrute api arthe na atyantam asaṃbhavaḥ rudrasya ruditāt rajata janma prajāpateḥ vapa utkhedaḥ tad homāt tu upara paśu udgamaḥ devānām devayajana adhyavasāne diś mohaḥ iti evaṃjātīyakam api satyam astu kaḥ doṣaḥ tat sarvathā na artha vādāḥ na pramāṇam 
[I,675,v_I,676,i]	evam stenam manaḥ anṛta vādinī vāc iti gauṇaḥ eṣa vādaḥ pracchanna tayā stenam manaḥ ucyate bāhulya abhiprāyeṇa ca anṛta vādinī vāc iti dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe na arciḥ arcira eva agneḥ naktam dadṛśe na dhūmaḥ iti dūra bhūyaḥ tva abhiprāyeṇa kasmaicid prayojanāya sāyaṃprātar homa devatā stutaye kathyate 
[I,676,ii_I,676,iv]	na ca etat vidmaḥ yadi brāhmaṇāḥ smaḥ abrāhmaṇāḥ vā iti pravara anumantraṇa praśaṃsāyai saṃśayaḥ iva darśitaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ api yajamānaḥ pravara anumantraṇena brāhmaṇaḥ syāt iti kaḥ hi vai tad veda yat amuṣmin loke asti vā na vā iti adṛṣṭa phalam kim api karma stotum ucyate śobhate asya mukham yaḥ evam vedaḥ iti vidyā praśaṃsā eṣā śobhate iti śiṣyaiḥ udvīkṣyamāṇasya mukham iti 
[I,676,v_I,676,viii]	sarvān kāmān āpnoti iti sarva tvam prakṛtā apekṣam stuti artham ca aśvamedha adhyayane tad phala vacanam hiraṇyam nidhāya cetavyam iti stuti artha tayā divi antarikṣe pṛthivyām ca cayanam pratiṣidhyate anupahita hiraṇyāyām pṛthivyām agniḥ na cetavyaḥ na punar na cetavyaḥ eva tasyām iti ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti añjane sati tejasvitayā yūpasya āditya rūpa tā stutaye kathyate tad kārya kāri tvāt ca yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ucyate na hi mukhyayā eva vṛttyā loke śabdāḥ pravartante gauṇyā api vṛttyā tad vyavahāra darśanāt evam vede api teṣām tathā prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati ittham ca mantreṣu api aindryāḥ gārhapatya upasthānam aviruddham 
[I,677,i]	evam stuti nindā svarūpāḥ tāvat artha vādāḥ vidhi eka vākya tvena pramāṇam para kṛti purā kalpa svarūpāḥ api tathā eva yojyāḥ 
[I,677,ii]	kvacid punar arthavādena eva kaścid aṃśaḥ pūryate iti na tu prati iti aṅga tvam eva tasya kārya aṅga tvam api bhavati yathā pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā yaḥ etāḥ rātrīḥ upāsate iti aśrūyamāṇa adhikārasya rātri satra vidheḥ adhikāra aṃśaḥ artha vādāt eva labhyate yathā uktam phalam ātreyaḥ nirdeśāt iti tatra hi pratiṣṭhā kāmāḥ satram āsīran iti artha vāda vaśāt gamyate vākya arthaḥ 
[I,678,i]	kvacid vidhi vākyasya artha sandehe arthavāda ātmakāt vākya śeṣāt tad niścayaḥ bhavati yathā aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti iti añjana dravye ghṛta nailavasā ādi bhedena saṃdihyamāne tejaḥ vai ghṛtam iti artha vādāt ghṛtena aktāḥ śarkarāḥ upadheyāḥ iti gamyate 
[I,678,ii]	iti artha vādāḥ vidhi nā aikya bhāvāt tadvat pramāṇa tvam amī bhajante asti prati iti anvayitā hi teṣām kvacid ca kārya anvayitā tu dṛṣṭā yat vā svarūpa para tām api saṃspṛśanta prāmāṇya vartma te ime na parityajanti naiyāyikāḥ hi puruṣa atiśayam vadantaḥ vṛttānta varṇanam api iha yathārtham āhuḥ āditya yūpa vacana ādiṣu tu svarūpa yāthārthyam ittham upapādayitum na śakyam gauṇīm tu vṛttim abalambya kṛtā tad artha vyākhyā iti teṣu api na vipla vana avakāśaḥ 
[I,679,i]	atha idānīm mantrāḥ vicāryante kim artha prakāśana dvāreṇa vidhi artha upayogi tā teṣām uta uccāraṇa mātreṇa iti 
[I,679,ii]	nanu ubhayathā api prāmāṇya aviśeṣāt kim tad vicāreṇa na hi idam śāstram vedasya artha vicārāya mīmāṃsā vat pravṛttam api tu prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva iti satyam prāmāṇya nirṇayāya eva idam śāstram pravṛttam avivakṣita artha tve tu mantrāṇām apratipādaka tva lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam eva bhavet sāmānyāt veda brāhmaṇa vākyānām api tathā abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti vedasya karma avabodha artha tvam hīyeta na ca saṃśaya viparyaya jananam eva aprāmāṇyam ajñāna janaka tvam api aprāmāṇyam eva 
[I,679,iii]	tat ucyate uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ kutas tathā viniyoga upadeśāt uru prathā uru prathasvaḥ iti puroḍāśam prathayati iti yadi artha prakāśana upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ sāmarthyāt eva prathana upayogī maṃtraḥ ayam iti kim artham prathane viniyujyante vacanena yathā sākṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pareṇa ced nīyate nūnam akṣibhyām na paśyati iti gamyate 
[I,679,iv_I,680,i]	agnīt agnīn viharaḥ iti ca karoti eva asau ṛtvij agni viharaṇam kim vacanena uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇi mantre tad uccāraṇāt eva adṛṣṭam kiñcid upakāra jātam kalpyate vākya krama niyamāt ca avivakṣita arthān mantrān avagacchāmaḥ niyata pada kramāḥ hi mantrāḥ paṭhyante yadi artha pratipādanena upakuryuḥ niyata krama āśrayaṇam anarthakam syāt krama antareṇa api tad artha avagama saṃpatteḥ 
[I,680,ii]	itas ca avivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ avidyamāna artha prakāśinaḥ hi kecid dṛśyante yathā catvāri śṛṅgāḥ trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśaḥ iti na hi catur śṛṅgam tri pādam dvi śiraskam sapta hastam kiñcid yajña sādhanam asti yat anena prakāśyeta 
[I,680,iii]	itas ca evam acetana praiṣa pradarśanāt oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti na hi oṣadhiḥ budhyate trāṇāya niyuktā asmi iti śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti ca udāharaṇam na hi acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ śrotum niyujyante 
[I,680,iv]	api ca aditiḥ dyauraditiḥ antarikṣam iti vipratiṣiddham abhivadanti mantrāḥ katham sā eva dyauḥ tat eva antarikṣam bhavitum arhati 
[I,680,v]	keṣāñcid ca mantrāṇām arthaḥ jñātum eva na śakyate te katham artha prakāśanena upakuryuḥ amyaksātaḥ indraḥ ṛṣṭiḥ iti sṛṇyeva jarbharītuḥ pharītu iti indraḥ somasya kāṇukāḥ iti ca tasmāt avivakṣita arthāḥ mantrāḥ 
[I,681,i]	api ca uccāraṇam ubhayathā api kartavyam mantrāṇām adṛṣṭāya vā artha pratyāyanāya vā yatas artham api na anud caritāḥ śabdāḥ pratyāyayitum utsahante tad avaśya kartavye asmin ud cāraṇe tatas eva yajña upakāre siddhe kim artha pratipādana dvāra parigraheṇa prayojanam iti 
[I,681,ii]	tatra ucyate kim mantrebhyaḥ artha pratītiḥ eva na asti kim vā bhavanti api nirnimittā asau uta sat nimittā api graha ekatva pratīti vat avivakṣitā iti 
[I,681,iii_I,681,iv]	na tāvat pratītiḥ eva na asti śabda artha sambandha vyutpatti saṃskṛta matīnām barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādi mantra śravaṇe sati tad artha pratīteḥ sva saṃvedya tvāt na api asau nirnimittā loka vat padānām eva atra nimitta tvāt vyutpattiḥ api na na asti yaḥ eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikā te eva teṣām arthāḥ iti loka vyavahārataḥ tad vyutpatti saṃbhavāt 
[I,681,v]	na api bhavanti api mantrebhyaḥ artha pratītiḥ graha ekatva pratīti vat avivakṣitā bhavitum arhati avivakṣā nibandhanasya kvacid api abhāvāt graha ādi vacana antara nirjñāta saṃkhya tvāt soma avaseka nirharaṇasya ca sammārga kāryasya sarva graha sādhāraṇa tvāt graham iti vibhakteḥ ca karma kāraka samarpaṇa mātreṇa api sārthakya upapatteḥ yuktam eka tvam avivakṣitam iti kathayitum iha tu barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmi iti evamādi vākya kriyamāṇa kratu upayogi dravya ādi prakāśanasya vidhi apekṣita tvāt mantreṇa smṛtam karma karoti tathā kriyamāṇam abhyudaya kāri bhavati iti na yajña aṅga prakāśanam avivakṣitam atas na uccāraṇa mātra upakāriṇaḥ mantrāḥ 
[I,682,i]	japa mantrāṇām tu pāvamānīm japet vaiṣṇavīm japet iti vidhinā eva tāvat mātrā kṣepaṇāt na arthena prakāśitena prayojanam iti kim tatra kriyate yatra tu japet iti vidhiḥ na śrūyate na tatra tad arthaḥ pratīyamānaḥ apekṣyamāṇaḥ ca upekṣitum yuktaḥ 
[I,682,ii]	nanu yadi japet iti vidheḥ vaiṣṇavī ādiṣu na arthaḥ vivakṣyate tarhi svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti akṣara grahaṇa mātra vidhānāt sarvasya eva vedasya avivakṣita artha tvam syāt mā evam svādhyāya adhyayana vidheḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hi tasya arthaḥ karma avabodhanam iti dṛṣṭa artha tvena vivakṣita artha tvāt etat ca śāstra antare vistarataḥ nirṇītam iha tu vitanyamānam asmākam avāntara vicāra vācāla tām āviṣkaroti iti na pratanyate 
[I,682,iii_I,683,ii]	yat tu tad artha viniyoga upadeśāt iti avivakṣita artha tvam uktam tatra uru prathā uru prathasvaḥ iti liṅgāt eva prathana viniyoge mantrasya siddhe kāmam tat vidhāyakam vacanam anarthakam bhavatu prāpta anuvādaka tvāt na tu pratīyamānaḥ mantrāt arthaḥ tyaktum yuktaḥ tat kim vacanam anarthakam eva na anarthakam pratipanna artha viṣayam tu tat artha vāda artham vā tat vacanam yajñapatim eva tat prathayati iti yat anena mantreṇa puroḍāśam prathayati tat yajña patim yajamānam eva prajayā paśubhiḥ prathayati iti kvacid tu guṇa artha vidhānam yathā tām caturbhiḥ ādatte iti evam agnīt agnīn viharaḥ iti ādau api draṣṭavyam 
[I,683,iii_I,683,iv]	yat tu niyata pada krama tvāt uccāraṇa mātra upayoginaḥ mantrāḥ iti tat api asādhu mīmāṃsakānām anādi tvāt vedasya tad krama laṅghana anupapatteḥ yathā uktam anyathā karaṇe ca asya bahubhyaḥ syāt nivāraṇam iti asmākam api yādṛś īśvara praṇītaḥ tad anyathā karaṇe kim adhyetṝṇām svātantryam asti tasmāt na artha vivakṣāyai mantra kramaḥ prabhavati brāhmaṇa vākya krama vat 
[I,683,v]	yat api catvāri śṛṅgāḥ iti avidyamāna artha vacanam āśaṅkitam tat api anabhijña tayā yajñasya vā eṣa guṇa vādena saṃstavaḥ catvāri śṛṅgāḥ iti vedāḥ uktāḥ trayaḥ asya pādāḥ iti savanāni dve śīrṣe iti dampatī ya jamānau sapta haḥ tāsaḥ iti chandāṃsi tridhā baddhaḥ iti mantra brāhmaṇa kalpaiḥ nibaddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ iti kāmān varṣati roravīti iti stotra śastra prayoga bāhulyāt śabdāyamānaḥ mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti manuṣya kartṛkaḥ iti evam eṣa yajñaḥ stutaḥ bhavati tat yathā cakravāka mithuna stanī haṃsa danta āvalī śaibālakeśī kāśa vasanā iti nadī stūyate 
[I,684,i_I,684,iii]	oṣadhe trāyasva enam iti cetanavat niyoga tasyāḥ stuti arthaḥ śṛṇota grāvāṇaḥ iti prātaranuvāka stutiḥ ittham nāma eṣaḥ prātaranuvākaḥ praśasyaḥ yat acetanāḥ grāvāṇaḥ api śṛṇuyuḥ iti aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam iti guṇavādāt apratiṣedhaḥ tat yathā loke tvam eva me mātā tvam eva me pitā tvam eva me bhaginī tvam eva me bhrātā iti 
[I,684,iv]	yat tu keṣāñcit mantrāṇām arthaḥ na jñāyate iti sa puruṣa aparādhaḥ saṃbhavati na mantra aparādhaḥ artha avagama upāyeṣu bahuṣu satsu api tad anveṣaṇa alasaḥ puruṣaḥ na artham avagacchati na punar mantraḥ atra aparādhyati brāhmaṇa vākya vat upāyataḥ tad artha avagama darśanāt upāyaḥ ca prathamaḥ tāvat vṛddha vyavahāraḥ eva tulya tvāt loka veda śabda arthānām yaḥ eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ te eva vaidikāḥ te eva ca eṣām arthāḥ iti 
[I,685,i]	yadi api ca agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat iti vede kṛtaṇa tvam agni śabdam paṭhanti uttānāḥ vai deva gavāḥ bahanti vanaspate hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaḥ te artham iti laukika vaidikayoḥ śabdayoḥ arthayoḥ ca nānātvam iva āśaṅkyate tathā api tathā tva pratyabhijñānena avadhārya īṣat vikṛtāḥ te eva vede iti laukikī ā iva vyutpattiḥ 
[I,685,ii_I,685,iii]	loka prasiddhi vipratiṣedhe tu śāstra vid prasiddhiḥ pramāṇīkriyate yathā yava mayaḥ caruḥ vārāhī upānahau vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān sañcinoti iti yava varāha vetasa śabdāḥ dīrghaśūka sūkara vañjulakeṣu śiṣṭa prasiddhyāḥ niyamyante na priyaṅgu kṛṣṇa śakuni jambūṣu iti yatra tu śiṣṭa prasiddhiḥ na asti tatra mlecchebhvaḥ api tad artha vyutpattiḥ āśrīyate yathā pika nema tāmarasa śabdeṣu 
[I,685,iv]	mleccha prasiddheḥ api abhāve nigama nirukta vyākaraṇa vaśena dhātutaḥ arthaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ tena āśvina sūkta prakramāt jaraṇa bharaṇa nimittau jarbharītuḥ pharīt iti dvi vacana anta sa rūpau etau śabdau aśvinoḥ vācakau iti gamyate evam anyatra api utprekṣaṇīyam 
[I,686,i_I,686,ii]	tat anena api nimittena na mantrāṇām avivakṣita artha tvam vaktavyam amī tasmāt artha prakaṭana mukhena eva dadhati kriyā artha tvam mantrāḥ na tu paṭhana mātreṇa japa vat na tad dvāreṇa api ślathayitum ataḥ śakyate idam pramāṇa tvam vede sakala puruṣa artha amṛta nidhau 
[I,686,iii_I,686,iv]	idam idānīm parīkṣyate udbhidāḥ yajeta citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ śyenena abhicaran vajeta vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti śrūyate tatra kim udbhida iti citrayā iti agnihotram iti śyenena iti vājapeyena iti guṇa vidhayaḥ ete tat tad karma nāmadheyāni iti kim anena parīkṣitena prayojanam ubhayatra api prāmāṇyam na upapadyate iti tad artham eva idam parīkṣyate 
[I,686,v]	yadi tāvat brīhibhiḥ yajeta dadhnā juhoti iti vat guṇaḥ kaścid udbhid ādi padaiḥ vidhīyate anena dravya viśeṣeṇa yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tadā bhāva arthasya yajya ādeḥ anyatas avagatiḥ mṛgyā anavagata arthe bhāva arthe guṇa vidhānasya anupapanna tvāt āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati agnihotram juhoti iti vidhi antareṇa bhāva arthe codite tatra brīhibhiḥ yajeta dadhnā juhoti iti 
[I,687,i_I,687,ii]	nanu vājapeyena svārājya kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena eva vākyena yāga ākhyaḥ bhāva arthaḥ codayiṣyate guṇaḥ ca tasmin vājapeya ākhyaḥ vidhāsyate iti kaḥ doṣaḥ katham na doṣaḥ artha dvaya vidhānena vākya bheda praṅgāt vājapeyena svārājyam kuryāt iti ekaḥ arthaḥ vājapeyena guṇena yāgam kuryāt iti dvitīyaḥ arthaḥ na ca sakṛt uccaritam vākyam artha dvaya vidhānāya prabhavati 
[I,688,i]	nanu yajeta iti rūpa sāmyāt ubhayatra api sambadhyate yajeta svārājya kāmaḥ vājapeyena ca iti tulyam asya ubhayatra api rūpam na rūpa sāmyasya asiddha tvāt svārājyam prati yajira prāpta tvāt vidhīyate guṇam ca prati prāpta tvāt anūdyate anavagate ca karmaṇi guṇa vidhānam aghaṭamānam iti avaśyam guṇa vidhi pakṣe guṇam prati yajiḥ prāpta tvāt uddeśyaḥ bhavati pradhānam ca saḥ eva svārājyam prati vidheya tvāt upādeyaḥ guṇaḥ ca iti viruddha rūpa āpatteḥ na yajiḥ ubhābhyām yugapad sambaddhum arhati yaḥ svārājyam sādhayitum icchet sa yajeta iti anyat rūpam yadyajeta tat vājapeyena iti anyat rūpam tasmāt bhāva artha prāptau pramāṇa antara apekṣaṇāt guṇa vidhi pakṣe tat apramāṇam vacanam 
[I,688,ii]	atha eṣa doṣaḥ mā bhūt iti nāmadheya pakṣaḥ āśrīyate tadā eṣām udbhida ādi padānām vispaṣṭam eva ānarthakyam yāvat eva uktam bhavati yajeta iti tāvat eva vājapeyena yajeta iti evam ānarthakyāt anyatra api asamāśvāsaḥ 
[I,689,i]	atra ucyate guṇa vidhi pakṣe yathā bhavān āha tathā eva nāmadheya pakṣaḥ eva tu śreyān iti abhyupagamyate tathā hi bhāva arthasya phalam prati karaṇa tvāt tad sāmāna adhikaraṇyena tṛtīyā prayujyate tatra vājapeyena iti sādhyaḥ ca bhavan bhāva arthaḥ karaṇa bhāvam anubhavati iti sādhya tva apekṣayā tad sāmāna adhikaraṇyena kvacid dvitīyā api prayujyate agnihotram juhoti iti 
[I,689,ii]	nanu guṇavat nāma api vidhātavyam eva anabhihitasya anavagamāt tatas ca guṇa vidhi pakṣa spṛśaḥ vākya bheda ādi doṣāḥ tad avasthā eva na etat evam na hi asya karmaṇaḥ idam nāma veditavyam iti saṃjñā saṃjñi sambandham vedaḥ vidadhāti yogena tu kenacid pravartamānam nāmadheyam avagamyate eva udbhedanam anena paśūnām kriyate iti udbhididam 
[I,689,iii_I,689,vi]	dadhi madhu payaḥ ghṛtam dhānāḥ taṇḍulāḥ udakam tat saṃsṛṣṭam prājāpatyam iti nānāvidha vicitra dravya sādhya tvāt citrā agnaye hotram asmin iti agnihotram yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte evam anena dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam ādatte iti artha vādāt śyenaḥ iva śyenaḥ yāgaḥ vājam annam pīyate asmin iti vājapeyaḥ yāgaḥ tasmāt karma nāmāni etāni 
[I,690,i]	yat tu nāmadheya pakṣe nairarthakyam āśaṅkitam tat api na cāru nāma api guṇa phala upalabdheḥ arthavat iti abhiyuktaiḥ parihṛta tvāt evaṃnāma idam karma iti avagamyate tatra guṇaḥ dravya devatā ādiḥ phalam ca tasya svargaḥ paścāt avagamyate iti tasmāt nāmadheya padānām aviruddhaḥ anvayaḥ 
[I,690,ii_I,690,iii]	kvacid punar aprāpte bhāva arthe sa guṇam eva tat karma codyate yathā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ amāvāsyāyām ca paurṇamāsyām cā acyutaḥ bhavati iti yathā vai etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti iti alam śa stra antara udgāra gahana kathā vistareṇa iti na asti nāmadheya dvāreṇa api pramāṇa tā aakṣepaḥ sarva prakāreṇa api siddham veda pramāṇa tvam iti veda prāmāṇyasidhyartham ittham etāḥ kathāḥ kṛtāḥ na tu mīmāṃsakacchātapāra mithyā abhidhānataḥ 
[I,691,i_I,691,iv]	nanu evam vidhi artha vāda mantra nāmadheyānām kārya aupayika tva darśanāt kāryaḥ eva arthe vedaḥ pramāṇam iti uktam syāt tatas kim siddhe arthe tasya prāmāṇyam hīyate tatas api kim bhūyān bhūta artha abhidhāyi grantha rāśiḥ upekṣitaḥ bhavet sakalasya ca vedasya prāmāṇyam pratiṣṭhāpayitum etat pravṛttam śāstram 
[I,691,v]	atra kecid āhuḥ sarvasya eva vedasya kārye arthe prāmāṇyam tathā hi gṛhīta sambandhaḥ śabdaḥ artham avagamayati sambandha grahaṇam ca asya vṛddha vyavahārāt vṛddhānām ca vyavahāraḥ pānīyam ānaya gām badhāna grāmam gaccha iti kārya pratipādakaiḥ eva śabdaiḥ pravartate iti tatra eva vyutpadyante bālāḥ prayojanaḥ ha īśena hi vṛddhāḥ vākyāni prayuñjate na ca siddhārtha abhidhāyinā pravṛtti nivṛttī anupadiśatā śabdena kiñcid prayojanam abhinirvartate iti tasya na prayoga yogya tvam aprayujyamānasya ca na sambandha grahaṇam agṛhīta sambandhasya ca na pratipādaka tvam apratipādakasya ca na prāmāṇyam 
[I,691,vi]	api ca ākhyāta pada uccāraṇam antareṇa nirākāṅkṣa pratyaya anutpādāt avaśyam ākhyāta yuktam vākyam prayoktavyam ākhyāta padena ca sādhya rūpaḥ arthaḥ ucyate nāma padena ca siddhaḥ bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti vākyasya sādhya artha niṣṭhata iti na bhūta artha viṣaye tasya prāmāṇyam atas ca kārye arthe śabdasya prāmāṇyam yatas ca kārya rūpaḥ arthaḥ śabdasya eva viṣayaḥ iti tatra śabdaḥ pramāṇa tām labhate siddhaḥ arthaḥ prasiddha tvāt eva pramāṇa antara pariccheda yogyaḥ iti tad pratipādane tad pramāṇa anta ra sa vyapekṣaḥ śabdaḥ bhavati tatas ca tad grāhiṇaḥ pramāṇa antarasya eva tatra prāmāṇyam syāt na śabdasya śabdaḥ ca tad upasthāpana mātre eva niṣṭhaḥ syāt tasmāt śabda prāmāṇyam icchatā kāryaḥ eva arthe tat prāmāṇyam aṅgīkartavyam iti 
[I,692,i_I,692,ii]	atra ucyate yat brūṣe kāryaḥ eva arthe vākyasya vyutpattiḥ iti tat ayuktam evam hi siddha rūpaḥ ayam tasya arthaḥ iti katham tvayā ucyate na hi alabdha vyutpatteḥ śabdāt artha pratyayaḥ yujyate artha pratītiḥ ca tatas dṛśyate vyutpattiḥ ca tatra na asti iti citram na ca kārya paraiḥ eva śabdaiḥ loke vyavahāraḥ vartamāna upadeśakebhyaḥ api nadī ādi vākyebhyaḥ vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ tatra api vyutpattiḥ bhavati eva 
[I,693,i]	api ca aṅgulī ādinā puras avasthitam artham nirdiśya yadā kaścid kathayati asya idam nāma iti tadā kārya upadeśam antareṇa api bhavati eva vyutpattiḥ asmāt śabdāt ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti kārya upadeśaḥ eva asau iti ced na tādṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt asya idam nāma iti hi śrūyate na asmāt ayam pratipattavyaḥ iti asya idam nāma iti eṣām eva akṣarāṇām eṣaḥ arthaḥ iti ced na apadārthasya kyārtha tva ayogāt na ca evam kalpayitum api śakyate asya idaṃna me iti etāvatā eva tad pratipatti siddheḥ pratipatti kartavya tā abhidhānasya niṣprayojana tvāt 
[I,693,ii_I,693,iii]	kārya parāt api śabdāt vyutpattiḥ bhavantī na vākya artha mātra paryavasāyinī bhavati kintu eka eka pada āvāpa udvāpa dvāraka padārtha paryantā sā bhavati padārtha vyutpatti saṃskṛta mateḥ ca abhinavaka vi viracita vartamāna upadeśa śloka śravaṇe api vākya artha pratītiḥ dṛśyate eva iti na avyutpatti kṛtam aprāmāṇyam na ca asau bhūta artha pratipādaka śabda janitā pratītiḥ bādhyate sandigdhā vā yena pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa antara karaṇaka pratīti vat pramāṇa phalam eva sā bhavitum arhati 
[I,693,iv]	yat punar abhyadhāyi kārye arthe pramāṇa antara nirapekṣa tayā pramāṇam bhavati śabdaḥ bhūta arthe tu na iti tat asat śabdasya pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tvānapāyāt pramāṇa antareṇa anavagate hi arthe śabdaḥ pravartayitum eva na śaknoti iti avocāma vakṣyāmaḥ ca vākya artha cintāyām api pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tvam tasya pratyuta prāmāṇyam āvahati na pratihanti 
[I,694,i]	kiñca idam sa apekṣa tvam iti vaktavyam kim siddhārtha abhidhāyinaḥ śabdasya utpattau eva pramāṇa antara sāpekṣa tvam uta tad viṣayasya pramāṇa antara pariccheda yogya tvam iti ubhayathā atiprasaṅgaḥ utpattau pramāṇa anta ra savyapekṣa tayā yadi aprāmāṇyam varṇyate hanta hatam anumānam tasya utpattau pratyakṣa ādi sāpekṣa tvāt varṇitam ca tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti tad viṣayasya pramāṇa antara grahaṇa ayogya tāyām tu tad aprāmāṇye pratyakṣa ādīnām sarveṣām aprāmāṇyam prāpnoti pramāṇa saṃplavasya prāk pratipādita tvāt 
[I,694,ii]	api ca vidhi yukteṣu api vaidikeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu adhīṣva gām vadhāna grāmam gacchaḥ iti evamādiṣu anvaya vyatirekābhyām hita ahita prāpti parihāra sādhana sāmarthya avagamena pravṛtti siddheḥ viniyoga mātra niṣṭhaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhavati apravṛtta pravartana ātmaka nirapekṣa nija vyāpāra vaidhuryāt kārya paratva anupapatteḥ anuvāda mātram vidhivacanam iti kārya artha prāmāṇya vādinām sarvam eva laukikam vākyam apramāṇam syāt 
[I,695,i]	ye tu bhūta artha vādiṣu laukika vākyeṣu pravṛtti nivṛtti kāriṣu vidhi niṣedhau kalpayanti te nitarāmṛjavaḥ śrūyamāṇaḥ api vidhiḥ anuvādībhavati yatra tatra aśrutaḥ kalpyate iti kim anyat atas parama ārjavam pravṛttau tu tatra vidhiḥ aprayojakaḥ eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām puruṣa artha sādhana sāmarthya avagamāt puruṣa pratyayāt vā lokeṣu pravṛtti siddheḥ 
[I,695,ii]	tatra etat syāt laukika vākyānām vivakṣā paratvāt na kārya artha tvam yathā uktam api ca pauruṣeyāt vacanāt eva mayam puruṣaḥ veda iti bhavati pratyayaḥ na evam artha tā iti vaidikāni punar mapauruṣeya tayā kārya parāṇi eva vākyāni iti etat api na peśalam apauruṣeyasya vacasaḥ pratikṣipta tvāt vede api kartuḥ īśvarasya sādhita tvāt 
[I,695,iii]	na ca puruṣa vacanam api vivakṣā param iti darśitam tathā hi na vivakṣā vākya arthaḥ devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām daṇḍena iti pada grāme vivakṣā vācinaḥ padasya aśravaṇāt apadārthasya vākya artha tva anupapatteḥ na ca viṣaya bhakṣaṇa vākyasya iva para gṛhe bhojana nivṛttau pauruṣeya vacasaḥ vivakṣāyām tātparyaśaktiḥ api prabhavati na hi sarva ātmanā abhidhātrīm śaktim avadhīrya eva tātparyaśaktiḥ prasarati iti na vivakṣā paratvam 
[I,696,i_I,696,ii]	katham tarhi puruṣa vacanāt uccāritāt vivakṣā avagamaḥ iti ced anumānāt iti brūmaḥ kāryatvāt pada racanāyāḥ puruṣa icchā pūrvaka tvam anumīyate artha avagama purassaram ca puruṣa vacanāt vivakṣā anumānam evam ayam veda evam ayam vivakṣati iti artha uparāga rahitasya vivakṣā mātrasya jīva tām nisargataḥ eva siddheḥ ayam arthaḥ asya vivakṣitaḥ iti artha uparajyamānā tu vivakṣā na śakyāḥ arthe anavagate avagantum arthaḥ ced prathamam avagataḥ vākyāt na tarhi tat vivakṣā param artha param eva bhavitum arhati loka vākyānām vivakṣā paratve bāhye arthe sambandha grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt vedāt api vākya artha a agamaḥ na syāt iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt na kārya paratvena eva śabdasya prāmāṇyam 
[I,696,iii]	yat punar abhāṇi na ākhyāta śūnyam vākyam prayoga arham tena vinā naiḥ ākāṅkṣya anupapatteḥ ākhyātasya ca bhavya rūpaḥ arthaḥ na nāmnaḥ iva bhūtaḥ bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe ca bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti sarvatra kārya paratvam iti tat api na sāṃpratam putraḥ te jātaḥ kanyā te garbhiṇī iti sukha duḥkha kāriṇām anupadiṣṭa pravṛtti nivṛttikānām anākhyātānām api vākyānām loke prācuryeṇa prayujyamāna tvāt 
[I,697,i]	atha sukhī bhava duḥkhī bhavaḥ iti tatra kārya paratvam vyākhyāyate tat api na yuktam īdṛśānām akṣarāṇām aśravaṇāt kalpanāyāḥ ca niṣphala tvāt na hi sukhī bhavaḥ iti upadeśāt asau sukhī bhavati sukhī bhavitum vā kvacid pravartate upāye pūrvam eva pravṛtta tvāt upeye ca pravṛtti anupapatteḥ kintu putra janma śravaṇataḥ eva asau sukhībhavati 
[I,697,ii_I,697,iii]	tathā kasyacid uttarīya avaguṇṭhita tanoḥ nidrāyamāṇasya kvacid kenacid kelinā rajju veṣṭita vapuṣaḥ paścāt prabodha samaye sahasā sarīsṛpa valitam ātmānam manyamānasya bhayāt anunmīlita cakṣuṣaḥ kenacid prayujyamānam rajvā veṣṭitaḥ asi iti vacaḥ śravaṇa patham avatarati tat siddhārtha bodhakam api pramāṇam na ca tatra mā bhaiṣīḥ iti prayoga kalpanāyāḥ prayojanam rajju veṣṭana pratyayāt eva bhaya nivṛtteḥ siddha tvāt tathā ca viṣama viṣa dhara adhiṣṭhitaḥ ayam adhvā nidhi yuktaḥ ayam bhū bhāgaḥ iti bhūtārtha khyāpakam vacaḥ dṛśyate na ca tad apramāṇam na ca tatra mā gāḥ tvam anena adhvanā nirdhi gṛhāṇa iti vidhi niṣedha paratvam yuktam eṣām padānām aśravaṇāt 
[I,697,iv]	nanu vaktuḥ prekṣā pūrva kāri tayā niṣprayojana vacanānuccārāt avaśyam mā gāḥ gṛhāṇaḥ iti kārya akṣarāṇi hṛdaye parisphuranti kathañcid ālasya ādinā na uccaritāni iti na etat yuktam prekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt eva vaktuḥ yathā avasthita vastu svarūpa bhātra khyāpaka vacana uccāraṇam eva yuktam arthāt pravṛtti nivṛttyoḥ siddha tvāt para abhiprāyasya ca anavasthita tvena niyata upadeśa anupapatteḥ sarpa bandha jīvinaḥ hi sa pannagaḥ eva panthāḥ upādeyatayā avabhāti vīta rāgasya ca brahma vidaḥ vitteṣaṇā vyutthitasya govindasvāminaḥ iva nidhiḥ api heya tayā parisphurati iti kasmai kim upadiśyatām vastu svarūpe tu kathite yathā hṛdaya varti rāga dveṣa anuvartanena kaścid tatra pravartatām kaścid tatas nivartatām iti bhūtārtha kathanam eva loke prekṣāvān karoti na vidhi niṣedhau prayoktum arhati iti 
[I,698,i]	ye api bruvate sarvatra pratipatti kartavya tā vidhānam eva ādau veditavyam avidhikasya vākyasya prayoga anarha tvāt iti te api na sādhu budhyante vidita śabda artha sambandhasya puṃsaḥ śabda śravaṇe sati pratipatteḥ svatas siddha tvena anupadeśya tvāt asiddhāyām vā pratipattau pratipatti kartavya tā api kutas pratīyeta 
[I,698,ii]	nanu kārya artha pratipādakam padam antareṇa pada antarāṇi saṃsargam eva na bhajante kārya akāṅkṣā nibandhana tvāt sambandhasya tena sarvatra kārya paratvam ucyate na eṣa niyamaḥ kārya akāṅkṣā garbhaḥ eva sarvatra sambandhaḥ iti vartamāna apadeśakānām api prekṣā pūrva kāri vākyānām itaretara saṃsṛṣṭa artha pratīti janaka tva darśanāt na hi daśa dāḍima ādi vākya sadṝṃśi vartamāna apadeśīni vacāṃsi bhavanti kārya nibandhane hi sambandhe tad rahitānām ananvayaḥ eva syāt darśitaḥ ca anvayaḥ pūrva udāhṛta vākyānām 
[I,699,i_I,699,ii]	api ca liṅanta pada yukte api vākye pada antara arthānām parasparam anvayaḥ dṛśyate eva sa katham samarthayiṣyate kārya akāṅkṣā nibandhane hi kārye sarveṣām anvayaḥ na parasparam iti bruvan brūyāt sarvathā kārya saṃbandhe prathamam avagate sati paścāt aruṇa eka hāyanī nyāyena vākyīyaḥ paraspara anvayaḥ api setsyati iti hanta tarhi paraspara anvaye kārya akāṅkṣā kāraṇam tarhi aruṇayā piṅga akṣyāḥ eka hāyanyā somam krīṇāti iti dravya guṇayoḥ vibhaktyā soma krayam prati yukta tvāt prathamam kraya saṃbandhaḥ eva tayoḥ gamyate yaḥ ca pāścātyaḥ paraspara anvayaḥ tatra kārya pāratantrī a āpādikā vibhaktiḥ akāraṇam asatyām api tasyām śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇya prayogeṇa anvaya siddheḥ tasmāt kārya aikya nibandhanaḥ anvayaḥ iti niyamaḥ yaḥ ucyate sa kalpanā mātra prabhavaḥ na pramāṇa vṛtta gamyaḥ iti 
[I,700,i_I,700,ii]	yat tu bhūta bhavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti ayam api na sārvatrikaḥ niyamaḥ viparyayasya api brīhīn prokṣati ityādau darśanāt alam vā darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa niveśa an ujjñita kārya mukha prekṣaṇa dainyena brīhi prokṣaṇa udāharaṇena ātmā jñatavyaḥ iti tu siddha paraḥ eva sādhya upadeśaḥ na hi atra karma kiñcid sādhyam pradhānam upadiśyate adhikāra aśravaṇāt na ca viśva jit ādi vat adhikāra kalpanā kācid upapadyate na ca karma pravṛtti hetu tvam ātma jñānasya iti vakṣyāmaḥ 
[I,700,iii]	arthavādaḥ tu artha vādaḥ eva na adhikāri kalpanāya prabhavati tasmāt apahata pāṣma ādi guṇa yukta ātma svarūpa niṣṭha tvam eva tatra avatiṣṭhate tasmin avagate puruṣa antara prārthanā dainya anupapatteḥ saḥ eva hi uttamaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ sa ca siddhaḥ eva na sādhyaḥ yatnaḥ tu kṛtabuddhīnām avidyā uparamāya eva iti vyācakṣate 
[I,701,i]	jñātavyaḥ iti pratipatti kartavya tāparaḥ ayam vidhiḥ iti ced na pratipatteḥ pramiti tvāt pramiteḥ ca prameya niṣṭha tvāt jñātavyaḥ iti ca karmaṇi kṛtya pratyaya nirdeśāt karmaṇaḥ ca īpsitatama tvāt tad paratvam eva avagamyate vidhiḥ tatra prasaran api kva prasaret phalam tāvat vidheḥ na viṣayaḥ eva yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ phala aṃśe bhāvanāyāḥ ca pratyayaḥ na vidhāyakaḥ iti upāyaḥ tu jñānam eva jñānam ca jñeya niṣṭham iti uktam 
[I,701,ii]	yaḥ tu yama niyama ādi pratipatti iti kartavya tā prakāra upadeśaḥ saḥ api tathāvidhātma rūpa adhigataye satya asatya svabhāva nāma rūpa prapañca vilāpana dvāreṇa tatra upayujyate iti siddha sādhyam 
[I,702,i]	tiṣṭhatu vā yama niyama prāṇāyāma pratyāhāra dhāraṇa ādi ātma jñāna upayogī iti kartavya tā vidhiḥ anye api jyotiṣṭoma ādi vidhayaḥ tad niṣṭhā eva iti vedānta vādinaḥ sādhyasya sarvasya kṣayitvena anupādeya tvāt siddhasya brahmaṇaḥ eva anādya vidyā atītasya anapāyinaḥ puruṣa artha tvāt stoka stoka prapañca vilāpana dvāreṇa uttama adhikāra yogya tva āpādanāt brahma prāptayaupayikāḥ eva sarva vidhayaḥ tathā ca manuḥ svādhyāyena brataiḥ homaiḥ traividyena ijyayā sutaiḥ mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ iti
[I,702,ii]	tat evam siddhaḥ eva arthe vedasya āduḥ pramāṇa tām sarvāḥ hi vidhayaḥ brahma prāpti paryavasāyinaḥ āstām vā ayam viṣayaḥ bahu vaktavyaḥ pramāṇa tā tu girām siddhe kārye ca arthe tulyā eva pramiti tulya tvāt 
[I,703,i]	kim tantra tā bhavati kasya tayoḥ iti iyam carcā cirāya na mahatī upayujyate naḥ saṃtoṣa vṛttim avalambya vayam hi veda prāmāṇya mātra kathatāya gṛhīta yatnāḥ prāmāṇya sādhana vidha abupa yogi yat ca vaktavyam atra tad avādi yathā upayogam vaktavyam iṣṭam api kiñcid iha abhidadhmaḥ tat śrūyatām yadi na dhīḥ parikhidyate vaḥ 
[II,3,i_II,3,ii]	prapannāya vipannānām duḥkhitānām sukha ātmane saṃpūrṇāya dṛḍha āśānām namaḥ kāraṇa bandhave atha yat uktam vāstavasya śabda arthasya avidyamāna tvāt artha asaṃsparśinaḥ śabdāḥ iti tat pratividhīyate 
[II,4,i]	dvividhaḥ śabdaḥ padam vākyam ca tatra padārtha pūrvaka tvāt vākya arthasya prathamam padārthaḥ nirdiśya nirūpyate 
[II,4,ii]	padam ca dvividham nāma ākhyātam ca upasarga nipāta karma pravacanīyānām api nāmasu evau antarbhāvam ācakṣate tat uktam suptiṅantam padam iti iha api sūtrakṛt āha te vibhaktti antāḥ padam iti tatra tiṅanta padārtha cintā vākya artha vicāra avasaraḥ eva kariṣyate tad aupayika tvāt subantānām tu arthaḥ ayam ucyate 
[II,5,i_II,5,ii]	te ca caturvidhāḥ subantāḥ padātmānaḥ śabdāḥ bhavanti jāti śabdāḥ kriyā śabdāḥ guṇa śabdāḥ dravya śabdāḥ iti tatra gavā ādi jāti śabdānām go tva ādi jāti avacchinnam vyakti mātram arthaḥ yaḥ tat vān iti naiyyāyika gṛhe gīyate 
[II,5,iii]	nanu śukla ādi guṇa adhikaraṇam kriyā āśrayaḥ ca dravyam vyaktiḥ sāsnādi avayava sanniveśa ātmikā ākṛtiḥ śābaleya ādi sakala go piṇḍa sādhāraṇam rūpam jātiḥ iti vyaktti ākṛti jāti sannidhāne samuccāritaḥ eṣa go śabdaḥ katham itara tiraskāreṇa tadvat mātra vacana tām abalambeta 
[II,5,iv]	āha vitatā khalu iyam kathā carcayiṣyate tāvat idam tu cintyatām jāteḥ eva pramāṇa atīta tvena śaśaśṛṅga vat avidyamāna tvāt katham tadvān padārthaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[II,6,i_II,6,ii]	tathā hi na tāvat sāmānya grahaṇa nipuṇa m akṣa jam jñānam bhavitum arhati tasya pūrva aparān anusyūta sva lakṣaṇa mātra pariccheda parisamāpta vyāpāra tvāt samāna vṛtti tā nāma sāmānyasya nijam vapuḥ katham spṛśati sa apekṣam anapekṣā akṣajā matiḥ 
[II,6,iii_II,6,iv]	samāneṣu ākaliteṣu tad vṛtti sādhāraṇa rūpam avadhāya sāmānyam gṛhyate iti sa apekṣam tad svarūpa grahaṇam iyam ca prathama nayana sannipāda samudbhūtā matiḥ pūrva apara anusandhāna bandhyā nirapekṣā katham tad grahaṇāya prabhavet tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ tu vikalpāḥ svabhāvataḥ eva vastu saṃsparśa kauśala śūnya ātmāna iti tad viṣayīkṛtasya api sāmānyasya na parama artha sattvam bhavitum arhati 
[II,6,v]	na ca anumānam śabdaḥ vā sāmānya svarūpa vāstava tva vyavasthāpana sāmarthyam aśnute śabda liṅgayoḥ vikalpa viṣaya tvena vastu grāhi tvā asaṃbhavāt tad prāpti ādi vyavahāraḥ tu prakāra antareṇa darśayiṣyate 
[II,7,i]	atas ca na vyakti vyatiriktam sāmānyam bhadena anupalam bhāt tathā hi kuvalaya āmalaka bilva ādīni kara tala vartīni pṛthak avalokyante na jāti vyaktī iti na tayoḥ bhedaḥ 
[II,7,ii]	deśa bhedasya ca agrahaṇāt yatas khalu yatas atiriktam tat tad adhiṣṭhi tadeśa vyatirikta deśa adhiṣṭhānam avadhāryate ghaṭāt iva paṭaḥ na ca evam jāti vyaktī iti na tayoḥ bhedaḥ 
[II,7,iii]	atas ca evam tad agrahe tad budhya bhāvāt yat hi yatas vyatiriktam tat tasmin agṛhyamāṇe api gṛhyate ghaṭāt iva paṭaḥ na ca vyaktau anupalabhyamānāyām jātirūpalabhyate tasmāt na tatas asau bhidyate 
[II,7,iv_II,7,v]	tad vṛtti tvāt sāmānyasya tat agrahe tad anupalabdhiḥ iti ced na vṛtti anupapatteḥ kim pratipiṇḍam kārtsyena vartate jātiḥ uta eka deśena iti dvayam api ca anupapannam piṇḍe sāmānyam ekatra yadikātsnyena vartate tatra eva asya samāpta tvāt na syāt piṇḍa antare grahaḥ eka deśena vṛttau tu go tva jātiḥ na kutracid samagrā asti iti go buddhiḥ pratipiṇḍam katham bhavet 
[II,8,i]	jāteḥ ca niravayava tvāt na kecid ekaśāḥ santi yaiḥ eṣā pratipiṇḍam varteta na ca ekatra piṇḍe samāpya vartamānā piṇḍa antare samāpya eva vartitum arhati samāptasya punar utpattim vinā samāpti antara anupapatteḥ tathābhūtasya ca vṛtti prakārasya kvacid api adarśanāt 
[II,8,ii]	yā ca samavāya ātmikā piṇḍeṣu vṛttiḥ sāmānyasya aulūkyaiḥ ucyate tām api na budhyāmahe vayam ayuta siddhānāmādhārya ādhāra bhūtānām yaḥ sambandhaḥ ihapratyaya hetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ iti yat ucyate tad vipratiṣiddham ayutasiddha tā ca sambandhaḥ ca iti katham saṅgaccheta pṛthak siddhe hi vastunī kuṇḍabadara vat anyonyam sambandhyete strīpuṃsavat vā ayutasiddha tve tu tad eka tvāt kim kena sambadhyeta na hi aham mayā eva sambadhye 
[II,8,iii]	dravya guṇayoḥ apṛthak siddhayoḥ api sambandhaḥ vidyate eva iti ced tat idam unmattasya unmatta saṃvarṇanam guṇinaḥ api guṇa vyatiriktasya anupalambhāt ayam guṇī rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antara tvena na ātmānam upadarśayati vyatirekam ca tebhyaḥ vāñchati iti citram 
[II,8a,i]	yat api nitya anitya vibhāgena yuta siddheḥ sva śāstre paribhāṣaṇam kṛtam nityānām paramāṇūnām pṛthak gatimat tvam yuta siddhiḥ anityānām tu yuta āśraya samavāyi tvam vibhūnām parasparam ākāśa ādīnām sambandhaḥ eva na asti iti tat api prakriyā mātram nānātvena siddhiḥ niṣpattiḥ jñaptiḥ vā yuta siddhiḥ iti ucyate tad viparyayāt ayuta siddhiḥ aikyena siddhiḥ avatiṣṭhate tathā ca sati sambandhaḥ durvacaḥ 
[II,8a,ii_II,8a,iii]	avayava avayavinoḥ api samavāya ātmā sambandhaḥ evam eva parihartavyaḥ yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ na aniṣpannasya sambandhaḥ niṣpattau yuta siddha tā iti paramāṇu ākāśayoḥ paramāṇu kālayoḥ ca sambandhaḥ iṣyate na ākāśa kālayoḥ anyonyam iti prakriyā eva iyam iti alam avāntara cintanena tasmāt na jāti vyakttyoḥ kācid vṛttiḥ upapadyate 
[II,8a,iv_II,8b,iv]	su śikṣitāḥ tu rūpa rūpi lakṣaṇam ācakṣate jāti vyakttyoḥ sambandham saḥ api na upapadyate rūpa śabdaḥ kim śukla ādi vacanaḥ ākāra vacanaḥ svabhāva vacanaḥ vā śukla ādi vacana tve nīrūpāṇām pavana manaḥ prabhṛtīnām dravyāṇām guṇa karmaṇām ca sāmānya śūnyatā syāt ākāra vacana tve api avayava sanniveśa rahitānām teṣām eva guṇa ādīnām sāmānyavat tā na prāpnoti svabhāva vacana tve tu jāti jātimatoravyatirekaḥ eva bhavet avabhāti hi bhedena svabhāvaḥ na sva bhāvinaḥ śabda atirikta tā eva iyam na tu vastu atirikta tā 
[II,8b,v_II,8b,vii]	kiṃca idam rūpam nāma kim vastu eva vastu dharmaḥ vastu antaram vā vastu antaram tāvat na pratibhāti iti uktam vastu dharmaḥ api tad vyatiriktayā sthitaḥ na cakāsti eva avyatireke ca sambandha vācaḥ yuktiḥ anupapanna iti uktam na ca rūpa rūpi tva lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyoga samavāya vyatiriktaḥ kaḥ api śrotriyaiḥ vivicya vyākhyātum śakyate yathā īdṛś iti tasmāt vācā uyukti nūta natā mātram iha kṛtam na tu arthaḥ kaścid utprekṣyate iti alam prasaṅgena 
[II,8b,viii]	api ca iyam jātiḥ sarva sarva gatā vā syāt piṇḍa sarva gatā api vā sarva sarva gata tve syāt karkā ādau api gomatiḥ aśvadhīḥ śābaleya ādau uṣṭra buddhiḥ gaja ādiṣu padārtha saṅkaraḥ ca evam atyantāya prasajyate 
[II,8c,i]	atha api vyakti sāmarthya niyamāt na eṣa saṅkaraḥ na hi karkādi piṇḍānām go tva ādi vyakti kauśalam mā evam khaṇḍa ādi abhivyaktam api go tvam anaṃśakam sarvatra eva pratīyeta na vā sarva gatam bhavet tad deśa grahaṇe tasya na hi kiñcid niyāmakam dīpa vat vyaṃjakaḥ piṇḍaḥ na tu tad piṇḍa vṛtti tat sarvatra āgṛhyamāṇam ca sarvatra asti iti kaḥ nayaḥ sarva sarva gatam tasmāt na go tvam upapadyate piṇḍa sarva gata tve tu kāmam etat adūṣaṇam kintu na eva adya jātāyām gavi go pratyayaḥ bhavet 
[II,8c,ii]	piṇḍe na āsīt asaṃjāte jātiḥ jāte ca vidyate saṃkrāmati na ca anyasmāt piṇḍāt anyatra niṣkriyā āyāti api na tam piṇḍam apa ujjhati purātanam na ca aṃśaiḥ vartate tatra kaṣṭā vyasana santatiḥ 
[II,8d,i_II,8d,iii]	bhāṭṭāḥ tu bruvate bhinna abhinnam ekam vastu anuyāyi ca vyāvṛttam ca yat tasya anugāmi rūpam tat sāmānyam yat vyāvṛttam sa viśeṣaḥ tathā hi sarva vastuṣu buddhiḥ ca vyāvṛtti anugama ātmikā jāyate dvi ātmaka tvena vinā sā ca na sidhyati kevala viśeṣa ātmaka padārtha pakṣe sāmānya pratīteḥ anālambana tvam sāmānya mātra vāde ca viśeṣa buddheḥ anupapattiḥ na ca api anyatarā bhrāntiḥ upacāreṇa vā iṣyate dṛḍha tvāt sarvadā buddheḥ bhāntiḥ syāt bhrānti vādinām na hi mihira marīci nicaya nīra pratīti vat sāmānya pratyaya upamardena viśeṣa pratītiḥ viśeṣa pratyaya upamardena vā sāmānya pratītiḥ udeti kintu avirodhena eva yugapad ubhaya avabhāsaḥ atas eva nirvikalpa bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇam upeyate 
[II,8d,iv_II,9,ii]	tat etat abhidhīyamānam eva na manojñam iva ābhāti nānā rūpa tvam ekasya aviruddham vadatā svayam dūṣaṇa ākhyāna maukharyam asmākam apavāritam tat eva sāmānyam saḥ eva viśeṣaḥ tat eva ekam tat eva nānā tat eva nityam tat eva anityam tat eva asti tat eva na astim iti jaina ucchiṣṭam idam ucyate ucyamānam api na śobhate dṛṣṭa tvāt na virodhaḥ ced na tathā tad avedanāt uktam hi na anuvṛtta artha grāhiṇī netra dhīḥ iti vicitra vikalpa prabandha vipralubdha buddhayaḥ khalu evam manyante bhavantu te na tu ekam vastu bahu rūpam bhavitum arhati 
[II,9,iii]	ekam hi vastunaḥ rūpam itarat kalpanā mayam na anuvṛtta vikalpeṣu visraṃbhaḥ ucitaḥ satām drāgitaḥ hi anya saṃsparśanaiḥ apekṣyeṇa dṛśyate sva lakṣaṇam atas bhadaḥ tāttvikaḥ anugamaḥ mṛṣā dṛḍhādṛḍha tvam akṣuṇṇam aparīkṣya eva saṃvidām dvaya pratīti mātreṇa dvayā abhyupagamaḥ bhramaḥ na na iti pratyayāt eva mithyātvam kevalam dhiyām kintu yukti parīkṣā api kartavyā sūkṣma darśibhiḥ 
[II,9,iv_II,10,ii]	na ca ekam śabalam vastu nirvikalpaka gocaraḥ vyakti antara anusandhānāt vinā anugamadhīḥ kutas yeṣu anugatam teṣu buddhyā ananusandhīyamāneṣu tad vṛtti sāmānya grahaṇa asaṃbhavāt na ca anusandhāna sāmarthyam buddheḥ asti atas eva na te samyak adhyakṣa ja jñāna vedinaḥ abheda vṛtti pratyakṣam āhuḥ advaita vāñchayā tasmāt bheda aviṣaya tvāt pratyakṣasya na tad gamyam sāmānyam 
[II,10,iii_II,10,v]	nanu evam apahnūyamāne sāmānye gaugauḥ iti śābaleya ādiṣu yaḥ ayam anu vṛttaḥ pratyayaḥ sa katham samarthayiṣyate uktam atra vikalpa mātram eṣa pratyayaḥ vikalpāḥ ca na artha adhīna janmānaḥ iti tathā ca para parikalpiteṣu sattā ādi sāmānyeṣu api sāmānyam iti anuvṛtta vikalpāḥ pravartante eva na ca sāmānyeṣu sāmānya antarāṇi saṃbhavanti nissāmānyāni sāmānyāni iti abhyupagamāt aupādhikaḥ eṣa sāmānyeṣu anugata vikalpaḥ iti ced āyuṣman gavā ādiṣu api kam cit upādhi viśeṣam abalambya gaugauḥ iti anusyūta bikalpaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[II,11,i_II,11,ii]	kaḥ punar asau upādhiḥ iti ced eka artha kriyā kāritvam iti brūmaḥ yat eva vāha doha ādi kāryam ekena ja nyate gopiṇḍena tat eva anyaiḥ iti teṣu anuvṛtta dhīḥ 
[II,11,iii_II,11,v]	nanu prativyakti kāryam bhinnam eva satyam bheda budhya bhāvāt ca tat ekam iti upacaryate karkā ādi kāryāt anya tvam yathā hi etasya dṛśyate na tathā khaṇḍa kāryasya muṇḍa kāryāt vibhinna tā nanu tathā mā bhūt na tu abhinnam eva khaṇḍa muṇḍayoḥ kāryam bāḍham darśanam eva tarhi tayoḥ ekam bhaviṣyati tat ca abhinnam 
[II,11,vi_II,12,i]	nanu darśanam api prativyakti bhinnam eva satyam sva pṛṣṭha bhāvi pratyavamarśa ākhya kārī aikyāt ekam iti ucyate yathā eva śābaleya ādi piṇḍa darśane sati gauḥ iti anantaram avamarśaḥ tathā eva bāhuleya piṇḍa darśane api gauḥ iti eva avamarśaḥ iti tat eka tvam ucyate tat uktam eka pratyavamarśasya hetu tvāt dhīra bhedinī ekadhī hetu bhāvena vyaktīnām api abhinnatā iti tasmāt aupādhika tvāt anuvṛtta buddheḥ na sāmānyam kiṃcid vāstavam asti iti 
[II,12,ii_II,12,iii]	tatra āha aniṣyamāṇe sāmānye nanu śabda anumānayoḥ katham pravṛttiḥ sambandha grahaṇa adhīna janmanoḥ na hi vyaktiṣu sambandhaḥ gṛhītum iha śakyate sa hi vyaktiṣu gṛhyeta sarvāsu ekatra vā kvacid na sarvāsu deśa kāla ādi bhedena tat ā ānantyāt aśakyatvāt na ekasyām vyabhicārāt tatas anyatra api sa śabdaḥ pravartamānaḥ dṛśyate agṛhītaḥ sambandhe ca na śabda liṅge pratītim utpādayitum utsahete ucyate syāt etat evam yadi pratyakṣa viṣaye sva sakṣaṇe śabda liṅgayo pravṛttiḥ syāt 
[II,12,iv_II,13,i]	nanu pratyakṣa viṣaye tayoḥ vṛttau aniṣyamāṇāyām anavasthā ādi doṣa upaghātāt apravṛttiḥ eva syāt mā evam vocaḥ katham asakṛt abhihitam api na buddhyase vikalpa viṣaye vṛttiḥ iṣṭā śabda anumānayoḥ avastu viṣayāḥ ca ete vikalpāḥ iti varṇitam 
[II,13,ii_II,13,iii]	nanu vikalpānām api viṣayaḥ yadi anugāmī kaścid na iṣyate tat utsīt etām eva śabda anumāne bāḍham asti vikalpānām anusyūtaḥ viṣayaḥ sa tu na vāstavaḥ kaḥ punar asau iti ced ucyate atad rūpa parāvṛtti svabhāvam abahis gatam bahisstham iva sāmānyam ālambante hi niścayāḥ yā ca bhūmiḥ vikalpānām saḥ eva viṣayaḥ girām atas eva hi śabda artham anya apoham pracakṣate 
[II,13,iv_II,13,v]	tathā hi na vikalpāḥ vastu spṛśanti kutas ekasya artha svabhāvasya pratyakṣasya sataḥ svayam kaḥ anyaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ bhāgaḥ syāt yaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate tasmāt bhrama nimitta samārīpita ākāra antara niṣedhāya teṣām pravṛttiḥ yathā rūpa sādharmya samāropita rajata ākāra nibāraṇāya śuktau pramāṇa antaram pravartate na idam rajatam iti tathā iha api śābaleya ādi sva lakṣaṇe nirvikalpena sarva ātmanā paricchinne kutaścid nimitāt āropitam ago rūpam iva vyavacchiti dam vikalpāḥ agauḥ na bhavati iti na tu goḥ sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇe teṣām vyāpāraḥ prāk eva gṛhīta tvāt 
[II,14,i_II,14,ii]	atha brūyāt nānā viśeṣa nikara kalmāṣita vapuṣaḥ tasya arthasya kiṃcid viśeṣaṇam prāc agṛhītam vikalpaiḥ gṛhyate iti tat api ayukttam nānā viśeṣaṇa nikara rūṣitasya api vastunaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa upakāra śakti vyatirikta ātmanī anupalambhāt tad abhede sati tad viśeṣaṇa upakārya vastu svarūpa grahaṇa velāyām eva tad khacita grahaṇa siddheḥ vikalpa antarāṇām ānarthakyam eva tat ukttam yasya api nānā upādheḥ dhīḥ grāhika arthasya bhedinaḥ tasya api nānā upādhi ātta śaktiḥ na hi atiricyate nānā upādhi upakāra aṅga śakti abhinna ātmanaḥ grahe sarva ātmanā upakāryasya kaḥ bhedaḥ syāt aniścitaḥ iti tasmāt apoha viṣayāḥ śabdāḥ vikalpāḥ ca iti 
[II,14,iii]	nanu apohavādaviṣaye mahatīm dūṣaṇa vṛṣṭim utsasarja bhaṭṭaḥ tathā hi apohaḥ nāma vyāvṛttiḥ abhāvaḥ iṣyate na ca abhāvaḥ svatantra tayā ghaṭa vat avagamyate tat ayamanya āśritaḥ vaktavyaḥ kaḥ ca tasya āśrayaḥ iti cintyam 
[II,15,i]	na tāvat go sva lakṣaṇam āśrayaḥ tasya vikalpa bhū mi tva abhāvāt na api avāntara sāmānyam śābaleya tva ādi tad āśrayaḥ tasya api hi sāmānya ātma tvena apoha svabhāva tvāt abhāvasya ca abhāva āśraya tva anupapatteḥ na ca śābaleya sāmānyam agoni vṛtteḥ āśrayaḥ tat hi aśā baleya nivṛtteḥ āśrayatām pratipadyeta na hi evam upapadyate aśābaleyaḥ na bhavati iti gauḥ kintu śābaleyaḥ aśābaleyaḥ iti aśā baleya vyāvṛttiḥ hi goṣu api bāhuleya ādiṣu asti 
[II,15,ii]	atha śābaleya ādi sva lakṣaṇa samudāyam ago vyāvṛtteḥ āśrayam brūyuḥ saḥ api aghaṭamānaḥ eva samudāyi vyatirekeṇa tasya anupalaṃbhāt samudāyinām ca sva lakṣaṇānām deśa kāla ādi bhedena ānantyātvargīkaraṇam puruṣa āyuṣa śatena api na śakya kriyam iti samudāyaḥ api na tad āśrayaḥ tasmāt sarva sādhāraṇam pratipiṇḍam parisamāptam kim api nūtanam ago vyāvṛtteḥ adhikaraṇam abhidhātavyam tat ca go tvam eva tasmin aṅgīkṛte vā kim ago vyāvṛtti kalpanā āyāsena 
[II,16,i]	api ca na kevalam āśraya abhāvāt tad agrahaṇam kintu yaḥ eva te keci dapohyāḥ ago rūpāḥ turaga ādayaḥ tad agrahaṇe api tad apohaḥ durgrahaḥ eva na ca teṣām ānantyāt grahaṇam saṃbhavati na api vargīkaraṇa nimittam eṣām kiñci dasti aśva ādayaḥ ca vidhi rūpa tayā bhavat mate na gṛhyante kintu anya vyavacchedena eva iti teṣām api vyavaccheda grahaṇe sā eva vārtā iti na idānīm vikalpaiḥ kvacid apohaḥ viṣayīkartum śakyate nirvikalpena ca na kaścid vyavahāraḥ iti sakala yātrā utsāda prasaṅgaḥ 
[II,16,ii]	kiṃca ye ete śābaleya ādi śabdāḥ te sarve eva apoha vāci tva aviśeṣāt paryāyāḥ syuḥ apohya bhedāt adoṣaḥ iti ced na apohānām bheda abhāvāt bhidyamāna tve vā sva lakṣaṇa vat eṣām vastu tva prasaktiḥ 
[II,17,i]	bhavat pakṣe api sāmānya mātra vāci tva aviśeṣāt paryāya tvam samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na sāmānyānām vidhi rūpa tvāt paraspara virahita svabhāva tayā nānā tva avagamāt apohaḥ tu abhāva mātra rūpā viśeṣāt na parasparam bhidyate 
[II,17,ii]	karkā diśā baleya ādi ādhāra bhedāt apoha bhedaḥ iti ced na teṣām ādhāra tvasya nirasta tvāt ādhāra bhedena vā tad bheda abhyupagame pratisva lakṣaṇam apoha bheda prasaṅgaḥ tatas ca sāmānya ātma tā asya hīyeta 
[II,17,iii]	atha apohya bhedena apoha bhedam avadhārya paryāyatā parāṇudyate tat api asāram tadā api apohya bhedāt bhedaḥ na paryāya tvam apahanti bhāktaḥ hi asau na mukhyaḥ 
[II,17,iv_II,18,i]	na ca apohya bhedāt bhedaḥ api apohasya avakalpate yaḥ hi saṃbhāvyamāna saṃsargaiḥ ādhāraiḥ api na bhettum pāryate sa dūra vartibhiḥ alabdha sambandhaiḥ atibāhyaiḥ a pohyaiḥ kathaṃbhidyeta abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ yadi apohya bhedāt apoha bhinna tvam apohya aikyā ttarhi tad aikyena api bhavitavyam atas ca gavā śvayoḥ anya apohena vyavasthāpyamānayoḥ agāvaḥ anaśvāḥ ca hasti ādayaḥ apohyāḥ tulyāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ bhavanti asādhāraṇaḥ tu ekaḥ gauraśve gavi ca aśvaḥ atiricyate tatra eka apohya bhadāt gavāśvayoḥ bhedaḥ bhavatu bhūyasām apohyānām abhedāt abhedaḥ vā bhavatu iti vicāraṇāyām vipratiṣiddha dharma samavāye bhūyasām syāt sadharma tvam iti abhedaḥ eva nyāyyaḥ bhavet 
[II,18,ii_II,18,iii]	atha asādha araṇyāt aśva apohaḥ eva go apohaḥ iṣyate sa tarhi siṃha ādau api asti iti saḥ api idānīm gauḥ bhavet atha aśva ādi viśeṣa uddhoṣa rahitam ago rūpam vyavacchedyam ucyate tat pratyekam grahītum aśakyam ānantyāt vargīkaraṇa kāraṇam ca kiñcid nā asti eva na hi sarveṣām agavām aśva ādīnām eka deśa tvam eka kāla tvam vā samasti 
[II,19,i_II,19,ii]	atha go pratiṣedhaḥ eva vargīkaraṇa hetuḥ iṣyate hanta tarhi gauḥ pūrva siddhaḥ eṣitavyaḥ yat pratiṣedhena āgāvaḥ pratīyeran pūrva siddhe ca gavi labdhe kim agobhiḥ kim vā tad apohena prayojanam pūrva siddham go sva lakṣaṇam asti eva iti ced na tena vyavahāra abhāvāt go sāmānye tu pūrva siddhe mudhā apoha prayatnaḥ iti uktam 
[II,19,iii]	atha go sāmānyamago pratiṣedhena siddhyati tadā dustaram itaretara āśrayam agoniṣedhena go siddhiḥ go siddhyā ca agoniṣedha siddhiḥ iti tasmāt apohyasya eva nirūpayitum aśakyatvāt na tad bhedāt apoha bhedaḥ siddhyati 
[II,19,iv_II,20,i]	api ca aśva ādayaḥ sāmānya rūpeṇa vā apohyeran tad viśeṣa ātmanā vā na viśeṣa ātmanā tad ananta tvāt aśabda vācya tvāt ca sāmānya ātmanā tu teṣām api apoha rūpa tvāt abhāva rūpa tvam katham cā bhāvasya eva abhāvaḥ kriyeta karaṇe vā pratiṣedha dvaya yogāt vidhiḥ avatiṣṭhate iti vidhi rūpaḥ śabda arthaḥ syāt apoha ātmanaḥ ca turaga ādeḥ yaḥ apohaḥ sa tasmāt vilakṣaṇaḥ anyathā vā vailakṣaṇye tasya bhāva ātma tā bhakte availakṣaṇye tu yādṛśaḥ eva apohyaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva tat apohe iti gauḥ api agauḥ syāt 
[II,20,ii]	kiṃca apoha śabda artha pakṣe nīlam utpalam ityādau viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sāmāna adhikaraṇyā ādi vyavahārāḥ vilupyeran na hi ekasmin arthe dvayoḥ apohayoḥ vṛttiḥ upapadyate na ca ekaḥ kaścid arthaḥ asti yatra tayoḥ vṛttiḥ sva lakṣaṇasya aśabda artha tvāt anyasya ca asaṃbhavāt na ca vṛttiḥ api kā cit asti 
[II,20,iii]	sat jñeya ādi śabdānām apohya nirūpaṇa asaṃbhavāt na apoha vāci tvam na hi asat ajñeyam vā kiṃcid avagatam yat vyavacchidyeta jñātam ced sat eva tat jñeyam ca iti atas katham sat śabdena sat eva jñeya śabdena ca jñeyam eva apohyate ajñātam tu na nitarām apohyam katpitam tu tat vaktum aśakyam kalpanayā eva sattvāt jñeya tvāt ca 
[II,20,iv]	apoha śabdasya kim vācyam iti cintyam anapohaḥ na bhavati iti apohaḥ kaḥ ca ayam anapohaḥ katham vā asau na bhavati abhavan vā kim avaśiṣyate iti sarvam avācakam 
[II,21,i_II,21,iii]	pratiṣedha vācinām ca naña ādi padānām kā vārtā atra na bhavati iti na iti kaḥ arthaḥ upasarga nipātānām ca katham apoha viṣaya tvam ākhyāta śabdānām ca pacati ityādīnām apohaḥ durupapādaḥ nāmnām eva jāti śabdānām apoha viṣaya tvam iṣyate yeṣām bhavantaḥ jāti vāci tvam tadvat vāci tvam vā pratipadyante iti ced tatas anyeṣām tarhi kā vārtā bāhya artha vāci tve jāti śabdeṣu kaḥ dveṣaḥ nirālambana tve jñāna aṃśa ābalambana tve vā jāti śabdānām api tat eva astu kim apoha vāda pramādena yathā eva pratibhā mātram vākya arthaḥ iti kalpitaḥ padārthaḥ api tathā eva astu kim apoha agraheṇa vaḥ ityādi dūṣaṇa audāryam apohe bahu darśitam atas śabda artha tām asya vadeyuḥ saugatāḥ katham 
[II,21,iv_II,22,iv]	ucyate tat etat avidita bauddha siddhāntānām abhidhānam apohaḥ yadi bhāva ātmā bahis abhyupagamyate tatas bhavati bhāvat kam vāc jālam na tu asau tathā kintu khalu ayam āntaraḥ jñāna ātmā saugatānām apohaḥ sammataḥ tathā abhyupagame ca iyam apoha vācaḥ yuktiḥ sva aṃśa viṣayam padārtha jñānānām iti etāvat eva vaktum ucitam etat api na asti na ayam āntaraḥ na bāhyaḥ apohaḥ kintu jñāna arthābhyām anyaḥ eva 
[II,22,v_II,22,vi]	nanu yat vidyate na antaḥ na bahis paramārthataḥ tat na vidyate eva iti katham śabda arthaḥ ucyate pāramārthika śabda artha samarthana pipāsitāḥ na iha āgatāḥ smaḥ yena evam anuyujyemahi tvayā yatas eva tat na antar bahis asti tatas eva mithyā iti kālpanikam iti ca gīyate kim punar tat āropitam kiṃcid ākāra mātram vikalpa uparaṃjakam 
[II,22,vii]	nanu bāhya artha vyatirekeṇa kimīya ākāraḥ āntarasya jñānasyas paraṃjakaḥ ucyate dṛśya chāyā eva anuraṃjikā vikalpānām na dṛśyaḥ arthaḥ vyāvṛttam hi vastu darśanānām viṣayaḥ tat ca spraṣṭum akṣamāḥ vikalpāḥ iti uktam atha tad śāyā ām abalambamānāḥ vikalpāḥ vyāvṛttasya agrahaṇāt vyāvṛtti viṣayāḥ ucyante 
[II,23,i]	nanu vyāvṛtti tadvata ura bhedāt yā vyāvṛttiḥ yat ca vyāvṛttam sva lakṣaṇam tat ekam eva iti vyāvṛtti grāhibhiḥ vikalpaiḥ vyāvṛttam api gṛhītam syāt iti darśana tulyāḥ eva te bhaveyuḥ na etat evam na vikalpaiḥ vyāvṛttam vastu gṛhyate na ca pāramārthikī vyāvṛttiḥ api tu kaścid āropitaḥ ākāraḥ vāstava tve hi vyāvṛtteḥ vastu saṃsparśinaḥ ete doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ na tu asau tathā iti uktam 
[II,23,ii]	atas eva yat ke cana paryacūcudan kila vyāvṛtta grahaṇa pakṣe tritaya grahaṇam prāpnoti yat vyāvṛttam yena ca nimittena vyāvṛttam yatas ca vyāvṛttam iti na ca tritaya grahaṇam asti iti atas katham vyāvṛtta grahaṇam iti tat api apāstam bhavati yadi hi vyāvṛttam gṛhṇīmaḥ iti evam ullekhaḥ bhavet vyavahartṛ janasya tadā evam asau paryanuyujyeta na tu evam asti iti acodyam etat 
[II,23,iii]	nanu evam āropita ākāra viṣayāḥ eva vikalpāḥ uktāḥ bhavanti vyāvṛtti viṣaya tva vācaḥ yuktiḥ ananvitā iti uktam samāhitam etat darśana pṛṣṭha bhāvibhiḥ gauḥ ityādi vikalpaiḥ atad kārya parāvṛttāḥ ākārāḥ ullikhyante na hi go vikalpaiḥ atad kāryāṇām aśva ādīnām ullekhaḥ sva lakṣaṇam ca spṛśyate sāmānyam ca vāstavam na asti tasmāt atad kārya parāvṛtti viṣaya tvam eva vikalpānām avatiṣṭhate iti evam yuktyā teṣām apoha viṣaya tvam ucyate na pratipattitaḥ 
[II,24,i_II,24,iii]	nanu atad kārya parāvṛttam iva sajātīya vyāvṛttam api dṛśya svarūpam tatra sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttam api ākāram ullikheyuḥ na hi sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛttī sva lakṣaṇam ca anyat na ca ekatara ākāra ullekhana niyamana hetum utpaśyāmaḥ dhīman mā evam maṃsthāḥ niścaya ātmānaḥ nirvikalpāḥ sajātīya vijātīya vyāvṛtta ākāra ullekhe ca sarva ātmanā tad niścayāt vikalpa antarāṇām śabda antarāṇām ca apravṛttiḥ spāt tathā ca gauḥ iti śabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vijātīya vyāvṛtta ākāra ullekhyā iva vikalpaḥ saṃvedyate na sajātīya vyāvṛtta ullekhī tulya viṣayāḥ ca vikalpaiḥ śabdāḥ iti anya apoha viṣayāḥ te ucyante saḥ ayam āropita ākāraḥ na bahis āropita tvāt eva na antaḥ abodha rūpa tvāt atas ca asau na kiṃcid eva na kiṃcid api bhavan apohaḥ iti phalatas upacaryate atas ca bāhyam apoham āśritya dūṣaṇa upanyāse kaṇṭha śoṣam anubhavan asthāne kliṣṭaḥ devānāṃpiyaḥ 
[II,25,i_II,25,ii]	api ca vikalpa bhūmiḥ arthaḥ vikalpa antara sannidhāpita bhāva abhāva ākṣepī niyata rūpaḥ bāhya sadṛśaḥ ca pratīyate na ca idam rūpa trayam api bāhye vastuni yujyate bāhyasya hi vastunaḥ sva rūpeṇa avagatasya na vikalpa antara upanīta bhāva sambandhaḥ upapadyate vaiyarthyāt na api abhāva sambandhaḥ vipratiṣedhāt niyata rūpa tā ca vikalpa viṣayasya gauḥ eva na aśvaḥ iti evam avagamyamānā vastu antara vyavacchedam antareṇa na avakalpate iti balāt vyavaccheda viṣaya tvam anyathā niyama pariccheda asaṃbhavāt sandigdham ca vastu na gṛhyate evam bāhya vastu viṣaya tve ca niraste vikalpānām ekasya artha svabhāvasya iti nyāyena paunaruktyādabāhya viṣaya tvam khyāyyam abāhyam ca āropitam rūpam tat ca bāhya vat avabhāsate na ca vyāvṛtti chāyam apahāya bāhya āropitayoḥ sādṛśyam anyat asti iti vyāvṛtti viṣayāḥ eva vikalpāḥ phalataḥ bhavanti 
[II,25,iii]	yadi api vidhi rūpeṇa gauḥ aśvaḥ iti teṣām pravṛttiḥ tathā api nīti vidaḥ anya apoha viṣayān eva tān vyavasthāpayanti yathā uktam vyākhyātāraḥ khalu evam vivecayanti na vyavahartāraḥ iti saḥ ayam na antaraḥ na bāhyaḥ anyaḥ eva kaścid āropitaḥ ākāraḥ vyāvṛtti chāyā yogāt apoha śabdarthaḥ ucyate iti iyam asat khyā ati vāda garbhā saraṇiḥ 
[II,26,i]	athavā vikalpa pratibimbakam jñāna ākāra mātrakam eva tat abāhyam api vicitra vāsanā bheda upāhita rūpa bhedam bāhya vat avabhāsamānam lokayātrām bibharti vyāvṛtti chāyā yogāt ca tat apohaḥ iti vyavahiyate sā iyam ātma khyāti garbhā saraṇiḥ 
[II,26,ii]	nanu ubhayathā api vastu viṣaya tva abhāve vikalpānām katham vastuni vyavahartāraḥ pravartante dṛṣṭe api kvacid vastuni tṛṇa ādau pravṛtti abhāvāt arthi tvam tu pravṛtteḥ kāraṇam 
[II,26,iii]	nanu arthi tā vat darśanam api kāraṇam eva arthinaḥ api apaśyataḥ tatra pravṛtti abhāvāt apoha pakṣe ca pravṛttasya vastu prāptiḥ katham iti vaktavyam ucyate pravṛttiḥ tāvat dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ ekīkaraṇa nibandhanā dṛśya darśana anantaram utpanne vikalpe vikalpa tayā na pratipadyate pramātā darśana ānantarya vipralabdhaḥ tu dṛśyam eva gṛhītam manyate tad abhimānena ca pravartate idam tat ekīkaraṇam āhuḥ dṛśya vikalyayoḥ bhedena vastunaḥ dṛśyāt vikalpaḥ yat na gṛhyate na punar bhinnayoḥ abheda adhyavasāyaḥ ekīkaraṇam iṣyate dṛśyāt vibhinnasya vikalpyasya śukteḥ iva rajatasya nirdeṣṭum aśakya tvāt abheda adhyavasāye ca upāya abhāvāt nābheda adhyavasāye darśanam upāyaḥ vikalpa aviṣaya tvāt na vikalpaḥ dṛśya viṣaya tvāt tasmāt bheda anadhyavasāyāt eva pravṛttiḥ 
[II,27,i]	prāptiḥ api dṛśyasya eva artha kriyā kāriṇaḥ vastunaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa tad mūla tvāt kārya prabandhasya dṛśyāt darśanam tatas vikalpaḥ tatas pravṛttiḥ iti artham hi mūlavartinam upalabhya pravartamānaḥ tam āpnoti apavaraka nihita maṇi prasṛtāyām kuñcikā vivara nirgatāyām iva prabhāyām maṇi budhyā pravartamānaḥ yatra tu mūle api arthaḥ na asti tatra vyāmohāt pravartamānaḥ vipralabhyate eva dīpa prabhāyām iva tathā eva maṇi buddhyā pravartamānaḥ 
[II,27,ii_II,28,i]	evam ca bāhya vastu saṃsparśa śūnyeṣu api vikalpeṣu samullikhita iṣu bāhyaḥ arthaḥ mayā pratipannaḥ tatra ca aham pravṛttaḥ sa ca mayā prāptaḥ iti abhimānaḥ bhavati laukikānām na tu ayam artha adhyavasāya mūlaḥ tat uktam yathā adhyavasāyam atattvāt yathā tattvam ca anadhyavasāyāt iti sva pratibhāse anarthe artha adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiḥ iti atra api granthe artha adhyavasāyaḥ bheda an adhyavasāyaḥ eva vyākhyeyaḥ evam dṛśya vikalpya avathau ekīkṛtya pravartate prāpnoti ca artham iti tat evam eva lokasya vyavahāraḥ abakalpate vivekinā api boḍhavyā lokayātrā ca loka vat 
[II,28,ii]	tasmāt vikalpa pratibimbakasya śabda artha tām āhuḥ apoha nāmnaḥ pratīti mārgaḥ tu avivicyamānaḥ janasya jāti bhramam ātanoti yāvān ca kaściṃnniyama prakāraḥ pravartate jātiṣu vṛtti avṛttyoḥ tāvān apoheṣu api tulyaḥ eva bhavati avastu tva kṛtaḥ tu bhedaḥ tulye api bhede śamane jvara ādeḥ kāścid yathā eva oṣadhayaḥ samarthāḥ sāmānya śūnyāḥ api tadvat eva syuḥ vyaktayaḥ kārya viśeṣa śaktāḥ viśeṣaṇa ādi vyavahāra kḷptiḥ tucche api apohe na na yujyate naḥ atas ca mā kāri bhavadbhiḥ eṣā jāti ākṛti vyakti padārtha cintā 
[II,29,i_II,29,ii]	atra abhidhīyate kim jāti ādeḥ bāhyasya śabda arthasya asattvāt apoha pakṣapātaḥ uta pratīti balāt eva iti pratītiḥ tāvat apoha viṣayā bhavadbhiḥ eva na aṅgīkṛtā iti kim atra kalahena 
[II,29,iii_II,29,iv]	na api jāti ādeḥ asattvam indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna bādha san deha rahita pratya yagamya tvāt sva lakṣaṇa vat ādyam eva hi vijñānam artha saṃsparśi cākṣuṣam na tad uttara bhāvi iti kim idam rāja śāsanam 
[II,29,v_II,29,vi]	tat eva astu pramāṇam vā tena api tu avagamyate vyāvṛttam vastunaḥ rūpam na anugāmi iti kā pramā tathā hi nirvikalpaka kālasya ati sūkṣma tvāt kim pratibhāsate kim na pratibhāsate iti katham eṣa kaliḥ āvayoḥ upaśāmyatu bhavān brūte vyāvṛttam eva bhāti iti aham bruve anuvṛttam api pratibhāti iti evam kalahāyamānayoḥ āvayoḥ kaḥ paricchedaḥ na khalu śapathasya krośa pātasya vaiṣa viṣayaḥ tasmāt nirvikalpaka anantara utpanna sthūla kāla kārya paryālocanayā tad vyavasthā kartavyā 
[II,30,i_II,30,iii]	tatra ca bhavet yadi viśeṣa eka viṣayam nirvikalpakam sāmānya adhyavasāyaḥ ayam akasmāt katham udbhavet śābdaḥ eṣa vikalpaḥ iti ced mā evam paśyati anugatam rūpam avijñāte api vācake dākṣiṇātyaḥ iva akasmāt paśyan uṣṭra paraṃparām anavagata śabda artha sambandhaḥ api abhinava aneka padārtha sannidhāne teṣām anugatam ca vyāvṛttam ca paśyati eva rūpam 
[II,30,iv]	api ca prathama akṣi sannipātaḥ eva aṅguli catuṣṭayam avalokyamānam anyaḥ nyagāminā ca rūpeṇa avagamyate tat katham kevala viśeṣa ābalambī cākṣuṣaḥ pratyayaḥ 
[II,30,v]	api ca purāṇa śābaleya piṇḍam avalokayataḥ kāla antare bāhuleyam piṇḍam paśyataḥ pūrda dṛṣṭa śābaleya piṇḍa viṣayam smaraṇam utpadyamānam saṃvedyate tasmāt sāmānyānavagamaḥ na upapadyate anyasmin asādhāraṇe sva lakṣaṇe dṛṣṭe anya smāraṇasya kim vartate asti ca tat tena manyāmahe dṛṣṭam ubhayā anugata rūpam iti 
[II,31,i]	kiṃca vyakti antara darśane api saḥ eva ayam gauḥ iti pratyabhijñāyate tasyāḥ ca prāmāṇyam darśitam darśayiṣyate ca vistarataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhaṅge tasmāt anugata rūpa viṣayā eva sā pratyabhijñā vyakti bhedasya vispaṣṭa siddha tvāt 
[II,31,ii]	yatra ca laghutara parimāṇa tila mudga ādi pracaya sannidhāne vicchinna sikthasva lakṣaṇam na asti tatra anuvṛttam eva rūpam indriyeṇa gṛhyate atas nirvikalpaka velāyām eva vyāvṛtta vat anugata rūpa avabhāsāt na sāmānya apahnavaḥ yuktaḥ prathama akṣa sannipāte api tulya tvam avagamyate nānātvam ca iti sāmānya bhedau dvau api vāstavau 
[II,31,iii]	sāmānyam idam iti evam kutas tatra anupagrahaḥ vyāvṛttam idam iti evam kim vā buddhiḥ sva lakṣaṇe samāna vṛtti sāpekṣam na ca sāmānya vedanam tatra sannihita tvāt tu vyakti vanna anupagrahaḥ samāna vṛtti apekṣa tvāt sāmānyasya anupagrahe viśeṣaḥ api hi mā grāhi vyāvṛttim sa hi apekṣate anuvṛttiḥ hi yeṣu asya kā teṣām grahaṇe gatiḥ vyāvṛttiḥ api yebhyaḥ asya yā teṣām grahaṇe gatiḥ
