[II,109,i]	tat etat ātma pratyakṣam liṅā ādi śravaṇe sati preraṇa avagatiḥ bhavati prathama śrutāt ca liṅā ādeḥ asau na bhavati na ca pramāṇa antareṇa saḥ arthaḥ darśayitum śakyate kuryāt iti asya arthaḥ kuryāt iti anena eva pratipādyate na prakāra antareṇa iti evam vyutpattau saṃbhavantyām api yaiḥ agṛhīta sambandhaḥ eva liṅādiḥ svarūpa sāmarthyena eva prerakaḥ iṣyate te atyanta bhīravaḥ iti upekṣaṇīyāḥ 
[II,109,ii_II,109,iv]	nanu yadi liṅā ādi vyatirekeṇa na anyatas niyogaḥ avagamyate katham asau niyoga śabdāt pratīyate katham vā niyośabdasya nāmnaḥ api arthaḥ pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ syāt ayi sādho na niyogaḥ nipūrveṇa yujinā ghañatena bodhayitum śakyate vyavahāra mātram etat svarūpam ākhyātum āśrīyate yathā tu yajeta iti evamādibhyaḥ śabdebhyaḥ saḥ avagamyate tathā na anyatas iti atas eva na pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ dharmaḥ iti āhuḥ liṅarthaḥ hi niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ saḥ eva dharmaḥ sa ca na pramāṇa antara gamyaḥ iti 
[II,109,v]	nanu liṅarthaḥ preraṇa ātmakaḥ ayam vyākhyātaḥ kārya ātmā ca ayam anuṣṭheyaḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva ca vākya arthaḥ yuktaḥ kārye arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam iti hi mīmāṃsakāḥ tasmāt punar api bhāṭṭa pakṣa vat dvayam āpatati prerakaḥ ca vidhiḥ kārya rūpaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ arthaḥ iti sukha edhitaḥ niranusandhānaḥ iva āyuṣmān evam vyavaharati na hi anyaḥ prerakaḥ anyaḥ ca anuṣṭheyaḥ iti uktam niyogaḥ eva prerakaḥ niyogaḥ eva ca anuṣṭheyaḥ 
[II,110,i_II,110,iii]	katham dvairūpyam asya śabdaḥ vadati iti ced mā evam preraka tvam eva śabda arthaḥ ārtham tu kāryatvam yatas vidhiḥ eva anuṣṭheyatayā avagamyate ācārya ājñām karomi rāja ājñām karomi iti kimartham tarhi viṣaya anuṣṭhānam iti ced na hi ājñā ghaṭa ādi vat sva rūpeṇa kartum śakyā api tu viṣaya dvārakam tad saṃpādanam kamaṇḍulam bibhṛhi iti ācāryeṇa ājñaptaḥ kamaṇḍulam bhṛtvā aacārya ājñām kṛtām manyate kaṭakam gaccha iti rājñā aaptaḥ kaṭakam gatvā rāja ājñām kṛtām manyate saḥ ayam niyogaḥ eva anuṣṭheyaḥ nanu rāja ājñayā karomi iti api vyapadeśaḥ dṛśyate sa ca ananuṣṭheyām eva ājñām darśayati mā evam tatra api ājñā eva anuṣṭheyā preṣāṇa abhiprāyeṇa tṛtīyā nirdeśaḥ iti evam kecid 
[II,110,iv_II,110,v]	anye tu śābdam kāryatvam niyogasya preraka tvam tu arthāt iti ācakṣate anuṣṭheya tā hi tasya nijam rūpam sva siddhaye sa tu niyojyam niyuṃjānaḥ prerakaḥ iti ucyate tat idam kārya tvam aparityakta preraka bhāvam asya avagamyate preraka tvam ca aparityakta kārya bhāvam iti anyatarat atra śābdam rūpam anyatarat ca artham rūpam iti na bhāṭṭaiḥ iva asmābhiḥ pratyaye guruḥ bhāraḥ āropitaḥ 
[II,111,i]	sa ca ayam niyogaḥ pratīyamānaḥ yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ pratīyate yajya ādina asya viṣaya anubandhaḥ dhātunā ucyate svarga kāmaḥ iti adhikāra anubandhaḥ pada antareṇa arpyate tatra ca svarga kāmasya eva adhikāraḥ nirvahati yadi bhāva arthasya svargam prati sādhana tvam avagamyate evam tarhi svarga kāmena eva asau kṛtaḥ bhavati iti svarga kāma pada anvaye prāktanaḥ eva mārgaḥ anumantavyaḥ na punar svarga ādi phala pradarśana pūrvakam vidheḥ pravartaka tvam asvātantrya prasaṅgāt na hi īdṛśam śāstrasya dainyam yat phalam vinā puṃsaḥ pravartayitum na śaknoti iti anyathā yāvajjīvam yajeta iti ādau apravartakam śāstram syāt 
[II,111,ii]	kim yāvajjīvam iti ādi codanāḥ phala śūnyāḥ eva om iti ucyate na hi vidhiḥ phalam ākāṅkṣati api tu niyojyam viṣayam ca kasya niyogaḥ kutra niyogaḥ iti te ete ubhe api ākāṅkṣe paripūrṇe tatra jīvataḥ niyogaḥ yāge ca niyogaḥ iti atas param phala kalpanam puruṣa buddhi prabhavam bhavati na śāstrī iyam kāma adhikāre tu niyojya tā eva anyathā svarga kāmasya na upapadyate iti svargasya sādhya tvam abhyupagatam na punar vidheḥ phala artha tvāt atas eva na tatra vaidhī pravṛttiḥ lipsayā eva pravṛtta tvāt āha ca tasya lipsā arthaṃlakṣaṇāḥ iti sādhya sādhana bhāva pratipādana paryavasitaḥ hi tatra vidhi vyāpāraḥ na prayoga paryavasitaḥ iti 
[II,112,i_II,112,ii]	atas eva śyena ādeḥ adharma tvam tatra hi abhicaran iti śatrā śatrum vaidikena upāyena jighāṃsuḥ adhikārī darśitaḥ tasya na tatra śāstram pravartakam jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na vedaḥ iti evam upāya mātram asya upadiśyate śyenaḥ śyanam kuru iti tu na vidhiḥ prabhavati jighāṃsāyāḥ eva tatra pravartaka tvāt atas śyena ādeḥ adharma tvāt tad vyudāsa artha pada upādānam codanā lakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ dharmaḥ iti kāma adhikāreṣu hi iti kartavya tā aṃśe śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ yathā uktam kratu arthaḥ hi śāstrāt avagamyate iti bhāva artha mātrasya hi karaṇa tvam avagatam itikartavya tā aṃśaḥ tu na karaṇa tva avagati belāyām upanipatitaḥ iti tatra lipsāyāḥ abhāvāt śāstram eva pravartakam 
[II,113,i_II,113,ii]	atas eva agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyāḥ na adharma tvam na hiṃsyāt sarvāḥ bhūtāni iti niṣedhaḥ sāmānya śāstram sāmānya śāstram ca viśeṣa śāstra kroḍīkṛta viṣaya parihāreṇa pravartate iti agnīṣomīyahiṃsāyāḥ śāstrīya tvāt na niṣedha vidhiḥ anartha tām bodhayet iti nanu śyene api śāstrīyā pravṛttiḥ pravartaka tvam hi vidheḥ svarūpam pramāṇa antara vilakṣaṇam na anvaya vyatireka vat sādhya sādhana pratīti mātra paryantaḥ hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ bhavitum arhati iti sarvatra vidheḥ prayoktṛ tva anapāyāt eva mevaceyam pravṛttiḥ śyenena yajeta iti 
[II,113,iii]	ucyate pravartitaḥ aham iti jñāna jananam vidheḥ preraka tvam tata satyam sarvatra tulyam karaṇe ca śyene itikartavya tāyām agnīṣomīye bāhye tu pravṛtti lakṣaṇe bhautike vyāpāre yatra lipsā ādi prakāra antaram asti tatra bhagavati api vidheḥ prayauktṛ śaktiḥ udāste paśu puroḍāśa prayāja vat tatra udāsīne vidhau niṣedha śāstram avataratina hiṃsyāt iti 
[II,113,iv_II,114,i]	yadi tu sarvatra eva prayoktṛ śaktiḥ udāsīnā bhavet tadā jyotiṣṭomān na viśiṣyeta śyenaḥ śāstrīyāyām pravṛttau agnīṣomīya iva niṣedha śāstrasya anavakāśāt jyotiṣṭome anullaṃghita niṣedhaḥ adhikārī svargasya aniṣiddha tvāt śyene tu hiṃsāyāḥ pratiṣiddha tvāt utkrānta niṣedhaḥ adhikārī iti ced mā evam adhikāri daśāyām api bhavat mate vidheḥ prayoktṛ tva anapāyāt na niṣedha śāstram avakāśam labhate iti śyene api na avadhīrita niṣedhaḥ adhikārī syāt 
[II,114,ii_II,114,iii]	nanu na vidhiḥ phale prayojyam prerayati phalam kuru iti karmaṇi tu enam pravartayati yajasva iti tena adhikāri daśāyām apratihataḥ niṣedha śāstra avakāśaḥ āyuṣman asmat pakṣam eva āśritaḥ asi phale ced na pravartayati vidhiḥ puruṣam phala arthi tvāt eva enam upāye pravartamānam tatra api na prerayet upāya anabhijñasya tu upāyam eva darśayet yāvat aprāptam hi vidheḥ viṣayaḥ tad uktam jānāti eva asau mayā etat kartavyam upāyam tu na vedaḥ iti pratītiḥ api iyam īdṛśī abhicaran yajet iti yadi tvam śāstrīyena upāyena vairiṇam hantum udyataḥ śyenena jahi śyenaḥ tava upāyaḥ iti arthaḥ tad alam ati prasaṅgena kāma adhikāreṣu tāvat na phala ākāṅkṣī vidhiḥ phalam tu adhikāre hetuḥ iti sthitam 
[II,114,iv]	pratiṣedha adhikāre api pratyavāyaḥ na kalpate niṣedhyāt viṣayāt eva labdha tvāt adhikāriṇaḥ tatra asau kalpyamānaḥ api naraka ādi phala udayaḥ avaidha tvam prapadyeta na hi ākāṅkṣedṛśī vidheḥ vidheḥ apekṣe dve eva niyojya viṣayau prati tad pūraṇena tṛptaḥ tu na vā aṃchati tatas adhikam niyojyaḥ tāvat etāvān kruddhaḥ ari hanana udyataḥ viṣayaḥ tad nivṛttiḥ ca niyogaḥ yatra gamyate 
[II,115,i_II,115,iii]	nanu etāvat na vibudhyāmahe niṣedha vidheḥ kaḥ viṣayaḥ iti bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta iti sthite nañarthaḥ tāvat pūrva aparībhūta tva abhāvāt na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ ananvita abhidhānāt ca na hi nañaḥ anantaram liṅa vibhaktiḥ śrūyate api tu hanteḥ hananam api na vidheḥ viṣayaḥ tasya dharma tva prasaṅgāt nañprayogasya vaiyarthya prasakteḥ hanane ca puruṣasya svatas pravṛtteḥ ca nañviśiṣṭaḥ api na hanti arthaḥ asya viṣayaḥ tayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva abhāvāt yuktam dadhnā juhoti iti home dadhi anurakta tā hanteḥ svarūpa nāśāt tu na nañartha anurakta tā puruṣa prayatnaḥ api na kevalaḥ vidheḥ viṣayaḥ svatā ssiddha tvāt na api nañartha anuraktaḥ kutra api nañarthasya viśeṣaṇa tva anupapatteḥ 
[II,116,i]	atha ayamabrāhmaṇa ādi nyāyena hantau paryudaste bhāva artha antare niyogaḥ kalpyate na hanyāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ anyat kim api kuryāt iti tarhi kim tad bhāva antaram iti na vicārayitum śakyam yat kiṃcid iti ced na tasya svatassiddha tvena vidhi anarha tvāt avaśyam jīvan pumān kiṃcid karoti paṭhati gacchati bhaṅkte ca 
[II,116,ii]	atha viṣaya aṃśam parihṛtya pramāṇa aṃśe nan niviśate sā hi pravartamāna pumāṃsam ruṇaddhi yat hanyāt tat na iti tat api anupapannam anvita abhidhānena vidhi vibhakteḥ hantinā avaruddha tvāt preraṇa śakti svabhāvaḥ vidhiḥ sthitaḥ yaḥ tu niṣedha ātmā nan pārśve sthitaḥ tatra na vidhiḥ saṃkrāmati saṃkrāntau api nañaḥ ca saṃbandhe sati vidheḥ svarūpa nāśaḥ avagamyate svabhānaḥ hi eṣa nañaḥ yat ayam yena yena saṃbadhyate tasya tasya abhāvam bodhayati iti atas vidhi saṃbandhe nañaḥ iṣyamāṇe etāvān vākya arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti tatas ca hananasya vidhi tvam ca syāt 
[II,116,iii_II,117,i]	atra ucyate dadhnā juhoti iti homasya vacana antara codita tvāt vidhi vibhakti śaktiḥ upapadam saṃkāmati iti yathā varṇitam evam iha api hanane svatas pravṛtta tvena vidhi vaiphalyāt nañaḥ ca śrūyamāṇasya anarthakya prasaṅgāt vidhāyikā śaktiḥ nañartham eva spṛśati iti kim na iṣyate nanu ukta matpra bhāva arthāḥ karma śabdāḥ iti tatra dadhi anuraktaḥ homaḥ eva vidhīyate iti phalataḥ dadhi vihitam bhavati na pramāṇataḥ iha tu nañaḥ tad upamarda svabhāva tvāt saṃsargaḥ dadhi ādeḥ iva kalpate 
[II,117,ii]	mā evam nivṛttim eva kurvan viśeṣaṇībhavati sā iyam nañupahite hantau śrute hanana nivṛttiḥ gamyate yathā siddha rūpa dadhi anupraveśe api na homasya sādhyamānā avasthā nivartate tathā nañanuviddha hanti artha avagatau na pūrva aparībhāva buddhiḥ nivartate na hi abrāhmaṇa vat na hanyāt iti siddha rūpa buddhiḥ saḥ ayam hanana nivṛtti rūpaḥ pūrva aparībhūtaḥ arthaḥ vidhi viṣayaḥ bhavati 
[II,117,iii_II,117,iv]	athavā vibhakti arthena nañ saṃbhantsyati śuddhasya liṅā ādeḥ arthaḥ pravartakaḥ nañupahitasya tasya arthaḥ nivartakaḥ iti śabda śaktiḥ eva eṣā vā aparyanuyojya iti yat tu sākṣāt nañaḥ anantaram vidhi vibhaktiḥ na utpadyate tat tasya ādhātu tvāt dhātoḥ pare tiṅādayaḥ pratyayāḥ bhavanti na anyasmāt iti yogya tayā tu nañarthena tasya saṃbandhaḥ na ca tatra ayam arthaḥ avatiṣṭhate hanana vidhiḥ na asti iti kintu nañupahitaḥ vidhiḥ audāsīnye puruṣam niyuṅkte tad avacchedakaḥ ca hantiḥ anyathā sarva kriyā audāsīnyam pratīyeta iti alam ati vimardena niṣedha vidheḥ api siddhaḥ anubandha dvaya yogaḥ 
[II,118,i_II,118,ii]	evam niyoga vyāpāre samāpte phala kalpanā nṛ buddhi prabhavā eva syāt atas sa apekṣatā bhavet katham naraḥ nivarteta pratyavāya bhayāt vinā mā nivartiṣṭa vidhinā tāvat uktam nivartanam pravṛddhatara rāga andhaḥ pratyavāye api kalpite na nivarteta iti evam kim vidhera pramāṇa tā phalam bhavatu mā vā bhūt puruṣaḥ api pravartatām mā pravartiṣṭa vā sve tu na asti arthe khaṇḍanā vidheḥ pravartana avagāma janane hi vidhi vyāpāraḥ iti asakṛt uktam tatra ca asya na kiṃcid vaikalyam 
[II,118,iii]	nanu vidheḥ phala apekṣā na asti ced kim tarhi aśrūyamāṇa phaleṣu viśva jit ādiṣu svarga ādi phalam kalpyate anabhijñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ na tatra vidheḥ phala apekṣā na ca phalam tatra kalpyate kintu aśrūyamāṇa tvā dadhikāra anubandhasya niradhikārasya ca vidheḥ vidhi tva anirvāhāt adhikāra anubandhaḥ kalpyate tatra sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt svarga kāmaḥ codanā śeṣa bhāvena niyojyaḥ kalpyate na ca iyam pauruṣī kalpanā śruti eka deśaḥ saḥ iti hi tad vidaḥ tat iyam adhikāra anubandha kalpanā na phala kalpanā iti saḥ ayam anubandha dvaya avacchinnaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ 
[II,119,i]	vākya artha tvam ca asya pradhāna tvāt anyaḥ hi yajyādiḥ arthaḥ avagamyamānaḥ tad anupraveśena pratīyate iti guṇaḥ bhavati niyogaḥ tu sva mahima ākṣipta dṛṣṭa upakāra aneka kriyā kāraka kalāpa upabṛṃhita svarūpaḥ pratīyate iti prādhānyam abalambate kāryam ced pradhānam ucyate niyogaḥ eva kāryam phalam ced pradhānam uyate tat api na siddham api tu sādhyam sādhya tvam ca asya niyoga adhīnam iti niyogaḥ eva pradhānam puruṣaḥ tu niyojyamāna tvāt apradhānam iti 
[II,119,ii_II,119,iv]	evam niyogaḥ eva pradhāna tvāt vākya arthaḥ sa ca pratīti bheda paryālocanayā catur avasthaḥ ucyate utpatti vidhiḥ viniyoga vidhiḥ prayoga vidhiḥ adhikāri vidhiḥ iti utpatti vidhiḥ agnihotram juhoti iti agnihotra ākhya karma svarūpa utpāda vyatirekeṇa artha antara anavagamāt viniyoga vidhiḥ dadhnā juhoti iti utpatti vidhitaḥ pratipanne bhāva arthe tatra dadhi ādi guṇa viniyoga avagamāt 
[II,119,v_II,120,ii]	adhikāri vidhiḥ agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti nirjñāte karmaṇi tatra adhikṛtasya puṃsaḥ tatas avagamāt prayoga vidhiḥ tu yaḥ krama paryantam prayoge padārthān avagamayati ayam ca adhikāra vidheḥ eva vyāpāra viśeṣaḥ iti tat eva asya udāharaṇam agni hotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti kvacid ekasmin eva vākye rūpa catuṣṭayam vidheḥ avagamyate na tatra pṛthak udāharaṇam apekṣyate yathā etasya eva revatīṣu vāravantīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kṛtvā paśu kāmaḥ hi etena yajeta iti 
[II,120,iii_II,120,iv]	anyāni api niyogasya rūpāṇi vyāpāra bhedāt avagamyante sa hi bhāva artha sidhi artham tat samartham artham ākṣipati iti tad prayojakaḥ ucyate yathā māṇavaka sthasya adhyayanasya ācārya karaṇa vidhiḥ kvacid anya ākṣipte vastuni labdhe sati tatra aprayojakaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā kraya niyukta eka hāyinyā lābhe sati na pādapa aṃsu grahaṇa artham anyām eka hāyanīm ākṣipati vidhiḥ iti prakaraṇa paṭhita padārtha paṭala parigrahāt ca grāhakaḥ iti vidhiḥ ucyate 
[II,120,v_II,121,i]	kvacid prakaraṇa paṭhitasya api tena agṛhītasya dvādaśa upasada ādeḥ prakaraṇāt utkarṣa darśanāt atas eva niyoga garbhaḥ viniyogaḥ iti ācakṣate kvacid viniyojaka śruti ādi pramāṇa virahe api paśu eka tva ādi upādānam śeṣīkurvan upādāyakaḥ iti ucyate paśunā yajeta iti vibhakyā hi prātipadikā arthaḥ viniyuktaḥ tad stham tu eka tvam uktam eva na viniyuktam ekena iti aśravaṇāt paśuḥ upādīyamānaḥ na saṃkhyā rahitaḥ upādātum śakyate śruta saṃkhyā parityāga kāraṇā bhāvāt ca ekatva viśiṣṭaḥ paśuḥ upādīyate iti upāda ānata śeṣīkṛtam eka tvam 
[II,121,ii_II,121,iii]	vaikṛtaḥ tu saurya ādi vidhiḥ prākṛta miti karta vyātā jātam ākarṣaḥ caḥ dakaḥ iti ucyate tat idam ekasya eva bhagavataḥ liṅarthasya prayoktṛ śavita khacita ātmanaḥ pracura vyāpāra vaicitryam upadarśitam iti alam anayā mahām ati mānasavatyā mīmāṃsā artha kathayā saḥ ayam īdṛśaḥ niyogaḥ vākya arthaḥ tasya dvādaśa lakṣaṇyām tad tad rūpam prakāśitam tat na iha likhyate asmābhiḥ grantha gaurava bhīrubhiḥ diṅa mātram tu etat ākhyāyi niyogasya yathā aagamam amuṣman api vākya arthe vivadante manīṣiṇaḥ 
[II,121,iv_II,122,ii]	liṅā ādeḥ avagamyamānaḥ kārya rūpaḥ preraṇa ātmā ca vākya arthaḥ niyogaḥ iti uktam na ca asau evaṃrūpaḥ api paridṛśyamāna bhāva artha ādi vyatiriktaḥ avagamyate kriyā eva tāvat kārya ātmā preraṇa ātmā phala arthitā pratīyate tatas anyaḥ tu niyogaḥ na ubhaya ātmakaḥ nanu anyaḥ eva kriyā kartṛ saṃbandhāt praiṣa praiṣya sambandhaḥ hi darśitaḥ na yuktaḥ asau kuryāt ityādi śabdebhyaḥ kriyā ādi vyatirekiṇaḥ na artha antarasya saṃvittiḥ kasya cit preraṇa ātmanaḥ 
[II,122,iii_II,122,iv]	kim idānīm karoti kuryāt ityādi ca tulye ete pratipattī abhinavam idam śabda jña tvam āyuṣmataḥ na brūmaḥ na bhinne ete pratipattī iti karoti iti pravṛtta kriyaḥ ucyate vartamāna kāla avacchinnaḥ ca kim tu asau praiṣaḥ tatas avagamyamānaḥ api prerakaḥ na bhavati na ca kāryaḥ iti brūmaḥ nanu preraka tvena eva avagamyamānaḥ katham prerakaḥ na bhavet etat eva asya praiṣa tvam yat preraka tvam satyam preraka tvena eva asau gamyate na tu asau tathā bhavati vyavahāra mātram etat rāja ājñayā karomi iti kāryatvam api asya prakriyā mātram rāja ājñām karomi iti 
[II,122,v]	ājñā hi nāma na eva anyā saṃpādya tvena gamyate na anuṣṭhātuḥ iyam buddhiḥ ājñā saṃpādyatām iti evam hi yasya kasya api pravarteta saḥ ājñayā na ca iha vāla unmatta ādi vacanāt phala varjitāt sati api preraṇa ajñāne pravartante sa cetasaḥ bhayam na āśaṅkyate yasmāt phalam vā api samīhitam tathāvidhasya rājñaḥ api na ajñā anuṣṭhīyate janaiḥ vartamāna apadeśe api phalam yatra avagamyate tatra pravartate lokaḥ liṅā ādiṣu aśruteṣu api bhavati ārogya saṃpattiḥ bhuṃjānasya harītakīm tad kāmaḥ bhakṣayet ca iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ pravartane anvaya vyatirekābhyām tat evam anumanyate preraka tvam phalasya eva na niyoga ātmanaḥ punar 
[II,123,i_II,123,ii]	tatra etat smāt loke bhavatu phala arthi tvāt pravartanam āriḥ ādhayiṣate preraka atiśaya anuvartane vā tasya pāraṃparyeṇa phala hetu tvāt vede tu vaktuḥ abhāvāt preraṇa avagamāt eva pravṛttiḥ unmatta vākyāt api liṅā ādi yuktāt na preraṇa avagamaḥ na asti bhavan api doṣa darśanāt upekṣyate unmattaḥ evam pralapati iti vede punar yajeta iti atra preraṇa avagamāt parityāga kāraṇa abhāvāt tatas eva pravartanam pravarta na abhāve api na vedasya aprāmāṇyam pramāṇa vyāpārasya tena nirvartita tvāt iti uktam 
[II,123,iii_II,124,i]	ucyate vede api vaktā asti tad āśaya vaśena tatra api phala arthinām pravartanam iti saṃbhavat api idam uttaram na ācakṣmahe kathā antara prasaṅgāt kitvidaṃbrūmaḥ preṣaṇa avagamāt eva pravṛtti siddhau svarga kāma padam bādari vat anyathāvyākhyāyatām adhikāra anubandha abhidhāne puruṣa viśeṣaṇa mātram etat bhavatu kim svarga sādhyaka tva kalpanayā viśeṣaṇa tvam eva anyathā na nirvahati iti ced āyātam tarhi phalasya sādhya tvam tat ced sādhya tvena avagamyate tasya eva sāmarthya siddham loka anuguṇam avyabhicāri ca pravartaka tvam utsṛjya na preraṇa avagamasya tat vaktum arhasi iti niyogāt atha niṣpattiḥ phalasya iti abhidhīyate phalam pratyaṅga bhūta tvāt avākya artha tvam āpatet 
[II,124,ii_II,124,iii]	nanu vidhi arthaḥ na bhāva artha vat phale karaṇam yena asya tad aṅga tvam syāt ākṣepaka tvāt tu tasya phala artha tvam ucyate prayoktṛ tvam hi tasya nijam rūpam yadi evam bhāva arthaḥ eva sādhyaḥ bhavatu vidhi arthasya tu kim anuṣṭhayetvamucyate saḥ api bhāva artha siddhyā saṃpadyate kṛtaḥ mayā svāmi niyogaḥ iti vyavahārāt iti ced bhāva arthāt tarhi niṣpattiḥ niyogasya phalasya ca iti ekatra pada grāme vākya artha dvayam āpatet 
[II,124,iv]	kiṃca anvitā abhidhānena viṣaya tva avadhāraṇāt niyogasya eva bhāva artha niṣpādya tvam pratīyate sa tu bhāva arthataḥ siddhaḥ phalāya yadi kalpyate para artha tvāt avākya arthaḥ bhavet iti upavarṇitam bhāva arthaḥ tu dvayam kuryāt yugapad vā krameṇa vā yugapad na asya sāmarthyam samatvam ca dvayoḥ bhavet 
[II,125,i]	niyogaḥ ca śabda eka gocara tvāt mā darśi phalam tu svarga paśu ādi tena saha niṣpadyamānam kim iti na gṛhyate krama pakṣe pūrvam vā niyogaḥ paścāt phalam pūrvam vā phalam paścāt vā viniyogaḥ siddhyet iti yadi pūrvam niyogaḥ tadā niyogasya asaṃpādya tvāt tad viṣaya lipsāyāḥ anupapatteḥ karaṇa aṃśe api vaidhī pravṛtti ssyāt 
[II,125,ii_II,125,v]	yathā niyoga niṣpattiḥ prayāja ādi kṛtena tu tatas pravṛttiḥ śāstrīyāḥ bhāva arthe api tathā bhavet iṣyate eva iti ced nanu evam tasya lipsā artha lakṣaṇa iti abhyadhāyi yat śyena ādīnām adharma tvam varṇitam tat viruddhyate atha pūrvam phala siddhiḥ tatas niyoga siddhiḥ tarhi phalasya tadānīm darśanam bhavet siddha tvāt na ca bhāva artha velāyām putra paśu ādi dṛśyate adṛśyamānam api etat siddha vimiti vismayaḥ 
[II,126,i_II,126,ii]	atas ca yat kaiścid uccate svarga siddhim avāntara vyāpārīkṛtya niyaḥ gameva bhāva arthaḥ saṃpādayati iti tat api apāstam avāntara vyāpārasya jvalana ādeḥ iva pradhāna vyāpārāt pūrvam darśana prasaṅgāt iti atha ucyate svarga kāmasya svargam sādhayitum udyacchataḥ yāge niyogaḥ yaḥ saṃpādyaḥ śrūyate sa ced saṃpannaḥ śabda vṛttena phalam api saṃpannam eva ānubhāvikī tu svarga ādi siddhiḥ kāla antare bhaviṣyati iti etat ayaktam siddhi dvyānupalaṃbhāt na hi ekā śābdī siddhiḥ anyā ca ānabhāvikrī phala siddhiḥ kutastyeti cintyam 
[II,126,iii_II,126,iv]	kāla antare ca bhāva arthaḥ kṣaṇika tvāt na vidyate śakti ādi rūpam ca apūrvam na bhavadbhiḥ upeyate bhavantaḥ hi apūrva śabdena dharma śabdena ca niyogam eva upacaranti na ca niyogaḥ śakti vat ātma saṃskāra vat vā kāla antara sthāyī bhavatī sa hi preraṇa ātmakaḥ kārya rūpaḥ vā na ubhayathā api sthairyam abalambate 
[II,126,v]	tatra etat syāt niyoga siddhiḥ ākṣitta phala siddhiḥ bhavati viṣaya ādi anubandha avacchinnaḥ hi asau eva anuṣṭheyaḥ tatra yathā tena tena kāraka cakreṇa kriyā kalāpena vinā saṃpattim alabhamānaḥ tat tadākṣipati tathā adhikāra anubandha bandhyaḥ api na asau saṃpattim adhigacchati iti tam api ākṣipati yaḥ ca ayam adhikāra anubandha ākṣepaḥ saḥ eva ayam phala ākṣepeṇa tu vidheḥ phalākṣepi ta iti uktam etat ayuktam yaḥ hi yena dinā kāmam na siddhyet sa tam ākṣipet niyojya mātra ākṣepe tu niyogaḥ na phala ātmakaḥ 
[II,127,i_II,127,iii]	niyojyaḥ caṇḍāla sparśanena iva svarga kāmana utpāda mātreṇa niyojyatām pratipannaḥ iti katham niyojya ākṣepaḥ eva phalākṣepaḥ nanu ca svarga kāmaḥ atra niyojyaḥ na anyathā bhavet yadi svargasya saṃpattim na adhigacchet sva karmaṇaḥ na etat evam narecchā mātram eva idam na śabdaḥ tu iyati kṣamaḥ niyojyaḥ svarga kāmaḥ hi bhavet jīvanavān iva 
[II,127,iv_II,128,i]	nanu loke kāmyamānasya sādhya tvam dṛṣṭam harītakīm bhakṣayet ārogya kāmaḥ iti tena vede api yajeta svarga kāmaḥ iti svargasya sādhya tvam avabhotsyāmahe sādho loke api katham etat avagatam āyuṣmatā niyojya samarpaka pada vācya paryālocanena vidhi vṛtta parīkṣayā vā padārthaḥ tāvat etāvān evaṃcātaḥ hi asau iti idam tu siddhyati etasmāt iti tasya na gocaraḥ vidheḥ eṣa svabhāvaḥ ced āyuṣman sādhu buddhyase bhāṭṭaiḥ kim aparāddham te nitye api phala vādibhiḥ 
[II,128,ii_II,128,iii]	adhikārī anupādeya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣitaḥ jīvan vā svarga kāmaḥ apitsamānaḥ kāmya nityayoḥ vidhi vīrya prabhāvaḥ tu dvayoḥ api tathāvidhaḥ sa pratyaya preraka tām vidhiḥ na upaiti niṣphalaḥ nanu kāmanā adhikāre svargaḥ śrūyate nitya adhikāre tu asau na śrūyate āśrūyamāṇaḥ kasya anurodhena kalpyate vidheḥ eva iti brūmaḥ svargeṇa śrutena api kim kariṣyati yadi asau vidhinā na apekṣyata ghṛta kulyāḥ asya bhavanti ityādi vat aśrutaḥ api ca asau vidhinā aakṛṣyate eva tasmāt vidhiḥ eva atra pramāṇam na śravaṇa aśravaṇe iti kāmya vat nitye api phalam abhyupagantavyam na vā kvacid api iti 
[II,128,iv_II,129,ii]	pratiṣedha adhikāre api vidhi vṛtta parīkṣayā evam naraka pāta ādi phala yogaḥ na durbhaṇaḥ yena hi durviṣaha kleśa dveṣa kaluṣita manasā brāhmaṇa hananam sukha sādhanam iti kartavyam iti gṛhītam nirargala rāga rasikena surā pānam sukha sādhanam iti gṛhītam sa tatas vidhinā vāryeta yadi tad asukha sādhanam iti jñāpyate tasmāt nityeṣu pratyavāya parihāraḥ iva upātta durita kṣavaḥ iva vā pratiṣidhyamāneṣu karmasu naraka pātaḥ phalam iti abhyupagamanīyam itarathāḥ hi artha anartha vivekaḥ na siddhyati evam ca brahmahatyā ādeḥ api na eva asti adharma tā kim punar śyena vajra ādeḥ iti artha grahaṇam vṛthā 
[II,129,iii_II,129,v]	karaṇa aṃśe api lipsātaḥ pravṛttiḥ yadi upeyate itikatavya tā aṃśe tu śāstrāt yadi tat api asat na hi tad karaṇam śuddham sva phalāya upakalpate sa iti kartavya tākam hi karaṇam karaṇam viduḥ avāntara vibhāgaḥ eva eṣaḥ karaṇa iti kartavya tā lakṣaṇaḥ sakala aṅgaḥ bṛṃhita svarūpaḥ tu bhāva arthaḥ kāmyamāna upāya tām pratipadyate na ekena api aṃśena nyūnāḥ atas eva kāmyānām karmaṇām sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayogam icchanti tasmāt karaṇa vat iti kartavya tāyām api lipsātaḥ eva pravṛttiḥ syāt ubhayatra api lipsātaḥ sati ca evam pravartane agnīṣomīyahiṃsā ādeḥ śyena ādi vat adharma tā 
[II,130,i_II,130,ii]	yat api uktam kāma adhikāreṣu kāmyamāna bhāva arthayoḥ upāya upeya bhāva mātra pratipādana paryavasitaḥ vidhi vyāpāraḥ iti tat api na samyak vidhi puruṣayoḥ him prerya preraka bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tatra yāga ādayaḥ viṣaya tvena pratīyante neṣyamāṇa upāya tvena sādhya sādhana mātra pratipādana paryavasita vyāpāraḥ tu vidhiḥ viniyoga paraḥ eva syāt tatas ca apravṛtta pravartakam nāma nijam rūpam jahyāt vidheḥ catur avastha tvam phalataḥ kila kathyate preraka tvam ca tad rūpam sarva avasthā anugāmi yat kārya ātma tā api vidhi arthe preraṇā jñapti pūrvikā preryeṇa eva satā puṃsā tat kāryam avadhāryate liṅā ādi śrutitaḥ ca ādau preraṇā eva pratīyate sādhya sādhana saṃbandha buddhiḥ tat buddhi pūrvikā 
[II,130,iii]	nanu evam kāmyeṣu vidhitaḥ pravṛtta aviṣyamāṇāyām apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt vidhi atikramāt mā evam svargam siṣā dhayiṣoḥ tatra adhikārāt anyaḥ tu anadhikṛtaḥ eva kṣatriya ādiḥ iva vaiśya stome na asau akurvan pratyavāyam arhati svarga arthī tu vidhitaḥ pravartate eva lipsayā tu karaṇa aṃśe pravṛttiḥ iṣyamāṇā kratu artham itikartavyatā aṃśam api mā evam spṛśet kratu upakāra kāmaḥ hi tatra pravartate iti evam sarvatra vidhi ḥ utsīdet eva iti alam prasaṅgena 
[II,131,i_II,131,ii]	api ca pramāṇa antara saṃparka vikale bhavataḥ katham niyoga ātmani vākya arthe vyutpattiḥ vyavahārataḥ nanu uktam ākūta viśeṣa pūrvikām ceṣṭām ātma niṣṭhām dṛṣṭvā paratra api tathā anumānam iti ayuktam idam sva ātmani api preraṇa avagama nimitta abhāvāt na hi ātmā iva saṃvid iva preraṇa avagama nimitta abhāvāt preraṇā sva prakāśā preraṇā saṃvid sva prakāśa iti ced tad utpāde tarhi nimittam tāvat mṛgyam na tāvat śabdaḥ tadānīm vyutpatti abhāvāt sva ātmani preraṇa avagama pūrvikām hi ceṣṭām upalabdhavataḥ te paratra ceṣṭā darśanāt tad anumānam setsyati tad nimittam liṅādiḥ śabdaḥ iti bhotsyate sa punar vyutpatti kāle sva ātmani eva preraṇa avagamaḥ cintyaḥ vartate pramāṇa antarāt tu tad avagamaḥ iti ced uttiṣṭha asiddham śabda eka gocara tvam 
[II,131,iii_II,132,i]	yā ca iyam pūrva avadhārita sukha sādhana bhāve kapittha ādau sva ātmani pravṛtti rupalabdhā tatra preraka tvena phala arthitā nirjñātā na anyā kacid preraṇā tat uktam smaraṇāt abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ pravartate iti phala viṣayā hi icchā tatra sva saṃvedyā atas ca preraka jñānam śabdāt api parasya yat kalpyate kalpyatām tatra prerikā sā eva sundarī capeṭā parihārāya modaka prāptaye api vā pravartate vaṭuḥ na asau juhudhi iti niyogataḥ katham tarhi evam ācaṣṭe ācārya coditaḥ aham juhomi iti astu ayam vyapadeśaḥ ācārya codanā tu na tatra kāraṇam api tu hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthi tvam eva iti atas phalam pravartakam yuktam anubhava sākṣika tvāt 
[II,132,ii]	ye api āhuḥ prayoktra āśayasya pravartaka tvam yatas ananuvidheyasya vacanāt na pravartamānaḥ kaścid dṛśyate anuvidheyasya puṃsaḥ kiṃcid abruvataḥ api bhrū bhaṅga ādinā aaśayam avagamya pravartate iti etat api ayuktam yatas prayoktra āśaya anumānena sva artha saṃbhāvanayā lokaḥ pravartate na punar prayoktā eva prīyatām iti tad prītiḥ api sva prīti hetu tvena arthyate na tad prīti tvena buddhaḥ api hi nāma sakala sattva hitaṃpratipannaḥ para artham sva prayojana tayā eva saṃpādayati para artha saṃpādana dvārakam tu tat tasmāt sva prītiḥ eva pravartikā prayoktrā śayasya ca pravartaka tve veda artha prayoktra āśaya anavadhāraṇāt apravṛttiḥ eva prāpnoti tasmāt phalam eva pravartakam 
[II,132,iii_II,133,i]	yat punar phalasya preraka tve dūṣaṇam abhyadhāyi siddhi asiddha vikalpa anupapatteḥ iti tat api ayuktam icchā viṣayīkṛtasya pravartaka tva abhyupagamāt asiddhe katham kāmanā iti ced asiddha tvāt eva idānīm ca tat asiddham na ekānta asiddha svarūpam eva kha puṣpa vat sukhe duḥkha nivṛttau vā puṃsām bhavati kāmanā na punar vyoma puṣpa ādi kaścid kāmayate naraḥ 
[II,133,ii_II,133,iv]	ye api rāga ādeḥ pravartaka tvam abhyupagatavantaḥ taiḥ api kāmanā viṣayīkṛtam phalam eva pravartakam abhyupagatam icchā viśeṣāḥ eva hi rāga ādayaḥ yat api śreya ssādhaka tvam pravartakam ucyate tat api na cāru satyām api śreya ssādhana tāyām anarthi tvena pravṛtti abhāvāt nanu arthinaḥ api na aniyata viṣayā pravṛttiḥ apitu nirjñāta śreyassā dhana bhāve bhāva arthe tasmāt tad sādhana tā avagamaḥ pravartakaḥ satyam dvaye sati api icchā eva pravartikā vaktum yuktā tasyām satyām eva pravṛtti darśanāt pravṛttiḥ hi nāma prayatnaḥ prayatnaḥ ca icchā kāryaḥ iti kāṇādāḥ viṣaya niyame tu śreyassādhana tvam kāraṇam na pravṛtti utpāde 
[II,133,v]	kiṃca bhāvanā avagatam śreyassādhana tvam pratartakam iṣyate taiḥ tat ca na pṛthak abhidhātum yuktam bhavanāyāḥ tri aṃśa tvena tad svarūpānagama samaye etad aṃśayoḥ svarga yāgayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva a agati siddheḥ na ca aṃśa dvaya avacchinnasya vyāpārasya śreyassādhana tvam rūpam vaktum ucitam aniṣpannasya tasya tādrūpya abhāvāt na hi aniṣpanne gavi tad eka deśa sāsnā ādau go tva rūpam sāmānyam niviśate na ca aṃśa traya pūraṇam antareṇa bhāvanā ākhya vyāpāra niṣpattiḥ iti 
[II,134,i]	yat tu liṅādeḥ śabdasya tad vyāpārasya vā preraka tvam ucyate tat prāk eva pratikṣiptam vidhiḥ api sva mahimnā vā prerakaḥ syāt sādhya sādhana bhāva saṃbandha avabodhanena vā sva mahimnā preraka tvam asya pūrvam eva nirastam sādhya sādhana bhāva saṃbandha avabodhana purassare tu tasya pravartaka tve phalasya eva pravartaka tvam idam anakṣaram abhihitam bhavati 
[II,134,ii_II,134,v]	yaḥ tu āha preraka tvam ced phalam darśayataḥ vidheḥ pratyakṣa ādi samāna tvāt svātantryam tasya hīyate sa vācyaḥ phala śūnya tve suta rām asvatantra tā yat riktam artham mūḍhaḥ api na kaścid anutiṣṭhati kaḥ hi nāma niṣphalam artham prekṣāvān anutiṣṭhet nanu phale api darśite kecid tatra na pravartante eva kiṃca atas kāma mā pravartiṣata na hi kārakaḥ vidhiḥ apitu jñāpakaḥ iti uktam nanu phalam apradarśayan api jñāpayet na jñāpayitum utsahate prekṣāvān hi jñāpyate na ca phalam vinā asau tathā jñāpitaḥ bhavati iti alam bahu bhāṣikayā 
[II,134,vi]	phalasya eva iṣyamāṇasya paśyan preraka tām atas yam artham adhikṛtya iti sūtram vyadhita sūtrakṛt tasmāt puṃsaḥ pravṛttau prabhavati na vidhiḥ na api śabdaḥ liṅādiḥ vyāpāraḥ api etadīyaḥ na hi paṭuḥ abhidhā bhāvanā nāmadheyā na śreyassādhana tvam vidhi viṣaya gatam na api rāga ādiḥ evam tena ākhyat kāmyamānam phalam amala matiḥ prerakam sūtrakāraḥ 
[II,135,i_II,135,ii]	āha para pakṣān pratikṣipya prerakam kathitam phalam evam parama tad viṣṭaiḥ vākya arthaḥ svayam ucyatām ucyate yam artham adhikṛtya puruṣaḥ pravartate tat prayojanam iti vadatā sūtra kṛtā phalam pravartakam iti pradarśitam pramāṇena khalu ayam jñātā artham upalabhya tam īpsati jihāsati vā tasya īpsā ajihāsā prayuktasya samīhā pravṛttiḥ ucyate sāmarthyam punar asyāḥ phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ iti ca bruvāṇaḥ bhāṣya kāraḥ api phala īpsām pravartikām prādīdṛśat iti tadīyām saraṇim anusaradbhiḥ asmābhiḥ api tathā eva tat kathitam 
[II,135,iii_II,136,i]	vākya arthaḥ tu na kvacid api sūtrakāra bhāṣya kārābhyām sūcitaḥ iti kutas śikṣitvā vākya artha svarūpam vayam ācakṣmahe kim iti tābhyām asau na sūcitaḥ iti ced pṛthak prasthānāḥ hi imāḥ vidyāḥ pramāṇa vidyā ca iyam ānvīkṣakī na vākya artha vidyā iti yadi evam padārthaḥ api kasmāt iha darśitaḥ vyakti ākṛti jātayaḥ tu padārthaḥ iti sthāne praśnaḥ sa tu śabdānām artha asaṃsparśitām vadantam rudantam ca śamayitum śabda prāmāṇya siddhaye sūtra kṛtā yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ 
[II,136,ii_II,136,iii]	yadi evam vākya artham api bāhyam vāstavam antareṇa śastrasya pramāṇatā na pratiṣṭhām labhate iti tatra api prayatnaḥ kartavyaḥ eva satyam padārtha pratipādana yatnena eva tu kṛtena tatra yatnam kṛtam manyate sūtrakāraḥ yat ayam pṛthak padārthebhyaḥ na vākya artham upadiśati sma tasmāt ayam asya āśayaḥ padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti tat kim amum eva pakṣam anumodāmahe padārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti bāḍham brumaḥ kiṃtu na ekaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ anekaḥ tu padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ 
[II,136,iv]	nanu anekaḥ api bhavan padārthaḥ eva asau na ca padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ bhavitum arhati sāmānye hi padam vartate viśeṣe vākyam anyat ca sāmānyam anyaḥ viśeṣaḥ anyatra api uktam yat atra ādhikyam sa vākya arthaḥ iti tasmāt anyaḥ padārthaḥ anyaḥ ca vākya arthaḥ ucyate yat etat uktam asmābhiḥ anekaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ na punar ekaḥ iti tat na bṛhītam āyuṣma tā 
[II,137,i]	etat uktam bhavati paraspara saṃspṛṣṭa padārtha samudāyaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti saṃsargaḥ eva adhikaḥ iti yat atra ādhikyam iti ucyate na ca anākṣipta viśeṣa tvena saṃsargaḥ upapadyate iti viśeṣaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti ucyate saṃsargaḥ tu svarūpataḥ na vākya arthaḥ apadārtha tvāt gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti pada grāme saṃsarga vādinaḥ padasya aśravaṇāt śravaṇe api sutarām ananvayāt gauḥ śukla anīyatām saṃsargaḥ iti kaḥ asya arthaḥ tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vākya arthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ tad uktam vyatiṣaktataḥ avagateḥ vyatiṣaṅgasya iti na ca tantubhiḥ iva paṭaḥ vīraṇaiḥ iva kaṭaḥ tad atiriktaḥ avayavi sthānīyaḥ padārthaḥ nirvartyamānaḥ vākya arthaḥ upalabhyate jāti guṇa kriyā avagame api avayavi buddheḥ abhāvāt na ca padārtha avayavī vākya arthaḥ tena pṛthak vākya artham na upadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ 
[II,137,ii_II,138,ii]	nanu guṇa pradhāna bhāvam antareṇa na saṃsargaḥ avakalpate na ca ekasmin vākye bahūni pradhānāni bhavanti prādhānyam eva hi tathā sati na syāt guṇāḥ tu bahavaḥ bhavanti yat idam aneka guṇa uparaktam ekam kiṃcid pradhānam sa vākya arthaḥ iti tat viṣayā iyam eka svabhāvā buddhiḥ satyam tathā api te eva saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ avabhāsante na tadā ārabdhaḥ kaścid ekaḥ saṃsarga siddhi kṛtaḥ tu guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ abhyupeyate sa ca guṇa pradhāna bhāvaḥ na niyataḥ yena ekam eva idam pradhānam iti vyavasthāpyeta kvacid kārakam pradhānam kriyā guṇa dravyasya cikīrṣita tvena avagamāt vrīhīn prokṣati iti siddha tantram kvacid sādhyam tat tantram itarat kvacid śabda prayoga tātparya paryālocanayā bhavet 
[II,138,iii_II,138,iv]	tasmāt guṇa pradhāna bhāva aniyamāt anyonya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārtha samudāyaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti etāvat eva śreyaḥ saṃsarga avagame ca sarva vādi nāma vivādaḥ vākya artham manvate ye api niyogam bhāvanām kriyām taiḥ api anyonya saṃsṛṣṭaḥ padārtha grāmaḥ iṣyate 
[II,138,v]	nanu saṃsarga vat anya vyavacchedaḥ api gamyate gauḥ śuklaḥ ānīyatām iti śrute kṛṣṇa aśva ādi vyavaccheda pratīti darśanāt satyam saṃsarga pūrvakaḥ tu vyavacchedaḥ śukla guṇa saṃsṛṣṭaḥ hi gauḥ kṛṣṇa ādibhyaḥ vyavacchidyate anya apohaḥ tu na padārthaḥ iti uktam tasmāt na bhedaḥ vākya arthaḥ 
[II,139,i]	nanu saṃsargaḥ api na śabda arthaḥ satyam sa hi śabdasya abhidheyaḥ na bhavati na tu tatas na pratīyate anabhidheyaḥ katham pratīyate iti ced etat agre nirṇeṣyate vyavacchede tu na sā gatiḥ tasmāt saṃsṛṣṭāḥ padārthāḥ vākya arthaḥ iti sthitam 
[II,139,ii_II,139,iv]	athavā guṇībhūta itara padārtha anugṛhitaḥ ekaḥ eva pradhāna bhūtaḥ padārthaḥ vākya arthaḥ iti eka ākāra pratīti balāt upeya tām ekaḥ tu ayam asau arthaḥ iti na nirṇetum śakyate yadi tu avaśyam ekasya kasyacid abhiṣeka kalaśaḥ dātavyaḥ tat phalasya eva dīyatām na hi niṣprayojanam kiṃcid vākyam uccaryate kvacid sākṣāt pada upāttam kvacid prakaraṇa āgatam kvacid ālocana ālabhyam phalam sarvatra gamyate sakalena ca kāraka kalāpena kriyā nirvartyate kriyayā ca phalam na tu phalena anyat kim api nirvartyate iti pradhāna tvāt phalam eva vākya arthaḥ 
[II,139,v_II,140,i]	nanu phalam api puruṣa artham iti puruṣaḥ pradhānam syāt na etat evam phalam sukha ātmaka tvāt puruṣa āśritam bhavati sukha ādīnām ātma guṇa tvāt na ca etāvatā puruṣaḥ pradhānam saḥ api hi phala artham eva yatate bhāvanā tāvat phala niṣṭhaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ niyogasya api phalam vinā na pravartaka tvam iti uktam kriyāyāḥ api kevalāyāḥ vākya arthaṃtvam apāstam tasmāt phalasya sādhya tvāt sarvatra tad avarjanāt kriyā ādīnām ca tādarthyāt tasya vākya arthatā iṣyate 
[II,140,ii_II,140,iii]	nanu phalasya svarga ādeḥ nisargataḥ siddha rūpa tvāt kārakaiḥ saha saṃbandhaḥ na prāpnoti siddhasya ca kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kriyā garbhaḥ iti ced tarhi phalam api kārakāṇi api kriyayā saṃbadhyante kaḥ viśeṣaḥ satyam param tu kārakāṇi sādhana tvena phalam tu sādhya tvena kriyayā hi phalam sādhyate na phalena kriyā iti atas phalasya eva prādhānyam iti siddham anyonya saṃgati viśeṣitaḥ eva yasmāt vākya artha bhāvam upayāti padārtha puṃjaḥ etat ca cetasi nidhāya tatas na bhinnam vākya artham abhyakadhita ca kaścana sūtrakāraḥ prādhānya yogāt athavā phalasya vākya artha tā tatra satām hi yatnaḥ prayojanam sūtra kṛtā tat eva pravartaka tvena kila upadiṣṭam 
[II,140,iv]	apare punar liṅā ādi śabda śravaṇe sati samupajāyamānam ātma spanda viśeṣam udyogam nāma vākya artham ācakṣate tad svarūpam tu vayam na jānīmaḥ kaḥ ayam ātma spandaḥ nāma iti buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāḥ hi navaḥ ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ viśeṣa guṇāḥ bhavanti na anye tatra ayam ātma spandaḥ buddhiḥ vā syāt prayatnaḥ vā icchā dveṣayoḥ anyataraḥ vā anye tu vikalpayitum api na yuktāḥ tatra yadi buddhiḥ ātma spandaḥ ucyate tarhi pratibhā vākya arthaḥ iti uktam bhavati na nūtanam kiṃcid utprekṣitam etat 
[II,141,i_II,141,v]	atha prayatnaḥ ātma spandaḥ tarhi bhāvanāyāḥ nāma antara karaṇam udyoga eti atha icchā dveṣayoḥ anyataraḥ asau tarhi sukha icchā duḥkha jihāsā vā vākya arthaḥ iti akṣapāda pakṣaḥ eva ayam na apūrvam kicid atha api bhāṭṭa parikalpitaḥ vyāpāraḥ ātmā spandaḥ saḥ api bhāvanā eva na artha antaram atha anuṣṭheyaḥ prerakaḥ kaścid arthaḥ udyogaḥ sa tarhi niyogaḥ eva upasarga anyatvam idam na vastu anyat tasmāt aśruta pūrveṇa kṛtam udyoga parvaṇā sa bhārata manuṣyāṇām gocaraḥ na tu mādṛśām 
[II,141,vi_II,141,viii]	anyaiḥ tu pratibhā vākya arthaḥ iṣyate tad pakṣaḥ tu saṃsarga nirbhāsa jñāna nirākaraṇena prāk eva pratikṣippaḥ pratibhā khalu vijñānam tat ca śabdena janyate na tu śabdasya viṣayaḥ rūpa dhīḥ iva cakṣuṣaḥ bāhyasya viṣayasya abhāvāt sā eva viṣayaḥ iti ced na tasya samarthita tvāt 
[II,142,i]	yaḥ api vyāghraḥ āyātaḥ iti ukte śūrakātara nara adhikaraṇa nānā ākāra kārya utpādaḥ sa bāhye arthe vyāghra āgamānādau pratipanne vāsanā anusāreṇa bhavat na pratibhā mātra hetukaḥ bhavati tasya hi jñāyamānaḥ arthaḥ karaṇam na tat jñāna mātram arthaḥ tadānīm na asti iti ced vipralambha vākyam idam asatya artham bhaviṣyati na tu abāhya viṣayam tat yathā avasthite vanitā ātmani bāhye arthe vāsanā anusāreṇa kuṇapaḥ iti kāminī iti bhakṣyam iti pratibhāḥ bhavanti tathā śabda arthe api vyāghra āgamane avagate śūrāṇām utsāhaḥ kātarāṇa bhayam ityādi kāryam bhavati na tu etāvatā pratibhā śabda arthaḥ bhavitum arhati tasmāt vākya prayojana tvena vā yadi pratibhā vākya arthaḥ kayyate kathyatām nāma na tu asau śabdasya abhidheyā anabhidheyā api saṃsarga vat vākya arthaḥ iti ced tatra api uktam saṃsṛṣṭāḥ vākya arthaḥ na saṃsargaḥ evam iha api pratibhāvantaḥ arthāḥ vākya arthaḥ na pratibhā iti 
[II,142,ii_II,142,iii]	śabdasya ca pratyakṣa vat vartamāna artha niṣṭhatva abhāvāt anāgata ādi artha abhidhāyinaḥ arthā sannidhānena pratibhā para tvam yat ucyate tat api ayuktam anāgata ādi viṣaya tve api tasya artha viṣaya tvam prasādhitam iti kṛtam vistareṇa vākya arthaḥ parama arthaḥ eva tat ayam no kalpanā nirmitaḥ tat vān api uditaḥ padasya viṣayaḥ tena artha saṃsparśinā aprāmāṇyam atas ca bāhya viṣaya abhāvena yat varṇyate tat śabdasya nirastam iti akaluṣam prāmāṇyam asya sthitam 
[II,143,i_II,143,iii]	nanu na adya api śabdasya niraṇāyi pramāṇa tā bījam padārtha vākya artha buddheḥ na hi nirūpitam ucyate kim atra nirūpaṇīyam yad anantaram hi yat bhavati tat tasya nimittam pada vākya śravaṇe sati padārtha vākya artha saṃpratyayaḥ bhavati iti te eva tatra nimittam kim punar idam padam nāma kiṃca vākyam iti uktam atra varṇa samūhaḥ padam pada samūhaḥ vākyam iti 
[II,143,iv]	nanu etat eva na kṣamante na hi varṇānām samūhaḥ kaścid asti vāstavaḥ tena kutas tad samūhaḥ padam bhaviṣyati tad abhāvāt ca na tarām pada samūhaḥ vākyam avakalpate na ca varṇānām vyasta samasta vikalpa upahata tvena vācaka tvam upapadyate tasmāt anyaḥ eva sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ artha pratipādakaḥ iti pratijānate 
[II,144,i]	nanu evam astu sphoṭaḥ anyaḥ eva artha pratipādakaḥ bhavatu kā kṣatiḥ naiyāyikānām katham na kṣatiḥ āpta praṇīta tvena hi śabdasya pramāṇyam taiḥ uktam sphoṭasya ca nitya tvena na āpta praṇīta tvam atas ca yasya anitya tvam varṇa ātmanaḥ śabdasya sādhitam na asau artha pratīti hetuḥ atas na pramāṇam yaḥ ca artha pratīti hetuḥ sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ tasya na anitya tvam na ca āpta praṇīta tvam iti asthāne naiyāyikāḥ kliṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ tasmāt anityānām varṇānām eva vācaka tvam pratiṣṭhāpanīyam parākaraṇīyaḥ ca sphoṭaḥ iti 
[II,144,ii]	tat ucyate gakāra ādi varṇa avagame satyartha pratīteḥ bhāvāt tad abhāve ca abhāvāt teṣām eva artha pratyāyana sāmarthyam te eva ca śravaṇa karaṇaka avagama gocara tayā śabda vyapadeśa bhājaḥ iti na prati iti anupārūḍhaḥ sphoṭaḥ nāma śabdaḥ kaścid pratyakṣa anumāna atītaḥ parikalpanīyaḥ 
[II,144,iii]	āha katham evam bhaviṣyati dūra apetāḥ ime manorathāḥ kutas varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam te hi varṇāḥ gakāra ādayaḥ artham pratipādayantaḥ samastāḥ pratipādayeyuḥ vyastā vā na tāvat vyastāḥ ekaika varṇa ākarṇane sati api artha pratīteḥ anutpādāt sāmastyam varṇānām na asti eva tat hi sattā mātreṇa vā syāt pratīyamāna tvena vā naiyāyika pakṣe tāvat sat tayā yaugapadyam avidyamānam āśu vināśinaḥ śabdasya darśita tvāt 
[II,145,i_II,145,ii]	atha api mīmāṃsaka matena nityaḥ śabdaḥ iṣyate tatra api sat tayā yaugapadyasya sakala varṇa sādhāraṇa tvāt kena varṇa samudāyena kaḥ arthaḥ pratyāyyeta iti na avadhāryate artha ucyate na cakṣuḥ ādīnām iva varṇānām kāraka tvam yena agṛhī tānām eva satām yaugapadya mātram artha pratyāyana aṅgam syāt jñāpaka tvāt teṣām gṛhītānām satām dhūma ādi vat pratyāyaka tvam iti pratītau eva sāmastyam upayujyate iti 
[II,145,iii_II,146,i]	etat api aghaṭamānam pratīti sāmastyam hi kim eka vaktṛ prayuktānām varṇānām uta nānā puruṣa bhāṣitānām tatra ekadā aneka puruṣa bhāṣitānām kolāhala svabhāva tvena svarūpa bhedaḥ eva duravagamaḥ iti kasya sāmastyam asām astyam vā cintyeta sati api vā tathāvidhe sāmastye na asti eva artha pratītiḥ eka vaktṛ prayuktānām tu prayatna sthāna karaṇa krama aparityāgāt avaśyaṃbhāvī kramaḥ krame ca sati ekaika varṇa karaṇikā artha pratītiḥ prāpnoti na ca asau dṛśyate iti vyasta samasta vikalpa anupapatteḥ na varṇāḥ vācakāḥ varṇa viṣayāḥ api buddhayaḥ tathā eva vikalpanīyāḥ tāḥ api na yugapad saṃbhavanti krame ca sati ekaika varṇa buddheḥ artha saṃpratyayaḥ prasajyeta iti 
[II,146,ii]	yat api ucyate pūrva pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ antya varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ iti tat api ayuktam saṃskāraḥ hi nāma yat anubhava janitaḥ tad viṣayam eva smaraṇam upajanayati na punar artha antara viṣayam jñānam iti smṛti dvāreṇa asau tarhi artha pratyāyakaḥ asau bhaviṣyati iti ced etat api na asti jñāna yauga padya prasaṅgāt antya varṇa jñāna anantaram hi pūrva varṇa smaraṇam iva samaya smaraṇam api tadā eva āpatati tatas ca jñāna yaugapadyam 
[II,146,iii_II,146,v]	na ca krama utpāde kiṃcid kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ atha api tena krameṇa bhavetām tathā api tadānīmantya varṇa jñānam uparatam iti kasya sāhāyyakam pūrvam varṇa smṛtiḥ vidadhāti iti etat ca aneka pūrva varṇa viṣayām ekām smṛtimam abhyupagamya uktam na puna rekā sarva varṇa gocarā smṛtiḥ kutas bhinna upalaṃbha saṃbhūta vāsanā bheda nirmitāḥ bhaveyuḥ smṛtayaḥ bhinnāḥ na tu ekā aneka gocarāḥ 
[II,146,vi_II,147,i]	atha vadet saṃkalanā jñānam ekam sat asat varṇa gocaram bhaviṣyati tad rūpa ārūḍhāḥ ca varṇāḥ artham pratyāyayiṣyanti iti tat api durāśā mātram tathāvidha jñāna utpattau kāraṇa abhāvāt na ca indriyam atīta varṇa grahaṇa samartham na saṃskāraḥ vartamāna grāhī bhavati na ca yugapad indriyam saṃskāraḥ ca imām buddhim janayataḥ saṃskārasya sahacāra darśana ādyāhita prabodhasya sataḥ smaraṇa mātra janmani nirjñāta sāmarthyasya indriyeṇa saha vyāpāra abhāvāt tasmāt na varṇāḥ vācakāḥ atas ca evam yadi te vācakāḥ bhaveyuḥ viparīta krama prayuktāḥ api artham gamayeyuḥ kramaḥ ced apekṣyate sa vyatirikta avyatirikta tayā cintanīyaḥ avyatireke te eva te varṇaḥ iti katham na bodhakāḥ vyatireke tu kim api adhikam vācakam abhyupagatam bhavati iti mad pakṣam ājigamiṣati bhavān 
[II,147,ii]	nanu vyutpatti vaśena śabdaḥ artha pratyāyaka tām upayāti vyutpattau ca yāvantaḥ yat kramāvarṇāḥ yad artham abhivadantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ te tāvantaḥ tad kramakāḥ tam artham abhivadiṣyanti iti kim vikalpa mālayā tat uktam yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ ye ca yad artha pratipādane varṇāḥ prajñāta sāmarthyaḥ te tathā eva avabodhakāḥ iti
[II,147,iii_II,148,i]	tat ucyate vyutpattiḥ eva iyam vicāraṇīyā vartate para avagati pūrvikā hi śabdāt svayam avagatiḥ para avagatau ca ke kiyantaḥ katham kam artham pratipādayantaḥ anena dṛṣṭāḥ yebhyaḥ tathā eva tam artham pratīyāt iti duradhigamā hi varṇa vartanī yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ ye ca iti evam tāvat prabhāṣase kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ keca iti evam yāvat na pṛcchayase tasmāt sarva prakāram avācakāḥ varṇāḥ 
[II,148,ii]	asti ca iyam śabdāt uccaritāt tad artha avagatiḥ na ca iyam akaraṇikā eva bhavitum arhati tat asyāḥ karaṇam sphoṭaḥ iti kārya anumānam idam astu pari śeṣa anumānam vā arthāpattiḥ vā sarvathā artha pratīti lakṣaṇa kārya vaśāt kalpya mānam tat karaṇam sphoṭaḥ iti ucyate sa ca niravayavaḥ nityaḥ ekaḥ niṣkāraṇakaḥ iti na varṇa pakṣa kṣepaṇa dakṣa dūṣaṇa pātra tām pratipadyate atas ca sphoṭaḥ artha pratipādakaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahārāt bhavataḥ hi varṇa janita ssaṃskāraḥ artha pratipādakaḥ tatra śabdāt iti prātipadikā arthī anupapannaḥ 
[II,148,iii]	atha varṇāḥ śabda śabdena ucyante te ca artha pratipādakāḥ iti idam anyathā siddham tathā api śabdāt iti eka tvam vibhakti arthaḥ na saṃgacchate śabdebhyaḥ pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahāraḥ syāt sphoṭa ātmani tu śabde artha pratipādake iṣyamāṇe śabdāt iti prātipādikā arthaḥ vibhakti arthaḥ ca dvayam api upapannam 
[II,149,i]	nanu na sphoṭaḥ śabda śabdena ucyate kintu varṇāḥ eva śrotra grahaṇe hi arthe śabdā śabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ te eva ca śrotra grahaṇāḥ iti na etat evam śabda tvasya api śrotra grahaṇa ātmanaḥ bhāvāt nirjhara jhāṅkāra rava prabhṛtīnām ca sati api śrotra grahaṇa tve śabda kārya nirvartaka tva anupapatteḥ tasmāt yatas artha pratipattiḥ sa śabdaḥ artha pratipattiḥ ca sphoṭāt eva na varṇebhyaḥ iti sphoṭaḥ eva śabdaḥ 
[II,149,ii_II,149,iii]	nanu evam sati dhūma ādīnām api atha pratīti hetutvāt śabda tvam prāpnoti mā evam vādīḥ atha gauḥ iti atra śrotra ja pratibhāse bahavaḥ arthāḥ pratibhāsante tatra kaḥ teṣām śabdaḥ iti upakramya yatas artha pratipattiḥ sa śabdaḥ iyupasaṃhṛte kutas dhūma ādīnām śabda tva śaṅkā avakāśaḥ nanu ca iyam artha pratītiḥ varṇeṣu bhavatsu bhavantī teṣu abhavatsu ca abhavantī tān utsṛjya katham sphoṭa kārya tām upayāyāt ucyate ananyathā siddham tad bhāva bhāvi tvam tat kāryatām avagamayati na anyathā siddham idam tu anyathā siddham kā punar anyathā siddhiḥ sphoṭa vyaṃjaka tvāt varṇānām tat ā ānantaryam artha pratīteḥ upaplavate varṇa abhivyaktaḥ sphoṭaḥ artha pratītim ādadhāti bhrāmyati janaḥ varṇaiḥ iyam artha pratītiḥ utpāditā iti 
[II,150,i_II,150,ii]	nanu sphoṭa vyaktau aprīdānīm varṇānām kva gatāḥ te vyasta samasta vikalpāḥ āha ca bhaṭṭaḥ yasya anavayavaḥ sphoṭaḥ vyajyate varṇa buddhibhiḥ saḥ api paryanuyogena na eva anena vimucyate iti bhāṣya kṛtā api nanu saṃskāra kalpanāyām adṛṣṭa kalpanā iti āśaṃkya prativihitam śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti naiṣa doṣaḥ na sphoṭa vyaktau vikalpāḥ prabhavanti kutas 
[II,150,iii]	eke tāvat ācakṣate prathama varṇa śravaṇa velāyām eva sphoṭaḥ abhivyaktaḥ bhavati na ca dvitīya ādi varṇa vaiphalyam tad avagateḥ eva atiśaya karaṇāt yathā ratna parīkṣakāṇām prathama darśane ratna rūpam amalam aprakāśa mānam api punar punar parīkṣamāṇānām carame cetasi cakāsti niravadyam ratna tattvam evam iha api prathama varṇa śrutyā vyakte api sphoṭe sphuṭatara pratītyai varṇa antarāṇi prayokṣyante iti 
[II,151,i]	apare tu vadanti dhvanayaḥ eva sphoṭasya ca vyaṃjakāḥ taiḥ ca marudbhiḥ anavayavaḥ eva eṣa sphoṭaḥ abhivyajyamānaḥ tālu ādi sthāna karaṇa saṃyoga upādhi vaśa upaplavamāna nānā ākāra gakāra ādi bhāga yogī iva pratibhāsate marutām caṃcala tvāt uccārita pradhvaṃsinaḥ te tam kālpanikā ākāram avabhāsayante dṛṣṭam ca upādhi vaśāt asatyam api rūpam avabhāsamānam yathā kṛpāṇa maṇi darpaṇa ādi vyaṃjaka bhedena śyāma dīrgha ādi rūpam vadanasya nāda ātmakaḥ hi śabdaḥ vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅga paṭaha ādi vyaṃja karbhadena nānātvam upagacchan dṛśyate tasmāt na pāramārthikāḥ eva te varṇāḥ na ca sphoṭasya vyaṃjakāḥ iti kva samasta vyasta vikalpāḥ prabhaveyuḥ 
[II,151,ii_II,151,iv]	upādhi bhedena pratibhāsamānāḥ asati a ākārāḥ ca te artha pratyayānvayavyati reka anuvidhāyinaḥ dṛśyante tena yat ucyate śabda kalpanāyām kalpanāt vaigaṇyam iti tatra eka guṇā api kalpanā na asti kā kathā dvaiguṇyasya iti tasmāt sphoṭa ātmakāt eva śabdāt artha pratyayaḥ varṇa anuvidhāyi tvam tu tasya anyathā siddham iti siddham api ca tārkikāṇām anumāna priya tvāt tad paritoṣāya idam anumānam abhyadhāyi na paramārthataḥ paramārthataḥ tu śrautre pratyaye pratibhāsamānaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva sphoṭaḥ 
[II,152,i]	āha kim idam apūrvam taskara ācaritam vartate varṇāḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyamānāḥ api durbhagāḥ na pratyakṣāḥ sphoṭaḥ punar anavabhāsamānaḥ api subhagaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ucyate na brūmaḥ varṇāḥ na pratyakṣāḥ iti te punar asantaḥ api upādhi vaśāt vadana daiḥ dhya ādi vat avabhāsante śabdaḥ tu ekaḥ niravayavaḥ pratīyate tathā ca padam iti vākyam iti eka ākārā pratītiḥ asti na ca bhinnāḥ varṇāḥ tasyām ālambanībhavanti na hi sāmānya pratyayaḥ vyakti ālambanaḥ avayavi pratyayaḥ vā avaya bālambanaḥ na ca senā vana ādi buddhi vat ayathārthā pada vākya buddhiḥ bādhaka abhāvāt 
[II,152,ii_II,152,iii]	eka artha pratyayavat tva upādhi kṛtā iyam eka ākārā buddhiḥ iti ced ekā rtha pratītiḥ idānīm kutastyā pada vākya pratīti pūrvikā hi padārtha vākya artha pratītiḥ padārtha vākya artha pratīti ākhya kārī aikyāt ca pada vākya buddhiḥ eka ākāra iti duruttaram itaretara āśraya tvam aupādhika tvam ca sāmānya avayavibuddheḥ api su vacam bādha saṃdeha rahita pratīti dārḍhyāt tatra parihāraḥ iti ced tat itaratra api samānam tasmāt pada buddheḥ padasphoṭaḥ vākya buddheḥ ca vākyasphoṭaḥ viṣayaḥ iti pratyakṣaḥ eva sphoṭaḥ tatra pada sphoṭāt padārtha pratipattiḥ vākyasphoṭāt ca vākya artha pratipattiḥ 
[II,153,i_II,153,ii]	āha yadi niravayavaḥ sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ bhavati vākyam api śabdaḥ eva tasya pada ātmakāḥ tvayavāḥ mā bhūvan tasya ced padātmānaḥ avayavāḥ bhavanti padasya api tarhi varṇa ātmānaḥ avayavāḥ bhavantu ucyate kiṃcid uccha vasitam iva me hṛdayam manye bhaviṣyati āyuṣmataḥ viveka ālokaḥ bodhyamānaḥ bhotsyase kiṃcid dhvani upādhi bheda pravṛtta varṇa bheda avabhāsa vipralabdha buddhim bhavadvidham bodhayitum padasphoṭaḥ eṣa niravayavaḥ asmābhiḥ darśitaḥ paramārthataḥ tu padasphoṭaḥ vākya avayava bhūtaḥ na asti eva niravayavam eva vākyam niravayavasya eva vākya arthasya bodhakam yathā padasya avayavāḥ na santi tathā vākyasya avayavāḥ padāni iti tathā ca āhuḥ vākye padānām asattvāt tad arthe padārthānām niravayavau vākya vākya arthau iti avayava kalpanāyām hi yathā vākyasya avayavāḥ padāni padānām avayavāḥ varṇāḥ evam varṇānau api avayavaiḥ bhavitavyam tad avayavānām api avayava antaraiḥ iti ānantyāt kā vyavasthā syāt varṇān prāpya tu yadi avayava kalpanātaḥ virantavyam tad vākyaḥ eva viramyatām 
[II,153,iii]	eka ghaṭana ākārā hi vākya artha buddhiḥ tathāvidhāt eva vākyāt utpattum arhati vṛddha vyavahārāt hi śabda arthe vyutpadyante vyavahartāraḥ tatra asya padasya prayogaḥ eva na kevalasya dṛśyate vyavahāra anaṅga tvāt vākyam tu prayoga arham iti tatra eva vyutpattiḥ tatas eva artha saṃpratyayaḥ avayava pratibhāsaḥ tu bhrama mātram arthaḥ api vākyasya ekaḥ eva narasiṃha ākāraḥ jāti antaram hi narasiṃhaḥ nāma tatra na nara arthaḥ na api siṃha arthaḥ 
[II,154,i_II,154,iii]	evam padārthebhyaḥ anyaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ pānaka ādi vat yathā pānakaḥ śarkarā nāgakesara marīci ādibhyaḥ artha antaram eva yathā ca sindūra harita āla lākṣā ādibhyaḥ artha antaram eva citram yathā vā ṣaḍja ṛṣabha gāndhāra dhaivatā ādibhyaḥ artha antaram eva grāma rāgaḥ tathā padebhyaḥ vākyam padārthebhyaḥ vākya arthaḥ katham tarhi tad aṃśa avagamaḥ iti ced kalpanā mātram tat na asau parama arthaḥ tad śabda anugame tad artha anugama darśanāt pāramārthika tvam bhāgānām iti ced na kūpa sūpa yūpānām eka akṣara anugame api artha anugama abhāvāt na ca kevala anugama mātreṇa tad kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vaktum śakyaḥ reṇu paṭala anugāmitayā kari turaga ādi vat pipīlikā paṅkteḥ api dṛśyamānāyāḥ tad kāraṇa tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt prakṛti pratyaya aṃśa vat asat padārtha parikalpanam vākya arthā vagama upāya tayā aaśrīyate na tu arthaḥ tadīyaḥ tatra aśvakarṇa ādi vat upalabhyate 
[II,154,iv_II,155,i]	asatyam api satya upāya tām pratipadyamānam dṛśyate alīka ahi daṃśa ādayaḥ satya maraṇa kāraṇam bhavanti lipi akṣarāṇi ca asatyāni eva satya artha pratipattim ādadhati sva rūpa satyāni tāni iti ced na rekhā rūpa tayā teṣām artha aprati pādaka tvāt gakāraḥ ayam iti evaṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ rekhā artha pratyaya hetavaḥ tāyena rūpeṇa satyāḥ tena na artha pradipādakāḥ yena ca artha pratipādakāḥ tena na satyāḥ iti 
[II,155,ii]	nanu prakṛti pratyaya ādi aṃśāḥ api parama artha santaḥ eva tathā pratibhāsāt artha pratyaya hetu tvāt ca na etat evam anvākhyāna bhedena teṣām svarūpeṇa iyattā niścaya anupapatteḥ bhavati iti atra bhū śabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ kvacid anvākhyāyate kvacid bhava śabdaḥ pratyaya ādeśa āgama guṇa vṛddhi varṇa lopa ādi anvākhyāna visaṃvādāt kaḥ pāramārthikaḥ prakṛti pratyaya vibhāgaḥ kalpanā mātram tu etat iyam prakṛtiḥ eṣa pratyayaḥ iti evam padārthānām api vākya artha parikalpanayā eva apoddhāraḥ tat uktam padam kaiścidvidhā bhinnam caturdhā paṃcadhā api vā apa uddhṛtya eva vākyebhyaḥ prakṛti pratyaya ādi vat iti
[II,155,iii]	api ca pāramārthika tve padānām niyatam avisaṃvādi rūpam pratīyeta visaṃvādi tu tat nāma ākhyāta sādhāraṇa varṇa sanniveśa darśanāt na niyatam teṣām rūpam atas kālpanikam eva tata na vāstavam na ca niścetum api tat pāryate kālena danti nāgāḥ iti atra kīdṛśaḥ pada vibhāgaḥ artha dvaya upapatteḥ ubhayatra ca varṇa tulya tvāt kim kālena kṛṣṇena dantinā hastinā agāḥ tvam gataḥ itmā ivam etāni padāni vyavasthā apyantām atha kāle samaye nadanti śabdāyante nāgā kariṇaḥ phaṇinaḥ vā iti tasmāt aniyamāt na pada tad artha vibhāgaḥ pāramārthikaḥ 
[II,156,i_II,156,ii]	atha prathama pratipanna vākya artha anusāreṇa pada tad artha vibhāgaḥ vyavasthāpyate tarhi kim tena tadānīm vyavasthāpitena vākya arthasya prathamam eva pratipanna tvāt kiṃca dadhi atra madhu atra iti dadhi madhu padayā urikāra ukārayoḥ adarśane api tad artha saṃpratyayaḥ dṛśyate tasmāt api na pāramārthikaḥ pada varṇa vibhāgaḥ nirasta avayavam vākyam tathāvidhasya eva vākya arthasya vācakam iti siddham 
[II,156,iii_II,156,iv]	nanu yathā padeṣu varṇāḥ na santi vākyeṣu padāni na santi tathā mahā vākyeṣu avāntara vakyāni api na syuḥ tatas kim mahā vākyāni api prakaraṇa apekṣayā na tāttvikāni syuḥ tatas kim prakaraṇāni api śāstra apekṣayā na syuḥ tatas api kim ekam eva idam śāstra tattvam avibhāgam advayam āpatati ucyate yadi tattvam pṛcchasi buddhyase vā tadā evam eva etat sādho śabda brahma eva idam advayam anādya vidyā vāsana upaplava māna bhadam artha bhāvena vivartate na tu vācakāt vibhaktam vācyam api nāma kiṃcid asti tasmāt kālpanikaḥ eva vācya vācaka vibhāgaḥ ayam avidyā eva vidyā upāyaḥ iti āśrīyate vāc rūpa tā tattvam sarvatra pratyaye tad anapāyāt yathā uktam a vā agrpatā ced utkrāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti
[II,157,i]	sā ca iyam vāc traividhyena vyavasthitā eva avabhāsate vaikharī madhyamā paśyanti iti tatra iyam sthāna karaṇa prayatna krama vyajyamāna gakāra ādi varṇa samudāya ātmikā yā vāc sā vaikharī iti ucyate vikharaḥ iti deha indriya saṅghātaḥ ucyate tatra bhavā vaikharī tat uktam sthāneṣu vivṛte vāyau kṛta varṇa parigrahā vaikharī vāc prayoktṝṇām prāṇa vṛtti nibandhanā iti
[II,157,ii_II,158,ii]	yā punar anta ssaṃkalpyamāna kramavatī śrotra grāhya varṇa rūpa abhivyakti rahitā vāc sā madhyamā ucyate tat uktam kevalam buddhi upādānā krama rūpa anupātinī prāṇa vṛttim atikramya madhyamā vāc pravartate iti yā tu grāhya bheda krama ādi rahitā sva prakāśa saṃvid rūpā vāc sā paśyantī iti ucyate tat uktam avibhāgāt tu paśyantī sarvatas saṃhṛta kramā svarūpa jyotiḥ eva antar sūkṣmā vāc anapāyinī iti tad alam ati prasakta anuprasaktyā drādhīyasī carcā iyam prakṛta antarāyakāriṇī iti na pratanyate 
[II,158,iii_II,158,iv]	iha tu etāvatā eva punar prayojanam varṇa pada pūrvakaḥ vyavahāraḥ na bhavati iti vākyena loke vyavahārāt tasya ca avayava avayavi vyavasthā anupapatteḥ nirbhāgam eva tat vācakam nirbhāgaḥ ca tasya vācyaḥ arthaḥ iti avāntara vākyam api prayoga yogyam vyavahāra kāraṇam iti tat na nihnūyate avidyā avastheyam vartate tatra iyam vyavahāra vartanī yathā dṛśyamānā eva astu vidyāyām sarvam eva idam asāram iti padena tu varṇena vā vyavahāra abhāvāt tasya kevalasya aprayogāt tad svarūpam asyām api daśāyām na vāstavam iṣyate iti 
[II,159,i]	tasmāt eka krama virahitaḥ kalpita asat vibhāgaḥ vākyasphoṭaḥ janayati matim tādṛśīm sva abhidheye varṇāḥ tu ete prakṛti laghavaḥ kalpana eka pratiṣṭhāḥ tasmin arthe vidadhati dhiyam na iti alam tat kathābhiḥ 
[II,159,ii_II,159,iii]	atra abhidhīyate kim ayam anumāna mahimnā sphoṭa abhyupagamaḥ pratyakṣa pratīti balavat tayā vā na tāvat anumānataḥ sphoṭa svarūpam upapādayitum pāryate paridṛśyamāna viśiṣṭa anupūrvīka varṇa kalāpa karaṇena artha pratīteḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt 
[II,159,iv_II,159,v]	nanu vyasta samasta ādi vikalpaiḥ utsāditam varṇānām vācaka tvam na etat durvikalpāḥ te vyastānām tāvat vācaka tvam na iṣyate eva varṇānām samastāḥ eva te vācakāḥ yat tu tad sāmastyam na asti krama bhāvi tvāt iti tat asat krama bhāvinām api samastānām kārya kāriṇām anekaśas darśanāt yathā yugapad bhāvinaḥ samastāḥ trayaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ekām nāsām dhārayantaḥ dṛśyante 
[II,160,i_II,160,ii]	tathā krama bhāvinaḥ api samastāḥ grāsāḥ ekām tṛptim utpādayantaḥ dṛśyante ekasmin api hi grāse hīyamāne na bhavati tādṛśī tṛptiḥ atas samastāḥ eva te grāsāḥ tṛpteḥ kāraṇam na ca samastāḥ api te grāsāḥ yugapad prayoktum śakyāḥ tathā eka anuvāka grahaṇe saṃsthānām krama bhāvinīnām api sāmastye sati sāmarthyam ekayā saṃsthayā tadāmukhīkaraṇa asaṃbhavāt evam tāvat loke sāmastyam krama bhāvinām dṛṣṭam 
[II,160,iii_II,160,iv]	vede api darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti itaretara yoga śaṃsinā dvandvena samarpita sāhityānām āgneya ādi yāgānām pakṣa dvaye prayojya tvena ca aparihārya kramāṇā meka adhikāra saṃpādaka tvam dṛṣṭam tathā aindra vāyavam gṛhṇāti āśvinam gṛhṇāti iti soma grahaṇa abhyāsānām samastānām krama bhāvinām ca eka pradhāna nirvartaka tvam dṛṣṭam iti atas ca na ayam virodhaḥ sāmastyam krama bhāvi tvam ca iti evam krama vartinaḥ api varṇāḥ eva artha abhidhāyinaḥ bhaviṣyanti 
[II,160,v_II,161,i]	nanu grāsa saṃsthā ādīnām yuktam samastānām krama bhāvi tvam yatas kāryam api tadīyam tṛpti ādi krameṇa nirvartyamānam dṛśyate varṇebhyaḥ tu krameṇa śrūyamāṇebhyaḥ na yāvatī tāvatī artha avagati mātrā nirvartyamānā dṛśyate yadi evam āgneya ādibhyaḥ tarhi krameṇa nirvartyamānam kim kāryam upalabhyate avāntarā pūrvam iti brūmaḥ śabda prāmāṇyāt parama apūrva nirvṛttiḥ tu teṣām sāmastye sati sesyati iti ucyate avāntarā pūrva nirvṛttau idānīm krama bhāvinām āgneya avayava bhūta kriyā akṣaṇānām kim avāntaram kāryam kā vā tasya nirvṛttiḥ upalabhyate 
[II,161,ii]	api ca yathā abhimatam yat kāryam tad abhisandhānena pravṛttiḥ tat sāmastyāt pūrvam na kvacid upalabhyate na hi avāntara apūrveṇa svarga mātrā kācid abhinirvartyate śāstra arthasya tadānīma niṣpanna tvāt atas kim avāntara apūrveṇa kṛtena api yat kiṃcitvava antara apūrva prāyam kāryam varṇeṣu api na na darśayitum śakyate kim tat iti ced svarūpa grahaṇam saṃskāraḥ vā bhaviṣyati 
[II,161,iii]	tayoḥ pradhāna kārya avayava tvam na asti iti ced mā bhūt ana yava tvam tad upayogi tā tu vidyate eva avayava avayavi vyavahāraḥ tu avāntara parama apūrvayoḥ api durupapādaḥ padānām tu vākya artha priti patti lakṣaṇa pradhāna kārya avayava bhūta padārtha jñāna ākhya kārya nirvartaka tvam atispaṣṭam asti eva iti na teṣu eṣa doṣaḥ prāduṣyāt 
[II,162,i]	varṇānām api gamana kriyā akṣaṇānām iva grāma prāptau grāsānām iva tṛptau saṃsthānām iva amukhīkaraṇe yadi api krama upacīyamāna tad kārya mātra samutmeṣaḥ na asti tathā api tad aupayikasya upalabdhi saṃskāra ādi kāryasya karaṇāt tad kārya avayavaḥ tāvat kṛtaḥ bhavati iti na samastānām krama kāri tvam apahīyate tatra pūrve varṇāḥ atītāḥ api upakariṣyanti carama varṇaḥ tu vartamānaḥ iti īdṛśaḥ eva ayam kālpanikaḥ kriyā akṣaṇa samūhaḥ iva varṇa samūhaḥ artha pratyāyakaḥ 
[II,162,ii_II,162,iii]	athavā krama upalabdheṣu api varṇeṣu mānasam anuvyavasāya rūpam akhila varṇa viṣayam saṃkalanā jñānam yat upajāyate tat artha pratyāyana aṅgam bhaviṣyati dṛśyate ca vinaśvareṣu api padārtha antareṣu krama anubhūteṣu yugapad anu vyavasāyaḥ mānasaḥ śatam āmrāṇi bhakṣitavān devadattaḥ iti na ca ayam pratyayonā asti sandigdhaḥ bādhyate vā anabhyupagamyamāne ca īdṛśi samuccaya jñāne tad nibandhanāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vyavahārāḥ utsīdeyuḥ sa ca ayam saṃkalanā pratyayaḥ smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna prāktana antya varṇa viṣaya tayā sat asat varṇa gocaraḥ citra rūpaḥ upeyate yadi vā antya varṇe api tirohite bhavan asat varṇa gocaraḥ eva citra ākāraḥ saḥ artha pratīti hetuḥ ekaḥ eva iti niravakāśāḥ vyasta samasta vikalpāḥ 
[II,163,i_II,163,ii]	nanu saṃkalanā pratyaye api yadi te varṇāḥ krameṇa avabhāsante tad asau api pūrva utpanna ekaika varṇa buddhiḥ nirviśeṣaḥ eva syāt iti tat upārūḍhāḥ api varṇāḥ na artha pratīti hetavaḥ bhaveyuḥ yadi tu eka sumana stabaka ākāravatī sa pratyayaḥ tadā tasmin kramānavagamāt viparīta kramāḥ api te varṇāḥ artha pratīti kāriṇaḥ syuḥ ucyate viśiṣṭa anupūrvīka varṇa mālā anubhava samanantara bhāvī hi saṃkalanā pratyayaḥ artha pratīteḥ hatuḥ na stabaka ākāra pariccheda mātram viparīta krama āśaṅkanam ca tadānīm kutastyam stabaka avabhāse tāvat kramaḥ eva na asti kasya vaiparītyam avaiparītyam vā yat anantara janmā ayam samuccaya pratyayaḥ tāḥ ca viśiṣṭa krama avabhāsinyaḥ eva pūrva bhāvinyaḥ varṇa buddhayaḥ iti kutas vaiparītya vikalpaḥ tasmāt prathama paripaṭhana niyata ānupūrvīkāḥ te tad anantara bhāvi samasta avabhāsi saṃkalanā pratyaya upārūḍhāḥ varṇāḥ artha pratīti kāriṇaḥ syuḥ iti na doṣaḥ yathā vā pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahitaḥ antya varṇaḥ iti tatrabhavatā mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kṛta āvarṇitam tathā varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam astu 
[II,163,iii_II,163,iv]	nanu atra uktam saṃskārasya artha pratīti janaka tvam na dṛṣṭa pūrvam smṛtau eva tasya vyāpāraḥ iti kim iyam rājā ājñā smṛtiḥ eva saṃskāreṇa kartavyā iti na iyam rājā ājñā naya ājñātu eṣā na hi saṃskāraḥ nāma svatantraḥ kaḥ api dharmī kintu paṭu abhyāsa ādara pratyaya gṛhīteṣu artheṣu yat ātmanaḥ smaraṇa kāraṇam sa saṃskāraḥ sā ca smṛtyā eva kāryeṇa kalpyamānā śaktiḥ na ca śakti rūpasya saṃskārasya śakti antaram artha pratīti janmani saṃbhavati yena eva kāryeṇa sā śaktiḥ kalpitā tad apahāya kim kārya antaram kuryāt smaraṇa hetoḥ ca saṃskārasya prasava kāraṇa tanu bhavaḥ anubhava hetoḥ tvasya nūtana caritasya saṃskārasya janma nimittam eva na utpaśyāmaḥ tasmāt na asau artha pratīti hetuḥ bhavati 
[II,164,i]	na etat sāram varṇa anubhava saṃskṛta mateḥ puṃsaḥ artha pratīti darśanāt na hi smaraṇa śaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ kintvā ātma guṇaḥ vāsanā ākhyaḥ sa ca smṛtim iva artha pratītim api janayitum utsahate sarvatra naḥ darśanam pramāṇam smaraṇa janana kauśalam api tasya tathā darśanāt avagamyate tat idam anubhava jananam api tatas dṛśyate eva varṇāḥ ca tad anubhavāḥ ca vyatītāḥ anyat ca śabda tattvam na anubhūyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ asti ca artha pratītiḥ na asau niṣkaraṇikā syāt karaṇa vyatirekeṇa hi sā anudbhavantī karaṇam ākṣipati yat asyāḥ karaṇam sa saṃskāraḥ iti smṛtiḥ iva artha pratītiḥ api tad kārya tvāt tad anumāpikā bhavati eva 
[II,164,ii_II,164,iii]	yat tu kutas tādṛśaḥ saṃskāraḥ udeti iti jaḍa praśnaḥ ayam anubhava hetukasya su prasiddha tvāt tathā ca āhuḥ vastu dharmaḥ hi eṣaḥ yad anubhavaḥ paṭīyān smṛti bījam ādhatte iti nanu smṛti bījam iti yat ucyate tat katham anubhava bījam syāt na eṣa niyamaḥ smṛteḥ eva bījam iti anubhavaḥ tāvat tathāvidham ātma dharmam ādhatte sa kārya bhedaḥ api na utpattau kāraṇa antaram mṛgayate kārya bhedaḥ ca asya tathā daśa enāt avagamyate iti uktam 
[II,165,i_II,165,iii]	athavā kim anena nirbandhena na sākṣāt artha pratīti kārī saṃskāraḥ smṛti dvāreṇa tām kariṣyati pūrva varṇeṣu saṃskārāt smaraṇam antya varṇe śrotra indriyāt anubhavaḥ iti evam smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna varṇa karaṇakaḥ artha pratyayaḥ syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ nanu anubhava krama āhita saṃskāra sāmarthyam anurudhyamānāḥ smṛtayaḥ api krameṇa utpattum arhanti na yugapad iti tatas ca prāktanaḥ eva doṣaḥ sāmastya abhāvāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ nānā varṇa viṣayaiḥ krama bhāvibhiḥ anubhavaiḥ krama upaceya ātmā puṭapākaiḥ iva kārtasvarasya ekaḥ eva ātmanaḥ saṃskāraḥ tādṛś upādhīyate yena sarvān eva pūrva dṛṣṭān varṇān asau sakṛt smarati iti saṃskārāt saṃskāra utpattiḥ alaukikī iti ced nālaukikī svādhyāya adhyayane siddha tvāt uccāraṇa kriyāyāḥ kṣaṇika tvāt tadā arhite saṃskāra antara kāriṇi saṃskāre aniṣyamāṇe antyam uccāraṇam prathama uccāraṇāt na viśiṣyeta iti tatas kim puruṣa āyuṣeṇa api na anuvākaḥ eva amukhīkriyeta 
[II,165,iv]	nanu ayam īdṛśaḥ prakāraḥ eka smaraṇa siddhaye kalpanīyaḥ artha pratīti hetu tā vā saṃskārasya kalpanīyā iti sarvathā ca iyam adṛṣṭa kalpanā atas na paśyāmahe tatra kaḥ saṃskāram prati pakṣapātaḥ kaḥ ca sphoṭam prati vidveṣaḥ yat eṣa kalpyate na eṣaḥ iti uktam atra tena eva su gṛhīta nāmnā bhāṣya kāreṇa śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti 
[II,166,i_II,166,ii]	nanu na asti kalpanāt vaiguṇyam saṃskāraḥ hi yathāprasiddhi sthitaḥ eva kā tatra kalpanā na hi vayam smaraṇa eka kāraṇa tvam saṃskāra dharmam ati laṅghitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ iva katham na laṅghitavantaḥ bhavantaḥ sarva varṇa viṣaya eka smaraṇa kāritā bhavadbhiḥ api kalpitā eva yā eva hi vartanī varṇānām artha pratītau sā eva sphoṭa vyaktau api tām ca kalpayitvā śabdaḥ anyaḥ kalpitaḥ evam atas ca saṃskārasya ubhaya vādi viditasya smaraṇa kāri tvam ullaṅghya artha pratyaya kāri tvam kevalam asmābhiḥ abhihitam bhavadbhiḥ tu mūlataḥ eva ārabhya abhinavam viśvam utthāpitam apūrvasya śabdasya tāvat astitvam punar varṇa vyatirikta tvam punar avayava śahityam kalpitam iti katham na kalpanā guru tvam tat uktam sadbhāva vyatirekau ca tathā avayava varjanam tava adhikam bhavet tasmāt yatnaḥ asau artha buddhiṣa iti
[II,167,i]	yat punar avādi prathama varṇa buddhi velāyām eva vyaktam sphoṭa tattvam uttara uttara buddhibhiḥ atiśayitatara pratyaya viṣaya tām nīyate ratna tattva vat iti saḥ eṣa viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ ratnasya hi sāvayava tvāt prathama pratyaya aviṣayī kṛta sūkṣma tara avayava viśeṣa grāhiṇām uttarottara pratyayānām asti tatra avakāśaḥ sphoṭaḥ tu varṇa svarupa vadanaṃśaḥ iti tad svarūpa sarva svamādyena eva varṇena vyaktam kim idānīm anye varṇāḥ kariṣyanti eka deśa vyaktiḥ tu niravayavasya varṇasya ivana saṃbhavati yathā uktam alpīyasā api yatnena śabdam uccāritam matiḥ yadi vā na eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti
[II,167,ii]	yaḥ api dvitīyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāhāri yathā anuvākaḥ ślokaḥ vā prathama saṃsthayā gṛhītaḥ api saṃsthā antara abhyāsaiḥ sphuṭataram paricchinnaḥ bhavati tathā sphoṭaḥ api prathama varṇāṃntaraiḥ arti śayita abhivyaktiḥ bhaviṣyati iti saḥ api na sadṛśaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ śloka anuvākayoḥ anaṃśa tva anupapatteḥ kecid avayavāḥ varṇa ātmānaḥ pada ātmānaḥ vā prathamāyām buddhau aparisphurantaḥ saṃsthā abhyāsa labdha atiśayāyām tasyām prakaṭībhaviṣyanti sphoṭaḥ tu eka varṇaḥ iva niraṃśaḥ iti tatra kaḥ buddheḥ atiśaya yogaḥ tasmāt ayam api na saṃgataḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ 
[II,168,i]	ye api ca manvate dhvani vyaṅgya tvāt sphoṭasya na tatra varṇa vikalpa avasaraḥ iti te api na samyak darśinaḥ parāṇudya varṇa pratītim dhvanibhyaḥ śabda pratīteḥ anutpādāt atidruta ucci cārayiṣayā anupalabhyamāna varṇa vibhāgāt ca śabdāt artha pratyaya abhāvāt 
[II,168,ii_II,168,iii]	atha dhvanayaḥ śabda vyaktimādadhānāḥ sthāna karaṇa anurodhena asatyam eva varṇa bhedam upadarśayanti śyāma ādi rūpam iva mukhasya khaṅga ādṛyaḥ iti ucyate tat apya sat asatya tve nimitta abhāvāt pratīyante hi nirbādhayā buddhyā varṇāḥ tat atiriktaḥ tu śabdaḥ na pratīyate yaḥ ca na pratīyate saḥ asti ye ca pratīyante te na santauti ucyamāne śaśaḥ na asti viṣāṇam asti iti syāt tasmāt ayam api na kalpanā gaurava parihāra kṣamaḥ panthāḥ atas suṣṭu uktam śabda kalpanāyām sā ca śabda kalpanā ca iti tasmāt sphoṭa pratipattau yaḥ kramaḥ āstheyaḥ saḥ artha pratītau eva asthīyatām iti kim tena sphoṭena 
[II,168,iv]	anye tu upalabdhi anantara sattākānām varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam ācakṣate tat iha na iṣyate kṣaṇika tvāt varṇānām upalabdheḥ ūrdhvam sattā anupapatteḥ sarvathā vyutpatti anusāreṇa varṇānām artha pratyāyaka tvam tat yathā purā dṛṣṭam tathā abhyupagamyate iti tad uktam yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ iti 
[II,169,i_II,169,ii]	yat tu atra pratīpam uktam kiyantaḥ kīdṛśāḥ iti tatra pratītayaḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na tapasvinaḥ vayam iti yat kiṃcid etat yat punar abhyadhāyi krama vyatyāsa prayuktāḥ api varṇā pratyāyakāḥ bhaveyuḥ kramaḥ eva vā sphoṭaḥ syāt iti tat api na peśalam kramaḥ hi nāma kāla bhedaḥ na ca kālaḥ eva sphoṭaḥ bhavitum arhati 
[II,169,iii]	kramaḥ api ca na svatantraḥ pratipādakaḥ padārtha antara vṛttiḥ vā kintu varṇa āśritaḥ eva tatra ca uktam dvaye sati api tena atra vijñeyaḥ arthasya vācakaḥ varṇāḥ kinnu krama upetāḥ kinnu varṇa āśrayaḥ kramaḥ kramaḥ kramavatām aṅgam iti kim yukti sādhya tā dharma mātram asau teṣām na vastu antaram iṣyate 
[II,169,iv_II,170,i]	tasmāt ye yāvat kramakāḥ yam artham pratyāyantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ varṇāḥ te tad kramakāḥ varṇāḥ tam artham pratyāyayiṣyanti iti na sphoṭāt artha avagatiḥ tat evam kārya anumānam arthāpattiḥ vā na sphoṭa siddhaye prabhavati iti siddham yat api abhāṇi śabdāt atha pratipadyāmahe iti vyavahāraḥ sphoṭa pakṣa sākṣitām ālambate iti tat api asāram varṇānām vācaka tve yathā ukta nītyā sādhite tad pakṣe api tathā vyavahāra upapatteḥ 
[II,170,ii_II,170,iii]	nanu katham upapattiḥ saṃskāraḥ tāvat na śabda śabdena ucyate na hi tathā loke prasiddhiḥ saṃskāre ca vācake vyutpattiḥ api durupapādā para avagati pūrvikā hi śabdāt sva avagatiḥ na ca para sthaḥ saṃskāraḥ parasya pratītim upajanayan grahītum śakyaḥ parokṣa tvāt varṇeṣu api śabda śabdaḥ vartamānaḥ prativarṇam vā varteta varṇa samudāye vā prativarṇam vartamāne ca śabda śabde na śabdāt artha pratipattiḥ syāt ekasya varṇasya vācaka tva ayogāt samudāye tu na vartitum arhati śabda śabdaḥ jāti śabda tvāt dvi vacana bahuvacana anta vyakti śabda prayoge hi tasmāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena na jāti śabdaḥ eka vacana antar prayujyate na hi bhavati devadatta yajñadattau puruṣaḥ iti dhava khadira palāśāḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti tathā gakāraukāra visarjanīyāḥ śabdaḥ iti api na 
[II,170,iv_II,170,v]	vanam vṛkṣāḥ iti vana śabda vat tarhi samudāya vācī bhaviṣyati śabda śabdaḥ na jāti śabda vat iti ced na tatra samudāya vyatireka nirdeśa darśanāt āmrāṇām vanam kapitthānām vanam iti na ca evam iha vyatireka nirdeśaḥ asti gakāra ādīnām śabdaḥ iti adarśanāt atha brūyāt āmra ādayaḥ vanam iti abhedena api vana śabdaḥ prayujyate tathā iha api gakāra ādayaḥ śabdaḥ iti prayokṣyate etat api na asti vana ādau bheda vyapadeśa vaśena prativyakti ca aprayoge siddhe samudāya śabda tve samudāya samudāyina uḥ abheda upacārāt āmra ādayaḥ vanam iti yujyate prayoktum iha tu gakāra ādīnām śabdaḥ iti na kadācid api vyatireka nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate iti samudāya śabda tvam aghaṭamānam tat sarvathā varṇa śabda vādinām anupapannaḥ ayam vyapadeśaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti 
[II,171,i_II,171,ii]	ucyate kim anena upapannena anupapannena vā kṛtyam yadi ayam upapadyate tatas kim atha api na upapadyate tatas api kim na hi loka vyapadeśa nibandhanā vastu sthitiḥ bhavati nanu śāstra kārāḥ api evam eva vyavaharanti bhāvam ākhyātena ācaṣṭe iti na śāstra kāra vyavahārāt api aprāmāṇikaḥ arthaḥ śakyate abhyupagantum katarat ca idam pramāṇam loka vyapadeśaḥ nāma anumānam tāvat pratikṣiptam pratyakṣam api pratikṣepsyate na ca anyat sphoṭa siddhau pramāṇam krama tetat asthāne ayam loka vyapadeśa nirūpaṇena sphoṭa āṭopaḥ 
[II,171,iii_II,172,ii]	na ca atyantam asaṅgataḥ ayam varṇa pakṣe laukikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ pūrva varṇa janita saṃskāra sahite tāvat antya varṇe vācake su saṅgataḥ eva ayam vyapadeśaḥ tasya śabda tvāt eka tvāt ca saṃkalanā pratyaya upārūḍha varṇa vācaka tva pakṣe api na doṣaḥ na hi bheda śabda sahitaḥ eṣa śabda śabdaḥ prayujyate gakāra ādibhyaḥ śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti kevalaḥ tu jāti śabdaḥ eka vacana antaḥ bahuṣu api varṇeṣu na viruddhaḥ kiṃca sphoṭa pakṣe sutarām anupapannaḥ ayam vyapadeśaḥ śabdāt iti prātipadikā arthasya abhāvāt na hi varṇa vat sphoṭe śabda śabdam prayuṃjānaḥ dṛśyate vyavahartṛ janaḥ 
[II,172,iii]	artha pratipatti hetu tvam śabda lakṣaṇam asādhuḥ dhūma ādibhiḥ vyabhicārāt atha api prakrama paryālocanayā śrautra grāhya tva viśiṣṭam artha pratipatti hetu tvam śabda lakṣaṇam abhidhīyate tat idam sphoṭam prati na siddham tasya śrautra pratyaya viṣaya tva abhāvāt śrotra grāhya tvam eva ca tad itara vyayava cheda kṣamam iti tat eva yuktam kim ubhaya upādānena śrotra grāhya tvam ca varṇeṣu eva na artha antarasya iti varṇāḥ eva śabdāḥ tat uktam paraspara anapekṣāḥ ca śrautra buddhyā svarūpataḥ varṇāḥ eva avasīyante na pūrva apara vastunī iti
[II,172,iv_II,173,ii]	śrotra grāhya tvam śabda lakṣaṇam sattā ādau api asti iti ced na śrotreṇa eva iti avadhāraṇasya vivakṣita tvāt śrotram anobhyām grahaṇāt asiddham avadhāraṇam iti ced na samāna jātīya vyavaccheda artha tvāt avadhāraṇasya cakṣuḥ ādīni eva tena vyavacchedyante na manaḥ tathā api śabda tve vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na jātimat tve sati iti prakrama labhya viśeṣaṇa apekṣaṇāt stanayitnu nāda prabhṛtibhiḥ api na vyabhicāraḥ teṣām śabda tva abhyupagamāt tat uktam bhāṣya kṛtā dvividhaḥ ca ayam śabdaḥ varṇa ātmā dhvani mātraḥ ca iti 
[II,173,iii_II,173,v]	artha pratyāyaka tvam tu na lakṣaṇam iti uktam agṛhīta saṃbandha varṇa ātma nyapi śabde tad abhāvena aśabda tva prasaṅgāt kāla antareṇa saṃbandha buddhau satyām ca tasya eva śabda tvam iti avyavasthitam idam lakṣaṇam yat api śabda svarūpa nirūpaṇa prasaṅgena tad abhidheyānām jāti guṇa kriyā ādīnām śabda tā aaśaṅkanam tad pariharaṇam ca tat api kim āśayam iti na vidmaḥ teṣām ati vibhakta rūpa grahaṇāt atas śrotra grāhyasya śabda tvāt sphoṭasya ca śrotra grāhya tva abhāvāt varṇa vādinām eva śabdāt artham pratipadyāmahe iti anukūlaḥ loka vyapadeśaḥ na sphoṭa vādinām iti sthitam 
[II,173,vi]	katham punar śrotra grahaṇa tvam sphoṭasya na mṛṣyate yāvatā padam vākyam iti śrotprakaraṇakam eka ākāram jñānam pratyātma vedanīyam astiḥ na ca asya varṇāḥ ālambanī bhaveyuḥ iti uktam na yuktam uktam iha hi śābaleya ādau pratipiṇḍam gauḥ iti buddhiḥ upajāyamānā sakala piṇḍa sādhāraṇam rūpam vipayīkaroti iti go tva sāmānyam tat iṣyate evam yadi prativarṇam padam padaṃm iti vākyam vākyam iti matiḥ upajāyeta jāti vat tarhi padam vākyam ca sarva varṇa vṛtti kim api rūpam avagacchema na tu evam asti pratītiḥ yathā ca tantu ādi avayava parighaṭṭita paṭa ādi kārya viṣayam ādya nayana sannipāta samayaḥ eva bheda graha rahitam avayavi jñānam udeti tathā krama samuccarat eka eka varṇa svarūpa upagraha nirapekṣam yadi padam iti vākyam iti jñānam bhavet tat pada ādikam avayavinam iva padam vākya meka eka rūpam anumanyemahi na tu evam asti na hi tantubhiḥ iva paṭaḥ vīraṇar iva kaṭaḥ varṇaiḥ padam ārabhyate 
[II,174,i]	yat tu gaugauḥ iti evaṃjñānam abheda grāhi dṛśyate tad ekāju pādheḥ bhinna ājupa śleṣe tu devadattaḥ ityādau nānā akṣara grahaṇam eva vilambitam anubhūyate na ca evam paṭa ādi buddhiṣu tad avayavāḥ kadācid vicchedena avabhāsante tasmāt na avayavī iva jātiḥ iva vā padam vākyam abhinnam avabhāsate 
[II,174,ii_II,175,i]	nanu ca yā asau śabda śabdāt buddhiḥ sā eva iyam sphoṭa buddhiḥ kim idānīm yat eva śabda tva sāmānyam saḥ eva sphoṭaḥ mā evam sphoṭaḥ eva asau na śabda tvam sāmānyam tat sāmānyam hi tat ucyate yatra eka vyakti darśane vyakti antara anusandhānam śābaleya grahaṇe bāhuleyasya iva ihatu na gakāra grahaṇe na vakāra anusandhānam iti na idam sāmānyam eka rūpaḥ tu ayam pratibhāsaḥ śabda tattva viṣayaḥ eva śabda tattvam ca sphoṭaḥ iti ucyate 
[II,175,ii_II,175,iv]	ā jñātam amunā eva hi bhayena kaiścid sphoṭa śaṅkibhiḥ śabda tva sāmānyam apahnutam asthānaḥ eva tu ayam saṃtrāsaḥ na hi śabda tvam sphoṭaḥ prativarṇam hi śabdaḥ śabdaḥ iti buddhiḥ asti na ca varṇasphoṭaḥ tat idam śabda tva sāmānyam eva śabda buddheḥ ālambanam na sphoṭaḥ sāmānya siddhau tu vyakti antara anusandhānam akāraṇam iti prāk eva nirṇītam tasmāt na śabda buddhau api sphoṭaḥ avabhāsate pada vākya buddhā viveti ekaḥ ca satyam āha yat iyam eka kārya kāri tva nibandhanā vana pṛtana ādi buddhi samāna yogakṣemā eva pada vākya buddhiḥ iti na ca jāti ādi buddhiṣu asamāśvāsaḥ vailakṣaṇyasya darśita tvāt 
[II,175,v]	yat api eka kārya kāri tva nibandhanāyām a bheda buddhau itaretara āśraya paricodanam eka artha pratīti pūrvikā pada vākya buddhiḥ pada vākya buddhi pūrvikā ca eka artha pratītiḥ iti tat api na samyak smaryamāṇa anubhūyamāna varṇa janitaiḥ vā iyam artha pratītiḥ iti avocāma na abhinnapada pariccheda pūrvikā iti kutas itaretara āśraya tvam 
[II,176,i]	brūyāt pada vākyayoḥ eka tvam antareṇa katham pada vākya artha pratotiḥ eka rūpā bhavet iti saḥ ayam atīva mugdha ālāpaḥ pratīti bheda abhedau hi viṣaya bheda abhedau anurudhyete na upāya bheda abhedau bhinnaiḥ api locana āloka antaḥkaraṇa prabhṛtibhiḥ upāyaiḥ abhinna artha grāhiṇī buddhiḥ upajanyate eva tat iha padārtha buddheḥ ekātu a ārta padārthaḥ ekaḥ bhavatu yaḥ asyāḥ viṣayaḥ na tu ekam padam yat kāraṇam iti vākya artha buddheḥ api eka tvāt ekaḥ vākya arthaḥ bhavatu na tu ekam vākyam vargīkaraṇa kāraṇam krama bhāvinām bahūnām varṇānām etat bhavati yat eka artha pratipādaka tvam na tu abhedam eva padavākyayoḥ gamayati iti 
[II,176,ii]	vipralabdhāḥ eva ca vaiyākaraṇāḥ pada vākyayoḥ api abhedam manyante kila śabdāt ananya bhūtaḥ eva śabda artham iti sa punar eṣām vyāmohe eva tad bhedasya dṛḍha pramāṇa siddha tvāt śabda adhyāsaḥ tu pratīti viruddha tvena na iṣyate iti alam tat kathayā tasmāt pratyakṣa gamyaḥ api na sphoṭaḥ iti siddham 
[II,177,i]	nanu abhinna tvāt vākya artha buddheḥ viṣaya bheda abheda anuvṛtti tvāt ca buddhi bheda abhedayoḥ abhinnaḥ vākya arthaḥ syāt bāḍham abhinnaḥ na tu anavayavaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ abhinnasya api sāvayatvāt 
[II,177,ii_II,177,iii]	yat tu niravaya tvam ucyate tat atīva saṃvid parāmarśa kaiśala śūnyam vyāhṛtam aṃśāssanti na santi iti cintā atyantam asaṅga tā niraṃśaḥ tu asti na asti iti yuktam cintayitum satām padatad artha bhedasya prativākyam vispaṣṭam ābhā samāna tvāt anupagṛhyamāṇa avayava vibhāgayoḥ ca vākya vākya arthayoḥ anava bhāsamāna tvāt 
[II,177,iv]	astu avayava pratītiḥ sā tu bhrāntā iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt bhānteḥ ca bījam kim api vaktavyam sādṛśyam iti ced kasya kena iti na vidmaḥ yadi hi kvacid mukhyāḥ avayavāḥ prasiddhāḥ bhaveyuḥ tad sādṛśyāt itaratra tad abhāve api bhramaḥ iti gamyeta na tu evam asti sarva vākyānām api abhāga tvāt narasiṃhe api nara avayavāḥ siṃha avayavāḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak pratyabhijñāyante tadvat iha api abhyupagamyamāne nūnam kvacid vākye satya tvam avayavānām eṣitavyam 
[II,178,i]	citre api haritāla sindūra ādi rūpam pānake tvac elā ādi rasaḥ grāma rāge api ṣaḍja ṛṣabha gāndhārā ādi svara jātam pṛthak avagatam iti na te nirbhāga dṛṣṭāntāḥ citra ādi buddhayaḥ tarhi dṛṣṭāntāḥ iti ced bāḍham vākya artha buddhiḥ api nirbhāga iṣyate eva asmābhiḥ buddhīnām niraṃśa tvena sarvāsām anavayava tvāt buddhi viṣayīkṛtaḥ tu arthaḥ dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antikayoḥ sa avayavaḥ eva tasmāt na nirbhāgau vākya vākya arthau iti yuktam 
[II,178,ii]	yat api abhyadhāyi vṛddha vyavahārataḥ saṃbandha buddhiḥ vākya vākya arthayoḥ eva na pada tad arthayoḥ padena vyavahāra abhāvāt iti tat api asādhu vākyāt api vyutpattiḥ bhavantī padārtha paryantā bhavati evam hi pada tad artha saṃskṛta mateḥ abhinava viracitāt api vākyāt vākya artha pratītiḥ upapatsyate tad ā āvāpa udvāpa cakra vaicitryeṇa vākyānām ānantyāt aśakyā prativākyam vyutpattiḥ sā api na apekṣiṣyate itarathāḥ hi sā avaśyam apekṣyeta 
[II,178,iii]	yat tu kevalam padam na prayujyate iti tat asatyam iti tat api asat mahā vākya sthāne avāntara vākyam na prayujyate iti tat api asatyam syāt sva arthe tat prayujyate iti ced padam api sva arthe kvacid prayujyate eva yatra pada antarāṇām arthaḥ artha prakaraṇa ādinā labhyate tatra yāvat aprāptam tāvat padam eva kevalam uccārayanti grantha grahaṇa avasareṣu ca svarūpa avadhāraṇam api phalavat varṇānām mā vā phalavat tvam pada varṇānām bhūt tathā api ratha avayavānām iva ratha kāryeṣu aparyāpta śaktīnām api svarūpa sattvam anivāryam kārya antarāya rathāt ratha avayavāḥ prabhavanti iti ced pada varṇāḥ api kārya antare prabhaviṣyanti ratha kārya eka deśa mātrām kām api ratha avayavāḥ kurvanti iti yadi ucyeta padāni api vākya kārya eka deśam kam api kurvanti eva varṇāḥ api kecid arthavantaḥ bhavanti eva tasmāt na asantaḥ pada varṇāḥ 
[II,179,i_II,179,ii]	yat punar avādi vākyasya iva padāni padānām iva varṇāḥ varṇānām api avayava antarāṇi syuḥ iti tat idam apūrvam pāṇḍityam na hi ghaṭāḥ sa avayavāḥ iti paramāṇubhiḥ api sa avayavaiḥ bhavitavyam paramāṇavaḥ vā niravayavāḥ iti ghaṭaiḥ api niravayavaiḥ bhavitavyam upalabdhi anupalabdhī hi vastūnām vyavasthāpike yat yatha upalabhyate tat tathā bhavati yadya thā na upalabhyate tat tathā na bhavati vākya padayoḥ ca bhāgāḥ upalabhyante na varṇānām tathā hi uktam etat alpīyasā api yatnena śabdam uccāritam matiḥ yadi vā na eva gṛhṇāti varṇam vā sakalam sphuṭam iti tasmāt bāliśa coditam idam varṇasya api avayavāḥ bhavantu pada vākyayoḥ api vā mā bhūvan iti 
[II,180,i]	itas ca sāvayavau vākya vākya arthai pada upajanana apāyābhyām tad artha upajana na apāya darśanāt anayā eva yuktyā pada bhāgāḥ api prakṛti pratyaya ādayaḥ tāttvikāḥ iti avagantavyāḥ na kalpanā mātra pratiṣṭhāḥ vṛkṣam vṛkṣeṇa iti atra prakṛti artha anugame pratyaya arthaḥ bhidyate vṛkṣam ghaṭam iti pratyaya artha anugama prakṛti arthaḥ bhidyate tatra yaḥ arthaḥ yam śabdam anugacchati sa tasya arthaḥ iti avasīyate tat katham asatyāḥ bhāgāḥ
