[II,400,iii_II,400,v]	atha mṛd piṇḍa rūpeṇa tadānīm ghaṭaḥ asti iti kathyate na tarhi asau tadānīm ghaṭaḥ asti mṛd piṇḍaḥ eva asau asti na hi anya rūpeṇa anyaḥ asti iti śakyate vaktum uṣṭraḥ api asan mṛd piṇḍa rūpeṇa asti iti syāt atha uṣṭra rūpam uttara kālam api na nirvartyate ghaṭaḥ tu tatas nirvartyate yadi evam yadā eva asau nirvartyate tadā eva asti na tatas pūrvam iti atha pūrvam śaktayā ātmanā tasya astitvam idīnīm abhivyakti ātmanā kriyate iti tat api anupapannam abhivyaktiḥ api tad svarūpāt bhinnā abhinnā vā satī asatī vā iti vikalpyamānā na pūrva uktam doṣam ativartate 
[II,401,i_II,401,iii]	kā ca iyam abhivyaktiḥ kim kārya ātmanā avasthānam atha saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ uta pratītiḥ iti yadi kārya ātmanā avasthānam tat pūrvam na abhūt tad adhunā bhūtam iti asat kāryam pūrvam api vā yadi tadā āsīt tadā punar kāraka vaiphalyam saṃsthānam api avayava sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ sa ca āsan eva kriyate avayavāḥ tu santi iti kasya atra vivādaḥ na hi paramāṇavaḥ asmābhiḥ na aṅgīkṛtāḥ 
[II,401,iv_II,401,vi]	pratītiḥ tu ghaṭasya cakṣuḥ ādi kāraka sāmagrī adhīnā na mṛd piṇḍa daṇḍa cakra ādi kāraka cakra sādhya iti sā cakra mūrdhani ghaṭasya na asti eva iti asan ghaṭaḥ darśana adarśana adhīne sat asat tve hi vastunaḥ dṛśyamyādarśanāt tena cakre kumbhasya na astitā cakra mūrdha vat pradhvaṃsa daśāyām api anupalambhāt ghaṭasya na astitvam eva iti atas ca na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti apramāṇakam pūrva apara antayoḥ bhāva svarūpa adarśanāt 
[II,402,i]	śakti ātmanā api yat astitvam asya ucyate atra api cintyam kā iyam śaktiḥ nāma iti yadi ghaṭa svarūpāt bhinnā asau tarhi para rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ asti sva rūpeṇa ca na asti iti asat kāryam uktam syāt ghaṭāt abhinna tve tu śakteḥ śakti rūpeṇa ghaṭaḥ asti iti sva rūpeṇa eva ghaṭa astitvam uktam bhavet tat ca pratyakṣa virodhāt nirastam 
[II,402,ii]	asat karaṇa pakṣe ca yat ca uditam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi api kriyeta iti tat tu vacana vyakti aparijñānāt yat asat tat kriyate iti na iyam vacana vyaktiḥ api tu yat kriyate tat asat iti 
[II,402,iii]	svarūpa sahakārya ādi hetavaḥ yat vidhāyinaḥ dṛśyante janyate tat hi na vyoma kusuma ādikam prāc abhāva daśāyām ca hetu vyāpāra darśanam na tu pradhvaṃsa velāyām atas kam anuyuṃjmahe upādānam tu sarvasya yat na sarvatra dṛśyate tat na kāryasya sadbhāvāt api tu evam nirīkṣaṇāt adya tve vyavahāraḥ api na eva apūrvaḥ pravartate yathā upalabdhaḥ vṛddhebhyaḥ sa tathā eva anugamyate taila arthī sikatāḥ kaścid ādadānaḥ na dṛśyate adṛṣṭavā ca adya na anyaḥ api tad arthī tāsu dhāvati anvaya vyatirekau ca gṛhyete vyavahārataḥ anādiḥ ca eṣa saṃsāraḥ iti kasya anuyojya tā 
[II,403,i_II,403,iv]	athavā śakti niyamāt eva upādāna niyamaḥ upapatsyate śaktiḥ tu nityā sūkṣmā ca na iha kācid upeyate tad abhyupagame nityam kārya utpatti prasaktitaḥ kintu yogya tā avacchinna svarūpa sahakāri sannidhānam eva śaktiḥ sā eva iyam dvividhā śaktiḥ ucyate avasthitā āgantukī ca mṛd tvā ādi avacchinnam svarūpam avasthitā śaktiḥ āgantukī ca daṇḍa cakra ādi saṃga rūpā śakti dvaya kṛtā ca kārya niṣpattiḥ asakṛt dṛṣṭā iti tad arthibhiḥ tu tad upādānam yogya tā api na artha antaram kiṃcid kintu vastu viśeṣaḥ eva iti evam vastu viśeṣa niyamāt upādāna niyama siddheḥ na sat kāryam 
[II,403,v]	na ca śaktiḥ eva kāryam iti vaktavyam kārya svarūpasya tatas pṛtha gbhūtasya pratītyā vyavasthāpanāt śakteḥ ca kāryatve kāryāt eva kārya utpādaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ syāt na ca ghaṭāt ghaṭaḥ utpattum arhati śakteḥ ca kāryam utpadyate iti abhyupagatam atas anyat kāryam anyā ca śaktiḥ 
[II,404,i_II,404,ii]	nanu vācya vācakayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ vyaṅgya vyaṃjakayoḥ ca dīpa ghaṭayoḥ ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ dṛṣṭā iti kārya kāraṇayoḥ api asau ubhaya adhiṣṭhānā bhavitum arhati asati dvitīye kārya ākhye tad āśraye katham iyam ubhaya āśritā syāt iti na etat evam yathādarśanam śakteḥ abhyupagamāta na ca ekatra dṛṣṭam rūpam anyatra api mṛgyate vācya vācakayoḥ vyaṅgya vyajakayoḥ ca dvayoḥ pṛthaktvena darśanāt ubhaya āśritā śaktiḥ aṅgīkṛtā iti hetu dvayasya anupalambhāt kevala kāraṇa vattiḥ eva śaktiḥ tad kṛtaḥ ca upādāna niyamaḥ iti siddham 
[II,404,iii_II,404,v]	asat kārya pakṣaḥ eva upādāna niyama vicāraḥ yuktaḥ utpattau khalu siddhāyām upādānam vicāryate sataḥ tu na eva na asti iti kim upādāna cintayā satkārya vāde ca sutarām upādāna niyamaḥ durghaṭaḥ sarvasya sarvatra bhāvāt sikatā tila sarit tīra kedāra vyapta bīja niyata aṅkura ādi krama utpadyamāna tila svarūpa paryālocanayā tileṣu iva sikatāsu api taila saṃbhavāt sarvasya sarvatra ca astitve niyata padārtha pratiṣṭhita hāna upādāna ādi vyavahāra sakalaḥ eva viplaveta 
[II,405,i]	api ca prāyaścittam eṣa tapasvī taptakṛcchram atikaṣṭam katham cariṣyati iti mahat mama manasi kāruṇyam annam ca tāvat ayam aśnāti anne ca varcaḥ asti iti viṣ bhakṣaṇāt prāyaścittīyate eva ayam iti alam satkārya vāda pramādena 
[II,405,ii]	yat punar abhāṇi kāraṇa anupamardena kārya anutpādāt abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ bhavet tatra ca anantara vṛtti utpatti niyamaḥ na syāt iti tat api ayuktam mūrtānām samāna deśa ṛtva avarodhāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ eka deśa tvam na iṣyate na etāvatā bhāva utpattiḥ abhāvāt bhavitum arhati kāraṇa adhīna tad utpāda darśanāt atas eva ānantarya niyamaḥ api upapannaḥ na ca kārya kāraṇayoḥ abhedāt sat kāryam iti vaktavyam tayoḥ pratyakṣa siddha bhinna svarūpa tvāt 
[II,405,iii_II,406,i]	yat tu niralambanā kāraka pravṛttiḥ iti coditam parihṛtam tat bhāṣya kāreṇa buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti vṛddha vyavahārataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvām avagamya amuṣmāt kāraṇāt idam īdṛśam kāryam utpadyate iti buddhau nirdhārya kārakāṇi kartā niyuṅkte iti na nirviṣayaḥ kāraka vyāpāraḥ tat evam satkārya vādasya niṣpramāṇaka tvāt tad mūla anvaya ādi hetu sidhya bhāvāt na pradhāna astitva siddhiḥ tad abhāvāt ca na tad vikṛtiḥ nitya abuddhiḥ api tu jñāna upalabdhi rūpā eva iti samyak sūtritam buddhiḥ upalabdhi rjñānam iti anartha antaram iti 
[II,406,ii_II,406,iii]	itas ca anityā buddhiḥ jānāmi jñāsyāmi ajñāsiṣam iti upajanana apāya dharma tayā pāka ādi vat kāla traye api prakāśamāna tvāt jñāna vyatiriktāyāḥ ca buddheḥ apratibhāsāt ayam tu viśeṣaḥ pāka ādi kriyāṇām odana ādi phala avaccheda dvārakam kāla vaitatyam api bhavati upalabdheḥ tu vastu svarūpa prakāśana mātra parisamāpta prayojanāyāḥ kāla vetatyam na asti eva atas eva anitya tve api utpanna apavargiṇīm eva buddhim ācakṣate śabda vat na ghaṭa ādi vat kāla antara sthā yinīm iti 
[II,406,iv]	sā ca iyam buddhiḥ ātma antaḥkaraṇa śabda dīpa indriya artha ādi aneka kāraka kalāpa kāryā api satī na bāhyena bāhya karmaṇi samavaiti na bāhya karaṇe cakṣuḥ ādau na antaḥkaraṇe manasi kintu kartari eva kartā api ca nityaḥ vibhuḥ ātmā na bhūta saṅghāta svabhāvaḥ kāryaḥ tasyāḥ āśrayaḥ iti ātma parīkṣāyām nirṇītam guṇa tvam api ca asyāḥ tatra eva darśitam 
[II,407,i]	nanu evam tarhi na buddheḥ anitya tvam vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt dvividhaḥ hi guṇānām vināśa hetuḥ āśraya vināśaḥ virodhi guṇa prādurbhāvaḥ vā na iha āśraya vināśa nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na ca virodhinam asyāḥ kam cit ruṇam upalabhāmahe na śabda vat āśu vināśi tvāt nitya ākāśa guṇaḥ api śabdaḥ śabda antaram ārabhya yathā vinaśyati tathā buddhiḥ buddhi antaram ārabhya vinaśyati iti tathā darśanāt kalpyate yāvān ca kaścana vināśa darśana bheda upalambha ādiḥ śabdasya anitya tāyām nyāya uktaḥ sa sarvaḥ api buddhau api yojanīyaḥ 
[II,407,ii_II,407,iii]	atas eva na buddhīnām eka pramātṛ vṛttīnām yaugapadya vidyate varṇānām iva eka vaktṛ prayuktānām vinaśyadavinaśyat daśayoḥ tu buddhyoḥ āśu vināśi tve api yaugapadyam anubhavāt abhyupeya taiti alam ati vistareṇa buddheḥ anitya tāyām ca prāyeṇa sarva vādinām avivādaḥ tathā ca āha jaiminiḥ sat saṃprayoge puruṣasya indriyāṇām buddhi janma tat pratyakṣam iti 
[II,407,iv]	acira ruci vat tasmāt buddhiḥ nisarga vinaśvarī bhavati janakaḥ sva ātmā tasyāḥ saḥ eva samāśrayaḥ bhava maru bhavaiḥ tāpaiḥ yā jātam eva yunakti sā vyasana jananīm jahyāt enām parama artha vid 
[II,408,i_II,408,ii]	yugapad jñāna anutpattiḥ manasaḥ liṅgam manasaḥ yat eva sattve pramāṇam tad gamya tvam eva asya lakṣaṇam samāna itara jātīya vyavaccheda kāritvāt 
[II,408,iii]	nanu manasaḥ indriya tvāt tad vargaḥ eva paṭhanam yuktam kimarthaḥ ayam pṛthak nirdeśaḥ na dharma bhedāt bhautikāni indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi sa guṇānām ca eṣām indriya bhāvaḥ manaḥ tu na bhautikam na niyata viṣayam na ca asya sa guṇasya indriya bhāvaḥ iti 
[II,408,iv_II,409,ii]	tat ca na bhautikam akārya tvāt atas eva na tad guṇa yogi na ca niyata viṣayam sarva viṣaya tvam tu asya sakala bāhya indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātṛ tvat tad anadhigamya sukha ādi viṣaya grāhi tvāt ca bāhya indriyāṇi hi manaḥ a dhiṣṭhitāni sva viṣayeṣu pravartitum utsahante cakṣuḥ ādīni na anyathā kasmāt evam iti ced yugapad jñāna anutpatteḥ uttara kālam ca bāhya indriya vyāpāra virahe api tad artha avamarśāt asti eka indriya gamyeṣu kvacid jāti guṇa ādiṣu vijñāna ayaugapadyam yat manasaḥ tat na sādhanam tatra viṣaya ādi doṣeṇa dūra tva ādinā jāti ādeḥ yugapad gṛhītum aśakyatvāt 
[II,409,iii]	yat tu nānā indriya grāhyeṣu yugapad sannihiteṣu api gandha rasa rūpa ādiṣu viṣayeṣu tad grahaṇeṣu ca sva kārya anumita sannidhāneṣu satsu api avikaleṣu kāraṇeṣu yugapad upalabdhayaḥ na bhavanti tatas avasīyate nūnam kāraṇān daram ebhiḥ apekṣyate tat ca manaḥ iti ākhyāyate 
[II,409,iv_II,409,vi]	nanu ca sugandhi śītalām dīrghām aśnantaḥ śuṣka śaṣkulīm kapila brāhmaṇāḥ santi yugapad paṃca buddhayaḥ api ca ayam khalu adhyāpakaḥ adhīte vrajati kamaṇḍalum dhārayati panthānam paśyati śṛṇoti araṇya jān śabdān bibhyat vyāla liṅgāni bubhutsate iti krama agrahaṇāt yugapad etāḥ buddhayaḥ asya bhavanti iti na āśu utpatteḥ sūcī agra bhidyamāna kokanada daḷa kadamba kāla vat ati sūkṣma tvāt kālasya kramaḥ tatra na vibhāvyate bhavitavyam tu tena iti 
[II,410,i]	yadi kāraṇa antara nirapekṣa cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa sādhyāḥ eva rūpa ādi viṣaya upalabdhayaḥ tad uttara kālam upahata karaṇānām api katham smaraṇa ādi rūpaḥ tad avamarśaḥ atas nūnam nayana ādi vat karaṇa antaram avikalam tat grāhi vidyate 
[II,410,ii_II,410,iv]	avyāpakam ca tat vyāpi tve na hi buddhīnām yaugapadyam nivartate asti ca ayam vyavahāraḥ ukte api kyacit vacasi kaścid āha na aham etat aśrauṣama anyatra me manaḥ abhūt iti tasmāt na vyāpakam manaḥ pratiśarīram ekam ca tad aneka tve punar api jñāna yaugapadyān apāyāt kriyāvat ca tat niṣkriyeṇa indriyāṇām adhiṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt 
[II,410,v_II,410,viii]	mūrta ca tat amūrtasya kriyā anupapatteḥ mūrta tve sati nityam ca tat niravayavat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca murta tvam tu anitya tā āyām aprayojakam iti vakṣyāmaḥ niravayavam ca tad avayava kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt vegavat ca tad āśu saṃcārāt āśu saṃcāram antareṇa upalabdhi śaighryasya dṛṣṭasya anupapatteḥ 
[II,410,ix_II,411,iii]	indriya saṃyogi ca tat dravya tvāt dravyam ca tat vega ādi guṇa yogāt kriyāvat tvāt anāśrita tvāt ca acetanam ca tat kāraṇa tvāt itarathāḥ hi ekatra śarīre cetana dvaya samāveśāt avyavahāraḥ syāt iti tasmāt evaṃrūpam manaḥ sāṅkhya uktam su tasya rūpam ayuktam iti tad prakriyā niṣedhāt eva vyākhyātam 
[II,411,iv]	anyāni api smṛti anumāna āgama saṃśaya pratibhāsvapnoha jñānāni āntara sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa ādi viṣaya grāhīṇi ca jñānāni manasaḥ liṅgāni santi eva teṣām bāhya indriya vyāpāra sādhya tva asaṃbhavāt karaṇa rahitāyāḥ ca kriyā abhinivṛtteḥ adarśanāt iti 
[II,411,v_II,412,i]	smṛtiḥ tāvat manaḥ janyā eva anumāna āgama jñānam tu parokṣa artha viṣayat tvāt mānasam saṃśayaḥ tu mānasaḥ api kaścid vakṣyate pratibhā manāsī darśitā eva śvas me bhrātā aagantā iti svapna jñānam uparata indriya grāmasya bhavat katham nāma na mānasam tarkaḥ api saṃśaya vat kvacid viṣaye mānasaḥ bhavati eva sukha ādīnām tu jñapti vat utpattiḥ api manaḥ nibandhana eva kāryaṇām ātma guṇānām utpattau pratyāsanna kāraṇa antara saṃbhave api ātma mana ssaṃyogasya avadhṛta sāmarthyasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvāt atas ca viṣaya anubhava janye api sukha ādau manassaṃyogaḥ kāraṇam sukha ādīnām ca bodha svarūpa tvam sva saṃvedya tvam ca nirastam atas tad upalabdhau manasaḥ eva kāraṇa tā 
[II,412,ii_II,412,iii]	tat idam manaḥ pūrva kṛta śubha aśubha karma saṃkāravatā aatmanā tad vaśāt eva śarīra deśe saṃyogam pratipadyate tatra eva ca jīvana vyavahāraḥ vipacyamāna karma āśaya sahitaḥ ātma mana ssaṃyogaḥ jīvanam iti hi vadanti saṃyuktaṃca ātmanā manaḥ teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu nānāvidha bhoga sādhana tayā saṃsāra kāraṇam bhavati nitya tvāt ātma manasoḥ anādi tvāt ca saṃsārasya na idam codanīyam prathamam eva katham ātma manasossaṃyogaḥ iti na hi prathamaḥ nāma kaścid kālaḥ samasti ādisargasya api pūrva sarga sāpekṣa tvāt īśvaraḥ api hi karma apekṣaḥ eva vicitrasya jagataḥ sraṣṭā iti nirṇītam etat iti kṛtam vistareṇa vidadhat sukha ādi bhogam vahat ca tarala indriya aśvasārathitām bandha nimittam manaḥ iti manasvinā yatnataḥ heyam 
[II,413,i_II,413,ii]	pravṛttiḥ vāc buddhi śarīra ārambhaḥ vāc iti varṇa ātmaka śabda kāraṇa saṃyoga ādi ucyate na indriyam iti vyākhyātam buddhiḥ iti manaḥ iha ucyate na upalabdhiḥ śarīram prasiddham teṣām ārambhaḥ vyāpāraḥ taiḥ vā ārambhaḥ iti sarvathā tadīya kriyā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate 
[II,413,iii_II,413,vi]	sā ca dvividhā puṇyā pāpikā ca tatra pāpikā vācā caturvidhā manasā trividhā śarīreṇa trividhā eva iti daśavidhā vācā pravṛttiḥ tatra anṛta paruṣa sūcanā sambaddha vacana rūpā caturvidhā para droha para dravya abhilāṣa na āstikyā anuvyāna rūpā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ hiṃsā steya pratiṣiddha maithuna ācaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ maithuna grahaṇam evaṃprakāra surā pāna ādi upalakṣaṇa artham sā iyam daśavidhā pravṛttiḥ anavaratam abhijvalataḥ niratiśaya duḥkha vedanā dāyinaḥ naraka analasya indhanam 
[II,413,vii_II,414,i]	puṇyā api satya priya hita vacana svādhyāya adhyayana rūpā caturvidhā vācā pravṛttiḥ japa yajñe hi svādhyāya pāṭhaḥ eva upāṃśunā anta ssaṃjalpena vā aspṛhā anukampā para loka śraddhā ātmikā trividhā manasā pravṛttiḥ dāna paritrāṇa paricaraṇa rūpā trividhā śarīreṇa pravṛttiḥ iti iyam api darśavidhā eva eṣā ca svarga sadana dvāra sopāna kalpā 
[II,414,ii]	sā iyam ubhayatas viṃśati bhedā pravṛttiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ dvividhā eva vidhi niṣedha ātmaka tad avagama upāya bhedāt vidhi niṣedha avagama śaraṇaḥ eva hi sat asat karma avagamaḥ tatra vihita anuṣṭhānam svargāya niṣiddha ācaraṇam narakāya iti evam sukha duḥkha upabhoga sthāna śarīra indriya ādi abhisamba dhani bandhanam eṣā pravṛttiḥ bhavantī saṃsārasya paramam kāraṇam bhavati 
[II,414,iii_II,414,iv]	yaḥ hi ayam deva manuṣya tiryagyoniṣu śarīra saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca prativiṣayam buddhi saṃsargaḥ yaḥ ca ātmanā saha manasassaṃsargaḥ sa sarvaḥ pravṛtteḥ eva pariṇāma vibhavaḥ vṛtteḥ ca sarvasyāḥ kriyā tvāt kṣaṇika tve api tad upagataḥ dharma adharma śabda vācyaḥ ātma saṃskāraḥ karma phala upabhoga paryanta sthitiḥ asti eva na ca phalam adattvā dharma adharmau kṣīyete antya sukha duḥkha saṃvid virodhinau hi dharma adharmau udāharanti na ca jagati tathāvidham kim api kāryam asti vastu yat na dharma adharma abhyām anākṣipta saṃbhavam iti tad ucchede mumukṣuṇā yatnaḥ āstheyaḥ iti vitanutaḥ puṇya apuṇya pravṛtti samudbhavau nigala vat imau dharma adhamau rujam bhava bandhane yadi niravadheḥ duḥkhasya antam cikīrṣasi sarvathā parihara manaḥ vāc kāyānām pravṛttim anargalām 
[II,415,i_II,415,ii]	pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ pravartanā pravṛttim prati prayojaka tā sā lakṣaṇam yeṣām iti pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ doṣāḥ doṣa prayuktaḥ hi puruṣaḥ puṇye karmaṇi pāpe vā pravartate 
[II,415,iii_II,415,iv]	nanu pratyātma vedanīya tayā doṣāṇām sva rūpam aparokṣam eva tat kim artham eṣām lakṣaṇataḥ rūpam nirūpyate satyam pratyātma vehanīya tve api yat eṣām pravartanā lakṣaṇa tvam upadiśyate tat anena rūpeṇa saṃsāra kāraṇa tva jñāpana artham dharma adharma nirmitaḥ hi śarīra ādi duḥkha adhiṣṭhāna saṃbandhaḥ tad bījasya ca karmaṇaḥ kāraṇam doṣāḥ karmaṇi pumāṃsam pravartayantaḥ bhavanti iti pravartanā lakṣaṇāḥ iti uktāḥ para santāna vartinām doṣāṇām apratyakṣa tvāt tat pratītaye pravartana ālakṣaṇattva kathanam iti tu apavyākhyānam alpa prayojanaka tvāt iti 
[II,415,v]	teṣām doṣāṇām trayaḥ rāśayaḥ bhavanti rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ mohaḥ iti tatra anukūleṣu artheṣu abhilāṣa lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ pratikūleṣu asahana lakṣaṇaḥ dveṣaḥ vastu pāramārthya apariccheda lakṣaṇaḥ mithyā adhyavasāyaḥ mohaḥ 
[II,416,i]	nanu ca īrṣyā asūyā lobha māna mada matsara ādi doṣa antara saṃbhavāt katham trayaḥ eva doṣāḥ na īrṣi ā ādīnām yathā nirdiṣṭeṣu eva antar bhāvāt 
[II,416,ii]	kāmaḥ matsaraḥ spṛhā tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ iti paṃca prakāraḥ rāga pakṣaḥ strī saṃyoga icchā kāmaḥ yat anyasmai nivedyamānam api vastu dhana vat na kṣīyate tad aparityāga icchā matsaraḥ anātmīyavaḥ tu āditsā spṛhā punarbhava prati sandhāna hetu bhūta icchā tṛṣṇā niṣiddha dravya grahaṇa icchā lobhaḥ iti abhilāṣa prakāra bhedāt rāga pakṣaḥ eva ayam 
[II,416,iii]	dveṣapakṣaḥ api paṃcavidhaḥ krodha īrṣyā asūyā drohaḥ amarṣaḥ iti akṣi bhvra ādi vikāra hetuḥ prajvalana ātmakaḥ krodhaḥ sādhāraṇe api vastuni parasya darśana ādya sahanam īrṣyā para guṇeṣu akṣamāḥ asūyā para apakāraḥ drohaḥ adarśita mukha ādi vikāraḥ param prati manyuḥ amarṣaḥ iti asahana prakāra bhedāt eṣa dveṣapakṣaḥ 
[II,416,iv]	mohapakṣaḥ tu caturvidhaḥ mithyājñānam vicikitsā mānaḥ pramādaḥ iti atasmin tat iti jñānam mithyājñānam kim svid iti vimarśaḥ vicikitsā asat guṇa adhyāropeṇa sva utkarṣa buddhiḥ mānaḥ kiyat etat iti avajñayā kartavyā karaṇam pramādaḥ saḥ eva madaḥ iti ākhyāyate saḥ ayam tattva aparijñāna prakāra bhedāt mohapakṣaḥ 
[II,417,i]	evam trayaḥ eva ete doṣāḥ śoka haṣau tu sukha duḥkhe ucyete na doṣa antaram teṣām tu mohaḥ pāpatamaḥ itarayoḥ tu tad adhīna ātma lābha tvāt mūḍhasya hi rāga dveṣau bhavataḥ mithyā saṃkalpāt utpadyamānayoḥ anubhavāt ku saṃkalpaḥ ca mithyājñāna prakṛtiḥ evam mithyājñānasya eva bhagavataḥ sarvam idam vilasitam yaḥ ayam aneka prakāraḥ saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ 
[II,417,ii]	yadi evam na tarhi mohasya doṣa tvam doṣa kāraṇa tvāt iti na tad lakṣaṇā napāyāt sati api doṣa antara hetu tve svayam api puruṣa pravṛtti prayojaka tva lakṣaṇa yogāt rāga vat doṣa tvam na mohaḥ api jahāti te ime doṣāḥ saṃsāra hetavaḥ iti yatnataḥ śamanīyāḥ 
[II,417,iii]	katham punar amī śamayitum śakyāḥ uktam atra na akasmikāḥ na nityāḥ na ajñāta śamana upāyāḥ na ca aśakya pratikriyā iti vistarataḥ ca etat apavarga āhnike parokṣyate mithyājñāna nimittāḥ khalu ete doṣāḥ tasmin samyak jñāna prabhāva nihate hetoḥ abhāvāt na bhavanti eva iti 
[II,418,i_II,418,ii]	nanu evam prasava vināśa kāraṇayoḥ eka tvāt ekaḥ eva doṣaḥ bhavet iti tritvam hīyeta na anubhava siddha bheda tvāt anubhūyate hi rāga dveṣa mohānām itaretara vibhaktam sva rūpam kāraṇa eka tvam tu na prayojakam ekasmāt eva jvalana saṃyogāt utpadyamānānām vinaśyatām ca pārthiva padārtha vṛttīnām gandharasa rūpa sparśānām nānātva darśanāt atas sūktam doṣaṇām trairāśyam iti saṃsāra kāra abhavana praveśa mārgāḥ te ete trayaḥ eva doṣāḥ eṣām prahāṇa udyamam ādadhānaḥ na janma mṛtyū punar abhyupaiti 
[II,418,iii_II,418,iv]	punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ kasya iyam punar utpattiḥ ucyate ātmanaḥ śarīrasya vā tatra ātmanaḥ nitya tvāt utpattiḥ eva na asti kā kathā punar śabda arthasya śarīrasya tu utpattiḥ asti na tu paunaḥpunyena na hi mṛtam śarīram tat eva punar utpadyate tasmāt punar utpattiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ iti avācakam sūtram ucyate punar śabda arthasya yatnatas upadiṣṭasya parihartum aśakyatvāt tasya eva nirveda utpāda dvāraka apavarga upayoga yogya upadeśa tvāt ātmanaḥ ca sthāyi tvena kriyā abhyāvṛtti saṃbhavāt tasya eva punar punar utpatti brūmaḥ utpatti vat maraṇam api saḥ ayam ātmanaḥ eva mṛtvā punarjanma pretyabhāvaḥ iti 
[II,419,i]	nanu janma maraṇe ubhe api nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na saṃstaḥ iti uktam satyam śarīra ādi saṃyoga viyogayoḥ tu tathā abhidhānāt na doṣaḥ maraṇam ātmanaḥ bhoga āyatana deha indriya ādi viyogaḥ ucyate janma tu tad saṃbandhaḥ te ete vipacyamāna karma āśaya anurūpeṇa deha indriya ādi tyāgopādāne eva maraṇa janmanī kriyā abhyāvṛttyā bhavantī pretyabhāvaḥ iti ucyate saḥ eva ca saṃsāraḥ tat ittham anudhyāyataḥ kasya sacetasaḥ nirvedaḥ na udiyāt tat uktam jarā viyoga maraṇa vyādhayaḥ tāvat āsatām janma eva kim na dhīrasya bhūyas bhūyastra pākaram 
[II,419,ii_II,419,iii]	atha yaiḥ utpadyamānaiḥ deha indriya ādibhiḥ ātmanaḥ saṃbandhaḥ teṣām katham utpattiḥ iti uktam sūtra kṛtā vyaktāt vyaktānām utpattiḥ pratyakṣa prāmāṇyāt iti vyaktāt iti kāpila abhyupagata triguṇa ātmaka avyakta rūpa kāraṇa niṣedhena paramāṇūnām śarīra ādau kārye kāraṇa tvam āha tathā hi pārthivam āpyam taijasam vāyavīyam iti caturvidham idam kāryam sva avayava āśritam upalabhyate tatra yathā ghaṭaḥ sa avayavaḥ kapāleṣu āśritaḥ evam kapālāni api sāvayava tvāt tad avayaveṣu tad avayavāḥ api tad avayava antareṣu iti evam tāvat yāvat paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ iti yatra yāvataḥ kārya jātasya sva avayava āśritasya pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam tatra tat eva pramāṇam tatas ūrdhvam anumānam 
[II,420,i]	tat api hi kāryam sva avayava āśritam sāvayava tvāt paridṛśyamāna kārya vat niravaya tve tu tasya parama aṇu tvam eva paramāṇuṣu ca sāvayava tvasya ca hetoḥ asiddha tvāt na avayava antara kalpanā teṣām hi sāvayava tve tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na te utpatti krama vat vināśa krameṇa api paramāṇavaḥ anumīyante loṣṭasya pravibhajyamānasya bhāgāḥ tad bhāgānām ca bhāga antarāṇi iti evam tāvat yāvat aśakya bhaṅga tvam adarśana viṣaya tvam ca bhavati tat yatas param a vayava vibhāgaḥ na saṃbhavati te paramāṇavaḥ ucyante teṣu api hi vibhajyamāneṣu tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyuḥ na te tat etat evam utpatti krama vat vināśa kramasya īdṛśaḥ darśanāt santi paramāṇavaḥ 
[II,420,ii]	atra hi trayī gatiḥ asya ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya niravayava tvam eva vā avayava ānantyam vā paramāṇu anta tā vā tatra niravayava tvam anupapannam avayavānām paṭe tantūnām ghaṭe ca kapālānām pratyakṣam upalambhāt ananta avayava yogi tvam api na yuktam meru sarṣapayoḥ ananta avayava yogi tva aviśeṣeṇa tulya parimāṇa tva prasaṅgāt tasmāt paramāṇu anta tā eva yuktimatī 
[II,421,i_II,421,ii]	te ime paramāṇavaḥ cetanā icchā preraṇam antareṇa viśiṣṭa kramakam itarā itara saṅghaṭanam alabhamānāḥ kārya siddhaye na paryāpnuyuḥ acetana tvāt iti cetanaḥ eṣām adhiṣṭhānā sakala bhuvana nirmāṇa nipuṇa matiḥ īśvaraḥ abhyupagataḥ tat si ddhaye ca sakala kutarka timira tiraskāra pūrvakam pūrvam eva niravadyam anumānam upapāditam īśvaraḥ api na aneka ātma vṛtti vipāka unmukha dharma adharma saṃskāra vaicitryam ananurudhyamānaḥ vicitrasya jagataḥ janma nirmātum arhati iti etat api darśitam 
[II,421,iii]	na ca sakṛt eva sarve nirvartyamāna kārya parimāṇa anuguṇa saṅkhyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekatra saṃyojya kāryam ārabhante kintu dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa sakṛt ārambhe hi kumbhe bhajyamāne kapāla śarkarā kaṇa cūrṇa ādi kramam apahāya prathamam eva paramāṇu anta tā bhavet sarva saṃyogasya sarva vibhāgena sahasā eva vināśāt atas ca karpara ādi krama darśanam virudhyeta avinaṣṭe api paṭa ādau tantu ādi avayava āśrita tvam upalabhyamānam katham vā samarthyeta paramāṇūnām apratyakṣa tvena tad āśrita tvasya grahītum aśakyatvāt paramāṇūnām ghaṭasya ca madhye kārya antara anārambhāt iti tasmāt dvi aṇuka ādi prakrameṇa paramāṇavaḥ kāryam ārabhante 
[II,421,iv]	nanu dvādveva paramāṇū prathamam saṃghaṭete iti atra kā yuktiḥ ucyate bahutva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat parimāṇa kāraṇa tva darśanāt triṣu paramāṇuṣu prathamam milatsu tad kārye bahu tva saṃkhyāyāḥ mahat tva ārambhaka tvāt tad pratyakṣa tvam prasajyeta na ca tad pratyakṣa tvam ati sūkṣma tvāt atas dvābhyām paramāṇubhyām dvi aṇukam ādau utpadyate 
[II,422,i]	tat ca paramāṇu vat a pratyakṣam eva mahattva anutpādāt dvi aṇuka dvayena tu kārya ārambhaḥ iṣyamāṇe tad aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ dvi aṇukaḥ iva tatra api mahat tva utpattau kāraṇa abhāvāt atas tribhiḥ dvi aṇukaiḥ tri aṇukam ārabhyate tatra ca bahu tva saṃkhyayā mahat tvam api ārapsyate pratyakṣa tvam ca bhaviṣyati tatas param tu krama sāmānye pramāṇam asti loṣṭa ādi bhaṅge sva avayava khaṇḍa avayava darśa nam krama viśeṣe tu pramāṇam na asti ittham ārambhaḥ iti yatra vā darśanam asti tatra tat astu krama viśeṣe pramāṇam iti 
[II,422,ii_II,423,ii]	ārabhya ārambhaka tvam na iṣyate mūrtānām samāna deśa tva virodhāt na hi paramāṇavaḥ prathamam kāryam ārabhya tadanu te eva uttarottara kālam kāryāṇi āra bhante kintu yat paramāṇu nirvṛttam kārya dvi aṇukam tat kārya antarasya ārambhakam tat api anyasya kāryaṇya iti evam tāvat yāvat paripūrṇa avayavi niṣpattiḥ ittham ca tantubhiḥ paṭaḥ kriyate na tantu avayavaiḥ aṃśubhiḥ itarathā hi uttarottara kārya ārambhe api pūrva pūrva kāraṇān apāyāt mūrtānām eka deśa tvam syāt na ca tat dṛśyate iti yathā uktaḥ eva kramaḥ śreyān t a d e v a m a n e k ā t m a samaveta dharma adharma saṃskāra paripāka anurūpa prasarat īśvara icchā preryamāṇa paramāṇu kriyā ānupūrvī nirvartyamāna dvi aṇuka ādi kārya prakrameṇa śarīra ādi a vayavi nivṛttiḥ iti sthitam 
[II,423,iii_II,423,iv]	etad viparītāni tu mata antarāṇi pramāṇa viruddhāni tathā hi nityam eva śarīra ādi anutpatti dharmakam iti pratyakṣa viruddham pṛthivī ādeḥ api avayava sanniveśa viśiṣṭa tvāt kāryatvam īśvara siddhau nirṇītam ākasmika tvam api śarīra ādeḥ kāryasya na yuktam kāraṇa niyama upalambhāt animittāyāḥ ca bhāva utpatteḥ anupapatteḥ 
[II,423,v_II,423,vii]	abhāvāt bhāva utpattiḥ api tādṛś eva triguṇa ātmaka pradhāna vikāra mahat ahaṅkāra ādi kāraṇaka tvam api kāryasya pṛthivī ādeḥ prāk eva pratiṣiddham anārabdha avayavi rūpa kāryāḥ paramāṇavaḥ eva ete saṃcaya viśiṣṭāssantaḥ lokayātrām vahanti iti etat api na samīcīnam saṃcayasya bheda abheda vikalpābhyām anupapadyamāna tvāt paramāṇūnām ca ati saukṣmyāt apratyakṣa tvāt 
[II,423,viii_II,424,iii]	paudgalika kārya pakṣe api paryāya antareṇa paramāṇūnām kathanam apramāṇaka tvam vā śabda vivarta tvam tad anugama agrahaṇāt anupapannam paramātma upādāna tvam api na saṃbhavati tasya eva niṣpramāṇaka tvāt na ca na kadācid anīdṛśam jagat iti pāda prasārikā mātram kartum ucitam sarga pralaya prabandhasya samarthita tvāt iti 
[II,424,iv]	atas ca pakṣa antara durbala tvāt yathā uditaḥ siddhyati bhūta sargaḥ tam yaḥ tu paśyan api nihnuvīt tasmai namaḥ paṇḍita śekharāya anādau saṃsāre sthitam idam aho mūḍha manasām janitvā jantūnām maraṇam atha mṛtvā api jananam iyam sā duḥkhānām saraṇiḥ iti saṃcintya kṛtinā nidhātavyam cetaḥ janana maraṇa ucchedini pade 
[II,424,v_II,425,i]	pravṛtti doṣa janitaḥ arthaḥ phalam pravṛtti doṣāḥ tu vyākhyātāḥ tat janitaḥ arthaḥ phalam iti ucyate artha pada grahaṇam gauṇa mukhya bheda pradarśana artham sukha duḥkhe mukhyam phalam tad sādhanam tu śarīra indriya viṣaya ādi gauṇam sarvam hi idam pravṛtti doṣa ākṣiptam phalam iti uktam tat idam anādinā prabandhena pravartamānam phalam punar punar upabhujyate iti mahataḥ khedasya hetuḥ iti bhāvyamānam nirveda vairāgya ādi mārgeṇa apavarga upayogi tām pratipadyate ātta māttam vijahataḥ tyaktam tyaktam ca gṛhṇataḥ puṃsaḥ phala ghaṭīyantram aho kaṣṭaḥ pariśramaḥ 
[II,425,ii]	tat punar phalam karmaṇā kim sadyas eva saṃpadyate kāla antareṇa vā ucyate dvividham karma vihitam niṣiddham ca tatra vidhi phalānām kāla niyamaḥ na asti kriyā phalam hi dogdhi pacati iti samanantaram utpadyamānam dṛśyate vidhi phalānām tu na eva niyamaḥ iti śabda parīkṣāyām citra ākṣepa parihāra avasare nirūpitam etat 
[II,425,iii_II,425,iv]	vidhi phalam apiḥ ca kiṃcana codanā vacana paryālocanayā sadyas iti niścīyate vṛṣṭiḥ iva kārīryāḥ kiṃcid aihika phalam api karma vastu balāt kāla antara apekṣam bhavati putra iṣṭi ādi na hi sahasā eva nidhi lābha vat putra lābhaḥ saṃbhavati garbha saṃbhava hetu bhūta bhāryā parirambhaṇa ādi krama apekṣa tvāt jyotiṣṭoma ādi tu svarga phalam karma phala svarūpa mahimnā eva pāralaukika phalam avartiṣṭhate svargaḥ hi niratiśayā prītiḥ tad anyathā anupapatti parikalpitaḥ kanaka giri śikhara ādiḥ vā bhoga deśaḥ ubhayathā api na etat deha upabhoga yogya tām pratipadyate aniyata phalam tu citra ādi kaiścid uktam tat ca yuktam ayuktam iti vā tatra eva parīkṣitam 
[II,426,i_II,426,iii]	niṣiddhasya tu karmaṇaḥ sarvasya eva prāyeṇa para loke eva phalam para dāra abhimarṣaṇa ādau hi kriyā phalam surata sukha ādi sadyas phalam niṣedha vidhi phalam tu naraka patanam pāralaukikam svarga vat narakasya api niratiśaya duḥkha ātmanaḥ tad anyathā anupapati parikalpita deśa svabhāvasya vai etat śarīrān upa bhoga yogya tvāt tīvra saṃvega nirvṛttam tu karma vihitam itarat vā pratyāsanna vipākam iha eva bhavati nandīśvara nahuṣayoḥ iva iti āgama vidaḥ cora brahma ghna ādayaḥ ca kecid pratyāsanna pratyavāyāḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyante eva iti evam eṣām vicitraḥ karmaṇām vipākaḥ 
[II,426,iv]	yat api ca ucyate karma kāle phalam na asti phala kāle karma na asti kāla antare ca phalasya anyat pratyakṣam kāraṇam upalabhyate sevā ādikam iti tat api pūrvam parihṛtam karmaṇām vināśe api tat janitasya ātma saṃskārasya dharma adharma śabda vācyasya bhāvāt dṛṣṭasya ca sevā ādeḥ kāraṇasya vyabhicārāt adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ avaśyaṃbhāvi tvāt 
[II,427,i_II,427,ii]	dharma ādeḥ ātma ni samavāyāt phalasya ca putra paśu ādeḥ anyatra samaveta tvāt bhinna adhikaraṇa tvam karma phalayoḥ iti api na codyam mukhyasya sukha duḥkha ātmanaḥ phalasya bhinna āśraya tva anupapatteḥ sukha duḥkhe hi ātmani vartete dharma adharmau ca tad sthau eva iti dṛṣṭam na eva sukhasya kāraṇam atas tad hetu rāgeṇa kim duḥkhasya api na tad nibandhanam iti dveṣaḥ tad artheṣu kaḥ tasmāt karma nimittakam phalam iti dhyāyan na kuryāt kṛtī saṅgam karmaṇi yena dustaram asau saṃsāram āpadyate 
[II,427,iii_II,427,iv]	bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham bādhanā pīḍanam santāpanam sā lakṣaṇam asya iti bādhanā lakṣaṇam duḥkham tatra mukhye duḥkhe lakṣye lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ yathāśrutaḥ eva bādhanayā eva hi duḥkha svarūpam lakṣyate bādhayati duḥkhayati iti gauṇe tu duḥkhe śarīra ādau lakṣye bādhanā lakṣaṇam bādhana anuṣaktam iti vyākhyeyam 
[II,427,v]	nanu pūrva sūtra vyākhyātena phala grahaṇena eva duḥkhasya upadiṣṭa tvāt kim artha punar upadeśaḥ sukha pratyākhyana arthaḥ iti ced na pūrva apara virodhāt sakala prāṇabhṛt anubhava sākṣika tvena ca sukhasya pratyākhyātum aśakyatvāt tad pratyākhyāne ca vivakṣite kim artham prameya sūtre phala pada upādānam phale khalu sukha duḥkhe iti vyākhyātam tatas ca sukhe pratyākhyāte duḥkham eva avaśiṣyate tat ca anena duḥkha śabdena eva nirdiṣṭam iti kim phala grahaṇena 
[II,428,i_II,428,ii]	ucyate na sukha leśasya saṃsāre jantubhiḥ antarā antarā anubhūyamānasya pratyākhyānāya duḥkha grahaṇam kintu sarvatra tathātva bhāvanā upadeśa artham saḥ api hi sukha lavaḥ duḥkham eva iti bhāvayitavyaḥ tad sādhananam api sarvam duḥkham eva iti mantavyam na tad vyavasitam puṃsām na tat karma na tad vacaḥ na tad bhogyam samasti iha yat na duḥkhāya jāyate 
[II,428,iii_II,428,iv]	tat ittham duḥkham utkṛṣṭam tiraścām madhyamam manuṣyāṇām hīnam devānām hīnataram vīta rāgāṇām iti āgama vidaḥ vīta rāgāṇām duḥkha tānavam yuktitaḥ api avagamyate duḥkhasya rāga nibandhana tvāt tattvataḥ cintyamānam hi sarvam duḥkham vivekinaḥ viṣa saṃpṛkta madhu vat sukham duḥkhībhavati adaḥ sukha adhigama lobhena yatamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ sahasra śākham āpnoti duḥkham eva tad arjane evam sarvam idam duḥkham iti bhāvayataḥ aniśam sarva upapatti sthāneṣu nirvedaḥ asya pravartate nirviṇṇasya ca vairāgyam viraktasya ca dehinaḥ kleśa karma prahāṇa ādi dvāraḥ niḥśreyasa udayaḥ 
[II,429,i]	nanu evam tarhi phala grahaṇam na kartavyam duḥkha padena eva gata artha tvāt iti uktam mā evam tasya anya prayojana tvāt pravṛtti doṣa janita tvena sukha duḥkhe bhāvayitavye abhyāsena ca vartamāne iti karma doṣa janita tvena hi phalam anucintayataḥ tad kāraṇayoḥ anukūla pratikūlayoḥ asya rāga dveṣau mā bhūtām abhyāvṛttyā ca sa sādhanasya phalasya hāna upādāna srotasohyamānaḥ tatra atyantāya nirvidya tām iti phala grahaṇam tat evam anyathā phalasya niḥśreyasa upayogi tvam anyathā tu phalatve sati api duḥkhasya iti 
[II,429,ii]	dīrghasya duḥkhasya nimitta bhūtam sukham ca duḥkha ātmakam eva sarvam mumukṣuṇā heya tayā vicintyam deha ādi duḥkhāntam idam prameyam iti nipuṇa matiḥ yaḥ dukham eva iti sarvam pariharati śarīre kleśa karma ādi jālam ajam ajaram anantam cintayan ātma tattvam gata bhayam apavargam śāśvatam saḥ abhyupaiti 
[II,430,i_II,430,iv]	evam śarīra ādau duḥkha paryante heye prameye nirṇīte yad arthaḥ etat upadeśaḥ yat param upādeyam prameyam yad arthaḥ śāstra ārambhaḥ tam apavargam lakṣayitum āha tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ tat iti prakrāntasya duḥkhasya avamarśaḥ na ca mukhyam eva duḥkham bādhanā svabhāvam avamṛśyate kintu tad sādhanam tat anuṣaktam ca sarvam eva tena duḥkhena viyogaḥ apavargaḥ asti pralaya velāyām api ātmanaḥ duḥkha viyogaḥ sa tu apavargaḥ na bhavati sarga samaye punar akṣīṇa karma āśaya anurūpa śarīra ādi saṃbandhe sati dukha saṃbhavāt atas tad vyāvṛtti artham atyanta grahaṇam 
[II,430,v]	ātyantikī duḥkha nivṛttiḥ apavargaḥ na sauvadhikā dvividha duḥkha avamarśinā sarva nāmnā sarveṣām ātma guṇānām duḥkha vat avamarśāt atyanta grahaṇena ca sarva ātmanā tad viyoga abhidhānāt navānām ātma guṇānām buddhi sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma saṃskārāṇām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti uktam bhavati 
[II,431,i_II,431,ii]	yāvat ātma guṇāssarve na ucchinnāḥ vāsanā ādayaḥ tāvat ātyantikī duḥkha vyāvṛttiḥ na avakalpate dharma adharma nimittaḥ hi saṃbhavaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ mūla bhūtau ca tau eva stambhau saṃsāra sadmanaḥ tat ucchede tu tad kārya śarīra ādi anupaplavāt na ātmanaḥ sukha duḥkhe staḥ iti asau muktaḥ ucyate hacchādveṣa prayatna ādi bhoga āyatana bandhanam ucchinna bhoga āyatanaḥ na ātmā taiḥ api yujyate prāṇasya kṣuppipāse dve lobha mohau ca cetasaḥ śīta ātapau śarīrasya ṣaṣ ūmi rahitaḥ śivaḥ tat evam navānām ātma viśeṣa guṇānām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti yat ucyate tat eva idam uktam bhavati tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ apavargaḥ iti 
[II,431,iii]	nanu tasyām avasthāyām kīdṛś ātmā avaśiṣyate svarūpa eka pratiṣṭhānaḥ parityaktaḥ akhilaiḥ guṇaiḥ umiṣṭaka atigam rūpam tat asya āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ saṃsāra bandhana adhīna duḥkha kleśa ādya dūṣitam 
[II,431,iv]	atra tāvat vedāntinaḥ āhuḥ na ayam idṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna bhūmiḥ bhavitum arhati kaḥ hi nāma śilā śakala kalpam apagata sakala sukha saṃvedana saṃsparśam ātmānam upapādayitum yateta sa upādhi sau adhika parimita ānanda niṣyandāt svargāt api adhikam anavadhika niratiśaya naisargika ānanda sundaram aparimlāna tad saṃvedana sāmarthyam caturtham puruṣa artham ācakṣante vicakṣaṇāḥ 
[II,432,i]	yadi tu jaḍaḥ pāṣāṇa nirviśeṣaḥ eva tasyām avasthāyām ātmā bhavet tat kṛtam apavargeṇa saṃsāraḥ eva varamastu yatra tāvat antarā antarā api duḥkha kaluṣitam api su alpam api sukham upabhujyate cintyatām tāvat idam kim alpa sukha anubhavaḥ bhadrakaḥ uta sarva sukha ucchedaḥ eva tasmāt nitya sukham ātmanaḥ mahattva vat asti iti āgama prāmāṇyāt abhyupagamyatām tat ca saṃsāra daśāyām avidyā āvaraṇa vaśena na anubhūyate tattva jñāna abhyāsa bhāvanā abhibhūta nirantara avidyā varaṇaḥ tu ātmā tasyām avasthāyām tat anubhavati iti 
[II,432,ii]	tat idam anupapannam ātmanaḥ nitya sukha sattāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt pratyakṣam tāvat na asmad ādīnām anyeṣām vā keṣāṃcid asmin arthe prabhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā anumānam api na saṃbhavati liṅga leśa anavalokanāt iti 
[II,432,iii_II,433,ii]	nanu uktam eva anumānam apavargāya yatra prekṣāvatām prayatnaḥ sukha siddhaye hi buddhimantaḥ yatante na aśma kalpam ātmānam kartum iti tat ayam iṣṭa adhigama arthaḥ mumukṣoḥ prayatnaḥ prekṣā pūrva kāri prayatna tvāt kṛṣi ādi prayatna vat iti na aniṣṭa uparama artha tvāt aniṣṭasya api śāntaye santaḥ prayatamānāḥ hi dṛśyante vyādhi kheditāḥ ati durvahaḥ ca ayam saṃsāra duḥkha bhāraḥ iti tad upaśamāya vyavasyantaḥ santaḥ na niṣprayojana prayatnāḥ bhavanti iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ 
[II,433,iii_II,433,iv]	atha āgamāt avagamyate bibhutvena iva nityena sukhena avinākṛtaḥ sva ātmā iti tathā ca paṭhyate vijñānam ānandam brahma iti syāt etat evam yadi etat eva kevalam āgama vacanam aśroṣyata vacana antaram api tu śrūyate na ha vai sa śarīrasya sataḥ priya apriyayoḥ upahatiḥ asti aśarīram vā va santam na priya apriye spṛśataḥ iti 
[II,433,v_II,433,vii]	nanu bhavat paṭhitam āgama vacanam anyathā api vyākhyātum śakyate sa śarīrasya iti prakramāt sāṃsārike sukha duḥkhe anukūla itara viṣaya upalaṃbha saṃbhave tadānīm aśarīram ātmānam na spṛśate iti arthaḥ hanta tarhi tvad adhītam api veda vacanam ānandam brahma iti saṃsāra duḥkha parihāra prakaraṇāt eva tad duḥkha apāya viṣayam vyākhyāsyate na khalu vyākhyānasya bhagavataḥ kācid abhūmiḥ asti dṛṣṭāḥ ca duḥkha uparame sukha śabda prayogāḥ cira jvara śirorti ādi vyādhi duḥkhena kheditāḥ sukhinaḥ vayam adya iti tad apāye prayuṃjate 
[II,434,i]	yadi ca ānandam iti vacanāt nityam sukham ātmanaḥ iṣyate tarhi brahma iti vacanāt vyāpaka tvam iva vijñānam iti vacanāt jñānam api nityam asya abhyupagantavyam atas ca sukha vat jñānasya api nitya tvāt saṃsāre api nitya sukha upalabdhiḥ syāt tatas ca dharma adharma phalābhyām sukha duḥkhābhyām asya nityasya sukhasya sāhacaryam anubhūyeta api ca sukha vat jñāna vat ca asya kāmam deha indriya ādi api nityam prakalpyatām ittham mokṣaḥ ramyataraḥ bhavet 
[II,434,ii]	atha kāryam sukha jñānam hetuḥ tasya vicintanīyaḥ yatas utpadyate iti dharmāt ced saḥ api kiṃprabhavaḥ iti vācyam yoga samādhi jaḥ iti ced tasya sva kārya tvāt sva kārya sukha saṃvedana avasāna tvāt na śāśvatika tvam syāt aprakṣayaḥ ca dharmasya niranumānakaḥ na hi yoga samādhi jaḥ dharmaḥ na kṣīyate iti atra ca kiṃcid anumānam asti viparyaye tu prasiddham anumānam sarvasya kṛtakasya anitya tva darśanāt iti kṣīṇe ca dharme tad kārya jñāna abhāvāt sat api sukham anupalabhyamānam asataḥ na viśiṣyate 
[II,434,iii]	sva prakāśam tat sukham iti ced na saṃsāre api tad upalabdhi prasaṅgāt śarīra ādi saṃbandhaḥ pratibandha hetuḥ iti ced na śarīra ādīnām upabhoga artha tvāt bhoga arthāḥ śarīra ādayaḥ te bhoga pratibandham vidadhati iti na sādhvī kalpanā 
[II,435,i_II,435,iii]	avidyā āvaraṇāt saṃsāre sva prakāśa sukha anupalambhaḥ iti ced na prakāśasya tucchena avaritum aśakyatvāt na ca prakāśa rūpam pāramārthikam ātmanaḥ sukham tad viparīta tuccha svabhāvā iyam avidyā na parītum arhati megha ādinā dinakara kiraṇāḥ varaṇa avadhāraṇāt avirala gavala m alīmasam balāhaka vyūha pihita ravi bimbam tat api na rajanī sadṛśam dinam iti sahasā moha mahimā meghāḥ api raveḥ anye svarūpeṇa ca vāstavāḥ tattva anya tvāt acintyā tu na avidyā avaraṇa kṣamā tasmāt na nitya ānanda tvam ātmanaḥ su vacam 
[II,435,iv_II,435,vi]	api ca mokṣe nitya ānanda svabhāve tad rāgeṇa prayatamānaḥ mumukṣuḥ na mokṣam adhigacchet na hirāgiṇām mokṣaḥ asti iti mokṣa vidaḥ duḥkha nivṛtti ātmake api mokṣe duḥkha dveṣāt prayatamānasya samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na mumukṣoḥ dveṣa abhāvāt rāga dveṣau hi saṃsāra kāraṇam iti ca jānāti mumukṣuḥ dveṣṭi ca duḥkham iti katham saṃgacchate sukhe api asya rāgaḥ na asti eva iti ced na svarga nirviśeṣe apavarge svargava drāgasya saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt duḥkhena tu nirviṇṇasya mumukṣoḥ vairāgyam jāyate na duḥkha viṣayaḥ dveṣaḥ viraktasya ca asya mokṣam prati yatnaḥ bhavati na duḥkham dviṣate iti na samānaḥ nyāyaḥ 
[II,436,i_II,436,ii]	yat uktam tādṛśaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām prayatna viṣayaḥ na bhavati iti tat api na sāṃpratam prayojana anusāreṇa pramāṇa vyavasthā anupapatteḥ na hi prayojana anuvarti pramāṇam bhavitum arhati yadi nirānandaḥ mokṣaḥ prekṣāvatām na ruciraḥ kāmam mā bhūt na tu apramāṇakam ānandam tu atra kalpayitum śaknumaḥ 
[II,436,iii]	na ca sarva ātmanā sādhūnām anabhimataḥ eva tathāvidhaḥ mokṣaḥ na catad avāptaye na prayatante te hi evam vivecayanti duḥkha saṃsparśa śūnya śāśvatika sukha saṃbhoga asaṃbhavāt duḥkhasya ca avaśyam hātavya tvāt viveka hānasya ca aśakya tvāt viṣa madhunī iva eka pātre patite ubhe api sukha duḥkhe tyajyetām iti atas ca saṃsārāt mokṣaḥ śreyān yatra ayam iyān ati dussahaḥ duḥkha prabandhaḥ avalupyate varam iyatī kādācid kī sukha kaṇikā tyaktā na tasyāḥ kṛte duḥkha bhāraḥ iyānūḍhaḥ iti tasmāt na sukha upabhoga ātmakaḥ mokṣaḥ iti 
[II,436,iv]	anyaḥ tu āha tiṣṭhatu tāvat mokṣaḥ saṃsāre api na sukham nāma kiṃcid asti iti sarve eva ayam dukha abhāva mātre suḥkha vyavahāraḥ tathā hi tṛṣā śuṣyati āsye pibati salilam svādu surabhi kṣudhā ārtaḥ san śālīn kabalayati māṃ pāka valitān pradīpte rāga agnau ghana nibiḍam āśliṣyati vadhūm pratīkāre vyādheḥ sukham iti viparyasyati janaḥ 
[II,437,i_II,437,ii]	ucyate tad idam ati kṛta ka vairāgya prakaṭana kauru kucī kauśalam ānanda ātmanaḥ prati prāṇi saṃvedyasya sukhasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt anivṛtte api duḥkhe kvacid sukha saṃvedanāt na duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham nirabhilāṣasya api atarkita upanata sukha sādhana viṣaya saṃparke sati sukha saṃveda darśanāt abhilāṣa ātmaka duḥkha abhāvaḥ sukham iti api na manojñam yaḥ tu duḥkha abhāve kvacid sukham iti api vyapadeśaḥ praśānta rogāṇām iva pūrvam darśitaḥ sa bhāktaḥ iti na tāvatā sva saṃvedana sākṣika sukha apahnavaḥ kartum ucitaḥ mokṣa tu nitya sukham asaṃbhavat pramāṇa tvāt na abhyupagamyate 
[II,437,iii]	api ca mokṣe sukham asti na vā iti vicāraḥ eṣa na prāmāṇika jana ucitaḥ sva rūpeṇa vyavasthānam ātmanaḥ mokṣaḥ iti mokṣa vidaḥ tatra ātma svarūpam eva kīdṛśam iti cintyam na pṛthak mokṣa svarūpam ātmanaḥ ca sukha duḥkha budhi ādayaḥ āgantukāḥ guṇāḥ na mahattva vat sāṃsiddhikāḥ iti nirṇītam etat ātma lakṣaṇe sukha ādi kāryeṇa ca ātmanaḥ anumānāt iti 
[II,437,iv_II,438,i]	atas eva kāpila kathita citi śakti svabhāva tvam api na yuktam ātmanaḥ sa cetanaḥ citā yogāt tad yogena vinā jaḍaḥ citiḥ nāma artha vijñānam kādācid kam tu tasya tat na artha saṃvenāt anyat caitanyam nāma vidyate tat ca sāmagrī adhīna tvāt katham mokṣe bhaviṣyati jāgrataḥ svapna vṛtteḥ vā suṣuptasya api vā aatmanaḥ jñānam utpadyate anyā tu caturthī na asti tādṛśī jāgrat daśāyām svapne ca buddheḥ pratyātma vedya tā sukham suptaḥ aham adya iti paścāt pratyavamarśanāt tadā tu avedyamānā api suṣupte dhīḥ prakalpyate turya avasthā tu saṃvitti śūnyasya sthitiḥ ātmanaḥ turya avasthā atigam rūpam yat āhuḥ kecid ātmanaḥ pramāṇa agocara tvena kalpanā mātram eva tat saṃvid prasava sāmarthyam sāmagrī sannidhānataḥ yadi nāma ātmanaḥ asti asya tāvatā na cit ātma tā 
[II,438,ii]	yadi tu darśana śakti yogyatā mātram eva puṃsaḥ caitanyam ucyate tarhi tathāvidhasya tasya kaivalyasya asmākīna mokṣa sadṛśa tvam eva sat saṃvid prasava yogya tāmātra saṃbhave api dṛśya indriya saṃprayoga ādi sāmagrī vaikalyāt kaivalya avasthāyām ātmanaḥ draṣṭṛ tva asaṃbhavāt darśana śūnyasya ca anyasya caitanyasya nirasta tvāt iti 
[II,439,i]	nirvāṇa ādi pada ākhyeyam apavargam tu saugatāḥ santati ucchedam icchanti su acchām vā jñāna santatim mata dvitayam api etat pratyuktam pūrvam eva yat dhvastaḥ ca jñāna santānaḥ nityaḥ ca ātmā samarthitaḥ santati uccheda pakṣaḥ tu naiyāyika matāt api śocyaḥ yatra aśma kalpaḥ api na kaścid avaśiṣyate 
[II,439,ii]	arhat pakṣe api yat rūpam anya sa apekṣam ātmanaḥ na kevalasya tādrapyam iti asmad mata tulya tā vikāri tvam tu jīvānām atyantam asamaṃjasam śabda pudgala vat ca etat pratyākhyeyam asaṃbhavāt tasmāt na vedānta vidaḥ vadanti mokṣam na sāṅkhyāḥ na ca saugata ādyāḥ iti akṣa pāda abhihitaḥ apavargaḥ śroyān tad atyanta vimokṣaḥ eva 
[II,440,i_II,440,ii]	āha bhavatu ayamī dṛś apavargaḥ sa tu katham adhigamyate iti ucyatām uktam eva bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa duḥkha janma pravṛtti doṣa mithyā jñānānām uttarottara apāye tad anantarā pāyāt apavargaḥ duḥkha ucchedaḥ tāvat apavargaḥ iti kathitam kārya tvāt ca duḥkhasya kāraṇa ucchedāt tad ucchedaḥ kāraṇam ca asya janma janmani sati hi duḥkham bhavati jāyate iti hi janma deha indriya ādi saṃbandhaḥ ātmanaḥ tat api janma kāraṇa ucchedāt eva ucchedyam atas tad kāraṇam pravṛttiḥ ucchedyā tasyāḥ api hetu ucchedāt ucchedaḥ iti tad hetayaḥ doṣāḥ ucchedyāḥ teṣām tu nimittam mithyājñānam tasmin ucchinne doṣāḥ ucchinnāḥ bhavanti iti mithyā jñānam ucchedyam tat ucchede ca tattva jñānam upāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ hi ayam arthaḥ samarthitaḥ ca pūrvam vistarataḥ tattva jñānam mithyājñānasya bādhakam iti tasmai tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna doṣa pravṛtti janma duḥkha nivṛtti krameṇa apavargaḥ iti 
[II,440,iii]	yadi api mithyājñānam api janma kāryam aśarīrasya ātmanaḥ mithyājñāna anupapatteḥ itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāvena bīja aṅkura vadana ādi prabandha pravṛttena pravartamānāḥ mithyājñāna ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ saṃsāraḥ iti ākhyāyate tathā api tad kāraṇa uccheda cintāyām kutas prabhṛti ucchedaḥ upakramyatām iti vicāryamāṇe viśeṣa niyama abhāvāt yatas kutaścid iti prāpte mithyājñānasya pratikūlam uccheda kāraṇam tattva jñānam upalabdham iti viśeṣe pramāṇa abhavāt tad ucchadaḥ eva upakramyate 
[II,441,i_II,441,ii]	atas eva mithyājñāna mūlaḥ saṃsāraḥ ucyate tasmin ucchinne tad uccheda saṃbhavāt na tatas prabhṛti saṃsāraḥ pravartate iti nipuṇa matibhiḥ api nirdhārayitum śakyam anādi tvāt tasya iti tat evam tattva jñānāt mithyājñāna apāye tad kārya doṣa apāyaḥ doṣa apāye pravṛtti apāyaḥ pravṛtti apāye janma apāyaḥ janma apāye duḥkha apāyaḥ saḥ eva apavargaḥ iti tat idam uktam uttarottara apāye tad anantara apāyāt iti 
[II,441,iii_II,441,v]	āha viditaḥ ayam sūtra arthaḥ kintva ghaṭamāna manoratha viḍambanā mātram idam alīka śraddadhāna tā prakaṭanam vā duradhigamaḥ tu saṃkaṭaḥ mokṣa mārgaḥ sādhyaḥ trivargaḥ eva eṣaḥ dharma karma artha lakṣaṇaḥ caturthaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ tu kathāsu eva virājate yadā priya viyoga ādi bhavati udvega kāraṇam tadā mokṣa kathāḥ kāmam kriyantām śoka śāntaye na tu udyam asamaye tad adhigama samarthām upalabhāmahe saraṇim ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti anubandhasya dustara tvāt 
[II,441,vi]	ṛṇa anubandhaḥ tāvat jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ tribhiḥ ṛṇaiḥ ṛṇavā brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyaḥ yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ iti idam hi vede paṭhyate tatra prathamam ṛṣīṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti brahmacaryam ācarati tatas pitṛṇām anṛṇaḥ syām iti kṛta dāra saṅgrahaḥ prajā utpādanāya vyavaharati tadanu gṛhasthaḥ eva darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu sahasra saṃvatsara paryanteṣu karmasu adhikṛtaḥ kratūn anutiṣṭhati iti devānām anṛṇaḥ syām iti kaḥ asya mokṣa vyavasāya avasaraḥ 
[II,442,i]	nanu ca ṛṇāṇi trīṇi apākṛtya manaḥ mokṣe niveśayet iti manu ādi smaraṇāt asti eva tad avasaraḥ na śruti vākya virodhāt evam hi śrūyate jarā maryam vai etat satram yat agni hotram darśa pūrṇamāsau ca jarayā ha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vā iti na ca karma prayoga aśaktyā karmabhyaḥ virantum śakyate svayam aśaktasya bāhya śakti upadeśāt antevāsī vā juhuyāta brahmaṇā hi sa parikrītaḥ krītaḥ vā juhuyāt dhanena hi sa parikrītaḥ aśaktasya ca mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāne api asya katham śaktiḥ 
[II,442,ii_II,443,i]	kleśa anubandhāt api apavarga abhāvaḥ ye hi rāga ādayaḥ doṣāḥ ātmanaḥ cira saṃbhṛtāḥ kaḥ tān śamayitum śaktaḥ punarāvṛtti dharmakān kāmam ciram vijitya api krodham vā lobham eva vā punar gacchan vaśe teṣām lokaḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyate tathā hi ciram api tapasi niyamita matiḥ api avijita viṣama śara vikṛtiḥ tanu pavana apanīta vasana kāminī stana jaghana darśanāt eva vaśam viśvāmitraḥ kusumadhanvanaḥ gataḥ iti śrūyate 
[II,443,ii_II,443,v]	alam ākhyāyikayā adyatve api evam śataśas dṛśyate iti durucchedāḥ doṣāḥ vīta rāga janma adarśanāt iti ca vicāritam ātma parīkṣāyām aviyuktaḥ eva doṣaiḥ jantuḥ jāyate iti doṣa vivṛddhi hetavaḥ ca rūpa ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ te katham iva sva karmaṇi udāsate tāmbūlam kusuma sugandha yassamīrāḥ saudheṣu pratiphalitāḥ śaśāṅka bhāsaḥ vācaḥ ca praṇaya nava amṛta drava ārdrāḥ dūtīnām dadhati na kasya rāga vṛddhim api ca mugdha smita sughādhauta madhura ālāpa śālinā mukhena pakṣmala akṣīnām kasya na ākṣipyate manaḥ iti evam nidāna anupaśamāt api sthitaḥ eva kleśa anubandhaḥ 
[II,443,vi_II,444,ii]	pravṛtti anubandhaḥ khalu api rāga ādi preryamāṇaḥ hi karmāṇi ārabhate naraḥ dīrgha dīrghāḥ pratāyante yaiḥ dharma adharma vāsanāḥ yaḥ pravṛtti anubandhaḥ ca hetuḥ anyasya janmanaḥ tena janma antareṇa anyā janyate karma vāsanā ekam eva īdṛśam karma kartum āpatati kvacid janma ayuta śatena api yat phalam bhujyate na vā kleśa karma anubandha utthā janma duḥkha ādi śṛṅkhalā punar āvartamānā eṣā kena upāyena bhajyatām vinā phala upabhogena na vināśaḥ asti karmaṇām teṣām jñāna agninā dāhaḥ iti śraddhā vijṛmbhitam kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ hi śāstrāt eva avadhāritaḥ karmaṇām ca phalānām ca sa katham vā nivartatām na ca pyajñāna sāpekṣam karma iṣṭam bandha kāraṇam yena ātma jñāna yuktānām tat udāsīta tān prati ajñāna nairapekṣyeṇa karmaṇām svabhāvaḥ eva eṣaḥ yat phala avinābhāvi tvam iti tasmāt ittham ṛṇa kleśa pravṛtti ādi anubandhataḥ na mokṣa siddhiḥ asti iti tad arthaḥ viphalaḥ śramaḥ aśakye arthe vṛthā yatnaḥ iti matvā manīṣibhiḥ mokṣa carcāḥ parityajya sve gṛhe sukham āsyatām 
[II,445,i_II,445,ii]	atra abhidhīyate yat tāvat uktam ṛṇa anubandhāt iti tat ayuktam vidhi padā śravaṇāt aupacārikam ṛṇa śabdam jāyamāna śabdam ca prayujya karma stutiḥ iyam kriyate jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti na tad vyatirikta puruṣa artha viṣaya prayatna pratiṣedhaḥ vidhīyate tathā hi ṛṇa śabdaḥ ayam viṣaya antare mukhya arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ yatra uttamarṇaḥ sa lābham amutaḥ pratigrahīṣyāmi iti dhanam adhamarṇāya prayacchati adhamarṇaḥ api sa lābham asmai pradāsyāmi iti mattvā gṛhṇāti saḥ ayam ṛṇa śabdasya mukhyaḥ viṣayaḥ iha na asti eva 
[II,445,iii]	jāyamānaḥ api mukhyaḥ utpadyamānaḥ hi mātuḥ kukṣi kuhārān nissaran abhi dhīyate na ca asau tapasvī bālaḥ karmabhiḥ abhisaṃbadhyate tasmāt brahmacaryam apatya utpādanam adhvara prayogaḥ iti tritayam idam ṛṇavat avaśya kartavyam iti karma stutiḥ iyam aupacārika pada prayogāt gamyate na ca etāvatā mokṣa vyavasāya avasara virahaḥ iti pariśaṅkanīyam āśrama antarasya tad aupayi kasya darśanāt 
[II,445,iv_II,446,i]	nanu maraṇa avadhi darśa pūrṇamāsa ādi dharma upadeśāt katham āśrama antara grahaṇam na jarā marya vāda sthāpya parityāga pratipādanāya karma praśaṃsā artha tvāt ye catvāraḥ pathayaḥ deva yānāḥ ityādayaḥ hi caturtha āśrama śaṃsinaḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ santi mantra artha vādāḥ manu ādi smṛti vacanāni caturtha āśrama upadeśīni caturtha āśrama ucita śauca ācāra ādi iti kartavya tā vitāna vidhāna parāṇi ca prabandhena eva dṛśyante evam gṛha āśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātakaḥ dvijaḥ vane vaset su niyataḥ bhaikṣa bhuj vijita indriyaḥ iti upakramya caturtha āśrama ucita mokṣa upāya anuṣṭhāna upadeśāya ṣaṣṭhaḥ adhyāyaḥ samastaḥ eva manunā anukrāntaḥ 
[II,446,ii_II,446,v]	jābāla śrutau ca vidhāyakena eva brāhmaṇa vākyena pratipadam āśrama catuṣṭaya mupadiṣṭam brahmacārī bhūtvā gṛhī bhavet gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet iti agni samāropaṇa vidhāna upadeśaḥ ca pratyakṣa śrutaḥ katham apahnūyate ātmani agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajet gṛhāt iti api ca upaniṣadām adhyayanam asati mokṣa upāya prayoga samarthe caturtha āśrame nirarthakam eva prāpnoti kriyā kāṇḍa anuṣṭhāna niṣṭha tve hi vedasya jñāna kāṇḍa upadeśaḥ kiṃprayojanaḥ syāt 
[II,446,vi_II,447,i]	tat evam varṇa vat āśramāṇām api caturṇām pratyakṣa upadeśa siddha tvāt caturtha āśramiṇām ca mokṣa adhigama upāya tattva jñāna bhāvanā abhyāsa avasara saṃbhavāt saḥ ayam jarā maryavādaḥ praśaṃsā mātra paraḥ eva avatiṣṭhate jarayā ha vai eṣaḥ etasmāt mucyate mṛtyunā vā iti ca vacanāt jarasā karma tyāga anujñānāt saḥ eva caturtha āśrama avasaraḥ iti gamyate tat uktam gṛhasthaḥ tu yadā paśyet valī palitam ātmanaḥ apatyasya eva ca apatyam tadā araṇyam samāśrayet iti itarathāḥ hi mṛtyunā eva ca tasmāt mṛcyate iti avakṣyata ca tu evam abravīt tasmāt vārdhaka daśa ucitam caturtham āśramam anumanyante 
[II,447,ii_II,447,iii]	tiṣṭhatu vā vārdhaka daśā yūnaḥ api paripakva kāṣa yasya āśrama catuṣṭaya kramam anapekṣya eva mokṣa adhikāraḥ ākhyātaḥ yathokyam brahmacaryāt eva pravrajet iti atas eva dvividhaḥ brahmacāri bhavati upakurvāṇaḥ naiṣṭhikaḥ ca tatra upakurvāṇakaḥ yaḥ brahmacaryam anubhūya gṛhastha āśramam anubhavati sa ca apari pakva kaṣāyaḥ anuṣa śānta rāgaḥ tam eva pratīdam ucyate anadhītya dvijaḥ vedān anutpādya ca santatim aniṣṭavā ca eva yajñaiḥ ca mokṣam icchan vrajati adhas iti yaḥ tu paripakva kaṣāyaḥ sa naiṣṭhikaḥ eva brahmacārī bhavati na gṛhastha āśramam pratipadyate gṛhasthaḥ api paripakva kaṣāyaḥ vānaprastha āśramam ullaṅghya yati tve adhikriyate yathā uktam gṛhāt vā vanāt vā pravrajet iti 
[II,448,i]	kecid tu karma phala abhisandhirahitasya kartavyam iti karma kurvataḥ kṣīṇa rāgasya ātma vidaḥ gṛhasthasya api mokṣam ācakṣate yathā aaha yājñavalkyaḥ nyāya arjita dhanaḥ tattva jñāna niṣṭhaḥ atithi priyaḥ śrāddha kṛt veda vidyā vid gṛhasthaḥ api vimucyate iti tasmāt ṛṇa anubandhāt apavarga abhāvaḥ iti ayuktam 
[II,448,ii_II,448,iii]	yat tu kleśa anubandhāt iti tat api anadhyavasāya mātram pratipakṣa bhāvanādinā kleśa upaśamasya suśaka tvāt yadi hi doṣāḥ nityāḥ bhaveyuḥ anitya tve api ākasmikā vā sa hetu tve api yadi eṣām nityaḥ hetuḥ bhavet kāryaḥ api vā yadi asau na jñāyeta jñātasya vā asya śamana upāyaḥ na jñāyeta jñātaḥ api vā anuṣṭhātum asau na śakyeta tadā kaḥ eva enam ucchindyāt kintu na akasmikāḥ na nityāḥ te na nitya ajñāta hetukāḥ na ajñāta śamana upāyāḥ na ca aśakya pratikriyāḥ na hi doṣāṇām ātma svarūpa vat nitya tvam upajanana apāya dharmaka tvena grahaṇāt mithyājñānam ca prasava kāraṇam eṣām avadhṛtam iti na akasmika tvam avināśi hetuka tvam ajñāta hetuka tvam vā 
[II,449,i_II,449,ii^1]	mithyājñānasya ca sanyak jñānam pratipakṣa bhāvanā abhyāsena ca sa mūlam unmīlayitum śakyante doṣāḥ iti na ajñāta pratīkāra tvam teṣām uktam ca kena cit sarveṣām sa vipakṣa tvāt nirhrāsa atiśaya āśritāt sā ātmībhāvāt tad abhyāsāt hīyeranna āsravāḥ kvacid iti viṣaya doṣa darśanena hi teṣu sakti lakṣaṇaḥ rāgaḥ śāmyati yadā hi eṣa cintayati vivekī asau tarala tārākṣī pīna unnata ghana stanī vilupyamānā kāntāre vihagaiḥ adya dṛśyate vibhāti bahis eva asyāḥ padma gandha nibham vapuḥ antar majja asthi viṣ mūtra bhedaḥ krimi kula ākulam asthīni pittam uccārāḥ klinnāni āntrāṇi śoṇitam iti carma pinaddham tat kāminī iti abhidhīyate medaḥ granthī stanau nāma tau svarṇa kalaśau katham viṣṭhā ādṛtau nitambe ca kaḥ ayam hema śilā bhramaḥ mūtra asṛj dvāram aśuci cchidram kledi jugupsitam 
[II,449,ii^2_II,450,ii]	tat eva hi rati sthānam aho puṃsām viḍambanā prītiḥ yathā nija asya uttham lihataḥ śoṇitam śunaḥ śuṣke asthini tathā puṃsaḥ sva dhātu syandinaḥ striyām vyātta ānanā vivṛtta akṣī vivarṇā śvāsa ghurgharā katham adya na rāgāya mriyamāṇā tapasvinī aho bata varākaḥ ayam akāle tṛṣitaḥ phaṇī prasārita mukhaḥ asmākam śoṇitam pātum āgataḥ kim anena aparāddham naḥ svabhāvaḥ vastunaḥ svayam spṛśyamānaḥ dahati agniḥ iti kasmai prakupyati na anukūlaḥ priye hetuḥ pratikūlaḥ na vipriye sva karma phalam aśnāmi kaḥ suhṛtkaḥ ca me ripuḥ evam ahaniśam cintayataḥ nitāntam śāntasya manasaḥ sama citta tā sarvatra samudbhavati iti vilīyante doṣa granthayaḥ atas eva upadiśyante mokṣa śāstreṣu anekaśas tasya tasya upaghātāya tāḥ tāḥ pratyūha bhāvanāḥ 
[II,450,iii_II,451,i]	nanu ca pratipakṣa bhāvane api na sarva ātmanā doṣa pakṣaḥ kṣayam upayāti nimba abhyupayogaḥ iva kriyamāṇe kapha dhātuḥ iti na etat evam tatra nimba upayaḥ gavat tad anukūlasya anna pāna ādeḥ upayoga darśanāt api ca dharmi lopa bhayāt tatra na iṣṭaḥ sarva ātmanā kṣayaḥ kapha ādhikyam tu hantavyam dhātu sāmyasya siddhaye iha sarva ātmanā ucchedyāḥ kleśāḥ saṃsāra kāriṇaḥ chedaḥ ca ekāntataḥ teṣām pratipakṣa upasevayā na ca pratipakṣa bhāvanā abhyāsam ekam astram apāsya tad upaśame nimitta antaram kim api kramate 
[II,451,ii_II,451,v]	na hi viṣaya abhilāṣaḥ tad upabhogena viraṃsyati yathā aaha na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmā iva bhūyas eva abhivardhate anyatra api uktam bhoga abhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni ca indriyāṇām iti pārāśaryaḥ api āha tṛṣṇā khaniragādheyam duṣpūrā kena pūryate yā mahadbhiḥ api kṣiptaiḥ pūraṇena eva khanyate iti tasmāt pratipakṣa bhāvanā eva bhagavatī bhīma kāntiḥ antaḥkaraṇa kāntāre nirantaram abhijvalantī dāva dahana dīdhitiḥ iva dahati doṣa viṭapakān iti tat evam doṣa anubandha vidhvaṃsa upāya saṃbhavāt na tad kṛtaḥ mokṣa mārga nirodhaḥ abhidhātavyaḥ 
[II,451,vi]	atas eva kecana cetanasya prakṛtyā nirmala tvāt malānām āgantuka tvāt mala nibarhaṇa hetoḥ ca yathā uktasya saṃbhavāt tad ācaraṇāt tad apāye sati sva tassakala padārtha darśana sāmarthya svabhāva cid tattva avasthānāt sarvajña siddhim adūra vartinīm eva manyante 
[II,452,i]	yat api uktam kleśa śūnya tvam ātmanaḥ na kadācid api dṛṣṭam anubandha vṛtti tvāt kva īśānām iti tat api asatyam suṣupta avasthāyām aspṛṣṭasya doṣaiḥ ātmanaḥ pratyaham upalambhāt jāgrataḥ api kā cana tādṛśī dṛśā dṛśyate eva yasyām asau ātma svarūpaḥ eva ātmā nirmalaḥ avatiṣṭhate yathā uktam aharahar brahma lokam yānti iti tad alam anena doṣa anubandha kathā anubandhena 
[II,452,ii]	yat api pravṛtti anubandhāt iti pratyapādi tat api sūtra kṛtā samāhitam na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti doṣeṣu bandha hetuṣu vigaliteṣu pravṛttiḥ api na deha indriya ādi janmane prabhavati iti 
[II,452,iii_II,452,iv]	nanu doṣa kṣayāt mā bhūt uttaraḥ karma saṅgrahaḥ katham phalam adattvā tu prāktanam karma śāmyati atra kecid āhuḥ dadati eva karmāṇi na adattvā śāmyanti tathā api bandha hetavaḥ na bhavanti yatas śama santoṣa ādi janitam yoginaḥ sukham utpādya dharmaḥ vinaṅkṣyati adharmaḥ ca śīta ātapa kleśa ādi dvārakam duḥkham dattvā iti 
[II,453,i]	nanu amuṣmāt karmaṇaḥ idam phalam bhavati iti karma phalānām kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyamāt katham iyatā karma phala upabhogaḥ bhavet iti anyathā tad upabhogam apare varṇayanti yogī hi yogardhi siddhyā vihita nikhila nija dharma adharma karmā nirmāya tad upabhoga yogyāni teṣu teṣu upapatti sthāneṣu tāni tāni sa indriyāṇi śarīrāṇi raṇḍa antaḥkaraṇāni ca muktaiḥ ātmabhiḥ upekṣitāni gṛhītvā sakṛt eva sakala karma phalam anubhavati prāpta aiśvaryaḥ iti ittham upabhogena karmaṇām kṣayaḥ 
[II,453,ii_II,453,iii]	anye tu ācakṣate kim anena bhoga āyāsena adatta phalāni eva karmāṇi yoginaḥ naṅkṣyanti tattva jñānasya eva bhagavataḥ iyān prabhāvaḥ yat asmin utpanne cira saṃcitāni api karmāṇi sahasā eva pralayam upayānti bhogāt api teṣām prakṣayaḥ śāstra prāmāṇyāt eva avagataḥ tathā tad prāmāṇyāt eva tattva jñānāḥ dapi tad prakṣayam pratipatsyāmahe tathā ca āha yathā edhāṃsi samiddhaḥ agniḥ bhasmasāt kurute arjuna jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā iti na ca idam śraddhā mātram veda vidāmagraṇyāḥ vyāsa muninā eva samabhidhānāt aveda artham hi na asau abhidadhīta iti 
[II,454,i]	tam anye na manyante na sarva amanā karmaṇām dāhaḥ kintu svarūpeṇa satām api saha kāri vaikalyāt sva kārya karaṇa udāsīna tā teṣām bhavati bhraṣṭānām iva bījānām aṅkura karaṇa kauśala hāniḥ yatas sāmagrī kāryasya janikā na kevalam kārakam atas na karmāṇi eva kevalāni phala upabhoga yogya śarīra indriya ādi janma nimitta tām upayānti kintu mithyājñānena doṣaiḥ ca sahitāni tat uktam avidyā tṛṣṇe dharma adharmau ca janma kāraṇam iti 
[II,454,ii_II,454,iii]	tattva vidaḥ ca tattva vid tvāt eva na avidyā mithyājñāna ātmikā bhavati doṣāṇām tu prathame darśitaḥ eva kramaḥ tad abhāve bhavantau api dharma adharmau na bandhāya kalpete na hi sva kāryam aṅkura ādi kusūla vartīni bījāni janayitum utsahante bhraṣṭa bījānām api svarūpa śaktiḥ api tānavam gatā tadvat karmaṇām sva rūpa śakti śaithilyam mā nāma bhūt tathā api kusūla varti bīja vat sahakāri vaidhuryāt kārya anārambhaḥ iti tat ida suktam na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti 
[II,454,iv_II,455,i]	nanu svarūpa sattāyām dharma adharmayoḥ katham idam uktam navānām ātma guṇānām nirmūla ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti na eṣa doṣaḥ manassaṃyoga vat akiṃcitkarayoḥ avasthānam api ucchedāt na viśiṣyate muktasya ātmanaḥ vibhu tvāt aparihāryaḥ manassaṃyogaḥ na ca tadānīm asau san api sukha duḥkha jñāna ādi janmani vyāpriyate evam dharma adharmau santau api phala m anākṣipantau kim kariṣyate iti phalatas ucchinnau eva bhavataḥ tasmāt navānām ātma guṇānām ucchedaḥ apavargaḥ iti aviruddham evam pravṛtti anubandhasya api bandha hetoḥ abhāvāt na durgamaḥ apavargaḥ 
[II,455,ii]	apare punar āhuḥ karma phalānām śāstrataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niyama avagateḥ śama santoṣa śīta ātapa ādi dvāraka sukha duḥkha mātra upapādanena karma parikṣayā anupapatteḥ yoga ṛddhyā ca dīrgha kāla avadhi sukha duḥkha upabhogasya sakṛt eva saṃpādayitum aśakya tvāt jñāna agninā ca dāhe tad karma upadeśi vaidika vacana sārtha ānarthakya prasaṅgāt adatta phalasya karmaṇaḥ anuparamāt avasthāna pakṣe ciram api uṣitvā kusūla avasthita bīja vat kāla antareṇa api tad phala ākṣepa prasaṅgāt avaśyam sva phala upabhoga dvārakaḥ eva karma kṣayaḥ vācyaḥ 
[II,455,iii]	na ca anirmokṣaḥ āśaṅkanīyaḥ tatas cirāt api tad siddhi saṃbhavāt tathā ca mumukṣuḥ nitya naimittikam karma avaśyam anutiṣṭhet ananutiṣṭhan pratyaveyāt iti tat kutas asya bandhaḥ syāt kāmyam niṣiddham ca karma svarga naraka kāri vispaṣṭam eva bandha sādhanam iti tad pariharet eva iti evam tāvat uttaraḥ ayam na karma saṃcayaḥ pravartate tat āha nitya naimittike kuryāt pratyavāya jihāsayā mokṣa arthī na pravarteta tatra kāmya niṣiddhayoḥ iti
[II,456,i_II,456,ii]	prāktanasya tu karma saṃcayasya bhogāt eva kṣayaḥ ātma vidaḥ ca mumukṣoḥ ayam anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ bhavati na itarasya iti saḥ eva ittham apavṛjyate iti āha ca ātma jñe ca etat asti iti tat jñānam upayujyate tatra jñāta ātma tattvānām bhogāt pūrva kriyā kṣaye uttara pracaya asattvāt dehaḥ na utpadyate punar nanu nitya karma nuṣṭhāna pakṣe na asti eva mokṣaḥ yāni eva hi nityāni darśa paurṇamāsa ādi karmāṇi yāvajjīvam darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta iti ādi codana upadiṣṭāni tāni eva phalavanti śrūyante iti kāmyāni api bhavituma rhanti darśa paurṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajet agniṃhotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti na phala abhisandhāna pūrvaka tvena aprayogāt tathā aaha prārthyamānam phalam jñātam na anicchoḥ tat bhaviṣyati
[II,456,iii_II,456,iv]	iti saḥ ayam pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ prayoge api viśeṣaḥ kāmyam karma sarva aṅga upasaṃhāreṇa prayujyamānam phala sādhanam iti na yathāśakti tathā tathā prayoktavyam iti nityakarmaṇaḥ akaraṇāt pratyavāyaḥ iti yathāśakti api tat prayoktavyam ananuṣṭhitāt yādṛś tādṛś anuṣṭhita śreyaḥ pratyavāya parihāra upapatteḥ kāmye tu sarvāṇi aṅgāni yadi asau upasaṃhartum na śaknuyāt mā pravartiṣṭa na hi apravartamānaḥ pratyaveyāt iti 
[II,457,i]	evaṃca tat eva darśa paurṇamāsa ādi karma yāvajjīvam iti ca udanayā upadiṣṭam nityam sat tad phala anabhisandhānāt prayuktam na bandhāya kalpate kva sā svarga sādhana tva śaktiḥ asya gatā iti ced na na vayam karmaṇām śaktim aśakti vā pratyakṣatas prapaśyāmaḥ śāstra eka śaraṇāḥ tu śrotriyāḥ vayam codanā eva dharme pramāṇam iti naḥ kula vratam etat sā ca codanā ekatra kāminam adhikāriṇam āśritya pravṛttā tad adhikāraḥ ca phala nirvṛtteḥ vinā na syāt iti phala paryantatām pratipadyate 
[II,457,ii_II,457,iii]	anyatra tu yāvat padoṣa baddha jīvana padārtha avacchinna adhikāri lābhena pravartamānā na phalāya prabhavati akriyamāṇe tu śāstra arthe pratyavāyāya bhavati adhikṛtena satā śāstra arthaḥ tyaktaḥ iti kāmye tu anutpanna kāmaḥ adhikṛtaḥ eva na bhavati iti na adhikṛtena satā vidhiḥ tyaktaḥ iti na pratyavaiti iti upakramya tu antarāle tyaktum na labhate eva vītāyām phala icchāyām āvāpte vā phale tad karma samāpana vat avaśya kartavyam eva tat iti alam śāstra antara garbheṇa bhūyasā kathā vistareṇa sarvathā suṣṭu uktam nitya naimittike kuryāt iti 
[II,457,iv_II,458,i]	nanu bhogāt prāktana karma kṣaya pakṣe dīrgha kāla apekṣaṇāt apratyāsannaḥ iva mokṣaḥ lakṣyate kim tvayā jñāta madhunā eva huṃ kṛtvā nirvilambam eva mokṣam āpnuyāt iti na khalu sulabhaḥ ayam puruṣa arthaḥ kim na śrutam idam āyuṣmatā kyāsa vacanam aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim iti jñāna agni dāha vacanam tu jñāna praśaṃsā artham eva saḥ ayam jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ ucyate iti 
[II,458,ii_II,458,iii]	atra abhidhīyate na khalu phala upabhoga dvārakaḥ karmaṇām parikṣayaḥ janma koṭi śataiḥ api śakya kriyaḥ uktam hi ekam eva īdṛśam karma kartum āpatati kvacid janma ayuta śatena api yat phalam bhujyate na vā dehaiḥ tad karma bhoga arthaiḥ karma anyat na kariṣyate deha bandhanam iti eṣā durāśā eva tapasvinām tat īdṛśam enam mokṣa patham upadiśadbhiḥ yājñikaiḥ mokṣa upekṣaṇam anakṣaram upadiṣṭam bhavati iti tasmāt pūrva ukta nītyā eva karmaṇām bandha hetu tvam apākaraṇīyam 
[II,458,iv]	nanu pakṣa catuṣṭaye api doṣaḥ uktaḥ na caturtha pakṣasya niravadya tvāt saha kāri vaikalyāt kusūla avasthita bīja vat karmaṇām anārambhaka tve sati na kaścid doṣaḥ eṣaḥ eva ca teṣām dāhaḥ yat kārya anārambhaka tvam 
[II,458,v_II,459,i]	nanu avinaṣṭa svarūpāṇi kusūla bīja vat eva kadā cirāt ārapsyante kāryam tasmāt varam ucchidyantām eva kim idānīm nityam ātmānam api ucchettum yatāmahe sa hi purā bhoktā abhūt iti muktaḥ api punar bhoktṛtām pratipadyeta iti varam ucchidyantām eva sāmagrya bhāvāt katham asau punar bhoktṛtām gacchet iti ced karmāṇi api saha kārya bhāvāt katham kāryam ārabheran na ca karmaṇām bandha karaṇe rāga ādayaḥ na sahakāriṇaḥ iti vaktum śakyate vīta rāgasya jatma adarśanāt iti asakṛt ukta tvāt tasmāt ayam eva sūtrakāra upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ peśalaḥ na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāya hīna kleśasya iti 
[II,459,ii_II,459,iii]	yat ca idam ucyate jñāna karma samuccayāt mokṣaḥ iti tatra idam vaktavyam karmaṇām kīdṛśaḥ mokṣam pratyaṅga bhāvaḥ na hi tad sādhyaḥ mokṣaḥ svargāḥ divada nitya tva prasaṅgāt api ca ātmā eva svarūpa avasthitaḥ mokṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca ātma svarūpam karma sādhyam anādi nidhana tvena siddha tvāt 
[II,459,iv_II,460,i]	nanu nitya karma ananuṣṭhāne pratyaveyāt iti tad dvāraka bandha parihāra upāya tvāt karma api mokṣa aṅgam syāt na sa nyāsa vidhānasya pratyakṣa upadeśa ādi tyukta tvāt aparipakva kaṣāyāṇām śanaiśśanaiḥ tad paripāka aupayika tvena karma anuṣṭhānam pāramparyeṇa apavarga upāyaḥ iti tu bāḍham abhyupagamyate yathā aaha manuḥ mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ iti adhyātma vidaḥ ca jñāna kāṇḍa aupayikam eva kriyā kāṇḍam manyante sākṣāt tu karma sādhye apavarge svarga vat apāyi tva prasaṅgāt kṛtakasya sarvasya anitya tvāt tattva jñānam eva mokṣa upāyaḥ iti uktam 
[II,460,ii_II,460,iii]	yat api yama niyama ādi sādhyam aṅga bhūtam karma jātam tat api tad aṅga tām gacchan na vāryate tad kāryatve api yāvat guṇa praghvaṃsa abhāva svabhāva tvāt mokṣasya na kṣayitvam svarga vat anyaḥ tu na mokṣaḥ iti uktam tad pūrva ukta prakrameṇa apavarga prāpteḥ tattva jñānam eva abhyupāyaḥ karma tu aṅgam tatra śauca ādi kiṃcid kiṃcid tad syāt ātma saṃskāra pūrvam 
[II,460,iv_II,460,v]	āha tattva jñānam idānīm vicintyatām kiṃviṣayam tad apavargāya kalpate kutas vā tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti nanu ātma jñānam apavarga hetuḥ iti bahuśas kathitam eva etat iti kaḥ ayam praśnaḥ na vipratipatteḥ vipra vadante hi atra vādinaḥ 
[II,460,vi_II,461,v]	ekaḥ eva ayam avidyā parikalpitaḥ jīva ātma parama ātma vibhāgaḥ paramātma tattva jñānāt avidyā apāye mokṣaḥ iti brahma vādinaḥ śabda advaita niścayāt iti vaiyākaraṇāḥ vijñāna advaita darśanāt iti śākya bhikṣavaḥ prakṛti puruṣa viveka vijñānāt iti pāramarṣāḥ īśvara praṇidhānāt iti ca anye tat evam kasmai tattva jñānāya spṛhayantu mumukṣavaḥ iti vācyam 
[II,461,vi_II,461,vii]	ucyate bhinnāḥ tāvat ātmānaḥ iti gṛhyatām ātma jñānam eva niḥśreyasa aṅgam iti yat tu kutas tasya niḥśreyasa sādhana tvam avagatam iti akṣa pāda vacanāt iti brūmaḥ akṣapādaḥ tāvat evam upadiṣṭavān ātma jñānāt niḥśreyasa adhigamaḥ iti na ca niṣpramāṇakam artham eṣaḥ ṛṣiḥ upādiśat iti bhavitavyam atra pramāṇena tat tu vaidikam vidhi vākyam ātmā jñātavyaḥ iti 
[II,461,viii_II,462,i]	saḥ eṣa tāvat na niradhikāraḥ vidhiḥ adhikāra rahitasya ca vidheḥ prayoga yogya tva abhāvāt adhikāra anveṣaṇam upakramaṇīyam para prakaraṇa paripaṭhana virahāt ca na asya samidh ādhi vidhi vat pradhāna adhikāra niveśi tvam atas viśva jit adhikaraṇa nyāyena svarga kāmam adhikāriṇam iha yāvat upādātu madhyavasyāmaḥ tadā eva na sa punar āvartate iti arthavāda samarpitā iyam apunarāvṛttiḥ eva hṛdaya patham avatarati rātri satraḥ iva pratiṣṭhā iti tām eva asya phala tvena pratipadyāmahe sā ca iyam sādhyamānā api rūpāt eva hi śāśvatī cakāsti apunarāvṛttiḥ na svarga vat apāyinī 
[II,462,ii_II,462,iii]	nanu dṛṣṭa prayojana alābhe sati adṛṣṭa prayojana parikalpana avasaraḥ iha ca dṛṣṭam eva prayojanam ātma jñānasya karma pravṛtti hetu tvam upalabhyate nityena ātmanā vinā bhūteṣu eva acetaneṣu śmaśāna avadhiṣu bahu vitta vyaya āyāsa sādhyāni kaḥ nāma jyotiṣṭoma ādi karmāṇi anutiṣṭhet iti nityaḥ eva ātmā para lokī jñātavyaḥ evam hi nirviśaṅkaḥ karmasu pravarteta iti tat idam anupapannam anyatas eva siddha tvāt pratyabhijñā pratyakṣa pratyayena jaiminīyaiḥ anumāna mahimnā ca naiyāyika ādibhiḥ ātmā nityaḥ iti niścitaḥ eva kim atra vidhiḥ kariṣyati iti kartavya tā kalāpa upadeśaḥ ca tadānīm atyanta niṣprayojanaḥ syāt 
[II,462,iv]	amī ca tathā nāma ati mahā antaḥ veda granthāḥ iyati eva paryavasannāḥ iti tat idam upanatam sā iyam mahataḥ vaṃśastambāt laṭvā aakṛṣyate iti tasmāt arthavāda samarpita mapunarāvṛtti rūpam eva phalam ātma jñāna vidhiḥ abalambataḥ iti evam kecid 
[II,463,i]	sūkṣma darśinaḥ tu āhuḥ iyam arpi mahatī durgatiḥ yat artha vāda mukha prekṣi tvam asya uktam adhikāra vidheḥ viśvajiti rātri satre vā kim anyat kriyatām na hi viśva jit rūpa paryālocanataḥ kaścid adhikārī labhyate iti balāt svarga kāma ādiḥ kalpyate vā arthavāda samarpitaḥ vā abalambyate yatra tu vidhi svarūpa mahimnā eva tad upalambhaḥ tatra kim kalpanayā kim artha vāda vadana avalokana dainyena vā 
[II,463,ii]	iha ca svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti vat agnīnāt adhītaḥ itivat vā kṛtyena dvitīyayā vai īpsitatama tva nirdeśāt tad niṣṭha tvam eva avatiṣṭhate tatra yathā agni artha tayā aadhāna vidhiḥ avagamyamānaḥ agnīnām anekavidha puruṣa arthaupayika karma kalāpa upayogāt tadā arjanena eva kṛtārtha tvam upagataḥ iti na phala antaram apekṣate yathā vā svādhyāyaḥ adhyetavyaḥ iti akṣara grahaṇa artha tvāt asya vidheḥ akṣara grahaṇasya ca phalavat karma avabodha dvāreṇa parama puruṣa artha upāya tva avadhāraṇāt na tad atirikta ghṛta madhu kulyādi phala antara apekṣi tvam na ca adhyāpana vidhi aṅga tvam sva mahimnā eva īpsitatama saṃskāra dvāraka adhikāra lābhāt evam iha api apahata pāpma ādi ātma svarūpa parijñānam eva tasya parama puruṣa artha tām avabodhayan asya vidheḥ anya prayojana tām āpādayati 
[II,463,iii]	kaścid kila saṃskāra vidhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇa niṣṭhaḥ api saṃskriyamāṇa prayojana apekṣayā para mukha prekṣī bhavati brīhīn prokṣati itivat kaścid tu saṃskriyamāṇa prayojanam alabhamānaḥ tad īpsita tama tva anirvahaṇāt saṃskāra vidhi tvam eva jahāti saktūn juhoti iti vat yathā uktam bhūta bhāvi upayogam hi dravyam saṃskāryam iṣyate saktavaḥ na upayokṣyante na upayuktāḥ ca te kvacid iti
[II,464,i]	yasya tu saṃskāryam anardham iva ratnam aparyuṣitam iva amṛtam anastamita iva candra bimbam aparimlānam iva śatapatram asti kaḥ tarhi prakaraṇa pāṭhā apekṣāyām arthavāda mukha prekṣaṇena phala kalpanāyām vā abhilāṣaḥ atas eva na kāma śruti prayukta tvam ādhānasya na ca ācārya karaṇa vidhi prayukta tvam adhyayanasya iti 
[II,464,ii_II,464,iii]	tasmāt svādhyāya adhyayana agni ādhāna vidhi samāna yogakṣema tvāt ātma jñāna vidheḥ tad kṛtam ātma jñānam apavarga artham avagamyate tathāvidha svarūpaḥ ātmā eva para upādhi janita dharma rahitaḥ apavargaḥ iti ucyate yatas tat idam ittham ātma jñāna mā iva niḥśreyasa sādhanam ananya labhyam iti tat eva upadiṣṭavān ācāryaḥ akṣa pādaḥ yat tu vijñāna satta ātma śabda āt i advaita darśanam tat mithyājñānam eva iti na niḥśreyasa sādhanam iti 
[II,464,iv]	nanu katham advaita darśanam mithyā kathyate tat pratyuta dvaita darśanam avidyā māyā api mithyājñānam iti yuktam tathā hi pratyakṣam eva tāvat nipuṇam nirūpayatu bhavān tatra hi yat anya anapekṣa tayā jhagiti padārtha svarūpam avabhāsate tat pāramāthikam itarat kālpanikam iti gamyate sat rūpam eva ca ca tatra abhinnam anya nirapekṣam avabhāti bhedaḥ tu anya apekṣaḥ iti na akṣaja vijñāna viṣaya tām upayāti 
[II,465,i_II,465,ii]	tatra yathā mṛd ru upatātaḥ prabhṛti yāvat kumbha avasthā iti asmin antarāḷe āvirbhavatām tirobhavatām ca ghaṭa kapāla śakala śarkarā kaṇā ādīnām kāryāṇām rūpam aparama artha sat eva vyavahāra padavīm avatarati paramārthataḥ tu mṛttikā eva yathā aahuḥ mṛttikā iti eva satyam iti evam tat api mṛttikā rūpam sattā apekṣayā na paramārtha sat iti sattā eva sarvatra parama arthā tat eva sat lakṣaṇam brahma iti āhuḥ āgamaḥ ca ekam eva advitīyam ityādiḥ abhedam eva darśayati na iha nānā asti kiṃcana mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati iti ca 
[II,465,iii]	na ca pratyakṣa viruddha tvam abheda śaṃsinaḥ vaktum śakyam āgamasya na hi anya niṣedhe pratyakṣam prabhavati sva rūpa mātra grahaṇe parisamāpta vyāpāra tvāt para rūpa niṣedham antareṇa ca bhedasya durupapāda tvāt bhede kuṇṭham eva pratyakṣam iti katham abheda grāhiṇam āgamam virundhyāt tad uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ vipaścitaḥ na ekatve āgamaḥ tena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate 
[II,466,i]	nanu yadi ekam eva brahma na dvitīyam kiṃcid asti tarhi tat brahma nitya śuddha buddha svabhāva tvāt muktam eva āste kena tat baddham iti kimarthaḥ ayam mumukṣuṇām prayatnaḥ kutastyaḥ vā ayam vicitra jagat avabhāsaḥ avidyā uccheda arthaḥ mumukṣu prayatnaḥ iti brūmaḥ tatas tyaḥ eva ayam vicitra jāgada vabhāsaḥ 
[II,466,ii]	kā iyam avidyā brahmaṇaḥ vyatiriktā ced na advaitam avyatireke tu brahmā eva sā tatas na anyā asti eṣa iti katham ucchidyeta mā evam vastunī dṛṃśi kutārkika codyāni kramante avidyā tu iyama vastu rūpā māyā mithyā avabhāsa svabhāvā abhidhīyate tattva agrahaṇam avidyā agrahaṇam ca nāma katham vastu dharmaiḥ vikalpyate 
[II,466,iii_II,466,iv]	nanu tattva agrahaṇa rūpā api kasya iyam avidyā na hi brahmaṇaḥ nitya buddha svabhāva tvāt avidyā bhavati anyaḥ tu na asti eva tad āśrayaḥ na ca niradhikaraṇam eva mithyājñānam bhavitum arhati ucyate jīvātmanām avidyā na brahmaṇaḥ nanu ke te jīva ātmānaḥ te api brahmaṇaḥ anya ananyatayā cintyāḥ evaāḥ kṣudratārkika sarvatra anabhijñaḥ asi brahma eva jīva ātmānaḥ na tatas anye na hi dahana piṇḍāt bhedena api bhāntaḥ sphuliṅgāḥ agni svarūpāḥ na bhavanti 
[II,467,i]	tat kim brahmaṇaḥ eva avidyā na ca brahmaṇaḥ avidyā yathā hi ekam eva ghaṭa ādi āvaraṇa upahita bheda tayā bhinnam iva vibhāti nabhaḥ paṭa ākāśam ghaṭākāśa miti tad āvaraṇa vaśāt eva ca rajaḥ dhūma ādi kaluṣitam api bhavati tad āvaraṇa viratau tu gaḷita kāluṣya male tatra eva parame vyomni līyate tathā eva jīvāḥ tmānaḥ api avidyā kalpita bhedāḥ tad kṛtam aneka prakāra kāluṣyam anubhavanti tad uparame ca pare brahmaṇi līyante iti 
[II,467,ii_II,467,iii]	nanu evam sati api avidyā parikalpitaḥ eṣa brahma jīva ātma vibhāgaḥ sā ca jīvātmanām avidyā iti ucyate tat etat itaretara āśrayam āpadyate avidyā kalpanāyām satyām jīva ātmānaḥ jīvātmasu ca satsu avidyā iti bhavatu itaretara āśrayam avidyā prapaṃcaḥ eva ayam aśeṣaḥ kasya eṣa doṣaḥ yadi vā anādi tvam asya parihāraḥ bīja aṅkura vat bhaviṣyati bhavadbhiḥ api ca ayam anādiḥ eva saṃsāraḥ abhyupagataḥ avidyayā eva ca saṃsāraḥ iti ucyate 
[II,467,iv_II,467,v]	nanu anādeḥ avidyāyāḥ katham ucchedaḥ kim anādeḥ ucchedaḥ na bhavati bhūme rūpasya bhavadbhiḥ vā katham anādi ssaṃsāraḥ ucchedyate nanu upāye satyanādiḥ api ucchidyate advaitinām kaḥ tad uccheda upāyaḥ avidyā eva iti brūmaḥ śravaṇa manana nidhyāna ādiḥ api avidyā eva sā tu abhyasyamānā satī avidyā antaram utsādayati svayam api utsīdati yathā payaḥ payaḥ jarayati svayam ca jīryati viṣam viṣa antaram śamayati svayam ca śāmyati yathā vā dravya antara rajaḥ kṣiptam rajaḥ kaluṣite ambhasi tat ca ātmānam saṃhṛtya svaccham ambu karoti evam iyam avidyā eva avidyā antaram ucchindantī vidyā upāya tām pratipadyate 
[II,468,i_II,468,ii]	nanu sva rūpeṇa asatyaiva iyam avidyā katham satya kāryam kuryāt ucyate asatyāt api satya artha sampattiḥ upapatsyate māyā sarpa ādayaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ satya pralaya hetavaḥ rekhā gakāra ādayaḥ ca asatyāḥ satya artha prati iti upāyāḥ dṛśyante sva rūpeṇa satyāḥ te iti ced kim tena kriyate gakāra ādi tvena hi te pratipādakāḥ tat ca eṣām asatyam iti 
[II,468,iii_II,468,iv]	nanu brahmaṇaḥ nitya śuddha tvāt jīvānām ca tatas ananya tvāt katham teṣu avidyā avakāśam labhate parihṛtam etat ghaṭa ākāśa dṛṣṭānta upavarṇanena api ca yathā viśuddham api vadana bimbam ambu maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa ādi upādhi vaśena śyāma dīrgha sthūla ādi rūpam apāramārthikam eva darśayati tathā brahmaṇaḥ tad abhāve api jīveṣu tad avakāśaḥ iti 
[II,469,i_II,469,ii]	nanu paramātmanaḥ nitya tvāt jīvānām api anyonyam ananya tvam iti eka smin baddhe mukte vā sarve baddhāḥ muktāḥ vā syuḥ ayi kutarka kaluṣita mate katham bodhyamānaḥ api na budhyase ghaṭa ākāśe hi ghaṭa bhaṅgāt parama ākāśa pratiṣṭhe jāte na paṭa ākāśaḥ api tathā bhavati ekasya api jīva ātmanaḥ upādhi bhedāt sukha duḥkha anubhava bhedaḥ dṛśyate pāde me vedanā śirasi me vedanā iti tīvratara taraṇi tāpa upanatā tanutara klamasya ca yatra eva ca śariḥ āvayave śiśira haricandana sthāsakam uparacayati parijanaḥ tatra eva tad duḥkha uparama anubhavaḥ na anyatra iti evam ekasmin api paramātmani kalpa nāmā atra pratiṣṭheṣu api jīva ātmasu baddha mukta vyavasthā siddhi ati eva iti eka ātma vādaḥ eva ayam āgama anuguṇaḥ upagantum yuktaḥ na ānantyam ātmanām brahma darśanam eva atas niḥśreyasa nibandhanam bheda darśana mūḍhānām saṃsāra viratiḥ kutas iti 
[II,469,iii]	atra abhidhīyate kapaṭa nāṭaka rahasya prakriyā kūrca uparacane tad anuguṇa dṛṣṭānta parampara upapādane ca kim ucyate param kauśalam bhavatām pramāṇa vṛtta nirūpaṇe tu tapasvinaḥ eva bhavantaḥ tathā hi bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt kim ayam abheda abhyupagamaḥ bhavatām uta svid abhedasya eva pramāṇa siddha tvāt iti dvayam api na asti pratyakṣa ādīni hi sarvāṇi eva bheda pratiṣṭhāni pramāṇāni 
[II,470,i_II,470,ii]	yat tāvat bhedasya para apekṣa tvāt akṣaja jñāna gamyatā na asti iti tat ayuktam abhedasya sutarām para apekṣa tvāt mṛd piṇḍāt prabhṛti ghaṭa karpara cūrṇa paryanta kārya paramparā paricchede tad anugata mṛd rūpa tā grahaṇe ca sati mṛdaḥ tat abhinna rūpa tvam avadhāryeta na anyathā bhikṣavaḥ tu ācakṣate cākṣuṣam vyāvṛtta sva lakṣaṇa grāhi nābheda viṣayam abhedasya para apekṣa tvāt iti 
[II,470,iii_II,470,v]	ayam asmāt anyaḥ iti iyam para apekṣā pratītiḥ iti ced ayam asmin anusyūtaḥ iti iyam api para apekṣā eva tat atra bhavān bhikṣavaḥ ca dvau api durgraha upahatau bheda abheda grahaṇa nipuṇam akṣa jam iti parikṣitam etat vistarataḥ sāmānya cintāyām aṅguli catuṣṭayam hi pratibhāsamānam itaretara vivikta rūpam api anugata rūpam api prakāśate iti uktam vyāvṛttiḥ anuvṛttiḥ vā para apekṣā astu vastuṣu asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvāḥ tu bhāvāḥ bhānti akṣa buddhiṣu 
[II,471,i_II,471,iii]	yat api uktam āhuḥ vidhātṛ pratyakṣam na niṣeddhṛ iti tat api asādhu vidhātṛ iti kaḥ arthaḥ idam api vastu svarūpam gṛhṇāti na anya rūpam niṣedhati pratyakṣam iti ced mā evam jñānam tarhi na tat bhavet anya rūpa niṣedham antareṇa tad svarūpa paricchedasya api asampatteḥ pītā divi a vat chinnam hi nīlam nīlam iti gṛhītam bhavati na itarathā tathā ca āha tat paricchinatti anyat vyavacchinatti iti bhāvavat abhāvam api gṛhītum prabhavati pratyakṣam iti ca sādhitam asmābhiḥ eva etat tasmāt itaretara vivikta padārtha svarūpa grāhi tvā anna abheda viṣayaṃpratyakṣam 
[II,471,iv_II,471,vi]	śabda anumānayoḥ tu saṃbandha grahaṇa adhīna sva viṣaya vyāpārayoḥ bhedam antareṇa svarūpam eva na avakalpate iti tau ubhau api bheda viṣayau eva viśeṣa viṣaya tva abhāve api liṅga sāmānyasya tad itara vilakṣaṇasya paricchedāt bheda viṣayam anumānam śabdasya tu pada ātmanaḥ tadvat ādi vācya bheda rūpasya tu paraspara uparakta padārtha puṃja svabhāvaḥ itara padārtha viśeṣita anyatama padārtha rūpaḥ vā vākya arthaḥ viṣayaḥ iti pūrvam eva nirūpitam atas sarvathā na bhedasya pramāṇa bādhita tvam na api abheda grāhi kiṃcana pramāṇam asti yathā uktena eva nyāyena 
[II,472,i]	yaḥ tu āgamaḥ paṭhitaḥ ekam eva advitīyam na iha nānā asti kiṃcana ityādiḥ tasya artha vāda tvāt na yathāśrutaḥ eva arthaḥ grahītavyaḥ 
[II,472,ii]	nanu siddhe api arthe vedasya prāmāṇyam abhyupagatam eva bhavadbhiḥ bāḍham abhyupagatam kintu dhūmaḥ eva agnedivā dadṛśe na arciḥ iti evamādīnām pratyakṣāḥ diviruddha artha abhidhāyinām artha vādānām mukhyām vṛttim apahāya gauṇyā api vṛttyā vyākhyānam āśritam evam idam api vacanam itara pramāṇa viruddham artham abhidadhat anyathā vyākhyāyate 
[II,472,iii_II,472,iv]	ye tu pramāṇa antara viruddha artha anuvādinaḥ na bhavanti artha vādāḥ teṣām astu svarūpe prāmāṇyam vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhāḥ devatāḥ iti evamādīnām tasmāt sukha duḥkha avasthā bhede api na avasthātuḥ ātmanaḥ bhedaḥ deha indriya ādi nānātve api vā na tasya nānātvam iti evam yathākathaṃcid ayam artha vādaḥ yojanīyaḥ abheda upadeśī tu tad paraḥ śabdaḥ vidhi rūpaḥ iha na asti eva evam āgama balāt api na advaita siddhiḥ 
[II,472,v_II,473,iii]	yat punar avidyā ādi bheda codyam āśaṅkya āśaṅkya parihṛtam tatra āśaṅkā sādhīyasī samādhānam tu na peśalam tattva anya tvābhyām anirvacanīyeyam avidyā iti kaḥ arthaḥ anādinā prabandhena pravṛttā aavaraṇa kṣamā yatna ucchedya api avidyā iyam asatī kathyate katham astitve kaḥ enām ucchindyāt iti ced kātara santrāsaḥ ayam satā mā iva hi vṛkṣa ādīnām ucchedaḥ dṛśyate na asatām śaśa viṣāṇa ādīnām tat iyam ucchedya tvāt avidyā nityā mā bhūt satī tu bhavati eva nityam na śakyam ucchettum sat anityam tu śakyate asattvam anyat anyā ca padārthānām anitya tā 
[II,473,iv_II,473,vi]	na ca tattva agrahaṇa mātram avidyā saṃśaya viparyayau api avidyā eva tau ca bhāva svabhāva tvāt katham asantau bhavetām grahaṇa prāgabhāvaḥ api nāsa nniti śakyate vaktum abhāvasya api astitva samarthanāt iti sarvathā na asatī avidyā asattve ca niṣiddhe asyāḥ sattvam eva balāt bhavet sat asat vyatiriktaḥ hi rāśiḥ atyanta durlabhaḥ sattve ca dvitīyāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ bhāvān na advaitam
