[II,473,vii]	yat tu brahmaṇaḥ satata prabuddha tvāt avidyā kṣevatā na iti jīvānām avidyā āspada tvam abhihitam avidyā uparame brahmaṇi parame te eva ghaṭa ākāśa vallīyante iti ca tat api na caturaśram ākāśa avaccheda hetoḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ ghaṭamāna tvāt avidyāyāḥ tu asattvāt tad kṛtaḥ paramātmanaḥ avacchedaḥ iti viṣamaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ avacchedaka abhāvāt ca jīva vibhāga kalpanā api niravakāśa eva 
[II,474,i]	yat ca itaretara āśraya tvam parihartum anādi tvam āveditam avidyāyāḥ tatra bīja aṅkura vat vādi antara upagata saṃsāra vat ca tasyāḥ satya tvam eva syāt anādi prabandha pravṛtta tve sattve ca asyāḥ pratikūla hetu antara upanipāta kṛtam apākaraṇam ucitam eka ātma vādinām tu tad ati durghaṭam iti anirmokṣaḥ eva syāt yathā aaha bhaṭṭaḥ svābhāvikīm avidyām ca na ucchettum kaścid arhati vilakṣaṇa upapāte hi naśyet svābhābikam kvacid na tu eka ātmā abhyupāyānām hetuḥ asti vilakṣaṇaḥ iti 
[II,474,ii]	yat punar avidyā eva vidyā upāyaḥ iti atra dṛṣṭānta parampara udghāṭanam kṛtam tat api kleśāya na artha siddhaye sarvatra upāyasya sva rūpeṇa sattvāt asataḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ upāya tva abhāvāt rekhā gakāra ādīnām tu varṇa rūpa tayā sattvam yadi api na asti tathā api svarūpataḥ sattvam vidyate eva 
[II,475,i]	nanu gakāraḥ ayam iti gṛhyamāṇaḥ sa rekhā āsanniveśaḥ artha pratyāyakaḥ bhavati na ca asau tena rūpeṇa asti mā evam sva rūpeṇa sataḥ arthasya rūpa anta reṇā api gṛhyamāṇasya kūṭa kārṣa āpaṇa ādeḥ iva vyavahāra hetu tā dṛśyate ca yuktā ca yaḥ tu svarūpataḥ eva na asti na tasya sva ātmanā para ātmanā vā vyavahāra aṅga tā samasti rekhā āsanniveśaḥ ca svarūpeṇa san iti varṇa ātma tvena āsan api tad kāryāya paryāpnuyāt na tu ayam avidyāyām nyāyaḥ sva rūpa asattvāt tasyāḥ 
[II,475,ii_II,475,v]	sarpa ādau tu sarpa ādi svarūpa vat tat jñānasya api tat kāryatvam avagatam atas eva śaṅkā viṣasya api sva śāstreṣu cikitsām upadiśanti evam vana guhā kuhara deśāt eṣa nissṛtaḥ kesarī saroṣa mitas eva abhivarttate iti asatye api ukte yat bhīrūṇām palāyana ādi śūrāṇām ca sa utsāham āyudha udyamana ādi satyam kāryam upalabhyate tatra siṃha jñānasya tad kāryatvāt na asataḥ eva upāya tvam etena pratibimba dṛṣṭāntaḥ api pratyākhyātaḥ khaṅga ādeḥ mukha ādi kāluṣya kalpanā kāraṇasya tatra sadbhāvāt iha tu tad abhāvāt iti 
[II,475,vi_II,476,i]	yat api baddha mukta vyavasthā siddhaye pāda vedana ādi udāhṛtam tat api evam apākṛtam avacchedakasya pāda ādeḥ tatra tāttvika tvāt iha tu bheda kalpanā bījam advaita vādinām durghaṭam iti bahuśas pradarśitam tat atra ayam vastu saṅkṣepaḥ avidyāyām asatyām sarve eva ayam yathā udāhṛtaḥ vyavahāra prakāraḥ tad kṛtaḥ iti na avatiṣṭhate satyām tu tasyām na advaita miti atas eva āha sūtrakāraḥ saṅkhyā ekānta asiddhiḥ pramāṇa upapatti anupapattibhyām iti 
[II,476,ii_II,476,iii]	yadi tāvat advaita siddhau pramāṇam astiḥ tarhi tat eva dvitīyam iti na advaitam atha na asti pramāṇam na tarāma dvaitam aprāmāṇikāyāḥ siddheḥ abhāvāt iti mantra artha vāda uttha vikalpa mūla mad vaitavāda parihṛtya tasmāt upeya tām eṣa padārtha bhedaḥ pratyakṣa liṅga āgama gamyamānaḥ 
[II,476,iv_II,476,v]	etena śabdāt vaitavadaḥ api pratyuktaḥ anādi nidhanam brahma śabda tattvam yat akṣaram vivartate artha bhāvena prakriyā jagataḥ yatas iti ucyate tatra anādi nidhana pada niveditā pūrvā para anta rahitā vastu sattā nitya tvam brahma pada pratipāditam ca vyāpi tvam iti ubhayam api śabdasya prāk eva nirastam niravayavaḥ ca sphoṭa ātmā śabdaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ eva 
[II,477,i_II,477,ii]	yat tu nityam vyāpi ca kiṃcid ucyate tat śabda tattvam iti atra kā yuktiḥ āha śabda upagrāhya tayā ca śabda tattvam tathā hi sarva pratyayaḥ upajāyamānaḥ na anullikhita śabdaḥ upajāyate tad ullekha virahiṇaḥ anāsādita prakāśa svabhāvasya pratyayasya anutpanna nirviśeṣa tvāt evam īdṛśam iti ādi parāmarśa pramuṣita vapuṣi vedane vedanā ātmaka tā eva na bhavet 
[II,477,iii]	ye api vṛddha vyavahāra upayoga vaidhuryāt anavāpta śabda artha saṃbandha viśeṣa vyutpattayaḥ bāla dāraka prāyāḥ pramātāraḥ te aapi nūnam yat sat tat kim ityādi śabda jātam anullikhantaḥ na pratiyanti kim api prameyam atas śabda unmeṣa prabhāva prāpta prakāśa svabhāva tvāt sarva pratyayānām śabda anuviddham bodhaka tvam iti sarvam śabda tattvam iti avadhāryatām tat āha na saḥ asti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ śabda anugamāt ṛte anuviddham iva jñānam sarvam śabdena gamyate iti
[II,477,iv_II,477,v]	evam anabhyupagame tu saṃvidaḥ prakāśa śūnya tayā anadhigata viṣayaḥ sarve eva andha mūka prāyaḥ lokaḥ syāt āha ca vāc rūpa tā ced utkrāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī iti atas krameṇa tāvat evam bodhyase śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuvedha viśeṣāḥ bhavāt sarvam nirvikalpakam indriya jam sa vikalpakam vā jñānam śabda viśiṣṭam artham avadyotayati gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati iti jāti guṇa kriyā avacchinna viṣaya ava bhāsini pratyaye śabda viśiṣṭaḥ eva arthaḥ sphurati iti budhyasva 
[II,478,i_II,478,iv]	evam ced boddhum avatīrṇaḥ asi śabda ākhya viśeṣaṇa anuraktasya tasya viśeṣyasya svarūpam pṛṣṭaḥ śabdena eva darśayasi śabda aparityāga labdha prakāśa svarūpayā eva vā anubhūtyā anubhavasi iti saḥ api viśeṣyaḥ śabda rūpaḥ eva iti jānīhi tat evam śabdaḥ eva artha upārūḍhaḥ pratibhāti iti vyavatiṣṭhate ittham iyantam adhvānam ced prāptaḥ api tad adhunā yat upārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ prakāśate tasya pṛthak pradarśayitum anubhavitum ca aśakya tvāt śabdaḥ eva tathā tathā pratibhāti iti śabda vivarte eva ayam arthaḥ na anyaḥ kaścid iti pratipattum arhasi yathā ca ayam indriya jeṣu pratibhāseṣu prakramaḥ tathā śābdeṣu api pratyayeṣu śabda viśiṣṭaḥ vā arthaḥ pravibhāti śabdaḥ vā artha ārūḍhaḥ śabdaḥ eva artha rūpeṇa vivartate iti gṛhyatām atas ca śabdabrahma idam ekam avidyā upādhi darśita vicitra bhedam avidyā uparame yathā avasthita svarūpam prakāśate iti yuktam 
[II,478,v]	atra abhidhīyate na khalu prakāra trayam api idam upapadyate pada padārtha saṃbandha vyutpatti virahiṇām anavāpta śabda yojana avairūpya svarūpa mātra pratiṣṭha viśuddha vastu grahaṇa pravaṇa indriya ja pratyaya darśanāt vṛddha vyavahāra paricaya adhigata śabda artha saṃbandha saṃskṛta dhiyām api śabda smaraṇa saṃskāra prabodha hetu bhūta prathama uda bhūta viśuddha vastu avabhāsasya aparihārya tvāt yatra hi vastuni niviśamānaḥ śabdaḥ śabda vid vyavahāreṣu yaḥ avadhṛtaḥ tad darśane tad saṃskāra prabodhāt sa hi smṛti patham eti na anyathā iti 
[II,479,i_II,479,ii]	sāmānya śabdeṣu api yat tat kim ityādiṣu viśeṣa śabdeṣu iva sā eva vārtā teṣām api vyutpatti upayoga virahe vividha vana vihāri vihaṅga kūjita ādi vat artha pratīti hetutva anupapatteḥ sa vikalpa kadaśāyām api na vācaka viśiṣṭam vācyam mecaka guṇa khacitam iva kuvalayam avalokayati lokaḥ iti vistaraśaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe parīkṣitam etat āha ca na śabda abheda rūpeṇa buddhiḥ artheṣu jāyate prāk śabda āt yādṛśī buddhiḥ śabdāt api hi tādṛśī iti
[II,479,iii_II,480,i]	saṃjñi tva mātram adhikamadhunā dhvani sannidhāne buddhisadhirohati na tat vi śiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ tasya hi na netreṇa na śrotreṇa na ubhābhyām na kevalam manasā vā grahaṇam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt śabdaḥ hi aneka dharmake dharmiṇi ekatara dharma avadhāraṇa abhyupāyaḥ bhavati na tatra ātmānam āropayati na hi dīpa indriya prabhṛtayaḥ prati iti upāyāḥ tad upeye rūpa ādau ātmānam āropayanti atas eva tad upāya tva bhrama kṛtaḥ tad abheda vādaḥ api na yuktaḥ na hi upāyāt abhinna tvam tad upeyasya yujyate rūpasya na hi abhinna tvam dīpāt vā cakṣuṣaḥ api vā 
[II,480,ii_II,480,iii]	api ca yadi śabdāt abhinnaḥ arthaḥ pratibhāti eva kaḥ adhyāsa arthaḥ abhede api śabda mayam eva viśvam iti tatra api kaḥ adhyāsa arthaḥ adhyāsa bhramaḥ tu vaiyākaraṇānām eka ākāra nirdeśa doṣa nirmitaḥ yathā aaha gauḥ iti eva hi nirdeśaḥ vācyaḥ tad buddhi vācinām iti kaḥ tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ arthaḥ iti pṛṣṭaḥ vakti gauḥ iti kīdṛśam te jñānam utpannam gauḥ iti kīdṛśam śabdam prayuktavān asi gauḥ iti tatas eṣā bhrāntiḥ vastutas tu viviktāḥ eva ete śabda jñāna arthāḥ tat uktam gavi sāsna ādi sat rūpā gādi rūpa abhidhāyake nirākāra ubhaya jñāne saṃvittiḥ paramārthataḥ iti
[II,481,i_II,481,ii]	evam indriya jeṣu iva śābdeṣu api pratyayeṣu na śabda svarūpa madhyasyati iti yuktam yadi ca śabdaḥ sva rūpeṇa artham pratipādayati tadā akṣa śabdasya aikyāt devana vibhītaka ratha akṣeṣu tulyā pratītiḥ syāt na ca akṣa śabdāḥ bhinnāḥ iti vaktavyam svarūpa pratyabhijñāna anapāyāt tad uccāraṇe ca artha travyām saṃśaya darśanāt bhavati śabdayoḥ ca suptiṅantayoḥ tulya rūpa tvāt adhyāsa pakṣe tulya artha pratīti hetu tvam prāpnoti tathā ca siddha sādhya buddhiḥ saṃvedyamānā api nihnūyeta evam agāt iti aśvaḥ iti aja avayaḥ iti ādau api draṣṭavyam 
[II,481,iii_II,482,i]	śabdasya siddha rūpa tvāt tad adhyāsena artha buddha aviṣyamāṇāyām yajeta dadyāt juhuyāt iti ādau na kvacid sādhya buddhiḥ bhavet siddha adhyāsena sādhya buddheḥ ananurūpa tvāt jāti guṇa kriyā śabdāḥ ca gauḥ śuklaḥ gacchati ityādayaḥ kena kāraṇena niyata madhyāsam anurundhataḥ iti na avagacchāmaḥ śabdasya artha an apekṣa nisarga siddha vaiśva rūpya kalpanā bīja abhāvāt pratiniyata śabda vṛtteḥ ca kasyacid lakṣaṇasya anupalakṣaṇāt vṛkṣa plakṣa śabdayoḥ ca ghaṭa paṭa śabdayoḥ iva svarūpa bhedāḥ viśeṣāt artha anapekṣi tvāt ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva sāmānādhikaraṇye śabda adhyāsa vādinaḥ na bhavetām na hi ekatra vastuni vācye kvacid anayoḥ śabdayoḥ vṛttiḥ etena nīlotpalam api pratyākhyātam 
[II,482,ii]	tatra etat syāt na nīla guṇa viśeṣitam idam utpalam nāma kiṃcid asti viśeṣyam api tu tat nirasta avayava artham aśva karṇa ādi vat artha antaram eva idam vyutpatti prakāra mātram tu viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva varṇanam iti tat etat asamī cīnam anubhūyamāna avayava artha pratīti nihna va nirmitta anupalambhāt aśva karṇa ādau hi yuktam artha antara tvam tatra hi na aśva arthaḥ na karṇa arthaḥ niravayava vākya artha vādaḥ ca prāk eva vistareṇa nirastaḥ iti alam punarukta ālāpena 
[II,482,iii_II,482,iv]	atha śabda dvaya adhyāsa mātra nibandhanam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat api na cāru vṛkṣaḥ taruḥ iti paryāyayoḥ api tad saṃbhave sati sāmānādhikaraṇya prasaṅgāt api ca paryāyeṣu hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ ityādiṣu śabda rūpa bheda adhyāsa pakṣe artha buddhi bhedaḥ prāpnoti na ca asau asti iti na adhyāsaḥ 
[II,482,v]	kiṃca saṃbandha grahaṇa nirapekṣaḥ api śabdaḥ sva sāmarthyam anurudhyamānaḥ svādhyāsena buddhim vidadhyāt tad apekṣāyām vā kasya kena saṃbandhaḥ iti na budhyāmahe śabdāt arthasya pṛthak vyavasthita ātmanaḥ tvad mate durlabha tvāt śabda vyatirikta artha upagame vā kim anena śabda adhyāsa samartha nāḍambareṇa viramyatām atas mṛgatṛṣṇā anusaraṇa raṇikāt 
[II,483,i]	api ca adhyāsaḥ kvacid sādṛśyāt bhavati śuktau iva rajatasya kvacid anurāgāt bhavati lākṣāyāḥ iva sphaṭike śabda arthayoḥ mūrtā mūrta tayā ati dūra bhinna svarūpayoḥ sādṛśyam tāvat anupapannam anurāgaḥ api tatas eva durghaṭaḥ pṛthak deśa tvāt bhinna indriya grāhya tvāt ca 
[II,483,ii_II,483,iii]	pratibimba varṇanam api na sundaram dūra deśa tvena śabda arthayoḥ prāpti abhāvāt aprāptayoḥ ca pratibimbe dvāraka udyāna nivāsi vāsudeva sundarī vadana tāmarasāni sāgara taraṅga pavana paricaya cala dala kalati kālān chitāni su accheṣu jyotsnā avadāta dyutiṣu tuṣāra giri gahvara gata tuhina śilā karpūra darpaṇeṣu pratibimbitāni dṛśyeran atha sarva gata tvena śabdānām artha deśe prāptiḥ abhidhīyate tarhi sakala śabda sārtha sādhāraṇyāt atyantam adhyāsasā aṅkaryam anavadhāryamāṇa viśeṣa niyama kāraṇam āpadyate iti alam ati prasaṅgena sarvathā na saṃbaddhaḥ śabda adhyāsa vādaḥ 
[II,484,i]	vivartavādaḥ api na samaṃjasaḥ tathā hi vivartate artha bhāvena iti kaḥ arthaḥ na tāvat artha ātmanā śabdaḥ pariṇāmam upayāti kṣīram iva dadhi rūpeṇa pariṇāmi tvena vikāritayā vā kṣīra ādeḥ iva anitya tva prasaṅgāt tathā abhāve api ca na advaita siddhiḥ dadhnaḥ iva kṣīra vikārasya śabda vikārasya arthasya tatas anya tvāt anya tvāt ca bādha kāraṇa kāluṣya ādi upaplava viraha pratīti samarpita bheda tvāt 
[II,484,ii]	atha artha pratibhāsam asatyam api indra jāla vat upadarśayati śabdaḥ iti ayam vivartaḥ arthaḥ saḥ api na yuktaḥ bāhyasya vastunaḥ pada abhidheyasya jāti vyakti ādeḥ vākya vācyasya api bhāvanā ādeḥ pūrva prasādhita tvāt avayava vyādeḥ ca adūraḥ eva agre samarthayiṣyamāṇa tvāt na ca indrajāla māyā ādi vat ayathārtha tāyām iha kim api kāraṇam utpaśyāmaḥ 
[II,484,iii]	atha artha rūpeṇa śabdaḥ śuktiḥ iva rajata ākāratayā avabhāsate iti iyam vivarta vācaḥ yuktiḥ iyam api na sādhīyasī śuktikā hi rajata vat prakāśataḥ iti śakyam vaktum śukteḥ ākāra sārūpyeṇa tathā avabhāsa sambhavāt iha tu śabda arthayoḥ atyanta visadṛśa vapuṣoḥ ākāra samāropakāraṇa anavadhāraṇāt katham itara rūpeṇa itarasya avabhāsaḥ śuktikā rajata ādiṣu ca bādhaka vaśāt tathātvam avagatam iha tu na bādhakam kiṃcid bhavati bhaviṣyati vā iti varṇitam 
[II,485,i]	atha sva anuvedham ajahat satyām asatyām vā artha buddhim ādadhāti śabda tyayam vivarta arthaḥ eṣaḥ api saṃprati eva pratikṣiptaḥ śabda anuvedha virahiṇīnām prācuryeṇa pratipattīnām pradarśita tvāt na ca anyaḥ kaścid vipaścit cetasi vivartate vivarta prakāraḥ iti avācakam ucyate vivartate artha bhāvena iti 
[II,485,ii_II,485,iii]	atha śabdabrahmā eva sṛjati jagat iti ayam vivarta prakāraḥ ucyate saḥ api na samyak acetana tvena śabdasya īśvarasya iva sraṣṭṛ tvā anupapatteḥ na ca paramāṇu vadasya kāraṇa tvam avayava samavāyi tvena pṛthivī ādeḥ kāryasya grahaṇāt atha vijñānam ānandam brahma iti āgama vacanam anusara tā vibhu tvam iva cetana tvam api śabdabrahmaṇaḥ varṇyate tarhi īśvarasya eva śabdabrahma iti nāma kṛtam syāt 
[II,485,iv_II,486,i]	yat api ucyate dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma param ca yat śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ param brahma adhigacchati iti tadā api brahma subhikṣam atyantam alaukikam ekatarasya brahmaṇaḥ kālpa nika tvāt aka alpa nika tve vā katham advaita vādaḥ tasmāt kṛtam anena śabdabrahmaṇā svasti parasmai brahmaṇe bhūyāt avidyā māyā vinirmita vividha bheda prathana kalpaḥ ca sattā dvaita dūṣaṇa avasara eva nivāritaḥ iti śabda advaitam api tad bada samaṃjasam iti siddham 
[II,486,ii_II,486,iii]	etena paramātma upādāna tvam api pratyuktam paramātmanaḥ nisarga nirmalasya evaṃprāya kaluṣa vikāra kāraṇa tva anupapatteḥ asatyam eva vikāra jātam avidyātaḥ paramātmani vibhāti iti etat api dūṣitam atas sarvathā na advaitapakṣaḥ kaścid anavadyaḥ 
[II,486,iv_II,487,ii]	atha sarva prāṇinām ekaḥ eva ātmā na nānā ātmānaḥ iti īdṛśam ucyate tat api apramāṇakam ekasmin sukhini na sarve sukhinaḥ ekasmin duḥkhite na sarve duḥkhitāḥ iti vyavasthā darśanāt ātma para vyavahārasya ca sarva jana pratīti siddhasya durapahnava tvāt anya dṛṣṭe ca sukha duḥkha sādhane vastuni smaraṇa anusandhāna pūrvaka icchā dveṣa ādi kārya jātasya anyatra anupalambhāt ekasmin ca vīta rāge mokṣam āsāditavati saṃsāriṇām anyeṣām ānantya darśanāt ahaṃpratyayasya pratyagātma vṛtteḥ paratra asambhavāt jagat vaicitryasya ca puruṣa bheda niyata dharma nibandhanasya anyathā anupapatteḥ ātma bhedasya vispaṣṭa siddha tvāt tapta loha sphuliṅka ghaṭa ākāśa pāda vedanā ādi dṛṣṭānta kadambakasya ca niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ eva iti eka ātmavādaḥ api na yuktimān iti alam vistareṇa 
[II,487,iii]	śabdasya ayam vivartaḥ katham akhilam iti prasphurat tad vivikta su a ākāraḥ artha prapaṃcaḥ katham iva vikṛtiḥ brahmaṇaḥ vedṛśī syāt tasmāt na anātma tattvaḥ paricita sat asat karma pāka anusāra prādurbhūteśvara icchā vaśa vicala daṇu prodbhavaḥ bhūta sargaḥ 
[II,487,iv_II,487,v]	evam sthiteṣu sarveṣu tūṣṇīm advaita vādiṣu vidvān ādvaita vādī tu punar pratyavatiṣṭhate satyam anupajananam anapāyam aparimitam advayam brahma na yuktimat iti yuktaḥ eva tad anabhyupagamaḥ vijñānam eva tu kṣaṇikam upajanana apāya dharmakam anādi santāna prabandha pravṛtam idam tathā tathā avabhāti iti na tatas advitīyam artha rūpam nāma kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ 
[II,488,i_II,488,ii]	nanu pratyakṣa ādinā pramāṇena paraspara visadṛśa padārtha svarūpa saṃvedanasya darśita tvāt katham vijñānasya ayam avabhāsaḥ artha abhāve tad svarūpa anupapatteḥ grāhya grahaṇam hi nāma vijñānam bhavati na grahaṇa grahaṇam iti ucyate idam tāvat parīkṣyatām yat etat pratyakṣa vijñānam nīlam idam pītam idam iti utpadyate tatra kim ekaḥ ākāraḥ prakāśate uta dvitayam iti 
[II,488,iii_II,488,iv]	yadi dvitayam avabhāti ayam arthaḥ nīlam idam tat jñānam iti tat kim atra vicāryate jitam bhavadbhiḥ jitasya yat ā āpadyate tat asmāsu vidhīyatām atha ekaḥ eva ayam ākāraḥ prathate tarhi asti vicāra avasaraḥ kasya ayam ākāraḥ kimarthasya kim jñānasya iti sa ca evam vicāryamāṇaḥ ākāraḥ yadi arthasya iti tat bhavantaḥ jeṣyanti jñāna ākāra pakṣe tu vayam jeṣyāmaḥ iti 
[II,488,v_II,489,ii]	kim tāvat atra yuktam jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ iti kutas kalpanā tāvat iha alpīyasi iti artha ākāra pakṣe hi arthasya jaḍa ātmanaḥ prakāśa ayogāt grāhya tvam anyathā na syāt iti grāhaka antara kalpanā avaśyaṃbhāvinī iti kalpanāt vaiguṇyam atha arthaḥ eva grāhya ātmā yaḥ saḥ eva grāhakaḥ iti kathyate sa tarhi prakāśaḥ eva iti saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt bāhya abhyantara kṛtaḥ viśeṣam iti ced aho viśeṣa jñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ grāhakāt vicchinna tā hi grāhyasya bāhya tā na śarīra apekṣiṇaḥ bāhya tā bhavati yadā ca grāhyāt arthāt avyatiriktaḥ eva grāhakaḥ iṣyate tadā asya na tatas vicchinna tā iti abāhya tvāt jñānam eva tat iti katham na nāmni vivādaḥ ubhaya siddha tvāt jñānasya tasya ayam ākārī bhavitum arhati jñāne hi na kecana vivadante atas tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti yuktam aneka kalpanātaḥ hi eka artha kalpanā jyāyasi iti 
[II,489,iii]	atas ca jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ jñānam hi prakāśakam aprakāśasya arthasya bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagamyate tatas ca arthāt prathamataram asya grahaṇena bhavitavyam agṛhītasya dīpa ādeḥ prakāśasya prakāśaka tvā darśanāt utpanneṣu api ca ghaṭa ādiṣu artheṣu prakāśa vaikalyāt vā pratibandha vaidhuryāt vā bhavati agrahaṇam jñānasya tu utpannasya sataḥ na kiṃcid grahaṇe pratibandhakaḥ na ca prakāśaka antara apekṣaṇam svatas eva dīpa vat prakāśa svabhāva tvāt atas yadā eva tasya utpādaḥ tadā eva grahaṇam avaśyam bhavet na ced kāla antare api na syāt 
[II,490,i]	kim hi tasya kāla antare bhaviṣyati kim vā tadā na abhūt yena tat kāla antare grahīṣyate tadā ca na gṛhyate iti jñāna antareṇa kāla antare tat grahīṣyate iti ced tat api kena grāhi iṣyate anyena iti ced tat api anyena iti kaḥ avadhiḥ śramaḥ iti ced kāmam śrāntaḥ viraṃsyati bhāvan artham tu na gṛhītavān eva prakāśa agrahaṇe tad prakāśya pariccheda ayogāt iti evam na kadācid artha grahaṇam syāt tasmāt artha grahaṇa vādinā api pūrvam jñāna grahaṇam avaśya āśrayaṇīyam yathā uktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti
[II,490,ii_II,490,iii]	atas ca etat evam jñāna pṛṣṭhena ca uttara kāla bhāvi pratyavamarśa darśanāt jñātaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti hi pratyavamṛśantaḥ pramātāraḥ prathamam jñāna grahaṇam anumodante na hi agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā viśeṣya buddhiḥ bhavati tasmāt api pūrvam jñāna grahaṇam iti siddham jñānam ca gṛhyamāṇam ākāra rahitam grahītum aśakyam iti balāt sa ākāram eva tat grahītavyam sa ākāre ca jñāne gṛhīte sati dvitīya kāraṇa abhāvāt kutas jñāna atiriktaḥ bāhyaḥ arthaḥ 
[II,491,i]	itas ca sa ākāram jñānam ākāravat tām antareṇa asya pratikarma vyavasthā anupapatteḥ kalpayitvā api bāhyam artham avaśyam ākāravat tā vijñānasya viṣaya niyama siddhaye vaktavyā nīla jñānam hi idam aneka sannidhāne samupajāyamānam katham akhila taditara padārtha parihāreṇa kevala nīla ālambanatām avalambeta bodha svabhāva tāyāḥ sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭa tvāt pravṛttiḥ api prekṣā pūrva kāriṇām katham tad eka viṣayā eva syāt na ca nīla janita tva kṛtaḥ eṣa tad adhigama niyamaḥ iti kathayitum ucitam āloka locana ādi kāraka antara janita tvasya api bhāvena tad viṣaya tva prasaṅgāt atas nīla ākāra tā eva nīla viṣaya tva vyavasthā hetuḥ na nimitta antaram āha ca tatra anubhava mātreṇa jñānasya sadṛśa ātmanaḥ bhāvyate anātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate iti
[II,491,ii_II,492,i]	atas eva ākāra grahaṇam eva atiśayam āśritya tam abartha samarthane sati sādhakatamam jñānam eva pramāṇam bhaviṣyati aparathā kāraka atiśaya darśana abhāve tad tad sādhakatama tvasya durupapāda tvāt sa ākāra jñāna sākṣī ca laukikaḥ api dṛśyate vyavahāraḥ evam ca vaktāraḥ bhavanti laukikāḥ nīlaḥ arthaḥ ayam yatas atra tat ākāram jñānam utpannam iti tena pratikarma niyamāni atha anupapatteḥ avaśyam sa ākāram eva jñānam ittham sati api bāhye arthe jñānasya ākāra kalpanā bhavet eva iti tatra eva santuṣya sthīyatām varam 
[II,492,ii_II,492,iv]	ye tu bruvante jñānasya svatas svaccha tva bhāva tvena nīla pīta ādi avabhāsaḥ para upādhiḥ eva bhavitum arhati sphaṭikasya iva lākṣā ādinā aruṇim a ādi anuvedhaḥ atas pṛthak ananubhūyamānaḥ api bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ākāra jñāna avabhāsā anyathā anupapattyā anumīyate yathokatam bāhya siddhiḥ syāt vyatirekataḥ iti tat idam anupapannam anvaya anupalabdheḥ arthe hi sati sa ākāram nirākāram tat atyaye nitya anumeya bāhya artha vādī jñānam kva dṛṣṭavān lākṣā sphaṭika ādau tu tathā yuktam tad anurakta sphaṭika śakala avalokanāt iha punar arthena rajyamānam hi nirākāram nisargataḥ jñānam na khalu paśyāmaḥ lākṣayā sphaṭikam yathā 
[II,492,v_II,493,i]	ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ hi na asti iti uktam abhyupagame vā su dusta ramanavasthā t ūṣaṇam artha ākāraḥ ca pratyakṣaḥ tad kṛtaḥ ca jñāna ākāraḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti ucyamāne artha ākāraḥ tāvat sa ākāreṇa jñānena gṛhītaḥ saḥ idānīm jñāna ākāraḥ api grāhya tvāt sa ākāra jñāna antaram bhavet tat api sa ākāram jñāna antaram tathābhūta jñāna antara grāhyam eva syāt iti aniṣṭam atha sva prakāśam tat sa ākāram jñānam iṣyate tena jñāna antara anapekṣaṇāt na anavasthā iti tarhi sva prakāśa sa ākāra jñāna vyatirikta artha ākāra anavabhāsāt tat eva astu kutas dvitīyaḥ idānīm artha ākāraḥ 
[II,493,ii_II,493,iii]	na ca anyathā anupapattyā api tad kalpanā yuktimatī na hi rāja śāsanam idam arthena ākāravatā bhavitavyam iti jñānam eva nīla ādi ākāram yadi bhavet kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti nīla ādi ākāra yogāt arthassa bhavet iti ced saṃjñāyām vivādaḥ iti uktam dvitīyasya abhāvāt svaccha tvāt jñānasya kāluṣyam anya kṛtam yuktam iti ced avidyā vāsanā akṛtam tat bhaviṣyati svatas svaccham api jñānam anādya vidyā vāsanā vibhava upanatam aneka ākāra kāluṣya rūṣita vapuḥ iva prakāśate jñāna vāsanā bheda santānayoḥ ca bīja aṅkura vat anādi tvāt na atra paryanuyogasya avasaraḥ kutas vāsanā pravṛttāḥ iti tasmāt anādi vāsanā vaicitrya racita jñāna vaicitrya upapatteḥ kṛtam anumeyena api bāhyena arthena iti jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham 
[II,493,iv]	atas ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ jñānena vinā hi na kvacid artha rūpam upalabhyate jñānam tu artha rahitam api gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu vispaṣṭam upalabhyate iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām api jñāna ākāra tvam avagacchāmaḥ yadi ca jñānāt arthaḥ pṛthak avasthita ātmā bhavet jñānam antareṇa api asau upalabhyeta na ca evam asti tasmāt abhedaḥ eva jñāna arthayoḥ yat āha saha upalambha aniyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti
[II,494,i]	na ca jñāna artha saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ bhavitum arhati yadi hi pṛthak artham anākāram pṛthak ca jñāna mānākāraḥ upalabhya saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ jñānayoḥ ākāravat tā mupalabhemahi tatas imam ākāram saṃsarga dharmam pratipadyemahi na tu ayam asti kramaḥ artha rahita tve api ca smaraṇa svapna ādi jñānānām ākāravat tvam asti iti uktam atas katham saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ 
[II,494,ii_II,495,ii]	api ca nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ iti katham ekasmin arthe paraspara viruddha liṅga samāveśaḥ parivrājaka kāmuka kauleyakānām ca katham ekaḥ eva vanitā rūpaḥ arthaḥ kuṇapaḥ iti kāminī iti bhakṣyam iti ca pratibhāsa tritaya viṣaya tām anubhavet dārāḥ iti katham ekā eva strī vyaktiḥ puṃvacana bahu vacana viṣaya tām yāyāt ṣaṇṇagariti ca katham bahanām anya liṅgānām ekatā strī liṅga tā ca bhavet hrasva dīrghayoḥ ca katham paraspara apekṣa grahaṇayoḥ arthena ekataraḥ ākāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ syāt jñānānām tu bhinna tvāt vicitra vāsanābheda sahakāri rūpa anuvidhānena jāyamānānām na kiṃcid api virodhaḥ 
[II,495,iii]	tasmāt jñānam eva idam sarvatra tathā tathā pratibhāti na tad vyatiriktaḥ arthaḥ nāma kiṃcid iti jñānaḥ eva ca ekatra ayam pramāṇa prameya pramiti vyavahāraḥ parisamāpyate tasya hi viṣaya ākāra tā prameyam grāhaka ākāra tā prāmāṇam sva saṃvittiḥ ca phalam iti yathā uktam yadābhāsam prameyam tat pramāṇa phalate punar grāhaka ākāra saṃvittyoḥ trayam na atas pṛthakkṛtam iti
[II,495,iv_II,495,vi]	tat idam anādya vidyā vāsanā vilāsa viparyāsita tattva darśana tayā jñānam eva grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bheda vat iva lakṣyate avidyā viratau tu svaccham eva tad saṃpadyate na kiṃcid vā iti tat uktam na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ buddhyā asti tasyāḥ na anubhavaḥ aparaḥ grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt svayam sā eva prakāśate tathā avibhāgaḥ api buddhi ātmā viparyāsita darśanaiḥ grāhya grāhaka saṃvitti bhedavān iva lakṣyate iti artha rūpa rahitam saṃvid mātram kila idam iti paśyan parihṛtya duḥkha santatim abhayam nirvāṇam āpnoti 
[II,496,i_II,496,ii]	atra abhidhīyate na khalu ekaḥ eva bodha ātmā grāhya grāha katayā ubhaya svabhāvaḥ bhavitum arhati grāhya grāhaka rūpayoḥ ita retara vi sadṛśa tvena ekatra samāveśa anupapatteḥ tathā hi nīla jñānam pīta jñānam śukla jñānam iti nīla pīta ādi upajanana apāye api anuvartamāna bodha rūpa tayā nīla ādi vilakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avadhāryate api ca jñānam ahaṃkāra āspadam ānanda ādi svabhāvam sva karmaṇi ca sa vyāpāram iva bhavadbhiḥ abhyupagatam arthaḥ tu na evam ātmakaḥ iti katham anayoḥ abhedaḥ 
[II,496,iii_II,497,i]	yadi api jñānam idam ayam arthaḥ iti evam ākāra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ na asti tathā api ayam ekaḥ api ākāraḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ prakāśya eva pratibhāti na prakāśakaḥ idam nīlam iti grāhakāt vicchinnaḥ eva grāhya ākāraḥ avabhāsate na tu aham nīlam iti tad aikyena avabhāsaḥ asti iti api ca prakāśyasya nīla ādeḥ prakāśaka bodha adhīnam yuktam nāma grahaṇam bodhasya tu tad grāhakasya tadā kiṃkṛtam grahaṇam iti cintyam na bodha antara nibandhanam anavasthā prasaṅgāt na api sva prakāśam jñānam aham nīlam iti apratibhāsāt 
[II,497,ii]	nanu na eva grāhya grāhakayoḥ anyatvam iti yaḥ ayam grāhya avabhāsaḥ iti bhavatā abhyupagataḥ saḥ eva grāhaka avabhāsaḥ grāhakāt anyaḥ ahi grāhyaḥ jaḍa ātmā bhavet grāhakaḥ tu prakāśa svabhāvaḥ grāhaka tvāt eva dvaya pratibhāsaḥ ca na asti iti uktam tatra anyatarasya pratibhāsane jaḍa prakāśayoḥ katarasya avabhāsitum yuktam iti cintāyām balāt prakāśaḥ eva prakāśate na jaḍaḥ nirākāraḥ ca na prakāśaḥ prakāśate iti tasmin sa ākāre prakāśyamāne kutas jaḍa ātmā tat atiriktaḥ arthaḥ syāt 
[II,497,iii]	tat idam apeśalam upāyena upeya nihnavasya aśakya karaṇīya tvāt rūpasya hi prakāśakam cakṣuḥ na cakṣuḥ eva prakāśa tām iti uktvā rūpam apahnotum śakyate tat idam arthasya mūrti drava tva kāṭhinī ādi dharma viśeṣita ātmanaḥ tad viparīta svaccha svabhāvam jñānam prakāśakam na tat eva cakṣuḥ vat tadā avabhāsitum arhati ca 
[II,497,iv]	nanu cakṣuḥ vat upāya tvam jñānasya prakāśa svabhāva tvāt cakṣuḥ janyaḥ hi prakāśaḥ nāma jñānam ucyate na ca agṛhītaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśyam prakāśayati iti satyam vakṣuḥ janyaḥ prakāśaḥ jñānam iṣyate sa tu prakāśaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya prakāśaḥ na prakāśa prakāśaḥ na hi cakṣuṣā prakāśaḥ prakāśyate api tu rūpam prakāśyate tatra yat rūpam ucyate sa viṣayaḥ grāhyaḥ yat tat prakāśate iti ucyate sa prakāśaḥ jñānam grāhakam tad utpatti mātreṇa ca rūpam prakāśitam bhavati iti na prakāśaḥ grahaṇam apekṣate 
[II,498,i_II,498,ii]	nanu uktam atra na anupalabdhāyām buddhau arthaḥ prakāśate apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti tat ayuktam apratyakṣa upalambhasya ca pratyuta artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasiddhyati upalambha utpādaḥ eva artha dṛṣṭiḥ na punar upalambha dṛṣṭiḥ nanu upalabdheḥ agrahaṇe tad utpāda nutpādayoḥ aviśeṣāt anutpanna upalambhasya api arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ syāt iti sarva sarvajña tva prasaṅgaḥ tat idam ati subhāṣitam artha prakāśa ātmā eva khalu upalambhaḥ sa katham utpannāt anutpannaḥ na viśiṣyeta tasmāt artha pratyakṣīkaraṇa ātmaka tvāt jñānasya tad utpādaḥ eva artha pratyakṣa tā na tat grahaṇam iti agṛhītam eva jñānam artha prakāśakam iti yuktam am 
[II,498,iii_II,499,i]	yat tu upāya tvāt jñānasya pūrvam grahaṇam ucyate tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam iti uktam gṛhītam yadi ca jñānam bhavet artha prakāśakam dhūma vat dīpa vat vā iti vaktavyam yadi dhūma vat bhavet artha anumeya tvam tattvayā eva ca dūṣitam ākāra dvaya saṃvitti virahāt na ca dīpa vat ghaṭam dīpena paśyāmi iti asti dvitaya vedanam na tu jñānena vijñeyam jānāmi iti dvaya grahaḥ 
[II,499,ii_II,499,iv]	yat api prakāśa tvāt jñānasya pradīpa vat pūrvam grahaṇam uktam tat api vyākhyeyam prakāśa tvāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ prakāśayati iti prakāśaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ prakāśa tvam iti tat cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ anaikāntikam uktam eva atha prakāśanam prakāśaḥ tarhi prakāśa tvāt iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ na hi artha grahaṇa kāle buddheḥ prakāśanam asti atha prakāśa śabdaḥ bodha paryāyaḥ eva prakāśa tvāt bodha rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ tadā sādhana vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pradīpasya bodha rūpa tva abhāvāt atas ca sva saṃvedana pakṣaḥ na yukti yuktaḥ svatas prakāśasya kasya cit api adṛṣṭa tvāt 
[II,499,v_II,500,i]	nanu jñāna śabda dīpāḥ trayaḥ sva para prakāśāḥ iti āhuḥ tat ayuktam śabda dīpayoḥ sva grahaṇe artha prakāśane ca sāmagryanta rasa vyapekṣa tvāt śabdaḥ artha prakāśane samaya grahaṇam apekṣate sva prakāśane tu śrotram dīpaḥ api cakṣuḥ ādi apekṣaḥ eva gṛhyate grāhayati ca artham iyān tu viśeṣaḥ ghaṭa ādi grahaṇe āloka sāpekṣam cakṣuḥ pravartate āloka grahaṇe tu nirapekṣam iti na etāvatā dīpasya sva prakāśa tā syāt ittham ca mārjāra ādi naktaṃcara cakṣuḥ apekṣayā sarve eva ghaṭa ādayaḥ sva prakāśāḥ syuḥ 
[II,500,ii_II,500,iv]	jñānasya para prakāśaka tvam eva dṛśyate na sva prakāśaka tvam artha prakāśa kāle tad aprakāśasya darśita tvāt mudhā eva nasmāt bhaṇitaḥ te ete trayaḥ prakāśāḥ sva para prakāśāḥ pradīpa bodha dhvani nāmadheyāḥ vibhinna sāmagrī abhivedya vedakāḥ ātma pratyakṣa vādinām tu avasthā bhedena grāhya grāhaka aṃśayoḥ bhedaḥ vidyate eva iti sarvathā na sva prakāśam jñānam 
[II,500,v_II,501,ii]	yat api abhihitam utpadyamānam eva jñānam anapekṣa tvāt apratibandha tvāt ca tadā eva gṛhyate na vā kadācid iti tat api asāṃpratam tadānīm tad grahaṇa sāmagrya bhāvāt na ca avibandha mātreṇa pratītiḥ avakalpate upāya viraheṇa api tadā jñānasya na grahaḥ na ca jaiminīyāḥ iva vayam jñānam nitya parokṣam ācakṣmahe jñātaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti kāla antare tad viśiṣṭa artha grahaṇa darśanāt 
[II,501,iii_II,501,v]	śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti jñāne yathā asau bhāti tad guṇaḥ tathā jñātaḥ arthaḥ iti atra bhāti arthaḥ dhī viśeṣaṇaḥ na viśeṣye ca saṃvittiḥ agṛhīta viśeṣaṇā na anusāyadhiyam vā ittham pratīyeta krama agrahāt na ca nitya parokṣā buddhiḥ anumātum api na śakyate iti ca vicāritam eva tat alam anayā kathayā kim iti śākya sutsṛjya śrotriyam idānī manu yuṃjmahe 
[II,501,vi]	atas ca yat uktam jñāna pṛṣṭha avamarśa darśanāt jñāna grahaṇa pūrvakam artha grahaṇam iti tat na sārvatrikam api tu kvacid eva jñāna viśiṣṭa artha saṃvedanāt tathā abhyupagamyate tasmāt artha grahaṇāt pūrvam jñānasya anavabhāsāt nirākāra āvasāya virahāt ca jñānasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti kadāśā pralapitam etat aruṇa ambarāṇām 
[II,502,i]	yat punar abhyadhāyi jñāna ākāra pakṣe kalpanā alpīyasi iti tatra yathā ukta nītyā pratyakṣa gamye bāhye grāhye artha ākāre kalpanā uktiḥ kīdṛśī kīdṛśam vā tat alpa tvam mahat tvam vā iti 
[II,502,ii]	ubhaya siddha tvam api yat avādi jñānasya tatra yadi pramāṇa āyattā vastu sthitiḥ arthaḥ api ubhaya siddhaḥ eva icchā dveṣa nibandhanāyām tu vastu sthitau jñānam api katham ubhaya siddham syāt iti yat kiṃcid etat 
[II,502,iii_II,503,ii]	yat punar idam abhihitam abhyupagamya api bāhyam artham apratyākhyeyaḥ pratikarma vyavasthā siddhaye jñānasya ākāra yogaḥ iti tat api na sāṃpratam pratikarma vyavasthāyāḥ prakāra antareṇa api upapatteḥ yadi api aneka sannidhāne nīla jñānam upajāyate yadi api ca bodha svarūpa tvam aśeṣa sādhāraṇam tathā api nīlena eva karma kārakeṇa tad upajanitam iti nīla niṣṭham eva avatiṣṭhate cakṣuḥ ādinā api tat janitam iti ced satyam janitam na tu karmaṇā satā nīlena tu karma bhūtena tat utpādyate iti tad eka viṣayam eva bhavati kutas eṣa niyamaḥ iti ced vastu svabhāva kṛtaḥ eva ākāra pakṣe api samānaḥ ayam paryanuyogaḥ yat ucyate kim iti nīlam eva karma kārakam kim iti vā karma viṣayam eva jñānam iti tatra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam ākāram api ca jñānam upādadānam karmakārakasya eva katham upādadīta na kāraka antarasya iti atra api vastu svabhāvaḥ eva śaraṇam iti 
[II,503,iii_II,503,v]	arthasya ca jñāna janaka tvam anvaya vyatirekābhyām avagamyate yadā hi devadatta arthī kaścid vrajati tad gṛham tatra asat nihitam ca enam gatvā api na sa paśyati kṣaṇa antare saḥ āyāntam devadattam nirīkṣate tatra tad sat asattvena tathātvam vetti tat hiyaḥ anāgate devadatte na deva datta jñānam udapādi tasmin āgate ca tat utpannam iti tad bhāva bhāvi tvāt tat janyam tat avasīyate ittham ca tad janya tvena eva tatra niyama siddheḥ alam ākāra kalpanayā 
[II,503,vi_II,503,vii]	etena puruṣa pravṛttiḥ api niyata viṣayā vyākhyātā sādhakatama tvam tu sāmagryāḥ pramāṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇe nirṇītam eva yaḥ tu lokikaḥ vyapadeśaḥ udāhṛtaḥ saḥ api vyabhicarati nīlaḥ arthaḥ ayam yatas tat viṣayam jñānam utpannam iti api na vyapadiśanti laukikāḥ tasmāt arthe sati api sa ākāram jñānam eṣitavyam iti yat uktam tad anupapannam 
[II,504,i_II,504,ii]	yat api avarṇi saha upalaṃbha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti tat api bāla bhāṣitam iva naḥ pratibhāti abhede saha artha anupapatteḥ atha eka upalaṃbha niyamāt iti hetu arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tat ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ nīla ādi grāhya grahaṇa samaye tad grāhaka an upalambhāt grāhaka ākāra anu vedha rahita tad vicchinna bāhya grāhya mātra pratibhāsaḥ eva ayam nīlam idam ityādiḥ darśitaḥ 
[II,504,iii_II,504,v]	kvacid ca grāhya ākāra anuparśliṣṭa kevala grāhaka avamarśanam arpi dṛśyate na smarāmi mayā kaḥ api gṛhītaḥ arthaḥ tadā iti tat evam itaretara vibhakta jñāna artha ākāra saṃvedanāt katham eka upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti ucyate nīla tad dhiyoḥ iti vadatā bhavatā aṣi eṣa bhedaḥ eva nirdiśyate para ma tā anuvāda mātram etat iti ced na abhede pṛthak nirdeśasya api aghaṭamāna tvāt tasmāt api na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ 
[II,504,vi_II,505,ii]	yat api uktam asatī api bāhye arthe svapna gandharvanagara māyā ādiṣu jñānasya ākāravat tā dṛśyate iti tasya eva ayam ākāraḥ yuktaḥ iti tat api durāśā mātram sarvatra jñānāt vicchinnasva grāhya ākārasya pratibhāsanāt tathā hi bhrama jñāneṣu catuṣṭayī gatiḥ ātma khyātiḥ asat khyātiḥ akhyātiḥ viparīta khyātiḥ vā tatra rajatam idam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka artha pratibhāsāt tad mate ca saṃvitteḥ aparokṣa tvāt rajata adhigama abhimānena tad arthinaḥ tatra pravṛtteḥ bādhaka pratyayasya tathāvidha bodha niṣedha paratvena prādurbhāvāt na tāvat akhyātiḥ iti prāk eva prāsādhitam etat 
[II,505,iii]	asat khyātiḥ api na asti ekānta asataḥ sva puṣpa ādeḥ pratibhāsā yogāt deśa kāla vyavahita anubhūta pūrva padārtha viṣayaḥ eva bhrāntaḥ api pratyayaḥ prāṇabhṛtām bhavati na tu atyanta asad artha viṣayaḥ 
[II,505,iv]	tathā hi dvividhā bhrāntiḥ bāhya indriya jā mānasī ca tatra bāhya indriya je bhrama jñāne viṣaya doṣāt indriya doṣāt vā samutpadyamāne na kvacid nirālambanatā dṛśyate bhāsvara rūpa sādṛśyena hi viṣaya doṣeṇa śuktikā rajatam iti parisphurati maru sthalī patita utphalitam ca sāvitram tejaḥ tarala taraṅga sārūpyeṇa payaḥ iti cakāsti indriya doṣāt api pitta upahata rasanasya tikta tayā śarkarā avabhāsate timira sīmantita nayana vṛtteḥ candra maṇḍalam ekam api dvidhā pratibhāti timira kaṇa nikara vivara viracita prasṛtāḥ ca nayana raśmayaḥ eva sūrya āśu saṃvalitāḥ santaḥ sūkṣma tayā keśa kūrcaka ākārāḥ pratibhānti iti 
[II,506,i_II,506,iii]	antaḥkaraṇa doṣeṇa vibhramaḥ yaḥ tu jāyate asati api mahelā ādau puṣpeṣu muṣita ātmanām saḥ api kaścid viṣaya doṣa sahāyaḥ bhavati sa ca ālambanaḥ eva tasyāḥ pāṇiḥ iti jñānam yathā bhavati kutracid komala anila kallola vellite bāla pallave anapekṣita tad tulya padārthasya eva yā punar mānasī manmatha unmāda mahimnā māninīmatiḥ 
[II,506,iv_II,506,vi]	tasyām api rāga ādi vāsanā bala upaplavamāna smṛti upasthāpita deśa kāla vyavahita upalabdha purandhrī rūpa ādi samullekhaḥ na tu ekāntāsataḥ khara viṣāṇa ādeḥ iva pratibhā nidrā ādi manaḥ doṣa janmani svapne api dṛṣṭa pūrvasya eva tasya akārasya ullekhaḥ jālajvala agaḷat vahni drava dravya ādi darśane rūpam anya stham anyatra vetti na tu asat eva tat tat evam bhrānti bodheṣu na asti atyanta asatām prathā deśa kālānyathātvam tu kevalam bhāti vastunaḥ 
[II,507,i]	nanu tatra asataḥ arthasya pratibhāse deśa antara ādiṣu sattvam kva upayujyate deśa antare hi san asan vā tatra tāvat na asti eva saḥ arthaḥ na ca dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ kiṃcid viśeṣaḥ deśa kālau api kim santā vasantau vā pratibhāsete iti vikalpanāyām tathā tayoḥ api tulyaḥ doṣaḥ mā evam bhavataḥ api asat khyāti vādinaḥ kim sarvatra eva tad artha asattvam saṃmatam uta tad deśaḥ eva tatra asannidhāna mātreṇa tāvat kaḥ iva tava sva arthaḥ sarva trāsataḥ tu pratibhāse kutastyaḥ eṣa niyamaḥ yat asattva aviśeṣe api rajata ādi eva asat pratibhāti na khara viṣāṇa ādi iti 
[II,507,ii_II,507,iii]	ayam tu dvayoḥ asattvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ deśa antara ādiṣu sataḥ arthasya smaraṇa ādi upāroheṇa pratibhāsamāna tā yujyate na tu ekānta asate iti evam deśa kālayoḥ api sat asattva vikalpa codyam parihartavyam atas ca kiṃcid api na atyanta asad artha grāhi jñānam asti iti kim dṛṣṭānta balena sarvatra artha śūnyatā kalpyeta tasmāt na asat khyātiḥ 
[II,507,iv_II,508,i]	ātma khyāteḥ tu nirākaraṇāya saḥ ayam iyān kaliḥ vartate tatra ca bahuśas kathitam grāhakāt vicchinnam eva grāhyam avabhāsate nīlam idam iti na tu tat abhedena nīlam aham iti bhrānti jñāneṣu tad artha asannidhānāt bhānta tvam astu na ātma tattva grahaṇam iti yat ca ucyate yad antar jñeya rūpam tat bahis vadavabhāsate iti sā iyam viparīta khyātiḥ eva aṅgīkṛtā syāt tat varam sā eva tapasvinī sādhīyasī 
[II,508,ii]	atha kathyate grahakāt satyam vicchinnam grāhyam tat tu jñāna rūpam eva iti tatra vicchinnam iti priyam āveditam jñāna tve tu tasya kā yuktiḥ na ca jñānayoḥ yugapad utpannayoḥ krama bhāvinoḥ vā grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ upapadyate yaugapadye savya itara go viṣāṇa vat grāhya grāhaka niyama abhāvāt krama pakṣe api pūrvam uttarasya grāhakam ced tad utpatti tad grahaṇa kāla pratīkṣaṇāt kṣaṇika tām jahyāt uttaram api yadi pūrvasya grāhakam tadā api sā eva vārtā tāvat kālam avasthitim antareṇa tat grāhya tā anupapatteḥ na ca jñāna tvam nāma sāmānyam grāhya grāhakayoḥ anugatam go tvam iva śābaleya ādau vibhāti atas vicchinnaḥ ced grāhakāt grāhya aṃśaḥ saḥ arthaḥ eva bhavet iti na jñānasya ayam ākāraḥ 
[II,508,iii_II,509,i]	yat tu saṃsarga dharmaḥ ākāraḥ na bhavati iti bhāṣitam tat yuktam eva na kuṇḍa dadhi vat kaścid saṃsargaḥ asti artha bodhayoḥ tad kṛta ākāravattā vā prāganākārayoḥ tayoḥ tat evam śākya ukta yukti śakala daurbalyāt sarvatra viccheda pratibhāsāt jñānasya svatas vaivitrya anupapatteḥ arthasya eva ayam ākāraḥ iti siddham 
[II,509,ii]	yat tu artha ākāra pakṣe coditam ekatra arthe nakṣatram tārakā tiṣyaḥ iti paraspara virūddha ākāra samāveśaḥ na yuktaḥ iti tatra ucyate anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ yat na pramāṇena avagatam viruddham api tat avabuddhyāmahe yat ekatra niviśamānam na paśyāmaḥ tat iha yadi abādhitena jñānena vispaṣṭam ākāra trayam ekatra gṛhyate tat katham anupapannam syāt katham vā viruddham iti 
[II,509,iii]	atha ekam samyak pramāṇa pariniścita rūpam itarat kālpanikam iti pratīyate tat evam astu kaḥ dīṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca citra ādau aneka varṇa samāveśaḥ na ca ekatra virodham avirodham vā dṛṣṭavā sarvatra tat kalpanam ucitam abādhita avagati nibandhanāḥ hi vastu sthitayaḥ bhavanti na kalpanā nirmitāḥ 
[II,509,iv_II,510,i]	api vā vastu tāt rūpya sada sattā anapekṣayā śabda prayoga sādhu tvam anvākhyāyeta kevalam dārāḥ iti na ekasyāḥ strī vyakteḥ puṃstvaṃhuvam tva vā vidyate śabdaḥ tu eṣa tatra prayujyamānaḥ sādhuḥ bhavati na artha asaṃsparśitā ca asya tāvatā vyavatiṣṭhate yathā etat ātmakam vastu tathā śaknoti bhāṣitum 
[II,510,ii_II,510,iii]	parivrāj prabhṛtīnām ca kuṇapa ādi pratītayaḥ arthasya aneka śakti tvāt na avahanti artha śūnyatām kim na bhakṣayitum śakyā nārī kauleyakena sā kim vā na śamayati eṣā kāminaḥ madana jvaram śavāt vā kena rūpeṇa sā viśiṣyeta yoginaḥ dhī trayam tu na sarveṣām abhāvāt sahakāriṇaḥ prati prāṇi niyata anekavidha vāsanā bheda sahakāri sāpekṣaḥ hi tasya tasya jñānasya ātma lābhaḥ iti na sarveṣām sarva sārūpyeṇa jñānam 
[II,510,iv]	yadi evam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva vividha pratibhā udbhava hetuḥ bhavati kim artha kalpanayā ayi sādho kim adya api na pariharasau su ciram guṇitām kalpanā vācaḥ yuktim na hi arthaḥ kalpyate api tu pratibhāsate eva bahu rūpasya tu tasya ekatama rūpa pariccheda niyame kim arpi vāsanā ādi kāraṇam kvacid kalpyate kaḥ tāvatā artha nihnavasya avasaraḥ 
[II,511,i]	yat ca uktam vāsanā bhedaḥ eva jñāna vaicitrya kāraṇam itaretara kārya kāraṇa bhāva prabandhaḥ ca bīja aṅkura vat anādiḥ jñānayāsanayoḥ iti tat api aghaṭamānam kā iyam vāsanā nāma jñānāt avyatiktā ced sā api svaccha rūpa tvāt na jñāna kāluṣya kāraṇam bhavet jñāna vyatiriktā ced vāsanā tad vaicitrya hetuḥ ca saḥ arthaḥ eva paryāya antareṇa uktaḥ syāt 
[II,511,ii_II,511,iv]	api ca vāsanā nāma viṣaya anubhava samāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ iti loke prasiddhiḥ saṃskāraḥ ca yat anubhava ghaṭitaḥ tatra eva kvacid avasare smaraṇam upajanayati na punar asadeva vaicitryam idam īdṛśam āvahati kiṃca bhikṣu pakṣe kṣaṇika tvena jñānānām grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ iva vāsya vāsaka bhāvaḥ api nirākartavyaḥ sthāyinaḥ hi bhāvāḥ tila ādayaḥ sthāyibhiḥ eva campaka ādibhiḥ vāsyante na tu utpadya sa padyeva vinaśyadbhiḥ jñānaiḥ tādṛṃśyā iva jñānāni iti niranvaya vināśāt ca na tad aṃśaḥ anuvartate yatas kathaścid vāsyeta pūrveṇa jñānam uttaram 
[II,511,v_II,512,ii]	api ca ekatra devadatta santāne vāsanātaḥ sahasrāṇi jñāna vaicitrya kārīṇi bhaveyuḥ na hi go vāsanātas hasti jñānam udeti ananta tve api khalu āsām ārambhe niyamaḥ kutas asamaṃjasa kāri tve vyavahārasya viplavaḥ dhūma jñāna samutpāde dhūma vāsanayā kṛte kim tadā na jala jñānam janayet jala vāsanā vāsanāḥ ca vāsanā santānārambha hetavaḥ eva bhaveyuḥ na punar anubhava jñānam ādhātum udyaccheyuḥ sadṛśāt sadṛśa utpattiḥ iti hi bhavatām darśanam 
[II,512,iii]	api ca na nirādhārāḥ vāsanāḥ āsate na ca bhavat pakṣe tad ādhāraḥ kaścana saṃbhavati bhaṅgura tvena jñānasya tad āśraya tva anupapatteḥ eka jñāna āśrita tve sarvāsām vāsanānām tad vināśe nāśaḥ syāt prativāsanam āśraya abhede tad ānantyena aniyamaḥ ca śataśākhaḥ 
[II,512,iv_II,513,i]	na ca ālayavijñānam nāma kiṃcid asti sati api tasmin aśeṣa vāsanā sahasra samāśraye tad kṣaṇika tvāt sakṛt eva tathāvidha vāsanā kusūla jñāna vināśaḥ syāt punar utpāde api katham tathāvidham jñānam eva samutpādyeta te tu gavāśvādi jñāna krama niyamaḥ bhavet iti sarvathā saṅkaṭaḥ ayam panthāḥ tasmāt mṛgatṛṣṇikā eṣā tapasvinām vāsanātaḥ eva lokayātrā liddheḥ kim bāhyena arthena iti kṛtam ati vācāla tayā ciram api nipuṇaiḥ nirūpyamāṇaḥ atas arthasya eva na buddheḥ sidhyati nīla ādiḥ ākāraḥ ekaḥ ca bodhaḥ pramiti pramāṇa prameya rūpāṇi katham bibharti bhinnam pramāṇāt phalam abhyadhāyi pranyakṣa cintā avasare purastāt 
[II,513,ii]	ye tu bruvate tiṣṭhatu tāvat pramāṇa mārgam iti prameyam eva vikalpayantaḥ na brāhmam artham kaṃcana nirapavādam pratipadyāmahe tathā hi na tāvat ayam avayavī ghaṭa ādiḥ avakalpate avayava vyatirekeṇa avayavinaḥ anupalambhāt yaḥ hi yasmāt vyatiriktaḥ saḥ tad adhiṣṭhita deśa vyatirikta deśa adhiṣṭhānaḥ upalabhyate ghaṭadiva paṭaḥ na ca evam avayavebhyaḥ pṛthak deśaḥ dṛśyate avayavī tad agrahaṇe ca tad budhya bhāvāt ghaṭāgrahaṇe api paṭaḥ gṛhyate na tu avayava anupalabdhau avayavī iti katham sa tebhyaḥ bhidyeta 
[II,513,iii_II,513,iv]	avayava grahaṇa anupapatteḥ ca na hi sarve tad avayavāḥ śakyante grahītuṃmarvāc bhāga vartinaḥ eva gṛhyeran na madhya para bhāga gatāḥ iti budhyāḥ vibhajyamāne ca anupalambhāt yadā hi paṭam pāṇau nidhāya budhyā vivinākti eṣa tantuḥ eṣa tantuḥ iti tadā prācyādaṃcalāt prabhṛti praticīnam aṃcalam yāvat viviṃcayan asau tantu santatim eva kevalām upalabhate na tatas atiriktam paṭa a ayavinam 
[II,514,i]	vṛtti anupapatteḥ ca na ekatra avayave kārtsnyena avayavī vartate tad anyeṣu avṛtti prasaṅgāt na eka deśenavartate su a ārambha avayava vyatirikta deśa abhāvāt abhyupagame vā anavasthā prasaṅgāt yaiḥ api eka deśaiḥ avayaveṣu asauvartate teṣu api katham vartate anyaiḥ eka deśaiḥ teṣu api anyaiḥ iti na asti antar asaṃbaddhaḥ tu eka deśaiḥ avayavī iti katham tad vāreṇa su a ārambhakaiḥ api saṃbadhyeta tasmāt abhayi api na asya vṛttiḥ avayaveṣu iti 
[II,514,ii]	dhāraṇa ākarṣaṇa ādi tu anārabdha kārye kāṣṭha mūlaka kārpāsa ādau api dṛśyate iti anaikāntikam eka ākārātu pratīti vikalpa mātram eka deśa avasthāna ādi nimittam āśritya kari turaga padāti prabhṛtiṣu iva senā iti dhava khadira palāśa ādiṣu iva vanam iti saṃciteṣu abhavayaveṣu eva ghaṭhaḥ ityādi buddhiḥ bhaviṣyatī ti eva avayava avayava paryālocanayā aṇu saṃcaya mātram eva avaśiṣyate na anyat 
[II,514,iii]	saṃcayaḥ api ca vyatirikta avyatirikta tayā cintyamānaḥ na asti eva iti aṇavaḥ eva avaśiṣyante paramāṇavaḥ api ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇā ūṣṣa ṣ aṃśatā iti evam vikalpyamānāḥ viplavantaḥ eva na ca taiḥ ati sūkṣmaiḥ eṣa vyavahāraḥ abhinirvartyate iti tasmāt vāhyasya prameyasya eva nirūpyamāṇasya anupapatteḥ vijñāna mātram eva idam iti abhyupagamanīyam 
[II,515,i_II,515,iii]	te api evam vadantaḥ prāktanebhyaḥ api bhikṣubhyaḥ kṛpaṇatarāḥ iva lakṣyante apūrvam eṣa tarka mārgaḥ yatra pratītim utsṛjya tarjanī visphoṭanena vastu vyavasthāḥ kriyante dṛḍhena ced pramāṇena bādha ādi rahita ātmanā gṛhītaḥ eva avayavī kim ebhiḥ bāla valgitaiḥ atha na asti pramāṇena kena cittadupagrahaḥ etat eva ucyatām vṛtti vikalpaiḥ kim prayojanam na ca śaknuyaḥ pade pade vayam ebhiḥ abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid apaśyadbhiḥ tat eva punar punar pṛcchadbhiḥ śākyahatakaiḥ saha kalaham atimātram kartum 
[II,515,iv]	sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam pramāṇam iti sādhitam nirvikalpakena api śabda ullekha mātra rahitam sa vikalpaka grāhyam eva vastu gṛhyate iti ca darśitam eka ākāra viṣaya vyatirekeṇa ca tad buddheḥ eka kāryatva eka deśa ādi anyathā siddhi nibandhana tvam api na kiṃcid vaktum śakyate iti api varṇitam kvacid vā pṛtanāvana ādau bādhakopanipātāt eka avagati mithyātvāt na sarvatra mithyā tva kalpanā yuktā iti api uktam kim vā tat asti yad sāmānya samarthana avamare na akathitam tasmāt tayā eva nītyā avayavi api siddhaḥ eva tad grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya nirapavāda tvāt 
[II,516,i_II,516,iii]	yat tu deśa bhedena agrahaṇāt tad agrahe tad buddhi abhāvāt iti tatra avayava āśrita tvam eva nimittam na asattvam deśa bhedena hi jñānam tad deśasya katham bhavet na hi kaścid svatantraḥ asau api tu avayava āśritaḥ yāvatām grahaṇaḥ api asmin buddhiḥ bhavati tāvatām apekṣate asau grahaṇam na sarveṣām iti sthitiḥ vivicyamāneṣu aṃśeṣu yuktaḥ tad anupagrahaḥ tadā avaya vināśaḥ hi buddhau viparivartate avayava vavibhāgaḥ hi avayavinaḥ vināśa hetuḥ tasmin buddhyā samullikhyamāne avayavi vināśaḥ api na anullikhitaḥ bhavet iti katham avayavī tadānīm gamyeta 
[II,516,iv_II,517,iii]	vṛttiḥ ca avayaveṣu asya vyāsa jyā eva iti gamyate na pratyavayavam tasya samāptiḥ vyakti jāti vat vyāsajya vartamānaḥ hi na khalu avayava antaraiḥ vartate tad asaṃvitteḥ kintu vartate eva saḥ tathā ca āhuḥ vartate iti brūmaḥ anāśritasya anupalaṃbhāt vṛttiḥ evaṃvidhā anyatra kva dṛṣṭā iti yat ucyate pratyakṣa dṛṣṭaḥ eva arthe dṛṣṭānta anveṣaṇena kim tasmāt pratyakṣatas eva avāyava vṛtteḥ avayavinaḥ upalabdheḥ na tadvat tau vikalpānām avasaraḥ 
[II,517,iv_II,517,vi]	sraj sūtra ādi vṛttiḥ api tathā darśanāt abhyupagatā tat iyam avayavi vṛttiḥ api īdṛśī dṛśyamānā kim iti nihnūyate na ca avayavi grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya kaścid apavādaḥ samasti aduṣṭa kāraṇa udbhūtam anāvirbhūta bādhakam asandigdham ca vijñānam katham mithyā iti kathyate na ca senā vanavadavaya vigrahaṇam abhidhātum ucitam abādhita tvāt senā ādau bādhaka sadbhāvāt 
[II,517,vii]	api ca gaja vāji padāti pīlu palāśa śiṃśapa ādi darśanasya tatra ghaṭamāna tvāt tad samavāye senā vanādi pratītiḥ upapadī eta api iha tu kiṃsamudāya viṣayaḥ paṭa pratyayaḥ iti cintyam tantu sasudāya ālambanaḥ iti ced tantu pratyayaḥ idānīm kim ālambanaḥ saḥ api su āvaya bālambanaḥ iti evam avayava avayava nirūpaṇe paramāṇavaḥ patti aśva śamī śiṃśapa ādi sthānīya vaktavyāḥ teṣām ca tadvat grahaṇam anupapannam atīndriya tvāt iti na tad ālambanaḥ avayavi pratyayaḥ tasmāt avayavī pratyakṣa grāhyaḥ asti iti siddham 
[II,518,i]	paramāṇavaḥ api kārya anumāna pariniścita nitya niravayava svarūpāḥ santi iti pūrvam eva samarthitam atas na ṣaṭka yoga ādinā sāvayava tvam eṣā upapādayitum pāryate mūrta tvam api anitya tā āyām aprayojakam iti darśayiṣyate 
[II,518,ii_II,518,iii]	atas prameya paryālīcana vartmanā api śūnya vāda samarthanam na suśakam prameya vicāre api hi pramāṇa vṛttam eva parīkṣyate atas ca pramāṇa carcā atas vibhyadbhiḥ prapalāyya yā prameya kathā vīthī tathāgata ebalambitā tasyām api sā eva bhīṣaṇa mukhī pramāṇa carcikā eva upanatā sarvatī vipadām mārgam ādeśayitum udyate vidhau vidhura tām yati prapalāpya kva gamyate tasmāt pramāṇataḥ aśakye śakye vā vastu nirṇaye evaṃprāyam ayuktam vaḥ kuśa kāśa abalambanam evam niṣphalam utsṛthya śūnya vāda baka vratam bāhyena eva artha jātena vyavahāraḥ vidhīyattam 
[II,519,i_II,519,ii]	atha asthā śaithilya jananāya sarvam śūnyam sarvam kṣaṇikam sarvam nirālambanam iti upadiśyate tarhi kim anena mṛṣodyena sati api ātmani satsu api sreṣu padārtheṣu viṣaya doṣa darśana dvāreṇa bhavati eva vivekavatām vairāgyam iti tad upajananāya śūnyavāda ādi varṇanam vakraḥ panthāḥ pratyuta prājñaḥ mumukṣuḥ kṣaṇika nairātmya śūnyatā ādi vacanam yukti bādhitam avabudhyamānaḥ vaṃcanā mayam iva tat upadeśam āśaṅkate saḥ eṣa buddhi śūnyānām śūnya vāda parigrahaḥ pratāraṇa parāṇām vā na tu tattva artha darśinām tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇaḥ ayam śabda ādi advaita pakṣa vat vijñānādvaitapakṣaḥ api gandharvanagara āyate 
[II,519,iii]	tat evam advaitadṛśāna dṛśyate janasya niḥśreyasa saṃpad āgamaḥ atas yathā ukta ātma su tattva cintayā kṛtī vyavasyet apavarga siddhaye 
[II,519,iv]	sāṅkhyaiḥ yaḥ tu apavarga sādhana vidhau uktaḥ prakṛti ātmanoḥ anyatva avagamaḥ abhyupāyaḥ iti sa prāk eva nirvāsitaḥ ajñā śaktimati vikāra bahulā badhnāti akiṃcitkaram bhūyas na prakṛtiḥ pumāṃsam iti vā kaḥ tām niyantum kṣamaḥ puṃsā na kiṃcid api bandha nidhāna bhūtam ati alpa mātram api karma kṛtam kadācid mathnāti tam prakṛtiḥ eva niraṅkuśā eṣā mattā kareṇuḥ iva padma vanāni bhūyas 
[II,520,i]	kaca niluṃcana diś paṭa dhāraṇa kṣitidharā ākramaṇa krama pūrvakam kṣapaṇakāḥ tu apavargam uśanti amī hi atitarām parama artha vidaḥ tu te lomnām nitya saṃbhavāt khalatayaḥ mokṣam kṣaṇāt prāpnuyuḥ saṃsāra uparamaḥ digambara tayā sadyas tiraścām bhavet muktāḥ syuḥ giri śṛṅga vāsinaḥ ime śaśvat tad ārohaṇāt jantūnām apavarga vartma nikaṭam kena īdṛśam darśitam tasmāt ātma jñānam santaḥ mokṣa prāptau hetum prāhuḥ tīrthe tīrthe tat ca ācāryaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ uktam saṃjñā bhedaiḥ 
[II,521,i]	yat api iha kecid a vikalpam īśvara praṇidhānam āhuḥ apavarga sādhanam idam ātma darśanam avādi taiḥ api prathitaḥ hi pūraṣa viśeṣaḥ īśvaraḥ 
[II,521,ii]	dṛṣṭā vādi antarāṇām gatiḥ iyam iyatī na apavargasya mārgam spraṣṭum draṣṭum samarthāḥ te iti ciram iha śvabhraḥ eva bhramanti nedī yāneṣu tasmāt bhava maru patitaiḥ akṣapāda upadiṣṭaḥ panthāḥ kṣemāyāḥ mokṣa adhigama samucitaḥ kṣipram ālambanīyaḥ 
[II,522,i]	saṃśaya ādeḥ padārtha gaṇasya pramāṇa prameya pada saṃgṛhītasya apinyāya pravṛtti prayo jana tayā pṛthak vyutpādanīya tvasya prāk eva samarthita tvāt prathama sūtre ca prameyāḥ nantaram saṃśaya uddeśāt uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam pratipādayitum āha samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ nyā sū 
[II,522,ii]	nanu saṃśayasya samāna dharma upapatti ādi kāraṇa bhedena paṃcavidha tvāt sāmānya sakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni tatra sāmānya lakṣaṇe vibhāge ca sūtra dvayam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham ca paṃcānām tad pramedānām sūtrapaṃcakam iti evam sapta sūtrāṇi praṇetum yuktāni ekam ca idam sūtram śrūyate tat katham etat bhaviṣyati ucyate satyam āha bhavān kim tu ekam eva idam sūtram āvṛtti nyāyam āśritya saptadhā kalpayiṣyate 
[II,522,iii]	tatra ācāryāḥ tāvat evam vyācakṣate samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti iyat sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇā pratipādakam samāna aneka dharma upapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ ca iti vibhāga sūtram punar ca samāna dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viśeṣa apekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti etat eva sūtram prathamasya saṃśayasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇa pratipādakam iti 
[II,523,i]	nanu etat eva sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa artham iyat eva ced ayamanyūna an atiriktam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa artham iti katham etat ucyate viśeṣa smaraṇa kāraṇa bhūta sādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa āsmṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti pratyātma vedanīyam tāvat etat sūtre viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti anena padena viśeṣa smaraṇam upadiṣṭam upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā padena ca viśeṣa agrahaṇam iti īyat tāvat dvayoḥ aṇi sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ tulyam samāna śabdaḥ tu ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ san tad sāmānya lakṣaṇam āha anugata sāmānyatracanaḥ tu viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti 
[II,523,ii_II,524,i]	katham punar ayam eva ākṣipta sāmānya vacanaḥ kathaṃca anugata sāmānya vacanaḥ iti ucyate saṃśaya utpattyā eva samāna dharya mātram ākṣipyate yat gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣa smaraṇa bīja saṃskāra udbodha nimitta tām pratipadyate tad vyatirekeṇa saṃśaya an utpādāt tathā hi viruddha viśeṣa avamarśa svabhāvaḥ tāvat saṃśayaḥ na ca viruddha viśeṣāṇām puras avasthite dharmiṇi sannihitānām avamarśanam viruddha tayā eva ekatra sannidhāna abhāvāt atas smṛti upārūḍhānām avamarśanam smṛtiḥ ca na akasmāt udbhavati iti yad sahacaritānām teṣām viśeṣāṇām pūrvam paryāyeṇa grahaṇam vṛttam tad darśana saṃskāra prabodha dvāreṇa smaraṇa kāraṇam avaśyam eva āśrayaṇīyam tat tu anugatam vā bhavatu vyāvṛttam vā vipratipatti ātmakam vā āntaram upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā rūpam vā iti evam ākṣipta sāmānya vācini samāna śabde paṃcasa ādhāraṇa rūpa avagamāt sāmānya lakṣaṇa artha tā yadā tu anugatam eva dharmam āroha pariṇāha ādi svabhāvam ācaṣṭe samāna śabdaḥ tadā aviśeṣa lakṣaṇa arthaḥ iti 
[II,524,ii]	tatra ca ittham sūtra yojanā samānaḥ dharmaḥ pariṇāha ādiḥ tasya guṇa tvena pratidravyam anya tve api tulya rūpa avagati viṣayīkṛta tvāt samāna tvam upapadyate tasya upapattiḥ upalabdhiḥ atha api sattā upapatti śabdena ucyate sā api upalabdhi adhīna sthitiḥ eva bhavati iti sarvathā samāna dharma upalabdheḥ saṃśayaḥ iti uktam bhavati 
[II,524,iii]	nanu samāna dharmaḥ artha antaram dharmiṇaḥ na ca artha antare dṛṣṭe anyatra saṃśayaḥ bhavitum arhati na artha antara viśeṣa tvāt artha antara viśeṣaḥ tu dharmyā iva ucyate artha antareṇa pariṇāha ādinā viśeṣyate iti tasmin eva sādhāraṇa dharma adhyāsita vapuṣi dharmiṇi nayana patha vartini tad gata viśeṣa avamarśa ātmā tatra eva saṃśayaḥ jāyate yaḥ ayam ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī dṛśyate saḥ sthāṇuḥ vāsyāt puruṣova iti na artha antara tvam dūṣaṇam 
[II,525,i]	tathā api vakra koṭara tva kara caraṇa ādi viśeṣa darśinaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kāraṇa antaram ucyate upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti viśeṣa agrahaṇāḥ diti arthaḥ katham punar upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ iti anena viśeṣa agrahaṇam ucyate ittham ucyate idantayā anidantayā vā tatra upalabdhiḥ na vyavatiṣṭhate anupalabdhiḥ vā iti viśeṣa grahaṇe hi sati tad vyavasthānam saṃbhavati sthāṇuḥ ayam na puruṣaḥ iti vakra koṭara ādi yiśeṣa grahaṇe śiraḥ pāṇi ādi paricchede tu puruṣaḥ ayam na sthāṇuḥ iti 
[II,525,ii]	evam anena padena viśeṣa agrahaṇam uktam tathā api preṅkhā ārūḍhasya sādhāraṇa dharma darśinaḥ viśeṣān upalabhamānasya api na dṛṣṭaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kāraṇa antaram ucyate viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[II,525,iii_II,526,i]	nanu viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti śrūyate na viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ iti satyam aśrūyamāṇam api tad smaraṇam saṃśaya prastāvāt avagamyate smaryamāṇa tvena hi viśeṣāṇām saṃśaya utpattau apekṣā na anabhūyamāna tayā anubhūyamāneṣu hi teṣu saṃśaya chedaḥ bhavati na saṃśayaḥ apekṣā śabda artha nirūpaṇāt eva vā smṛtiḥ labhyate viśeṣāṇām apekṣā ākāṅkṣā te ca anupalabhyamānāḥ pūrva anubhūtāḥ ca ākāṅkṣyante iti iyam sā teṣām smṛtiḥ saṃprati upalabhyamāneṣu ekāntān anubhūteṣu vā teṣu ākāṅkṣā anupapatteḥ 
[II,526,ii_II,526,iii]	nanu samāna dharma upapatteḥ viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca iti kāraṇa dvayam eva astu kim vaśeṣa agrahaṇena api ca viśeṣa smaraṇāt eva nanu ākṣiptaḥ tadā agrahaḥ grahaṇam smaraṇam ca eva bhavetām yugapad katham asti etat kintu na ati dūra gatāyām nija pramadāyām anurāgavataḥ kāminaḥ samāna dharma darśane tad gata viśeṣa adarśane tad anusmaraṇe ca sanī api na bhavati eva saṃśayaḥ atas saṃśaya utpatti avyabhicāre deśa kāla vyavahita viśeṣa agrahaṇa siddhaye pada antaram upādīyate deśa antare kāla antare vā cira dṛṣṭānām viśeṣāṇām idānīm agrahaṇam saṃśaya kāraṇam na viśeṣa agrahaṇa mātram evam amunā pada trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam idam uktam 
[II,526,iv]	nanu ca saṃbhūya kārakaiḥ kāryam ārabhataḥ iti nyāyāt samāna dharma upalabdhi viśeṣa anupalabdhi tad smṛti lakṣaṇa kāraṇa traya janye saṃśaye jñāna yaugapadya mā āpadyate krama bhāvi tve hi buddhīnām na eka kārya utpattau yugapad vyāpāraḥ samasti viśeṣāḥ ca bahavaḥ api saṃbhavanti iti tad smaraṇāni api yugapad bhūyāṃsi bhaveyuḥ na etat evam samāna dharma grahaṇa anantaram pūrva upajāta vividha viśā eṣa anubhava paramparā upacita pīvara saṃskāra dvārakam ekam eva tat viṣayam smaraṇam bhaviṣyati yathā varṇānām artha pratītau varṇitam 
[II,527,i_II,527,ii]	upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthā sūcitā ca viśeṣa anupalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ eva na sā jñāna ātmikā kintu jñāna anutpādaḥ iti tat tṛtīyam kāraṇam api bhavat na jñāna ātmakam iti dve eva jñāna ātmake kāraṇe samāna dharma grahaṇam viśeṣa smaraṇam ca tayoḥ prathamam samāna dharma grahaṇam vinaśyat avastham viśesmaraṇam ca dvitīyam avinaśyat avastham saṃśayam upajanayataḥ īdṛśayoḥ ca jñānayoḥ yaugapadyam aviruddham iti śāstre sthitam evam samāna dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa agrahaṇāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti pada trayeṇa saṃśaya lakṣaṇam anavadyam ucyate iti 
[II,527,iii_II,528,i]	tat etat ācārya vyākhyānam arocayantaḥ pare aparathā vyācakṣate sāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat vimarśa padena eva pratipādyate na hi paryāya uccāraṇa mātram idam vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti kintu saṃśayaḥ iti lakṣya padam vimarśaḥ iti lakṣaṇa padam pramāṇa pada vat ca nirvacana savyapekṣam etat padam lakṣaṇa pratipādana kṣamam bhavati viruddha artha avamarśaḥ vimarśaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti iyatā ca sajātīya saṃśaya paścaka anugatam vijātītebhyaḥ pramāṇa ādibhyaḥ vyavaccinnam sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati saṃśayīt pādaka kāraṇa parigaṇanam punar indriya artha sannikarṣa utpanna grahaṇa vat iha api na upayujyate kāraṇa antarāṇām api ātmam anasyat nikarṣa ādīnām aparihārya tvāt atha anyāsādhāraṇa kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ cikīrṣitaḥ tena api kī arthaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇasya pratipipādayiṣita tvāt tasya ca vimarśa padāt eva siddha tvāt 
[II,528,ii_II,528,iv]	upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthāpada pratipādyamāna viśeṣa agrahaṇa varṇanam ca atīva kliṣṭam iti punar ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇa prasaṅge yathāśrutam eva tat vyākhyeyam iti atibhāraḥ evam vimarśa padena vijātīya vyavaccheda kāriṇi sāmānya lakṣaṇe varṇite samāna dharma upapatteḥ iti ekam eva padam sajātīya saṃśaya antara vyavaccheda kāri viśeṣa lakṣaṇa kṣamam bhavati iti tatra api pada traya yojanam na upāyujyate iti atra vyākhyāna dvaye api katarat sādhu iti tad vidaḥ pramāṇam 
[II,528,v]	aneka dharma upapatteḥ iti atra api tripada parigrahaṇena ena lakṣaṇam ācāryāḥ varṇayanti aneka dharma upapatteḥ upalabdhi anupalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ viṣeṣa apekṣaḥ iti asādhāraṇa dharma grahaṇāt viśeṣa grahaṇāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti arthaḥ ekaika pada upādāna phalam ca pūrvavat atra api darśayitavyam na ca indriya mana ssaṃyoga ādi kāraṇa antara parigaṇana codanam yuktam teṣām sarva buddhi janma su tulya tvāt iha asādhāraṇa saṃśaya jñāna kāraṇa upadeśa prastāvāt iti 
[II,529,i_II,529,iii]	anye tu sāmānya lakṣaṇa sampādite vijātīya vyavacchede kevala sajātīya vyavacchinna lakṣaṇa pradhita pādana nipuṇam aneka dharma upapatti padam eva pūrvavat varṇayāṃcakruḥ nanu aneka dharma śabdena katham asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ucyate evam ucyate samāna jātīyam asamāna jātīyam ca anekam tasmāt parāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ iti yat vā kim anayā kliṣṭa kalpanayā asti ayam eka śabdaḥ samāna paryāyaḥ tatra spaṣṭaḥ eva nañsamāsena asamāna dharmaḥ aneka dharmaḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ ucyate eva iti 
[II,529,iv]	bhavatu evam asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu katham saṃśaya kāraṇa tvam iti cintyam viruddha viśeṣa anusmaraṇa kāraṇakam hi saṃśayam āhuḥ viśeṣāṇām ca smaraṇa hetoḥ saṃskārasya tat udbodhakam bhavati yena saha ete pūrvam paryāyeṇa upalabdhāḥ asādhāraṇa dharmasya tu asādhāraṇa dharma tvāt eva na kenacid saha pūrvam grahaṇam abhavat bhāve tu asādhāraṇa dharma tā eva hīyeta iti atas katham asau tad smṛti hetuḥ vyāvṛtta tayā eva tu smṛti hetu tve asya trailokya smaraṇa nimitta tā prasajyeta tatas api vyāvṛtta tvāt iti 
[II,530,i]	na eṣa doṣaḥ prakāra antareṇa asya smṛti hetu tvāt iha hi keṣucid keṣucid asādhāraṇa dharmāḥ dharmiṣu bhavantaḥ tad gata sādhāraṇa dharma antara sahacaritāḥ bhavanti tat yathā pṛthivī tvac andha tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ pṛthivyām asādhāraṇā ssantaḥ sneha vat tva ādi dharmāḥ ca tathā eva apsu dravya tva sahacāriṇaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ rūpa ādiṣu rūpa tva ādi dharmāḥ guṇa tva sahacāriṇaḥ utkṣepaṇa ādiṣu utkṣepaṇa tva ādi dharmāḥ karma tva sahacāriṇaḥ evam prakṛte api dharmiṇi kasmiṃścid asādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ kena api sādhāraṇa dharma antareṇa sahacaritaḥ bhavati iti bhavati viśeṣa anusmṛti dvāreṇa saṃśaya sādhanam 
[II,530,ii_II,530,iii]	nanu evam tarhi vyāvṛtta tvāt eva samāna dharmāt eṣa saṃśayaḥ na aneka dharmāt iti mā evam aneka dharmaḥ eva asau tena vartmanā viśeṣān smārayan saṃśaya janmane kalpate asati hi tasmin kim ālambanam vyāvṛtta tvam syāt iti ala m ati sūkṣma īkṣikayā tasya udāharaṇam bhāṣya kāreṇa darśitam śabde vibhāga ja tvam yathā hi pṛthivī ādau pṛthivī tva ādiḥ vyāvṛttaḥ dharmaḥ dravya tva ādi anugata dharma sahacārī dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabde vibhāga ja tvam dharmaḥ kenacid dravya tva ādīnām anyatamena dharmeṇa sahacaritaḥ syāt iti saṃśayaḥ 
[II,530,iv_II,531,i]	nanu vibhāga ja tvam asādhāraṇaḥ na bhavati eva śabda dharmaḥ vibhāga javi bhāge api bhāvāt tathā ca prayogaḥ guṇaḥ śabdaḥ vibhāga ja tvāt vibhāga ja vi bhāga vat iti tatra kecid āhuḥ satyam asti vibhāge api vibhāga ja tvam śabde tu viśeṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ dvividhaḥ hi vibhāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ ca kāraṇam samavāyi kāraṇam atra abhipretam kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tāvat tantu vibhāgāt tantu ākāśa vibhāgaḥ 
[II,531,ii_II,531,iii]	kāraṇa akāraṇa vibhāga pūrvakaḥ tu aṅgulī ākāśa vibhāgāt hasta ākāśa vibhāgaḥ hasta ākāśa vibhāgāt api śarīra ākāśa vibhāgaḥ iti śabdaḥ tu niyamena eva kāraṇa vibhāga pūrvaka vi bhāga prabhavaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgāt dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgāt ca asamavāyi kāraṇāt śabdaḥ niṣpadyate iti anena viśeṣeṇa āsya īdṛśa vibhāga ja tu asya asādhāraṇa tvam śabda dharmasya ucyate iti 
[II,531,iv_II,531,v]	anye tu vibhāga jam vibhāgam amṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathāśrutasya eva śabde vibhāga ja tu asya asādhāraṇa dharma tām ācakṣate nanu kim iti vibhāga jam vibhāgam te na mṛṣyante asti hi ayam tad siddhau nyāyaḥ yadā hi avayave karma utpannam avayava antarāt vibhāgam karoti na tad ākāśa ādi deśāt yadā tu ākāśa ādi deśāt na tadā aayava antarāt iti sthitiḥ 
[II,532,i_II,532,ii]	kim kṛtā punar iyam sthitiḥ iti ced ucyate yā hi avayava kriyā nabhaḥ bhāga vibhāga kāriṇī na asau dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratipakṣa bhūtam vibhāgam ārabhamāṇā dṛśyate dinakara kiraṇa parāmarśa upajanita kamala dala vikāsa kāri kriyāvat tat eva katham iti ced kamalasya mukula vikāsa daśayoḥ pratyabhijñāyamāna tvena avināśa niścayāt iyam tu pāṭyamāna vaṃśa dala kriyā dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratidvandvibhūta vibhāga ārambhikā dravyān āraṃbhaka saṃyoga pratidvaṃdvi vibhāga janikā upalabhyate iti na asau nabhasaḥ vibhāgam ārabheta iti atas eṣā sthitiḥ asti iti vibhāga ja vibhāga kalpanā kriyate 
[II,532,iii]	saṃyoga antam karma iti tāvat sthitam anyathā hi tasya kāla antara sthāyi tvam nitya dravya samavetasya ca nitya tvam syāt tasmāt karmaṇaḥ acira jīvi tvāt tad vināśakena saṃyogena bhavitavyam uttaraḥ tu saṃyogaḥ pūrva saṃyoga uparame sati jāyate na anyathā na ca vibhāga vyatiriktaḥ kaścana saṃyogasya hantā samasti 
[II,532,iv_II,533,i]	karma tu uttara saṃyoga janma nirjñāta kauśalam na hi prāktana saṃyoga vināśāya prakalpate tasmāt vibhāgena eva saṃyoga virodhinā bhavitavyam yat adhikaraṇaḥ vibhāgaḥ tad adhikaraṇam eva saṃyogam upaśamayati na tu aṅguli vibhāgaḥ kuṇḍa badara saṃyoga upamardāya prabhavati iti atas na vaṃśa dala vṛtti vibhāgaḥ dala ākāśa saṃyogam upahantum alam iti nūnam dala ākāśa saṃyoga vairiṇā dala ākāśa vibhāgena bhavitavyam 
[II,533,ii]	tat idānīm tasya utpatti kāraṇa cintāyām kriyāyām vaṃśa dala vibhāga mātraḥ pajanane caritārtha tvāt tam nirmāya vibhāga antara nirmāṇe viramya vyāpārā saṃvedanāt avaśyam vaṃśa dala vibhāgaḥ eva pratyāsanna tayā dala ākāśa vibhāga ārambhakaḥ abhyupagamanīyaḥ evam anabhyupagame karma nitya tva prasaṅgāt iti 
[II,533,iii]	atra vadanti na karma nitya tvam anabhyupagamyamāne api vibhāga je vibhāge bhaviṣyati uttara saṃyogasya karma vināśa hetoḥ astitvāt pūrva saṃyoga anuparame katham tad utpādaḥ iti ced bāḍham uparate eva pūrva saṃyogaḥ kaḥ tasya uparama hetuḥ iti ced karma hi uttara saṃyoga nimittam yat upeyate tat eva pūrva saṃyoga dhvaṃsa kāri bhaviṣyati na yat janane śaktam aśaktam tad vināśane hetuḥ dahana saṃyogaḥ pākaja utpāda nāśayoḥ 
[II,533,iv]	yathā ca vibhāge adhikaraṇa niyamaḥ yad ādhāraḥ vibhāgaḥ tad ādhāram eva saṃyogam niruṇaddhi tathā karmaṇi api niyamaḥ karma api sva āśrayasya yat anya diś saṃyoga nibandhanam tat tad viruddha diś vṛtteḥ saṃyogasya upamardakam iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ evam karma āviṣṭasya uttara saṃyoga darśa nam adūṣaṇam vigantara saṃyogasya tena upamardanāt 
[II,534,i_II,534,ii]	api ca yat eva karma vaṃśa dalana vibhāga kāri kathyate tat eva dala ākāśa vibhāga kāri bhaviṣyati kaḥ doṣaḥ nanu vyoma vibhāga kāri karma na dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratyanīka bhūta vibhā ārambhakam ambhoruha karma vat iti uktam satyam uktam ayuktam tu śatapatra patra karmaṇaḥ api dravya ārambhaka saṃyoga pratikūla vibhāga ārambhaka tvāt tat ca karma kuḍmala kamalāt vikaca kamalasya anya tva niścayāt niścitam 
[II,534,iii_II,534,iv]	nanu tat eva idam aravindam iti saṃdeha viparyaya rahita tāmarasa pratyabhijñā darśanāt katham saṃkoca vikāsa daśā mātra bhedāt tad anyatvam iti kṛtam anayā durā śayā śarīre api su spaṣṭa upalabhyamāna śaiśava yauvana vārdhaka ādi daśā bheda bhinna svarūpe pratyabhijñāna darśanāt na ca śarīra kuśeśayayoḥ viśeṣa leśam ati kṛśam api paśyāmaḥ iti kutas tat eka tvam bhavatu vā puṇḍarīkasya avināśaḥ nidarśana mātram idam tu varṇitam na tu pratibaddhaḥ kaścana hetuḥ asti iti abhyadhāyi yena vaṃśa dala karmaṇaḥ kokanada pallava karma sāmyam kalpyeta kriyā tvam tu aprayojakam eva tad karmaṇām vicitra kārya hetu tvāt 
[II,535,i]	yadi vā na anyaḥ vaṃśa dala vibhāgaḥ na anyaḥ ca tad kāryaḥ dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ kintu ekaḥ eva vibhāgaḥ ayam bhedaḥ asi a āśraya bhedataḥ ekatra deśe avasthānāt vyomnaḥ vaṃśa dalasya ca samāna deśe vṛtti tvam mūrtānām hi viruddhyate vyomnassarva gata tvāt tu vidyate tatra sannidhiḥ eka deśa āśraya tve tu yat ekasmāt vibhāga kṛt tat eva anyatas iti asti na vibhāgaḥ vibhāga jaḥ 
[II,535,ii]	apare punar vibhāga ja vibhāga parākaraṇa upārūḍha rabhasāḥ saṃgirante tiṣṭhatu tāvat dūratas eva vimāga jaḥ vibhāgaḥ karma jaḥ api na vibhāgaḥ nāma kaścid asti saṃyoga virodhini tasmin abhyupagamyamāne mudgara ādi vat pūrva siddha tā avaśyaṃbhāvinī tatas ca pūrva siddhaḥ vibhāgaḥ saṃyogam unmūlayati iti ghaṭa mudgarayoḥ iva saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ ekatra yugapad upalabdhiḥ bhaveta na ca evam asti tasmāt saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva vibhakta pratyayaḥ iti na vibhāga ālambanatām pratipadyate 
[II,535,iii]	sati api vibhāge tasmin kṣaṇe saṃyogasya avināśāt na bhavati vibhakta pratibhāsaḥ kṣaṇa antare ca saṃyoga vināśe sati bhavati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām saṃyoga abhāva viṣayaḥ eva avasīyate iti atas na pratyakṣa gamyatā nibhāgasya saṃyoga bhaṅga liṅgena ca tad parikalpana kriyā iva tam hinasti iti purastāt upapāditam 
[II,536,i_II,536,ii]	katham tarhi vibhāga ja tvam śabdasya bhāṣya kāraḥ udāhṛtavān ucyate trividham kāraṇam kārya utpattim prati vidhatte samayāyi kāraṇam asamavāyi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇam cetiḥ tatra samavāyi kāraṇam tat ucyate yatra āśritam kāryam upalabhyate yathā paṭasya tantavaḥ asamavāyi kāraṇam tu dvividham kāryā eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā pratyāsattya pratyāsannam kāraṇa eka artha samavāya lakṣaṇayā vā saṃbaddham tatra kārya eka artha samavāyena pratyāsannam yathā paṭasya tantu saṃyogaḥ kāraṇa eka artha samavāyena tu pratyāsannam yathā paṭa rūpasya tantu rūpam iti 
[II,536,iii_II,536,iv]	avadhṛta kāraṇam ca tad asamavāyi kāraṇam āśrayaṇīyam atas buddhi janmani sati api eka artham amavāye na anyeṣām ātma guṇānām icchā dīna asamamavāyi kāraṇa tvam api tu avaghṛta sāmarthyasya ātma mana ssaṃyogasya eva iti samavāyi asamavāyi vyatiriktam tu kārya utpattau nirjñāta sāmarthyam yat kāraṇam tat nimitta kāraṇam ucyate iti 
[II,536,v_II,537,ii]	evam sthite śabdasya nitya tve niraste kāryatve ca sādhite tad utpattau ākāśam tāvat samavayi kāraṇam nimitta kāraṇāni tu bhūyāṃsi santi eva asamavāyi kāraṇam tu cintyam tat ca ākāśa āśritam avaśyam anyathā pratyāsatti abhāvāt tad guṇa antarāṇām ca vibhu tva ādīnām anavadhṛta śakti tvāt vaṃśa dala pāṭana samanantaram ca śabda utpāda darśanāt evam manyāmahe kriyā yadā eva saṃyogam hanti vaṃśa dala āśritam tadā eva gagane kaṃcid karoti atiśayam dhruvam ākāśa atiśayaḥ yaḥ ca kriyājaḥ śabda kāraṇam asau vibhāga nāma iti śabde tat janyatā ucyate tat evam etat yathāgamam ācārya matam abhihitam asmābhiḥ 
[II,537,iii_II,537,iv]	etat ca matimat bhivicāraṇīyam kim ākāśa atiśaya mātram kiṃcid asamavāyi kāraṇam uta yathā mudgara daṇḍa saṃyoga kārye śabde bherī gagana saṃyogasya asamavāyi kāraṇa tvam evam vaṃśa dala vibhāga kārye tasmin dala gagana vibhāgasya iti dala ākāśa vibhāgaḥ api kim dala vibhāga jaḥ uta karma jaḥ eva iti sarvathā kaścid asādharaṇaḥ dharmaḥ saṃśaya hetuḥ udāhartavyaḥ iti iyatā naḥ prayojanam 
[II,538,i]	virūddhā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ asti ātmā iti eke na asti ātmā iti apare sā iyam vipratipatti rūpalabhyamānā viśeṣa smaraṇa dvāreṇa saṃśayam āvahati na ca iha kaścid anugataḥ vyāvṛttaḥ vā dharmaḥ saṃśaya kāraṇam api tu vipratipattiḥ eva iti kim tatra api tripada parigraheṇa lakṣaṇa varṇanam ekena eva vā padena iti pūrvavat ācārya dvaya matam anusaraṇīyam 
[II,538,ii]	upalabdhi avyavasthātaḥ khalu a vapi bhavati saṃśayaḥ sat ca udakam upalabhyate yathā hrada ādiṣu kvacid asat ca bhāskara kara nikara pratiphalana taralitāsu maru sthālīṣu tat evam upalabdhekhyavasthita tvāt kvacid upalabhyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ kim idam sat upalabhyate kim asat iti 
[II,538,iii]	anupalabdhi avyasthātaḥ ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ kiṃcid asat eva na upalabhyate nabhaḥ samādi kiṃcid sat api na upalabhyate mṛd antarita śaṅku mūla jala ādi tad anyatra anupalabhyamāne saṃśete pumān kim idam asat eva na upalabhyete uta sat iti 
[II,538,iv_II,539,i]	avyavastha śabdena atra pūrvam paryāyeṇa pravṛtta sadasat āśrita viśeṣa adarśanam sūcitam idānīm punar artha kriyā samartha tā ādiḥ viśeṣa darśana śūnya cetasām upalabdhi anupalabdhi mātra upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati iti varṇyate na ca evam sati sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ iti śaṅkanīyam yathā anubhavam saṃśaya abhyupagamāt sarvatra ca tad utpādaka viśeṣa agrahaṇa tad smaraṇa ādi kāraṇa sānnidhya asaṃbhavāt iti atra api pada trayeṇa ekena vā padena lakṣaṇa upapādanam pūrvavat draṣṭavyam 
[II,539,ii_II,539,iii]	nanu ca upalabdhi anupalabdhī sat asataḥ samānaḥ eva dharmaḥ iti pūrveṇa gata artha tvam na etat pūrva nirdiṣṭasya ūrdhva tva ādeḥ dharmasya jñeya stha tvāt upa labdhi anupalabdhyīḥ ca jñātṛ stha tvāt atas eva ca mānasam imam saṃśayam ācakṣate na bāhya dharmi saṃbaddha sādhāraṇa ūrdhva tā ādi dharma adhigama adhīna saṃśaya vat bāhya indriya jam 
[II,539,iv]	nanu ca upalabdhi tvam anupalabdhi tvam vā atra saṃśaya kāraṇam tat hi na jñātari vartate kintu buddhau iti katham ayam viśeṣaḥ satyam evam asamāna dharmaḥ api upalabdhita ādikaḥ yat āśritaḥ tat hi boddhari vartate atas viśeṣāt pṛthak eva kathyate yathā hi asādhāraṇa tā āśrayaḥ evaṃprakāram eva ca viśeṣam āśritya kiṃcid paṃcavidha tvam vipaṃcyate 
[II,539,v_II,540,i]	paramārtataḥ tu sarvatra anugata saṃbandhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ viśeṣa smaraṇa janya tvāt saṃśayasya viśeṣāṇām ca yena saha pūrvam darśanam abhūt tasmin anupalabhyamāne smaraṇa asaṃbhavāt atas tasya aneka viśeṣa anugāmi tvāt samāna tvam aparihāryam atas eva ca ākṣipta sāmānya vācinam samāna śabdam sāmānya lakṣaṇe vyācakhyuḥ ācāryāḥ iti alam ati vistareṇa iti paṃcavidhaḥ prapaṃcitaḥ muninā darśitaḥ eṣa saṃśayaḥ phalavat vyavahāra hetu tām anumāna aṅga tayā vibharti yaḥ anumāniḥ apekṣaḥ eva vā kila dṛṣṭe viṣaye artha saṃśayaḥ vahati vyavahāra vartanīm iti pūrva ca vicāritam budhaiḥ 
[II,540,ii_II,540,iii]	yam artham adhikṛtya prarvatate tad prayojanam yam iti atra deśa kāla puruṣa daśā bheda bhinna prayojana viśeṣa vyāptaye vīpsā draṣṭavyā arthaḥ arthyamānaḥ ucyate na vastu rūpaḥ eva abhāvasya api prayaḥ jana tu a saṃbhavāt adhikāraḥ arthasya vyavasāyaḥ yam yam artham āptavyam hātavyam vā adhikṛtya vyavasāyaḥ pravartate tad prāptaye parihārāya vā ceṣṭate puruṣaḥ tat prayojanam iti 
[II,541,i_II,541,iii]	tat ca gauṇa mukhya bhedena dvividham mukhyam sukha prāptiḥ duḥkha parihāraḥ ca tad sādhanam tu gauṇam sukha sādhanam api candana dhana sāra hāra mahilā ādi prāptavya tvāt mukhya tvena yadā vivakṣitam bhavati tadā tad avāpti upāye gauṇa tā draṣṭavyā tat ca prayojanam deśa kāla puruṣa śābhedāt avyavasthitam bhavati tat yathā grīṣme maru sthale niśāta malātaka nikaram iva kirati kiraṇa miṣeṇa pūṣaṇi tṛṣā āturasya tuṣāra kaṇā utkara danturam ambu paramam sukha sādhanam tat eva śiśire sakala jagat kampa kāriṇi dāruṇa samīraṇa śithilīkṛta nīreṣu kāśmīreṣu śleṣma upacaya janita jaḍima jaṭhara śikhinaḥ khedāya jāyate tasyāt aniyataḥ eva ayam sukha duḥkha sādhana bhāvaḥ bhāvānām yadi api ca yat ekadā sukha sādhanam iti viditam upayuktam atikrāntam vastu tat tathā api tad jātīya tva liṅga avadhṛta sukha sādhana bhāve bhāva antare adi pravartante eva tad arthinaḥ 
[II,541,iv]	nanu prayojanasya pravartaka tvam ayuktam sat asat vikalpābhyām anupapatteḥ sattve karṇa nāsā ādi vat na tad arthā pravṛttiḥ asattve tu khapuṣpāḥ divat na tarām na eṣa doṣaḥ īpsā ajihāsa aviṣayīkṛtasya tasya pravartaka tvāt na hi tat kha puṣpa ādi vat asādhyam na api śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vat siddham eva adi tu sādhya tvena buddhi upārūḍham tat pravartakam iti sarva loka sākṣikam etat tasmāt icchā viṣayīkṛtam tat pravartakam iti yuktam 
[II,542,i]	ittham pravartaka tve prayojanasya upapadite muninā bhagnāḥ bhavanti sarve preraka pakṣāḥ para abhihitāḥ prayojanam atas akhila evidhi vacobhiḥ ādiśyate prayojana nibandhanāḥ tanubhṛtām aśeṣāḥ kriyāḥ krimeḥ api yathā tathā kim api jīvitam bibhrataḥ prayojana bahiṣkṛtam na khalu ceṣṭitam dṛśyate vaitaṇḍikaḥ prayatate nija pakṣa siddhyai tām ca eṣa veda para pakṣa niṣedha labhyām tasmāt iyam sva mata sādhana varjitā api yuktā prayojanavatī bhavitum vitaṇḍā 
[II,542,ii_II,543,i]	laukika parīkṣakānām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ laukika parīkṣakau vādi prativādinau dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇa prastāvāt veditavyau na tu mūrkha paṇḍitau prakṛta asaṅgateḥ tayoḥ ca saṅgatyabhāvāt tayoḥ ca yasmin arthe bhāva svabhāve abhāva ātmake vā buddhi sāmyam prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tve sādhya vyāvṛtti pūrvaka sādhana dharma vyāvṛtta tāyām vā tulya rūpā buddhiḥ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasya tathāvidha dharma ādhāra tvam tat rahita tvam vā vakṣyamāṇāt udāharaṇa lakṣaṇāt mantavyam 
[II,543,ii]	yathā ca anumāna lakṣaṇe tad pūrvakam iti pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram pratipāditam tad svarūpam tu avayava lakṣaṇe nirṇītam udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ tathā vaidharmyāt iti evam iha vādi prativādi prasiddhi mātram dṛṣṭāntasya darśitam rūpam tu tasya dvividham api tatra eva vakṣyate sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam tad viparyayāt vā viparītam iti 
[II,543,iii_II,543,iv]	anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam a yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yat punar anityam na bhavati tat kṛtakam api na bhavati eva yathā aakāśaḥ iti vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā ukta lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt tu dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tā bhavati ābhāsa bheda vibhavaḥ kathayiṣyate tu teṣām udāharaṇa lakṣaṇa vāc prasaṅge ābhāsatā vacana doṣa kṛtā api kācid asti iti sā avayava lakṣaṇaḥ eva vācyā dvividhaḥ api dṛṣṭāntaḥ su dṛṣṭibhiḥ yatnataḥ adhigantavyaḥ sa hi niścalaḥ phala nidheḥ anumāna mahā taroḥ skandhaḥ 
[II,544,i_II,544,ii]	tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ siddhāntaḥ tantryate anena padārtha sthitiḥ iti tantram pramāṇam ucyate adhikaraṇam āśrayaḥ tantram adhikaraṇam yasya saḥ tantra adhikaraṇaḥ pramāṇa mūlakaḥ iti arthaḥ abhyupagamaḥ svīkāraḥ tasya saṃsthitiḥ itthaṃbhāva vyavasthā dharma niyamaḥ idam ittham iti idam iti sāmānya nirdeśaḥ ittham iti viśeṣa nirdeśaḥ evam ca tantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ sāmānya viśeṣavān arthaḥ siddhānte iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati 
[II,544,iii]	anye tu vyācakṣate tantram itaretara saṃbaddhasya artha samūhasya upadeśaḥ śāstram adhikriyate iti adhikaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate abhyupagamaḥ yathā uktaḥ eva saṃsthiti śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate tantra saṃsthitiḥ adhikaraṇa saṃsthitiḥ abhyupagama saṃsthitiḥ iti anena tantra nirdeśa sāmyāt sarva tantra pratitantra siddhāntayoḥ sūcanam itarābhyām padābhyām uttarayoḥ adhikaraṇa bhyupāgama siddhāntayoḥ iti 
[II,545,i]	etat tu apavyākhyānam na hi evam siddhānta catuṣṭaya anugatam kiṃcid sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati na ca idam vibhāga artham viśeṣa sakṣaṇa artham vā sūtram tad pratipādanasya uttara sūtraiḥ kariṣyamāṇa tvāt uktasya ca punarvacane prayojana abhāvāt atas pūrva prakrameṇa eva siddhāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇa varṇanam śreyaḥ 
[II,545,ii_II,545,iv]	tasya sva kaṇṭhena vibhāgam āha sa caturvidhaḥ sarva tantra pratitantra adhikaraṇa abhyupagama saṃsthiti artha antara bhāvāt catuṣprakāraḥ hi siddhāntaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ prati tantra siddhāntaḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti tatra sarva tantra aviruddhaḥ svatantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ 
[II,545,v_II,545,vi]	atra tantra śabdena śāstram uccate sva śāstre yaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ arthaḥ sarva śāstra avirūddhaḥ ca sa sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ yathā cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti nanu atra api vividante brahma vādinām hi sarvā eva iyam avidyā avidyā ca katham pramāṇam iti na vyavahāra avasthāyām taiḥ api tad prāmāṇya abhyupagamāt saṃkhyā lakṣaṇa viṣaya vipratipattiḥ tu pratiśāstram bhavatu cākṣuṣam pramāṇam iti iyati sarva vādinām a vivādaḥ 
[II,546,i_II,546,iii]	tantre adhikṛtaḥ arthaḥ iti varthate yathā asmākarma aśvara icchā prerita paramāṇu nirmitāni samāna tantre kaṇa vrata mate tathā eva siddhāni paratantre ca sāṃkhya ādi śāstre tathā na abhyupagamyante iti yathā vā guṇatraya ātmikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ mahat ahaṅkara ādi rūpeṇa bhūta sarga ti sāṃkhyānām svatantra siddhaḥ arthaḥ samāna tantre api pātaṃjale yoga aśātre siddhaḥ eva para tattre tu vaiśeṣika ādimate na siddhaḥ iti nanu asya katham pramāṇa mūla tā sthāne praśnaḥ satyam etat āsmākīne hi pratitantra siddhānte pramāṇa mūla tvam yathārtham eva sāṃkhya siddhāntasya tu pramāṇa mūla tva abhāve api paratantra tva khyāpanāya udāhṛtaḥ tad arbhiprāyeṇa vā asya pramāṇa mūla tā vaktavyā iti 
[II,546,iv_II,547,ii]	yat siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddhaḥ sā adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ prakriyate iti prakaraṇam pakṣaḥ ucyate yasya arthasya siddhau satyām prakaraṇa antara siddhiḥ bhavati saḥ adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ tad adhikaraṇānām artha antarāṇām siddheḥ kaḥ punar yad siddhau iti sarva nāmnā pratyavamṛśyate pakṣaḥ hetuḥ vā kiṃca atas pakṣaḥ katham pakṣa antara siddhaye kalpate hetunā hi pakṣa siddhiḥ kriyate na pakṣeṇa hetoḥ hetoḥ tu adhikaraṇa siddhānta tve katham siddhānta āśrayā nyāya pravṛttiḥ iti tad uddeśa prayojanam varṇitam nyāyaḥ hi hetuḥ eva saḥ eva ca adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ na ca hetuḥ hatvā āśrayaḥ iti 
[II,547,iii_II,547,iv]	ucyate ubhayathā api adoṣaḥ hetuḥ api kvacid pakṣībhavati pakṣaḥ api hetūbhavati eva tatra tāvadāṃjasyena hetu adhīnā pakṣa siddhiḥ iti hetuḥ eva sarva nāmnā avamṛśyate tad siddhau anya prakaraṇa siddheḥ saḥ eva adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ katham tarhi tad āśrayā nyāya pravṛttiḥ ucyate hetuḥ api tad anyatarā siddhaḥ iva sādhyamāna tvāt pakṣībhavat nyāya antara āśraya tām pratipatsyate 
[II,547,v_II,547,vi]	api vā pakṣaḥ eva sarva nāmnā avamṛśyamānaḥ bhavatu adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ sa ca spaṣṭaḥ eva nyāyasya āśrayaḥ sa ca sidhyan pakṣa antarāṇi ākṣipan eva siddhi ati iti adhikaraṇa siddhānta tām bhajate tasya udāharaṇam indriya vyatiriktaḥ jñātā darśana sparśanābhyām ekārtha grahaṇāt iti atra indriya vyatirikte jñātari siddhyati tad anuṣaṅgīṇi artha antarāṇi api siddhyanti nānā indriyāṇi niyata viṣayāṇi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti evamādīni
