[II,548,i_II,548,ii]	aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ atra aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti yathā śruta paṃcamī nirdeśam anurudhyamānāḥ pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ iti ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam anusarantaḥ kecid evam vyācakṣate dharmiṇaḥ śabda ādeḥ nitya anitya tva vicāra carcāyām aparīkṣitasya eva ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā rahitasya evā abhyupagamaḥ kartavyaḥ tatas aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt kim siddhyati ucyate tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇam iti tad gata nityāni tva tva parīkṣaṇam hi sāmānyena dharmiṇī upādīyamāne vyoma viśeṣa guṇa tva ādi dharma parīkṣā rahite sati upapadyate yadi punar ākāśa viśeṣa guṇa tva viśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dharmi tvena upādīyate param pratyasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ bhavet iti 
[II,548,iii]	evam api kṛte yadi purodharmiṇam vikalpayet kīdṛśasya sataḥ śabdasya bhavatā nitya tvam sādhyate dravyasya guṇasya vā iti saḥ evam vikalpayan artha antara gamanāt tāvat parājitaḥ eva bhavati jitam api enam punar jetum sva buddhi atiśaya cikhyā apayiṣayā para buddhi avajñayā ca vādī bravīti astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti 
[II,549,i_II,549,ii]	etat tu vyākhyānam na buddhyāmahe evam vyācakṣāṇānām eṣām abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti kaḥ nu vyavasitaḥ iti yadi tāvat anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti dravya tva guṇa tva ādi viśeṣa rahitaḥ śabda ākhya dhami nirdeśaḥ yaḥ prathamam upāttar saḥ eva abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tatra abhyupāgama arthaḥ krīdṛśaḥ kaḥ ca prati tantra siddhāntāt asya viśeṣaḥ atha astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti sva buddhi atiśaya abhimānena paścāt abhyupagamyamāna dravya tva viśiṣṭa śabda nirdeśaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ tarhi sūtram aparīkṣita abhyupagamāt iti na yojitam anyatra eva taiḥ sūtra arthaḥ nītaḥ iti 
[II,549,iii_II,549,iv]	tasmāt evam vyākhyāyate aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ eva sva m ati kauśalyena kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ astu dravyam śabdaḥ iti pramāṇa mūla abhyupagama viṣayīkaraṇam tu sāmānya lakṣaṇe prauḍha vādī abhiprāyeṇa eva yojyam dravya tvam api pramāṇa mūlam śabdasya bhavatu tathā api tasya anitya tvam iti kila niravayavam dravyam anityam iti na asti eva śabdasya tu tādṛśasya api anitya tvam aham sādhayāmi iti katham tarhi paṃcamī kim paṃcamyā vastu tāvat īdṛśam yathā vyākhyatam asmābhiḥ 
[II,549,v_II,550,i]	paṃcami api ca ittham yojyate kimartham punar ayam aparīkṣitaḥ eva śabda gata dra vyatva abhyupagamaḥ kriyate iti pṛcchate uttaram paṃcamyā abhidhīyate yasmāt aparī kṣita abhyupagamāt tad viśeṣa anitya tva parīkṣaṇam avakalpate tasmāt aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ api abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti na tu tad viśeṣaṇa parīkṣaṇam eva sāmā na adhi karaṇya nirdeśāt abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti mantavyam parīkṣaṇasya siddhānta āśrita tvāt tasmāt tad viśeṣa parīkṣaṇa arthaḥ aparīkṣita abhyupagamaḥ prauḍha vādinā kriyamāṇaḥ abhyupagama siddhāntaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ ittham eva ca tatra tatra pravādukānām vyavahāraḥ imāḥ ca siddhānta bhidāḥ catasraḥ nyāya pravṛtteḥ prathamam nimittam pravartate na eva parīkṣakāṇām anāśritā nyāya kathā kadācid 
[II,550,ii]	iha hi svayam avagatam artham anumānena parasmai pratipādayatā sādhanīyasya arthasya yāvati śabda samūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tāvān prayoktavyaḥ tam eva ca para artha anumānam ācakṣate nīti vidaḥ 
[II,550,iii_II,551,i]	nanu na eva parārthānumānam nāma kiṃcid astiḥ vaktṛ apekṣayā śrotra pekṣayā vā tad anupapatteḥ vaktra anvamāyi sa hi arthaḥ na idānīm anumīyate śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam tat vākya avagati hetukam yathā pratyakṣatas dhūmam dṛṣṭavā agnim avagacchati tathā tadīyāt vacanāt iti kasya parārtha tā āgamaḥ tu eṣa bhidyeta kaścid artha upadeśakaḥ kaścid tad pratyaya upāya nyāya mārga upadeśakaḥ iti 
[II,551,ii_II,551,iii]	satyam na paramārthataḥ para artham anumānam upapadyate kintu dvividhaḥ pratipattā svayam avagata yathā prakṛta liṅga vyāptikaḥ tad viparītaḥ ca tatra svayam avadhṛta pratibandham prati na upadiśyate evam anumānam svatas eva tasya prati iti upapatteḥ anavadhṛta vyāptikasya tu vyāptiḥ eva vyutpādyate iti tam prati para artham anumānam tat upadeśakam vākyam eva ākhyāyate tathā hi vaktrā sva pratyayena idam na hi vākyam prayujyate paraḥ mad vacanāt eva tam artham buddhyatām iti kim tu enam anumānena bodhayāmi iti manyate saḥ api tad vacanāt na eva tam artham avabuddhyate kintu vyāptimataḥ liṅgāt svayam tat tu na paśyati tad prati iti abhyupāya tvāt para artham idam ucyate atas ca śrotuḥ sva artha anumānam eva idam vaktā tu tathā param pratipādayan para artha anumānam prayuṅktaḥ iti ucyate 
[II,552,i_II,552,iii]	na ca anuvāda mātram tat vaktuḥ iti upapadyate yatas vyāpriyate samyak parasya pratipattaye tena anadhigata artha upadeśaka tvāt na anuvāda mātram sva avagama apekṣayā tu anuvāda tve nedānīm āpta vacanam ananuvāda rūpam kiṃcid bhavet sarvasya sva upalabdhi pūrvaka tvāt iti tasmāt para artha anumāna vākya upapatteḥ tad eka deśāḥ avayavāḥ yuktāḥ iti lakṣyante 
[II,552,iv_II,552,v]	pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanayana nigamanāni avayavāḥ etat ca sūtram ekam eva sāmānya lakṣaṇam avayavānām abhidhatte vibhāgam ca pramāṇānām iva pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāḥ pramāṇāni iti tatra avayavāḥ bhāgāḥ aṃśāḥ eka deśāḥ iti evam avayava śabdaḥ sādhanīya artha pratipatti paryanta vacana kalāpa eka deśa tvam avayavānām sāmānya lakṣaṇam ācaṣṭe 
[II,552,vi]	yadi api ca eka vadana vinirgatānām nisarga bhaṅgurāṇām adīrgha āyuṣām aparihārya krama janmanām varṇānām drumāṇām iva pāramārthika ssamūhaḥ na sa matti eva tathā api siṣā dhayiṣita artha pratipādana rūpa eka kārya upayoga mūlīkṛta ātmanām teṣām kālpanikaḥ kalāpaḥ pūrvam eva vākya kalpanā avasare samarthitaḥ iti tad bhāgāḥ api saṃbhavanti eva 
[II,553,i_II,553,iv]	na ca padānām eva anumāna vākya avayava tvam api tu khaṇḍa vākyānām ekaikena padena pratijñā udāharaṇa ādīnām abhidhātum aśakyatvāt hetu vacanam tu ekam api padam kvacid bhavati kṛtaka tvāt iti tat api vā sa viśeṣaṇam prayujyamānam pada samudāyena eva pratipādyate vastu tve sati kṛtaka tvāt iti udāharaṇa vacanam api ghaṭa vat iti ālasyāt eva prayuṃjate tat hi vyāpti pradarśanāya evam vaktavyam yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti tasmāt avayavān ām avayatvam eva lakṣaṇam na padatvam vibhāgaḥ api pratijña ādi pada sannidhau avayava śruteḥ eva avagamyate pratijña ādayaḥ paṃca avayavāḥ na nyūnāḥ na atiriktāḥ iti 
[II,553,v_II,553,vi]	nanu atra vivadante kecid nūna tām avayavānām ācakṣate tri avayavam dvi avayavam vā sādhana vākyam vadantaḥ anye tu jijñāsā saṃśayaḥ śakya prāptiḥ prayojanam saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ iti paṃcabhiḥ saha pratijñā ādīn daśa avayavān āhuḥ 
[II,554,i_II,554,iii]	ucyate nyūna tā yathā avasaram pratisamādhāsyate ādhikyam api ayuktam jijñāsā ādīnām aśabda svabhāva tvena vākya avayava tva ayogāt tathā hi apratīyamāne arthe pratīti prayojanasya pravartikā jijñāsā sā ca icchā svabhāva tvāt āntaraḥ pramātṛ dharmaḥ na vākya avayavaḥ artha kriyā sādhane arthe vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ kim eva m ayam ayathā evam iti saḥ api jñāna ātmaka tvāt na vākya avayavaḥ 
[II,554,iv_II,554,vii]	pramātuḥ pramāṇāni pravartamānāni prameyam arpayitum pārayanti iti sambhāvanā śakya prāptiḥ sā api tathā eva na vākya avayavaḥ prayojanam saṃśayitasya nirṇayaḥ katham vākya avayava tām spṛśet saṃśaya vyudāsaḥ tu pratyakṣa upālambhaḥ sa ca vacana svabhāva tve api na sādhana vākyasya avayava tvam pratipadyate tat ime saṃśaya ādayaḥ prakaraṇa pravṛtti hetavaḥ bhavanti na vākya avayavāḥ iti sūktam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamanāni avayavāḥ iti 
[II,554,viii_II,554,ix]	teṣām sādhya nirdeśaḥ pratijñā pratijñā iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ sādhya nidaśaḥ iti lakṣaṇam śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ vā dharmasya vā dvayoḥ vā svatantrayoḥ dharmi viśiṣṭasya vā dharmasya sādhya tva anupapatteḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī sādhyaḥ iti anumāna lakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat tasya nirdeśaḥ parigraha vacanam pratijñā iti 
[II,555,i_II,555,iii]	nanu sa avadhāraṇa tvāt vākyānām kim sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāraṇam uta pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti yadi sādhya sideśaḥ eva pratijñā iti avadhāryate tadā yatas evakārakaraṇam tatas anyatra avadhāraṇam iti pratijñā niyamyate sādhya nirdeśam mā hāsīḥ iti sādhya nirdeśaḥ tu aniyamitaḥ iti pratijñām apahāya api bhavet iti ativyāpakam lakṣaṇam atha pratijñā eva sādhya nirdeśaḥ iti avadhāryate tatas sādhya nirdeśaḥ niyamyate pratijñām mā tyākṣīt iti pratijñā tu aniyamitā iti sādhya nirdeśam apahāya apibhavet iti sādhya nirdeśena pratijñāyai avyāpta tvāt avyāpakam lakṣaṇam iti 
[II,555,iv_II,555,v]	tat etat ayuktam na hi sarvam vākyam sa avadhāraṇam bhavati yathā eṣa panthāḥ srughnam gacchati iti na hi tatra eṣaḥ eva iti srughnam eva iti vā gacchati eva iti vā niyantum śakyate iti atha api avadhāraṇam amaśya āśrayaṇīyam tat bhavatu sādhya nirdeśaḥ eva pratijñati na ca ati vyāptiḥ pratijñām apahāya ani atra sādhya nirdeśasya adarśanāt aniyamitaḥ api asau anyatra na ca dṛśyate eva iti tasmāt sādhyatiḥ deśaḥ eva pratijñā iti sthitam tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[II,556,i]	nanu atra api kim anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇam uta śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti tatra anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti ukte tad gata dharma antara tiraskārāt kṛtaka tvam api tatra na bhavet iti asiddhaḥ hetuḥ śabdaḥ eva anityaḥ iti tu avadhāryamāṇe ghaṭa ādau anitya tva pratiṣedhāt anvaya śūnyatā hetoḥ syāt iti na eṣa doṣaḥ niravadhāraṇasya api vacana prayogasya darśita tvāt anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ iti avadhāraṇe vā na anitya tva vyatirikta tad aviruddha kṛtaka tva ādi aśeṣa dharma antara niṣedhaḥ tatra vidhīyate kintu tad viruddha nitya tva mātra niṣedhaḥ eva anityaḥ eva śabdaḥ na nityaḥ iti arthaḥ tat uktam niyamaḥ tad viruddhāt ca kalpyate na avirodhinaḥ iti tasmāt na hetoḥ asiddha tvam 
[II,556,ii_II,557,i]	nanu sādhana vākye pratijñā vacanam asamaṃcatam asādhana aṃga vacana tvāt hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanābhyām hi sādhya siddheḥ te eva vaktavye na ca sva pratipattau upalabdham sarvam eva parasmai ākhyeyam ākhyāne vā dharmi mātram ākhyāyatām sva pratipattau hi pūrvam parvata ādeḥ śuddhasya dharmiṇaḥ grahaṇam siṣā dhayiṣita hutavaha ādi dharma viśeṣa rūṣita vapuṣaḥ evam abhyupagame anumāna vaiphalya prasaṅgāt atas katham prathamam eva sādhya dharma adhyāsita svarūpa dharmi nirdeśa karaṇam api ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthau labhyate iti kim sva kaṇṭha uktena tena prayojanam 
[II,557,ii]	ucyate sva pratipattim anusaratā parasya pratipattiḥ utpādanīyā iti sva pratipattau prathamam upalabdhaḥ dharmī tāvat ākhyeyaḥ eva anucyamāne hi dharmiṇi niradhikaraṇaḥ hetuḥ ku asādhyam sādhayet dharmiṇī anavacchinne ca dharma mātre anumānam anarthakam avivāda siddha tvāt asti hi yatra kvacid anitya tvam iti 
[II,557,iii_II,557,iv]	āśraya asiddhaḥ ca dharmi nirdeśāt vinā hetuḥ navet iti avaśya nirdeśyaḥ dharmaḥ yadi api dharmi mātra darśanam eva prathamam abhūt tathā api kim sādhayitum eṣa hetuḥ prayuktaḥ bhavet iti upaplava śamanāya sādhya dharma nirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti hi prayujyamānam tat idam andha padam iva asādhanam bhavet 
[II,557,v]	atha vyāpti pradarśana pravaṇena yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā tasmāt anityaḥ iti nigamana vacanena vā viraṃsyati saḥ upaplavaḥ iti tathā api śrotṛ bubhutsa uparam apariśrama phale sādhana vākye sādhana adhigama ākāṅkṣā saṃpādanāya sādhyam nirdeṣṭavyam na hi śabdaḥ iti etā atī ukte tatra sādhanam ākāṅkṣati kaścid iti sādhana vacana avasara tad prayoga sāphalya utpādanāya eva nūnam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā vacanam prayoktavyam 
[II,558,i]	yat ca vivādāt eva pratijñā arthasya labdha tvam abhidhīyate tad abhyupagamanam eva śabda antareṇa pratijñāyāḥ yatas viruddhaḥ vādaḥ vivādaḥ ekaḥ āha nityaḥ śabdaḥ itaraḥ tu anityaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vivādaḥ pratijñā eva sa tu pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ tat ahar eva bhavatu dina antare vā iti kim anena viśeṣeṇa aparihāryam pratijñā vacanam iti 
[II,558,ii_II,558,iv]	pratijñā eva ca pakṣaḥ iti ucyate tat evaṃvidhe pakṣa lakṣaṇe pradarśite balāt pakṣa ābhāsāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ bhavanti tat yathā anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti pratyakṣa viruddhaḥ pakṣaḥ na rūpa grāhi cakṣuḥ iti anumāna viruddhaḥ śabdaviruddhaḥ tu bahu śākhaḥ brāhmaṇena surā peyāḥ iti agāma viruddhaḥ janayitrī me vandhyā pitā me brahmacārī iti dharmi dharma padayoḥ eva vipratiṣedhāt sva vacana viruddhaḥ na candraḥ śaśī iti loka prasiddhi viruddhaḥ upamāna viruddhaḥ tu na gavaya pada vācyaḥ ayam go sadṛśaḥ iti aprasiddha viśeṣaṇaḥ nabhaḥ kusuma kṛta avataṃsaḥ caitraḥ iti aprasiddha viśeṣyaḥ sugandhi gagana kamalam iti aprasiddha ubhayaḥ kha puṣpa kṛta śekharaḥ vandhyā sutaḥ iti 
[II,559,i]	yatra api viśeṣi aṇaya ūrūbhayoḥ api pramāṇantarataḥ svarūpam niścitam eva tat nirdeśaḥ api pakṣa ābhāsaḥ eva śītam tuhinam uṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti sādhya tva abhāvena anumāna prayoga avasara virahāt iti iyam eva ca sā siddha sādhyatocyate iti 
[II,559,ii_II,559,iii]	ye ca ete pratyakṣa viruddha tā ādayaḥ pakṣa doṣāḥ ye ca vakṣyamāṇāḥ sādhana vikala tva ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ te vastu sthityā sarve hetu doṣāḥ eva prapaṃca mātram tu pakṣa dṛṣṭānta doṣa varṇanam tathā ca ābādhita tvam hetu lakṣaṇam eva uktam dṛṣṭānta duṣṭa tayā ca hetoḥ eva lakṣaṇam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyat hīyate iti sarve ca te hetu doṣāḥ eva atas eva ca śāstre asmin muninā tattva darśinā pakṣa ābhāsa ādayaḥ na uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tu darśitāḥ kaścid hetu anapekṣaḥ api pakṣa mātra pratiṣṭhitaḥ bodhaḥ anumāna arūpasya svāvākya ādi kṛtaḥ yathā 
[II,559,iv_II,560,i]	evam lakṣaṇakaḥ hetuḥ iti tad svarūpa avadhāraṇam sati tad abhidhāyakam vacanam mukham eva lakṣyate iti artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam tāvat ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti nanu artha ātmakaḥ hetuḥ anumānam tat ca lakṣitam eva pūrvam tad pūrvakam trividham anumānam iti satyam tatra tad pūrvakam iti sarva nāmnā parāmṛṣṭa pratyakṣa mūla tā upavarṇanena pratibandha pariccheda upāya mātra nirūpaṇam kṛtam iha tu pratibandha svarūpam api pratipādyate 
[II,560,ii]	tatrā hi artha ātmake hetau lakṣye paṃcamīm apāsyaḥ uvāharaṇa sādharmye sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti vyācakṣate ca sādharmyam hetuḥ iti ucyamāne gandhavat tva ādeḥ asādhāraṇa hetoḥ sādhya dharmi vyakti bheda vṛtti tvena sādharmya rūpa saṃbhavāt viruddhasya ca pakṣa vipakṣa vṛtteḥ tad sādharmya svabhāvat tvāt hetu tvam prasajyate iti tad nivṛtti artham udāharaṇa grahaṇam udāhriyate asmin sādhya sādhanayoḥ prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ iti udāharaṇam dṛṣṭāntaḥ tena sādharmyam kasya iti prakṛta tvāt pratyāsatteḥ ca sādhya dharmiṇaḥ iti avagamyate udāharaṇa sādharmye sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmi sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ hetuḥ iti nāsā dhāraṇa ādau tathā aviprasaktiḥ iti 
[II,560,iii_II,561,i]	evam api prameya tva ādeḥ anaikāntika hetoḥ tathā bhāga asiddhasya anitya tva siddhaye caturvidha paramāṇu pakṣīkaraṇe gandhavat tva ādeḥ prakaraṇa sama kāla atyaya apadiṣṭayoḥ ca udāharaṇa sādharmyasaṃbhavāt hetu tvam bhavet iti tad vyavacchedāya sādhya sādhana grahaṇam sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇoḥ ca samānaḥ dharma sādhyaḥ api anitya tva ādiḥ bhavati eva iti tasya api hetu tā mā prasāṅkṣīt iti sādhya sādhana grahaṇam liṅga sāmānya lābha artham sādhya sādhanam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam sa hetuḥ iti sādhya sādhana śabdena ca pratibandhaḥ lakṣyate sa ca savyabhicāra ādiṣu na asti iti na te hetavaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti eka eka lakṣaṇa apāya kṛta hetvābhāsa paṃcaka nirdeśāt eva sūtritavān ācāryaḥ 
[II,561,ii]	nanu evam tarhi sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva hetu lakṣaṇam astu tat hi sakala hetvābhāsa vyudāsa samartham iti kim uda āharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena na samāna jātīya vyavaccheda artha tvāt ahetavaḥ hi vijātīyāḥ tad vyavacchedaḥ sādhya sādhana grahaṇāt samāna jātīyasya kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ vyavacchedāya udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam iti 
[II,561,iii]	tat kim kevala anvayī hetuḥ iti lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ na tathāvidhasya hetoḥ abhāvāt anvaya vyatirekavān eva lakṣyaḥ tatra udāharaṇa sādharmya vaidharmya saṃbhave tu sati sādharmyam api asti eva iti na sa avadhāraṇam vā viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa eva ida sudāha raṇa sādharmya grahaṇam kevala anvayi lakṣaṇam varṇanīyam iti 
[II,562,i]	nanu yadi dvividhaḥ hetuḥ iṣyate tarhi sāmānya lakṣaṇam ādau vaktavyam tatas viśeṣa lakṣaṇam iti ucyate sādhya sādhana grahaṇam eva pratibandha sūcakam sāmānya lakṣaṇam bhaviṣyati udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇam tu anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam uttara sūtram ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva iti evam paṃcamīm upekṣya artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇam ācakhyuḥ 
[II,562,ii]	api vā bhavatu tatra api saṃśaya vyavaccheda phalaḥ paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ kaścid evam abhidadhīta sādhya sādhanam iti paryāya paṭhana mātram etat na hetu lakṣaṇam api ca yatra eva vṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi hetu dharma prayukta tayā sādhya dhamaḥ avadhāritaḥ tatra eva punar asābu palabhyamānaḥ tam upasthāpayatu dharmi antare tu tad upalambhāt bhavatu saṃśayaḥ kim tat sādhyāvinābhūtam iha hetoḥ sattvam uta anyathā iti tasya idam uttaram ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti 
[II,562,iii_II,562,v]	ayam arthaḥ deśa kāla vyakti viśeṣāṇām vyabhicārāt na teṣu pratibandha avadhāraṇam api tu sāmānya dharmayoḥ eva vyakti bheda āśraya tve hi na eva vyāpti grahaḥ bhavet dṛṣṭānte api abhyanujñā evam bhavatā dīyate katham tad abhyanujñānāt tu sāmānyena vyapti grahaṇam aṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati tasmin ca sati udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam eva bhavati na saṃśayaḥ saṃśayasya viśeṣa agrahaṇa kāraṇaka tvāt iha ca udāharaṇa sādharmya pada upāttam liṅga sāmānyam eva viśeṣaḥ gṛhyate iti kutas saṃśayaḥ 
[II,563,i_II,563,iii]	sādhya sādhana padam api na paryāya mātram api tu paṃca lakṣaṇaka pratibandha sūcanena hetoḥ hetu tva samarthana artham eva kasmāt hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati sādhya sādhana tvāt gamaka tvāt iti arthaḥ sādhya sādhana tā ca asya paṃca lakṣaṇakāt pratibandhāt vinā na nirvahati iti asau sādhya sādhana padena lakṣyate saḥ api ca prayojya prayojaka bhāva garbhaḥ sādhana tā aṅgatām eti iti tathāvidhaḥ eva sūcyate atas eva ca aprayojakaḥ eva ekaḥ paramārthataḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti vakṣyate tat idam īdṛśam sādhya sādhana tvam hetoḥ kutas bhavati iti udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti saṃśayam vyavacchindantyā paṃcamyā kathyate 
[II,563,iv_II,564,ii]	atas ca yat ucyate paraiḥ sādharmyam yadi hetuḥ syāt na vākya aṃśaḥ na paṃcamī iti tat idam anupapannam paṃcamyāḥ artha ātmaka tve hetau anupayogāt tatra api vā tasyāssamarthita tvāt vākya aṃśe lakṣaṇa antara karaṇāt tat ca idam idānīm ucyate udāharaṇa sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ yathā uktāt udāharaṇa sādharmyāt vivakṣā ādi krameṇa yat vacanam pravartate sa hetuḥ yadi api ca jñānasya api udāharaṇa sādharmyāt kam aṃbhūtāt karaṇa ātmakāt vā bhavati abhinirvṛttiḥ tathā api vākya avayava karaṇa sāmarthyāt vacanam avasīyate yadi vākya avayava karaṇam idam kimartham tarhi artha vyutpādanam uktam atra tad aupayika tvāt iti 
[II,564,iii_II,564,iv]	sādhya sādhana grahaṇam vacana lakṣaṇe kimartham hetvābhāsa vacana nirasanam artha ātmaka hetu nirasanāt eva hi siddham na hetvābhāsa vacana vyavaccheda artham tat kintu hetu vacana viśeṣa pratipatti artham na sva rūpa mātra nirdeśakam vacanam kṛtaka tvam iti evamādi prayoktavyam api tu hetu vibhakti antam kṛtaka tvāt iti kṛtaka tvena iti kṛtakaḥ ayam asmāt iti bā abhidhātavyam evam hi tat sādhya sādhanam bhavati iti tathā vaidharmyāt 
[II,564,v_II,564,vii]	udāharaṇa grahaṇam anuvartate sādhya sādhanam iti ca etat ca tathāśabdaḥ pādāna sāmarthyāt gamyate udāharaṇa vaidharmyāt sādhya sādhanam hetuḥ atra api artha ātmaka hetu upūrva kanvāt tat vacanasya artha ātmakaḥ eva hetuḥ prathamam prayujyate iti tad lakṣaṇāya pūrvavat paṃcamī pāṭha śūnyam eva sūtram varṇayanti vaidharmyam hetuḥ iti ucyamāne pakṣa vaidharmyasya api vipakṣa vṛtteḥ aśeṣa aśva vyakti pakṣīkaraṇe turagāḥ ime viṣāṇi tvāt iti evamādeḥ hetu tvam syāt iti udāharaṇa grahaṇam tathā api asādhāraṇa ādeḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmyasya hetu tā prasajyate iti pūrvavat sādhya sādhana grahaṇam pratibandha sūcakam sakala hetvābhāsa vyavacchedakam yojanīyam tasmāt eva sakala hetvābhāsa vyavaccheda siddheḥ udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇam samāna jātīya anvaya vyatireki hetu vyavacchedāya vyākhyeyam 
[II,565,i]	nanu yaidharmya śabdaḥ kevala anvayinam eva hetum avyatirekam vyavacchet tum alam tasya vardhami aṃśūnyatvāt anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ tu hetoḥ udāharaṇa sādharmya vat tad vaidharmyasya api bhāvāt katham anena vyāvartanam ucyate vaidharmya śabda upādānāt kevala anvayinaḥ yathā nivṛttiḥ gamyate tadvat anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ sādhya sādhana śabdaḥ hi pratibandha upalakṣaṇaḥ vyākhyātaḥ pratibandhaḥ ca vyatireka anvaya ātmakaḥ vaidharmya sādhane api asmin saḥ eva yadi varṇyate pūrvatra kathanāt vyartham vaidharmya grahaṇam bhavet kevala vyatireka ākhya pratibandha abhidhitsayā vaidharmya vacanam tasmāt saphalam vyavatiṣṭhate adhyāhṛtā evakāram vā tat vyudāsāya paṭhyatām viśeṣa vidhi rūpeṇa vyākhyānam vā vidhīyatām kevala anvayi hetuḥ ca na kaścid upalabhyate tena pūrva uktaḥ eva asya vyavacchedyaḥ bhaviṣyati 
[II,565,ii]	nanu evam tarhi anena eva nyāyena pūrva sūtram kevala ātvayi lakṣaṇa artham syāt yathā iha vaidharmi aṃgrahaṇam sādharmya vyavacchedakam evam tatra sādharmya grahaṇam vaidharmya vyavacchedāya syāt iti uktam atra na kevala anvayī nāma hetuḥ saṃbhavati iti alakṣaṇīyaḥ eva asau tat evam anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇāya pūrva sūtram idam tu kevalalī atireki lakṣaṇāya iti sthitam 
[II,566,i]	artha ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇa pakṣe api paṃcamī pāṭhaḥ pūrvavat saṃśaya parākaraṇa phala tvena varṇanīyaḥ vacana ātmaka hetu lakṣaṇe api tathā eva sūtram yojyam yathā ukta vaidharmyāt pravṛttam vacanam sādhya sādhanam hetu vibhakti antam prayoktavyam iti 
[II,566,ii]	tat etat ākṣipanti lakṣye sati lakṣaṇam vaktavyam bhavati kevala vyatirekī tu nāma na samasti eva hetuḥ iti kasya idam lakṣaṇam ucyate pratibandhena hi hetoḥ gamaka tvam uktam pratibandhaḥ ca paṃcalakṣaṇakaḥ vyākhyātaḥ ekaika lakṣaṇa viraha nibandhanāḥ ca paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti tat pakṣa dharma tva virahiṇaḥ iva asiddhasya hetoḥ anvaya śūnyasya api na hetu tā yuktā kevala vyatireka mātra śaraṇena hetunā sādhya siddhau tathāvidha siddhi subhikṣa saṃbhavāt yat yasmai rocate sa tat sarvam sādhyet asādhāraṇasya vā kim iti hetu tvam vyatirekavataḥ apinā iṣyate 
[II,566,iii_II,567,i]	api ca anvayasya aparicchedāt vyatireke api saṃśayaḥ sādhya abhāva kṛtā tasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ uta vā anyathā anvaye hi kvacid gṛhīte anyatra hetu vyāvṛttiḥ avagamyamānā sādhya vyāvṛtti kṛtā eva iti avadhāryate na itarathā ittham eva ca sandigdha vyatireka tā vyāvartate na anyathā iti sandigdha vyatireke ca sādhya sādhana tā katham lakṣya abhāvādatas ca idam kathyate tasya lakṣaṇam 
[II,567,ii]	tasmāt na sādhya sādhana grahaṇena hetu dvaya sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya udāharaṇa sādharmya grahaṇena anvaya vyatirekiṇaḥ lakṣaṇam udāharaṇa vaidharmya grahaṇena ca kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ varṇanīyam api tu sūtra dvayena ekasya eva anvaya vyatirekavataḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam vyākhyeyam anvaya vyatirekayoḥ gamaka aṅga tvāt ekena anvayanirūpaṇam apareṇa ca sūtreṇa vyatireka vyutpādanam atas eva bhāṣya kāraḥ kim etāvat hetu lakṣaṇam na iti ucyate tathā vaidharmyāt iti eka vākya tayā eva vyākhyātavān udāharaṇam api ca sūtra dvaye tulyam eva anvaya vyatireki hetoḥ uktavān utpatti dharmaka tvāt iti 
[II,567,iii_II,568,i]	atra vadanti yadi vayam kaṃcana śuṣkam eva kevala vyatirekiṇam hetum upagacchema tatas evam anuyujyemahi kintu anvaya vyatireka vān eṣu hetuḥ kvacid sādhya viśeṣe viśeṣaṇa vaśāt kevala vyatireki tām abalambataḥ iti brūmaḥ tat yathā icchā ādi gatam kārya tvam ātma siddhau tatra hi kāryatva mātram āśrita tva mātreṇa vyāptam upalabdham anvaya vyatireka yuktam eva ghaṭa ādeḥ kāryasya āśritasya dṛṣṭa tvāt yatra ca āśrita tvam na asti tatra kāryatvam api na asti eva vyoma ādau saḥ ayam anvaya vyatirekavān eva hetuḥ yadā paridṛśyamāna śarīra ādi āśraya vyatirikta āśraya āśrita tve sādhye deha ādiṣu bādhaka upapattau satyām kāryatvāt iti sa viśeṣaṇaḥ prayujyate tadā kevala vyatirekī saṃpadyate deha ādi yati riktasya āśrayasya ātmanaḥ nitya parokṣa tvena anvaya anupalambhāt iti dṛśasya ca anvaya mūlasya tasyām daśāyām kevala vyatirekitām upagatasyu hetu tva upagamāt na pūrva ukta doṣa avasaraḥ na hi īdṛśā hetunā sarvaḥ sarvam sādhayitum utsahate na ca asādhāraṇasya hetu tvam ittham sthite prasajyeta paṃca lakṣaṇa tvam api pūrva āśraya apekṣam asya bhaviṣyati 
[II,568,ii]	yat ca sandigdha vyatireki tvam āśaṅkitam tat api anvaya vyatireka mūle kevala vyatirekiṇi niravakāśam kāryasya āśritasya upalambhāt aśrita tvavyā vṛttyā vyoma ādau ca kāryatva vyāvṛtti darśanāt idānīm ghaṭa ādau śarīre vā sa viśeṣa vyāvṛttiḥ dṛśyamānā viśiṣṭa āśraya vyāvṛtti kṛtā eva avagamyate iti na sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ etat ca ātma siddhi prasaṅge nirṇītam iti nirapavādaḥ kevala vyatirekī hetuḥ asti eva lakṣyaḥ iti tad lakṣaṇa artham uttara sūtram anvaya vyatireki hetu lakṣaṇa artham pūrva sūtram kevala anvayī hetuḥ na asti eva sāmānya lakṣaṇe tu anumāna lakṣaṇa vat sādhya sādhana padāt vā avagantavyam 
[II,568,iii]	bhāṣya akṣarāṇi tu kāmam upekṣiṣyāmahe athavā yathā karthacit vā vyākhyāsyāmaḥ kevala vyatirekiṇam tu īdṛśam ātma ādi prasādhane paramam astram upekṣitum na śaknumaḥ iti ayathābhāṣyam api vyākhyānam śreyaḥ 
[II,569,i_II,569,ii]	sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam yathā tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra pratibandha grahaṇa upāya mātram pratipāditam iha tu pratibandha svarūpam udāharaṇa sādharmyam uktam evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti atram vādi prativādi pratipanna tvam dvividhasya api dṛṣṭāntasya sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktam iha tu prayojya prayojaka bhāva vyavasthita sādhya sādhana dharma adhikaraṇa tvam ekasya dvitīyasya ca tat rahita tvam lakṣaṇam upapādyate 
[II,569,iii_II,570,i]	tatra sādhya sādharmyāt tad dharma bhāvī iti sādharmya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇam vacana adhikāre api artha ātmaka dṛṣṭānta cintanam tad aupayika tvāt hetu vat kartavyam sādhyaḥ dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī tena sādharmyam samānaḥ dharmaḥ liṅga sāmānyam yat udāharaṇa sādharmyam pūrvam uktam tat eva dviṣṭha tvāt ubhābhyām vyapadiśyate iti iha ca sādhya sādharmya padena uktam tasmāt sādhya sādharmyāt yaḥ tad dharma bhāvī tasya sādhyasya dharmaḥ nitya tva ādiḥ yasmin bhavati saḥ tad dharma bhāvī paṃcamyā prayojaka tvam ucyate hetu dharma prayuktaḥ hi sādhya dharmaḥ yatra asti saḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti arthaḥ saḥ eva ca vacasaḥ karma tām pratipadyamānaḥ udāharaṇam bhavati iti artha vacana vācinoḥ dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇa śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam aviruddham dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva anvaya khyāpakena vacanena ucyamānaḥ udāharaṇam iti ukte sati tat abhidhāyakam vacanam udāharaṇam bhavati eva yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti 
[II,570,ii]	nanu evam yatra hetu kṛtā sādharmya vat tā yathā jaladhara unnamana vṛṣṭi ādau tādṛśaḥ evam dṛṣṭānte upadiṣṭaḥ bhavet na yatra sādhya dharma kṛtā hetu sattā yathā dhūma anumānaḥ iti adarśana jñaḥ devānāṃpriyaḥ na atra utpatti apekṣayā prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kintu jñapti abhiprāyeṇa jñaptau ca dhumaḥ eva agneḥ prayojaka tām pratipadyate na hi dhūma agnyoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gabhya gamaka bhāvaḥ kintu nitya sāhacaryeṇa eva niyama nāmnā saṃbandhena iti asakṛt uktam 
[II,570,iii_II,571,i]	dhūmaḥ svarūpataḥ nāma jāyatām jātavedasaḥ agniḥ tu na ākṣipati enam saḥ eva hi agnim ākṣipet prayojaka tvam agneḥ ca paṃcamyā yadi kathyate yatra yatra agniḥ iti evam tat nirdeśaḥ prasajyate yasya prayojaka tvam hi cikhyā payiṣitam bhavet yat śabdena ca pūrvatra sa hi nirdeśam arhati bhavet evam ca hetu tvam dhūmam prati vibhāvasoḥ na ca tat yujyate vaktum anaikāntika doṣataḥ prayojaka tvam icchanti tasmāt na utpatti apekṣayā api tu jñapti abhiprāyam hetoḥ eva ucitam ca tat tasmāt hetu dharma prayuktaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ yatra khyāpyate sa sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat vacanam udāharaṇam iti siddham 
[II,571,ii_II,571,iii]	tad viparyayāt vā viparītam dṛṣṭāntaḥ udāharaṇam iti vartate tat iti sādhya sādharmya parāmarśaḥ tat ca yadi api pūrva sūtre liṅga sāmānyam vyākhyātam tathā api ubhayasya saṃbhavāt iha anu meya sāmānyam sādhya sādharmyam draṣṭavyam tad viparyayāt sādhya abhāvāt tad viparītaḥ atad dharma bhāvī sādhana rahitaḥ yaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ pūrvavat vacasaḥ karmatām āpadyamānaḥ vaidharmya udāharaṇam bhavati viparītam iti udāharaṇa apekṣayā napuṃsaka liṅga nirdeśaḥ 
[II,571,iv_II,571,v]	kimartham punar sādhya abhāvāt sādhana abhāvaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ varṇyate na punar sādharmya dṛṣṭānta sthityā sādhana abhāvāt evam sādhya abhāvaḥ iti uktam atra vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ yaḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ saḥ eva vaiparītyena mantavyaḥ tad abhāvayoḥ iti kim kāraṇam sādhana dharme hi dhūme sādhya dharmeṇa agninā vyāpte anagniḥ tatra niveśam alabhamānaḥ anyatra anavakāśa āt adhūmaḥ eva niviśate evam sādhya dharma abhāve anagnau sādhana dharma abhāvena ādhūmena vyāpte sati dhūmaḥ tatra alabdha avakāśaḥ ananya gati tvāt agnau eva niviśate iti 
[II,572,i]	yadi tu sādharmya dṛṣṭānta vat tathā eva vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvaḥ khyāpyate ssādhana abhāve sādhyam na asti iti tadā dhūma abhāvena anagninā vyāptena agni tatra alabdha niveśaḥ dhūmam eva ābalambeta iti syāt na ca etat nirvahati adhūme api vahni darśanāt iti evam sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ hetu tvam api prasiddham hīreta vyāpti vaidhuḥ yāt iti 
[II,572,ii]	api ca dhuma abhāvena agni abhāve vyāpte kathyamāne satya dhūmaḥ niyamitaḥ bhavati anagnim mā ha āsīt iti agniḥ tu aniyamitaḥ iti svātantryāt adhūma vat dhūmam api spṛśet iti vyabhicārāt pratibandhaḥ viplaveta tat uktam yadā tu sādhya abhāvena hetu abhāvaḥ viruddhyate tadā sādhyam tatas dṛṣṭam avatiṣṭheta sādhane evam niyavitam sādhyam sādhane khyāpitam bhavet sādhanam tu svatantra tvāt sādhya abhāve api saṃbhavet 
[II,572,iii_II,573,ii]	tasmāt yatra api samavyāptikau sādhya sādhana dharmau iti sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvena ahetutvam āśaṅkyate tatra api sādhana dharmasya vipakṣāt vyāvṛttim abhidhitsatā sādhya abhāve sādhana abhāvaḥ darśayitavyaḥ yatra anitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api na asti yathā aakāśaḥ iti yaḥ api avidyamāna vipakṣaḥ hetuḥ saḥ api sutarām tatas vyāvṛttaḥ bhavati tad abhāvāt tatra āvṛtteḥ iti atas ca sarva padārtha anitya tva vādī evam api vaidhamya dṛṣṭāntam pradarśayan na vāryate yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra kṛtaka tvam api na asti yathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādau iti te ete sādharmya vaidharmya udāharaṇe anvavyayatirekavati hetau ubhe api saṃbhavantī viklpena prayoktavye ekena eva vyāpteḥ pradarśanāt kim anyena kṛtyam 
[II,573,iii_II,573,iv]	kecid tu vyāpti sauṣṭhava pradarśanāya dvayoḥ api prayogam icchanti sa bhavatu mā vā bhūt na idam mahat vimarda sthānam nanu hetu udāharaṇa adhikam iti nigraha sthānam idam ādiṣṭam na samāna jātīya abhiprāyam tat bhaviṣyati sādharmya dṛṣṭantā an eka tve vaidharmya dṛṣṭat tān eka tve vā tad nigraha sthānam iti āstām etat 
[II,573,v]	itthai sādharmya vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta svarūpe vyutpādite basāt tad lakṣaṇa rahitāḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ bhavanti tatra sādhya vikalaḥ sādhana vikalaḥ uthaya vikalaḥ iti vastu doṣa kṛtāḥ trayaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ ananvayaḥ viparīta anvayaḥ iti dvau vacana doṣa kṛtau yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt iti atra bruddhi vat iti sādhya vikalaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ paramāṇu vat iti sādhana vikalaḥ ghaṭa vat iti ubhaya vikalaḥ vyomni nitya tvāt mūrta tvam vidyate inyananvayaḥ yat amūrtam tat nityam iti vaktavye yat nityam tat amūrtam iti viparīta anvayaḥ iti 
[II,574,i_II,574,ii]	vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ api paṃca eva sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ iti vastu doṣāḥ trayaḥ avyatirekaḥ viparīta vyatirekaḥ iti vacana doṣau dvau yathā tatra eva hetau yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra amūrta tvam api na asti yathā paramāṇuṣu iti sādhya avyāvṛttaḥ yathā buddhau iti sādhana avyāvṛttaḥ yathā aakāśaḥ iti ubhaya avi āvṛttaḥ nitya tva amūrta tve ghaṭe na vidyete iti avyatirekaḥ yatra nitya tvam na asti tatra amūrta tvan api na asti iti vaktavye yatra amūrta tvam na asti tatra nitya tvam api na asti iti viparīta vyatirekaḥ iti ete ca vastu vṛttena hetu doṣāḥ eva tad anuvidhāyi tvāt atas eva hetvābhāsa vat sūtra kṛtāḥ na upadiṣṭāḥ asmābhiḥ tu śiṣya hitāya pradarśitāḥ evam 
[II,574,iii_II,574,iv]	udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāse na tathā iti vā sādhyasya apenayaḥ udāharaṇam ātma lābhe apekṣate iti udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ pakṣa dharmīpasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ dvividhaḥ ca asau tathā iti na tathā iti vā udāharaṇa dvaividhyāt tatra sādharmya udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tathā iti udanayaḥ yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti vedharmya udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ tu na tathā iti upanayaḥ yat nityam tat akṛtakam dṛṣṭam yathā aakāśaḥ na ca tathā kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti atra api niṣedha dvaya yogāt vidhiḥ eva gamyate 
[II,575,i]	nanu sādhyasya iti avācakaḥ sūtra avayavaḥ pakṣa dharma upasaṃhārohi upanayaḥ na sādhya upasaṃhāraḥ sādhyaḥ hi dharmaḥ dharmī vā syāt na taryīḥ anyatarasya api ayam upasaṃhāraḥ iti ucyate sādhyaḥ dharmī ā iva na dharmaḥ iha vivakṣitaḥ tatra ayam hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ tathā ca kṛtakaḥ śabdaḥ iti sā iyam sādhyasya iti saptamī arthe ṣaṣṭhī mantavyā sādhye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ upanayaḥ iti 
[II,575,ii_II,576,i]	nanu ādhāra vivakṣāyām iha prāpnoti saptamī saṃbandha mātre vā vācye katham ādhāratā ucyate na etat saṃbandha sāmānye api ukte bhavati dharmiṇā yogaḥ viśeṣa cintāyām tasya tu ādhāra tā bhavet viśeṣe antar nigūḍhe ca prāyas ṣaṣṭhī prayujyate śeṣaḥ nāma avivakṣā eva kārakāṇām iti sthitiḥ tathā ca rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ taroḥ śākhā iti sarvatra viśeṣaḥ antar vyavasthitaḥ atas ca dharmāya jijñāsā dharma jijñāsā sā hi tasya jñātum icchā iti vat saṃbandha mātra samarpikā api se ayam ṣaṣṭhī viśeṣa yarya vasānā bhaviṣyati iti sūktam sādhyasya upasaṃhāraḥ iti 
[II,576,ii_II,576,v]	nanu upanaya vacanam anarthakam pakṣa hetu dṛṣṭānta vacanaiḥ kim na paryāptam yad artham upanaya vacanam uccāryate yadi dharmiṇi hetoḥ sattva siddhaye tad abhidhānam tadā eṣa vṛthā eva śramaḥ pakṣa dharma vacanena eva kṛtaka tvāt iti evamādinā siddha tvāt atha sādhya dṛṣṭānta dharṇiṇoḥ sāmya āpādanāya tad uccāraṇam tat api na caturaśram udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti anena eva gata artha tvāt udāharaṇa sādharmya vacanam hi hetu vacanam eva bhavet atha sva pratipattau tad artha darśanāt param prati tad vacana tatra api parāmarśa jñāne vivadante api ca svayam dadhi bhakṣaṇa samanantaram yadi kadācid anumeya matiḥ upajāyate tat kim aparasmai tad upadiśyatām 
[II,576,vi]	yaḥ api ayam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana prayoga kramaḥ āśrīyate saḥ api sva prakriyā anurāgunirmitaḥ eva na vastu bala pravṛttaḥ tathā hi yat yat kṛtakam tat tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti iyataḥ vananāt kaḥ nāma śabda anitya tām na avagacchet tvam eva atra satya vrata dhanaḥ pramāṇam ḍiṇḍika rāgam parityajya akṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim iyatā artham buddhyase na vā tasmāt sva prakriyā pakṣapātam apāsya paṃcāvayavam evam kramakam vākyam upekṣya yathoktam eva vākyam prayuṅkṣva iti 
[II,577,i]	atra ucyate idam tāvat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ vyācaṣṭām kim sva pratipattim anusarantaḥ para pratipādanāya vākya racanām kurmaḥ uta para hṛdaya anuvarthanena iti tatra para abhiprāyasya vaicitryāt parokṣa tvāt ca duravagama tvena na vidmaḥ kim vidadhmahe kim bhuvam utkṣipāmaḥ kim aratninā param pīḍayāmaḥ uta hasta saṃjñayā vyavaharāmaḥ āho hetu mātram eva kevalam prayujmahe kim vātri avayavam vākyam abhidadhmaḥ uta paṃca avayavāt api vākyāt abhyadhikam ākhyānakam asmai iti evam anavasthita tvāt para abhiprāyasya sva prati pattim eva anusaratā paraḥ pratyāyyaḥ 
[II,577,ii]	tatra sva pratipattau parvata ādi dharmī prathamam dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa pratijñāya kathyate tatas api dhūma ādi liṅgam upalabdham iti hetu vacanena tadā avedyate tatas yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ yathā mahānasaḥ iti vyāpti smaraṇam abhavat iti dṛṣṭānta vacasā tat abhidhīyate tatas tathā ca ayam dhūmaḥ iti parāmarśa jñānam udapādi iti tad upanaya vacanena pratipādyate tatas tasmāt atra agniḥ iti anumeya jñānam upajāyate iti nigamanena tat ucyate tatas para pratipatti paryavasānāt kim anyat upadiśyamānam iti na ca dadhi thakṣaṇa sadṛśam atas anyatamam api bhavitum arhati anumeya pratipattau upādaya tvāt 
[II,578,i]	yeṣām api mate parāmarśa jñānam na ati taiḥ api upanaya vacanam avaśyam eva aparihāryam anumeya pratipattaye dṛṣṭānte darśita śaktiḥ eva hetuḥ prabhavati na anyathā iti atas yadi api pakṣa dharma vacanena hetu dharmi saṃbandha mātram upapāditam tathā api adhunā dṛṣṭha ante darśita śakti dharmaḥ saḥ tasmin dharmiṇi tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ syāt na vati asiddhi āśaṅkā śamanam upanaya vacanam antareṇa na bhavati eva iti avaśyam prayoktavyam tat iti sva prati iti anusaraṇena ca vākya racanāyāḥ sthata tvāt kramaḥ api yathā uktaḥ upayujyate 
[II,578,ii_II,578,iii]	atas eva ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam iti abhidhānam anupapannam anavagate dharmiṇi tad vartini ca hetau prathamam eva vyāpti smaraṇa asaṃbhavena tad vacana ayogāt tad idam avayavi viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kāla nigraha sthānam upadekṣyāmaḥ api ca yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva prayoktavyam iti vadatā bhavatā kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti idam upanaya vacanam anujñātam kṛtaka tvāt iti pakṣa dharma vacanam tu nihnutam kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti etāvat eva hetu vacanam iti ced na prayojakasya paṃcami ādinā nirdeśa arha tvāt iti yat kiṃcid etat 
[II,579,i]	yat api ucyate viduṣām vācyaḥ hetuḥ eva hi kevalaḥ iti tat api acāru vidvadbhiḥ vid tvāt eva hetoḥ api prajñānāt apūrvāḥ ime vidvāṃsaḥ ye pratijña ādi ava yava catuṣṭayasya artham jānanti hetu vacanasya tu na vindanti iti tasmāt parāśayasya sarvathā durbodha tvāt pūrva uktena eva krameṇa sva anubhava sākṣikeṇa vākya racanām kṛtvā paraḥ pratyāyya iti 
[II,579,ii_II,579,iii]	hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi nirjñāta śaktiḥ sādhye dharmiṇi apadiśyate anena iti hetu apadeśa upanayaḥ tasmāt hetu apadeśāt pravṛttam prarti jñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam nigamyate anene pūrva uktāḥ avayavāḥ ekatra sādhye arthe samarpyante niyojyante iti nigamanam tasmāt kṛtaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat idam nigamanam sādharmya vaidharmya bhedena hetoḥ dṛṣṭāntasya ca tad apekṣiṇaḥ ca tathā na tathā iti upanayasya dvaividhye api pratiśāvacana vat tulyam eva bhavati 
[II,580,i_II,580,ii]	nanu pratijñā vacanam eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tvāt apārthakam tasyāḥ eva punarvacanam nigamanamadhunā saphalam bhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam iti ca na vācakaḥ granthaḥ sādhya nirdeśaḥ hi pratijñā siddha nirdeśaḥ tu nigamanam iti vācake vā granthe paunaruktyāt eva nigamanasya vaiphalyam sva pratipattau ca parāmarśa jñāna antaram sādhya avagatiḥ eva bhavantī dṛśyate sā parasya api upanaya vacana śravaṇa samanantaram upajāyate eva iti kim tad uktyā prayojanam 
[II,580,iii_II,580,v]	ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat sāphalyam samarthitam eva tasyāḥ ca idam punarvacanam siddha sādhya bhede sati api dharmi dharma nirdeśa mātra sāmyāt ucyate siddha sādhya bhedāt eva ca na paunarukti akṛtāphalyam sva pratipattaye ca parāmarśa jñāna anantaram sādhya buddhiḥ utpannā sā parasmai kathyamānā na niṣprayojanā bhavati asmāt hetoḥ idam sādhyam aham ajñāsiṣam yathā tathā tvam api jānīhi mā sma vighnaḥ atra te bhavet evam ukte saṃśayān asya saṃśayaḥ śābhyati viparyasta mateḥ ca viparyayaḥ tad arthaḥ ca ayam para artha anumāna upanyāsa śramaḥ tat idam viparīta prasaṅga pratiṣedha artham nigamanam āhuḥ 
[II,581,i]	ye tu yathā śruta sādhya nirdeśa ātmaka pratijñā punarvacana samarthana lobhāt adya api pratijñāyāḥ siddhim abudhyamānāḥ asādhāraṇa āśaṅkā vyavacchedāya nigamana vacanam icchanti te na samyak abhyayus asādhāraṇa āśaṅkāyāḥ dṛṣṭānta vacanena eva nirasta tvāt viśeṣasya hi hetu tva saṃbhāvanā āyām asādhā raṇa āśaṅkā syāt yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti tu dṛṣṭānta vacasā sāmānyasya hetu tve kathite katham asādhāraṇa tvam āṅkyeta 
[II,581,ii_II,581,iii]	yadi punar upanaya vacanena sādhye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhārāt asāthāraṇa tvam āśaṅkyeta tad punar dṛṣṭānta dharmi vṛtti tvam asya darśayitavyam tasmin darśite punar tad vṛtti tvāt dharmiṇī a siddha tvam āśaṅkanīyam punar tad vyāvṛttaye dharmiṇi hetoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ vidheyaḥ iti evam asādhāraṇā siddhāya śaṅkābhyām gacchet iti na kadācid sādhya pratītiḥ bhavet iti nāsā dhāraṇa śaṅkā vyudāsāya tad prayogaḥ kintu pūrva rītyā eva iti tasmāt vivakṣite arthe yathā udita krama niveśinaḥ avayavān ekatra saṃghaṭayitum nigamana vacanam prayoktavyam 
[II,581,iv_II,582,i]	te ime pratijña ādayaḥ nigamana paryantāḥ paṃca avayavāḥ yathāsaṃbhavam āgama ādi pramāṇa anugṛhītāḥ paraspara anuṣaktāḥ ca sva artham sādhyanti tatra mukhyayā vṛttyā pratipādyena anumānena eva sarve avayavāḥ anugṛhyante prapaṃcāya tu pramāṇa antara anugrahaḥ eṣām ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat āgamaḥ anugrāhakaḥ upeyate upadeśa svabhāva tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti vaktā tu evaṃvidhe viṣaye ṛṣi vat asvatantra tvāt anumānam upadiśati pratijñā vacanam tu tad chāyā anupāti tvāt śabda prāmāṇya siddhi arthe vā śāstre tad pratijñāyāḥ śabda viṣaya tvāt āgama anugṛhīta tvam ucyate 
[II,582,ii_II,582,v]	hetu vacanam anumānena anugṛhyate udāharaṇam tu pratyakṣeṇa tad mūla tvāt vyāpti pāricchedasya yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti vat yathā ghaṭaḥ tathā śabdaḥ iti anayā cchāyayā upamāna kāraṇa bhūta vanecara ādi vacana sadṛśa tvāt upamānam upanayasyā nugrāhakam abhidhīyate nigamanasya tu sarva avayavānām ekatra niyojana artha tvāt sarva pramāṇa anugrāhya tā eva 
[II,582,vi]	itaretara anuṣakta tvāt pratijñām vinā nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ bhavet iti sā pūrvam prayoktavyāḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tatas hetum parojijñāsate iti hetu vacanam uccāryate kṛtaka tvāt iti hetau śrute kva asya vyāptiḥ avadhṛtā iti darśayitum udāharaṇam ucyate yat kṛtakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti evam ukte īdṛśaḥ nirjñāta śaktiḥ eṣa hetuḥ sādhye dharmiṇi bhavet na vā iti asiddha tā śaṅām apākartum upanayaḥ prasajyate tatas amunā krameṇa tava api sādhya prati iti rbhavatu iti sarva avayavān ekatra sādhye arthe samarthayitum nigamanam abhidhīyate anyatamam avayavam antareṇa sakalam idam anuṣakta artha vākyam syāt iti paṃcāvayavam eva yathā upadiṣṭa kramakam vākyam prayoktavyam 
[II,583,i]	iti ārabdha upakāraḥ tad anuguṇa phalaiḥ āgama ādi pramāṇaiḥ atyonya apekṣiṇaḥ amī niyatam avayavāḥ sādhayanti artha jātam yaḥ ca eteṣām prameye vacasi ca caturaḥ tasya jāti prayoga prāyaiḥ śakyaḥ na pakṣaḥ kṣapayitum iti hi vyāharat vṛtti kāraḥ 
[II,584,i_II,584,ii]	avayava anantaram prathama sūtre tarkasya uddeśātaḥ uddeśa anukrameṇa tasya lakṣaṇam āha avijñāta tattve arthe kāraṇa upapattitaḥ tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ avijñāta tattve atha iti sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśāt arthaḥ eva anya padārthaḥ na puruṣaḥ puruṣām hi ṣaṣṭhyā niradekṣyata avirjñātam tattvam asya iti tattva pada upādānena dharmiṇaḥ sāmānya dharma mānna viśiṣṭasya vijñāta tvam sūcayati kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti saṃśaya jñāna ullikhya māna pakṣa dvaya anyatara pakṣa utthāpana anukūla kāraṇa avalokanam tarkasya utthāpakam āha atas eva avijñāta tattve arthe bhavantau api bubhutsā vim aśauna tarka tām prāpnutaḥ tattva jñāna artham iti sākṣāt pramāṇa tām asya nirasyati pramāṇa anugraham tu viṣaya pariśodhana dvāreṇa vidadhat tattva jñānāya kalpate tarkaḥ ūhaḥ iti paryāya pada upādānasya prayojanam vakṣyāmaḥ 
[II,584,iii]	tena ayam sūtra arthaḥ avijñāta tattve sāmānyatas jñāte dharmiṇi eka pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa darśanāt tasmin saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ bhavitavya tā avabhāsaḥ tad itara pakṣa śaithilya āpādanena tad grāhakam pramāṇam anugṛhṇat sukham pravartayan tattva jñāna artham ūhaḥ tarkaḥ iti yathā vāha keli pradeśa ādau ūrdhva tva viśiṣṭa dharmi darśanāt puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti pratyayaḥ 
[II,585,i]	nanu tattva jñāna artham iti ukte sati sāma arthyāt avijñāta tattva tā labhyate eva iti kim artham kaṇṭhena punar anūdyate bāḍham kintu kvacid viṣaye jñāta tattve api pūrva tarkeṇa avasṛṣṭe sati uttarakālam tarkitaḥ mayā ayam arthaḥ iti smaryamāṇa tarka viśeṣaṇa tayā gṛhyamāṇaḥ viśeṣaṇībhūtaḥ tarkaḥ tattva jñāna arthaḥ bhavati iti tat yudāsāya punar avijñāta tattva grahaṇam mārga śodhana dvāreṇa tarkasya tattva jñāna artha tvam iha vivakṣitam tat ca avijñāta tattve arthe saṃbhavati iti 
[II,585,ii]	nanu na eva saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ kaścid asti tathā hi yadi tāvādanavagata viśeṣasya saṃbhavati asau pratyayaḥ tarhi saṃśayaḥ eva bhavet avagata viśeṣasya bhavat nirṇaya tām eva spṛśet puruṣaḥ eva iti eva kāra arthāsam unmeṣa rahitaḥ api pratyayaḥ na anirṇayaḥ bhavitum arhati turaga parisaraṇa samucita deśa darśanam api yadi sthāṇu pakṣam sthagayitum alam iti manyate tat kara caraṇa ādi nara viśeṣa darśana vat tat nirṇaya kāraṇam eva syāt atha tasyām api turaga viharaṇa bhuvi niśi nikhanati kaścana sthāṇum iti śaṅkase yadi evam sthāṇu pakṣān apāyāt punar saṃśayaḥ eva syāt iti na tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ samasti iti lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti 
[II,586,i_II,586,iii]	ucyate na khalu sva mati parikalpita vikalpa vitānena pratyātma vedanīyāḥ pratītayaḥ apanetum śakyāḥ tathā hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti pratītiḥ ekā puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti anyā anyā capuruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti madhya vartinī tṛtīyā saṃbhāvanā pratītiḥ sva hṛdaya sākṣikā eva sāmyena hi samullekhaḥ saṃśaye pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ nirṇaye tu itaraḥ pakṣaḥ spṛśyate na manāk api tarkaḥ tu ekataram pakṣam vibhāti utthāpayan iva nara saṃbhāvanā bīja vāji vāhana darśanāt vāha keli pradeśa viśeṣa darśanam hi puṃsi saṃbhāvanā mātram upajanayitum alam na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi viśeṣa darśana vat sarva ātmanā sthāṇu pakṣa apasāraṇena puruṣasya nirṇayāya prabhavati atas ayam agṛhīta viśeṣasya eva bhavati pratyayaḥ na tu saṃśayaḥ ekatara pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa upapattyat jāyamāna tvāt 
[II,586,iv]	katham punar pāṇi pāda ādi puruṣa viśeṣa vat aśva vāhana deśa viśeṣaḥ viśeṣa kāryam na kuryāt karaṇe vā sthāṇu pakṣa utsāraṇāt nirṇayaḥ eva ayam iti kasya eṣa paryanuyogaḥ yathā hi śiraḥ pāṇi ādi darśane sati puruṣa nirṇayaḥ bhavati na tathā turaga vahana darśane sati ananuyojyāḥ ca padārthāḥ evaṃbhavataḥ evam mā bhūtaḥ iti yathā ca deśa antare spardhamānaḥ eva sthāṇu pakṣe āste na tathā vāhakeḷi bhūmau api tu śithilībhavati saṃbhavat pramāda tvāt ca na sarva ātmanā nivartate 
[II,587,i]	nanu yadi na nivartate tarhi spardhatām mā vā spardhiṣṭa sthitaḥ tāvat sthāṇu pakṣaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ eva ayam iti mā evam na sthāṇupakṣaḥ sarva ātmanā nivartate na api āste evam eva ayam triśaṅkuḥ iva lambamānaḥ pratyā yā antara nirvṛttaye prabhavati iti tathā vidha pratyaya anubhavāt eva parikalpyate vāha keli pradeśa darśane hi yathā puruṣa viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham avataranti na tathā sthāṇu viśeṣāḥ ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā ca saṃśayaḥ iti saḥ ayam vāhakeli pradeśa viśeṣaḥ śithilayati sthāṇu pakṣam na sarva ātmanā ucchinatti iti tat darśanāt bhavati pratyaya antaram ūha rūpam puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti iti alam ati vistareṇa 
[II,587,ii_II,587,iii]	yat tu bhāṣya kāreṇa tarka udāharaṇam abhyadhāyi janma uccheda darśanāt kṛtaka tad kāraṇa pratyayaḥ iti na tad hṛdayaṅgamam tena krameṇa nirṇayaḥ eva asau tad kāraṇa tathā tvam na tarkaḥ iti athavā kārya udāharaṇa tvāt asya tatra api saṃśaya nirṇaya antarāla vartī tarka pratyayaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ saḥ udāharaṇam bhaviṣyati 
[II,587,iv_II,588,ii]	ūhaḥ iti paryāya abhidhāne kim prayojanam lakṣaṇa pratipādanam eva tarkasya lakṣaṇam yat ūha rūpa tvam itaraḥ tu sūtre kāraṇa viśeṣāya phala nirdeśaḥ kāraṇa upapattitaḥ iti kāraṇa nirdeśaḥ avijñāta tattve arthe iti viṣaya nirdośaḥ tattva jñāna arthaḥ iti phala nirdeśaḥ api ca tarka śabdam kecid anumāne prayuṃjate yathā smṛti kārāḥ paṭhanti ārṣam dharma upadeśam ca veda śāstra avirodhinā yaḥ tarkeṇa anusandhatte sa dharmam veda na itaraḥ iti tat iha api tarkaḥ anumānam mā vijñāyi iti ūha grahaṇam ūhaḥ atra tarkaḥ ucyate na anumānam tattva jñāna artha tā api asya pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvena na sākṣāt tathā eva ca artham sādhayitum eṣa vāde prayujyate hṛdaya śuddhi prakāśana artham 
[II,588,iii]	kāpilāḥ tu buddhi dharmam ūham āhuḥ saḥ tad siddhānta prasiddha sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ rūpa prakṛti prabhava bhuvana sarga ādi vyavahāra nirākaraṇa vartmanā pūrvam eva nirastaḥ 
[II,588,iv_II,589,i]	jaininīyāḥ tu bruvate yuktyā prayoga nirūpaṇam ūhaḥ iti iha hi kiṃcid upadiṣṭa dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa svabhāva sa kala iti kartavyatā kalāpam karma bhavati yathā āgneyaḥ aṣṭākapālaḥ iti darśa pūrṇamāsa kāṇḍe paṭhitam kvacid punar pradhāna karma mātram upadiśyate itikartavya tā tu kācana nāmnā āyate yathā sauryam carum nirvapeda brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti tatra vicāryate kim itikartavya tā virahita yathā śruta pradhāna mātra saṃpādanena tatra śāstra artha prayogaḥ parisamāpyate uta tat api sa iti kartavya tākam pradhānam anuṣṭhe yam iti 
[II,589,ii]	tatra apūrva prayukta tvena dharmāṇām pratikaraṇam bhede sthite niraṅgasya pradhānasya ananuṣṭheya tvāt vidhi anta adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāyena prākṛta vat vaikṛta karma kartavyam iti sa iti kartavya tākam tat anuṣṭhīyate evam sāmānya atideśe sthite sati kasya vaikṛtasya karmaṇaḥ kutas prakṛteḥ dharmāḥ adhigantavyāḥ iti cintāyām draya devatā ādi codanā sārūpya paryā locana upanata hṛdaya sannidhāna prākṛta karma viśeṣa saṃbandhina eva tatra dharmāḥ bhavitum arhanti iti sthāpite yugapad upanipatadanargala codaka vyāpāra upanīta nikhila akhaḍa maṇḍala vidhi anta kāṇḍa adhi gamya dharma prabandha prāptau satyām te dharmāḥ katham prayoktavyāḥ iti yuktyā prayoga nirūpaṇam ūhaḥ ucyate yena ittham prayoktavyāḥ iti dharmāḥ vyavasthāpyante 
[II,589,iii_II,590,i]	sa ca trividhaḥ mantra sāma saṃskāra viṣayaḥ mantra viṣayaḥ tāvat yathā atra eva saurye carau prakṛti vat bhāvena agnneyāt agnaye tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti nirvāpa mantraḥ prāptaḥ katham prayoktavyaḥ iti vicāraṇāyām uccāraṇa mātreṇa mantrāṇām anupayogāt prayoga samaveta dravya devatā ādi prakāśana dvāreṇa tad upayogasya vyavasthita tvāt iha vaḥ prākṛtaḥ eva ayam agnaye juṣṭam iti prayujyamānaḥ mantraḥ prayoga samavetasya arthasya aprakāśanāt asaṅgataḥ bhavet sarva ātmanā ca utsṛjyamāne mantre mantra prakāśita karma ananuṣṭhānāt na prakṛti vat kṛtam bhavet iti agni pada uddhāreṇa sūrya pada prakṣepeṇa mantraḥ ūhena ittham prayoktavyaḥ iti gamyate sūryāya tvā juṣṭam nirvapāmi iti nanu ūha pravara nāmadheyānām amantra tvāt ittham api na mantreṇa smṛtam karma kṛtam syāt na etat eka deśa vikṛtam ananya vat bhavati iti nyāyāt 
[II,590,ii]	sāma viṣayaḥ tu gītayassāmāni iti sthite kvacid karmaṇi rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati bṛhaduttarayoḥ gāyati iti śruteḥ sā bṛhat rathantara gītiḥ yasyāmṛci yoni bhūtāyām utthitā tatas anyasyām api prayujyate tādṛś akṣara apāye api sā gītiḥ ṛc antara akṣareṇu api pratyabhijñāyate rathantaram anena ślokena gītam iti vyavahāra darśanāt 
[II,590,iii]	saṃskāraḥ khalu api prākṛtau prokṣitābhyām ulūkhala musalābhyām avahanti iti saṃskāraḥ coditaḥ kvacid ca vikṛtau śrūyate nakha nirbhinnaḥ caruḥ bhavati iti tatra ulūkhala musalayoḥ prakṛtau puroḍāśa apekṣita tuṣa kaṇa vipramoka pūrvaka taṇḍulībhāva saṃpādana dvāreṇa upayogāt vikṛtau api tad kārya āpannānām nakhānām prokṣaṇa ākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyate iti saḥ ayam trividhaḥ ūhaḥ 
[II,590,iv]	kecid tu paṃcavidham ūham ācakṣate dharmasya artha kṛta tvāt dravya guṇa saṃskāra vyatirikta krama pratiṣedhe codanā anubandhaḥ samavāyāt iti sūtram anusarantaḥ etat tu pratanyamānam atiprasaṅgam āvahati trividham eva ca ūham yājñikāḥ anumanyante iti 
[II,591,i_II,591,ii]	atra vadanti saḥ ayam ūha śabdaḥ śrotriyaiḥ anumāne prayuktaḥ yathā smṛti kāraiḥ tatra tarka śabdaḥ yaḥ tarkeṇa anusagdhattaiḥ iti tathā hi vaikṛtam karmam dharmita tsamaveta artha prakāśaka mantra prayoga nirvartyam iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ karma tvāt prākṛta karma vat iti prākṛteṣu ca karmasu tathā tathā vyāpti grahaṇat sarvaḥ ayam anumāna mārgaḥ eva nakhāḥ prokṣaṇīyāḥ prayoga upayogi taṇḍula nirvartaka tvāt iti sāmasu tu spaṣṭam eva vacanam asti rathantaram uttarayoḥ gāyati iti tad abhāve api mantra saṃskāra samāna yogakṣema tvam eva 
[II,591,iii]	api ca śabda pṛṣṭha sthita nyāya sahasra vyutpādana ātmake mīmāṃsā śāsat tad nyāya labhyaḥ arthaḥ codanā arthaḥ eva iti sthāpitam atas ca yathā uktohalabhyasya arthasya codanā artha tā mā ativatiṣṭa iti saḥ ayam ūhaḥ śabdaḥ eva antar bhāvaṇīyaḥ pramāṇa antara gocaraḥ vā dharmaḥ syāt nyāya viśeṣa ātmakaḥ tūhaḥ na anumānāt artha antaram syāt agnaye iti asya sthāne sūryāya iti padasya prayogaḥ ūhasya phalam na ūhaḥ tasmāt na yājñikaiḥ pramāṇāt artha antaram ūha uktaḥ 
[II,591,iv_II,592,i]	iha tu pūrva uktayā nītyā pramāṇa vyatiriktaḥ ūhaḥ upapāditaḥ śrotri yāḥ tu tad anabhijña tayā nyāye nyāya phale ca ūha śabdam upacaritavantaḥ iti alam śāstṛ antara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ tat eṣa mīmāṃsaka kalpyamānaḥ na ūhaḥ pramāṇa vyatirekam eti pramāṇa sandeha daśā antarāḷa vartī tu tarkaḥ kathitaḥ atra śāstre 
[II,592,ii_II,592,iii]	tarka anantaram nirṇayaḥ bhavati paṭhitaḥ ca iti sa lakṣyate vimṛśya pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām artha avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ avadhāraṇam nirṇayaḥ iti ucyamāne mithyā avadhāraṇam api tathā syāt iti artha grahaṇam indriya ādi janitam api tattva avadhāraṇam asti eva nyāya uparama hetoḥ tu nirṇayasya uddeśāt saḥ eva anumāna janyaḥ lakṣaṇīyaḥ iha iti pakṣa pratipakṣā bhyām iti uktam 
[II,592,iv_II,592,v]	eka adhikaraṇau dharmau tulya kālau virodhinau pṛthak parigrahau pakṣa pratipakṣau udāhṛtau na tarhi tābhyām nirṇayaḥ tayoḥ anyatara viṣayaḥ hi bhavati nirṇayaḥ na tad karaṇakaḥ eva iti satyam iha tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdābhyām tad viṣayau sādhana tad upālambhau lakṣyete tau ca tasmin karaṇam eva kim artha punar lakṣaṇā aaśrīyate sādhana upālambhābhyām iti eva katham na sūtritam evam abhidhīyamāne punar tayoḥ viṣayaḥ mṛgyaḥ lakṣaṇa aprayoge tu saḥ api avagataḥ bhavet mukhyam abhidhāya tad itaraḥ lakṣyate 
[II,593,i_II,593,iii]	bhavatu evam dvābhyām tu katham nirṇayaḥ ekam eva hi sādhanam nirṇayāya kalpate evam etat na dvitīyam api sādhanam nirṇaya nimittam ācakṣmahe kintu tad upālambhasa dhanam ca sādhana upālambhaḥ ca sādhana upālambhau tābhyām nirṇayaḥ etat uktam bhavati sva pakṣe sādhanam adhigacchan para pakṣa sādhane ca dūṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇaḥ sva pakṣam pramātā nirṇayati iti na khalu evam na jāne kintu upālambhasya kaḥ iva nirṇaya janmani vyāpāraḥ sa hi para pakṣa sādhanam eva ucchindyāt iti asti etat tad uccheda dvāreṇa api tu sva pakṣa sādhana abhimānam āviṣkurvan kalpataḥ eva nirṇayāya iti yuktaḥ dvayoḥ api kāraṇa bhāvaḥ 
[II,593,iv_II,594,i]	nanu idānīm artha grahaṇam anarthakam iva na hi evaṃvidha sādhana adhīna janmā nirṇaya ābhāsaḥ saṃbhavati sādhana upālambha lakṣaṇa arthau api pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdau viṣayam abhivaditum na śaknutaḥ iti uktam eva iti kaḥ arthaḥ artha grahaṇena ucyate pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ tu dvayoḥ anyatara arthe avadhāraṇam bhavati na ubhayatra saḥ eva ca paramārthataḥ arthaḥ itaraḥ tu bhrānti kalpitaḥ iti pradarśanāya artha pada upādānam lakṣyamāṇa sādhana upālambha niṣṭha tvāt tu pakṣa pratipakṣa śabdayoḥ viṣaya nirdeśa artham artha padam iti eke 
[II,594,ii_II,594,iii]	vimṛśya iti kimartham vastu svarūpa kathana artham eva anumāna kāraṇakaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ iha lakṣyate iti uktam anumānam ca saṃśaya viṣaye pravartate iti tarka anantaram api anena eva āśayena asya upādānam saṃśayāt anantaram tarkaḥ tarkāt ūrdhvam ca nirṇayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pravartamānaḥ atassa tad pūrvakaḥ iṣyate nirṇaye tu samutpanne bubhutsā vinivartate atas eva hi manyante tad antam nyāya cintanam 
[II,594,iv_II,594,v]	bhavatu evam idantu cintyatām kva niyamaḥ kim vimarśe kim pakṣa pratipakṣayoḥ kim nirṇaye iti traye api ca na upapadyate iti na vimṛśya eva nirṇayaḥ avimṛśya api bhāvāt na pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva indriya ādeḥ api tad utpādāt na nirṇayaḥ eva tarkasya api kvacid anivṛtteḥ uktam atra uddeśa sūtre tattva jñāna pada upādānāt pramāṇa padena ca tad phala ākṣepāt na nirṇaya mātreṇa uddiṣṭena kim api prayojanam viśiṣṭaḥ tu nirṇayaḥ lakṣya tvena vivakṣitaḥ parīkṣā viṣayaḥ yaḥ hi nirṇayaḥ nyāya nirmitaḥ niyama trayam api etat tasmin na hi na yujyate 
[II,595,i_II,595,iii]	sa hi vimṛśya eva bhavati vimarśa pūrvaka tvāt parīkṣāyāḥ anumānam ca saṃdigdhe viṣaye pravartate iti prāyeṇa tad vyavahāraḥ yadi api kvacid asaṃdigdhe api viṣaye dṛṣṭam pravartamānam anumānam anala arthi tāyām atarkita upanata parvata nitamba nirgata dhūma darśanena kṛśa anu kalpam iva tathā api vastu yogya tā vaśena saṃdigdha viṣayam eva anumānam icchanti nyāya vidaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca nirṇayaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva nirṇayaḥ eva iti na śakyate niyantum anyathā nyāya anuparamāt iti śāstre tu vinā api saṃśayāt asti nirṇayaḥ yadi api ca tatra api sūtra kṛtā sarva parīkṣāṇām saṃśaya pūrvaka tvam upadeśa atideśābhyām abhyadhāyi tathā api na asau śāstrīyaḥ nirṇayaḥ parīkṣā kārya tvāt 
[II,595,iv]	yaḥ tu śāstrataḥ eva kvacid viṣaya nirṇayaḥ sa vimarśa varjam utpadyate vāde api vimarśa rahitaḥ bhavati nirṇayaḥ ubhau niścitau vādam kurutaḥ saṃdigdhasya tatra anadhikārāt katham tarhi eṣa pravādaḥ saṃśaya chedaḥ vādasya phalam iti prathamam ubhayoḥ api niścitayoḥ vāda pravṛttau antarāle balāt āpatati yukti dvaya upanipāta kṛtaḥ saṃśayaḥ iti vastu nirṇaya avasāna tvāt vādasya saṃśaya cheda phala tvam ācakṣate 
[II,595,v]	yadi api aniścita matiḥ kurute na vādam śrutvā tathā api parakīyanaya prayogam antar mata dvaya bala abala cintanena saṃśayya nirṇayati nūnam asau sva pakṣam 
[II,596,i_II,596,ii]	nyāya parīkṣā dvāraka vastu vicāra yogyāḥ kathāḥ vādinām bhavanti vādaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍa iti tatra vādaḥ tāvat ucyate pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ siddhānta aviruddhaḥ pañca avayava upapannaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣau vyākhyātau tayoḥ parigrahaḥ abhyupagama niyamaḥ ekaḥ vakti nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti aparaḥ tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti āha saḥ ayam pakṣa pratipakṣa parigrahaḥ vādaḥ etat ca rūpam kathā traye api sādhāraṇam iti viśeṣam āha pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti pramāṇaiḥ tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaḥ ca asmin kriyate iti pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ na tu īdṛśī vitaṇḍā tasyāḥ pratipakṣa sādhana upanyāsa śūnya svabhāva tvāt 
[II,596,iii]	nanu pratyakṣa ādeḥ pramāṇasya para prati iti anupāya tvāt na tena vāde sādhana upālambhau śakya kriyau tarkasya tu pratīti sādhana tvam api tāvat na saṃbhavati saṃbhavanā pratyaya svabhāva tvāt kim uta para pratyāyana aṅgatā iti na tarām tasya sādhana upālambha hetu tvam satyam evam iha tu na pramāṇa śabdena pratyakṣa ādeḥ abhidhānam api tu pramāṇa mūlāḥ avayavāḥ ucyante taiḥ ca siddhi upālabdhī kriyete evam tarkasya tu svatas sādhana upālambha karaṇa kauśala śūnyātmanaḥ api pramāṇa anugrāhaka tvāt pāramparyeṇa tad hetoḥ āśaya śuddhi pradarśana artham upādānam 
[II,597,i_II,597,iii]	yadi evam pramāṇa padena eva tad mūla avayava pratipādanāt paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam atiricyate tatra ke cit ācakṣe pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti vāda lakṣaṇe chala jāti nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti ca jalpa lakṣaṇe śravaṇāt vāde sarva ātmanā chala ādi niṣedha prasaktau katipaya nigraha sthāna udbhāvanā abhyanujñāna artham paṃca avayava upapanna grahaṇam anena ca hīnam anyatamena api avayavena nyūnam hetu udāharaṇābhyām adhikam adhikam iti nyūna adhikayoḥ udbhāvanam anujñāyate siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena api siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti viruddha ākhya hetu ābhāsa udbhāvanam anujñātam iti evam vāde trīṇi nigraha sthānāni udbhāvanīyāni 
[II,597,iv]	anye vadanti viruddhaḥ eva hetvābhāsaḥ vāde codyate na anaikāntika ādi riti katham etat yujyate nigraha sthānebhyaḥ pṛthak upadiṣṭāḥ hetu abhāsāḥ vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti bhāṣya kāra vacanāt pramāṇa padena ca tad mūla avayava ākṣepāt pramāṇa ābhāsa mūla nirāse sati sakala hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api tatra siddham iti 
[II,598,i]	siddhānta aviruddha grahaṇena siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ iti apasiddhānta ākhya nigraha sthāna abhyanujñānam iti evam aṣṭau nigraha sthānāni vāde udbhāvyante iti tad anupapannam na hi trīṇi vai aṣṭau vā vāde nigraha sthānāni codanīyāni iti codanārvaidikī rāja śāsanam vā vastu pariśuddhi sādhanam sarvam eva tatra prayoga arham ayam tu viśeṣaḥ jalpe kasyāṃcid avasthāyām buddhi pūrvakam api chala ādi prayogaḥ kriyate vāde tu na tathā teṣām prayogaḥ bhrāntyā tu kathaṃcid prayuktānām avaśyam udbhāvanam anudbhāvane vastu pariśuddheḥ abhāvāt 
[II,598,ii]	katham tarhi idam pada dvayam siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti apasiddhānta ādi samyak dūṣaṇa diś pradarśanena evaṃprakāra vastu śuddhi anuguṇa nigraha sthāna jāta abhyanujñāna artham eva iti abhiyuktāḥ apratibhā vikṣepa ādayaḥ hi na vāde parājaya hetavaḥ kṣaṇa antareṇa api āgatya anusmṛtya ca sādhanam upālambham vā tatra pravadan na parājīyate pratijñāhāni ādi tu samyak parājaya kāraṇam akhilam ābhyām padābhyām abhyanujñātam atra iti 
[II,598,iii]	nanu idānīm pramāṇa tarka grahaṇam apārthakam paṃca avayava upapanna padena eva pramāṇa mūla avayava upadeśāt vastu pariśuddhi anuguṇa nigraha sthāna abhyanujñānāt ca kim iva na uktam na abhiprāyanaiḥ malya nivedana dvāraka vāda jalpa viveka pratipādana artha tvāt sva pratipatti sādhanam api pratyakṣa ādi vāde prayoktum ucitam āśaya śuddhim upadarśayitum atra vastuni mama prathamam tarkaḥ ittham pravṛttaḥ āsīt tatas pramāṇam idam pravṛttam iti evamādi api tatra vaktavyam atas eva ca anyatara pakṣa nirṇaya avasānaḥ eva bhavati vādaḥ na jalpa vat alīka dūṣaṇa āḍambara viracita para paribhava paryavasānaḥ api iti tathā buddhi pūrvam ābhāsā nāmaprayoga iti nirmatsara kathā tvam asya uktam iti akaluṣa ākūta kathanāya pramāṇa tarka padam 
[II,599,i_II,599,ii]	api ca sādhana upālambha vyatiṣaṅga pratipādanam api tasya phalam ubhau api parasparam anubandhena vādibhyām parīkṣyamāṇau pakṣa pratipakṣau vādatām prayojayataḥ na tu sva guhe śāstre vā vivicyamānau pramāṇaiḥ eva vāde chala ādibhiḥ eva jalpe vyavahāraḥ iti niyama śaṅkā nirasanam api tad pada upādāna prayojanam uktam anyaiḥ iti kṛtam ati vistareṇa sarvathā vāda lakṣaṇam sustham vādam tu nirṇaya phala arthibhiḥ eva śiṣya sabrahmacāri gurubhiḥ saha vīta rāgaiḥ na khyāti lābha rabhasa prativardhamāna spardhā anubandha vidhuḥ a ātmabhiḥ ārabheta 
[II,599,iii_II,600,i]	yathā ukta upapannaḥ chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ yathā ukta upapanna grahaṇena sarva atideśe vāda jalpayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ iti śaṅkamānāḥ kecana pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha mātra atideśam eva vyācakṣate iyataḥ tu pūrva sūtra anuvṛttyā api siddheḥ manda phalam eva yathā ukta upapanna vacanam bhavet iti samastāditi deśaḥ eva varam na ca tatra api vāda jalpayoḥ sāmyam gamyamāna arthān atideśāt śrautaḥ eva arthaḥ atidiśyate na gamyamānaḥ tad kṛtaḥ eva ca tayoḥ bhedaḥ 
[II,600,ii]	tathā ca pramāṇa tarka sādhana upālambhaḥ iti atra gamyamānaḥ arthaḥ abhiprāya niyamaḥ sa na atidiśyate siddhānta aviruddhaḥ paṃca avayava upapannaḥ iti atra api buddhi pūrvaka jāti ādi prayoga pratiṣedha tad udbhāvana niyama rūpaḥ gamyamānaḥ arthaḥ saḥ api na atidiśyate iti kutas tayoḥ avivekaḥ atas eva ca buddhi pūrvaka prayoga anujñānāya chala jāti nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ iti uktam 
[II,600,iii]	bhavatu evam chala ādīnām tu asat uttara tvāt katham iva sādhana upāsambha hetu tvam para pakṣa pratikṣepa dvārakam iti ced na asat uttara tvena pratikṣepe api teṣām asāmarthyāt evam api ca sādhana grahaṇam anarthakam eva iti satyam eva idam kintu kasyāṃcid avasthāyām sva pratipatti sādhana upahita tattva jñāna rakṣāyai tāni api vyāpriyante yadā jānan api para pakṣakaśimānam sva pakṣet raḍhimānam ca kvacid avasare para prayukte sādhane dūṣaṇam sapadi na paśyati sva pakṣa sādhanam ca jhaṭiti na smarati tadā chala ādibhiḥ api upakramya param abhibhavati ātmānam ca rakṣati iti 
[II,601,i_II,601,ii]	nanu yadi paraḥ api chala ādīni jānīyāt teṣu ca anurūpam uttaram abhidadhīta katham jīyeta pratyuta jayati eva satyam tathā api ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti yuktam eva tad prayogeṇa sphuṭa āṭopa karaṇam nanu īdṛṃśi prayojanāni jigīṣataḥ janasya jānapada sadasi bhavanti tasya api na nipuṇam ati pariṣadi mumukṣoḥ tu dūra apetā eva kathā iyam iti katham iha mokṣa śāstre jalpa ādi upadeśaḥ na etet evam mumukṣoḥ api kvacid prasaṅge tad upayogāt tathā uktam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham jalpa vitaṇḍe bīja praroha saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā āvaraṇa vat iti 
[II,601,iii]	yadi hi kvacid āśrame sukham āsīnam aneka śiṣya gaṇa upāsyamānam rahasya tattvam upadiśantam śānta mānasamācārya anāryaḥ kaścid vipaścit āgatya duradhi gata katipaya akṣara caya janita gurutara garva gadgadayā girā bhoḥ tapasvin kim vyākhyāyate hum ānvīkṣakī saralam ati priyā iyam vidyā kva vedāḥ kvaveda prāmāṇyam kva ātma jñānam kvāpavargaḥ ityādi mandam mandam vihasya sahasā duṣṭa medhaḥ iva prakaṭitā kāṇḍa daṇḍa kāśa ḍambara vitrāsita āśrama mṛgavargam udgrāhayan ākulayati tadā jagat jālam indrajāla paṇḍita vilasitam iti jānan api ācāryaḥ yadi tam upekṣate tiraskaroti sadyas samyak sādhana apratibhāse api yadi chala ādibhiḥ enam na śamayati tadā tasmin gate tatas utthāya śiṣya gaṇāḥ brūyuḥ kaṣṭama sthāne kliṣṭāḥ smaḥ 
[II,602,i]	yaḥ asau asmākam ācāryaḥ prakhyātaḥ nyāya vittamaḥ adya tu āgatya saḥ anyena paṇḍitena parājitaḥ tat śrutvā janaḥ itaraḥ api sat patha āsthā śaithilyāt sapadi tam eva mā anuyāsīt tat nūnam paribhava bhūmikām asabhyaḥ netavyaḥ sadasi sa vāvadūka pāśaḥ tad vidhāna ghaṭane nirargalam jalpam astram upadiṣṭavān muniḥ ānuṣaṅgikam api prayojanam tasya rāgi janatāsu varṇitam 
[II,602,ii_II,602,iii]	sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍā saḥ eva yathā ukta lakṣaṇakaḥ jalpaḥ vitaṇḍā bhavati kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced āha pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ iti uttara pakṣa vādī vaitaṇḍikaḥ prathama vādī prathama sādhyamāna pakṣa apekṣayā tad pakṣaḥ hasti pratihasti nyāyena pratipakṣaḥ iti ucyate tamasau abhyupagacchati eva na tatra sādhanam upadiśati para pakṣam eva akṣipan āḥ te tarhi sādhanāt vinā pakṣaḥ api saḥ asya na astye vā iti 
[II,603,i_II,603,ii]	pratipakṣa hīnaḥ vitaṇḍa iti ucyatām kim sthāpana agrahaṇena na abhyupagama mātreṇa tad bhāvāt tam anabhm upagamya pralapataḥ kaḥ tasya śṛṇuyāt aupacārikaḥ vā para mataparākaraṇa rūpaḥ eva asya pakṣaḥ tasmin hi sati sva pakṣaḥ hi tasya siddhyet iti para matā ākṣepa pravaṇa pravṛtteḥ ca balāt dvitīya pakṣa vādyā iva vaitaṇḍikaḥ iti tat evam pakṣaḥ asya asti iti sādhanam tu na asti iti samyak sūtritam sa pratipakṣa sthāpanā hīnaḥ vitaṇḍāḥ iti iti udāhṛtam idam kathā trayam yad paraspara vivikta lakṣaṇam sthūlam api anavalokya kathyate vāde ekaḥ iti śākya śiṣyakaiḥ 
[II,603,iii_II,604,ii]	pakṣa dharma tva ādīni paṃca lakṣaṇāni hetoḥ uktāni teṣām ekaika apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ bhavanti iti tān darśayitum āha savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇa sama sādhya sama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ atra hetvābhāsa śrutiḥ eva nirvacana sahitā sāmānya lakṣaṇam bodhayati ahetavaḥ hetu vat ābhāsantaḥ iti hetvābhāsāḥ iti lakṣaṇa eka deśa yogāt ca hetu vat ābhāsanam ahetoḥ api upapadyate sakala lakṣaṇa apāye api paṃcamī nirdeśa ādiḥ bhrama hetuḥ iti eke savyabhicāra ādi pada paryanta vartinī tu sā eva śrutiḥ vibhāgam avagamayati pramāṇa śruti vat iti uktam pakṣa dharma tā ādi lakṣaṇānām ca krama niyama abhāvāt sādhya sama viruddha savyabhicāra atīta kāla prakaraṇa samāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti pāṭhaḥ na āśritaḥ 
[II,604,iii_II,605,i]	nanu trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti śākyāḥ na pratyakṣa āgama bādhitasya ca hetoḥ pūrvam pradarśita tvāt nanu ekasya eva rūpa dvaya vaikalyāt katham na ṣaṣṭha ādayaḥ tad prabhedāḥ syuḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti eṣa hi pakṣe vṛtti abhāvāt asiddhaḥ ucyatām uta sāmānya ādeḥ vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ savyabhicāraḥ uta jāti antaram eva tābhyām iti na etat evam eka eka rūpa apāya nimitta bheda paṃcaka pratipādane kṛte dvi tri rūpa apāyāt na rūpa antaram avatarati kintu teṣām eva samāveśaḥ syāt api ca prathama gṛhīta anyatama rūpa vaikalya labdha eka hetvābhāsa rūpe asmin kim rūpa antara nirūpaṇena ityāḥ tām etat 
[II,605,ii]	nanu aprayojakaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ samasti iti na punar api paṃcatvam na tasya anyathā siddha tvena asiddhaḥ eva antarbhāvam vakṣyāmaḥ avāntara bheda vivakṣāyām tu hetvābhāsānām iyattā niścayaḥ na śakya kriyaḥ na ca sa prayojanaḥ iti paṃca eva hetvābhāsāḥ iti siddham 
[II,605,iii_II,605,iv]	teṣām savyabhicāraḥ tāvat ucyate anaikāntikaḥ savyabhicāraḥ vyabhicāraḥ ekatra vyavasthā aniyamaḥ tena saha vartate iti savyabhicāraḥ vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ iti arthaḥ ekasmin ante bhavan aikāntikaḥ tad viparyāyāt anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva arthaḥ evam iha lakṣya lakṣaṇa padayoḥ yathākāma mabhyupagamaḥ na pratyakṣa ādi vat vyavasthayā 
[II,605,v]	savyabhicāra pade lakṣya abhidhāyini lakṣaṇa vacanam anaikāntika padam anaikāntika pade tu lakṣya vācini sa vyabhicāra padam lakṣaṇa pratipādakam prasiddhi aprasiddhi vibhāga apekṣayā pika kokila vat draṣṭavyam pikaḥ kokilaḥ iti ukte yasya pika śabda arthaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tatas kokila śabda artham avabhotsyate prasiddha kokila śabda arthaḥ tu pika śabda artham iti 
[II,606,i]	āha bhavatu evam idam tu cintyatām anaikāntikaḥ iti kim ayam paryudāsaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ vā kiṃca atas paryudāsa pakṣe sva pakṣa niyatāt aikāntikāt anyaḥ yaḥ saḥ eva anaikāntikaḥ iti saḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt prasajya pratiṣedhe tu aikāntika abhāvasya nivṛtti rūpasya hetvābhāsa tā bhavet na lakṣya tvena abhimatasya vipakṣa vṛtteḥ hetu antarasya prameya tva ādeḥ iti ucyate praśnaḥ eva ayam anupapannaḥ saṃśayānaḥ hiparam pṛcchati saṃśayaḥ ca ubhayathā darśanāt bhavati na ca nāma pada saṃbaddhasya nañaḥ dvayī vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā aśrāddha bhojī ityādau hi bhujinā nan saṃbadhyate śrāddha na bhuṅkte iti na tu nāmnā śrāddhena iti 
[II,606,ii]	ākhyātena api prayojyamānaḥ kvacid prakaraṇa sāmarthya anurodhāt pratyaya artha saṃbandham avadhūya dhātu artham eva kevalam āliṅgan paryudāsa vṛttiḥ bhavati na īkṣeta udyantam ādityam iti na tu nāmnā saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacid api paryudāsa vṛttim ullaṅghya prasajya pratiṣedha mātra para tām abalambamānaḥ dṛśyate abrāhmaṇa ādau sarvatra tad anya avagati darśanāt iti kutastyaḥ saṃśayaḥ 
[II,606,iii]	athavā kim anayā avāntara cintayā yathā pṛṣṭam kṛtaḥ eva uttaram ucyate ekasmin anitya pakṣe nitya pakṣe vā niyataḥ ekāntikaḥ eka pakṣa vṛttiḥ ucyate tatas anyaḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttiḥ anekāntikaḥ bhavati evam na sarve hetvābhāsāḥ pakṣa dvaya vṛttayaḥ iti na saṃkhyā hāniḥ atas paryudāsa pakṣe tāvat na doṣaḥ 
[II,607,i_II,607,ii]	prasajya pratiṣedhe api aikāntikaḥ na bhavati yaḥ saḥ eva ahetuḥ iti na nivṛtti mātra paratvam aśrāddhabhojī iti kṛtā puruṣaḥ ucyate na śrāddha bhojana abhāva mātram evam iha api tad hitena ekānta niyata tā pratiṣedha viśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ eva ucyate na abhāva mātram iti evam ubhayathā api na doṣaḥ tasya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameya tvāt iti eṣa hi nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ anyatarasmin api na niyataḥ iti vipakṣa vṛtti tvāt anaikāntikaḥ uktaḥ bhavati 
[II,607,iii_II,607,iv]	nanu ṣaṣ prakāraḥ paraiḥ anaikāntikaḥ iṣyate sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ vipakṣa vyāpī vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sa pakṣa vyāpī ubhaya pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ ubhaya pakṣa vyāpī iti sādhāraṇaḥ catuṣprakāraḥ asādhāraṇaḥ viruddha avyabhicārī ca iti sa katham iha na nirdiśyate ucyate sa pakṣa vyāpti ādi bheda darśanam tāvat aprayojanakam aśakyam ca hetvābhāsānām avāntara bheda ānantyāt vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ yasya na asti sa savyabhicāraḥ iti anyatama hetu rūpa rahita tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam iha vivakṣitam tat ca uktam eva kim avāntara bheda parigaṇanena asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāriṇau tu na saṃstaḥ eva hetvābhāsau iti na vyākhyāyete 
[II,608,i_II,608,ii]	nanu sādhāraṇa vadasā dhāraṇasya api gandhavat tva ādeḥ saṃśaya hetu tva darśanāt katham asaṃbhavaḥ aneka dharma upapatteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api vyākhyātaḥ eva na etat evam ubhaya viśeṣa sahacarita dharma darśanam hi tad anusmaraṇa yuktena saṃśayam upajanayati asādhāraṇaḥ tu asādhāraṇa tvāt eva na tad sahacaraḥ kadācid upalabdhaḥ iti katham saṃśaya hetuḥ katham tarhi aneka dharna upapatteḥ iti varṇyate varṇitam etat vastunaḥ hi viśeṣa dharmaḥ kaścid asādhāraṇaḥ kena api dharma antareṇa sahacaritaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ aya śabde vibhāma gajatva ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ kenacid dharma antareṇa dravya tvena guṇa tvena vā sahacaritaḥ bhavet iti ittham aneka dharma upapatteḥ saṃśayaḥ varṇitaḥ 
[II,608,iii]	tat iha api gandhavat tvam asādhāraṇam eva yadi saṃśaya hetu tayā varṇyate tarhi sādhāraṇāt vastu dharma tvāt eva saṃśayaḥ bhavet nāsā dhāraṇāt gandhavat tvāt na hi tat nitya anityayoḥ anyatareṇa api sahacaritam upalabdham vastu dharmaḥ tu dharma antara anuyāyī dṛśyate iti vastu dharma tvam eva tad kāraṇam atas nityā bhūḥ gandhavat tvāt iti asādhāraṇa anaikāntikaḥ na vaktavyaḥ 
[II,608,iv_II,608,v]	viruddha avyabhicarī api na vācyaḥ eva ekatra dharmiṇi paraspara viruddha dvaya prayojaka hetu dvaya upanipātasya anupapatteḥ nanu pratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ sparśavat tvāt ghaṭa vat apratyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ arūpa tvāt ākāśa vat iti asti hetu dvaya sannipātaḥ te eva ca viruddha avyabhicāryucyate iti atra tāvat etat eva vaktavyam kaḥ ayam apūrvaḥ prāmāṇika vyavahāraḥ īdṛśaḥ yat anumānena pratyakṣa tvam apratyakṣa tvam vā sādhyate iti indriya ja pramiti viṣayaḥ hi arthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bhavati saḥ eṣa vāyuḥ yadi indriya je pratyaye pratibhāti eva kim anumānena atha tatra na pratibhāti tathā api kim anumānena iti 
[II,609,i]	kiṃca anayoḥ anyataraḥ hetuḥ avaśyam aprayojakaḥ vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ hetau ca prayukte tad guṇa doṣa parīkṣaṇam eva prativādī vidhattām kaḥ avasaraḥ pratihetu upanyāsasya viḍambana arthaḥ taṭupa nyāsaḥ iti ced na viḍambana upanyāsasya jāti uttara prakāra tvāt iha ca hetvābhāsāḥ vāstavāḥ eva anumāna doṣāḥ ekatra prayojaka vṛddha hetu dvaya samāveśa asaṃbhavasya ukta tvāt katham tarhi prakaraṇa samaḥ iti ced tatra eva viśeṣam vakṣyāmaḥ 
[II,609,ii_II,610,i]	atha hetu prayoga rahita ubhaya va ādi parigṛhīta pakṣa pratipakṣa upanyāsa mātram viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ rūpam ucyate saḥ ayam vipratipatteḥ sa śayaḥ bhavati na hetvābhāsāt asmāt iti api ca yadi saṃśaya janaka tvam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam ucyeta kāmam asādhāraṇasya vā viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ vā yathā tathā saṃśaya hetu tām adhiropya kathyatām anaikāntika tā na tu saṃśaya janaka tvam tad lakṣaṇam indriyāḥ deḥ api tad janaka tvena tathā abhāva prasakteḥ api tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvam anaikānti kalakṣaṇam sa tu pakṣa dvaya vṛtti tvāt saṃśayam api janayati iti vastu svabhāvaḥ ayam atas asādhāraṇa viruddha avyabhicāriṇoḥ kathaṃcid saṃśaya hetu tve api pakṣa dvaya vṛtti abhāvat na anaikāntika varge antarbhāvaḥ kva tarhi tau antar bhaviṣyataḥ jāti uttarāṇām ānantyāt teṣu iti vakṣyāmaḥ tasmāt asādhāraṇa saṃjñakasya hetoḥ viruddha avi abhicāriṇaḥ vā vipakṣa vṛtti tvam atarkayantaḥ vadanti anaikāntika tām na tad jñāḥ 
[II,610,ii_II,610,iv]	siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ vṛtti avṛttī hetoḥ lakṣaṇam te yasya viparyaste dṛśyete yaḥ sa pakṣe na vartate vipakṣe ca vartate saḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ bhavati saḥ ayam ucyate siddhāntam abhyupetya iti siddhānta śabdaḥ yadi api dharma viśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vyākhyātaḥ ayam ittham iti abhyupagama viṣayīkṛtaḥ arthaḥ siddhānte iti tathā api iha tad eka deśa sādhya dharma viṣayaḥ lakṣyate tam siddhāntam sādhya dharmam abhyupagamya yaḥ viruṇaddhi vyāhanti tad viparyayam sādhayati sa viruddhaḥ iti arthaḥ 
[II,610,v]	nanu samāna kartṛkayoḥ ktvā apratyayaḥ smaryate iha ca hetoḥ acetanasya abhyupagamena kartṛ tva asaṃbhavāt puruṣaḥ tad kartā bhavet siddhāntam ca viruṇaddhi hetuḥ iti bhinnakakatṛ tvam ucyate ucyate samāna kartṛka tva siddhaye hetoḥ eva abhyupagame kartṛ tvam upacārāt varṇayiṣyate hetu balāt puruṣeṇa abhyupagamaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ hetunava kṛtaḥ bhavati evam ca saḥ eva abhyupagantā saḥ eva viruṇaddhi iti na bhinna kartṛka tvam 
[II,611,i_II,611,ii]	nanu upacāra parigrahaḥ ced abhimataḥ tat atra tritayam vaktavyam mukhye arthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ nimittam prayojanam ca iti mukhye arthe pramāṇa bādhaḥ uktaḥ eva hetoḥ acetana tvam nimittam api asti hetu sādhanakaḥ hi abhyupagamaḥ iti prayojanam tu viśeṣa viruddhānām hetvābhāsa tva nivāraṇam siddhānta śabdasya api samudāya vācinaḥ yat eka deśe avasthāpanam tasya api viśeṣa viruddha vyavacchedaḥ eva phalam 
[II,611,iii]	viśeṣa viruddhānām hi hetvābhāsa tva abhyupagame sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ na hi tathāvidhaḥ hetuḥ iha jagati kaścid avāpyate yaḥ sādhya siddhaye abhidhīyamānaḥ dharmasya vā dharmiṇaḥ vā viśeṣam na kaṃcana bādhate tathā hi anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti sakala tākika gṛha prasiddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ anitya tām sādhayan api yat yat kṛtakam tat tat aśrāvaṇam dṛṣṭam yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sa vyoma viśeṣa guṇaḥ na bhavati iti dharmiṇaḥ viśeṣam bādhataḥ eva iti ahetuḥ syāt na ca evam yuktam iti na viśeṣaviruddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ kintu sādhya svarūpa viparyaya sādhane eva iti 
[II,612,i]	atas eva yathā tīrtha antare varṇyate viruddhaḥ catuṣprakāraḥ dharma svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharma viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ dharmi viśeṣa viparīta sādhanaḥ iti tathā iha na iṣyate atiprasaṅgasya darśita tvāt iti asya udāharaṇam nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ityādi 
[II,612,ii]	nanu ekaika lakṣaṇa apāyāt paṃca hetvābhāsāḥ iti uktam asya ca hetoḥ ubhe lakṣaṇe na staḥ yathā hi asya sa pakṣe vṛttiḥ na asti tathā vipakṣāt api vyāvattiḥ yadi hi sa pakṣāt iva vipakṣāt api vyāvṛttaḥ eṣa bhavet gandhavat tva vadasā dhāraṇaḥ eva syāt iti satyam evam vipakṣāt avyāvṛttiḥ vyabhicāram prati prayojaka tām pratipadyate pratipakṣa gāmī hi vyabhicaritaḥ iti ucyate sa pakṣe vṛtti vicchedaḥ tu viparyaya siddhau prayojakaḥ iti satyām api vipakṣa vṛttau sa pakṣa vṛtti viccheda nibandhanam eva asya viruddha tvam ucyate vipakṣāt apracyutaḥ su asādhyam eva na sādhayet sa pakṣe tu avartamānaḥ asau viparītam api sādhayati iti tad lakṣaṇa apāya kṛtam eva asya viruddha tvam ācakṣate iti alam sūkṣma īkṣikayā tat idam uktam siddhāntam abhyupetya tad virodhī viruddhaḥ iti 
[II,612,iii]	anye tu anyathā vyācakṣate kila sādhya dharma viparyaya sādhaka vat apasiddhānta pratijñā virodha ādayaḥ api siddhānta virodhinaḥ saṃgṛhītum yuktāḥ eva te ca evam vyākhyāyamāne na saṃgṛhītāḥ syuḥ ktvā pratyaya siddhānta śabdau ca na samanvitau syātām tasmāt abhyupagata siddhānta virodhī iti sūtra arthe varṇite abhyupagatam siddhāntam yaḥ viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ tad kāla upātta pratijñā viṣayīkṛtam vā avasara antara vyavasthāpitam vā iti etat saṃgrahaḥ ca kṛtaḥ bhaviṣyati siddhānta śabdaḥ ca na saṅka ucitaḥ bhaviṣyati ktvā pratyayaḥ tu asaṅgata tvāt upekṣyate eva bhinna kartṛka tvāt ānantaryasya gamyamānasya ca anupayukta tvāt iti 
[II,613,i]	tathā ca bhāṣya kāreṇa aviśeṣeṇa pūrva abhyupagata siddhānta viruddham eva udāharaṇam uktam saḥ ayam vikāraḥ vyakteḥ apaiti nitya tva pratiṣedhāt apetaḥ api asti vināśa pratiṣedhāt iti atra hi pratiṣiddha nitya dharma tvāt iti ayam hetuḥ vyakteḥ apetaḥ api vikāraḥ api asti iti amum siddhāntam viruṇadi anena vā viruddhi atas iti 
[II,613,ii]	etat tva hṛdayaṅgamam iva vyākhyānam apasiddhānta pratijñā virodha ādeḥ nigraha sthāna sūtre hetvābhāsebhyaḥ pṛthak upadeśāt kim iha tad saṅgraheṇa pratyuta saṅgrahaḥ eva doṣaḥ yaḥ hi mīmāṃsakaḥ aham iti abhyupagamya anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti brūyāt na tasya ayam hetuḥ viruddhaḥ bhavet api tu apasiddhāntana eva asau nigṛhyeta tasmāt sādhya viparyaya sādhanaḥ eva viruddhaḥ ucyate na tu pūrva abhyupagata sva siddhānta viruddhaḥ 
[II,614,i_II,614,ii]	na ca nirabhiprāyaḥ eva sūtra kṛtā ktvā anirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ kintu tatas pratīyamānam ānantaryam api apekṣamāṇena yaḥ hi siddhāntam abhyupetya pratijñāya tad sidhi artha tayā upādīyamānaḥ tam eva viruṇaddhi sa viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ iti prāktanam eva vyākhyānam anavadyam atas pratijñā viparīta sādhanāt viruddha tām eti na hetuḥ anyathā viśeṣa bādha ādi nibandhanam punar cahu prakāra tvam asuṣya na iṣyate 
[II,614,iii_II,614,iv]	yasmāt prakaraṇa cintā sa nirṇaya artham upadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ ekaika lakṣaṇa apāya nimitta hetu ābhāsa paṃcaka pratijñānāt asat pratipakṣa tva lakṣaṇa vaikalyāt kila prakaraṇa samaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sa ca na saṃbhavati sa pratipakṣasya hetoḥ abhāvāt advyātmaka tvāt hi vastūnām ekatra paraspara virodhi dharma dvaya prayojaka hetu samāveśaḥ na asti iti asakṛt uktam atas eva hi viruddha avyabhicārī nirastaḥ anumāna viruddham anumānam ca neṣyate eva tat kutas sa pratipakṣaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ atas ca lakṣya abhāvāt kasya idam lakṣaṇam iti atra āha yasmāt ityādi 
[II,615,i_II,615,ii]	vicāryamāṇau prāc ukta lakṣaṇakau pakṣapati pakṣau prakaraṇam tasya cintā saṃśayāt prabhṛti ānirṇayāt yadi api bhavati tathā api iha vimarśa ātmikā eva gṛhyate sā yasmāt bhavati kasmāt ca sā bhavati viśeṣa anupalambhāt saḥ eva viśeṣa anupalambhaḥ yadi nirṇaya artham upadiśyate tad prakaraṇam anativartamāna tvāt prakaraṇa samaḥ bhavati nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti saḥ ayam sa pratipakṣaḥ hetuḥ iha lakṣyaḥ vidyate 
[II,615,iii_II,615,iv]	na ca dravya ātmakāni vastūni pramātāraḥ tu rūpam eṣām niyatam avadhārayitu maśaknuvante evam bhrāmyanti iti tathā hi ekaḥ tad viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan tathā iti sādhyam budhyeta tathā eva param pratyāyayet iti itaraḥ api dvitīya viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ sādhana tām buddhvā pratyavasthānam ca karoti iti sva pratipatti sākṣikaḥ eva eṣa prakaraṇa samaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ 
[II,616,i]	tathā ca na tāvat ayam samyak hetuḥ pratipakṣa upahata tvena sva sādhya upasthāna sāmarthya śūnya tvāt hetvābhāsaḥ api bhavat na tāvat asiddhaḥ sādhye dharmiṇi śabde anupalabhyamāna nitya dharma tvasya hetoḥ sadbhāvāt na api viruddhaḥ sādhya viparyaya sādhana nimitta bhūta sapakṣa vṛtti aviyoga anupapatteḥ na api anaikāntikaḥ pakṣa dvaya sādhāraṇa tva anavadhāraṇāt saṃśaya janaka tvam tu na tasya lakṣaṇam iti uktam eva
