[II,616,ii]	nanu ekasmin pakṣe niyataḥ aikāntika tad viparyayāt anaikātikaḥ sa ca ayam nitya anitya pakṣayoḥ anyataratra api na niyataḥ iti anaikāntikaḥ eva syāt api ca āhuḥ aprāmāṇyam tridhā bhinnam mithyātva ajñāna saṃśayaiḥ iti tatra yathā indiyādeḥ abodhaka tvāt vā saṃśaya viparyaya svabhāva avabhāsa samutpādana daurātmyāt vā bhavati aprāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ evam anumānam api tena eva vartmanā pramāṇa ābhāsa tām abalambate 
[II,616,iii_II,617,ii]	tatra asiddhaḥ tāvat alabhamānaḥ dharmiṇi vṛttim tatra sādhya dharma dhiyam ādhātu manadhikṛtaḥ iti ajñāna phala tvāt aprāmāṇya phalam anubhavati viruddhaḥ tu viparyaya sādhanaḥ iti bhavantaḥ eva pratipannāḥ saṃśaya janakaḥ tu anaikāntikaḥ bhavitum arhati na tu pāribhāṣika vipakṣa vṛtti tvam eva tasya lakṣaṇam ucitam ubhayam api ca anyatara pakṣa niyama virahita tanuḥ iti kim iti na bhavati vimarśam upadadhat anaikāntikaḥ iti trayaḥ eva hetvābhāsāḥ 
[II,617,iii]	ucyate na phala niyamena lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ kartum śakyate yadi api dvividham trividham bhavati apramāṇa phalam tathā api na tri lakṣaṇake liṅge avinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate api tu paṃca lakṣaṇakaḥ iti prasādhitaḥ ayam arthaḥ tad vaikalyāt ca hetvābhāsānām api paṃcatvam eva phalam tu dvividham astu trividham vā na hi apratipatti janakam kiṃcid liṅgam upalabhāmahe na ca apratipattiḥ prayatna janyā prāgabhāvasya nisarga siddha tvāt iti alam avāntara cintanena 
[II,617,iv]	na phala apekṣaḥ liṅga lakṣaṇa niyamaḥ tatra yathā pakṣa dharma rahita tvam asiddha lakṣaṇam evam vyatireka vaikalyam anaikāntika lakṣaṇam eṣa ca hetuḥ pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām anyatamena api rūpeṇa na vikalaḥ iti katham anai kāntika tām pratipadyeta vyasta tāyām hi sarvāṇi etāni santi lakṣaṇāni samastaḥ tu na upanyastaḥ eva hetu tvena nitya anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ iti 
[II,617,v_II,618,i]	nanu yadi asya pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāḥ nirapavādāḥ santi katham tarhi na hetuḥ eva ayam itarasi api pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatirekāṇām nirapavādānām asaṃbhavāt saḥ api na katham hetuḥ astu iti ced na vastunaḥ dvairūpya anupapatteḥ evam imau hetū pakṣa dvaye api buddhim janayantau saṃśayam āvahataḥ na anaikāntika vat vipakṣa vṛtti tvena iti hetvābhāsa antara tvam evaṃvidhasya ca asya prakaraṇa samasya viruddhāvyabhicārī iti nāma yadi kriyate tat api bhavatu na punar anaikāntika prabheda tām abalambate tad lakṣaṇā saṃsparśāt ubhaya pratīti janakau hi imau hetū bhavataḥ na ubhaya pakṣa vṛtti iti 
[II,618,ii]	na api ayam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ anyatarasya api bādhakasya anu palambhāt anumānam tu na anumānasya bādhakam bhavitum kṣamam iti uktam na ca itaretarava ādi apekṣayā anayoḥ asiddha tvam abhidheyam saṃśaya janaka tve anubhava siddhe sati viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ apratyākhyeya tvāt 
[II,618,iii_II,619,i]	nanu niścitasya sādhana prayoga adhikārāt kathaṃcid tā vat sādhanam prayuṃjīta niścita tve ca tad dharma anupalabdhyoḥ parasparam asiddha tvam sthitam eva na etat evam anyatara dharma anupalabdheḥ eva pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyatirekāt paśyan asau niścita tām prāptaḥ na dvitīya dharma anupalabdheḥ asiddha tām buddhyamānaḥ atas eva bhrānti mūlaḥ eṣa hetvābhāsaḥ dvitīya dharma anupalabdhi siddha tva niścaye tu samyak hetuḥ eva syāt tad asiddha tvānavadhāraṇe api asau svasya hetoḥ trairūpya darśanāt niścita matiḥ bhūtvā sādhanam prayuṃjānaḥ itareṇa tathā eva niścita matinā pratiprayoge kṛte tasya api trairūpyam upalabhamānaḥ saṃśayam adhi gacchati iti alam prasaṅgena tat evam asiddha ādi lakṣaṇa vaiparītyāt prati iti anuguṇaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ nāma asaddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ 
[II,619,ii_II,619,iii]	apare punar udāharaṇa antaram asya vyāharanti nityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣasapakṣa yoḥ anyatara tvāt ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt eva ghaṭa vat iti nanu pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ vā syāt sa pakṣaḥ vā syāt na tṛtīyaḥ na hi mitrāvarupayoḥ anyataraḥ somaḥ bhavatum arhati tatra pakṣenyatara śabda vācye ananvayaḥ na hi śabda ākhyaḥ pakṣaḥ dharmī dharmi antare vartate sa pakṣe tu anyatama abhidheye pakṣa dharma tā na asti na hi ākāśa ādiḥ sa pakṣaḥ śabda ākhye dharmiṇi vartate 
[II,619,iv]	ucyate na pakṣa tvāt iti hetuḥ prayuktaḥ sa pakṣa tvāt iti vā yena evam syāt pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyatara tvāt iti tat ca dvayoḥ api kim api sādhāraṇam rūpam na hi varuṇaḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti yādṛśī buddhiḥ tādṛśi eva mitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ yaṣṭavyaḥ iti viśeṣa niṣṭhatāyām tu balāt āpādyamānāyām sakala anumāna ucchedaḥ na ca anyatara tvam śabda mātra āropitam rūpam avāstavam iti vaditum ucitam artha asaṃsparśitāyāḥ pratikṣipta tvāt 
[II,620,i_II,620,ii]	anyataratva āditya siddhaḥ hetuḥ iti ced kila pakṣaḥ eva ayam na pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ iti tat ayuktam yatas eva ayam pakṣaḥ tatas eva ayam pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ na hi apakṣaḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ anyataraḥ syāt na hi avaruṇaḥ mitrāvaruṇayoḥ anyataraḥ iti uktam eva pakṣaḥ api ca bhavan eṣaḥ na pakṣa tvāt iti anena rūpeṇa hetūkriyate kintu anyatara tvāt iti ittham ca hetūkaraṇe na ekaḥ api doṣaḥ iti 
[II,620,iii_II,620,v]	aparam udāharaṇam san sarvajñaḥ itaratad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt ghaṭa vat asan sarvajñaḥ itaratad viparīta vinirmukta tvāt khara viṣāṇa vat iti atra api ākṣepa pratisamādhāna prakāraḥ pūrvavat anusaraṇīyaḥ dharmya siddha tā ādi ca yatnatas paricintanīyam evaṃjātīyakam tu udāharaṇam na anumodante matimantaḥ yatra hi hetunā svayam artham samyak asamyak vā anumāya pramātā para pratyāyanāya tam eva hetum prayuṃjīta sa prayujyamānaḥ vastu bala pravṛtta tayā hetūbhavati hetvābhāsībhavati vā 
[II,620,vi]	tathā hi āroha pariṇāhavati puras ava asthite dharmiṇi sthāṇu gata viśeṣa anupalambhāt ekasya puruṣaḥ iti bhavati pratītiḥ itarasya tu puruṣa gata viśeṣa anupalabdheḥ sthāṇuḥ iti bhavati matiḥ evam ca yadā asau ekaḥ puruṣa tva siddhaye param prati sthāṇu dharma agrahaṇam hetu tvena brūyāt itaraḥ api puruṣa dharma agrahaṇena sthāṇutām pratiṣṭhāpayan pratyavatiṣṭheta tadā sva prati iti anusaraṇa pura smara sādhana abhidhānāt bhrānti saṃbhavāt ca yuktam tathāvidha udāharaṇa kīrtanam evam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ākāśa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya dharma anupalabdheḥ ghaṭa vat iti api draṣṭavyam 
[II,621,i_II,621,ii]	yaḥ tu na vastu mūlaḥ kevala utprekṣā mātra ābalambanaḥ sva pratītiṣu na dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ kim tad upanyāsena etena sa dvitīya prayogāḥ api pratyuktāḥ yathā kvacid sādhana prayoga kṛte sati tatra evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate prastuta sādhya dharma adhikaraṇa tva śūnya dharmi ghaṭā anyatarasa dvitīyaḥ ghaṭaḥ anutpanna tvāt kuḍya vat iti yathā prastutena siṣā dhayiṣitena dharmeṇa śūnyaḥ yaḥ prakṛtaḥ dharmī ghaṭaḥ ca tayoḥ anyatareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ ayam ghaṭa ākhyaḥ dharmī tatra hetuḥ anutpanna tvam tasya kuḍya ādau vyāptiḥ iti 
[II,621,iii_II,621,iv]	satyam vadata yadi asti loke kvacid īdṛśaḥ pratīti kramaḥ ghaṭaḥ ca dharmī dharmi ghaṭayoḥ anyatareṇa sa dvitīyaḥ iti atra anyatara śabdaḥ sāmānya vacanaḥ api dharmiṇi vyākhyeyaḥ na hi ghaṭaḥ eva ghaṭena sa dvitīyaḥ bhavitum arhati iti alam alīka kalpanā kauśala pratyākhyānena samyak vā yadi vā anyathā vidadhate ye hetavaḥ saṃvidam dṛṣṭāḥ sva ātmani te prayoktum ucitāḥ kāmam para jñaptaye ye tu sva pratipattim eva na tathā kartum kṣamāḥ kalpanā sāmarthya utthita vastu śūnya ghaṭanāḥ kim tad prayoge phalam 
[II,622,i]	ye tu sūkṣma utprekṣaṇa kṣama prajñā atiśaya abhimāna durvidagdhāḥ tathāvidhān api prayuṃjate kṛtakaracanā cāturyam taiḥ pradarśitam ātmanaḥ bhavati na punar śuddhiḥ kācid prameya diśaḥ kṛtā kvacid avasare evaṃprāyāḥ para bhrama kāriṇaḥ kila sa phala tām dadhyuḥ jalpe yathā kathitam purā tatra tu etān kathayati paraḥ prājña mānī yadā vā tasya ākhyeyaḥ nipuṇa matinā pūrva nītyā samādhiḥ drādhīyasyā tad alam anayā tārki kam manya goṣṭhyā hetvābhāsaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ tu eṣa nirṇītaḥ eva 
[II,622,ii_II,623,i]	sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ sādhya tvāt sādhya samaḥ anyataravādi prasiddham anyataram prati yat sādhayitum upādīyate tat sādhyam tat aviśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ sādhya samaḥ katham sādhyena tulya tā hetoḥ iti ced āha sādhya tvāt iti yathā sādhyam asiddha tvāt sādhyam tathā tad sidhi artham upāttaḥ hetuḥ apiyaḥ asiddha tvāt sādhyaḥ saḥ sādhya aviśiṣṭa tvāt sādhya samaḥ ucyate etat ca anyatara asiddhasya eva lakṣaṇam yathā mīmāṃsakam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti na cākṣuṣa tva ādeḥ ubhaya asiddhasya sādhya tvam saṃbhavati iti atas sakala asiddha bhada saṅgrahāya sādhya tvāt iti etat pada rahitam sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ iti eva asiddha lakṣaṇam upavarṇanīyam 
[II,623,ii]	sādhyasya ca rūpa dvayam asti asiddha tvam sādhya tvam ca tatra asiddha tvam eva bhavati tava viśiṣṭa tva kāraṇam iha āśrīyate sarva asiddha bheda sādhāraṇam na tu sādhya tvam anyatara asiddhi eka lagnam iti evaṃcāsiddhatvam eva asiddhasya lakṣaṇam uktam bhavati pakṣa dharma tvam yasya na asti sādhye dharmiṇi yaḥ na vartate hetuḥ saḥ asiddhaḥ iti 
[II,623,iii]	tasya tu bhūyāṃsaḥ bhedāḥ bhavanti hetu svarūpe tāvat anyatarasya vādinoḥ dvayoḥ vā ajñānam saṃdehaḥ viparyayaḥ iti tathā tad āśraye api dharmiṇi ekasya vā dvayoḥ vā tathā eva ajñāna sandeha viparyayāḥ iti bhūyasi ca pakṣīkṛte arthe tad eka deśe kvacid vṛttiḥ tad itaratra āvṛttiḥ iti eka deśa vṛttau api dvayoḥ ekasya vā tathā eva ajñāna saṃśaya viparyayāḥ iti evam prakāra bheda udāharaṇa varṇanam alpa prayojanam iti na prastūyate 
[II,623,iv]	anyatara asiddhe tu na vivadante pramāṇasya apakṣa pāti tvāt yadi tāvat kṛtaka tvam śabde pramāṇataḥ niścitam tarhi mīmāṃsakasya api tārkikasya iva tat siddham eva atha tatra kṛtaka tva niścaya nipuṇam na asti eva pramāṇam tadā tārkikaḥ api tūṣṇīm āstām dvayoḥ api asau cākṣuṣa tva ādi vat na siddhaḥ hetuḥ vāc mātreṇa tu asiddhi katha nam asāṃpratam atiprasaṅgāt iti 
[II,624,i]	satyam evam na sarvadā anyatara asiddhasya hetvābhāsa tvam samabhidadhmahe kintu kiṃcid kālam iti yadā ekena vādinā hetau prayukte dvitīyaḥ vadati mām prati na siddhaḥ eṣa hetuḥ iti tadā hetoḥ prayoktrā tad sādhanam abhidheyam anabhidhānāt sa parājīyate sādhane tu tena ukte tad asiddha tā udbhā vana vādī parājīyate iti yāvat tad siddhau na upanyastam sādhanam tāvat eva asau anyatara asiddhaḥ anantaram tu samyak hetuḥ ubhaya asiddhaḥ vā bhaviṣyati iti 
[II,624,ii_II,624,iii]	vyadhikaraṇa asiddhiḥ tu yathā ukta bheda antargataḥ eva yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt iti kvacid punar ca vyadhikaraṇa asiddhaḥ api bhavati gamakaḥ iti eke tat yathā bahala bahalaḥ pracala jala dhara śyāmala vapuḥ ambara talam ākrāman dhūma prabandhaḥ kṣoṇī dhrakandara ādi pradeśa dharma tvānavadhāraṇe api tatra gamayitum alam analam iti yadā vai agni māneṣu deśaḥ dhūma upalabdheḥ iti prayujyeta tadā upalabdhe rātma dharma tayā vaiyadhikaraṇye api gamaka tā asti iti 
[II,625,i_II,625,ii]	anye tu anyathā siddha tvam nāma tad bhedam udāharanti yasya hetoḥ dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ bhavanti api sādhya dharma pravṛttā na bhavati saḥ anyathā asiddhaḥ yathā anityāḥ manaḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti nanu katham ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ ucyate kim iti sat hetuḥ eva na bhavati kim paramāṇuṣu mūrta tvam na vartate kim ghaṭa ādau anitya tayā vyāptam na dṛśyate kim ākāśa ādeḥ kha puṣpa ādeḥ vā vipakṣān na pracyavate kim pratyakṣeṇa āgamena vā bādhyate kim pratipakṣeṇa prabādhyate yena ābhāsa tām bhajate na pratibandha abhāvāt 
[II,625,iii]	nanu paṃcānām pratibandha lakṣaṇānām katama dasya ślathībhūtam na anyatamasya api śaithilyam brūmaḥ tat kim paṃcasu api lakṣaṇeṣu na parisamāptaḥ pratibandhaḥ na na parisamāptaḥ kā tarhi iyam viḍambanā paṃcasu lakṣaṇeṣu pratibandhaḥ parisamāpyate tāni ca asya santi eva na ca eṣa pratibandhaḥ iti kaitavam ucyate prayojya prayojaka bhāvena sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ dhūma agni vat pratibandhaḥ avadhāryate sa ca atra prayojya prayojaka bhāvaḥ na asti iti atas eva ayam anyathā siddhaḥ aprayojakaḥ iti kathyate 
[II,625,iv_II,626,i]	katham punar asya aprayojaka tvam avagatam ucyate mūrta tvam hi sarva gata itara dravya parimāṇa viśeṣa ādi dharmaḥ vastu svabhāva mātra nibandhanaḥ na kṛtaka tva ādi vat anityatām prayoktum utsahate tathā hi paramāṇuṣu siddheṣu satsu tatra varta mānam mūrta tvam anitya tām sādhayet anyathātva āśraya asiddha tām upeyāt sidhyante eva ca sāvayava kārya anumāna mārgeṇa loṣṭa pravibhaṃga avabhāsamāna bhāga paramparā parikalpana krameṇa vā paramāṇavaḥ niravayavāḥ siddhyanti sāvayava tve hi tad avayavāḥ paramāṇavaḥ bhaveyu na te teṣām api avayava antara parikalpanāyām api avayavānām ānantyāviśeṣat sarṣapasya meroḥ ca sāmyam āpadyate na ca tat asti tat evam niravayaveṣu parama aṇuṣu nisarga siddham anāśrita tvam atas ca āśraya vināśa avayava vibhāga ādi vināśa kāraṇa abhāvāt svābhāvika vināśa vāda nirākaraṇāt ca katham paramāṇūn anitya tā spṛśet mūrta tvam tu vastu dharma tvāt bhavat api prameya tvāt na prayojakam iyān tu viśeṣaḥ prameya ṛtvaḥ ubhaya pakṣa sparśāt anaikāntikam bhavat aprayaḥ jakam idam tu mūrta tvam anitya vyatiriktaḥ tu antara paricaya virahitam api na prayojakam iti 
[II,626,ii]	nanu idam api prameya tva vat vipakṣa vṛttyā iva mūrta tvam kva vipakṣe vartate paramāṇuṣu eva nanu teṣām pakṣīkṛta tvāt katham vipakṣatā na puruṣa icchā anurodhena vastu viparivartate vipakṣaḥ hi nāma saḥ ucyate yaḥ siṣā dhayiṣita dharma viparīta dharma adhyāsita tayā dṛḍha pramāṇa siddhaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ca ete anantara nirdiṣṭa nīti krameṇa nirṇīta nitya tvāḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣāḥ eva anitya tva vādinaḥ sa tu rāga dveṣa kaluṣita hṛdaya tayā yadi tāvat pakṣatayā bravīti bravītu nāma na tu su spaṣṭā siddha nityatānām vipakṣa bhāvaḥ nivartate iti 
[II,627,i_II,627,ii]	tat idam anupapannam anena krameṇa dhūma anumānasya api anaikāntika tva prasaṅgāt dhūmaḥ hi mahībhṛti hutavaha virahita vapuṣi vipakṣe vartate eva na tatra citrabhānoḥ abhāvaḥ niścitaḥ iti ced kinnu khalu sadbhāvaḥ asya tatra gṛhītaḥ tathā sati vā kṛtam anumānena atha sattvam asat tvam vā na avadhāritam eva dharādhare dhūmaketoḥ tarhi sandigdhā tatra vipakṣatā niścita vipakṣa vṛtti vat saṃśayita vipakṣa vṛttiḥ api na anaikāntika tām ativartate iti sarva anumānānām eva nivāpa aṃjaliḥ dattaḥ syāt 
[II,627,iii]	na ca vādi hṛdaya parikalpana upārūḍha sthitiḥ api pakṣaḥ nāma na asti tad abhāve kim apekṣaḥ sa pakṣa vipakṣa vyavahāraḥ buddhi ārūḍha tva pakṣe api na sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ pakṣa tvam na ca vastūnām ubhaya ātmaka tā bhavet kintu kaṃci kālam atyatara asiddhi vat vimati patha apatitasya vastunaḥ pakṣa tvam upeyate nirṇaya janmā tu vimati viratau nūnam anyatara varga patitaḥ asau bhaviṣyati iti sarvathā na tasyām daśāyām tena anaikāntika tva udbhāvanam yuktam 
[II,627,iv]	nanu anena pathā pṛthak kṛte sa pakṣa vipakṣābhyām pakṣena tatra anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyatarasya api grahaṇam bhavet sa pakṣe hi anvayaḥ gṛhyate vipakṣe ca vyatirekaḥ eṣa tu tābhyām artha antaram iti tatra agṛhīta anvaya vyatireka ātma niyame hetuḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ iva suta janmani na samarthaḥ eva sādhya upasthāpane bhavet 
[II,628,i_II,628,ii]	alam anayā ḍimbha bibhīṣikayā na hi sakala sapakṣa vipakṣa sākṣāt karaṇa kāraṇa keka ullekha purassaram vyapti grahaṇam iti pūrvam eva nirṇotaḥ ayam arthaḥ na catad varjam iti vyāpti grahaṇam bhavati yena ṣaṇḍha suta sāmya codanā vakāśaḥ syāt sāmānyena hi vyāptiḥ gṛhyamāṇā tatra api gṛhītā bhavati eva tena api ca kāla antare sa pakṣa vipakṣa anyatara varga anupraveśinā bhavitavyam eva vimati avasthāyām tu pṛthak eva tābhyām asau iti na tatra vartamānaḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati etena īśvara ādi anumānānām api anaikāntika tvam apākṛtam veditavyam tasmāt na anaikāntika tvena āgamakam mūrta tvam api tu anyathā siddha tvena eva iti 
[II,628,iii]	nanu evam api paramāṇu prasādhana anumāna mahima hata śakti tayā mūrta tvam anitya tva siddhau akṣamam jātam iti tatas ca kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tvāt na anyathā siddha tām adhigacchet na etat evam kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ hi pratyakṣa āgama apahṛta viṣayaḥ ucyate anuṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇadartmā madirā dvijaiḥ pātavyāḥ ityādau darśitaḥ yat punar anunumānam pratyakṣa āgama viruddham nyāya ābhāsaḥ saḥ iti na ca paramāṇuṣu parama aṇu tayā eva satata parokṣeṣu pratyakṣam anitya tā viparyaya grāhi pravartitum śaktam āgamaḥ tu na asti eva iti kutas kāla atyaya apadiṣṭa tā 
[II,629,i_II,629,ii]	nanu kim idam avanipati vacanam uta vaidikī codanā yat pratyakṣa āgamayoḥ eva bādhaka tvam anumānam prati na anumāna antarasya iti paramāṇu prasādhana anumānam hi dṛḍham adṛḍhasya tad anitya tā anumānasya mūrta tva ādeḥ yadi bādhakam syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ syāt iti atha manuṣe niyamaḥ eva eṣaḥ pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ virodhe pratyakṣam eva balīyaḥ iti tat eva anumānasya bādhakam ucitam na anumāna antaram iti tat asat alāta cakra ādau pratyakṣam api anumānena ananyathā siddhena bādhyatas eva 
[II,629,iii_II,629,v]	nanu bhramaṇa viratau parimita parimāṇa ulmuka grāhi pratyakṣam eva tatra pratyakṣasya bādhakam na anumānam iti na evam anavarata paribhramaṇa samudbhūta cakra avabhāsa samayaḥ eva anumānena tatra bhrānta tā niścayāt pūrva pravṛttam acakra ākāra tad alātapari chedi pratyakṣam bādhakam iti ced na pūrva pravṛtta tvena eva atikrānta tvāt tasmāt anumānam eva cakra jñāna bādhakam evaṃca ananyathā siddham anumānam api pratyakṣasya bādhakam bhavati yat ca ananyathā siddha tayā mūla stambha bhūtam akhila anumāna pratiṣṭhā āyatanam pratyakṣa mapi bādhate tat anumānasya tapasvinaḥ katham na bādhakam atas ca pratyakṣa āgama grahaṇasya upalakṣaṇa artha tvāt anumāna bādhitam api kāla atyaya apadiṣṭam eva iti 
[II,630,i_II,630,ii]	tat etat asamī cīnam anumāna ādeḥ bādhya bādhaka bhāva anupapatteḥ sarvatra khalu pramāṇa bhāsa rūpam bādhyate na tu pramāṇam nāma śakyate bādhitum alāta cakra ādau api pratyakṣa ābhāsasya bādhakam anumānam na pratyakṣasya evam atra api anumāna ābhāsasya bādhya tā na anumānasya tat idānīm anumāna ābhāsa tvam asya kiṃkṛtam iti cintyatām sva lakṣaṇa vaidhuryāt iti ced kim anumāna aṃtareṇa bādhakena tat vādhya tayā tu tad ābhāsa tva kathanam itarasya api tādṛśam eva paramāṇu prasādhana anumānam ananyathā siddham idam tu mūrta tvam anyathā siddham iti ced āgataḥ asi madīyam panthānam anyathā asiddha tvāt eva tad aprāmāṇye siddhe kim tad bādhayā 
[II,630,iii]	anyathā siddha tvam eva katham iti ced na ghaṭa ādau mūrta tva prayuktam anitya tvam api tu kāryatva prayuktam kāryasya hi kāraṇa vibhāgāt vā tad vināśāt vā vināśa upapatteḥ kāryatvam eva anitya tva prayojarka yuktam na mūrta tvam mūrtatpe tu anitya tā kṣepiṇi paramāṇu tā eva hīyeta iti uktam tasmāt na mūrta tvam anitya tāyām kārakam jñāpakam vā iti bhavati anyathā siddham 
[II,630,iv_II,630,v]	bhavatu evam asiddha varge tu katham eṣa hetuḥ gaṇyate sādhya dharma yuktā dharmiṇi vṛttiḥ asya na asti iti ced yadi evam paṃcānām api tad prayukta vṛtti rahita tvāt asiddhaḥ eva ekaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ syāt atha sati api prayojaka tve vipakṣa vṛtti ādi avāṃtara rūpa bheda nibandhanānaikānti tva ādi vyapadeśa paṃcaka bhājaḥ ime hetvābhāsāḥ iṣyante hanta tarhi prakṛtaḥ ayam hetuḥ mūrta tvāt iti kim anaikāntikaḥ ucyatām atha kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ āhosvit viruddhaḥ uta prakaraṇa samaḥ iti na eṣām anyatamaḥ api vaktum śakyate etad lakṣaṇa anupapatterini ced kāmam asiddhaḥ api mā vādi pakṣe vartamāna tvena tad lakṣaṇasya api anupapatteḥ iti 
[II,631,i_II,631,ii]	astu tarhi ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva ayam hetvābhāsaḥ samyak hetu tām tāvat yathā ukta nayena na aśnutaḥ eva na ca eteṣu antar bhavati iti balāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate katham vibhāga sūtram iti ced atikramiṣyāmaḥ idam sūtram atikrāmantaḥ su spaṣṭa dṛṣṭam api imam aprayojakam hetvābhāsam apahnuvīmahi na ca evam yuktam atas varam sūtra atikramaḥ na vastu atikramaḥ iti atha vā na sūtrakāra niyama ullaṅghanam śreyaḥ pramādyan khalu parimita darśī mādṛśaḥ anyathā brūyāt na nyāya mahodadheḥ pāradṛśvā bhagavān akṣapādaḥ tat enam hetvābhāsam asiddha vargaḥ eva nikṣipāmaḥ 
[II,631,iii]	nanu pakṣe vartamānaḥ katham tatra nikṣeptum śakyate yathā sādhya dharma prayojaka tayā pakṣe api vartitum yuktam tathā na vartate eva ayam tatra iti adūra viprakarṣeṇa bhavati eva ayam asiddhaḥ atas eva ayam anyathā asiddhaḥ iti ucyate yathā asiddhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati tathā na siddhaḥ anyathā tu siddhaḥ iti anayāni itya uttāna vṛtti mātra lābhe api ayam asiddhaḥ evam anyeṣu tu hetvābhāseṣu bhaṅgyā api na antarbhavati iti uktam etat 
[II,632,i_II,632,ii]	athavā sarva hetvābhāsā anuvṛttam idam anyathāsiddha tvam nāma rūpam iti na na ṣaṭhaḥ ayam hetvābhāsaḥ tat tu kvacid kevalam eva dṛśyate kvacid avyabhi cāra ādiḥ upāntara sahacāritam atas ca vyabhicāra ādi rūpa apekṣam eva paṃcatu asupadiṣṭavān muniḥ iti na vibhāga sūtra virodha eti alam ati vistareṇa yuktaḥ tasmāt anyathā asiddha nāmā hetvābhāsaḥ saḥ ayam eka prakāraḥ yasya uttānā vidyamānā api pakṣe vṛttiḥ na syāt sādhya dharma prayuktā hetvābhāsa kudumbakasya tat idam sarvasya sādhāraṇam rūpam yadi api lakṣaṇa antara kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ tathā na anyatas sāmānyam tu viśeṣa rūpa rahitam na asti pramāṇam yathā mā bhūt atra tathā iti na asya viṣayaḥ ca udyasya vastu sthitiḥ 
[II,632,iii_II,632,iv]	kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ yathāprāptam hetu prayoga kālam atītya yaḥ hetuḥ apadiśyate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ kāla atītaḥ ucyate 
[II,633,i_II,633,iii]	tatra kecid ācakṣate pratijñā anantaram hi hetuḥ prayoktum yuktaḥ tatra yaḥ pratijñāyāḥ pūrvam eva dṛṣṭānta vacana ādeḥ api ūrdhvam vā prayujyate sa kāla atyayā padiṣṭaḥ iti tad anupapannam akṣata pratibandhasya sādhya avagati kāriṇaḥ krama atikrama mātreṇa na hetvābhāsa tā bhavet kiyān ca eṣa doṣaḥ pada antara vyavahita uccāraṇam nāma vyavahitam api yena saha samucita samayam anvetum adhikṛtam itarad ati nikaṭa paṭhitam api parāṇudya davīyasā api tena eva saṃbandham anubhavati yathā athasā pathi gacchantīm auṣadhīm dīrgha locanām dṛṣṭavān asi kedāre yaḥ lunāsi mama priyām iti api ca aprāpta kālam etat kathitam pṛthak eva nigraha sthānam tat ce punar ucyamānam na kaṃcana sva artham āvahati tasmāt apavyākhyānam etat 
[II,633,iv]	aparaḥ āha sa viśeṣaṇasya hetoḥ prayujyamānasya yasya viśeṣaṇam kārya kālam atyeti na tat paryantam avatiṣṭhate sa kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ iti yathā kāla antara sthāyī śabdaḥ saṃyoga vyaṅgya tvāt rūpavat iti atra na vyaṅgya tva mātram hetu tvena vivakṣitam api tu sa viśeṣaṇam saṃyoga vyaṅya tvam sa ca ayam saṃyogaḥ vyaṃjakaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi rūpe tad avagati paryanta sthitiḥ upalabhyate dīpa ādi saṃyogaḥ sādhya dharmiṇi tu śabde na tathā avasthāna miti dūratas hi dāruparaśu saṃyoga vicchinne chetrā punar udyamyamāne paraśvathe śrūyate śabdaḥ iti tad upalabdhi kāle tad atyayāt kāla atyaya apadiṣṭaḥ ayam hetuḥ iti 
[II,634,i_II,634,ii]	etat api na saṅgatam asiddha tvena asya hetvābhāsa antara tva anupapatteḥ tasmāt ayam artha hetoḥ prayoga kālaḥ pratyakṣa āgamān upahata pakṣa parigraha samayaḥ eva tam atītya prayujyamānaḥ pratvakṣa āgama bādhite viṣaye vartamānaḥ kāla atyayā padiṣṭaḥ bhavati tasya udāharaṇam pūrvam eva pradarśitam uṣṇaḥ na tejaḥ avayavī kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat brāhmaṇena surā peyā dravya tvāt kṣīra nīra vat yat ca kiṃcid abhidheyavatra tat sarva m uktam anumāna lakṣaṇe aprayojaka nirūpaṇe punar kiṃcana uditam atas viramyate 
[II,634,iii]	hetvābhāsāḥ te ete avagati niyamitānanya saṃkīrṇa rūpāḥ nirṇītāḥ paṃcaye arthe vidadhati mahatīm śuddhim abhyasyamānāḥ pakṣa ādau vṛtti bheda akalana gurutara kleśa niṣpādyamānaiḥ taina yattā tadīyā kvacana phalavatī nādatāḥ tena tajjñaiḥ 
[II,635,i]	tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ prayojanam uktam tad aṅga bhūtāni chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni yadi api ca vāde keṣāṃcad abhyanujñānam asti tathā api jalpa vitaṇḍe eva teṣām prācuryeṇa kṣetram iti tad aupayika tayā tad svarūpa nirūpaṇam yuktam iti uddeśa krameṇa chalasya tāvat lakṣaṇam āha vacana vighātaḥ artha vikalpa upapattyā cchalam 
[II,635,ii]	chalasya bhedavat tvāt sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni ca vaktavyāni tāni iha sarvāṇi sva kaṇṭhena kila tad pūrvakam anumānam iti atra tricatura akṣara samarpita aparimita viṣaya vitata anumāna lakṣaṇa labdha nirati śaya sūtra karaṇa kauśalyasya me kim adhunā śiṣya jana manaḥ kleśa kāriṇā saṃkṣiptā bhidhāna dohadena iti manyamānaḥ sūtra kṛt uktavān 
[II,635,iii]	tatra vacana vighātaḥ iti sūtram sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam parasya vadataḥ vacana vighātaḥ abhidhāna nirodhaḥ chalam kim āsya pidhāna ādinā na iti āha artha vikalpa upapattyā iti vaktuḥ anabhipretam arthāt tat ukte vacasi samāropya tat niṣedham chala vādī karoti katham artha antarāropaṇam iti ced artha vikalpa upattyā vikalpamāna artha ghaṭanayā iti arthaḥ 
[II,635,iv_II,636,i]	kim udāharaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ iha eva kasmāt na ucyate asaṃbhavāt iti brūmaḥ na hi nirviśeṣam sāmānyam upapadyate iti tat udāhriyamāṇam balāt viśeṣa niṣṭham eva avatiṣṭhate anyeṣu api gauḥ na padā spraṣṭavyāḥ iti sāmānya upadeśeṣu na amūrtāyām ākāśa nirviśeṣa vapuṣi jātau sparśa prasaktiḥ tad niṣedhaḥ vā avakalpate kintu vyaktiṣu eva iti viśeṣa viṣayaḥ eva sarvatra kriyā yogaḥ iti tatra eva udāharaṇa varṇanam yuktam 
[II,636,ii]	katham tarhi sakala hetu ābhāsa sārtha sāmānya lakṣaṇam aprayojaka tvam anapekṣita savyabhicāra viruddha ādi viśeṣam api udāharaṇa dvāreṇa darśitam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ucyate pramāṇe tarhi pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa nirapekṣam pramāṇa sāmānyam na udāhṛtam nanu ayam aparaḥ doṣaḥ astu tat api ayuktam eva anuṣṭhitam kim iti na udāhṛtam anapekṣita pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣam pramāṇa sāmānyam atra ucyate na śakyam udāhartum asaṃbhavāt iti tat na udāhṛtam na punar ālasyāt pramādāt vā hetvābhāsa samūha tva ādhāraṇa rūpam tu aprayojaka tvam tathā saṃbhavāt udāhṛtam na ca tad sāmānyāt atra api tathā astu iti vaktavyam na hi cākṣuṣeṇa paṃcāśat bhavitum arhati tasmai na evam vaktum śakyam 
[II,636,iii_II,637,i]	yathā viruddha ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam aprayojaka tvam hetvābhāseṣu sāmānya rūpam dṛśyate tathā pramāṇeṣu api pratyakṣa ādi viśeṣa rūpa rahitam tat dṛśyatām yathā vā pramāṇeṣu tat na dṛśyate tathā hetvābhāseṣu api mā darśī iti vastu svabhāvānām anuyoga kṣetra tā anupapatteḥ api ca aprayojaka tvam sāmānyam viruddha ādi viśeṣeṣu iva tad rūpa rahiteṣu tad viśeṣeṣu api saṃbhavat dṛśyate atas eva tat api sva viśeṣa niṣṭham eva udāhṛtam anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ mūrta tvāt iti na ca ākāśa vadana ālambanam eva kiṃcid aprayojaka tva sāmānyam iti tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam na sāmānya lakṣaṇe śakyam udāhartum iti 
[II,637,ii_II,637,iii]	evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam abhidhāya chalasya vibhāgam āha tat trividham vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāra chalam ca nigada vyākhyātam sūtram vibhāga sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ ca upadeśa paurvāparya niyamaḥ na asti iti pūrvam eva uktam 
[II,637,iv_II,637,v]	atha vibhāga krameṇa lakṣaṇāni āha tatra aviśeṣa abhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāthādartha antara kalpanā vākchalam saṃbhavat viśeṣe api aviśeṣa sādhāraṇa artha samarpaṇa kauśala śālini śleṣa alaṅkāravati śabde prayukte sati vaktuḥ abhipretam artham apahnutya tatas artha antaram parikalpya tad niṣedha vacanam vāci nimitta bhūtāyām chalam vākchalam 
[II,638,i]	nava kambalaḥ ayam māṇavakaḥ iti navaḥ kambalaḥ asya nava kambalāḥ asya iti vigrahada śādṛśyamāna viśeṣam api samāsapadam idam artha dvaye api avi śiṣṭam tatra abhinava kambala yogam vaktuḥ abhipretam pramāṇa upapannam ca nihnutya nava saṃkhyā saṃbandham adhyāropya tad pratiṣedhena paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate kutas asya nava kambalāḥ iti tat etat sādhāraṇa śabde vāci chalam vākchalam iti 
[II,638,ii]	yathā ca kasyāṃcid avasthāyām jalpa ādau chala ādi prayogaḥ yuktaḥ iti tad vyutpādanam evam para prayuktasya api sataḥ chala ādeḥ pratisamādhānam abhidheyam iti tat api vyutpādyate nava kambalāḥ asya iti mama vivakṣitam iti kutas pratipannam āyuṣmatā kim ayam abhinava kambala yoga pratipādakaḥ na bhavati eva bahuvrīhiḥ pakṣa dvaye api ca saṃbhavati yadi tāvat artha prakaraṇa ādi sāmarthya paryā locana avasita niyata abhidheya vṛtti śabda vyavahāra abhijñaḥ asi tad artha siddham artham abhinava kambala sambandham eva buddhvā tūṣṇīm āsva atha śuṣka tārkika kuṭumbaka garbha dāsaḥ iva śabda vṛtta anabhijñaḥ eva tvam tarhi pakṣa dvaya saṃbha vena saṃśayānaḥ mām eva pṛccha kim te vivakṣitam iti niṣedhakassan vaktum upakramase 
[II,638,iii_II,639,i]	nanu tvam api artha prātpya ādi phala paryanta śabda prayoga pravṛttaḥ kim iti sādhāraṇam idam andhapada prāyam vacaḥ prayuṅkṣe ayi bāliśa tava eva iha idam andha padam artha prakaraṇa adhīna niyata sva artha vṛtti tām yaḥ na janāti śabdānām saḥ evam apabhāṣate idam artha dvaye tāvat sādhāraṇa padam bhavet jāti śabdāḥ punar vyakti sahasra ākṣepa kāriṇaḥ spṛśanti niyatam vācyam te api prakaraṇa ādinā brāhmaṇān bhojaya ityādau tad vālena na śikṣitam tasmāt śabda artha sandehe prayoktā vā sa pṛcchyate na tu artha antaram āropya tad niṣedhaḥ vidhīyate 
[II,639,ii_II,639,iii]	saṃbhavataḥ arthasya ati sāmānya yogāt asat bhūta artha kalpanā sāmānyacchalam anivyāpakam sāmānyam atisāmānyam tad yogāt tad saṃbhavāt kvacid vyakta arthasya kasya cit saṃbhavataḥ saṃbhāvyamāna niṣpatteḥ vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ yā asat bhūta artha kalpanā vaktuḥ anabhipreta atisāmānya hetutva kalpanā tayā ca pratyavasthānam tad sāmānya nimittam chalam sāmānyacchalam 
[II,639,iv_II,640,i]	yathā kvacid ucita upacāra vacana ārādhya māna praguṇa brāhmaṇa kule tad kathā bahule rāja kule kaścid su janmā kaṃcid agrajanmānam stauti aho nu khalu asau brāhmaṇaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ iti tasmin prasaṅge tathāvidhaḥ eva aparaḥ tam utsāhayan kathayati saṃbhavati brāhmaṇe vidyā caraṇa saṃpad iti tatra piśunaḥ chalavādī āha yadi brāhmaṇe vidyā avacaraṇa saṃpad saṃbhavati tarhi brātye api brāhmaṇa tva jāti anapāyāt sā bhavet iti tatra idam ativyāpakam brāhmaṇa tva sāmānyam yatas vidyā caraṇa saṃpadamatyeti spṛśati ca tad yogāt brāhmaṇa vyaktau saṃbhavataḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpad rūpasya arthasya vaktrā abhihitasya sataḥ tatra vaktra nabhimatām eva ati sāmānya hetutām āropya cchala vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate iti 
[II,640,ii_II,640,iii]	atra uttaram kena brāhmaṇa tvasya atra hetu tvam abhihitam yat anaikāntikīkurvan pratyavasthitaḥ asi saṃbhāvanā vacanam idam stuti artham upanyastam vidyā caraṇa saṃpadām pātram hi brāhmaṇaḥ sati brāhmaṇa tve pūrva janma upacita sukṛta pariṇāmāt bhavati vidyā caraṇa saṃpad na ca tat eva tasyāḥ hetuḥ iti yathā saṃbhavanti asmin kṣetre śālayaḥ iti kṣetra praśaṃsā pare vākye prayukte na evam vaktum āpadyate yadi kṣetram eva śāli saṃbhava hetuḥ tarhi vinā api hala balī varda ādi sāmagrīm mahati avagrahe api śālayaḥ asmin bhaveyuḥ iti tat idam arthavāda gati anabhijñasya bhavataḥ bhāṣitam iti āstām etat idam tu bhavantam pṛcchāmi bho mahātman svabhāva śuddhā pariniścita artha saṃsparśinī puṇya sahasra labhyā kena īdṛśī sarva jana anukūlā kalyāṇinī te niramāyi vāṇī 
[II,641,i_II,641,iii]	dharma vikalpa nirdeśe artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ upacāracchalam abhidhānasya dharmaḥ aneka prakāraḥ mukhyayā vṛttyā gauṇyā vā lākṣaṇikayā vā yat arthe pratyāyanam tat anena vikalpamānena dharmeṇa gauṇena lākṣaṇikena vā nirdeśe prayoge kṛte yaḥ artha sadbhāva pratiṣedhaḥ mukhya artha niṣedhaḥ saḥ upacāra nimittam chalam upācāra chalam yathā maṃcāḥ krośanti iti ukte chalava ādī āha katham acetanāḥ kāṣṭha racana ātmānaḥ maṃcāḥ krośanti maṃca sthāḥ puruṣāḥ ete krośanti na maṃcāḥ iti 
[II,641,iv]	atra samādhiḥ vṛddha vyavahārāt śabda artha vyutpattiḥ tatra na kevala yā eva mukhyayā vṛttyā śabdāḥ pravartavānāḥ dṛśyante vṛtti antara vyavahārasya api su prasiddha tvāt na ca nirnimittam eva para śabdam paratra prayuktavantaḥ vayam saha cāraṇa ādi sūtra nivedita nimitta nikurumba anyatama nimitta pūrvaka tvāt asya prayogasya sthānāt ayam tadvat upacāraḥ sa tvam gauṇala akṣaṇikā ādi śabda prayogāḥ vagati bāhyaḥ eva yaḥ evam pratyavatiṣṭhate 
[II,642,i]	gauṇa lākṣiṇakayoḥ katham viśeṣaḥ iti ced ucyate satyam gauṇe api lakṣaṇā vidyate evam sati go śabdaḥ sva artham abhidhāya sāsnādimantam tadīyān guṇān eva jāḍya mauḍhya tiṣṭhat mūtraṇa ādīn lakṣayati na tu tāvatī etva viramati sa tu sāmānādhikaraṇyena vāhīke api pravartate gauḥ vāhīkaḥ iti evam prayujyamānaḥ sa gauṇaḥ bhavati 
[II,642,ii_II,642,iii]	yaḥ tu sva artha abhidhāna anantaram tat itaram artham guṇam aguṇam vā lakṣayati eva na sāmānādhikaraṇyena paratra prayujyate śabdaḥ sa lākṣaṇikaḥ bhavati gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ prativasati iti tathā ca uktam gauṇe hi prayogaḥ na lakṣaṇā yām iti alam śāstra antara udgāra gahanābhiḥ kathābhiḥ mukhyam artham atha lākṣaṇikam vā gauṇam api avagamayya ca śabdaḥ loka veda vihitam vyavahāram santanoti tad abhijña matīnām kuryāt ākṣepam yaḥ ca bhākte prayoge mukhyam matvā artham tatra vaktuḥ na doṣaḥ tena tu ā ātmīyam śabda vṛtta anabhijñam rūpam vyaktam syāt atra vṛddhāḥ pramāṇam 
[II,642,iv_II,643,ii]	evam chalasya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni abhidhāya tad parīkṣā artham ākṣepam karoti vākcchalam eva upacāra chalam tat aviśeṣāt na khalu vāc upacāra chalayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ anekadhā śabda arthe saṃbhavati vaktṛ abhimatāt arthāt anyasya kalpanam tad pratiṣedhanam ca ubhayatra api samānam avāntara viśeṣa kṛta nānā tva abhyupagame ca tad ā ānantya prasaṅgaḥ atra samādhim āha na tad artha antara bhāvāt 
[II,643,iii_II,643,v]	na etat evam vākchalam eva upacāra chalam iti tatas artha antara tvāt vāc chale hi nava kambalaḥ iti navasu kambaleṣu nave ca kambale mukhya arthaḥ eva śabdaḥ sa rāmaḥ ityādi vat tatas tu ekataram vaktuḥ anabhipretam chala vādinā aaropya niṣidhyate upacāra chale tu kāṣṭha sanniveśe mukhya arthe maṃca śabdaḥ puruṣa bhaktyā pravṛttaḥ mukhyam abhidhāya ca gauṇaḥ pratyāyyaḥ bhavati na tu eṣa kramaḥ sādhāraṇa śabdeṣu iti mahān bhedaḥ vākcchale ca artha sattā eva niṣidhyate kutas asya nava kambalāḥ iti iha tu sataḥ maṃcasya krośana śaktiḥ niṣidhyate samādhiḥ api sādhāraṇa śabda anabhijña tām parasya pradarśayatā vākchale vācyaḥ upacāra chale tu gauṇa śabda vṛtti anabhijña tām iti mahān viśeṣaḥ 
[II,643,vi_II,644,i]	aviśeṣe vā kiñcid sādharmyāt eka chala prasaṅgaḥ chalasya dvi tvam abhyanujñāya tritvam bhavatā pratiṣidhyate yatas sāmānyacchalam pārśve kṛtvā vāc upacāra chalayoḥ abhedam abhihitavān asi yathā ca ayam tad aviśeṣāt iti tritva pratiṣedhaḥ tathā dvi tvasya api kiṃcid sādharmyasya sāmānyacchale api bhāvāt 
[II,644,ii_II,644,iii]	tathā hi yadi tāvat vāci nimitta bhūtāyām idam pravṛttam chalam idam ca iti tad abhedam manyase tarhi sāmānyacchalam api mā pṛthak vocaḥ tat api hi na śarīre manasi buddhau vā pravṛttam api tu vācyevetiḥ vākchalam eva ekasyāt atha evam sati api tad viśeṣaḥ dṛśyamānaḥ na parāṇudyate sāmānya chalepi na śabda arthaḥ anyathākṛtaḥ kintu sāmānyasya hetu tvam anuktam āropitam iti pṛthak iṣyate tarhi vāc upacāra chale api bhidyete eva iti darśitam atas yuktam chalatri tvam 
[II,644,iv_II,644,v]	na ca ānantyam iyattā niyama kāriṇaḥ nimitta trayasya darśita tvāt avāntara bheda kṛtam tu tat ā ānantyam iṣyate eva jāti vat iti alam prasaṅgena tasmāt paraspara vivikta nija svarūpam īdṛś chala tritayam etat iha upadiṣṭam tasya kvacid svayam api kriyate prayogaḥ vācyaḥ paraiḥ abhihitasya tathā samādhiḥ 
[II,645,i]	chala anantaram jāteḥ uddeśāt tasya assāmānya lakṣaṇam tāvat āha sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ 
[II,645,ii_II,645,iii]	atra traikālya samādi sakala viśeṣa saṃgrahāya sādharmya vaidharmya ādi pada nirapekṣam eva pratyavasthāna padam jāti sāmānya lakṣaṇa pratipādakam āhu pratīpam avasthānam pratyavasthānam tāvat mātram eva ca yat kiṃcid uttaram para prayukte hetau jāyamāna tvāt jātiḥ iti abhidhīyate tad anupapannam pratyavava sthāna mātrasya sādharmya ādi nirapekṣasya jāti tve hetvābhāsa udbhāvanam api jātitām aśnu vīt 
[II,645,iv]	atha tasya samyak uttara tvāt iha ca nirviśeṣaṇa pratyavasthāna mātra upapādanāt phalgu prāyam asat uttaram jāti tvena vivakṣitam iti ucyate tathā api chalasya jāti tva prasaktiḥ aparihārya eva tat vyudāsāya tu tad anya tve sati iti ādika yadi kiṃcid adhyāhriyate tat amuṣya śrūyamāṇasya sādharmya vaidharmya grahaṇasyai kaḥ doṣaḥ 
[II,645,v]	nanu traikālya samādīnām asaṃgrahaḥ kim na doṣaḥ na hi traikālya samādiṣu sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā pratyavasthānam asti iti na eṣa doṣaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām iti asamāsa karaṇena diś pradarśanasya sūcanāt sādharmyeṇa vaidhamyaiṇa vā katham eṣa hetuḥ hetuḥ bhavati iti vā kim anena kriyate iti vā yat evaṃprakāram pratyavasthānam hetu pratibimba vartmanā kriyate sā jātiḥ iti ucyamāne bhaviṣyati sakala viśeṣa saṅgrahaḥ traikālya samādiṣu api vā yādṛśasya tādṛśasya sādharmya vaidharmya prakārasyaḥ yojayitum śakya tvāt na hi udāharaṇa sādharmyam sādhya sādhanam iha vivakṣitam tad vaidharmyam vā sādharmya ādi mātram tu tatra api na atyantāya duravagamam iti yathāśrutam eva sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānam jātiḥ iti sāmānya lakṣaṇam yuktam 
[II,646,i_II,646,ii]	atha bhedavat tvāt jāteḥ caturviśatidhā vibhāgam āha s ā d h a r m y a v a i d h a r m y o t k a r ṣ ā p a k a r ṣ a v a r ṇ y ā v a r ṇ y a v i k a l p a s ā d h ya prāpti aprāpti prasaṅga pratidṛṣṭānta an utpatti saṃśaya prakaraṇa hetu artha apatti aviśeṣa upapatti upalabdhi anupalabdhi nitya anitya kārya samāḥ atra samāḥ iti striyām puṃsi ca tulya tvāt nidarśasya jāti apekṣayā strī nirdeśaḥ vā pratiṣedha apekṣayā puṃnnirdeśaḥ vā varṇanīyaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa sūtreṣu punar prāyeṇa put liṅga nirdeśaḥ dṛśyate sa tu pratiṣedha apekṣayā teṣu vyākhyeyaḥ iti tad vyākhyāna avasaraḥ eva vakṣyāmaḥ 
[II,646,iii]	nanu āstām tāvat viśeṣa lakṣaṇa varṇanam idam eva tu ādau cintyatām kimartham evaṃvidham asat uttara jātam śāstre vyutpādyate evaṃprakārāṇām ca dhūli prakṣepa sadṛśānām sāretara parīkṣaṇa kṣama vicakṣaṇa upekṣaṇīyānām asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt caturviṃśati saṃkhyā api katham iti mahān vismayaḥ asmākam 
[II,647,i_II,647,ii]	yat api ca tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam tat prayojanam abhidhīyate tat api na hṛdayaṅgamam asat uttara upanyāsena tattva adhyavasāyasya saṃrakṣitum aśakya tvāt atha vikaṭa āṭopa prakaṭana pāṭava upahita apara saṃmohana dvāreṇa tat rakṣaṇam āsthīyate tarhi niṣṭhīvana hasita tarjana aṃsa mardana kaupīna āvaraṇa vidāraṇa caraṇa avasphoṭana ādi api vyutpādyatām iha mokṣa vidyāyām 
[II,647,iii]	api ca idam vicāryatām kva jāti prayogaiḥ pratyavastheyam samyak sādhane pareṇa prayukte tad ābhāse vā na tāvat sādhana ābhāse tasya hi yena nimittena asiddha tva ādinā sādhana ābhāsa tvam upanatam tat eva tatra prayoktum ucitam na jātayaḥ tena eva ca paraḥ parājīyate na api samyak sādhane tatra prayuktānām api tāsām akiṃcitkara tvāt na hi jāti prayoga kaluṣitam api samyak sādhanam asādhanībhavitum arhati 
[II,647,iv]	atha ekānta parājayāt varam saṃdehaḥ iti tābhiḥ upakramyate tatra api na tathā upakramamāṇaḥ kam iva pratyāyayet na nīti vidaḥ nīti vidaḥ tāvat jānanti eva saḥ ayam yathocitam abhivaditum apārayan kim api āla jālam ālapitum pravṛttaḥ iti śākaṭikā ādi pratyāyanam tu pratyanta gahvara jana padeṣu grāmya sadasi lābha ādi kāmasya kasyacid prayojana vat bhavet api kadācid na tu mokṣa śāstre tathāvidha upadeśaḥ peśalaḥ iti 
[II,648,i]	atra abhidhīyate samāhitam etat bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa eva tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇa artham kaṇṭaka śākhā parivaraṇa vat iti vadatā jalpa vitaṇḍa aṅga bhūtāni chala ja ati nigraha sthānāni tat uktam chala ja ati nigraha sthāna sādhana upālambhaḥ jalpaḥ iti bhāsya kṛt api āha chala ja ati nigraha sthānānām pṛthak upadeśaḥ upalakṣaṇa arthaḥ upalakṣitānām sva vākye parivarjanam para vākye ca paryanuyogaḥ jāteḥ tu pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ su vacaḥ samādhiḥ svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti 
[II,648,ii]	yadā hi mumukṣoḥ āgamāt vā yuktitaḥ vā tattva jñānam utpannam na ca adya api bhāvanā abhyāsa prasāda samāsādita tad draḍhimā atiśayaḥ vartate tasyām avasthāyām yadi kenacid kim api anumāna prāyam abhidhāya tadākulīkriyeta tat at asau vidita yukti āgama gauravaḥ api sapadi tad utpādite tattva jñāne manāga saṃbhāvanā āleśam iva adhigacchet tasmin vā dṛḍha pratyaye api tad pārśva vartinaḥ śiṣyāḥ śithilita āsthāḥ bhaveyuḥ atas jhaṭiti sa dūṣaṇam apaśyan pratipakṣam jāti prayogaiḥ api asau śamayet eva na udāsīta iti uktam jalpa lakṣaṇe 
[II,648,iii]	para uditā vā jātīḥ pratyabhijñāya tad kṣaṇam eva pariharet iti sapha jāti vyutpādanam yathā kvacid acira vyupta sasye saṃprati udbhidyamāna komala aṅkura nikara danturita sīmani kedāre tad upadravaḥ drutatara gāminaḥ yatas kutaścana catuṣpadāt dvipādāt vā abhiśaṅkyate iti tad parihārāya samantataḥ nirantara kaṇṭaka śākhā santati paricaraṇam ādhīyate evam iha api jāti ādi prayoga tad uddhāra dvārakam tattva adhyavasāya saṃrakṣaṇam kartavyam iti 
[II,649,i_II,649,iii]	yat tu vikalpitam kva jāteḥ prayogaḥ samyak sādhane tad ābhāsā iva iti tat ucyate samyak dūṣaṇam apaśyat tā kila jāti ādi prayoktavyam tat ca sat dūṣaṇā darśanam samyak sādhane tad abhāvāt eva bhavatu sādhana ābhāse vā pramāda ādinā iva iti kaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ mumukṣoḥ tu jñāta tattvasya tad pratikūla vādinā kena cit ākṣiptasya tad prayukte tattva pratikṣepa balāt sādhana ābhāsa viṣayaḥ eva samyak dūṣaṇam apaśyataḥ jāti prayoga avasaraḥ jñātvā api sādhanānām ābhāsa tām yathā tathā satvaram eva nirbhartsyata āmayam durācāraḥ iti pārśva sthita sukumāram ati śiṣya jana utsāha jana nāya jāti ādi āḍambara viracam ucitam eva mumukṣoḥ mumukṣum prati ca śāstra ārambhāt āṃjasyena tad apekṣayā sādhana ābhāsa viṣayaḥ eva jāti prayogaḥ atas eva ca bhāṣya kṛtā prathamam sādhana ābhāsāḥ eva jāti udāharaṇam darśitam lābha ādi kāmānām tu samyak sādhane api prayukte yuktaḥ eva jāti ādi upakramaḥ itarathāḥ hi nissaṃśayaḥ eva parājayaḥ syāt iti etat ca ānuṣaṅgikam prayojanam iti uktam 
[II,649,iv_II,650,i]	yat punar abhihitam asat uttara kathane katham na capeṭa ādikam prayujyate iti tat api asat tasya atyantam alaukika tvāt lokaḥ hi tadā evam manyeta nūnam eṣa na jānāti vaktum sadṛśam uttaram anyathā vācam utsṛjya pāṇinā praharet katham khedayet vādinam yaḥ tu hasta pāda ādi cāpalaiḥ sa saṃsadi ucyate sadbhiḥ bhaṇḍaḥ eva na paṇḍitaḥ jātya upakramamāṇaḥ tu na tathā eṣa vihasyate na hi saṃdūṣaṇa chāyā tatra atyantam asaṅga tā tat na kaupīna vasana apanaya ādi sāmyam jāti uttarāṇām iti 
[II,650,ii_II,650,iii]	yat tu kaḥ taiḥ pratyāyyate iti tat na na sarvaḥ sarvajña kalpaḥ bhavati na ca śākaṭika tulyaḥ santi hi madhyama daśāvartinaḥ janāḥ te ārādhayiṣyante iti alam prasaṅgena yat punar asat uttarāṇām ānantyāt katham caturviśati saṃkhyā iti tatra api ucyate sati api ānantye jātī nāma saṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā caturviṃśati prakāra tvam upavarṇitam na tu tad saṃkhyā niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ iti 
[II,650,iv_II,650,v]	tat atra sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetoḥ tad sādharmya samā jātiḥ sā ca sādharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau ca prayujyate vaidharmyeṇa pravartamānam tathā eva vaidharmya samā jātiḥ utkarṣa apakarṣābhyām pratyavasthānam utkarṣāpakaṣaṃsame jātī iti evam sarvatra yojyam sthāpanā hetutas ca āviśeṣyamāṇa tvam jāti vādi abhiprāyeṇa tāsām draṣṭavyam jāti vādī hi evam vadati yathā bhavat prayuktam sādhanam tathā idam api kim iti na bhavati iti atas eva hetu pratibimbana dvārakaḥ eva jāti upanyāse iti uktam 
[II,651,i_II,651,ii]	atha viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha tatra sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām upasaṃhāre tad dharma viparyaya upapatteḥ sādharmya vaidharmya samau pratiṣedha apekṣayā puṃliṅga nirdeśaḥ iti tatra tatra draṣṭavyam tatra ca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā sādhanam abhidhāya siṣā dhayiṣita pakṣa upasaṃhāre sādhana vādinā kṛte sādhya dharma viparyaya upapādanāya sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇam sthāpanā hetutaḥ sādharmya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,651,iii]	udāharaṇam tu anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt yat prayatna ānantarīyakam tat anityam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sādharmyeṇa hetau prayukte jāti vādī sādharmyeṇa eva pratyavatiṣṭhate nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt niravayavam dravyam ākāśa ādi nityam dṛṣṭam iti na ca atra viśeṣa hetuḥ asti ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[II,651,iv_II,652,ii]	tathā atra eva vaidharmyeṇa tyavasthānam nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt yat punar anityam tat sa avayavam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭa ādi dravyam iti na ca asti viśeṣa hetuḥ ghaṭa sādharmyāt pratyatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ na punar ghaṭa vaidharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ iti vaidharmya hetau api sādhana ādinā prayukte anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt yat anityam na bhavati tat prayatna ānantarīyakam api na bhavati ākāśa ādi vat iti atra etat eva pūrva uktam sādharmya vaidharmya pratyavasthāna dvayam udāhartavyam iti yathā kvacid avasare svayam prayogaḥ jātīnām upayujyate iti tad svarūpa vyutpādanam upakrāntam evam para prayuktānām tāsām uttaram api vaktavyam atas tad vyutpādana artham āha go tvāt go siddhi vat tad siddhiḥ 
[II,652,iii]	sādharmya vaidharmya samayoḥ idam uttaram yadi sādharmya mātram vā edha rmyamātra vā sādhya sādhanam pratijñāyeta syāt iyam anavasthā bhavet ca bhavat prayuktānām īdṛśām api sthāpanā hetoḥ aviśeṣaḥ viśiṣṭam tu sādharmyam vaidharmya vā prayojakam mucyamānam na evaṃvidhaiḥ pratyavasthānaiḥ upahanyate yathā sati api sattā ādi sāmānya saṃbandhe sati api śukla ādi guṇa saṃbandhe sati api calana ādi karma yoge na gauḥ tathā tvena tat sādharmyāt siddhyati aśva ādi vaidharmyāt vā kintu avyabhicāriṇaḥ go tva ādi saṃbandhāt eva tathā iha api askhalita niyamam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā sādhya siddhi nibandhanam na sādharmya ādi mātram iti 
[II,653,i_II,653,ii]	sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpāt ubhaya sādhya tvāt ca utkarṣā pakarṣa varṇya avarṇya vikalpa sādhya samāḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmam sādhye dharmiṇi yojayan asantam adhyāropayan utkarṣeṇa pratyavasthānam yat karoti saḥ utkarṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte aparaḥ āha yadi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ ghaṭa vat eva mūrtaḥ api bhavati na ced mūrtaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ api mā bhūt iti mūrta tvasya dharma antarasya prasaṃjanam utkarṣa samaḥ 
[II,653,iii]	dṛṣṭānta dharma vikalpanena eva sādhya dharmiṇi siddhasya api dharmasya apakaṣaṇa pratyavasthānam apakarṣa samaḥ pūrvasmin eva prayoge ghaṭaḥ khalu prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san aśrāvaṇaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam śabdaḥ api prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt aśrāvaṇaḥ astu na ced aśrāvaṇaḥ ghaṭa vat anityaḥ api mā bhūt iti sataḥ śrāvaṇa tvasya apasāraṇam apakarṣa samaḥ 
[II,653,iv]	khyāpanīyaḥ varṇyaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ sādhya dharmaḥ tad viparyayāt avarṇyaḥ siddhaḥ dṛṣṭānta dharmaḥ tau etau varṇyāvaṇyau viparyasyan itaram itareṇa samīkurvan pratyavasthānam yat karoti tau varṇyāvarṇya samau pratiṣeghau bhavataḥ yadi śabdaḥ nitya tvena varṇyate sādhyate ghaṭaḥ api varṇyatām iti varṇya samaḥ ghaṭaḥ ced na varṇyate śabdaḥ api mā varṇī iti avarṇya samaḥ 
[II,654,i]	dharma antara vikalpena pratyavasthānam vikalpa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tatra eva prayoge prayatna ānantarīyakam kiṃcid mṛdu dṛṣṭam dukūla rāṅkavaśayi ādi kiṃcid kaṭhinam karpara paraśvadha ādi evam prayatna ānantarīyakam kiṃcid anityam bhaviṣyati ghaṭa ādi kiṃcid nityam śabda ādi iti 
[II,654,ii_II,654,iii]	ubhayoḥ api sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādhya tva āpādanena pratyavasthānam sādhya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi yathā ghaṭāḥ tathā śabdaḥ prāptam tarhi yathā śabdaḥ tathā ghaṭaḥ iti śabdaḥ ca anitya tayā sādhyaḥ iti ghaṭaḥ api sādhyaḥ eva syāt anyathā hi na tena tulyaḥ bhavet iti atra paṃcānām uttaram kiñcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāri seḥ ddha eva dharmyāt apratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,654,iv]	kiṃcid sādharmyāt upasaṃhāraḥ siddhyati yathā gauḥ evam ayam gavayaḥ iti na tu sarvathā rūpa abhedaḥ tayoḥ āpādayitum śakyaḥ pramāṇa avagata svabhāva bhedānām bhāvānām itaretara rūpa saṃkarasya kartum aśakyatvāt evaṃca sva pratibandha sādharmye susthite sva sādhyam upasthāpayati sthāpana ahetau sādhya dṛṣṭāntayoḥ dharma vikalpam āpādayatā vaidharmyam ca kiṃcid abhidadhatā pratiṣedhaḥ kartum na labhyate iti 
[II,655,i_II,655,ii]	atha ṣaṣṭhasya uttaram sādhyatideśāt ca dṛṣṭānta upapatteḥ yat ucyate ghaṭaḥ api śabda vat sādhyaḥ bhavatu iti tat na evam laukika parī kṣakāṇām yasmin arthe buddhi sāmyam sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ tena aviparīta tayā śabde atidiśyate yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ evam śabdaḥ a pi iti evam sādhya atideśāt dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne na tasya sādhya tva abhi dhānam upapadyate 
[II,655,iii_II,655,iv]	prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyā viśiṣṭa tvāt aprāpya asādhaka tvāt ca prāpti aprāpti samau prāpti aprāpti vikalpana pūrvakam ubhayatra api doṣa āpādanam prāpti aprāpti samaupratiṣedhau bhavataḥ hetau sādhana vādinā prayukte paraḥ āha saḥ ayam hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyam sādhayet aprāpya vā prāpya ced dvayoḥ labdha svarūpayoḥ eva prāptiḥ bhavati iti kim kasya sādhyam sādhanam vā iti aviśeṣaḥ aprāpya tu sādhaka tvam anupapannam atiprasaṅgāt na hi aprāpya pradīpaḥ prakāśya prakāśayet iti 
[II,655,v_II,656,i]	anayoḥ uttaram ghaṭa ādi niṣpatteḥ pīḍane ca abhicārāt apratiṣedhaḥ na ayam pratiṣedhaḥ upapadyate ubhayathā api kāraṇa bhāvasya darśanāt daṇḍa cakra mūtra ādi kārakāni prāpya mṛdam ghaṭa ādi kāryam niṣpādayanti dṛśyante abhicāra karmaṇā ca śyena ādinā dūra sthasya api śatroḥ pāṭanam saṃpādyate iti 
[II,656,ii_II,656,iii]	dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇa anapadeśāt pratyavasthānāt ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṃga pratidṛṣṭānta samau ati prasaṅga āpādanena pratyavasthānam prasaṅga samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pūrva udāhṛtaḥ eva hetau yadi api anitya tve prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam sādhanam prayatna anantarīyaka tve idānīm kim sādhanam tad sādhane kim iti dṛṣṭāntasya ghaṭa ādeḥ anityatāyām kāraṇam na kiṃcid apadiśyate tena tad kāraṇa anveṣaṇa atiprasaṅgāt prasaṅga samaḥ ayam pratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,656,iv]	pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam pratidṛṣṭānta samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ prayatna ānantarīyakaḥ san anityaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ evam ākāśam prayatna anantarīyaka nityam dṛśyate tadvat śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti kaḥ puṇara ākāśasya prayatnāḥ nantarīyaka tvam vadet kūpa khana nādinā aakrāśa karaṇam manvānaḥ evam brūyāt api kaścid 
[II,657,i_II,657,ii]	nanu evam api vyabhicāra udbhāvanam etat samyak uttaram na asat uttara prakāraḥ jāti prayogaḥ na etat evam na hi hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam udbhāvayan asau sādhuḥ iva jāti vādī pratyavatiṣṭhate api tu pratidṛṣṭānta balena nitya tvam eva sādhayan utthitaḥ iti jāti prayogaḥ eva ayam hetvābhāsāḥ api svarūpa nigūhana purassaram apara hetu pratibimba vartmanā pradarśyamānāḥ jātitām pratipadyante eva atra prasaṅga samasya tāvat uttaram āha pradīpa upādāna prasaṅga vinivṛtti vat tat vinivṛttiḥ 
[II,657,iii]	asiddham hi nāma sādhyate na siddham tatra prayatna vaiphalyāt sa andha kāre hi sadmani piṭhara ādi padārtha darśanāya pradīpam upādadate laukikāḥ na dīpa darśanāya dīpa antaram āharanti iti antareṇa api hi dīpa antarāṇi dṛśyate eva pradīpaḥ evam laukika parīkṣakāṇām ghaṭa ādau prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya siddha tvāt tatra kāraṇa apadeśaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ iti tasmāt na ayam apita prasaṅgā pādanasya viṣayaḥ 
[II,657,iv_II,658,i]	atha pratidṛṣṭānta samasya uttaram pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve ca na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhaka buddhayā yadi tvayā upanyastaḥ tarhi viśeṣa hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ anena hetunā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti na ca asau viśeṣe hetuḥ ucyate tasmāt na pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhi hetuḥ iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ bhavati pratidṛṣṭānta hetu tve api sthite sati ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi sādhakaḥ syāt na ca tat asti iti uktam atas na ahetuḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ atha yathā pratidṛṣṭāntaḥ na sādhakaḥ evam dṛṣṭāntaḥ api mā bhūt iti anayā nītyā pratyavatiṣṭhate sa hanta tarhi pratidṛṣṭāntasya tāvat ahetu tvam sva kaṇṭhena kathitam iti tasmin asādhake sati dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva sādhakaḥ iti 
[II,658,ii_II,658,iii]	prāk utpatteḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpatti samaḥ anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpatti samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāktanaḥ eva prayoge jāti vādya āha anityaḥ iti utpatti dharmakaḥ ucyate yaḥ ca utpatti dharmakaḥ tasya utpatteḥ pūrvam anutpattyā bhavitavyam anutpanne ca śabda ākhya dharmiṇi prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam dharmaḥ kva vartatām alabdha pakṣa vṛttiḥ ca katham anitya tvam sādhayatu asiddhe ca anitya tve śabdasya balāt nitya tvam eva bhavati kāraṇa abhāvāt iti anitya tva siddhi kāraṇasya prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ athavā śabda utpādaka kāraṇa abhāvāt anutpanne śabde nirāśrayaḥ hetuḥ iti 
[II,658,iv_II,658,v]	asya uttaram tathā abhāvāt utpannasya kāraṇa upapatteḥ na kāraṇa pratiṣedhaḥ śabda ākhya dharmiṇaḥ siddhasya sataḥ nitya tvam anitya tvam vā vicāryate tad asiddhau hi nitya tvam api kasya bhavān abhidadhīt utpannasya ca asya tathā bhāvaḥ bhavati na anutpannasya utpannaḥ khalu ayam śabdaḥ iti bhavati na anutpannaḥ prāk utpatteḥ alabdha ātmanaḥ kim ucyate labdha svarūpasya punar anitya tva kāraṇa prayatna anantarīyaka tvasya sadbhāvāt ayuktaḥ eva ayam pratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,659,i_II,659,ii]	nitya anitya tva sādharmyāt saṃśathaḥ nitya nitya sādharmya upanyāsena saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇam pratyavasthānam saṃśaya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti asmin eva hetau asti śabdasya anitya sādharmyam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti ca nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyaka tvam atas krima nitya sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ uta nitya sādharmyāt aindriyaka tvāt nityaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ evam paraḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate na ca sādharmya sama prayogaḥ eva ayam āśaṅkanīyaḥ saṃśaya āpādana pravaṇa tvāt asya iti 
[II,659,iii_II,659,iv]	asya uttaram sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayaḥ vaidharmyāt ubhayathā vā saṃśaye atyanta saṃśayaḥ nitya tva anabhyupagamāt ca sāmānyasya apratiṣedhaḥ sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sthāṇu puruṣayoḥ sādharmyāt ūrdhva tva ādeḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavati na tu śiraḥ pāṇi ādi vaidharbhyāt pratyuta tatas asau nivartate yadi punar ubhayathā api sādharmyāt iva vaidharbhyadipi saṃśayaḥ syāt tathā sati atyanta saṃśayaḥ prāpnoti iha cani viśeṣa darśana sthānīyam anitya tva sādhanam śabde prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti iti nitya tvam sāmānya gatam saṃśaya kāraṇam iti na abhyupagabhyate tasmāt apratiṣedhaḥ ayam nitya sāmānya sādharmya nibandhana saṃśaya āpādana rūpaḥ 
[II,660,i_II,660,ii]	ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ pakṣa pratipakṣau nirṇaya lakṣaṇe vyākhyātau tau eva prakaraṇam prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati pūrvasmin eva prayoge nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt ākāśa vat iti evaṃjātīyakam pratiprayogam upanyasya sva pakṣam utthāpayati jāti vādī sādharmya grahaṇam ca upalakṣaṇam vaidharbhyeṇa api pratiprayoga upanyāse prakaraṇa samaḥ eva pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati ubhaya vaidharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ prakaraṇa samaḥ iti mūla hetau api sādharmyeṇa vaidharbhyeṇa vā prayukte prayoga dvayam etat veditavyam 
[II,660,iii]	nanu ca te eva ete sādharmya vaidharmya same jātī sādharmya hetau vaidharmya hetau vā prayujyamāna tvāt caturdhā sthite iti tābhyām eva gata tvāt na abhinavaḥ ayam jāti prayogaḥ catasraḥ ca etāḥ jātayaḥ iti eka tvam api na saṅgatam ucyate tatra para pakṣa pratiṣedha pravaṇa tayā eva pratyavasthānam udāhṛtam iha tu pakṣa sādhana chāyayā iti atas eva prakaraṇa samaḥ ayam ucyate jātiḥ anitya pakṣa vat nitya pakṣe api pratikriyate asyām iti udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā catur viśati bheda tvam vastutas tu tāsām ānantyam iti uktam 
[II,661,i_II,661,ii]	atra uttaram pratipakṣāt prakaraṇa siddheḥ pratiṣedha anupapattiḥ pratipakṣa upapatteḥ nirṇaya utpattyā prakaraṇam paryavasitam bhavati prāk nirṇayāt tad avastham eva tat iha prakaraṇam utthāpayatā bhavatā ubhaya sādharmyam tad utthāpana kāraṇam abhihitam ubhaya sādharmyāt prakriyā siddheḥ iti bruvatā ubhaya sādharmye ca mad uktam api sādharmyam asti eva anyathā ubhaya śabda arthaḥ kaḥ evam ca tad abhyanujñātam bhavati iti tad pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate pratiṣedha upapattau vā na ubhaya sādharmyam prakaraṇa kāraṇam sidhyati iti nirṇaya utpatti nimittam ca prakaraṇa uparamāya na kiṃcid uktam ubhaya sādharmya abhidhānāt iti 
[II,661,iii_II,662,i]	traikālya anupapatteḥ hetoḥ ahetu samaḥ kāla traya anupapattyā hetum ākṣipya kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ahetu samobhavati hetuḥ sādhanam sādhanam ca sādhyāt pūrvam paścāt vā saha vā bhavet yadi pūrvam asati sādhye tat kasya sādhanam atha paścāt sādhanam pūrvam sādhyam tat asati sādhane kasya idam sādhyam bhavet pūrva siddhe vā sādhye kim sādhanena atha yugapad sādhya sādhane bhavataḥ na tarhi tayoḥ savya itara go viṣāṇayoḥ iva sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ bhavet iti evam ayam hetuḥ ahetoḥ na viśiṣyate asya uttaram na hetu tassādhya siddheḥ traikālya asiddhiḥ 
[II,662,ii_II,662,iv]	na traikālya asiddhiḥ kasmāt hetutaḥ sādhya siddheḥ utpattau tāvat ayam paryanuyogaḥ pūrva siddhena hetunā tantu ādinā paścāt bhāvinaḥ asataḥ eva kāryasya paṭa ādeḥ siddhiḥ iti ukta tvāt buddhi siddham tu tat asat iti jñaptau api parihṛtaḥ eṣa doṣaḥ upalabdhi hetoḥ upalabdhi viṣayasya ca arthasya pūrva apara sahabhāva aniyamāt yathādarśanam vyavasthā iti pramāṇa parīkṣayām abhidhānāt dṛśyate ca nirvartana hetunā nirvartanīya nirvṛttiḥ upalabdhi hetunā ca upalabhyasya upalambhaḥ iti pramāṇa siddhe ca vastuni kaḥ ayam ākṣepaḥ pratiṣedhe ca tulyaḥ ayam anuyogaḥ iti āha pratiṣedha anupapatteḥ ca pratiṣeddhavya apratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ api pratiṣedhyāt pūrvam paścāt saha vā bhavet iti vikalpyamāne na pratiṣeddhavyam pratiṣeddhum utsahate iti 
[II,662,v_II,662,vi]	arthāpattitaḥ pratipakṣa siddheḥ arthāpatti samaḥ arthāt āpadyate pratipakṣa siddhiḥ iti evam kriyamāṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ arthāpatti samaḥ bhavati pūrvasmin eva prayoge yadi ghaṭa sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate ākāśa sādharmyāt nityaḥ iti asti ca asya nityena sādharmyam ākāśa ādinā dravyeṇa niravayava tvam iti udbhāvana prakāra bhedāt ca jāti bhedaḥ iti uktam 
[II,663,i_II,663,iii]	asya uttaram anuktasya arthāt āpatteḥ pakṣa hāneḥ upapattiḥ anupapādita sādhanam anuktam api arthāt āpadyate iti vadataḥ pakṣa hāniḥ api upapadyate māmaka anitya pakṣa siddhau hi satyām arthāt āpadyate tāvakasya nitya pakṣasya hāniḥ iti doṣa antaram āha anaikāntika tvāt ca arthāpatteḥ 
[II,663,iv]	ubhaya pakṣa tanānā iyam arthāpattiḥ viparyayeṇa api prayoktum śakya tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti evam api ukte śakyam vaktum yadi nitya ākāśa sādharmyāt niravayava tvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthāt āpadyate anitya ghaṭa ādi sādharmyāt prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ iti na ca evam api kācid artha siddhiḥ na khalu vai ghanasya grāvaṇaḥ patanam iti ukte arthāt āpadyate dravasya vāriṇaḥ patana abhāvaḥ iti 
[II,663,v_II,664,i]	eka dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ aviśeṣa upapādanena pratyavasthānam aviśeṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi śabda ghaṭayoḥ eka dharmaḥ prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam asti iti tayoḥ anitya tva aviśeṣaḥ ucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣa prasaṅgaḥ katham sadbhāva upapatteḥ sattā saṃbandhāt iti arthaḥ saḥ ayam aviśeṣa samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,664,ii_II,664,iii]	etasya uttaram kvacid tad dharma upapatteḥ kvacid anupapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ kvacid aviśeṣa āpādana hetuḥ upapadyate dharmaḥ kvacid tu na upapadyate iti evam ayama pratiṣedhaḥ śabda ghaṭayoḥ ekaḥ dharmaḥ prayatna ananta tarīyaka tvam asti yena tayoḥ dharma antaram anitya tvam aviśeṣa rūpam upapādyate na tu sarva bhāvānām īdṛśam aviśeṣa kāraṇam dharma jātam asti 
[II,664,iv]	yat tu sadbhāva upapatteḥ iti tena kim dharma antaram aviśeṣa rūpam sādhyeta anitya tvam eva iti ced tarhi ayam pratijñā arthaḥ vyavatiṣṭheta anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sattvāt iti sa ca ayam anupapannaḥ dṛṣṭānta anupapatteḥ sarva bhāvānām pakṣīkṛta tvāt dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kaścid avaśiṣyate na ca pratijñāta eka deśaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntīkartum śakyaḥ siddha sādhya bhedāt sādhyaḥ pratijñātaḥ arthaḥ bhavati siddhaḥ ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ca dṛṣṭānta rahitaḥ hetuḥ sva sādhya upasthāpana sāmarthyam aśnute 
[II,664,v_II,665,ii]	na ca saugata ukta nītyā nityebhyaḥ vyāpaka an upalabdhyā sattvam vyāvartita manityeṣu eva pratiṣṭhām labhate yā eva vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ saḥ eva sādhyena anugamaḥ iti vaktavyam tad nīteḥ prāk eva pratikṣepāt pratyuktam hi vistarataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam iti kiṃcid hi sattva yogi bhāva jātam anityam bhavati kiṃcid nityam iti na ayam ekāntaḥ sattvāt anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ iti api ca sarva bhāvānām anitya tve sādhyamāne tad antargata tvāt śabdasya api anitya tvam abhyupagatam bhavet iti evam api ayam apratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,665,iii_II,665,v]	ubhaya kāraṇa upapatteḥ upapatti samaḥ ubhaya kāraṇa upapattyā pakṣa dvaya upapatti varṇanam upapatti samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yadi anitya tva kāraṇam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upapadyate śabdasya iti anityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya tva kāraṇam api niravayava tvam asya upapadyate iti nityaḥ syāt ubhayatra api kāraṇa upapatteḥ 
[II,665,vi_II,665,vii]	nanu sā eva iyam sādharmya ādi samā prakaraṇa samā vā jātiḥ na bheda antaram mā evam udbhāvanā prakāreṇa bhedāt para pakṣa upamarda buddhyā sādharmya ādi samā jātiḥ prayujyate pakṣa antara utthāpana āsthayā prakaraṇa samā apratipatti paryavasāyi tvā śayena iyam upapatti sameti atra uttaram upapatti kāraṇa anujñānāt apratiṣedhaḥ 
[II,665,viii]	ubhaya kāraṇa upapattyā pratiṣedham abhidadhatā pakṣa dvaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ anujñātā bhavati sā ced anujñātā katham ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ekatara pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ced katham ubhaya kāraṇa upapattiḥ ubhaya pakṣa kāraṇa upapattiḥ ekatara pakṣa pratiṣadhaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham vyāghātāt eva tata pakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ avakalpate iti ced samānaḥ vyāghātaḥ tena hi para pakṣa vat sva pakṣaḥ api pratihanyate iti na hi vyāghātaḥ ekam pakṣam sādhayati ekam bādhate iti 
[II,666,i_II,666,ii]	nirdiṣṭa kāraṇa abhāve api upalambhāt upalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nirdiṣṭasya sādhya dharma siddhi kāraṇasya abhāve api sādhya dharma upalabdhyā pratyavasthānam upalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yat etat anitya tāyām śabdasya prayatnāḥ nantarīyaka tvam kāraṇam upadiṣṭam tasya abhāve api prabala prabhaṃjana java bhajyamāna jarat pāda papāta prabhave api śabde dṛśyate eva anitya tvam anyatra api vidyut ādau vinā api prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam upalabhyate eva anitya tā iti 
[II,666,iii_II,666,v]	asya uttaram kāraṇa antarāt api tad dharma upapatteḥ apratiṣedhaḥ atra etat eva tāvat vaktavyam sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛtti tvam idam asya hetoḥ udbhāvitam na ca sa pakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ agamakaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvam anitya tve pratibaddham na punar anityam prayatna ānantarīyaka tve yat prayatna anantaroyakam tat anityam iti hi vyāptiḥ na tu yat anityam tat prayatna ānantarīyakam iti yathā yatra agniḥ tatra dhūmaḥ iti na yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti evam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam antareṇa samīraṇaraya pātyamāna vanaspati ādi śabde vidyut ādau vā yā iyam anityatā upalabdhiḥ na sā tasya hetutām apahanti iti 
[II,667,i_II,667,ii]	api ca prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam iti kāraṇāt utpattiḥ iyam abhidhīyate na tu kāraṇam niyamyate prayatnaḥ eva iti tatra pavana nodana janita taru śabda vat asati api prayatne kāraṇa antaram tad utpādakam bhaviṣyati kāraṇa antara janye api anitya tvam śabde vidyut ādau vā na viruddham iti katham punar idam eva gamyate prayatna ādibhiḥ asan utpādyate śabdaḥ na punar sanna bhivyajyate iti sataḥ anupalabdhau nimitta abhāvāt āvaraṇam nimittam iti ced na mūla udaka ādiṣu mṛdaḥ iva śabde kasyacid āvaraṇasya agrahaṇāt tasmāt na mūlovaka ādinā tulyaḥ śabdaḥ iti asan ā iva prayatna ādinā kriyate iti 
[II,667,iii_II,667,iv]	tad anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt abhāva asiddhau tad viparīta upapatteḥ anupalabdhi samaḥ anupalabdheḥ anupalambha upanyāsena pratyavasthānam anupalabdhi samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yat uktam āvaraṇa anupalambhāt asati āvaraṇe prāc uccāraṇāt agrahaṇāt asan ā iva śabdaḥ prayatnena abhinirvaryatte iti tat ayuktam āvaraṇa anupabdheḥ api anupalambhāt tasyāḥ ca anupalambhāt abhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ abhāvāt upalabdhiḥ bhavati pratiṣedha dvayena vidheḥ eva pratīteḥ āvaraṇa upalabdheḥ ca āvaraṇa sattā siddhyati iti tat kṛtam eva śabdasya agrahaṇam na asattva kṛtam iti abhivyaṃjakam eva asya prayatna ādi kāraṇam iti 
[II,668,i_II,668,ii]	asya uttaram anupalambha ātmaka tvāt anupalabdheḥ ahetuḥ āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ na asti anupalabdheḥ iti yaḥ ayam hetuḥ uktaḥ sa na hetuḥ kutas anupalambha svabhāva tvāt anupalabdheḥ upalambha pratiṣedha ātmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ astitvanā astitve hi bhāvānām upalambha anupalambhābhyām avasthā apyete yat upalabhyate tat asti śaśa vat yat na upalabhyate tat na asti tad viṣāṇa vat na upalabhyate ca śabdasya āvaraṇam mūla udaka ādeḥ iva mṛttikā iti anupalambhāt na asti iti gamyate anupalambhaḥ hi ayam āvaraṇa viṣayaḥ na anupalabdhi viṣayaḥ saḥ āvaraṇasya eva na astitām avagamayati na anupalabdheḥ iti anupalabdheḥ bhāvāt āvaraṇam eva na asti iti 
[II,668,iii_II,668,iv]	jñāna vikalpānām ca bhāva abhāva saṃvedanāt adhyātmam jñāna vikalpāḥ pratīti prakārāḥ teṣām bhāva abhāvau prati prāṇi saṃvedyau bhavataḥ asti me jñānam iti evam sarvaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna āgama jñānāni pramāṇa phalāni smaraṇa saṃśaya ādi jñānāni ca pramāṇa phalāni anubhavati iti sā ca iyam āvaraṇa anupalabdhiḥ upalabdhi vat adhyātmam saṃvedyate na upalabhe śabdasya āvaraṇam mṛdam iva mūla udaka ādeḥ iti tat evam bāhya padārtha bhāva abhāva vat āntara jñāna bhāva abhāvayoḥ api pratyakṣa tvāt aparyanuyogaḥ ayam anupalabdheḥ anupalambhāt āvaraṇam asti śabdasya iti tasmāt prāk uccāraṇāt asan eva śabdaḥ iti siddham 
[II,669,i_II,669,ii]	sādharmyāt tulya dharma upapatteḥ sarva anitya tva prasaṅgāt anitya samaḥ sarva bhāva anitya tva prasaṅgena pratyavasthānam anitya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityena ghaṭena sādharmyam asti śabdasya iti yadi tasya anitya tvam ucyate tarhi sarva bhāvānām api ghaṭena kim api sādharmyam asti iti sarve eva anityāḥ syuḥ 
[II,669,iii_II,669,v]	aviśeṣa sanaiveyam jātiḥ iti ced na tatra hi sattā abhiyogāt sarva bhāvānām aviśeṣaḥ āpāditaḥ iha tu ghaṭa sādharmyāt eva anitya tvam āpādyate iti udbhāvana bhaṅgi bhedāt ca jāti nānātvam iti asakṛt uktam atra uttaram sādharmyāt api asiddheḥ pratiṣedha asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya sādharmyāt atiprasaṅgam āpādayataḥ hi etat vivakṣitam bhavati ghaṭa sādharmyāt asiddhiḥ anitya tvasya iti yadi ca ghaṭa sādharmyāt anitya tvasya asiddhiḥ tarhi tāvakasya asya pratiṣedha vākyasya api asiddhiḥ pratiṣedhya vākya sādharmyāt asti hi pratiṣedha vākyasya pratiṣedhya vākyena sādharmyam pratijña ādi ava yava yogitvam iti 
[II,670,i_II,670,ii]	kiṃca dṛṣṭānte sādhya sādhana bhāvena pratijñātasya dharmasya hetu tvāt tasya ca ubhayathā bhāva anna viśeṣaḥ na hi sādharmya mātram sādhanam bhavati api tu dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī avadhṛta sāmarbhyam sādharmyam vaidharmyam vā tathāvidham ced sarva bhāvānām asti bhavatu teṣām api anitya tvam kaḥ dveṣaḥ na asti ced kaḥ ayam ati prasaṅgaḥ na hi dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi prajñāta sāmarthyam sādharmyam ubhayathā bhavati pakṣa antaram spṛśati tena sādharmya viśeṣasya hetu tvāt tasya ca sarvatra asaṃbhavāt na sarva anitya tvam aviśeṣa samāyām ca jātau yat samādhānam uktam tat iha api vaktavyam iti 
[II,670,iii_II,670,iv]	nityam anitya bhāvāt anitye nitya tva upapatteḥ nisyasamaḥ anitya tva ākhya sādhya dharma svarūpa vikalpanena śabda nitya tva āpādanam nitya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñāte hi jāti vādī vikalpayati kim idam anitya tvam śabdasya nityam atha anityam iti yadi tāvat anityam tatha kadācid pracyaveta tad pracyuteḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ atha nityam anitya tvam tarhi dharmasya nitya tvāt tasya ca nirādhārasya anupapatteḥ tad āśrayasya śabdasya api nitya tvam anitya tve hi śabde vinā aṣṭe tad ādhāraḥ dharmaḥ kva varteta iti 
[II,671,i_II,671,ii]	asya uttaram pratiṣedhye nityam anitya bhāvāt anitya tva upapatteḥ pratiṣedha abhāvaḥ pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anitya tvasya bhāvaḥ ced ucyate tat anityaḥ eva asau uktaḥ bhavati anitya tva upapatteḥ ca tad pratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate nityam anitya tvam śabdasya iti ca bravīṣi nityatām ca tad yogāt asya upapādayasi iti mahān ayam āyuṣmataḥ bhramaḥ 
[II,671,iii_II,671,iv]	atha niradhikaraṇaḥ dharmaḥ katham syāt iti tat ucyate anitya tvam hi nāma nirodhaḥ pradhvaṃsaḥ abhāvaḥ iti anarthāntaram anitya tvāt abhāvaḥ iti tu vyavahāra mātram sā ca iyam anitya tā śabda avacchinnāḥ na śabda adhikaraṇā na ghaṭa abhāvaḥ ghaṭa āśritaḥ bhavitum arhati bhāva svabhāvāḥ hi dharmāḥ dharma āśritāḥ bhavanti na abhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ tu āśritaḥ api na pratiyogi āśritaḥ bhavati kintu artha antara vṛttiḥ bhū pradeśaḥ iva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti nitya anitya tva virodhāt ca nitya tvam anitya tvam ca ekatra dharmiṇi virudhyete tat katham abhidhīyate nityam anitya tvasya bhāvān nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti 
[II,671,v_II,671,vi]	prayatna kārya aneka tvāt kārya samaḥ prayatna kārya nānā tva upanyāsena pratyavasthānam kārya samaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti ukte aparaḥ āha prayatnasya hi kārya t vaidham upalabdham kiṃcid asat eva prayatnena nirvartyate yathā ghaṭa ādi kiṃcid sa deva āvaraṇa vyapanayana ādinā prayatnena abhivyajyate yathā mṛd antaritam udaka ādi evam prayatna kārya nānā tvāt kim prayatnena avidyamānaḥ śabdaḥ nirvartyate dhaṭa vat uta vidyamānaḥ eva abhivyajyate mṛd antarita salila vat iti saṃśayaḥ 
[II,672,i_II,672,ii]	na ca iyam saṃśaya samā jātiḥ hetu artha vikalpanena atra pratyavasthānāt tatra hi niravayava tu a ādi ākāśa dharma upanyāsena saṃśayaḥ āpāditaḥ iha tu sādhana vādī ukta prayatna anantarīyaka tva hetu artha nirūpaṇena iti udbhāvanā prakāra bhedaḥ ca jātīnām vaicitrya kāraṇam iti uktam eva atra uttaram kārya anya tve prayatna ahetu tvam anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ 
[II,672,iii_II,672,iv]	yadi api prayatna kārya anyatvam upalabhyate tathā api prakṛte śabde prayatnasya abhivyaktauvahetutvam na prayatnataḥ śabdam abhivyanakti kintva bhūta prādurbhāvam eva vidhatte kasmāt anupalabdhi kāraṇa anupapatteḥ yatra hi sataḥ padārthasya pratyatnaḥ abhivyakti hetuḥ tatra tasya sataḥ salila ādeḥ anupalabdhi kāraṇam asti mṛdādi vya vadhānam tat apoham ācaratā prayatnena tad abhivyaktiḥ saṃpādyate śabdasya tu na kiṃcid anupalabdhi nibandhanam vyavadhāna ādi saṃbhavati iti varṇitam atas tasya asataḥ eva ātma lābha nimittam uccāraṇa ādi prayatnaḥ na sataḥ abhivyakti nimittam tasmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti siddham tat evam anena catur viśatividha jāti udāharaṇa pratisamādhāna upadeśa vartmanā śabda anitya tva sādhake parakīyam upālambha jātam evaṃprāyam akhilam apākṛtam āmra seka pitṛ tarpaṇa nyāyena bhavati bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa 
[II,673,i]	idam aparam idānīm upadiśyate catur viśatau api jāti vādinā prayuktāsu mūla sādhana vādī vispaṣṭa anumāna udanta parīkṣaṇa purassaram sadeva uttaram yathā upadiṣṭam abhidadhīta na tu jāti prayoga anukāri duruttara ālāpa cāpalena ṣaṣ pakṣīm pravartayet tasyām hi prastutāyām ubhayoḥ api vādi prativādinoḥ asiddhiḥ asat vāci tvāt katham punar ṣaṣ pakṣī pravartate iti tat patham darśayitum āha pratiṣedhe hi samānaḥ doṣaḥ 
[II,673,ii_II,673,iv]	sthāpanā hetu vādinā prathama pakṣa sthena sthāpanā hetuḥ prayuktaḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt iti tatas jāti vādī dvitīya pakṣa sthaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti prayatnāḥ nantarīyaka tvam abhivyaṅgye api śabde bhavati iti hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam āha tad adhunā tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ sthāpanā hetu vādī yadi yathā upadiṣṭam āvaraṇa anupalabdhi kramam anusṛtya viśeṣam upadarśayan anaikāntika tām uddharati tatas tāvati eva paryavasyati kathā iti caturtha ādi pakṣa avasara virahāt na avatarati eva ṣaṣ pakṣī 
[II,673,v]	yadi tu tam kramam apahāya eva tṛtīya pakṣa sthaḥ asau vadati hetoḥ ca id ana ekānti katvam udbhāvayasi anaikāntika tvāt asādhakaḥ syāt iti nanu ayam tāvakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ api anaikāntikaḥ kiṃcid pratiṣedhati kiṃcid na iti hetossādhaka tvam pratiṣedhati na svarūpam iti atas eva ittham pratiṣedhasya anaikāntika tvāt saḥ api hi na abhi vyakti pakṣam eva sādhayet utpatti pakṣe api prayatna sāphalya upapatteḥ ubhayatra api ca viśeṣa hetoḥ anapadeśāt evam anaikāntika tvam abhihitavati sādhana vādini bhavati pratiṣaidha vādinaḥ api vacana avasaraḥ iti avatarati ṣaṣ pakṣī 
[II,674,i_II,674,ii]	sa hi caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ eva vadati pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe tad pratiṣedha doṣavat doṣaḥ vividhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ iha ucyate na vyādhātaḥ prakṛta saṅgatera bhāvāt yaḥ ayam pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ anaikāntika tva doṣaḥ ucyate sa pratiṣedha pratiṣedhe api bhavat prayukte samānaḥ saḥ api hi pūrvavat anaikāntikaḥ eva iti tatas paṃcamam pakṣam abalambya mūla sādhana vādī mata anujñām udbhāvayati 
[II,674,iii_II,674,iv]	sā ca pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samāna doṣa prasaṃgaḥ mata anujñā pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti samudbhāvitam doṣam anuddhṛtya tam pratiṣedham sa doṣam abhyupetya mad ukte pratiṣedha vipratiṣedhe samāna doṣa prasaṅgam āpādayataḥ te mata anujñā nigraha sthānam bhavati coraḥ bhavān iti ukte abhiyuktena cauryam ātmanaḥ nirākaraṇīyam na tu bhavān api coraḥ iti paraḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti 
[II,674,v]	evam paṃcama pakṣa sthe mūla sādhana vādini kathitavati paraḥ ṣaṣṭham pakṣam āsthāya punar abhidhatte yadi sva pakṣa doṣān uddharaṇa purassara para pakṣa doṣa āpādana upanata mata anujñā nigraha sthāna pātram aham ādiśye hanta tarhi tava api tat eva nigraha sthānam avatarati tvam api evam akārṣīḥ tathā hi dvitīya pakṣa sthena mayā prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti yat anaikāntika tvam udbhāvitam tad anuddhṛtya eva pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti mayi eva pratīpam āpāditam tat evam tvattaḥ eva śikṣitvā aham api caturtha pakṣa sthaḥ tathā eva tvayi doṣam arpitavān iti mama ced matā anujñā prathamataram tava asau bhavet iti 
[II,675,i_II,675,ii]	tat etat āha sva pakṣa lakṣaṇa apekṣā upapatti upasaṃhāra hetu nirdeśe para pakṣa doṣa abhyupagamāt samānaḥ doṣaḥ sva pakṣaḥ mūla sādhanavādi uktaḥ prayatna anantarīyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tad lakṣaṇaḥ tat samutthānaḥ tad viṣayaḥ prayatna kārya aneka tvāt iti pratiṣedhaḥ tam apekṣamāṇaḥ tam anuddhṛtya anujñāya pravṛttaḥ pratiṣedhe api samānaḥ doṣaḥ iti upapadyamānaḥ para pakṣe anaikāntika tva doṣa upasaṃhāraḥ tasya ca hetu nirdeśaḥ iti ayam anaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti tasmin sati para pakṣa kathitānai kāntika tva doṣa abhyupagamāt tad anuddharaṇena tasya eva pratīpa doṣa udbhāvanāt samānaḥ mata anujñā doṣaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ 
[II,675,iii_II,675,iv]	sā iyam ṣaṣ pakṣī tasyām prathama tṛtīya paṃcamāḥ sthāpanā hetu vādinaḥ pakṣāḥ dvitīya vaturtha ṣaṣṭhāḥ pratiṣedha vādinaḥ ete ca sādhya sādhaka tayā parīkṣyamāṇāḥ paunarukti amata anujñā ādi doṣa apahata tvāt anyatarasya api vādinaḥ sādhya siddhaye na prakalpante tathā hi caturtha ṣaṣṭhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ artha aviśeṣāt punarukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ caturthe pakṣe parasya samāna doṣa tvam ucyate ṣaṣṭhe api tathā eva samānaḥ tṛtīya paṃcamayoḥ tṛtīye pakṣe parokṣam samāna doṣa tvam abhyupagamyate paṃcame api mata anujñām udbhāvayatā tad aṅgīkṛtam eva bhavati tṛtīya caturthayoḥ ca para ukta doṣān uddharaṇāt tu mata anujñā ityā evam ṣaṣ pakṣyām ubhayoḥ asiddhiḥ tasmāt sat uttaraiḥ eva doṣa cikitsā sādhīyasī na asat uttaraiḥ ṣaṣ pakṣī prasaṅgāt iti 
[II,676,i]	nanu asat uttara kathane api katham ṣaṣ pakṣyām eva virāmaḥ śatapakṣī sahasrapakṣī vā katham na pravartate kaḥ atra niyamaḥ iti ced ucyate iyati eva nivartate vacana avakāśaḥ iti na ananta pakṣa tā saṃbhavati tathā hi pūrva uttara pakṣa vādinau tāvat sādhana dūṣaṇa vādinau bhavataḥ eva kaḥ atra vicāraḥ tatra sthāpanā hetu vādinā tāvat prathamam sva pakṣa sādhane abhihite dūṣaṇa vādinā ca tatra dūṣaṇe varṇite tṛtīye vacasi vartamānaḥ sādhana vādī samyak ni itya upakramamāṇaḥ tad dūṣaṇam uddhartum śaknuyāt na vā iti tasyām eva daśāyām prāṅvivāka āyattaḥ nirṇayaḥ 
[II,676,ii]	asat uttara upanyāse tu tṛtīya vacasā tena kṛte dūṣaṇa vādi api labdha avakāśaḥ tatas eva śikṣitvā caturthe vacasi vartamānaḥ tad pratīpam yojayati tatas sthāpanā hetuvādī pratīpa yojana āyāma phalāyām duruttarāyām samavyaya phalāyām aśakya kriyāyām ca nirudyogaḥ kiṃcid abhinavam dūṣaṇam utprekṣya paṃcame vacasi sthitaḥ mata anujñām āha 
[II,676,iii]	tatas tām api para pakṣam anativartamānām paśyan pratiṣedha vādī ṣaṣṭhe vacasi sthitvā tām tad pakṣaḥ eva yojayati iti evam vṛtte dūṣaṇa antara asaṃbhavāt pratīpa yojane ca bhagna rasa tvāt tūṣṇīm eva asitum ucitam iti tāvatī eva bhavati vacana viratiḥ na śata sahasra ādi pakṣa prasaṅgaḥ pravartate iti atas ṣaṣ pakṣīm eva darśitavān ācāryaḥ sa ca antevāsinam bodhayitum evam upāḥ diśadanena pathā pravarteta bhavān anyena mā pravartiṣṭa iti 
[II,677,i]	vācyam uttaram atas niravadyam jātivādinam api prati tad jñaiḥ kaśmala uttara girā na tu kāryā pakṣa ṣaṭka parikalpa na goṣṭhī yādṛś yajñaḥ baliḥ api tathā iti evam ādāya buddhau yaḥ tu brūyāt kaluṣam aphalaḥ tasya śuddhaḥ api hetuḥ ṣaṣ pakṣa ādi prasaraṇa parimlāna kāntiḥ na buddhim śaktaḥ sva arthe janayitum asau agrataḥ prāśnikānām 
[II,677,ii]	iti idam vyākhyātam nija saraṇi sāṅkarya rahitam svarūpam jātīnām sphuṭam iha caturviśatividham amūṣām tattva jñaḥ para viracitānām parihṛtau svayam ca upanyāse na hi sadasi saṃmuhyati naraḥ 
[II,677,iii_II,678,i]	jāti anantaram nigraha sthāna uddeśāt tad lakṣaṇa pratipādana artham āha tad vikalpāt jāti nigraha sthāna bahu tvam nigrahaḥ parājayaḥ tasya sthānam āśrayaḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ kiṃca parājaya nimittam vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca viparītā kutsitā garhaṇīyā pratipattiḥ vipratipattiḥ sādhana ābhāse sādhana buddhiḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāse dūṣaṇa buddhiḥ apratipattiḥ tu ārambha viṣaye anārambhaḥ ārambhasya viṣayaḥ sādhane dūṣaṇam dūṣaṇe ca uddhāraḥ tayoḥ akaraṇam apratipattiḥ 
[II,678,ii]	dvidhā hi vādaḥ parājīyate yathākartavyam anārabhamāṇaḥ viparītam vā pratipādyamānaḥ atas eva na karma karaṇayoḥ nigraham ādiśanti na hi tābhyām kiṃcid aparāddham sva viṣaye prayujyamānayoḥ sāmarthya an apāyāt kartā tu pramādyan aprayojyam prayuṃjānaḥ prayojyam aprayuṃjānaḥ vā nigraham arhati prāyeṇa ca atattva vādinaḥ nigṛhyāḥ bhavanti 
[II,678,iii]	tattva vādī api kadācana jalpe vitaṇḍāyām vā samyak sādhanam api apadiśya prativādi pratipādita dūṣaṇa ābhāsa nirākaraṇa saraṇim anuguṇām apaśyan nigṛhyate eva atas eva ca bhāṣya kṛta uktam tattva vādi nam atattva vādinam ca abhiplavante nigraha sthānāni iti asamāsa karaṇam aneka nigraha sthāna bheda avarodha artham 
[II,678,iv_II,678,v]	atas eva anantaram āha tad vikalpāt jāti nigraha sthāna bahu tvam tat iti sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthānasya vipratipatti apratipattyoḥ ca parāmarśaḥ nānā kalpaḥ vikalpaḥ prakāra bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ sādharmya vaidharmyābhyām pratyavasthāna prakārasya bahu tvāt jāti bahu tvam tat vyākhyātam vipratipatti apratipatti prakāra bahu tvāt nigraha sthāna bahu tvam 
[II,679,i]	tat dvāviṃśatidhā vibhajya daśaṃyati pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñā virodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāsaḥ hetu antaram artha antaram nirarthakam avijñāta arthakam apārtha kamaprāpta kālam nyūnam adhikam punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ mata anujñā paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam niranuyojya anuyogaḥ apasiddhāntaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ ca nigraha sthānāni 
[II,679,ii]	atra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepaḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam iti apratipattyā saṅgṛhītāni śeṣāṇi vipratipattyā punaruktam adhikam iti asamāsa karaṇena vipratipattyā eva vā abhimatam kim asa māsa kliṣṭa kalpanayā sā api hi kutsitā eva pratipattiḥ yat punaruktam adhikam vā prayujyate iti asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā ca dvāviṃśati bheda saṅkīrtanam avāntara bhedaiḥ tu jāti vat ānantyam eva teṣām iti 
[II,679,iii_II,680,i]	atra kīrtiḥ āha dvāviṃśatidhā nigraha sthānāni vibhajyante teṣām ca pratipadam idānīm viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni varṇyante iti na mṛṣyāmahe kutas asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam dvayoḥ nigraha sthānam anyat tu na yuktam iti na iṣyate vādinā siṣā dhayiṣita pakṣa siddhaye sādhanam abhidheyam sa ced asādhana aṅgam brūyāt nigṛhyeta prativādinā api vādi ukte sādhane dūṣaṇam udbhāvanīyam sa ced adoṣam eva doṣa tvena udbhāvayet nigṛhyeta te eva dvayoḥ vādi prativādinoḥ nigraha sthāne atas anyathā nigraha karaṇam anyāyyam eva pratijñāhāni ādiṣu tad prabhedeṣu ca pratipadam ayukta tām darśayiṣyate kati chātra śiśu pralāpa prāyāṇi nigraha sthānāni nirdiṣṭāni tādṛṃśi śāstre lakṣyante iti paramam apratiṣṭhānam 
[II,680,ii_II,680,iii]	atra ucyate saṃkṣepa vivakṣayā dve eva nigraha sthāne iti vayam api kim na uktavantaḥ vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca nigraha sthānam iti etat ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam akhila bheda saṅgraha kṣamam bhavati na bhavat uktam tathā hi uttara apratibhānena vādinoḥ anyataraḥ parājīyate na vā na parājīyate iti katham ucyate tat kim mūkaḥ eva jitvā gacchatu nigṛhyate ced kim anena aparāddham na adoṣaḥ udbhāvitaḥ 
[II,680,iv]	atha prasajya pratiṣedhena udbhāvanā bhāvaḥ eva vyākhyāyate tarhi dūṣaṇa ābhāsa udbhāvanam anumatam syāt atha doṣa an udbhāvanam ādau vyākhyāya punar adoṣa udbhāvanam āvṛttya paryudāsena varṇyate hanta tarhi te eva ete vipratipatti apratipattī ukte syātām doṣa an udbhāvanam apratipattiḥ viparīta doṣa udbhāvanam vipratipattiḥ 
[II,680,v]	evam asādhana aṅga vacanam api vikalpanīyam prasajya pratiṣedha vṛtti a sādhana aṅgasya avacanam ced sā iyam apratipattiḥ paryudāsa vṛttyā sādhana aṅgāt anyat ced vacanam sā iyam vipratipattiḥ atas śabda antareṇa akṣa pāda pādebhyaḥ eva śikṣitvā tat eva nigraha sthāna dvayam anena śloka dvayena nibaddham na punar abhinavam alpam api kiṃcid utprekṣitam iti 
[II,681,i]	na ca yathā saṃkhya niyamena dvayoḥ dve nigraha sthāne varṇanīye api tu yathā saṃbhavam ubhayoḥ api yathāvasaram tad tad nigraha sthānam ādeṣṭavyam dvāviṃśati bheda tvam ca nigraha sthānānām asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā kathyate na niyamāya iti uktam eva paraspara visadṛśam ca lakṣaṇam eṣām idānīm upadiśyate eva tatra eva ca ayukta tvam eṣām bāliśa pralāpa kalpa tvam vā parākriyate eva iti alam ati prasaṅgena
