[II,681,ii_II,681,iv]	evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vibhāgam ca abhidhāya viśeṣa lakṣaṇāni āha pratidṛṣṭānta dharma anujñā sva dṛṣṭānte pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñā siddhaye vādinā sādhane abhihite tatra prativādinā ca dūṣaṇe udbhāvite tṛtīye vacasi tu vartamānaḥ vādī yadi pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam sva dṛṣṭānte anujānāti tat asya pratijñā hīyate iti pratijñāhāniḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati tat yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti ukte paraḥ āha sāmānyam aindriyakam api nityam dṛṣṭam iti anaikāntikaḥ hetuḥ iti 
[II,682,i]	tatra sādhata vādī āha sāmānyam aindriyakam nityam tarhi tathā eva ghaṭaḥ api nityaḥ astu iti ayam asya evaṃvadataḥ bhramaḥ kila nitya anitya pakṣa vṛttiḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhavati hetuḥ ghaṭasya tu nityatāyām ekasmin itya pakṣaḥ eva vṛtteḥ anaikāntika tām eṣa vijahyāt iti tat evam asya bruvat pratijñāhāniḥ bhavati ghaṭasya hi nitya tve tad dṛṣṭānta balāt eva śabdaḥ api nityaḥ syāt iti 
[II,682,ii_II,682,iii]	atra kīrtiḥ āha pratijñā eva tāvat asādhana aṅga vacanam iti tad abhidhānam nigraha sthānam bhavitum arhati na tad hāniḥ na ca hāniḥ api asti yadi nāma ghaṭasya dṛṣṭantīkṛtasya pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam nitya tvamayam abhyupaiti kimiyatā śabda anitya tva pratijñām avajahāti api ca hetvābhāsāḥ api nigraha sthāna varge gaṇitāḥ eva sa ca ayam anaikāntika hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva parājīyate na pratijñā ahā anyā iti tasyāḥ viṣaya antaram vaktavyam 
[II,682,iv]	atra ucyate pratijñāyāḥ tāvat asādhana aṅga vacana tā na asti iti avayava lakṣaṇe nirṇītam etat pratijñā asiddhi arthaḥ eva sarva vādinām prayāsaḥ anirdiṣṭā ca sā sādhayitum aśakyā eva iti na tad vacanam asādhana aṅga vacanam laukikeṣu api ṛṇa ādāna ādi vivāda padeṣu pratijñā ahānim eva mukhyam parājaya kāraṇam āhuḥ yathā aaha nāradaḥ sāraḥ tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā tad hānau hīyate vādī taran tām uttaraḥ bhavet iti pratidṛṣṭānta dharmam ca sva dṛṣṭānte abhyupagacchan utsṛjati eva pratijñām nitya tvam hi sāmānya vat ghaṭasya api sahate tad ṛṣṭānta balena śabde api siṣādhayiṣati iti nūnam idānīm nitya tvam eva ghaṭa dharmaḥ śabde siddhyet iti katham tat anitya tva pratijñā asya na hīyate 
[II,683,i]	yat tu uktam hetvābhāsa prayogaḥ eva nigraha nimittam na pratijñā hāniḥ iti syāt etat evam yadi dvitīye vacasi vyavasthitena prativādinā vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ vādī tāvatī eva viramet sa tu tṛtīye vacasivartamānaḥ tad uddharaṇa buddhyā tathāvidham abhidhatte yena pratijñām jahāti atas ca vyabhicāra pariharaṇa lobha abhihita pratidṛṣṭānta dharma abhyanujña vacana upanata tad artha pratijñā ahāni nibandha naḥ eva asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ na hetvābhāsa prayoga kṛtaḥ iti ayam eva mukhyaḥ pratijñā hāneḥ viṣayaḥ 
[II,683,ii_II,684,i]	pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe dharme vikalpāt tad artha nirdeśaḥ pratijñāntaram pratijñāta artha pratiṣedhe pareṇa kṛte tatra eva dharmiṇi dharma antaram sādhanīya vādinaḥ pratisā antaram mabhidadhataḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte pūrvavat sāmānyena vyabhicāra udbhāvanayā pratyavasthitaḥ āha sāmānyam aindriyakam yat nityam tat yuktam tat hi sarva gatam asarva gataḥ tu śabdaḥ iti naḥ darśanam iti saḥ ayam anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pūrva pratijñātaḥ anyam asarva gataḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñām kurvan pratijñā antareṇa nigṛhītaḥ bhavati 
[II,684,ii_II,684,iv]	atra āha na idam aprastuta pratijñā antara karaṇam api tu para udbhāvita vyabhicāra nirākaraṇa viśeṣa utpādanam etat uktam bhavati asarva gata tve satya aindriyaka tvāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti tat idam asarva gata tva pratijñā siddhi artham upāttam katham nigraha sthānam yaḥ hi mīmāṃsakam prati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti uktavān tena kṛtaka tvam asiddham iti upālabdhaḥ kṛtaka tva siddhaye yateta sa kim kṛtaka tva pratijña antara kara ṇāt nigṛhyeta yaḥ tu pūrva pratijñām avadhīrya tat anaupayikam akasmāt eva pratijñāntaram ārabheta sa tadā unmattaḥ eva bhavet na ca unmatta pralāpānām śāstre lakṣaṇa karaṇam yuktam spaṣṭe ca nigraha hetau hetvābhāsa abhidhāne saṃbhavati kim iti pratijñā antaram nigraha sthānam ucyate iti 
[II,684,v_II,685,i]	atra ucyate pratijñā siddhaye hetu dṛṣṭāntau prayoktavyau na punar pratijñāntaram karaṇīyam iti sthitiḥ iha ca yaḥ hetuḥ anena upāttaḥ tasmin pareṇa anaikāntikīkṛte sati na tad parihāra prakāram anuguṇam ayam āsthitavān api tu asarva gata tva pratijñām anyām ārūḍhaḥ nanu viśeṣaṇam etat aneka antika tva parihāra artham na pratijñāntaram iti uktam na asiddha tvāt siddham hi viśeṣaṇam bhavati nitya tva vādinam ca prati śabdasya asarva gata tvam asiddham sādhyate ced tarhi pratijñā antaram eva idam hetu ādi avayava vailakṣaṇyāt pratijñā lakṣaṇasya ca sādhya nirdeśasya upapatteḥ anaikāntika tva parihṛtaye hi hetu viśeṣaṇam siddham vācyam na tu dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca iti 
[II,685,ii]	anyatara asiddhe tu hetvābhāse tad samarthanam prakrama anurūpam eva iti na pratijñā antaram nigraha sthānam bhavati iha tu anaikāntika tva parihārāya yatamānaḥ mārgam anuguṇam apaśyan skhalitaḥ iti nigṛhyate na ca hetu udādaraṇa ādi prayoga nipuṇa mateḥ api bhramāt evaṃvidham abhidhānam na saṃbhavati na ca pratijñā mātreṇa siddhim icchan evam bravīti api tu vyabhicāram parijihīrṣan iti 
[II,685,iii_II,686,i]	na ca ayam unmatta pralāpaḥ eva prastuta anuguṇya buddhyā prayogāt api ca anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti ubhayāsiddhaḥ nāma hetvābhāsaḥ bhavadbhiḥ api śāstre lakṣitaḥ eva saḥ unmatta pralāpaḥ na bhavati yathā udāhṛtam tat pratijñā antaram unmatta pralāpaḥ iti apūrvaḥ eṣa bhikṣoḥ sva darśane rāgaḥ para darśane dveṣaḥ vā kaḥ hi nāma śiśuḥ api śabde cākṣuṣa tām brūyāt idam tu saṃbhavati eva abhidhānam kevalam hetu viśeṣaṇe siddhe ca vaktavye bhramāt dharmi viśeṣaṇam sādhyam ca ayam uktavān iti nigṛhyate tṛtīye vacasi sthitaḥ ca evam asau uktavān iti nimitta antaram idam asya nigrahe nirūpitam dvitīyaḥ eva tu vacasi kathā viratau hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva nigraham āpnuyāt iti pratijñā hāni prastāvaḥ eva uktam 
[II,686,ii_II,686,iii]	pratijñā hetvaḥ virodhaḥ pratijñā virodhaḥ yatra pratijñā hetunā viruddhayate hetuḥ vā pratijñayā saḥ pratijñāvirodhaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam iti pratijñā rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anupalabdheḥ iti hetuḥ saḥ ayam pratijñā hetvaḥ virodhaḥ yadi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam na tarhi rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anumalabdhiḥ atha rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya anupalabdhiḥ na tarhi guṇa vyatiriktam dravyam guṇa vyatirikta ca dravyam ca rūpa ādi vyatiriktasya anupaladheḥ iti yāhatam 
[II,686,iv]	atra āha na idam pratijñā hetvoḥ virodha udāharaṇam bhavatum arhati hetoḥ asaṃbhavāt saṃbhavan hi hetuḥ pratijñāyāḥ viruṇaddhi tayā vā viruddhyate iha tu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ na samasti eva rūpa ādibhyaḥ artha antarasya pṛthaktvena upalabdhi yogyatva anupapatteḥ saṃbhavan api ca evaṃvidhe viṣaye pratijñā virodhe hetuḥ na dvayīm doṣa jātim ativartate viruddha tvam asiddha tvam vā guṇa vyatirikta dravya vādinaḥ hi bhedena agrahaṇam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ siddha tve vā sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ iti atas hetvābhāsa grahaṇena gata artha tvāt na pṛthak vaktavyam idam nigraha sthānam 
[II,687,i]	yat anyat anyaiḥ udāharaṇam abhāṇi nityaḥ śabdaḥ sarvasya anitya tvāt iti tat api asādhu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya anena prakāreṇa kuśikṣitaiḥ abhidhānāt tathā hi sarva śabdaḥ atra sa avayava vacanaḥ iti niravayava tvam hetuḥ vivakṣitaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti tatra vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhya abhāve hetoḥ abhāvam pradarśayatā vaktavyam nityaḥ śabdaḥ anitya sarva tvāt sāvayava tvāt iti saḥ ayam aśikṣita vaidharmya dṛṣṭāṃta pradarśana prakramaiḥ viparyayeṇa vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ eva kathitaḥ sarvasya anisya tvāt iti tad uktam sa hi duṣṭa antaḥ eva uktaḥ vaidharmyeṇa su śikṣitaiḥ iti tasmāt na idam api pratijñā hetu virodha udāharaṇam iti 
[II,687,ii]	atra ucyate yat uktam hetoḥ asaṃbhavān na idam nigraha sthānam iti tat acāru paṃcami anta nirdiṣṭasya hetoḥ pradarśita tvāt niravadya hetu abhāvāt tu yadi tat asaṃbhavaḥ ucyate tarhi hetvābhāsa vyākaraṇam api akaraṇīyam bhavet puruṣa buddhi pramāda nibandhana hetu prayogaḥ tu tathāvidham api abhidhānam saṃbhavati eva 
[II,687,iii]	yappunar abhyadhāyi saṃbhavan api hetuḥ ayam asiddha viruddhayoḥ anyataraḥ bhavet na dūṣaṇa antaram iti tatra brūmaḥ satyam etat kintu hetu svarūpa nirūpaṇa avasare sa yadi tad gata doṣa adoṣa darśanāt viruddha tā tasya abhidhīyate yathā bhavadbhiḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt iti viruddha hetau varṇite kvacid siddha sādhya tva dṛṣṭānta hīna tā ādi doṣa antara saṃbhave tad avadhīraṇayā viruddha tvam eva darśitam yathā vā hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇe kathitam asmābhiḥ anityaḥ śabdaḥ cākṣuṣa tvāt iti asya anaikāntika tva doṣe sati api prathama tarama siddha tā eva hṛdaya patham avatarati tena asiddhaḥ ayam ucyate na savyabhicāraḥ iti evam iha api hetu guṇa doṣa vicāre kriyamāṇe viruddha tā ādi hetvābhāsa tā asya kathyate 
[II,688,i]	yadā tu para artha anumāna vākyasya paṃcāvayavasya para matena vā vyavayavasya paraspara anvita padārtha samudāya ātmā vākya arthaḥ cintyate tatra itaretara vyāhata artha vādinoḥ pratijñā hetu padayoḥ asaṃsargāt tad virodhaḥ eva jhaṭiti manasi viparivartate iti saḥ eva nigraha nimittam bhavitum arhati yatas itaretara virodhinam ananvitā artham am idadhati vākye api vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ vā bhavet iti adaḥ eva nigraha sthānam 
[II,688,ii_II,688,iii]	api ca sādhya viparyaya sādhakaḥ eva viruddha hetuḥ ucyate yaḥ pratijñām eva bādhate iha tu pratijñayā hetuḥ vā adhyate pratijñā vā hetunā iti vikalpyamāna tvāt nigraha sthāna antaram eva idam ittham asya eva udāharaṇasya upapatteḥ udāharaṇa antara nirūpaṇam vṛthā aṭāṭyā eva 
[II,689,i_II,689,ii]	bhāṭṭauḥ tu bhavadīyam nirālambana sādhanam pratijñā virodha udāharaṇam varṇitam nirālambanāḥ sarve pratyayāḥ pratyaya tvāt iti yatas pratyaya tva hetu grāhaka jñāna sālambana tve tena eva eṣā pratijñā viruddhadhyate tad nirālambana tve tu hetu abhāvaḥ eva syāt iti tat uktam vispaṣṭaḥ ca akṣapāda uktaḥ virodhaḥ hetu sādhyayoḥ yama dṛṣṭavā paraiḥ uktam adūṣaṇam idam kila iti tat sarvathā sulabha udāharaṇam idam pratijñā hetu virodha ākhyam nigraha sthānam iti sthitiḥ 
[II,689,iii_II,689,v]	pakṣa pratiṣedhe pratijñāta artha apanayanam pratijñāsannyāsaḥ pakṣa sādhane pareṇa dūṣite tad uddhāraṇā śaktyā pratijñām eva nihnuvānasya pratijñāsannyāsaḥ nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyaka tvāt iti ukte tathā eva sāmānyena anaikāntika tāyām uddhāṭitāyām yat pratibravīti kaḥ evam āhānityaḥ śabdaḥ iti saḥ ayam evaṃbruvan pratijñāsannyāsāt parājīyate 
[II,689,vi_II,690,i]	atra āha atisthūlaḥ khalu ayam pramādaḥ kaḥ hi nāma prativādī prāśnika sannidhāne pratijñām kṛtvā tadā eva teṣām eva abhraṣṭa saṃskārāṇām puratas apasmāraka ādi anupapluta matiḥ tām eva nihnuvīta api ca dyūta parājita paṇa rahita śaṭha kitava vat udāsīnaḥ pratijñām ajahat api hetau anaikāntike kim asau na nigṛhyate na hi pratijñāyāḥ tyāga atyāgau tadīyayoḥ nigraha anigrahayoḥ prayojakau api tu hetu guṇa doṣau eva sa ca ayam sādhana vyabhicārāt eva anitya pakṣaḥ parājīyate iti alam sannyāsena iti 
[II,690,ii_II,690,iv]	atra ucyate para udbhāvita hetu anaikāntika tva dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa raṇa raṇa katara lita mateḥ bhavet api ayam pramādaḥ evam hi asau vadati mayā uktam saṃyoga viyoga vyaṅgyaḥ śabdaḥ na bhavati na tu anityaḥ iti ayam āśayaḥ tu evaṃdataḥ kila saṃyoga vibhāga anabhivyaṅgya tve mayā pakṣīkṛte sāmānyena vyabhicāraḥ na bhaviṣyati iti tat api hi tādṛśam eva sva āśraya vyaṅgya tvāt iti muhyataḥ na ati sthūlam amum īdṛśam pramādam pratipannasya bhavati eva nigraha hetuḥ apramādinoḥ tu nigrahaḥ nāma na asti eva kaścid iha loke para loke vā yat tu tadīyayoḥ pratijñā tyāga atyāgayoḥ anaikāntika tvena eva asau nigṛhyate iti syāt etat evam yadi vyabhicāra udbhāvana samanantaram asau tūṣṇīm eva āsīta tathāvidham tu bruvāṇaḥ tasya eva parājaya hetoḥ sannikṛṣṭa tvāt tena eva nigṛhītaḥ bhavati na anaikāntika prayogeṇa iti 
[II,690,v_II,691,i]	aviśeṣa ukte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchataḥ hetu antaram aviśeṣa abhihite hetau pratiṣiddhe tad viśeṣaṇam abhidadhataḥ hetu antaram nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā sāṃkhyasya itthaṃvadataḥ eka prakṛti idam vyaktam parimāṇāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti dvividham ca vikāreṣu dṛṣṭam iyattā lakṣaṇam aṅkura ādeḥ phala antarasya caturaśratā ca ghaṭa ādeḥ mṛd pūrvakasya tade tad parimitam nikāra jātam eka prakṛtikam dṛṣṭam iti atas sarvam idam eka prakṛti bhavitum arhati yā ca sā ekā prakṛtiḥ tat pradhānam iti 
[II,691,ii]	asya hetoḥ vyabhicāraḥ nānā prakṛtīnām api pariṇāma darśanāt iti tad parijihīrṣayā viśeṣaṇam āha samanvayāt iti sukha duḥkha moha samanvitam hi sarvam vyaktam parimitam dṛśyate iti tasya prakṛti antara rūpa samanvaya abhāvāt eka prakṛtika tvām iti tat idam hetu antaram nigraha sthānam prāk uktā viśeṣaṇa hetoḥ svayam eva hetu tva amarṣaṇāt iti 
[II,691,iii]	atra āha kim ayam dagdhaḥ dahyate mṛtaḥ vā māryate anaikāntika hetu upanyāsena eva khalu ayam tapasvī nigṛhītaḥ eva asādhana aṅga vacanāt iti kṛtam hetu antarākhya nigraha sthāna antara udīraṇena iti atra ucyate yuktam eva tat dvitīye vacasi kathā samāptau yathā tu bhavān āha yadā tu vyabhicāra nirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇam aparam adhika madhunā abhidhātum pravṛttaḥ tadā tad upādānāt eva nigṛhyate iti piṣṭapeṣaṇam saṃprati eva ayam iṣyate puruṣa śakti parīkṣā ātmake ca jalpe nigraha sthānam idam vāde tu viśuddha āśaya tayā vastuni parīkṣyamāṇe viśeṣaṇa antara upādāne api tad vicāraḥ prastotavyaḥ na nigrahaḥ kāryaḥ iti abhiyuktāḥ 
[II,692,i_II,692,iii]	prakṛtāt arthāt apratisaṃbaddha artham artha antaram prakṛtāt arthāt artha antaram tat anaupayikam abhidadhataḥ arthāntaram nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā kaścid vaiyākaraṇa viṭaḥ sphoṭa ātmānam śabdam cetasi nidhāya tat nitya tu asiddhaye nityaḥ śabdaḥ niravayava tvāt iti abhidhitsurā iva durita karma ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tām āśaṅka mānaḥ arthāntaram nāma nigraha sthānam jigamiṣuḥ tatra eva vākya śeṣa chāyayā uttiṣṭhati nityaḥ śabdaḥ niradha yava tvāt iti vayam pāṇinīyāḥ pratipannoḥ ye bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ chātrāḥ iti kaḥ punar bhagavān pāṇiniḥ iti yena akṣara samāmnāyam adhigamya maheśvarāt kṛtsnam vyākaraṇam proktam ācāryaḥ nassa pāṇiniḥ 
[II,692,iv_II,692,v]	kaḥ punar maheśvaraḥ yatas akṣara samāmnāyam adhijagāma pāṇiniḥ iti ati udbhaṭa jaṭā jūṭa koṭi grathita candramāḥ viśva sthiti bhava dhvaṃsa hetuḥ ekaḥ maheśvaraḥ api ca acintya veṣa ābharaṇasya tat ktaḥ yadṛcchayā yasya niśāsu tāṇḍavam sa bhasma bhaktīni bibharti maulinā kṛta aṃjaliḥ pāda rajāṃsi vāsavaḥ 
[II,693,i_II,693,iii]	kīdṛśam punar tāṇḍavam tanoti khaṇḍaparaśuḥ iti itthaṃcārī kramaḥ yasmin ittham ca kara vartanāḥ ittham yatra kaṭi chedāḥ daṇḍa pādāḥ tathā īdṛśāḥ iti ekaikam upadeśayan utthāya nṛtyati tat etat artha antaram nigraha sthānam asādhana aṅgam iti kīrtinā api anumoditam dvayoḥ api ca vādi prativādinoḥ prakṛta an anuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavati adaḥ nigraha sthānam yathākramam ekasya sādhanam anavadyam apaśyataḥ dvitīyasya dūṣaṇam iti 
[II,693,iv_II,693,v]	varṇa krama nirdeśa vat nirarthakam abhidheya rahita varṇa ānupūrvī prayoga mātram nirarthakam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anityaḥ śabdaḥ kacaṭatapānām gaja ḍada ba tvāt ghajhaḍha dhama vat iti evam prakāram idam api vādi prativādinoḥ prakṛta an anuguṇam abhidadhatoḥ bhavati adaḥ nigraha sthānam yathākramam sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca yathā uvitam abhidhātum ajānatoḥ pūrvavat ubhayoḥ api nigraha sthānam 
[II,693,vi_II,693,vii]	atra āha saḥ ayam unmatta pralāpam eva śāstre lakṣayitum upakrāntaḥ na hi anunmattānām īdṛṃśī akṣarāṇi mukhāt nirgacchanti īdṛśām ca nirdeśe kapola vāditra kakṣyā abhitāḍana ādīni api kāmam śāstre nirdiśyantām api ca varṇa krama nirdeśa vat iti matupāḥ nirdeśaḥ eṣa sūtre vat iti vati prayogaḥ vā matuppakṣe sarvam varṇa krama nirdeśa yuktam nigraha sthānam bhavet iti hasta saṃjñā ādibhiḥ idānīm udgrāhiṇikāḥ prastūyeran 
[II,694,i_II,694,ii]	atha anarthakakram asiderśa yuktam iti vyākhyāyate tathā api niyama anupapattiḥ na hi artha rahita varṇa uccāraṇam eva prakṛta anupayogāt nirarthakam eva varṇa krama nirdeśasya api ca kvacid prakaraṇe sārthaka tā dṛśyate eva pratyāhāra vat vati pakṣe tu bhavati diva pradarśanam etat kintu artha antareṇa eva gata artha tvāt pṛthaṅana vaktavyam 
[II,694,iii_II,694,iv]	atra ucyate matupā vatinā vā abhidheya śūnya tva mātram atra vivakṣitam abhidheya śūnyam vacaḥ nirarthakam iti uktam iti bhavati eṣaḥ eva ca artha antarāt asya viśeṣaḥ tatra abhidheyasya bhāve api prakṛta anupayogaḥ ihatu abhidheyam eva na asti iti yatra kvacid prakaraṇa vaśena varṇa krama nirveśasya api sārthaka tā na tat iha udāharaṇam udāharaṇam yadi sphuṭam pṛcchasi na kupyasi ced tat bhavadīyam sarvam eva vacanam iha udāharaṇam saugata darśane śabdānām artha asaṃsparśi tvāt sva lakṣaṇe teṣām apravṛtteḥ apohasya ca ati tuccha tvāt sarvam tad abhidhāne nararthakam 
[II,694,v_II,695,ii]	atas eva ca unmatta pralāpinaḥ śākī abhikṣavaḥ api pariśuddha vṛttayaḥ para lokayāthārthya darśinaḥ śauca ācāra vyavahāreṣu abāhyāḥ mahāntaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ te kāmam artha śūnyam api kathayantaḥ na unmattā bhavitum arhanti evam anyasyārpi prajñā pramādāt kacaṭata pādi vyāharataḥ na unmatta tā yacya uktam īdṛśām gaṇane kā pariniṣṭhā iti tat parihṛtam asakṛt asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā dvāviṃśati bheda tvam āśritam iti kapola vādana ādīni punar akadhā svabhāva tvāt acintyāni eva yasya ca asmin kathā prasaṅge gaṇḍa vāditra ādi cetasi sphurati tasya anyat ati jaghanyam api hṛdayam avataret iti alam kaśmala goṣṭhyā iti 
[II,695,iii_II,695,iv]	parṣad prativādibhyām tris abhihitam api avijñātam avijñāta artham yat sādhana vārkya dūṣaṇa vākyam vā tris abhihitam parṣadā prativādinā na vijñāyate kliṣṭa śabda prayogam aprasiddha prayogam atidruta uccarita minyā ivaṃprakāram avijñāta artham nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati asāmarthya saṃvaraṇāya ca dhūrtaiḥ idam āśrīyate 
[II,695,v_II,696,i]	atra āha artha asaṃpratyayasya samāna tvāt kaḥ asya nirarthakāt bhedaḥ atha prakṛta upayoga yogyam artham asau vadati tadā parṣad prativādinā uramedha avitā kāmam bhavet na tu viduṣaḥ vaktum vivadataḥ parājayaḥ bhavitum arhati kiṃkṛtaḥ ca eṣa tris uccāraṇa niyamaḥ kim rāja ājñayā uta svākyena iti na vidmaḥ atra ucyate nirarthake sarveṇa sarva artha śūnyatā iha tu bhavan api arthaḥ na avagamyate drutatara uccāraṇa ādi vyatikara vaśāt iti katham aviśeṣaḥ tatra ca kalpyate nūnam asāmarthyam ātmīyam āvarītu manāḥ evam abhidhatte na hi samarthaḥ vidvān vispaṣṭam na vakti iti 
[II,696,ii]	tri tva niyamaḥ api na veda vacana nara pati śāsana nibandhanaḥ kintu vastu sthityu panataḥ eva yatas sakṛt dvis api abhihitam api anavadhāna ādinā na gṛhītam iti saṃbhāvyate tris tu yat uktam na jñāyate tatra vaktuḥ eva jāḍyam aneka prāśnika ādi samāje kathitam avaśyam kena api avagamyeta sarveḥ anavagamāt tu vaktā eva nigṛhyate caturdhā paṃcadhā vā abhidhāne tu iṣyamāṇe niravadhitā abhidhānasya prasajyate iti yuktaḥ tris vaṃcana niyamaḥ iti 
[II,696,iii_II,696,iv]	paurvāparya ādi yāgāt apratisaṃbaddha artham apārthakam pūrva apara asaṅgatapada kadambaka uccāraṇāt apratiṣṭhita vākya artham apārthakam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati tat yathā daśa dāḍimāni ṣaṣ apūpā kuṇḍam ajājiḥ na palala piṇḍaḥ kumāryāḥ caitrasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti 
[II,696,v_II,697,i]	atra āha apratisaṃbaddhavat eva asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca nigraha sthāna antaram kasmāt na uktam etena eva gata artha tvāt iti ced yadi evam anarthakena eva gata artha tvāt apārthakam api pṛthaṅana vaktavyam atra ucyate nirarthake na padārthaḥ na vākya arthaḥ kevalam varṇāḥ eva śuṣkāḥ uccāryante artha antare api samanvita padārthe vyavasthāpita vākya artham anupakṛtam tu ucyate iha tu padārtha saṃpratyaye api tad anvayā saṃbhavena vākya artha anavasāyaḥ iti spaṣṭaḥ bhedaḥ prakṛta vivāda āspadībhūte vastuni kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ iti ced uktam atra saṃkṣepa vivakṣāyām dve eva nigraha sthāne asaṃkīrṇa udāharaṇa vivakṣayā tu dvāviṃśati bheda tvam prakṛta vastu siddhiḥ tu dvāviṃśatau api tulyā eva 
[II,697,ii]	yat tu asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca pṛthak upasaṃkhyeyam iti tat na apratisaṃbaddha padārthena eva tad saṃgrahāt yadi tu asaṃbaddha vākyam asaṃbaddha prakaraṇam ca avaśyam vaktavyam tat yuktam eva bhavadīyam śāstram tathā hi vaibhāṣikāṇām asti bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ sautra antikānām ca san apya sau anumeyaḥ yoga ācārāṇām sa ākāram jñānam eva na bāhyaḥ arthaḥ sa ca pratyakṣaḥ mādhyamikānām ākāra śūnyam svaccham jñāna mātram eva iti evam itaretarān anvita vākya prakaraṇam idam aśeṣam eva śākya śāstram āha ca daśa dāḍima vākyasya bauddha śāstrasya ca īdṛśaḥ anyasya ca api abaddhasya pratiṣṭhā kena labhyate 
[II,698,i_II,698,ii]	avayava viparyāsa vacanam aprāpta kālam pratijñā hetu udāharaṇa upanaya nigamana vacana kramam ati laṅghya avayava viparyā sena prayujyamānam anumāna vākyam aprāpta kālam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati 
[II,698,iii]	atra āha na hi padānām vākyeṣu niyataḥ kramaḥ kaścid asti niyata kramakāḥ hi varṇāḥ padatām āpadyante iti yuktam tad antareṇa tad arthān avagamāt na hi ghaṭaḥ iti ukte ghaṭa avagatiḥ bhaṃvati vākyeṣu tu devadatta gām śuklām abhyāja daṇḍena daṇḍena śuklām gām abhyāja devadatta iti krama antareṇa api tathā eva artha pratipatteḥ kim krameṇa anumāna vākye tu paṃca avayavāḥ iti etat eva tāvat prathamam asāṃpratam pratijña ādi ava yavānām asādhāna aṅga vacana tvāt tatra teṣām paṃca avayavānām api prayogaḥ prayoge api ca kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tad ullaṅghanam ca nigraha sthānam iti mahatī mūrkha prakriyā iti 
[II,698,iv]	atra ucyate vākya antareṣu krama vivakṣā bhavatu mā vā bhūt na anena naḥ prayojanam anumāna vākye tu ārthaḥ krama balāt āpatati sva pratipatti anusāreṇa para pratipateḥ utpādanāt sva pratipattau ca dharmi darśana tad gata hetu dharma avadhāraṇa pratibandha smaraṇa parāmarśa jñāna sādhya niścayānām krameṇa darśanāt param prati tathā eva tad abhidhānam kartavyam iti sa vistaram avayava lakṣaṇam nirṇitam etat asādhana aṅga tvacana tvam api pratijña ādi avayavānām tatra eva nirastam atas kramasya iha yukti yukta tvāt tavatikramaḥ bhavati eva nigraha sthānam 
[II,699,i_II,699,ii]	hīnam anyatamena api avathavena nyūnam paṃca avayave vākye prayoktavye sthite tad anyatamena api avayavena hīnam prayuṃjānasya nyūnam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati 
[II,699,iii]	atra āha pratijña ādi ava yava jātam asādhana aṅga vacanam iti atas tad anabhidadhataḥ na nigrahaḥ pratyuta vadataḥ nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ iti atra ucyate anantaram evai tat parihṛtam vistarataḥ ca avayava lakṣaṇe tathā hi śrotuḥ ākāṅkṣā nivṛttaye anumāna vākyam prayujyate iti prathamam tad ākāṅkṣā viṣayaḥ sādhya dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī pradarśyate tatas kāraṇa ākāṅkṣāyām hetu vacanam abhidhīyate kva asya pratibandhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti bubhutsāyām udāharaṇam upapādyate ittham eṣa siddha pratibandhaḥ hetuḥ dharmiṇi bhavet na vā iti śaṅkāyām upanaya vacanam uccāryate tad anantaram sarva avayavānām ekatra upasaṃhārāya nigamanam prayujyate iti anyatamasya aprayogāt nigraha arha tā bhavati eva iti alam atra eva vastuni pade pave kalaha prastāvanena iti 
[II,699,iv_II,700,i]	hetu udāharaṇa adhikam adhikam ekena eva hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā pratipādite arthe hetu antaram dṛṣṭānta antaram vā prayuṃjānasya adhikam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati etat ca vāde tāvat vīta rāga kathā ātmake vastu nirṇaya phale neṣyate eva jalpe api niyama abhyupagamena vadataḥ vādinaḥ idam nigraha sthānam yaḥ hi na mayā āvābhyām vā sādhanam adhikam abhidheyam udāharaṇam vā iti niyamya udgrāhayati saḥ eva tathā nigṛhyate na anyaḥ iti etat ca kīrtinā api evam eva kathitam prapaṃca kathāyām tu na doṣaḥ iti 
[II,700,ii_II,700,iii]	aparaḥ āha niyama abhyupāme api na ayam doṣaḥ pratipatti dra ḍhimne tad abhi dhānāt iti tat ayuktam abhyupagata niyama tyāgāt asau nigraha arhaḥ bhavet kaḥ ca ayam pratipatti draḍhimā prathama prayuktasya hi hetoḥ mṛdu pratipatti kāriṇaḥ hetu tvam eva na syāt utpannasya pratyayasya punar utpādanam yuktam tatra na pūrva hetuḥ adra ḍhimne na api uttaraḥ draḍhimne tasmāt niyama abhyupagame adhika abhidhānam doṣaḥ eva aparam matam akṛta niyamasya api doṣaḥ eva prapaṃca kathāyām apye kena hetunā dṛṣṭāntena vā kṛte nirṇaye dvitīyasya vaiyarthyāt nirṇītasya nirṇaya anupapatteḥ anirṇaya kāriṇaḥ ca prathamasya hetoḥ prayoga anarha tvāt iti 
[II,700,iv_II,701,ii]	śabda arthayoḥ punar uccāraṇam punarvacanam anyatra anuvādāt arthāt āpannasya sva kaṇṭhena punarvacanam śabdasya vā arthasya vā abhihitasya punar abhidhānam punaruktam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati anuvādam varjayitvā śabda punaruktam tāvat yatra pūrva uccāritaḥ eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ nitya śabdaḥ iti 
[II,701,iii_II,701,iv]	artha punaruktam tu yatra saḥ arthaḥ pūrvam anyena śabdena uktaḥ paryāya antareṇa punar ucyate yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ nirodha dharmakaḥ dhvānaḥ iti yadi api ca śabda punarukte api artha paunaruktyam asti eva tathā api śabda pūrvaka tvāt artha pratyabhijñāyāḥ prathamataram śabda pratyabhijñānāt tat paunaruktyam eva tat ucyate jāti apekṣaḥ ca śabda paunarukti a vyavahāraḥ na vyakti apekṣaḥ kṣaṇam bhaṅgi tvāt varṇānām punar prayoga asaṃbhavāt 
[II,701,v_II,701,vii]	anuvāde tu paunarukti ama doṣaḥ yathā hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ puna rvacanam nigamanam iti arthāt āpannasya api sva śabdena punarvacanam bhavati eva punaruktam yathā asatsu megheṣu vṛṣṭiḥ na bhavati iti ukte arthāt āpadyate satsu bhavati iti tat kim artham sva kaṇṭhena punar ucyate artha prati iti arthaḥ hi śabda prayogaḥ pratīte arthe kim tena iti etat ca niyama abhyupagame nigraha sthānam veditavyam akṛta niyamasyam tu na atīva mahān ayam aparādhaḥ 
[II,702,i_II,702,ii]	atra āha na artha punaruktāt anyat śabda punaruktam upapadyate śabda sāmye api artha bheda darśanāt smarata giriśam giriśaḥ nagarī yasya asamaradveṣasya kaḥ iva yadīyasya mudā na garīyasyā samasmaradveṣasya iti tasmāt arthataḥ eva paunaruktyam na śabdataḥ api ca vistara kathāsu kadācana samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkrāyām punar abhidhānam nāma kiyān pramādaḥ arthāt āpannasya ca sva śabdena punarvacanam yadi nigraha sthānam ucyate tarhi pratijñā vacanam eva prathamam nigraha sthānam 
[II,702,iii_II,702,iv]	adhika punaruktayoḥ vā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti vaktavyam yādṛśam tādṛśam ca viśeṣa leśam āśritya pṛthak abhidhāne nigraha sthāna bheda parigaṇanam aśakya kriyam syāt anuvādaḥ ced ucyate hetu apadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanam nigamanam iti tatra pratijñā eva tāvat asādhvī tasyāḥ punarvacanam sādhu bhaviṣyati iti kā iyam kathā 
[II,702,v]	atra ucyate yat uktam artha punaruktāt anyat na śabda punaruktam iti tat evam eva pṛthak nirdeśaḥ tu anayā vivakṣayā yaḥ hi śakti atiśaya cikhyā apayiṣayā sakṛt prayuktaḥ śabdaḥ punar mayā na prayoktavyaḥ iti pratijñāya jalpam pravartayati sa śabda punaruktena api nigṛhyate iti niyamya vādinaḥ eva nigrahāt tatas anyasya samyak aśravaṇa śaṅkayā punar vadataḥ api na doṣaḥ artha ākṣipta kathanam api kṛta niyamasya eva doṣaḥ na anyasya iti 
[II,703,i_II,703,iv]	atas eva vāde na nigraha sthānam idam api tu jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ eva vijigīṣu kathayoḥ tayoḥ ca sa prayojana tvam kathā antara tvam ca purā samarthitam eva yat tu pratijña uccāraṇam artha ākṣipta tvāt tad anuvādaḥ ca nigamana vacanam aphalataram iti tad avayava lakṣaṇe vistareṇa samāhitam adhika punaruktayoḥ tu ayam vispaṣṭaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ anyam hetum anyam vā dṛṣṭāntam tatra eva sādhye abhidadhat adhika vādī bhavati tam eva hetum dṛṣṭāntam vā punar cadan punar ukta vādi iti yat tu evaṃvidha viśeṣa āśrayaṇe parigaṇa nam adhaṭamānam iti tat avāntara viśeṣa vivakṣayā evam eva asaṅkīrṇa udāharaṇa pradarśanāya tu dvāviṃśati nirdeśa aiti uktam 
[II,703,v_II,704,i]	vijñātasya parṣadā tris abhihitasya api anuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam parṣadā viditasya vādinā tris uccāritasya api yat apratyuccāraṇam tat ananubhāṣaṇam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati apratyuccārayan kim āspadam dūṣaṇam abhidadhīta nanu yadi ananu bhāṣya api tatra uttaram brūyāt kim iti nigṛhyeta na ca yaḥ anubhāṣitum asamarthaḥ saḥ uttaram api dātum akṣamaḥ bhavati vicitra tvāt puruṣa śaktīnām na etat evam ananubhāṣaṇe tad uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt kva uttaram prayujyeta prayuktam vā katham avadhāryeta 
[II,704,ii]	na ca evam brūmaḥ yāvat kiṃcid vādinā sa vistaram abhidhīyate tad akhilam anyūnā anatiriktam anujjhita kramakam prativādī tathā eva anubhāṣeta iti yaḥ tu samasta anubhāṣaṇam tathā kuryāt api nāma tena sva kauśalam eva kevalam mupadarśitam bhavati medhāvi tvam vā na tu evam akurvan pratyaveyāt iti stoka stokam anubhāṣamāṇaḥ tathā eva ca krameṇa dūṣayan na nigraham āpnuyāt iti 
[II,704,iii]	atra āha yadi vādī sva pakṣa mādhana vivaraṇa vartmanā bahutaram akṛta kama prakṛta artham upakṣipet tat kim prativādinā sarvam anubhāṣaṇīyam hetu mātram tu anūdya dūṣaṇam udbhāvayataḥ na asya nigrahaḥ yuktaḥ dūṣaṇa viṣayam tu hetu mātram api yaḥ anubhāṣitum akauśalaḥ saḥ uttara viṣaya aparijñānāt uttaram api pratipattum asamarthaḥ eva iti apratibhayā nigṛhyatām kim ananubhāṣaṇena 
[II,704,iv]	api ca tris abhihitasya iti kā iyam paribhāṣā tathā ca vādī para avabodha artham vākyam prayuṃjīta para upadrava artham vā tatra para avabodha arthe vākye para avabodhaḥ eva abhidhāna vidhiḥ na dvis tris vā niyamaḥ yāvat kṛtvas prayukte vākye parasya ayabodhaḥ jāyate tāvat kṛtvas prayoktavyam para upadrava artham tu vākya uccāraṇam akṣataḥ eva dharmaḥ prāśnikān yathā tathā saṅketena api brodhayitvā duḥśliṣṭa kaṣṭa śabda prayoga ādi āḍambara viracanayā api āndhyam utpādya parān uparudhyeta iti mahat kaśmalam etat na ca īdṛśam śāstre vyutpādana arham tasmāt bahu kṛtvas api abhidhāya prativādī bodhayitavyaḥ na tu dvis uccāritam apratyuccaran nigṛhītavyaḥ iti 
[II,705,i_II,705,ii]	atra ucyate na khalu sakṛt eva sakala para viracita vacana saṃdarbha anubhāṣaṇam avilambita kramakam asmābhiḥ api kartavya tayā upadiṣṭam api tu yathocita dūṣaṇa viṣaya anubhāṣaṇa mātram eva yaḥ tu stokam api anubhāṣitum apragalbhaḥ tasya uttara pratibhānam api na asti iti yat ucyate tad asamyak anyat ananubhāṣaṇam anyat uttarā pratibhānam kasyacid aśeṣam anubhāṣitavataḥ api uttara apratibhāna darśanāt tat idam anuttara viṣayānuddha ūṣaṇam nigraha sthānam ucyate na uttara apratibhānam uttara apratibhānam anantaram vakṣyate 
[II,705,iii]	yat tu tris uccāraṇa paribhāṣā kutastyeti vikalpitam tad avijñāta artha nāmni nigraha sthāne prativihitam vīta rāga kathā ātmake vāde śiṣṭa ādi bhiḥ saha kriyamāṇe kāmam astu para avabodha avadhi vākya uccāraṇam jalpe tu vijigīṣu kathāyām puruṣa śakti parīkṣaṇāt avaśyam uccāraṇa niyamaḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ tatra sakṛt vā dvis vā abhihitasya agrahaṇam anavadhāna ādinā api saṃbhavan na nigrahāya kalpate tris abhihitasya tu sarvaiḥ agrahaṇe vaktuḥ eva aparādhaḥ anyaiḥ gṛhītasya prativādinā tu agrahaṇe tasya nigrahaḥ vāra trayāt ūrdhvam api abhidhāne tu āśrīyamāṇe jalpa ādau kathā samāptiḥ eva na syāt chātra śālā hi asau bhavet na udgrāhiṇikā bhūmiḥ iti 
[II,706,i_II,706,iii]	avijñānam ca ajñānam pariṣadā vijñātasya api vādi vākyasya prativādinā yat avijñānam tat ajñānam nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati avidita uttara viṣayaḥ hi kva uttaram brūyāt iti ajñānam apratibhā iti na anayoḥ viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ atra ucyate bhinna viṣaya tvāt adoṣaḥ uttara viṣaya apratipattiḥ ajñānam uttara apratipattiḥ tu apratibhā iti 
[II,706,iv]	nanu uttara viṣarya yaḥ na jānāti saḥ uttaram api na jānāti eva mā evam uttara viṣayam jānan api kiṃcid uttaram na jānāti iti loka dṛṣṭam etat evam tarhi ananubhāṣaṇena gata artham ajñānam ajñāte hi parakīye vākya arthe tad anubhāṣaṇe sāmarthya abhāva darśanāt santi hi kecid ye anubhāṣitum aśaknuvantaḥ patrikā ādi likhitam tadā āvedayanti iti evam trayāṇām api ca na paunaruktyam uttara viṣaya apratipattiḥ ajñānam pratipattau api tat apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam anubhāṣite api uttarā pratipattiḥ apratibhā iti 
[II,707,i]	nanu yadi ajñāna sāmye api viṣaya bhedam āśritya nigraha sthāna nānā tvam ityam abhidhīyate tarhi ajñāna prakāra vaicitryāt bheda antarāṇi api vaktavyāni iti uktam atra sāra saṃgraha vivakṣayā dve eva nigraha sthāne vipratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ ca iti itaretara visadṛśa udāharaṇa diś pradarśanāya dvāviṃśati bheda tvam ucyate avāntara viśeṣaiḥ tu tat ānantyam abhyupagamyate eva tathā ca dvāviṃśati varge hetvābhāsāḥ ca iti paṭhitam te ca sva rūpeṇa eva tāvat paṃca savyabhicāra viruddha prakaraṇa sama sādhya sama atīta kālāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ iti avāntara bhedāḥ ca teṣām atibahavaḥ santi eva iha tu ekam eva tad nigraha sthānam ādiṣṭam hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ iti tasmāt ittham samāsa vyāsa varṇanāt alam pade pade paryanuyogena iti 
[II,707,ii_II,708,i]	uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā para pakṣe gṛhīte api tasmin uttara apratibhānam apratibhā nāma prativādinaḥ nigraha sthānam bhavati ajñāna ādibhyaḥ bhinna tā asya darśitā eva kīrtiḥ api ca etat anumanyate eva nigraha sthānam nanu uttaram apratipadyamānaḥ sadasi prativādī katham āsīta yat kiṃcid vikatthamānaḥ tat yathā hṛd puṇḍarīka vikasat sakalān avadya vidyā avadāta vadanaḥ kva janaḥ asmad ādiḥ kva ayam vaṭuḥ katipaya akṣara leśa lipta jihvā anvitaḥ katham anena saha abhidadhmaḥ dāna ārdra gandha gaja kumbha kapāṭa bhedi bhīma sphurat nakha śikhā śikharaḥ kva siṃhaḥ kva amī samīraṇa vidhūta pūrāṇaparṇa pāta udbhavat bhaya vilola dṛśaḥ kuraṅgāḥ ityādi yat vā tat vā pralapan āste 
[II,708,ii_II,708,iii]	kārya vyāsaṃgāt kathā vicchedaḥ vikṣepaḥ udgrāhaṇikām upakramya vā tat grāhayitavyam mayā iti pratiśratya vā abhimukham prativādini sannihiteṣu prāśnikeṣu kārya vyāsaṅgam vyapadiśati idam me karaṇīyam apahīyate gacchāmi iti abhidhāya kathām vicchinatti yaḥ sa vikṣepeṇa parājīyate anyatara nigraha antā hikathā bhavati sa cattham kathām kurvan ātmanā eva ātmānam nigṛhṇāti pratiśyāyena me kaṇṭha uparodhaḥ udapādi padam api vaktum na yujyate jananī me jīvitam jahāti sma tām śmaśāna bhuvam prāpayya vahnisāt karomi iti 
[II,709,i_II,709,ii]	atra āha yadi tāvat paramārthataḥ eva mātṛmarāṇa ādi kāryaṃmasya upasthitam tat kim iti tapasvī parājīyate udgrāhaṇikā ajitaḥ mā bhūvam iti kim asau mṛtām mātaram api mā dhākṣīt iti mahat subhāṣitam iti pīnasa avaruddha sthāna karaṇaḥ vā katham vācam udīrayatu atha asāmarthya sthaganāya vitatham api kathayati tathāvidham asau kārya vyāsaṅgam tarhi satyam nigṛhyate na tu vikṣepeṇa kintu anyena eva vādī tāvat druta kartavya vyāja vyapadeśāt artha antara gamana ādinā nigṛhyate prativādī tu apratibhayā eva iti atiprasaṅgaḥ ca evaṃprakāraṇām nirdeśe bhavet iti 
[II,709,iii_II,709,v]	atra ucyate kathām upakramya pratijñām vā hetum abhidhāya tad vivaraṇa saraṇimiṣam abalambya kiṃcid artha antaram upanyasyati yat tat artha antaram udāhṛtam ādau eva iha tu kathā pūrva raṅge kathāyām vā kim api karaṇīya nibham abhidhāya sa bhayam apasarati sadasaḥ iti katham iva tad tulya tā bhavati apratibhayā api śruta pūrva pakṣaḥ parājīyate iha tu pūrva pakṣam eva na śṛṇoti vā na karoti vā prathamam eva palāyate iti mahān viśeṣaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ tu asakṛt parākṛtaḥ yat tu hetvābhāseṣu antar bhāvam asya kīrtiḥ akīrtayat tat atīva subhāṣitam kva hetvābhāsaḥ kva kārya vyāsaṅgaḥ saṃpradhāraṇā eva ramaṇīyeyam ahetavau hetu vat avabhāsamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ kim asya kārya vyāsaṅgasya ahetoḥ hetu vat ābhāsanam kīrtinā dṛṣṭam iti param naḥ kutūhalam 
[II,710,i_II,710,ii]	sva pakṣe doṣa abhyupagamāt para pakṣe doṣa prasaṃgaḥ mata anujñā sva dakṣe para āpādita doṣam anuddhṛtya abhyupagamya tam eva para pakṣe pratīpa mā āpādayataḥ para ma tā anujñānāt mata anujñā nāma nigraha sthānam bhavati yathā cauraḥ bhavān puruṣa tvāt prasiddha caura vat iti ukte sati āha bhavān api cauraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti saḥ ayam evam vadan ātmanaḥ para āpāditam doṣam abhyupagatavān iti mata anujñayā nigṛhyate 
[II,710,iii_II,710,iv]	atra āha anaikāntike hetau pareṇa ukteḥ tad udbhāvanam anena prakāreṇa prativādī karoti iti kim iti nigṛhyate vādyā iva hetvābhāsa prayogāt nigṛhyate iti atra ucyate uktam ādau eva sva pakṣe doṣam anuddhṛtya iti evam hi tena vaktavyam anaikāntikaḥ ayam hetuḥ acaure api puruṣa tvasya darśanāt iti evam hi sa doṣaḥ uddhṛtaḥ bhavati evam tu anabhidhāya bhavān api coraḥ puruṣa tvāt iti vadan anujānāti eva para matam atas anaikāntika tve vaktavye tad udbhāvanā anukramam avadhīrya atiprasaṅgam āpādayat nigraha arhaḥ bhavaṣi eva iti vādinaḥ ca anaikāntika hetu prayoge api tad anudbhāvanānna parājayaḥ prativādinaḥ eva hi idam sannikṛṣṭam nigraha sthānam iti 
[II,711,i_II,711,ii]	nigraha prāptasya anigrahaḥ paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam paryanuyojyaḥ nāma nigraha upapattyā codanīyaḥ idam te nigraha sthānam upanatam atas nigṛhītaḥ asi iti evam vacanīyaḥ te yaḥ upekṣate na anuyuṅkte sa paryanuyojya upekṣaṇāt nigṛhyate 
[II,711,iii]	atra āha kaḥ kasya idam nigraha sthānam āpādayati kim paryanuyojyaḥ uta tad upekṣakaḥ upekṣakaḥ tāvat asya paryanuyojyatām eva na jānāti jānan vā katham enam upekṣeta upekṣya vā kim ātmanaḥ eva nigraha sthānam udbhāvayan evam ācaṣṭām eṣa paryanuyojyaḥ api mayā upekṣitaḥ iti nigṛhītaḥ asmi iti paryanuyojyaḥ api katham ātmīyam avadyam prakāśayet idam me dūṣaṇam tat ca bhavatā na udbhāvitam atas bhavān jitaḥ iti sa khalu evam abhidadhat amedhyam pāṇau nidhāya param kalaṅkayitu kāmaḥ param kalaṅkayan eva ātma kalaṅakam anubhavati eva iti 
[II,711,iv_II,712,i]	api ca na idam nigraha sthāna antaram apadiśyate kintva pratibhā eva iti tathā hi yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam sādhana ābhāsam avyācakṣāṇam upekṣeta tatra dūṣaṇam na udbhāvayet tad uttara apratipattyā na nigṛhyate na paryanuyojya upekṣaṇena vastutas tu dvayoḥ api tatra jaya parājaya nirdhāraṇam anupapannam ekasya sādhana ābhāsa va ādi tvāt itarasya ca tad uttara apratibhānāt atha pūrva pākṣikaḥ dūṣaṇa ābhāsa vādinam doṣa prāptam uttara pākṣikam na nigṛhṇāti tathā api tasya duruttara apratibhā eva na ca anyatarasya api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā nirdhāryate ekasya dūṣaṇa ābhāsa va ādi tvāt itarasya ca tadanu dbhāvanāt 
[II,712,ii_II,712,iii]	atra ucyate na apratibhāyāḥ samyak sādhana viṣaya tvāt samyak sādhane ca prayukte tad uttarasya apratipattiḥ apratibhā bhavati sādhana ābhāse tu prayukte tad ābhāsatānudbhāvanāt paryanuyojya upekṣaṇam bhavati atra tu sādhana ābhāsa vādī paryanuyojyaḥ saḥ upekṣitaḥ tatra samyak sādhana vādī tu aparyanuyojyaḥ eva iti viśeṣaḥ yat tu vastu vṛttena na kasyacid api jayaḥ parājayaḥ vā iti tat evam eva kintu jalpe puruṣa śakti parīkṣāyām idam nigraha sthānam ucyate 
[II,712,iv_II,712,v]	tad udbhāvayitā api yat vikalpitaḥ tatra api ucyate pūrva pākṣikeṇa sādhanā bhāse prayukte uttara pākṣikeṇa tasmin tathā tvena anudbhāvite prāśnikānām apṛṣṭānām vaktum avasara abhāvāt saḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa vādī kadācid vaiyātyāt evam brūyāt mayā asya śaktim jijñāsamānena sādhana ābhāsa prayogaḥ kṛtaḥ eṣa tu mūrkhaḥ tam na jānāti iti tadā katham na nigṛhyate etena dūṣaṇa ābhāsava ādī api vyākhyātaḥ athavā ubhaya abhyarthitāḥ sabhā pati niyuktāḥ vā prāśnikāḥ tathā kathayantaḥ nigṛhṇanti eva paryanuyojya upekṣiṇam sādhana ābhāsa vādinaḥ hi dhūrta tayā tad abhidhānam samyak sādhanam ajānataḥ artha saṃśayāt vā saṃbhavati uttara pākṣikasya tu tad anudbhāvanam mohāt eva iti saḥ eva parājīyate 
[II,713,i_II,713,ii]	anigraha sthāne nigraha sthāna abhiyogaḥ niranuyojya anuyogaḥ anujjhita yathā ucita kramam upapanna vādinam apramādi nam anigraha aham api nigṛhītaḥ asi iti yaḥ brūyāt saḥ eva abhūta doṣa udbhāvanāt nigṛhyate 
[II,713,iii]	atra āha yadi tāvat uttara pākṣikaḥ pūrva pākṣikam aduṣṭa sādhana vādinam abhūtaiḥ eva doṣaiḥ abhiyuṅkte tathā sati bhūta doṣa udbhāvanasya uttarasya apratipatteḥ apratibhayā eva sa nigṛhyatām kim niranuyojya anuyoga ākhya nūtana nigraha sthāna parājīyate bhūta doṣa abhiyoga pakṣe tu pūrva pākṣikaḥ eva sādhana ābhāsa yogāt anuyojyaḥ eva khalu asau na niranuyojya anuyogasya viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati kathanena 
[II,713,iv_II,714,i]	atra ucyate aho nu khalu ayam tapasvī paryudāsasya prasajya pratiṣedhasya ca viśeṣam apaśyan atimātram muhyati bhūta doṣa apratibhānam anyat anyat ca abhūta doṣa pratibhānam ekatra apratipattiḥ itaratra viparīta pratipattiḥ tatra bhūta doṣa apratipattiḥ apratibhā abhūta doṣa pratipattiḥ ananuyojya anuyogaḥ api ca asādhana aṅga vacanam adoṣa udbhāvanam ca yat bhavatā nigraha sthānam ākhyātam tatra kathyate 
[II,714,ii_II,714,iii]	tatra prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva kevalam āśriyamāṇe hetvābhāsāḥ api na nigraha sthāne bhaveyuḥ sādhanaṅgasya anabhidhānam maukyam eva kevalam nigraha sthānam bhavet tasmāt asādhana aṅga vacanam adīṣa udbhāvanam api paryudāsa vyākhyāna arha bhavati eva tatas ca bhūta doṣa anudbhāvanam apratibhā abhuta doṣaḥ dbhāvanam ca niranuyojya anuyogaḥ atha abhūta doṣa udbhāvane api bhūta doṣa apratibhānam asti eva iti tat eva astu nigraha sthānam iti ucyate tarhi mūka tvam eva ekam nigraha sthānam syāt asādhana aṅga vacane api evam vaktum śakya tvāt iti uktam eva 
[II,714,iv_II,714,v]	siddhāntam abhyupetya aniyamāt kathā prasaṅgaḥ aprasiddha antaḥ yaḥ kaṃcana prathamam siddhāntam abhyupagamya kathām upakramate tathā pravṛttaḥ ca siṣā dhayiṣita artha samarthana rabhasena dūṣaṇa uddharaṇa śraddhayā vā siddhānta viruddham abhidhatte saḥ apasiddhāntena parājoyate tat yathā sāṃkhyaḥ prativādi sannidhāne na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ
[II,715,i]	iti sva siddhāntam prathamam pratijñāya pradhāna siddhaye sādhana prayogam karoti vyaktam vikāra jātam eka prakṛti samanvaya darśanāt mṛd anvitāḥ hi mṛd vikārāḥ kuṇḍa piṭhara śarāva prabhṛtayaḥ eka prakṛtikāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ evam asya api gavāśvādi vikāra jātasya sukha duḥkha moha anvaya darśanāt tad ātmaka eka prakṛti prabhava tvena bhavitavyam 
[II,715,ii]	evam uktavān asau naiyāyikena anuyujyate atha kā prakṛtiḥ nāma kā ca dikṛtiḥ iti avidita prakṛti vikṛti svarūpaḥ hi katham vikṛtīnām eka prakṛti tvam eka tvam jānīyāt iti evam anuyuktaḥ kāpilaḥ āha yasya avasthitasya dharma antara nivṛttau dharma antaram pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ yat tad dharma antaram pravartate sā vikṛtiḥ iti 
[II,715,iii_II,716,i]	saḥ ayam evam vadan prāc abhyupagata sada sannirodha prabhava abhāva siddhānta viruddha abhidhānāt apasiddhāntena nigṛhyate yadi pūrva dharma nirodhe dharma antara prādurbhāvaḥ tadā na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti sva siddhāntaḥ hīyete atha siddhāntaḥ na tyajyate tarhi prakṛti vikāra aniścayāt hetu asiddhau sādhya abhāvaḥ prasajyate iti 
[II,716,ii_II,716,iii]	atra āha hetu prayogam kṛtavati kapile naiyāyikaḥ tad asiddha tā udbhāvanayā pratyavatiṣṭhatām prakṛti vikṛti svarūpa praśnasya kaḥ avasaraḥ tat idam artha antara gamanam asya bhavet evam pṛcchataḥ artha antara gamanam sva granthe nigraha sthānaḥ ucyate atha ca adhunā tena eva vyavahniyate iti kaḥ ayam nayaḥ yadi tu sāṃkhya matam nirācikīrṣitam tat asiddha tā eva hetoḥ udbhāvyatām prakṛti anvayasya vikāreṣu asaṃbhavāt iti vikārāḥ hi pravṛtti nivṛtti dharmakāḥ na ca evaṃprakāram avyaktam avyakta dharma anvaye hi vikārāṇām pravutti nivṛtti ātmaka tvam hīyeta iti evam asiddha tvāt hetoḥ hetvābhāsa prayogāt eva sāṃkhyaḥ nigṛhītaḥ iti na nigraha sthāna antaram apasiddhāntaḥ iti 
[II,716,iv]	atra ucyate satyam asiddhaḥ bhavatu ayam kāpila kalpitaḥ hetuḥ prakṛti vikṛti praśna krameṇa api tat asiddha tvam avadhārayitum śakyataḥ eva kintu hetu rūpe avadhārite tat dūṣaṇam abhidhānīyam anavadhāritasya dūṣayitum aśakya tvāt iti tad praśnaḥ na artha antara gamanam praśna uttaram eva bhāṣamāṇaḥ parāmarśe nikaṭatara parisphura dapasiddhānta abhidhāna nibandhana nigraha antara viṣaya tām pratipannaḥ iti hetvābhāsa vartmani na dūram gamyate kvacid api para nigrahasya hetau hṛdaya patham prathamam kila avatīrṇe aparam api na kāraṇam vicintyam kim iva phalam khalu piṣṭapeṣaṇasya 
[II,717,i_II,717,ii]	hetvābhāsāḥ ca yathā uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ tu pūrva ukta lakṣaṇaiḥ eva lakṣitāḥ nigraha sthāna tām yānti yathā uktā iti atas abravīt pramāṇasya prameya tvam prameyasya pramāṇa tā yathā lakṣaṇa bhedena na tathā eteṣu dṛśyate bhedena uktāḥ kimartham te iti nigaditā pūrvam eva atra yuktiḥ vāde hi ete prayojyāḥ praguṇanaya vidā tattva śuddhim vidhātum eteṣām dharma kīrteḥ api ca na vimatiḥ nigraha sthāna tāyām ittham dvāviṃśatiḥ naḥ gurubhiḥ abhihitāḥ nigraha sthāna bhedāḥ 
[II,717,iii]	iti evam sūtra kāra āgamam anusara tā anujjhatā bhāṣya bhūmim sthāne sthāne pareṣām matam atula gati kṣiṇvatā tārkikāṇām kāṃcid vākya artha carcām api viracayatā anukrameṇa avatīrṇā nirṇītaḥ sve nibandhe nipuṇam iha mayā ṣoḍaśā ete padārthāḥ nyāya udgāra gabhīra nirmala girā gaurīpatiḥ toṣitaḥ vāde yena kirīṭinā iva samare devaḥ kirāta ākṛtiḥ prāpta udāra varaḥ tatassa jayati jñāna amṛta prārthanā namra aneka mahā ṛṣi mastaka valat pādaḥ akṣapādaḥ muniḥ vādeṣu ātta jayaḥ jayantaḥ iti yaḥ khyātaḥ satām agraṇīḥ anvarthaḥ nava vṛtti kāraḥ iti yam śaṃsanti nāmnā budhāḥ sūnuḥ vyāpta digantarasya yaśasā candrasya candra tviṣā cakre candra kalā ardha cūḍa caraṇa dhyāyī sa dhanyām kṛtim namaḥ śaśikalā koṭi kalpyamāna aṅkura śriye prapanna jana saṃkalpa kalpavṛkṣāya śambhave
